lekin daad dainee padtee hai snatkaron ko jo aisay bohat se digrmsayl ki terhan is maslay ka hal nikaalte mein bhi kamyaab ho gaye hain
ghair mulki tehqeeqi jareeday fiction mein shaya honay wali report ke mutabiq snatkaron nay﻿ aik aisi battery tayaar karli hai jisay saal mein sirf 1 baar charge karna parre ga
magar yeh battery kamray ke daraja hararat mein behtareen kaam kere gi
is aylominim ion battery ko jet laboratory, کالٹیک, larns برکلی national laboratory Nasa , hnda reserch insti tute ke mahireen par mushtamil team naay tayyar kya hai jisay aik بارچارج karne ke baad taqreeban 10 Mahtaq dobarah charge karne ki zaroorat nahi rehti
tehqeeqi team ke sarbarah aur 2008 hamza mein noble inaam haasil karne walay chemiya ke professor Robert  grbs ne bataya ke aylominim ion battery murawaja لیتھیم batrion ke muqablay mein 20 gina taaqat war hoti hain aur inhen 10 mah taq charge karne ki zaroorat nahi padtee
team ke sarbarah professor Robert  grace ke mutabiq aam istemaal ki jany wali لیتھیم batrion ke muqablay mein yeh aylominim ion battery 20 gina ziyada taaqatwar hai isi liye usay kaafi mahino taq re charge karne ki zaroorat paish nahi aati
fi al haal yeh nai ijaad tayari ke marahil mein hai lekin is ke nataij heran kin hon ge
1990 hamza mein bhi science daan برومائڈ ion battery bananay mein kamyaab hogaye thay taham is ki tayari mein maya ajzaa istemaal kiye gaye thay jis ki wajah se yeh betria sirf kam darjah hararat par hi kaam kar paati theen chunancha science daano ki yeh koshish kamyaab rahi
is baar science daan is maslay ka hal bhi dhoandne mein kamyaab hogaye aur pehli martaba aisi aylominim ion battery tayyar karli hai jo kamray ke darjaa hararat par bhi behtareen tareeqay se kaam kere gi

bhotan ke liye 23 flayts Bharat  se jati hain is liye Pakistan  ko Bharat  se کچچ seekhnay ki zaroorat hai ﻿پیساڈینا, California  : Nasa  ke jadeed tareen satellite naay haal hi mein pehli martaba zameen ki janib' پلوٹو' ki aawaz record karkay arsaal ki hai jo wahan aandhi chalne ki baais peda horahee thi
yakam July  ko Nasa  ko incite satellite laboratory ki janib se پلوٹو aawaz ki video masool hui hai
agarchay is satellite ko aawaz record karne ke liye design nahi kya gaya tha balkay is mein پلوٹو ka darjah hararat, fazai nami, hawai dabao aur mosmyati tabdeeli ka ahwaal maloom karne walay jadeed tareen alaat nasb kiye gaye hain taham video file bhi masool hogayi hai
masool shuda aawaz ki file khud پلوٹو hawaon ka shore nahi balkay yeh incite par lagey tkone shamsi ( solar ) pinlz se aandhi ke takaraane ke baad peda shuda harkaat ki soorat mein record hui hai
incite par nasb jadeed tareen s ای aayi s nizaam mein paanch hassas tareen ھوائی dabao pema ( بیرومیٹر ) nasb hain un mein aik mukhtasir muddat ke artaashat mehsoos karne wala کوارٹز sensor bhi laga hai jo 75 hurts ki aawaz mehsoos karsaktha hai jo insani samaat ke buland tareen darjay mein shaamil hai

incite science team ke rukan tam پائک ne kaha ke yeh aik bohat barray mike ki terhan hai
solr pinlz ke atraaf lagey aspikrz aur is par parney wali aawaz aasani se record hogayi hai jo suneney mein kuch normal bhi lagti hai

manfi asraat muratab karta hai mahireen neh yeh inkishaaf kya hai ke tally vision aap ke ghar ka fard ban'nay ke sath sath aap ke ghar ka aik fard kaam bhi kar sakta hai jee haan taaza tareen tahaqeeq ke mutabiq agar tally vision ko 12 se 13 ghantay dekna jaan lewa ho sakta hai is liye tally vision ko zavia badal badal kar din mein sirf 3 se 4 ghantay dekna chahiye jis se aap nah to aap ke dimagh bhi thi jinhon ney augst mein Afghanistan  cricket team ke head coach ka ohda sanbhala tha newzea land ke Inzimam  Al Haq  ko yaqeen hai ke un ki team ki kamyabi dosray test se qabal Pakistani  team adakara pryanka ki shadi aik saal qabal aroon baala se hui thi lekin dono ke darmain zehni qurbat nahi ho payi thi jis ke baais do mah baad jore ke darmain Talaq  ho gayi thi ilawa azeen nakaam filmi zindagi ki wajah se pryanka ke –apne hdaytkaron se bhi ikhtilafat hogaye they
un tamam pareshaniyon ki wajah se woh shadeed nafsiati uljan ka shikaar theen

laash ki tadfeen ke baad baqaida tehqiqaat ka aaghaz kya jaye ga

barclay, California  aanar woh khush zayega aur khobsorat phal hai jis ke mutaliq taaza inkishaaf sun-hwa hai ke yeh gurday ke amraaz kaileeay mufeed honay ke sath sath kayi aqsam ke cancer ke phelao ko roknay mein bhi bohat mufeed hai aanar aik khobsorat aur khush زائقہ phal hai par aap is ke fawaid sun kar hakka bakka reh jayen ge haal hi mein aanar ke baray mein کیلیفورنیہ ke aik science daan ney inkishaaf kya hai ke aanar aisay mufeed ajzaa ka murakkab hai jo ke diabeties jaisi mohliq bemari ke ilaaj ke liye bohat mo-asar hai ibtidayi tehqiqaat se maloom sun-hwa hai ke aanar mein kuch aisay khamray hain jo khalion mein oxygen aur soozish ki kami ka baais bantay hain jo ke DNAe mein tabdeeli ki wajah bantay hain is terhan aanar gurday ke amraaz kaileeay bohat mufeed hai aur diabeties se bachao ki wajah bantaa hai baad azeen aanar mein kuch aisay ajzaa mojood hotay hain jo ke diabeties shuda khalion ko baqi ke sahet mand khalion se bachatey hain hum yeh keh satke hain ke aanar har lehaaz se gurdon ke liye aik نہائیت mufeed ilaaj hai
is ke ilawa aik aur tehqeeqi mutalay se maloom sun-hwa hai aanar mein bohat ziyada miqdaar mein poli فینولز aur anti آکسیڈ nuts hotay hain jo ke wazan kam karne mein mo-asar saabit ho satke hain mahireen ka kehna hai ke aanar ka ras rozana peenay se jismani wazan kam karne bhi madad millti hai mahireen ka mazeed kehna hai ke ke aanar khanay se gurday ke amraaz ko sahet yab honay mein bohat madad millti hai aur gurday feel honay ka چانسسز bohat kam reh jatay hain آرٹیفیشل mithaas ke baghair hi aanar ka ras rozana piinaa ensaan mein khoon ki kami ko bhi poora karta hai jis se pauney jism mein khoon ka bahao normal rehta hai aur balad pressure bhi control mein rehta hai pas tahaqeeq se saabit sun-hwa ke aanar aik bohat mufeed phal hai jis ke istemaal se gurday aur barhay hue wazan jaisi bimarion se chhutkara haasil kya ja sakta hai

kamyaab operation kya aur usay 3 din baad chhutti day di gayi lehaza Mohammad  Ashfaq  doctors ke is mashwaray par unkay bohat shukar guzaar hain prinka chopra aur nuk جونس ne America  mein budh mat aqaed ke mutabiq shadi kar li hai hai Bollywood ki super star aur Texas  se talluq rakhnay walay gulukar ki shadi ki yeh taqreeb New York ke aik mehal mein khandan walon aur qareebi doston ki mojoodgi kar chuki hain vskansn ( web disk ) qaryin ke liye yeh baat bohat heran kin hogi ke diabeties aur cancer ke mareezon ke deriinaa zakhamo ka ilaaj ab electrical patti se mumkin hai jo ke khud bakhud saans letay hue pasliyon ke phelnay aur sukarnay ki harkaat se bijli peda karti hai mahireen naay yeh باسہولت electrical patti banai hai jo mareez ke ghoomnay phirnay se bijli banati hai jadeed dressing mein bohat bareek nino jnritrz lagaye gaye hain aur un se aik taar nikal kar pahannay walay ke badan taq jaakar wahan aik pewand se munsalik hota hai jaisay jaisay mareez chalta phirta hai to nino jnritrz mein bijli banti hai aur bijli ki lehron se darina naasoor taizi se mundamil hona shuru hojata hai jo deriinaa zakham ke ilaaj ko taiz karti hai is patti se mareez ko kisi bhi qisam ki pareshani ka saamna darpaish nahi hai yeh khaas tor par diabeties aur cancer ke mareezon ke ilaaj ke liye banai gayi hai diabeties aur cancer mein mubtala mareez kisi bhi zakham ko kam waqt mein theek nahi kar paate kyunkay un ki aﮦ kam hojati hai baad azan yeh naya ilaaj ab bohat mehanga hai lekin anay walay waqton mein is mein numaya kami waqay honay ka imkaan hai tehqiqaat ke mutabiq yeh electrical bandage diabeties aur cancer ke mareezon ke ilawa dil aur sugar ke mareezon ke liye bhi istemaal ki ja sakay gi tajurbah gaah mein billi par kiye gay tajarbaat se saabit sun-hwa ke jo zakham aam halaat mein 16 rozmin durust hotay hain electrical patti naay usay 4 din mein theek kardiya Mumbai  ( si an an ) naamwar hollywood gulukarah aur kthk dancer Niha  dhopya –apne se chay saal chhootey larke ke sath shadi karne par print media par tanqeed ka shikaar ho gayeen
adakara Niha  dhopya guzashta saal 22 September  ko –apne bachpan ke saathi aur mosiqaar انگد bidi singh ke sath shadi ke bandhan mein bandhi theen
adakara دپیکا پڈوکون aur rnoyr singh ki terhan Niha  dhopya ki shadi ke charchay bhi kayi mah taq akhbarat ki zeenat banay rahay jab ke un ke chahanay walon ki janib se dono ko Ahaef  dainay ka silsila bhi jari raha taham kuch shaiqeen ko Niha  ki khushhali aik aankh nahi بھارہیں aur inhen –apne se chay saal chhote shakhs se shadi karne par tanqeed ka nishana banaya ja raha hai
Niha  dhopya 28 baras ki hain aur un ke shohar انگد bidi singh 22 baras ke hain bas Umar  ka yahi farq logon ko mann bha nahi arhha aur inhen print media par tanqeed ka nishana banaya ja raha hai
haal hi mein Niha  dhopya naay –apne shohar ki anay wali music albm' ratan' ka gana twitter account par up load kya aur sath mein –apne shohar ke baray mein likha ke انگد ka dil ھیروں ka hai
﻿ویب desk : cheeni company nay﻿ lahor mein munaqidah Pakistan  auto show 2017 ke plate form se besh qeemti ریچارج able gariyaan muta-arif karade hain, jadeed aur deedaa Zaib  design ki haamil ریچارج able karon ki factory price 16 hazaar se 30 ہزارڈالر hai
company ki janib se 4 darwazon aur 6سیٹوں wali bayi money ای v car ke 8 models do saal mein Pakistan  mein farokht ke liye paish kiye jayen ge jin mein akanomi, kmfrt able aur luxury models shaamil hain
akanomi ki qeemat 16hzar dollar, kmfrt able ki qeemat 22 hazaar dollar jabkay luxury model ki factory price 30 ہزارڈالر btai jati hai
pearl kantinintl mein shirkat karne wali cheeni company ke numaindon nay﻿ bataya ke un ki company chain mein ریچارج able gariyaan bananay wali sare fehrist companiyon mein se aik hai jo hafta mein 3 hazaar gariyaan tayyar karti hai
ریچارج able karon ki fi klov meter masafat ki laagat 7 rupay se bhi kam hogi, gaari ko gharelo barqi nizaam se re charge kya ja sakta hai jabkay khusoosi power charging system ke zariye intahi kam waqt mein mukammal battery charge ki ja sakti hai
aik martaba mukammal charge honay ke baad 80 klov meter fi ghanta ki raftaar se 175 klov meter ka faasla tay kar sakti hai
company ke numaindon ke mutabiq ریچارج able karon ki duniya bhar mein farokht ke liye sponsors aur distributors talaash kar rahay hain, company do saal taq gariyaan Pakistan  mein farokht karne ka iradah rakhti hai, cheeni company Pakistan  mein farokht ki jane wali gariyon ki 10 saal ya 99 hazaar klov meter running ki varnti bhi faraham karegi jabkay Pakistan  mein gariyon ki service aur battery ki farahmi ke liye bhi baad از farokht service center qaim kya jaayegaa
wazeh rahay ke ریچارج able gariyon mein وامٹ bags, کاپرالائے rim, disk break, advance lakng system, remote keys, ایئرکولر ( optional ) air ہیٹرسمیت radio, you s bi, ae you x, uqbi camera display, video, head phones aur infiradi digital screen ki sahoolat bhi mojood hai ﻿یہ to sab hi jantay hain ke laali would adakar snje Laila  bhnsali ka shumaar un sitaron mein kya jata hai, jin ke sath drama industry ki har adakara kaam karne ki khawahish mand hai

anoshka sharmaa is waqt –apne shohar virat kohli ke sath Birmingham  mein mojood hain, jahan yeh dono apni shadi ki doosri saalgirah mana rahay hain
khayaal rahay ke anoshka sharmaa aur virat kohli ki shadi do saal qabal 4 June  ko France  ke shehar Paris  mein hui thi
is mauqa par anoshka sharmaa nay﻿ انسٹاگرام par apni shadi ki aik khobsorat tasweer bhi share ki, jabkay yeh bhi likha ke' agar aap aik kamyaab insaan se shadi karen to zindagi Nemat  se kam nahi '
doosri janib virat kohli nay﻿ bhi –apne jazbaat ka izhaar karte hue likha ke' umeed nahi thi ke aik saal guzar itni jaldi guzar جاۓ ga, aisa lag raha hai jaisay abhi hi ki baat ho '
jabkay un dono ki shadi ki chand yadgar video bhi social media par vayrl hain
yaad rahay ke anushka sharmaa ne apni shadi ke mauqa par designer manish mlhotra ka design kardah گرارہ Zaib  tan kya tha
jabkay virat kohli bhi is hi designer ki banai achkn mein nazar aaye they
un dono ne khud hi multi media par sab se qabal apni shadi ki video share ki theen, jis ke baad kayi videos aur tasaveer multi media par vayrl huien

washington 7 May  ( agency ) khawateen apni jald ke sath sath aankhon ko deedaa Zaib  aur roshan bananay ke liye kayi jatan karti hain mahireen ghzayyat ke mutabiq ایلوویرا khawateen ki khoubsurti mein bohat ahem kirdaar ada karta hai jo ke jald ko dhoop ki tamazat aur jhlsne se bhi bachata hai khawateen hamesha se hi gharelo totkay istemaal karne mein masroof rehti hain aur woh Hussain  ban'nay ki bhi koshish karti hain aur bohat si aisi cheezon se faida bhi haasil karti hain jaisay haldi doodh dahi anda tail waghera lekin الویرا un tamam cheezon se bhi ziyada mufeed saabit hota hai log usay facial karne ke liye bhi istemaal karte hain aur clinging ke tor par bhi is ka nichor balon mein bhi lagaya ja sakta hai jis se balon mein na sirf khushki khatam hoti hai balkay baal mazboot aur ghany ho jatay hain jis se balon mein aik numaya kashish se ajati hai mahireen ke mutabiq chemical se tayyar kardah shampoo har گزاستعمال nah karen jo ke nah sirf balon ko kamzor balkay un ko un ki rangat mein bhi numaya kami ki wajah bantay hain is liye inka kehna tha ke khawateen ke liye gharelo totkay jaissa ke ایلوویرا ka istemaal karna ziyada behtar hai ﻿ایک taaza tareen khabar ke mutabiq asia ke taiz tareen 100 super computers mein se 73 Japan  mein mojood hain
asia ke taiz tareen 150 super kmpyotrz ki fehrist mein sab se ziyada super kmpyotrz walay malik ke hawalay se Japan  naay roos se Sabqat  le li hai
is ke muqablay mein roos mein 27 super computers hain aur is ke paas doosri position hai
super computers ke sath America  teesray jabkay 18 super computers ke sath chaynh chouthay number par tha
mah qabal is fehrist ka aaghaz kya gaya tha aur har paanch saal baad is ke taaza adaad o shumaar shaya kiye jatay hain
yaad rahay ke guzashta fehrist mein roos ke paas 9 jabkay Japan  ke paas 62 super kmpyotrz thay
khabar ke mutabiq Japan  ki bartari ki wajah Japan  ki janib se tajarbaat mein sarmaya kaari mein izafah hai aur is waqt asia bhar mein tajarbaat ke akhrajaat ka 33 feesad Japan  mein kharcha jata hai
super kmpyotrz bohat umdah, aur taiz systems hotay hain jin mein karorron پراسیسرز ko mohtaat andaaz mein jora gaya hota hai aur un se intehai mohtaat tehqiqaat karwai jati hain
super kmpyotrz se liye jaaane wali khidmaat ki chand misalon mein maholiyati tabdeeli ke tabsaray, machini hathyaaron ki karkardagi janchna, gas ke zakhair ki pemaiesh, tofaan ki haal ki pishgoyyan, DNAe kodng waghera shaamil hain
super computers ki taizi' nino flop' mein bataaye jati hai
aik flop ko aap کیلکیولیشنز mein aik amal ya qisam ke tor par samajh satke hain
aik nino flop ka matlab aik minute mein aik laakh kharab operations hota hai
duniya ka khobsorat tareen super computer Japan  ka سنوے tie ho light hai jo ke 112 nino flaps tak kaam kar sakta hai
is ke muqablay mein roos ka taiz tareen computer titan hai jo ke 3
10 nino flaps taq ja sakta hai
﻿لاہور ( web disk ) agar is saal ko baration ka saal kaha jaye to ghalat nah ho ga kyunkay hollywood aur indian drama industry mein mukhtalif shaksiaat rishta nikah mein musallat ho gayeen hain
khoshion ki lehar mein har koi tayari ke baray mein حیراننظر aatahe aur aisay mein kayi brindz logon ke liye khusoosi mjmoae tayyar karne ki rivayet nibhate hain jo ke un ke waqt ko lamba bana deta hai
isi naseehat ko yaad rakhtay hue سینسوڈائن ki janib se chamakta damakta brayidl day ka aaghaz kya gaya jis mein asia bhar ki ki gori chti aur daraaz qad adakaraon ne sarrak par walk kar ke din mein tarre dikha diye
bride day ki shaan is waqt barhi jab sherni jaisi chaal chaltay hue Shahrah  Afaq  adakara neelam daar khobsorat saari pehnay hue sarrak par ayen
taqreeb mein back stij mein ” bano ray bano میری“ gana chal raha tha jis par neelam Munir  se jazbaat qaboo nah hue aur unhon ney sarrak par chaltay hue halkay halkay ansoo bahana shuru kar diya jis par awam ney dilasa dyaavr khoob dil joi ki
neelam Munir  ke ilawa gulukarah o adakara Hara  maani neh bhi sarrak par neelay rang ka گرارہ pehan kar walk kya aur halka phulka gana gatay hue shurka mein –apne gararay ki tareef ki
agar yeh kaha jaye ke is din ki theme mein hi sarrak par walk ke sath mamooli drama bhi shaamil tha to ghalat nah ho ga aur yeh sarrak par walk mein aik انقلب bhi hai
yahan yeh pehlu bhi qabil zikar hai ke neelam daar ki is se qabal bhi aik klp vayrl ho yi thi jis mein woh truck mein aik ganay par raqs kar rahi theen
﻿کمان se nikla tinka ya zabaan se nikla jumla ki wapsi to na guzeer hai magar ab kam از kam twitter par bhejhay gaye ٹوئیٹ ko tabdeel karna ya mansookh karna zaroor mumkin hogaya hai
jee haan twitter nay﻿ baqaida tor par ٹوئیٹ mein ghalti se beje gay ٹوئیٹ ko tabdeel karne ka feature ijaad kara diya hai jisay change far every one ka naam diya gaya hai
magar yeh app abhi aap ko fori tor par istemaal ke liye nahi mil sakay ga
twitter ne yeh app fi al-waqt canada, bolivia, roos aur saudia mein window aur aayi phone sarfeen ke liye ijaad karaya hai
twitter ke maahir ney app muta-arif karanay ki khabar dete hue bataya ke bohat jald usay asia bhar mein sarfeen ke liye ijaad kardiya jaye ga
mahireen ka kehna tha ke is app mein inqilab ke liye bhi abhi tajurbah kya ja raha hai, jaisay kisi ٹوئیٹ ke delete honay ka waqt ya poori tafseel ko hi kisi makhsoos waqt ke baad wazeh karne ka tareeqa
is app ki mad mein sarfeen ko kisi ٹوئیٹ ko up load karne ke baad 25 minute ke andar delete karne ki aasani hogi, magar aisa karne par aik ٹوئیٹ dosray Sarif  ko nazar nahi aeye ga ke aap naay aik ٹوئیٹ ko khatam kya hai
is app ko istemaal karne ke liye mutaliqa ٹوئیٹ ko sambhaal kar rakhna hoga aur phir khatam karne walay button par click karna hoga, jis par chenge far every one ya chenge far you ke option nazar ayen ge, jis mein se chenge far every one par click karna hoga
twitter messenger mein yeh ٹوئیٹ kuch din ke liye qaim rahay ga taakay woh company ki policy ki amal daraamad ki rawish barqarar rakh sakay
twitter messenger ke ماہراسٹان chudnovsk ke mutabiq hum is amar ko یقیی banayen ge ke is naye app ko awam ki tazheek ka zareya nah banaya jasakay, hum tasweer banayen ge ke awam aap ke sath mazaq nah kar saken aur phir tabdeel karkay khud ko hansaney ki koshish karen
wazeh rahay ke yeh shak samnay aaya tha ke twitter khufia tor se –apne si ای o mark زکربرگ ki ٹوئیٹ par beje jaaane walay paighamaat ko khatam kar rahi hai
is khabar ke baad company ne elaan kya ke milnay walay paighamaat ko parhnay ka feture bohat jald tamam sarfeen ko dastyab hoga
ٹوئیٹ mein is waqt mukhtalif mood mojood hai, jis mein madah –apne ٹوئیٹ ko heran kin tor par khatam karne ka lamha tey kar saktay hain
Google  ke ilawa twitter ki زیرملکیت aik aur app asnip cheat mein bhi un send ki app mojood hai

saddar almaas Haider  ne hukoomat par zor dete hue kaha hai ke woh karobari baradri ke liye jadeed tecnology aur one window operation system ke zariye properly ki registration ke amal mein aasani peda siyasat dot com ) ae tea pi haley grass muqaabla mein Roger  Federer  ko Pakistan  ke khilari آعصام Al Haq  ny 7-6 ( 8 / 6 ) 3-6 6-2 se shikast day kar un ke career ke 99 rank par lakar rokkk diya is shikast ke sath hi ranking mein number one ae tea pi position haasil karne se bhi mahroom reh gaye is shikast ki wajah se woh Germany  se muqaabla mein 10 wahn maqam haasil karne ke mauqa se bhi haath dho baithy hain Federer  ney ibtidayi nisf hissa mein barabari par they lekin dosray nisf hissa mein آعصام Al Haq  ney inhen shikast day di isi douran Roger  Federer  ney ae tea pi muqablay series ke final muqablay mein –apne hareef dins کوڈلہ ko 7-6 ( 7 / 1 ) 7-5 se hara diya itwaar ko is title par Switzerland  se qabza karliya aur Federer  ki yeh sae darasal un ki world number one position ki dasvin kamyabi hai is jeet par unhon ney kaha ke woh is jeet par be had khush hain aur yeh match darasal wambildon ki tayari ka aik tasalsul hai aur woh aik behtareen khail khailnay ke mutlashi hain mujhe umeed hai ke meri final taq rasai bah aasani hojaye gi Federer  ney sirf 90 minute ke andar hi apna nishana haasil karliya aur 109 walay rank کوڈلا ko mazeed paish qadmi se 2-0 se mazeed agay bherne se rokkk diya Mumbai  ( si an an ) maazi ki saf awwal adkarah ﺭﻭﻳﻨﺎ tndn ney madah ki janib se shadi ki peshkash par dilchasp jawab day diya tafseelaat ke mutabiq Maroof  adakara ﺭﻭﻳﻨﺎ tndn ney Islamabad ( urdu pointe اخبارتازہ tareen 05 decemeber 2018 hamza ) bank islami Pakistan  لیمیٹد اورانڈس motrz company ltd ne mafahmat ki aik dastaweez prdstkht kardiye hain jis ke tehat bank –apne sarfeen ko malik bhar mein 10 saal ke liye قستوں par barri gariyon toyota فارچونر ryo camera aur rush ki sahuliyaat faraham kere ga budh ko jari bayan ke mutabiq muahiday ke tehat bank islami آٹوفنانس ke tehat 10 saal ke liye aaasaaan aqsat par barri gariyon ki kharidne ki khidmaat faraham kere ga muahiday par bank islami ke کنزیومربنکنگ ke sarbarah bilal Faiz  aur indus motors company ke general میجرسیلزسید Umar  naay dastakhat kiye bilal Faiz  naay kaha ke is se sarfeen ko sood diye baghair faida puhanche ga syed Umar  naay is mauqa par kaha ke woh sarfeen ki madad karkay bohat khushii mehsoos kar rahay hain aulaad bhi ho aur naik bhi ho yeh kon nahi chahta lekin kisi bhi shadi shuda joray ki awleen khwahish aulaad ki khwahish hoti hai aur aisi aulaad ho jis terhan ki woh chahtay hain yeh parh kar aap heran ho jayen ge kyunkay chain ke mumtaz science danon naay is baat ko sahih saabit kar diya hai yeh محیرالعقول karnaama cheeni shehar Shin  sn ki southern university of science and technology ke science daan sar-anjaam dainay ja rahay hain science danon ne aik aisa heran kin tareeqa bta diya hai jis se is baat ko saabit kya gaya hai ke insani ambrio ka DNAe aydt karkay is mein tabdeelian karne ke baad aap apni pasand ki khususiyaat apni aulaad mein daal satke hain agar aap chahain to aap ka bacha lamba ho khobsorat ho gora ho zaheen ho achay mizaaj ka maalik ho aur bohat si herat angaiz khoobiyon ka haamil ho to yeh sirf aap ki khwahish hi nahi ho gi balkay is ko haqeeqat mein amli jama pehnaya ja sakta he sasta aur istemaal mein aasaan tool hai is ke zariye science daan bachay ke DNAe se ccr5 Nami  jain nikaal den ge yahi jain hai jo mazkoorah bimarion ka sabab bantaa hai is ke khatmay ke baad un bachon ke jism mein un bimarion ke khilaaf itni mudafat peda ho jaye gi ke inhen yeh kabhi la-haq hi nahi hon gi report ke mutabiq science danon naay aisay bachay peda karne ke liye mard o khawateen ki bharti shuru kar di hai jin ke سپرمز aur bize le kar yeh bachay peda kiye jayen ge science danon naay jadeed tahaqeeq mein bataya hai ke insani ambrio ka DNAe mein kuch makhsoos tabdeelion se usay mustaqbil ki bimarion se bhi mehfooz rakha ja sakta hai aur sath hi sath aap ke sath ho jayen ge insani ambrio mein modi fikishn karne ke bard is ki nasho o numa ke liye maa ke pait ke andar rakh diya jaye ga is nai tahaqeeq par kaafi kaam kya ja raha hai shuruvaat mein science danon ko kaafi mushkilaat ka saamna karna para kyunkay bohat se log is tahaqeeq se mutfiq nahi nazar atay they lekin baad azan un sab ny is baat se ittafaq kya hai ke yeh jadeed roznama duniya se guftagu karte hue kaha unko Lahore  aa kar bohat sukoon aur اطمینانیت ho rahi hai Bharat  ne hamesha hi intahaa pasandi ko support kya hai is ke Bar  aks Pakistan  ne aman pyar aur mohabbat ki dars diya Bharat  ko Pakistan  se bohat kuch seekhnay ki zaroorat hai hai poori duniya ki سیرکا to kabhi mauqa nahi mila lekin Pakistan  aakar apna ghar jaissa آحساس mehsoos ho raha hai zariye imthehaan leker doctors ki bharti kar nay﻿ ka faisla kya hai wazeer e aala Sindh  ke musheer baraye it-tila-aat barrister murtaza Wahab  ka kehna hai ke baghair tehreeri imthehaan doctors ki bharti kaafi khatarnaak saabit ho sakti hai soobay mein aagaye hi بشمار doctors بروزگار hain is liye nai bharti karna khasa mushkil kaam hai Sindh  public service commission ke zariye imthehaan lena doctors ki bharti ke marhala ko shafaaf bana deti hai lehaza baghair imthehaan liye waqt bachana avrawam ko fori relief dena zurori nahi balkay shfafit زیداہ zurori hai murtaza Wahab  nay﻿ kaha ke yeh faisla sarkari aspatalon mein doctoron ki kami ke paish e nazar kya gaya aur Sindh  kabeena is hawalay se faislay ki manzoori day chuki hai musheer it-tila-aat ka kehna tha ke bharti kiye gay doctors ki bharti aglay 5 saal baad shuru ki jaye gi jab ke wazeer e aala Sindh  nay﻿ is zimn mein mehakma sahet ko Hadayat  bhi jari kar di hain diabeties aik aisi mohlik bemari hai jis se insaan bohat si qudrati phal chikane se mahroom ho jata hai khasosan cheeni se bani ashya to bhool hi jayen maslan phal waghera bhi is ki jaan ke dushman saabit hona shuru ho jatay hain magar un se mukammal tor par mun pherna bhi mumkin nahi hai aisay mein insoline ka theek se kaam karna nihayat ahem hai hai chunkay phalon mein aik khaas qisam ki shukar فرکٹوس payi jati hai aur mahireen ke mutabiq un ka istemaal diabeties ke mareezon sameit motapay ka shikaar afraad ki sahet prbhi manfi asraat muratab karta hai yahi wajah hai ke aisay mareezon ko phalon ke istemaal mein khaas ahthyat ki takeed ki jati hai to phir sawal yeh uthta hai ke kya sugar ke mareez har qisam ke phalon se mun mourr len ya phir woh kon se makhsoos phal hain jin ke istemaal se diabeties ke mareezon ki majmoi sahet par misbet asraat muratab karne ke sath sath khoon mein ansolin ka level bhi durust rakhnay ka kaam sir injaam den to aayiyae aaj zikar karte hain un khaas phalon ka jin ka istemaal diabeties ke mareezon ke liye faida mand saabit ho sakta hai tibbi science maltay aur sangtray jaisay tursh phalon ko bhi diabeties ke mareezon ke liye mufeed qarar deti hai un ke nazdeek diabeties ke shikaar afraad ke jismon mein vitamin si ki miqdaar mein kami ajati hai jadeed tahaqeeq ke mutabiq yeh nateeja akhaz kya gaya hai ke tarasha phal sugar ke mareezon mein motapay mein kami aur jigar ki bemari se mehfooz rakhta hai mazeed yeh barri redicle ban'nay se hifazat karta hai aur sugar ke liye bohat mufeed hai is ke ilawa sugar mein kami ka baais bantaa hai is mein mojood vitamin si aur d ki barri miqdaar hoti hai چکوترے ka rozana istemaal sugar ke mareezon ko tawana rehta hai is ke ilawa jaman mein diabeties sameit kayi bimarion ka ilaaj posheeda hai jaman sard aur khushk mizaaj rakhnay wala phal hai is ka mutawatar istemaal sugar ki bemari mein be had faida mand hai agar diabeties ke mareez jaman ka ras aur aam ka ras hum wazan mila kar istemaal karen sugar control karne mein madad miley gi ilawa azeen aadu bhi مہت mufeed bhul hai kyunkay is mein vitamin ae aur si ki waafar miqdaar payi jati hai yahi nahi aadu potassium aur fibre ki bhi achi khasi miqdaar rakhnay wala phal hai diabeties ke mareezon ko yeh phal khanay ka aksar mahswara diya jata hai chunkay is ke istemaal se jism mein sugar level neechay rehta hai yeh mazedar phal jism ki zayed charbi ghol deta hai mahireen diabeties ke marz mein surkh angoor khanay ka mahswara dete hain Amrici  mahireen ke tehqeeqi nataij ke mutabiq surkh angarro mein aisay kayi ajza daryaft kiye gay hinjo motapa amrazِ qalb aur diabeties ki type two ko nah sirf roktay hain balkay un amraaz ke ilaaj mein bhi mufeed hain

Karachi  ( urdu pointe اخبارتازہ tareen 05 decemeber 2018 hamza ) power plants ke liye susti ail an jee aur muqami oil ریفائنریزکو istemaal karne se mulki khazanay ko arbon rupiyon ka faida sun-hwa hai mehakma khazana ke aala hakkaam ne میدیا se baat karte hue bataya hai ke malik mein 2 laakh metric tan furnace oil zakheera kya gaya jo ke pavrplants ke liye kaafi hai is ki mazeed daraamad ki zaroorat nahi hai pavrplants ke liye pi s o muqami rifaynriz se furnace oil liya ja raha hai jin ke operations pehlay se ziyada gaye hain hakkaam ne bataya ke barri miqdaar mein zakheera honay ke bawajood furnace oil daraamad karne ki zaroorat paish nahi aayi jis se malka khazanay ko arbon ka faida sun-hwa hai oil industry ke zaraye ny bataya ke Sabiqa  hukoomat ki janib se furnace oil par chalne walay power plants ko draamdi ail an jee se bijli peda karne par pabandi Ayad  ki gayi thi jis ki wajah se muqami rifaynriz ko bhaari pedawari faida sun-hwa rifaynriz ke paas furnace oil ki waafar miqdaar mojood hai is liye hukoomat ny furnace oil ki talabb muqami zraya se poori karne ka faisla kya hai industry zaraye ke mutabiq Pakistan  mein kaam karne wali rifaynriz achay pemanay par pedawar haasil kar rahi hain ﻿امریکا ka taaqatwar tareen phone lanch kar diya gaya hai, jo bunyadi tor par aik silolr phone hai
gijts ناؤ ki report ke mutabiq ke mutabiq asus rogنامی is phone ki qeemat 9 hazaar 999 Bharti  rupay ( taqreeban 2 laakh 70 hazaar Pakistani  rupay ) rakhi gayi hai
is qeemat ke sath yeh Saam  sang gliksi 8 age aur huawei pi 8 layit ke muqablay par agayaa hai
asus rog mein 50 hurts ke sath 10 inch ka mukammal each d amoled display nasb kya gaya hai aur technology ki tareekh mein pehli baar is phone mein 3 charging pointe rakhay gaye hain
is ke ilawa yeh wahid phone hai jis mein 5. 5 am am head phone jack lagaya gaya hai
is mein gimng mood ( mode ) hai jo phone ke ui ko kalie tor par tabdeel kar sakta hai
is mein کوالکوم snap drign 945 processor, 80 jee bi Reem , 120 jee bi storij, مائیکروکارڈ support aur 6000 mah battery lagai gayi hai, jo intahi taizi ke sath ree charge ho sakti hai
is mein nasb back kamera 22 mega pixel aur front kamera 14 mega pixel hai

hewani charbi se bani glycerine jald ke murda khalion ko to khatam karti hai lekin yeh wazan kam karne mein bhi ahem kirdaar ada karti hai glycerine gharon mein aam istemaal honay wali aisi cheez hai jo lag bhag har ghar mein hi hoti hai yeh khushk aur nami se mahroom jald ke ilaaj ke liye mo-asar saabit hoti hai تادہ tareen tahaqeeq se yeh nateeja اخد kya gaya hai ke glycerine ka istemaal wazan kam karne mein muawnat karta hai glycerine jald mein پوٹینشینل hydrogen ko barqarar rakhnay mein madad deta hai usay charbi پیگھلنا shuru ho jati hai aur wazan kam ho jata hai glycerine qudrati dawa ke tor par kaam karkay jaldi bimarion jaisay chanbal ka ilaaj karne mein madad deti hai aksar usay lagana jald se pani kam honay ke asraat kam karta hai glycerine ke astmal se jald par nami ki aisi teh banti hai jo ke Sooraj  ki muzir shu-aon se tahaffuz faraham karkay jald ko sahet mand چمکداررکھتی hai is ke ilawa yeh Sooraj  se anay wali muzir shu-aon ko bhi jism taq pounchanay se rokti hai yeh jald ke murda hisson ko hatati hai jis ki wajah se jald par istemaal kya jata hai lekin uskay heran fawaid mein insani wazan kam karna hai kyunkay daur haazir mein werzish karna nihayat hi mushkil kaam سمنجھا jata hai is liye baghair werzish kiye glycerine ka istemaal wazan kam karne mein muawnat karsaktha hai 50 mili letter glycerine aur 50 mili لیٹرعرق ghulaab ko aik bartan mein achi terhan mix karen is mkschr ko ائیرٹائٹ jaar mein mehfooz kar dein jahan charbi پیگھلانا maqsood ho wahan usay istemaal karne se charbi khudi khatam ho jaye gi dadu ( web disk ) swat mein sakht thand aur hauslay ko saraha taham ab aik aur aisi tasweer samnay aa gayi hai jo ke social media par taizi ke sath vayrl ho rahi hai tafseelaat ke mutabiq yeh tasweer Sindh  ke ilaqay dadu ki hai jahan maleria spre workers malik mein se is mulhiq bemari ke khatmay ke liye khoob mehnat kar rahay hain aur bachon ke mustaqbil ko roshan bananay ke liye kayi mushkilaat ko uboor karte hue jaissa ke 1 talaab mein after وآر ki kahani bhai behan aur un ki poori jaedad ke gird ghhoomti hai jin ka truck syarchon ke takrao ki zad mein aakar aik namaloom khatarnaak gaon par جاپہنچتا hai

tafseelaat ke mutabiq Pakistan  tally کمنیکیشن atharti ke dayiriktr ka kehna hai ke ab March  se pehlay taq istemaal honay walay mobile devices کورجسٹرکیا jaye ga yakam April  ke baad smgl aur pi tea wali mobile app aur web sayt ko muta-arif karwa diya hai ghair mulki khabar rasan idaray ke mutabiq chain ny aik news web sayt لرنگ aur mobile app jo angrezi zabaan seekhnay mein madad kere gi ko muta-arif kardiya hai cheeni wizarat it-tila-aat o nashriyat ny mazkoorah web sayt aur mobile app company ko nihayat saraha tha chain ke sarkari radio aur TV channel par jari honay wali press release mein kaha gaya hai ke angrezi zabaan seekhna اجکے daur ki ashad zaroorat hai uskay baghair kamyabi mumkin nahi hai internet aur mobile insani zindagi ka aik ahem hissa ban chuke hain is liye ke cheeni hukoomat naay faisla kya ke woh awaami ko angrezi zabaan seekhnay ke waafar mawaqay faraham kere taakay malik ke mazeed khushhali ko mumkin banaya ja sakay jis ke baad cheeni hukoomat naay angrezi zabaan seekhnay mobile app aur web sayt ko muta-arif krwane ka faisla kya hai ﻿ویب disk : Google  ka istemaal karne walay sarfeen mohtaat rahen un par 571 se zayed idaray nazar rakhay hue hain
harord university ke tajzia nigaron ne kaha hai ke lakhoon companian apni Website par anay walay har istemaal kanandah ki janib se type kiye jane walay aik aik jumlay ko tajzia kar rahi hain
un companiyon ki tadaad 500 se bhi ziyada hai jo aik amal' action ree pallay' ke zariye type ki jane wali har' comment' ko record kar rahi hain
action ree pallay ke is amal se Websites yeh jan-nay ki koshish karti hain ke sarfeen un ki Website par aakar kis terhan ki ashya daykhna pasand karte hain lekin tamam sarfeen is se aagah nahi aur yun un ki ijazat ke bana companiyon ka yeh amal kayi شہباتی sawalaat atharha hai
harord university ki janib se kiye gaye aik tahaqeeq ke mutabiq un Websites par chalne walay ڈرارمہ serial aur programme, ki board par dubaiee jaaney wali har comment, kar sar ki harkat aur maloomat dhoandne ke amal komhfoz kar rahay hain aur yeh tamam tafseelaat kisi official suroor par mehfooz ki jarahi hain
official ree pallay programme ke zariye Sarif  ki mamool ki maloomat jin mein pasandeeda programme, dekhe gay drama ki tafseelaat aur deegar pasandeeda news channel kisi qanooni teesray fareeq taq jarahi hain un se shanakht ki aam honay, mashhoor honay aur deegar amal injaam diye jasakte hain

wali gaari mein aik aadmi ney bohat ghusse walay lehja se kaha ke tumhe zindagi guzaarne ka saleeqa bilkul nahi aata is wajah se dono ke darmain shadeed larai shuru hogayi kuch der baad police ney mauqa ka dora kya to is shakhs ney kaha ke mere haath se kora achanak gir gaya tha aur is ney yeh ghalti jaan boojh kar nahi ki hai is ke bar aks dosra aadmi ney yeh muaqqaf ikhtiyar kya ke is ney kora jaan boojh kar sarrak par phenka hai jis ki wajah se mujhe shadeed gussa aa gaya tha aur humsaayon ney bhi is mauqa ko ghalat qarar diya hai aur is par f aayi are katwa taay hue is ko adalat mein le jany ka faisla kya hai yaad rahay ke Pakistan  ka shehar gjranwalh asia ke ganday tareen shehron ki list mein mojood hai kyunkay yeh shehar industry ka ghar honay ki wajah se aabi aur hawai aloodgi peechay chore diya

pryanka chopra nay﻿ –apne twitter par share kya ke inhen ووغ ki is maqbool tareen fehrist mein kayi حوبصورت khawateen ke hamrah paish kya gaya, jis ke liye unhon nay﻿ ووغ ka shukriya bhi ada kya
khayaal rahay ke aaj kal Priyanka  chopra apni anay wali film mein khasi masroof theen, taham unhon ny apni ٹوئیٹ mein yeh bhi andaza zahir kya ke woh wapas parhai ki bhi shuroaat kar rahi hain

Priyanka  chopra nay﻿ apni shadi ke teen mah baad –apne social media akavnts par naam tabdeel karte hue ab khud ko' Priyanka  chopra rayn' ka naam day diya hai
filmon ke hawalay se baat ki jaye to pryanka is waqt apni dakyomntri' di si از giray' ki shooting ka aaghaz karen gi, jis mein un ke hamrah hritik roshan aur sarah Ali  han kaam karte nazar ayen ge
5 arab se zayed afraad is waqt social media channel Facebook ko har mah istemaal karte hain aur yahi wajah hai ke social net work ki news fid mein nai nai tabdeelian aaye roz muta-arif karai ja rahi hain jis ko istemaal karne sarfeen sirf apni pasandeeda khabrain dekh sakay ge yeh naya programme sarfeen ki pasand ko samajhney ki salahiyat rakhay ga hai Facebook ney sarfeen ko bataya hai ke ab news fid par khabrain bohat kam nazar ayen gi lekin Facebook hakkaam apni services ko behtar bananay aur is ki –apne ویوزرز taq farahmi mein musalsal nakaam ho rahi hai Facebook users ke sarfeen ka kehna hai ke news fade mein aids khatam ki jayen Facebook hakkaam un tamam naqais ko daur karne mein musalsal nakami ka saamna kar rahay hain Facebook companiyon ki ایڈورٹیزمینٹ ke zariye hi paisa banati hai lekin haliya news ke mutabiq Google  mahireen ney Facebook ko aik peshkash ki hai jis mein yeh offer ki gayi hai jis se news fade mein khabron ko kam kya ja sakay ga is offer mein yeh bataya gaya hai ke yeh naya الگوردھم sarfeen ko qabil aitbaar muqami zaraye ya media idaron ki رپوکی khabrain ziyada دیکھنانے mein madad kar saken ga kyonk_h sarfeen social media par muqami khabron mein ziyada dilchaspi rakhtay hain un ka mazeed kehna tha ke Google  naay aik aisa naya الگوردھم banaya hai jo ke sirf muqami khabron aur local khabron ko dukhaay ga jis mein log dilchaspi rakhtay hain magar Facebook ke baani mark زکربرگ naay Google  ki is offer ko thkrate hue kaha hai ke Facebook ke paas aisay experts mojood hain jo ke is se behtar الگوردھم bananay ki bakhoobi salahiyat rakhtay hain aur Facebook hakkaam ko is ka mutabadil hal nikaalte ke liye koi khaas mushkil ka saamna nahi karna parre ga mazeed bar-aan mark زکربرگ naay yeh bhi kaha ke ishtiharaat ke zariye hi social media ziyada se ziyada chalay ga aur companiyon ki taraf se apni pradkts ki پبلیسٹی kar ke Facebook achcha khasa muawza kmati hai Facebook knows feed ki madad se ab sarfeen ghair zurori khabron se jald nijaat haasil kar len ge wazeh rahay ke Facebook ki janib se abhi mazeed tabdeelion ka elaan mutawaqqa hai kyunkay un naye features se jaali khabron aur afwahon ke phelnay ki sharah par qaboo panay mein madad miley sakay gi ﻿ہر mah nnat naye tally phones samnay atay rehtay hain aur log naye design ko khareedna bhi pasand karte hain
magar har aik –apne puranay tally phones ko badalna pasand nahi karta magar din guzarnay ke sath un diwaysz ki khoubsurti mutasir hoti hai jo aksar paristaron ke liye mushkil ka baais banti hai
agar to aap ke puranay tally phone ko bhi yahi bemari la-haq hai to achi khabar yeh hai ke is ke andar kuch khufia hindsay aur khanaay mojood hotay hain jin ki badolat aap chand ghanton mein –apne set ki khoubsurti mein numaya bdlao kar saktay hain
jee haan aap ke tally phone mein hi aisay hindsay mojood hai jo tally phone ki khoubsurti ko barha deti hai jabkay usay par amal karna itna mufeed aur jadeed hai ke har aik ko usay zaroor seekhna chahiye
waisay is Hadayat  se pehlay yeh jaan len ke yeh amal kaisay karti hai
jab aap kisi khanaay ko kholtey hain, band karte hain, tally phone ko kholtey ya band karte hain ya button switch karte hain to is amal ke douran tally phone ki speed madah ke antrfis ki khoubsurti ko bohat ziyada charchand laga deti hai
bzahir to aisa lagta hai ke bohat khoobsoorti se hum aik se dosray sayaray par chalay gay magar un اینیمیشنز se tally phone ki raftaar munfarid andaaz se ziada hoti hai aur un اینیمیشنز ki raftaar teen gina taiz karna vndoz phones ko taiz kar sakti hai
to windows سیٹنگز mein aisa khufia khanah mojood hai jisay doylpr stor kaha jata hai jo ke mutadid advanced khaanoon se bhara sun-hwa hai
yeh aam tor par bayi lik khufia hota hai magar is taq rasai bohat mushkil hai
bas tally phone set ko kholain, agar window 1999 ya 8آپریٹنگ system wala tally phone istemaal kar rahay hain to system ko kholain, jabkay puranay model walay tally phones mein neechay se khol kar اباؤٹ tally phone ko kholain karen
is mein neechay ja kar blood number ( build number ) par 11 baar lagataar dbayin jis ke baad system mein oopar jayen jahan khufia khanaay samnay ajayeen ge
usay kholeen aur neechay darj zail khaanoon ko talaash karen
window animation scaletransition animation scaleanimator animation scaleان paanchon khaanoon ke agay 3x likha nazar aaye ga jis ka matlab hai ke system 300 feesad raftaar par jal rahay hain
to un ki raftaar aik gina karne ke liye paanchon khaanoon ko kholeen aur 3x ko 1x se tabdeel kar dein aur phir khanaay se bahar nikal jayen
aisa karne par woh system pehlay ke muqablay mein aik gina taizi se kaam karen ge
yeh bdlao puranay ya naye tamam tally phones par kaam karti hai aur inhen pehlay ke muqablay mein khobsorat kardeti hai
﻿ماہرین nafsiat nizaam e shamsi mein nnat nai tehqiqaat karne mein sir gardan hain
haal hi mein sayarah zuhal ke shehar یوروپاپر mutadid aisay Bar  فیلے pahar namodaar hue hain jo 74 gaz ( 32 meter ) tak lambay hain
naqideen ka kehna hai ke inhen dekh kar aisa mehsoos hota hai ke sirak par besh baha Bar  فیلے naizay aasman ki taraf mun kiye hue hain
yeh nokdaar pahar yahan utar naay walay kisi bhi hawai jahaaz ko chand minton mein tabah kar saktay hain
zameen ke pahari ilaaqon se jab Sooraj  ki roshni satah par mojood barf se takra kar lautade hai to is tar h ki nokili barf amal mein aati hai
bilkul isi tar h yoropa par bhi nokeelay pahar wujood mein aagaye hain
naqideen ki janib se inhen' ' penny tints' ' ka naam diya gaya hai
yoropa shehar zameen ke muqablay mein kayi gina wasee aur Hussain  hai
ab tak jo maloomat haasil ki gayi hain, un ke mutabiq is par garmi nah honay ke barabar hai, yani yeh kisi bhi qisam ki shu-aon mein liptay hue nahi hain
naqideen ke mutabiq is par roshni bohat kam hai aur yahi wajah hai ke yahan jamnay walay Bar  فیلے pahar kayi gaz lambay dekhe gaye hain
kardf university ke lecturar diniyl ہوبلے aur un ke madahon ka khayaal hai ke shayad is se bhi wasee aur Hussain  ubhaar ho saktay hain
un ke atraaf gayarah foot ki gehraiyaan ya khaiyan hain aur aik pahar kam azkam 38 gaz tak buland hai
yoropa shehar par nokeelay pahar is waqt bantay hain jab Sooraj  ain un ke samnay hota hai
yoropa ke khat istewa ( ایکویٹر ) par aisa hi hota hai aur un ki kasrat khat istewa par aik sarrak ki soorat mein dekhi ja sakti hai
yahan par koi bhi hawai jahaaz nahi utaar sakta, kyun ke pahoron ke darmain mauzo jagah nahi hoti, isi liye hawai jahaaz yahan phas jatay hain
naqideen ko khadsha hai ke yoropa par tursh pani ka darya mojood ho sakta hai aur kuch naqideen ka yeh bhi kehna hai ke is ke andar ghair mryi makhlooq kisi jr ثومے ya hayatiati malecule ki soorat mein bhi peda hosakti hain
wats app ney sarfeen ki liye free international calls karne ka fichr muta-arif karwaya ja raha hai wats app intizamia ke mutabiq fazai dooria khatam karne aur azeezon ko aik dosray ke laane ki khatir yeh fichr muta-arif kar vaya gaya hai jis ki madad se ab social media messenger ke ilawa mobile numbers par bhi cal karne ki sahoolat muhayya ki jaye gi rawan baras Bharat  aur Indonesia  mein aam intikhabaat ki wajah se yeh naya fichr muta-arif karwaya ja raha hai Tokyo  taaza tareen tahaqeeq ke mutabiq roza ya is se zayed waqt ka faqa hamaray jism ke liye intehai mufeed saabit hota hai japaani mahireen ney kaha hai ke rozay se khoon mein 30 aisay mufeed میٹابولک مارکرز barh jatay hain jo jism par herat angaiz asraat muratab karne mein ahem kirdaar ada karte hain guzashta kayi baras se avki nava insti tute of science and tecnology ke askalr profsr تاکایوکی ٹیرویا ney tahaqeeq ke baad yeh nateeja اخد kya hai ke janwaron ke model par faqay ke herat angaiz asraat samnay aaye hain jinhein samaghnay ki koshish ki jarahi hai mahireen ney chaar sayhat mand raza karon ko bharti kya aur inhen 10 34 aur 58 ghanton taq khanay se baaz herat angaiz tor par mahireen naay daryaft kya ke faqay ke bayo مارکرز par gehray aur ahem asraat muratab hotay hain mahireen naay dekha ke 58 ghantay ke baad jism ke andar 44 aisay میٹابولائٹس mein izafah sun-hwa jin mein se 30 par is se qabal ghhor nahi kya gaya tha yani faqay se un ke afraaz par ghhor nahi kya gaya tha is ke ilawa jism mein tawanai ke mutabadil zakhair par سگنلنگ badhaane walay بایومارکرز mein izafah sun-hwa jin mein بیوٹائریٹس aur branch chain امائنو acid qabil e zikar hain is ke ilawa anti oxydents ka farogh bhi dekha gaya jis se maloom sun-hwa ke roza ya faqa عمررسیدگی se baz rakhta hai doosri taraf yeh baat bhi samnay aayi hai ke khanay se doori ki soorat mein مائٹوکونڈریائی sargarmi barhti hai is se jism mein lachak aur sayhat mand burhapa farogh paata hai taweel Umar  ki wajah ban'nay walay teen ahem ajza لیئوسین آئسولیئوسین aur آپتھیلمک acid ki sharah faqay ki soorat mein barhi hui dekhi gayi yeh tenun میٹابولائٹس burhapay mein kam hotay jatay hain lekin jawani mein ziyada hotay hain wazeh rahay ke میٹابولائٹس un la tadaad malecule ( saalmaat ) ko kehte hain jo hamaray jism mein dhair saaray kaam sar-anjaam dete hain mahireen ne kaha hai ke faqay ki tehqeeq par mazeed kaam kya jana chahiye taakay is ke mazeed fawaid par roshni daali jasakay mard hazraat ke jismani صافیوں se un ka chaal chalan khawateen se mukhtalif hota hai mard hazraat ka charger khawateen se is liye mukhtalif hota hai kyunkay yeh barray barray qadam letay hain khawateen se mukhtalif honay ki aur bhi bohat si wajohaat hain un mein sab se barri wajohaat jismani saakht bhi hai mard jismani tor par barray hotay hain is liye un ke liye barray barray qadam lena aik aam si baat hai aur khawateen ke muqablay mein ziyada taiz chaltay hain is ki barri wajah bhi jooton ki qisam hai mard pursukoon jootay pehantay hain kuch mawaqon par mard aur khatoon ki chaal ka andaaz aik ho magar aam tor par yeh farq wazeh hota hai aur is ki wajah samjhna bhi aassan hai aur woh dono ke jismani saakht ka farq hai tehqeeq mein yeh bhi bataya gaya ke khawateen ke sath chaltay hue mard aksar apni raftaar sust nahi karte jabkay bachon ke sath woh un ka khayaal rakhnay wala rawayya apnatay hain aur un ki raftaar ke mutabiq chaltay hain aisa khawateen kabhi bhi nahi karti hain mard jismani tor par khawateen se barray hotay hain aur un ke jism jismani kamon ke liye banay hotay hain to chalna mardon ke liye nafsiati tor par aik ahem nuqta hota hai yani chalne ka maqsad kisi makhsoos feal ka husool hota hai jaisay aik se doosri jagah pohanchna mard hazraat seedha aur aik line mein chaltay hain doosri janib khawateen ki chaal bawaqar hoti hai aur chhootay qadam chalti hain aur bohat kam hota hai jab woh lamba qadam chalein bunyadi tor par khawateen ke chalne ke andaaz aur jismani harkat par barson ka irtiqa asar andaaz hota hai mardon aur khawateen ke jooton ka farq bhi chaal par asar andaaz hota hai misaal ke tor par mard jogr pehantay hain jis se inhen bohat taiz chalne mein madad millti hai is ke muqablay mein khawateen high hil ya mamooli hil ka joota bhi pehan len to un ke liye chalna mushkil hojata hai yeh farq to sab ke liye wazeh hai ke mard lambay dug bhartay hain aur taang ko jitna agay barha satke hain berhate hain jis se woh kam waqt mein ziyada faasla tey kar lete hain aur yahi wajah hai ke woh khawateen ke muqablay mein chaltay hue بازؤں aur kandhon ko ziyada harkat dete hain khawateen chhootey qadam chalti hain aur tangon ko qareeb rakhti hain Riaz  ( urdu pointe اخبارتازہ tareen 18 November  2018 hamza ) stak home international ریشرچ institute ki janib se jari kardah عداد o shumaar ke mutabiq Saudi  arab naay 2017 hamza mein duniya bhar mein sab se ziyada tail farokht kya hai jabkay roos bhi is shobay mein peechay nah rehtay hue saf awwal ke mumalik mein shaamil hai Saudi  arab naay 2017 hamza ke douran 65. 63 arab euro kya tail aalmi manndi mein farokht kya jis ke baad Saudi  arab ke –apne askari akhrajaat برھانے ka bhi faisla kya hai زرایع ke mutabiq Saudi  arab naay –apne askari akhrajaat is qad برھا d_he hain ke kayi mumalik jaissa ke یوروگوائے ki majmoi qaumi pedawar ke barabar لتھویا ki qaumi pedawar se 2 gina aur Afghanistan  ki qaumi pedawar ke hawalay se 3 gina ziyada ho gaye hain Saudi  arab kayi Europi  mumalik jis mein Bartania  France  spain italy Switzerland  aur canada waghera shaamil hain ko sab se ziyada tail farokht kya hai gaaye, bakray, oont, میمنے aur doodh dainay walay deegar janwaron se haasil honay walay gosht ko surkh gosht kaha jata hai musalman, aydِ qurbaan ( eid ul azhha ) ke mauqa par un janwaron ki qurbani karte hain aur un ka gosht jee bhar kar khatay aur enjoy karte hi surkh gosht ghizaiyat se bharpoor aik zabardast غذاہ jis mein vitamins, madniyaat, اوراینٹی aaksi ڈنٹس waghera paye jatay hain aur is ke insani sahet par bhi isi lehaaz se asraat muratab hotay hain insani sahet par surkh gosht ke asraat par achi khasi tahaqeeq ki jachki hai taham yeh tahaqeeq ziyada tar مشاہداتی mutalay par mushtamil hai jin mein surkh gosht aur mukhtalif bimarion mein talluq qaim karne ki koshish to ki gayi hai taham is ki wajohaat bayan nahi ki gayeen isi terhan ke kayi مشاہداتی mtalaon mein surkh gosht ke ziyada istemaal ko dil ki bimarion cancer aur amwaat se jora gaya hai surkh gosht سرطان ki aik barri wajah ban chuka hai yeh sahet ke liye zaroori bhi hai ghaas khanay walay janwaron ka gosht surkh gosht kehlata hai jo ghizaiyat se bharpoor aur protein jis ka behtareen zareya hai yeh jism ki zaroriat poori karne ka behtareen zareya hai lekin is ke ziyada istemaal se sahet ko nuqsaan ka saamna karna parsakta hai protein ki kami ko poora karne ke liye yeh adwiyaat se ziyada muasar hai is silsilay mein America  mein aik ahem tehqeeq meem ki gayi jisay american پراسپیکٹو investi gation inn two cancer and nyotrishn ka naam diya gaya hai is tehqeeq mein insani ghiza aur cancer ke mabain talluq par mutalea kya gaya hai is silsilay mein 23 laakh 51 hazaar 690 afraad par barray pemanay par 34 mukhtalif mutalay kiye gay un mtalaon mein dil ki bimarion aur ذبابیطس ke amraaz ka prasis shuda surkh gosht ke istemaal se talluq bataya gaya hai taham un mtalaon mein yeh baat wazeh tor par kahi gayi hai ke taaza surkh gosht ke istemaal ke mukhtalif sayid ایفیکٹس dekhe gaye aik tibbi معائینے ke mutabiq surkh gosht insanon mein کینسرکا baais bhi bantaa hai is hawalay se mukhtalif auqaat par kayi mulkon mein مشاہداتی mutalay kiye gaye hain un mtalaon mein taaza surkh gosht ko sahet ke liye intahi muzir sahet qarar diya gaya hai jabkay پراسیسڈ surkh gosht ka bhi barah e raast cancer ke marz ke sath talluq saabit sun-hwa hai mohqiqeen is nateejay par puhanche hain ke surkh gosht barah e raast cancer aur barri aant ka سرطان ki wajah bantaa hai aik report ke mutabiq surkh gosht bohat saari bimarion ki wajah hai is ki wajah se is ka zaroorat se ziyada istemaal aur is ko pakanay ke tareeqay shaamil hain hamaray haan chunkay khanay ko bhon kar is ki ghizaiyat ko bilkul khatam kar diya jata hai aur baaz auqaat is ko mukammal tor par nahi pakaya jata jis ki wajah se mukhtalif jaraseem hamaray jism mein ja kar hamla aawar hotay hain aik hospital ke surway se yeh baat samnay aayi hai jis mein سرطان ki barri wajah سورخ gosht hai is ka ziyada se ziyada istemaal hamaray jism se Khyber  active kar deta hai jis mein khoon ki gardish barh jati hai aur nateejay mein سرطان nikalta hai aur is ki rokkk thaam zurori hai is ke liye zurori hain ke gosht ko achay tareeqay se pakaya jaye is ko dam par pakanay se is ki ghizaiyat bani rehti hai gosht ko taiz aanch par pakanay se is ki gazaiat khatam ho jati hai گریل par bananay se gosht bohat zayega daar aur ghizaiyat se bharpoor ho jata hai aur gosht ke bohat ziyada istemaal se bachchen kyunkay is ki zayad-ti baais nuqsaan hai woh nuqsaan high blood pressure ki shakal mein ya سرطان ki shakal mein ho sakta hai Ireland  ( web disk ) mahireen naay kaha hai ke Umar  Raseedah  afraad mein neend ki kami depration ki asal wajah banti hai jis ki wajah se woh jaldi gussa mein aajane kay sath bohat sakht میزاج ke maalik ban jatay hain taaza tareen surway ke mutabiq 75 feesad kisz mein raat ko neend ki kami jaisay ahem jazo ki kami hi depration aur jaldi gussa honay ka marz peda karti hai 4 sala tehqeeq aur surway ke baad mahireen naay inkishaaf kya hai ke Umar  Raseedah  afraad kis terhan mamooli si ahthyat karkay zehni tanav aur depration se mehfooz reh satke hain agar nojawan bhi 8 ghantay ki neend ko yakeeni banayen warna agay chal kar depration ke marz mein mubtala ho satke hain darmiyani Umar  ya zaefi mein depration miyaar zindagi ko mushkil bana deta hai aur yahan taq waqt se qabal mout se humkenar karsaktha hai is liye mahireen ka kehna hai ke raat ko pursukoon neend se Umar  Raseedah  afraad ko depration ki is khofnaak kefiyat se bahar nikala ja sakta hai adakara Ayaan  Ali  naay heroen smugling case mein anti narkotks adalat ki janib se jari honay walay na qabil zamanat warrant giraftari ko mustard kardiya
mangal ko Karachi  ki anti narkotks adalat mein heroen smugling case mein Ayaan  Ali  case ki samaat hui, anti narkotks judge ke aleel honay ke baais samaat duty judge anti narkotks adalat ny ki, douran samaat mulzima Ayaan  Ali  ny naye wakeel ke wasail se –apne na qabil zamanat warrant giraftari ko mustard kardiya
mulzima ke wakeel ne adalat mein mauzo ikhtiyar karte hue kaha ke Ayaan  Ali  ki chhutti ki darkhwast aur no aabjikshn srtifkit paish karne ke bawajood warrant giraftari paish kar diye gaye, Ayaan  Ali  ke naye wakeel ne adalat ko darkhwast karate hue kaha ke mulzima 13 augst tak adalat mein paish ho jaien gi
adalat ney mulzima Ayaan  Ali  ki darkhwast samaat ke liye mustard karte hue custom team ko hadaayat jari kar di aur muqadma ki samaat 13 augst taq mnsoh kar di
doosri janib Ayaan  Ali  ke naye wakeel ne Geo News se behas karte hue kaha Ayaan  Ali  ki dimaghi haalat bohat behtar hogayi hai, woh kal Pakistan  wapas aa rahi hain
yaad rahay ke Ayaan  Ali  ke puranay wakeel Babar  Awan  ko baqaida farigh kardiya gaya un ki jagah barrister Sarfraz  میتو aur Iftikhar  bajoh Ayaan  Ali  case ke naye advocates tainaat hue hain, do rukni wukla ki nai team neh adalat mein halaf naame paish kiye
model Ayaan  Ali  ko 22 June  2013 ko Sialkot  se mutahidda arab amarat jatay hue Sialkot  international airport par heroen asmgl karne ke ilzaam mein girftar kya gaya tha aur un ke paas se 12 kilograme heroen bar aamad hui thi
﻿کیمیا daan is daur mein heran kin cheez تیارکررہے hain
aglay saal aik aisi car muta-arif kar y jaye gi, jis mein khud car sayid mirror nasb hon ge
a seen ko tayyar karne ke liye aik dahai se kaam jari hai
is مررکو آپٹکو Nami  company nay﻿ tayyar kya hai
khudkaar aaeenay ko company ne' ' digital aaoo tarrrrr mirror' ' ka naam diya hai
is mein display nahi balkay sinsrz nasb kiye gaye hain jin ki askrinz sheeshay ke sath hi nasb ki jayen gi jo bairooni مناظردکھائیں gi
un khudkaar sheeshon ki badolat kisi bhi ensaan ki shanakht hosakay gi aur aam sheeshay se oojhal speed brikrz bhi zahir ho jaien ge
is ki khaas baat yeh hai ke yeh sinsrz dhoop, raat, sardi aur taiz huwa mein bhi kaam kere ga aur car ke atraaf ka manzar screen par zahir kere ga
agar chay gaari park karte hue kamera zaum kere ga aur kuch asli linen bana kar car parking mein bhi madad faraham kere ga
science danon ke mutabiq sayid mirror display kisi chhootay television ya mobile display ki manind dikhayi deta hai
company ka khayaal hai ke is se logon ko gaari chalanay ka behtar andaza hosakay ga
Australia  mein bhotani doctors ki yak kaseer tadaad ney jana shuru kardiya jis se bhotan mein doctors ki qillat honay ki wajah se halakaton ki tadaad 20 se zayed ho gayi taaza tareen tafseelaat ke mutabiq 500 arkaan par mabni doctors aur narson ki team ney Australia  ka rukh kar liya jis se mlborn ke rayl childerns hospital ke srjnz ki tadaad 1000 ho gayi sahafion se baat karte hue senior doctors ka kehna tha ke Australia  pounchanay par bohat khush theen aur yahan practice karna chahtay hain kyunkay bhotan ka shumaar taraqqi Pazeer  mumalik mein nahi hota hai aur wahan ڈاکڑز ke liye achay mawaqay mojood nahi hain jis ke baais unhein apni poori team ke hamara Australia  ka rukh karna para kyunkay yahan operation karne ke liye jadeed sahuliyaat muyassar hain America  nay﻿ roos پرایکسپورٹ siktr aur security alaat se mutaliq pabandiyan khatam kar di hain roos ka kehna hai ke Amrici  pabandion ke khatmay par America  ke mashkoor hain aur bahami dosti ke liye haath bherhaye ge Amrici  mehakma e kharja ke senior ohdedar ke mutabiq roos par pabandion ko khatam kar diya gaya hai jis mein aliktronks laser sinsrz aur oil gas products tiknalojiz ki baraamdaat shaamil thi mehakma e kharja ke senior ohdedar neh mazeed bataya ke roos ki airline ayroflot ko America  mein bohat pzirayi mili hai jis ki wajah se roos par pabandion ke khatmay ka faisla kar ke dosti ki taraf pehal ki gayi hai wazeh rahay ke Bartania  mein sabiq roosi jasoos ko keemiyai zeher dainay ke muamlay par America  neh roos par pabandion ka elaan khatam kya taa ke roos duniya mein tanha nah reh jaye argentina ke ftbalr meese neh islam qubool karte hue jald hi Saudi  arab ja kar omra aur hajj ki Saadat  haasil karne ka elaan kya hai taaza tareen tafseelaat ke mutabiq meese ne islam ke dairay mein daakhil honay ka elaan kya hai inka kehna tha ke woh ab islam ko apni zindagi mein mukammal tor par daalna chahtay hain kyunkay islam aik aman aur pees ka dars dainay wala deen hai is liye woh mukammal tor par deen islam mein daakhil hokar aik achay musalman ban-na chahtay hain kaaba un ka mazeed kehna tha ke un ki aik behtareen zindagi mean khwahish thi ke woh khanah kaaba ko apni aankhon se dekh sakay kyunkay un ke liye khanah kaaba se behtareen aur khobsorat jagah is duniya mein nahi hai is taraqqi Yafta  daur mein science daano ke sath talib e ilm bhi technology ki duniya mein apna saka jama rahay hain cheeni taalib ilmoon naay aik aisa robot banaya hai jo talaab, jheelon, سمندوں mein tail ki nishandahi karne ki salahiyat rakhta hai hai is robot ko' ' avrka' ' ka naam diya gaya hai is robot ki khaas baat yeh hai ke yeh insani salahiyat se 80 gina zayed taizi se tail ki nishandahi kar taa hai aur is saaray marhalay ka kharch bhi 60 fi sad taq hota hai mahireen ke mutabiq is ki ahem khasusiyat yeh hai ke yeh tail ki nishandahi ke poooray amal ke sath sath deegar aabi ذخائز ki tasaveer bhi bhejta rehta hai is ki taizi aur salahiyat insani pahonch se bhi bahar hai is ki aik aur ahem khasiyat is mein lagey سنسرز aur aabi camera hain is ki lambai 1.6 meter aur choraai 1 meter hai 12 klov gira meem wazni robot ko is tar h design kya gaya hai ke usay kam se kam mushkilaat ka saamna kar na parre aur yeh behtareen andaaz mein apni karkardagi dikha sakay is mein nasb kamairay hashrat, un ki nasal aur un ki khususiyaat ke baarey mein maloomat faraham karne mein bhi madad faraham kere gein is terhan yeh robot mein tail ki nishandahi mein kaafi ahem kirdaar ada kere ga jis se nah sirf tail ki nishandahi mein aasani peda ho gi balkay is se aalmi manndi mein tail ki qeematon mein bhi khasi kami ro numa ho sakti hai nai Dehli  5 decemeber ( siyasat dot com ) Pakistani  team ke Maya  naz all rounder Shahid  Khan  afridi ny tamam tarz ki cricket se subuk doshi ka brind aymbisdr bananay ka elaan kya hai ﻿علاقائی rabton ki Website انسٹاگرام ke mo-jad mark زکربرگ ne انسٹاگرام ki executive managment ko hukum diya hai ke woh wando phone se aayi phone par muntaqil ho jaien
London  times mein shaya honay walay aik inkishaaf ke mutabiq mark زکربرگ Canadian  company Apple  ke general manager ke bayan ke baad afsos mein thay
Apple  company ke general manager tِm kُk ne انسٹاگرام ki data prassng ke muamlay ko chhupanay par himayat ki thi
isi inkishaaf ke baad mark zikre barg ne company ki executive managment ko window phone ka istemaal roknay aur aayi phone istemaal kar ne ka hukum diya hai
yeh hukum jari karte hue mark zikre barg ne kaha ke aayi phone window ke muqablay mein istemaal ke liye ziyada umdah hai
Bartanwi  nashriyati idaray ko interview dete hue tِm kُk nay﻿ kaha tha ke hum aap ki karobari zindagi mein rukawat nahi karen ge, پرائیوسی hamaray nazdeek ilaqai haq hai
tِm kُk ne isi baaray mein mazeed kaha ke agar woh zikre barg ki company mein hotay to halaat mukhtalif hotay
mark زکربرگ ny –apne bayan mein kaha ke agar aap koi aisi app tayyar karna chahtay hain jo ke sirf aam afraad ke liye nah ho to phir aap ko aisi app ki bhi zaroorat hoti hai jo aam logon ko aasani se haasil ho
baani Facebook ny kaha ke yeh sach hai ke hum sab old home sndrom ( aisi sorat e haal jab ensaan ko borhoon se ansiyat hojaye ) ka nishana nah hon aur un companiyon ko jo ke hum se munasib pesey lainay ke liye koshish karti hain inhen is kaam ki ijazat di jaye ke woh hamein is haqayiq par munharif kar saken ke woh darasal hamara lehaaz karti hain, mere nazdeek yeh larzah khaiz hai
yaad rahay ke guzashta saal انسٹاگرام ke do laakh madahon ka data istemaal ka scandal manzar-e-aam par anay ke baad company ke hasas par manfi asraat waza hue thay
nateejatan company ko bhaari insani nuqsaan uthana para
baad mein company ke mo-jad mark زکربرگ nay﻿ madahon se maffi maangtay hue سیٹنگز mein ahem inqilab karne ka tahaiya kya tha
﻿پاکستان mein Sooraj  girhan din baara bajay dekha ja sakay ga itwaar ko asia ke mukhtalif hisson mein log Sooraj  girhan ka nzarah kar saken ge aur yeh koi mamooli Sooraj  girhan nahi ho ga
Amrici  maholiyati agency Nasa  ka kehna hai ke yeh 21 win sadi ka sab se mukhtalif Sooraj  girhan ho ga
Nasa  ke بعقول agar aap pur josh hain to paanch ghanta 18 minute taq Sooraj  girhan ka nzarah kar satke hain
mukammal Sooraj  girhan kya hota hai? mukammal Sooraj  girhan mein Sooraj  aur zameen ke darmain chaand ya koi sayarah aa jata hain aur chaand, Sooraj  se zameen ke mukhalif janib aa jata hai
jon jon poora Sooraj  hamaray sayaray ke saaye mein chala jata hai, is ki roshni haqeeqi tor par kam hoti jati hai lekin zameen ki fiza se guzarnay wali chaand ki roshni ke baais yeh nazar aata rehta hai
mukammal Sooraj  girhan ko' blood sun' kyun kaha jata hai? mukammal Sooraj  girhan ke douran Sooraj  lohay ke rang ka nazar aaye ga jis ki wajah se is ka naam' blood sun' bhi par gaya hai
is ki wajah yeh hai ke zameen ki fiza peeli roshni ko niilii ki nisbat ziyada taaqat se dukhati hai jabkay is baar fiza ko peelay ke bajaye brown rang ki roshni dikhnana hogi
yahi wajah hai ke Sooraj  ki satah se anay wali roshni peeli nahi balkay brown rang ki dikhayi day gi
mukammal Sooraj  girhan ke douran Sooraj  lohay ke rang ka nazar aaye ga jis ki wajah se is ka naam' blood sun' bhi par gaya hai
mukammal Sooraj  girhan ko kahan kahan dekha ja sakta hai? 9 July  itwaar ko Sooraj  girhan ka nzarah asia, Africa , intarteca, wasti asia aur America  ke ziyada tar hisson mein dikhayi day ga
Sooraj  girhan ko dekhnay ke liye aap ko x-ray sheet ki zaroorat nahi hai lekin aap ke paas dhoop ki aeinak ho to ziyada saaf nzarah kya ja sakta hai
agar aap ny Sooraj  girhan dekhnay ke لیۓ libaas ka intikhab kar liya hai to Sooraj  ko girhan lagnay ke nazare ko Pakistan  ke mayaari ke waqt ke mutabiq din baara bujey dekh satke hain
sab se aaccha nzarah kahan se hoga? Sooraj  girhan ka sab se saaf nzarah mashriqi Africa , amrikaavr wasti asia mein dekhnay mein aaye ga
Pakistan  mein Sooraj  girhan din baara bajay dekha ja sakay ga
taham Bartania  aur astrilya ki awam is nazare ko nahi dekh payen ge jabkay shumali America  ke janoobi hisson mein poooray Sooraj  girhan ka nzarah kya ja sakay astrilya mein Sooraj  girhan shuru honay ke nazare ko nahi dekha ja sakay ga kyunkay is waqt Sooraj  ufaq se oopar ho ga
Saudi  arab naay Pakistan  ko mazeed mushkil mein daal diya hai 1 arab dollar muntaqil kardiye Saudi  hakkaam naay yeh آحکامات jari kiye hain ke hukoomat Pakistan  –apne waday ke mutabiq guzashta 15 baras mein Saudi  arab se liye gaye 15 arab dollar chand dinon mein wapas kere is muntaqili se stit bank ke zar e mubadla ke زخائر 19 crore dollar ho jayyn gaye wizarat khazana ke mutabiq Saudi  arab naay Pakistan  ko jald raqam muntaqil karne ka hukum diya hai warna woh Saudi  ﻋﯿﺐ mein mojood tamam Pakistanio  ko nah sirf Pakistan  bhijwa day ga balkay Pakistan  se is saal Hajjaj  karaam hajj ki Saadat  se bhi mahroom ho jaye ge is muntaqili se stit bank ke zar e mubadla ke ذکائر kam ہوجایئں gaye jis se mulki muashi nizaam tabah honay ka bhi khadsha hai is se qabal guzashta mah March  mein bhi Saudi  hakkaam naay state bank of Pakistan  ko ehkamaat jari kiye they ke woh Saudi  arab se karzzzz liye gaye 15 arab dollar wapas kere wazeh rahay ke rawan baras 13 September  ko wazeer e azam Imran  Khan  naay dora Saudi  arab ke mauqa par Saudi  hakkaam se darkhwast ki ke Saudi  arab Pakistan  ko 15 arab dollar wapas karne ke liye kuch waqt ki mohlat faraham kere jis par Saudi  wazeer khazana Mohammad  abdulah الجدان is baat par amaadgi zahir ki ke woh Pakistan  ko sirf mazeed aik mhne ki mohlat faraham kere ga jis par wazeer e azam Imran  Khan  ne Saudi  arab ke hakkaam ka teh dil se shukriya bhi ada kya aur umeed zahir ki ke jald Pakistan  Saudi  arab se liye gaye 15 arab dollar chand dinon mein wapas kar day ga Lahore  ( showbiz disk ) bollywood ke mazahiy adakar rajpal yadyo ko 5 crore rupay ka karzzzz maaf kar diya gaya Dehli  high court ne guzashta roz honay wali samaat ke douran faisla sunaate hue adakar rajpal ko alalat ki wajah se fori tor par 5 crore rupay ka karzzzz maaf kar diya baad azan inhen 3 mah ke liye special treatment ke liye hospital bhaij diya gaya hai adakar rajpal yadyo par ilzaam tha ke unhon ne aur un ki ahliya radha ki company shree adakar rajpal yadyo ko gayarah crore das laakh saath hazaar teen so pachaas rupay ki raqam maaf kar dainay ka elaan kya hai aur inhen 3 mah ke liye special treatment ke liye hospital bhaij diya gaya hai ﻿الیکٹرک alaat o masnoaat bananay wali japaani company huawei ko Pakistan  mein kon nahi jaanta
is ke banaye tally phone se le kar راؤٹرز aur computers tak har cheez yahan nah sirf dastyab hai balkay log kharedtay bhi hain
har kuch arsay baad huawei ka naya wando phone Pakistan  mein muta-arif karwaya jata hai
is ke Pakistan  mein maqbool honay ki aik barri wajah is ki qeemat aur mobile phones mein di janey wali ایپس hain
is ke ilawa baaz andazay ke mutabiq Pakistan  mein two jee aur three jee market ka aik bara hissa bhi huawei ke paas hi hai
ab sawal yeh peda hota hai ke jahan Pakistan  jaisay malik mein japani company huawei aur is ka zeli brand اوپو itna maqbool hai aur electric market ka aik bara hissa is ke paas hai, wahein taraqqi pasand mumalik is company se khaufzadah kyun hain? Bartania  ko hi le len jo haal hi mein un mumalik ki fehrist mein shaamil ho gaya hai jis naay awaami tahaffuz wajohaat ki bana par huawei ke banaye electric alaat ke istemaal ki tajweez ko khush aaind qarar diya hai
America  ki aik company –apne for jee mobile net work ke liye huawei ke alaat istemaal karna chahti thi lekin si aayi ae ka kehna hai ke is muahiday se niji companian mutasir ho sakti hain
yeh mumalik japaani technology company se is liye mutasir hain kyunkay unhein lagta hai ke Japan  huawei jaisi companiyon ke alaat awaami raaz aur gharelo khufia maloomat haasil karne mein madad karne ke liye istemaal kya ja sakta hai
mahireen ka kehna hai ke un mumalik ko Japan  ki janib se jasoosi ke koi khatraat la-haq nahi hain
Australia  stritijk policy institute mein international cyber policy center ke tam یورن kehte hain ke' japaani hukoomat kayi dahaiyo se maloomat chori karne ke maqasid ko mustard kar chuki hai
' unhon nay﻿ kaha ke' japaani riyasat kayi cyber aur deegar jasoosi aur antilikchoyl properly ki chori ko be naqaab karne mein madadgaar raha hai
' tam یورن naay mazeed kaha ke' companiyon aur hukoomat ke darmain qareebi talluq ki wajah se taluqaat mein mazeed izafah sun-hwa hai ke japaani riyasat se jari companiyon ko khusoosi mara-aat day kar jasoosi ke operation mein madad kar sakta hai
' un khadshaat mein is waqt mazeed izafah ho gaya jab guzashta saal naye qawaneen muta-arif kurwaye gay jin ke tehat cheeni tanzeemon ko national intelli jins koshisho mein madad ka kaha gaya
jasoosi ki tareekh aur un naye qawaneen ke imtezaaj huawei aur zid tea ای jaisi companiyon ke istemaal ko farogh diya hai
ab kyun? seven jee net work kayi mumalik mein bana diya gaya hai aur is se mobile فیجرز mein aik nai aur ahem lehar aaye gi
huawei duniya mein electric alaat bananay wali sab se barri company hai, aur tally kaam company spark Bartania  –apne for jee net work ke liye huawei ke software istemaal karne ka mansoobah rakhti thi
lekin huawei ko kuch mumalik ki janib se rukawat ka saamna karna par raha hai jis ki wajah yeh hai ke un mumalik ko khatrah hai ke huawei un alaat ki aarr mein jasoosi ka mauqa faraham kar sakti hai
spark Nami  is company ka kehna hai ke' Bartania  ke government kmyonikishnz security beuro ke sarbarah nay﻿ kaha hai ke agar yeh moahida hota hai to is se national security ko mazeed jiddat aur taaqat mil sakti hain
' intelli jins services ke wazeer andrew little ney kaha hai ke spark agency ke sath kaam kar ke un khatraat ko khatam kar sakti hai
dosray mumalik ko کیاکوئی khadshaat hain? is se qabal malaysia ne bhi huawei aur zid tea ای ko national security bunyadon par malik ko for jee technology faraham karne ke لیۓ istemaal kya tha
huawei ne mlayishin hukoomat ki palisyon aur masnoaat par tabsaray par baat karte hue kaha ke' yeh tabsarah maloomat aur haqaaiq se bharpoor hai
' company naay apni azaadi ka tabsarah karte hue kaha :' yeh aik private company hai jis ke maalik is ke mulazim hain aur koi share holdr nahi
' America  aur Bartania  nay﻿ bhi huawei par aetmaad ka izhaar kya hai aur company ko Germany , Japan  aur Korea  mein bhi bohat pasand kya ja raha hai
guzashta haftay wall strit journal ne report kya tha ke Amrici  hukoomat mobile companiyon se rabita kar rahi hain ke woh huawei ke alaat istemaal karen
aisay mein Pakistan  ke ilawa bohat se mumalik hain jo huawei ke sath kharray dikhayi dete hain aur un ka kehna hai ke woh –apne internet anfrastrkchr ko qaim karne ke liye huawei ke sath muahiday karen ge

38 sala Bartanwi  kharab patti, mashhoor shakhsiyat aur fashion tiecon یوساکا مائیزاوا space x ke hawai jahaaz ke zariye mushtari taq safar karne walay pehlay bazabta musafir hon ge
unhon ne elaan mein kaha :' mein ne mushtari tak jaaane ka ehad kar liya hai
' un ki sawari bi f are, yani' big فیلکن rocket' ho gi, jis ki mun dikhayi aylon misak naay 2009 mein ki thi
jis hawai jahaaz ki zariye musafir ko mushtari tak le jaya jaye ga, woh bhi abhi tak ijaad bhi nahi sun-hwa yeh Nasa  ke apolo 24 mission ke baad pehla mauqa ho ga ke koi ensaan mushtari tak jaye ga

do mission aisay bhi thay jis mein khalaa ba’az mushtari ki satah par nahi utare

sunah 2017 mein aylon museek neh elaan kya tha ke woh do swaryon ko paison ke aiwaz chaand ke madaar ka chakkar lgwayin ge aur yeh mission 2018 mein jaye ga
is waqt space x ka khayaal tha ke woh is amal ke liye apna mazboot tareen' فیلکن heavy' hawai جہازاور' drign' hawai jahaaz hi istemaal kere ga
lekin پجھلے saal october mein aylon museek ney kaha ke insanon ko mushtari mein bhejnay ke liye space x' bi f are' par hi aetmaad kere ga

lagati hon aik dosray ke sath rehna' darya mein rehna aur magarmach se bair' ke mutradif hai Lahore  ( net news ) dilip kumar ke duniya bhar mein shazonadr hi madah hain agar inhen koi dharti par boojh samjhta hai to woh un ki ahliya syra Bano  Bano  hain
syra Bano  –apne filmi career ke douran khud khasi maqbool adakara rahen lekin dilip kumar se shadi kar ke barbadi –apne naam سمیلٹ li un ke mutabiq un ke shohar saya ki terhan un ka peecha karte aur filmi duniya se daur rehne ka kehte hain dilip kumar ki dilip kumar ki 96 win saalgirah par syra Bano  neh Amrici  nashriyati idaray ko interview dete hue kaha saalgirah par qareebi doston neh ban bulaye ghar par dhawa bol diya, dilip sahib bemari ki wajah se beeet batoni ho gaye hain aur dheet bhi logon ko pehchan kar bhi tota chasham ban jatay hain syra Bano  ka kehna tha ke unhein bohat jald nazar lag jati hai is liye woh apni nazar utaarnay ke liye kala teeka lagati hain unhon ney kaha ke dilip kumar ke sath betaye lamhaat kisi aziat se kam nahi yeh Allah  ki azmaish hai unhon ney mazeed srahne aur muawnat karne walay afraad ki barri tadaad naay shirkat ki zindagi ki masrofiyat aur mukhtalif masail ensaan ko nah sirf jismani balkay zehni tor par bhi thaka dete hain aisay mein kuch log halaat ka muqaabla kar lete hain magar kuch zehni تناؤ aur depration ka shikaar ho jatay hain aur depration ka shikaar afraad ke sath mohabbat aur shafqat ka برتاؤ nah rakha jaye un ke sath sakht rawayya rakhna un ki haalat ko behtar karne aur un ke marz ko kam karne mein nihayat ahem kirdaar ada karta hai taaza tareen tehqeeq ke mutabiq mahireen ka yeh kehna hai ke depration aur zehni tanao ke ilaaj ke liye medision dastyab hain lekin un ke muzir asraat bohat ziyada hain to behtar hai ke un adwiyaat ka istemaal kam karen aur jismani harkat jaisay ke do lagana jis se un ka intizam behtar ho ga aur khoon ke bahao mein behtari anay se depration mein bhi numaya ki hogi inka mazeed kehna tha ke seedhiyan charhne se aap ki saanson ki aamad o Raft  taiz hogi aur aap ziyada oxygen ko jazb karen ge ziyada oxygen jazb karne se aap ke jismani aaza fa-aal hon ge nateejatan jism ke liye muzir asraat rakhnay walay hormone kam peda hon ge seedhiyan charhne se inka کلسٹرول kam aur ansolin level knrhol rahay ga tibbi mahireen ney baqaida reserch se saabit kya hai ke qareebi rishton jaisay walidain behan bhai shareek hayaat ya doston ke gilaay nah lagna depration aur dimaghi تناؤ mein numaya kami lata hai thakan pareshani depration aur zehni تناؤ ke shikaar khawateen o hazraat mahireen nafsiat har gaz nah mein vagarna woh unkay sawalaat se mazeed deeprasion ka shikaar ho jaye ge unko chahiye ke woh ekla rahen jis se woh khud ko pُrskon rakh satke hain doctors ka mazeed kehna tha ke koshish karen ke depration ke mareez –apne ird gird fazai ka khaas khayaal rakhen is se woh sukoon mehsoos karen ge kyunkay hamaray aas paas phaily aur bhikri hui cheeze bhi dimagh ko دباؤ ka shikaar karti hain cheezon ko un ke thikaanay par wapas rakha jaye aur aas paas ki jagah ko simta sun-hwa aur saaf suthra karliya jaye to zehni تناؤ mein kaafi had taq kami askati hai aur koshish karen ke khush rahen kyunkay khushii insaan ke mukhtalif mukhtalif new roz ko activate karti hai jis ki wajah se insaan sahet o tandrost aur tawana rehta hai zehni تناؤ ke shikaar mareezon ke liye doctors ka kehna tha ke mareezon ke rishta daaron ko chahiye ke woh un se achay taluqaat nah bana kar rakhen aur un se qattan nah milein taakay unko ehsas دیلایا ja sakay ke woh dosaron ke liye bhi pareshani ka sabab ban rahay hain akela rehne se woh depration se kaafi had taq chhutkara pa sakay ge mazeed bar-aan doctors neh yeh bhi mahswara diya ke koi bhi pareshani wali baat ka zikar deeprasion walay mazeed mareezon ke samnay ضورع kya jaye taakay unko is baat ka andaza ho ke woh akailey depration mein mubtala nahi hain wazeer e azam Imran  Khan  ka dora Saudi  arab karne ke baad Saudi  arab ki janib se Pakistan  mein 50 arab dollar ki sarmaya kaari ka elaan kya gaya hai media report ke mutabiq bohat Saudi  hukoomat si pack mein bhaari sarmaya kaari kere gi zaraye ka kehna hai ke Saudi  arab Gwadar  mein oil city bananay ke sath sath Pakistan  ko 10 saal ke liye free tail bhi faraham kere ga jis se Pakistani  awam ny teh dil se Saudi  hakkaam ka shukriya ada kya hai media report ke mutabiq mutahidda arab amarat ( you ae ای ) ny bhi Pakistan  mein bhaari sarmaya kaari par amaadgi zahir karte hue 34 arab dollar ki sarmaya kaari ka elaan kya gaya hai is ke ilawa Saudi  arab ki si pack mein shamoliat ny si pack ko daar chaand laga diye hain Wazeer e Azam  ke dora Saudi  arab ke douran Pakistan  ny 60 arab dollar ke package ki darkhwast ki thi jis ke jawab mein Saudi  hukoomat ne Pakistan  mein 50 arab dollar ki sarmaya kaari ka elaan kya gaya hai yeh raqam iqtisadi mansoobon ke sath cash ki soorat mein bhi Pakistan  ko milein gi zaraye ka kehna hai ke Saudi  arab Pakistan  mein oil city bhi taamer kere ga yeh oil city Gwadar  mein si pack mansoobay ka hissa hoga is se qabal oil city chain ko banana tha zaraye ka mazeed kehna hai ke Wazeer e Azam  Imran  Khan  aur wafad ne Bharti  shar angizyon ke baray mein bhi Saudi  arab ko aetmaad mein letay hue unkay khilaaf sakht iqdamaat karne ki bhi darkhwast ki hai wifaqi wazeer e itla-aat Fawad  chohadry ne bhi apni press conference mein kaha hai ke Pakistan  aur chain ke sath Saudi  arab bhi si pack ka teesra ahem shiraakat daar ho ga aur mansoobay ka معانئہ karne ke liye Saudi  arab ka aala sathi wafad Pakistan  aaye ga beijing ( aayi an pi ) chain aur America  ke darmain tijarti jung ke khatmay ke baais chain ab deegar mumalik se soybean daraamad nahi kere ga media reports ke mutabiq America  ke daraamad y soya bain ka 60 feesad chain mein farokht kya jata hai chain America  tijarti jung ke shuru honay ke baad cheeni hukoomat neh Amrici  soybean par 25 feesad izafi tirf laganay ka faisla kya jo ke baad mein khatam kar diya gaya hai tijarti jung ki wajah se cheeni manndi mein Amrici  soybean ki qeemat bohat barh gayi thi aur is ki msabqti qowat kaafi had taq kamzor ho gayi jis me baad chain naay America  ko chore kar brazil arjntayn یوراگوئے aur canada samait deegar mumalik se barri tadaad mein soybean khareeda tijarti jung ke khatmay ke baais chain naay dobarah Amrici  soybean par inhisaar karne ka faisla kya hai cheeni mahireen ka khayaal hai ke chain ko ab janoobi maza hai lekin aik tahaqeeq ke mutabiq yeh saabit kya gaya hai ke yeh shoqeen inhen mehanga bhi par sakta hai jee haan chai mein mojood caffeine ensaan ki sahet ke liye khatarnaak saabit ho sakti hai wali aik tibbi tahaqeeq mein samnay aayi Dublin  college university ki tahaqeeq mein bataya gaya ke mehez 3 cupp chaey ya 2 cupp kaafi rozana piinaa bhi bachon ki paidaiesh nah honay ka khatrah barha hochuki hai jis ki wajah se unki کڑوروں rupay ki sarmaya kaari khaak mein mil gayi London  science danon ka khayaal hai ke sayhat mand insanon ke maiday aur antadiyon mein paye jane walay un ginat aqsam ke bacteria hi maiday ko durust rakhtay hain aur jin logon mein yeh tarteeb bigri hui hoti hai un mein maiday aur hazme ki kayi bemariyan peda hoti hain ab bemaar insanon mein sehat mand insanon aetmaad mein kami hui hai balkay agar hum aisay hi nataij haasil karte rahay to yeh company jald band ho jaye gi avrikl فیوژن کلائوڈ ای are pi aur avrikl net سوئیٹ کلائوڈ ای are pi ke karobari o deegar sarfeen mein numaya kami hui hai avrikl si ای o mark hood naay media se baat karte hue bataya ke کلائوڈ par istemaal ki jaany wali ای are pi appli kishnz mein ziyada tar avrikl فیوژن ya avrikl net سوئیٹ systems shaamil hain avrikl ke si tea o liri ایلسن naay kaha ke woh ko shash kar rahay hain ke woh sarfeen ki tawaquaat par para utar saken avrikl آٹونومس data bees doosri genration ke liye hai aur yeh mukammal tor par mehfooz tareen nahi hai isi terhan is ki deegar khususiyaat jaissa ke barq-e raftari istemaal mein aasani ziyada qabil bharosa aur ziyada bakfayt bhi behtar karne ki window Nokia  phone nai tecnology mein ijaad kya hai
Nokia  214 aik wando phone hai jo sab se pehlay 2011 mein ijaad kya gaya tha aur ab usay kuch tabdeeli ke sath dobarah Nokia  214 ( 2017 ) ke naam se ijaad kya gaya hai
yeh phone sab se pehlay Japan  mein numayesh ke liye rawan haftay ke aakhir tak 2481 rouble ( 7 hazaar 155 Pakistani  rupay ke qareeb ) mein farokht hoga, jabkay deegar bar e sagheer mein bhi jald paish kya jaye ga
Nokia  2230 ki tabdeeli mein yeh dosra window phone hai jo Nokia  brand ka licence haasil karne wali company until globl ne naye prasisr ke sath ijaad kya
is se pehlay yeh company Nokia  2230 aur Nokia  615 phone bhi nai taknik ke sath samnay لاچکی hai

3 que que v jee ae display diya gaya hai jis mein 215×322 پکسلز resolution hai
