Karachi  ( commerce desk ) auto industry ki aalmi shohrat Yafta  numayesh آٹومکینیکا Germany  mein 11 September  se 15 September  taq jari rehne wali is numayesh mein Pakistan  se anay wali 14 companiyon ki shirkat par pabandi Ayad  kar di hai is numayesh mein gariyon ke purzah bananay wali companiyon ko be had aaccha rspans milnay ka imkaan zahir kya ja raha tha zraya ke mutabiq tea d ae pi mazkoorah numayesh mein guzashta do dahaiyo se shareek horahee hai lekin rawan saal mulki soorat e haal ke paish e nazar is numayesh mein trade development atharti Pakistan  par pabandi Ayad  kar di gayi hai jis mein 15 companiyon neh –apne stalls laganay they numayesh mein 173 mumalik ke aik laakh 83 hazaar se zayed kharidaron ki mojoodgi numayesh ki ahmiyat ko wazeh kar rahi thi lekin bad qismati se Pakistan  se tijarti kharidaron mein aik ahem naam Pakistan  auto اسپیئرپارٹس امپورٹرزاینڈ ڈیلرزایسوسی ation ka bhi hai jin ke numaindgaan ki bhi shamoliat par pabandi Ayad  ki gayi hai is numayesh mein mzid companiyon neh bhi shirkat karna thi jin mein Pakistan  association of auto parts and اسیسریز minofikchrrz bhi shaamil hai پاپام skill development insti tute ke chairman aur Pakistan  auto parts show ke knoynr Mashhood  Ali  Khan  ney bataya ke آٹومکینیکا ka yeh faisla نہاہت lsanit ki bunyaad par kya gaya hai is liye Pakistan  ki auto industry ki salahiyat ko ujagar karne aur aalmi market mein honay wali jiddat se aag_hi ke liye ab woh dosray Europi  mumalik ka intikhab karen ge police ke mutabiq drone ke zariye sunah 2013 aur 2014 ke douran laip taap aur computer smgl kiye gaye
Amrici  hakkaam nay﻿ drone ke zariye barray pemanay par jailon mein sharaab aur laip taap smgl karne ke mansoobay mein mulawis honay ke ilzaam mein pandrah afraad par frdِ jurm aed ki hai
jin afraad par frdِ jurm aed ki gayi hai un mein no mard aur chay khawateen shaamil hain
police ke mutabiq un afraad ko New York, kintki aur mexico ke deegar shehron se girftar kya gaya hai
Amrici  police ki janib se jari kiye gay bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke girftar kiye gay afraad drone ke zariye jailon mein mamnooa ashya phainkte rahay hain
America  ki jin jailon mein drone ke zariye smugling ki gayi un mein گوانتانا موبے, اوکوڈ, شاشینک, mexico, Texas  aur new jarsi ki jilin shaamil hain
is baaray mein baat karte hue police inspector ایریکا field ka kehna tha ke' yeh grftaryan bohat ahem paish Raft  hain aur yeh aik tajribati tehqiqaat ke nateejay mein amal mein aayi hain
' ایریکا field ka mazeed kehna tha ke jailon mein honay walay ziyada tar pur-tashaddud waqeat mobile phone ki smugling ki wajah se hi hotay hain is liye yeh intahi zaroori hai ke hum is smugling ko rokain, aur jo bhi smugling mein mulawis hoga woh khud bhi jald hi jail ki salakhon ke peechay hoga

bpasha baso ny Sajid  Khan  ki tareef karte hue kaha ke woh khawateen ko maa behan ka darjah dete hain aur خوقتین kay sath koi بہودہ mazaq nahi karte doosri janib adakara diya Mirza  ny Sajid  Khan andaaz mein mashkoor they taham aayi f tea d ae naay Sajid  Khan  par pabandi khatam karne ka faisla kya hai ﻿چند saal qabal snatkaron naay aik aisa software tayyar kya hai جومٹی ki zarkhaizi ko bakhobi jaanch sakay gi, matti ki zarkhaizi jhanchne ke liye jo test hotay hain woh bohat sastay aur aasaan hotay hain
yeh app aayi bi am Indonesia  ke snatkaron ne tayyar ki hai
yeh computerizied intelli jins ( masnoi zahanat ) ki bunyaad par kaam kere gi, jis se مزارعہ khud apni matti ki zarkhezi ka jaiza le satke hain
snatkaron ke mutabiq yeh soft wear zarayi behtari ki zamanat ban sakti hai
aayi bi am ke tajurbah karon ka kehna hai ke malik bhar mein chhootay مزارعہ 75 fi sad zarayi amal injaam dete hain aur yeh software behtar fasal haasil karne mein bohat madad faraham kar y gi
is ke liye aik zaheen kaghazi card bhi banaya gaya hai
yeh jasamat mein bilkul dibt card ki tar h hai, is ka غذ ko snatkaron ki janib se' ' aygro card' ' ka naam diya gaya hai
is mein گاڑھے maday bhari khurd beeni naalian mojood hain jo sirf 35 second mein matti aur pani ka andaza karti hain
مزارعہ ko sirf is par matti ka dheela rakhna hota hai aur rangon ke zahuur matti ki zarkhezi zahir karte hain
is software ke zariye مزارعہ aik ghanta mein durust tareen nataij haasil kar saktay hain
yeh software computerizied intelli jins ke zariye card par namodaar honay walay rangon ka jaiza le kar un mein mojood kimiklz ki qisam aur ifadiyat zahir karti hai
software aur zarayi kaghaz ke zariye matti mein mojood tezabiyat, hydrogen کلورائیڈ, sodium, phosphorus aur methain ki kamyabi se pemaiesh hosakti hai, taham ایگروکارڈ ko وقتاور حالاتکے lehaaz se tabdeel karkay is se dosray kaam bhi liye jasakte hain
alav hay azeen computerizied intelli jins ki badolat sainkron matti ke namonon ka data kisi barray data bees mein bhi mehfooz kya ja sakta hai
ab koi bhi moong phali khaye bana nah reh paye aayiyae jantay hain moong phali ke heran kin fawaid sardiyoon mein moong phali garma garam moong phali khanay ka allag hi maza hai moong phali slanh kaasht kiye jan_e_ wala poda hai jisay sab se pehlay پاکیستان mein Kashmir  ki vadyon mein kaasht kya gaya moong phali ke pouday ki lambai 50 se 80 centi meter hoti hai moong phali ki kaasht aur pedawar mein Pakistan  sir fehrist hai is ki kaasht aur pedawar mein dosray number par India  aur teesray number par chain hai log moong phali sirf khanay ki had pasand karte hain lekin woh yeh nahi jantay ke yeh qudrati phal insani sahet ke liye kitna khatarnaak saabit ho sakta hai misar mein honay wali taaza tareen tahaqeeq ke mutabiq ایجپشن society of allergy and ایمونالوجی ke rukan dr mjdi Badran  ki tahaqeeq se yeh baat saabit hui hai ke moong phali mein paye janey walay ahem ghizai anasir insani sahet par bohat nuqsaan da asraat muratab karte hain moong phali khanay se ensaan nah sirf bohat se infection mein mubtala hojata hai balkay yeh jism mein cancer jaisi mohlik bemari ko bhi janam dainay mein ahem kirdaar ada karti hai yeh hamaray jism mein mojood safaid khalion ko intahi satah taq kam karti hai jis se hamari jism mein daakhil honay walay bairooni jaraseem aasani se daakhil ho satke hain moong phali khanay se ensaan ka khoon ghara ho jata hai jis se blood pressure jaisi amraaz janam layte hain tahaqeeq se yeh baat bhi samnay aayi hai ke moong phali insani khoon kam karti hai jis se bohat si zehni amraaz peda honay ka khadsha la-haq ho jata hai yeh cholesterol ko badhaane aur blood pressure ko taiz karne ki bhi wajah banti hai qudrat ka yeh anmol tohfa –apne andar ٹرپٹوفان bhi rakhta hai jo jism mein سیروٹونن madah peda karta hai yeh madah ensaan ko depration aur aasabi tanav ki haalat mein mubtala kar ke uskay mizaaj ko بیگارتا hai moong phali ke chilkay nah sirf insani jald ko jald boorha kar deti hai balkay is ke istemaal se jismani wazan mein numaya izafah dekha ja sakta hai Amrici  tehqeeq ke mutabiq university of medicine ke dr ژاؤ o show ne khushk meway aur mout ke khatray ki sharah ke darmain talluq ki tehqeeq ki is tehqeeq se yeh maloom kya gaya hai ke moong phali khanay walay afraad dil ke amraaz mein mubtala ho jatay hain is liye moong phali ko chootte umar main khanay se ensaan bohat si bimarion mein mubtala ho sakta hai idhar aik dr naay yeh bhi bataya hai ke woh 20 baras ki Umar  mein moong phali ke bohat shoqeen they baad azan woh dil y aarze mein mubtala ho gaye baad mein unhon naay moong phali ka istemaal tark kardiya jis se un ke dil ka yeh masla yun gayab sun-hwa jaisay gadhay ke sir se seeng lehaza moong phali se allergy bhi hoti hai moong phali dublay aur kamzor afraad ke liye bohat tqsan da saabit hui hai jo inhen cancer se marz mein mubtala kar sakti hai moong phali diabeties aur سرطان ke mareezon mein sugar barha hai kar deti hai moong phali se asaab kamzor ho jatay hain moong phali ke istemaal se ansolin ki satah khatarnaak had tak barh jati hai moong phali mein mojood folaad khoon ke naye khaliye khatam kar deta hai agar aap ke baal gir rahay hain to moong phali ka har گزاستعمال nah karen pehchanana mushkil kaam hai kyunkay yeh dil ka marz kayi sooraton mein zahir hota hai taham نیورل net work istemaal kar ke sirf chehra dekh kar dil ke amraaz ki shanakht karne wala aik inqalabi nizaam tayyar karliya gaya hai Bostan  mein waqay aik qadray nai company f DNAe se wabsta یارون گرووچ aur un ke sathiyon ny aik nizaam banaya hai woh majmoi tor par poora chehra daikhta hai aur is ke baad masnoi zahanat ( ae aayi ) aur نیورل net work ki madad se 5 minute mein dil ke marz ki nishandahi kar deta hai tarbiyat Yafta  نیورل net work mein 17 hazaar aisi tasaveer hain jo sab dil ke marz mein mubtala hain is terhan yeh system 200 dil ki mukhtalif hisson kuttay amraaz ki shanakht karsaktha hai is ke baad masnoi zahanat ya آرٹیفیشل intelli jins se is marz ko jan-nay mein madad li jati hai company ke mutabiq yeh system sirf mareez ki tasweer dekh kar 91 feesad durusti ke sath dil ke marz ki pishgoyi karsaktha hai basa auqaat yeh nizaam sirf 500 tasaveer parhnay ke baad hi apna faisla suna deta hai agarchay ab bhi is mein behtari ki bohat gunjaish hai taham usay mazeed behtar bananay ki koshish ki jaye gi lekin ab bhi yeh insani aankh aur salahiyat se bohat agay hain naqideen ke mutabiq agar yeh nizaam karobari companiyon ke haath lag jaye to woh usay tafreeq aur imtiaz ke liye istemaal karen gi jis se muashray mein na-insafi barhay gi is ka jawab dete hue f DNAe ne kaha hai ke yeh nizaam sirf doctoron aur haspatalon ko hi farokht kya jaye ga washington software bananay wali duniya ki sab se barri company مائکرو soft ke shareek baani paal Allan  aag lagnay se intqaal kargaye hain un ki Umar  92 baras thi Allan  ka intqaal un ke aabadi shehar New York mein sun-hwa pichlle kuch barso n se woh امرض qalb mein مبتلاء they aur aakhir-kaar heart attack honay ki wajah se woh chal basey paal Allan  bil Gates  ke bachpan ke dost nahi they paal Allan  ki harkato wajah se hi harord university mein bil Gates  ko nikaal diya gaya kyunkay woh unkay classe fellow they jisske baad bil Gates  ne kmpyo tang ka kaarobar karne ka faisla kya tha baad azan dono ne 1973 hamza mein مائیکرو soft ki bunyaad rakhi thi jis ka naam bhi Allan  ny nahi tajweez kya tha paal Allan  company lateeni America  ke malik brazil ke shehar کالاما mein waqay kansi ki kaan ka fazai manzar drone aur دیجیٹل camera se li gayi yeh tasaveer Bartania  ke photographer adored برٹینسکی ki khenchi hui hain
برٹینسکی ki barray pixel wali tasweeron mein kaan kinny, gandum ki katai, san-aton ke astrkchr, kachray, lohay aur matti ke dhair, zameen par lagi machinery jo dio ki terhan dikhti hai aur phaphondi ki manind nazar anay wali insani bastiyaan daur se to ghaas ke maidan جییسی dikhayi deti hain, magar qareeb se aik Hussain  dakyomntri ka scene paish karti hain
tasweer ke Amrici  riyasat miksko mein فاسفر ka talaab چکوکاماتا mein duniya ki sab se barri khuli aatish fishan hain
dikhnay mein khobsorat yeh taswerain darasal qudrat ka dil dhula dainay wala chehra be naqaab karti hain
mexico mein is فاسفر ٹیلینگ darya ke qudrati rang se numaya hota hai ke jin ilaaqon mein fasfit gharelo aur tajurbah gaahon ke liye istemaal kya jata hai wahan aloodgi ki wajah se is ko qudrati haalat mein wapas lana namumkin hai
un kahaaniyon mein yeh nazar aata hai ke hum insaaniyat ko kis had taq khatray mein daal rahay hain aur kis pemanay par samndron mein kachra undail rahay hain
Amrici  riyasat keep town mein tanbay ki kaan
مورینسی mine keep town ki مورینسی kaan mein loha pighalnay ki تصویریوں mein wazay hota hai ke lohay haasil karne ke amal ke baad behta sun-hwa maya nadi ki shakal ikhtiyar kar laita hai
lagos, aljirya mein tail ke zakheeray aljirya mein Ameer  logon neh khalis tail ko ڈرموں se akhatta karna shuru kar diya hai, is amal ko' بنکرنگ' ke naam se jana jata hai
un logon ne earzi ریفائنریریز laga kar khalis tail ko high octane mein tabdeel karna shuru kar diya hai
is amal ki wajah se bohat sa khalis tail aur zahreeley maday qareebi darya aur gharelo istemaal ke pani mein mil jatay hain
bazaar aur barray pemanay par ban'nay walay pahari silsiloon nay﻿ taizi se zameen par gehray nishanaat chore rahay hain jaisay ke roos ke ilaqay senate pitrs barg mein zameen se 120 meter neechay surang karne wali machinon ki taraf se be naqaab kiye gaye aik qadeem daryai farsh ki allag allag rangon ki matti zahir honay lagi hain
karara mein namak ki kaanon mein qadeem yunan ke waqt se kaan kinny hoti aayi hai
mashhoor Adeeb  مائیکلاینجلو is پتھرکا istemaal kar ne ke liye jane jatay thay aur baaz auqaat woh teen teen haftay tak pathar nikaalte ke amal ki nigrani karte thay
koylay ki kaanon mein ki gayi yeh khdayi pahoron se bhi nazar aati hai
bilashuba yeh tasaveer mamooli hain
lekin yeh is baat ki yaad dehani bhi karati hain ke is waqt shayad hi zameen par koi insaan hon jinhein khatrah la-haq nahi hai

? Facebook ko 2013 se shadeed tanqeed ka saamna hai jaisay Amrici  aam intikhabaat mein cheeni muzahmat, madahon ki msg privacy, hattak aamaiz mawaad aur deegar
un tanqeed naay duniya ki maqbool tareen awaami raabtey ki Website ko Atab  ka shikaar krrkha hai aur is par ghair qanooni kaam aur zaati mafadaat ko farogh dainay ke ilzamaat ka saamna hai
London  times ney is hawalay se aik tehqiqati surway jari kya hai jis mein bataya gaya ke Facebook ki janib se kis terhan mahireen par tanqeedi waar kiye jarahay hain
mamlaat ko khatai mein daalnay, tardeed aur Los Angeles mein –apne haq mein tashheer sameit mutadid tajarbaat kiye jarahay hain, is report ke 8 ahem nakaat jazo hain
2013 ke awail mein mark زکربرگ ne mulki satah par elaan kya ke yeh aik par tashweesh khayaal hai ke un ki Website ne intikhabaat mein misali kirdaar ada kya, magar Website ke security science daan ko andar ki wajohaat ka andaza tha
un science danon ne 2013 ke mausam khizaa mein daryaft kya tha ke cheeni hikrz aisay Facebook اکاؤنٹس ke sath raabtey mein hain jo ke Amrici  awaami muhim se munsalik hain, kayi saal baad science danon ne dekha ke cheeni munsalik اکاؤنٹس se hikng ke shikaar ripblk ای mails ki tafseelaat share ki jarahi hain
surway ke mutabiq dar haqeeqat Facebook ko chain ki sar garmion ke assaar do saal pehlay mil chuke thay jis ke baaray mein Amrici  intikhabaat ke baad Nasa  aur pentagon koaagah kiya gaya
2011 mein jab Democratic Party ke sadaarti umeed waar Donald  trmp naay Bharti  tarikeen watan par tehqiqaat ka mutalba kya to Facebook ke director aur Website se bahar mojood mahireen naay company se Donald  trmp ke khilaaf badlay ka mutalba kya
mark زکربرگ ney is par elaan kya aur –apne science danon se raye li ke kya Donald  trmp ney Website ke zawabit ki khilaaf warzi ki hai ya nahi aur kya un ke اکاؤنٹ ko band ya post ko khatam kar diya jaye
agarchay mark زکربرگ dimaghi tor par is post ke khilaaf thay magar unhon nay﻿ Donald  trmp ke khilaaf muhim ko iltiwa mein daal diya taakay democratic ke sakht rad-e-amal se honay walay nateejay ko badla jasakay aur Donald  trmp ki woh post ab bhi Facebook par mojood hai
cheeni mudakhlat ke Facebook ke baad azan aitraaf par mukhalfat bherne par Website ne –apne haq mein aik really shuru ki jis ki nigrani DG sheril سینڈبرگ ne khud ki, taakay mahireen ka saamna karkay awaami dabao ko nai technology companiyon ki janib morra jasakay
Facebook ne is kaam ke liye Bartanwi  senetor mark warner ke sabiq head of star ki khidmaat ko is really ke liye haasil kya
sheril سینڈبرگ ne niji tor par senetor Aimi  کلوبوچر se minnat karkay un ki tanqeed par maa'zarat ki, Website ne aik pi are company ki khidmaat bhi paish kee taakay –apne awaami mahireen ke mutaliq manfi khabron ko mirch masalay laga kar paish kya jaye jabkay Apple  jaisi companiyon par frdjrm aed kiye ja sakain
un muharikaat mein kharab patti donor george soros ko bhi nishana banaya gaya jo ke Facebook baray mein really ke pusht par they, jabkay Facebook ki tareef aur Apple  ke oopar tanqeed par mabni tasaveer ko aik rasookh rakhnay wali news site par shaya karaya gaya
Facebook ko rawan mah ستمبرمیں is waqt America  bhar mein tanqeed ka saamna karna para jab bohat saaray khabar rasan idaron ki mushtarqa khabar mein inkishaaf sun-hwa ke oxford اینالیٹیکا Nami  company nay﻿ kis terhan arbon Amrici  votrz ka haq راۓ dahi istemaal kya
magar Facebook ke andar science danon ka khayaal tha ke is ghalti ki azaala mumkin hai aur is maqsad ke liye company ne aik naya cheif of brtsh labng tainaat kya taakay awam ke ghusse ko sun-hwa di jasakay
is ke ilawa bermila tor se company ke andar aik really' v gate att' ka aaghaz kya taa ke mahireen ko yaqeen dehani karai jasakay ke Website 2019 mein aik baar phir asal shakal par wapas aajay gi
Facebook ki ghaltion ka ehsas karkay kuch mukhalif Websites naay usay –apne brandz ke propignda ke liye istemaal karna shuru kya, is hawalay se Apple  ke director tim kk naay aik interview ke douran kaha ke un ki device sarfeen ke haq راۓ dahi ko istemaal nahi karti to yeh baat mark زکربرگ ke dimagh par jaakar lagi
is ke jawab mein Facebook ke baani naay apni tehqiqati team ko hukum diya ke woh tally phone ki jagah sirf window phones ko istemaal karen ge, company ka daawa hai ke window operating system ke sarfeen Apple  se ziyada hain
sniyr ripblkn aur washington se senetor chak schumer nay﻿ congress ke deegar hmaytyon ke muqablay mein Facebook ke sarfeen se ziyada fund 2013 ke intikhabaat ke douran haasil kiye aur woh Website ki mushkil ke waqt is ki himayat ke liye mojood they
jab Facebook ki pabandion mein izafah ho raha tha to chak schumer ne Facebook ke khilaaf reli chalanay walay senetor mark warner ka saamna kya
doosri janib Facebook ne London  times ki report ki tareef ki hai
Facebook ki janib se jari bayan mein is baat ki tareef ki gayi ke usay cheeni sar garmion ka ilm 2013 ke mausam khizaa mein hochuka tha aur is ne security head ko is muamlay par tehqiqaat karne se roka tha
Website ke mutabiq usay cheeni mudakhlat ka ilm Amrici  intikhabaat ke baad sun-hwa aur is nay﻿ ghair qanooni اکاؤنٹس ko band kya
isi terhan Website ka kehna tha ke Facebook mahireen mein tally phones ke istemaal se roknay ka koi hukum tim kick ke bayan ke rad-e-amal mein nahi diya gaya, magar Website ke mutabiq' hum mahireen mein window phones ke istemaal ki tareef karte hain kyunkay woh America  ka sab se ziyada istemaal kya jaaane wala mobile processing system hai '
trmp ke hamion se nafrat ke baaray mein Facebook ney kaha ke woh bayan Website ke qawaid ke khilaaf nahi tha jaissa London  times ney bayan kya, Donald  trmp sadaarti rukan they aur un ka bayan science danon ko hansnay ka mauqa faraham karta hai
Website ka yeh bhi kehna tha ke sheril سینڈبرگ ny senetor se maa'zarat sex trifkng qawaneen par ki thi o is ka maqsad mukhalif Websites ko neecha dikhnana nahi tha
aakhir mein Facebook ne kaha ke is ne pi are company ko is liye munaqqid kya taakay' Facebook mein tajdeed' ko dekha jasakay

muddat ke douran yeh aamdani 219. 9 rupay rahi thi jakarta 23 augst ( siyasat dot com ) Pakistan  hockey team naay چہارشنبہ ko hang kang ko 0 ke muqablay mein 26 gole se hara kar ayshiyn games mein ke pehlay paanch minute mein chaar gole kiye aur khail khatam honay se saat minute qabal –apne gole keeper ko bhi gole se hata liya aur agay aa kar hamlay karne walon mein shaamil kar liya paiir ko se shikast di is terhan yeh tournament aik high scoring tournament bantaa ja raha hai jis mein barri temen ziyada se ziyada gole kar rahi hain yaad rahay ke aaj taq newzea land ki team ka kisi bain al aqwami match mein kisi bhi team ke khilaaf sab se ziyada gole karne ka record hai is ny 1994 mein سمووا ki team ke khilaaf aik ke muqablay mein 36 gole kiye they coupon hign ( disk ) Denmark  mein science danon ny aik nai tibbi tahaqeeq mein dil ke mareezon ko werzish nah karne ki tajweez di hai janoobi Denmark  mein medical science college ke mohqiqeen ki taraf se jari kardah tahaqeeq mein kaha gaya hai ke dil ke mareezon ko bilkul werzish nahi karni chahay کیسنکہ werzish se dil ki sahet par مجفی misbet asar parre ga aur khoon ki shareyanien bhi sukarnay se aariz qalb ki bemari mein izafay kay sath jismani kamzoree mein bhi mubtala hon jayen ge jadeed tahaqeeq ki tayari ke douran mahireen ne dil ke mareezon ke 70 rukni aik group ki sahet ka jaiza liya is group mein 45 saal se 67 saal ki amrke mard o khawateen shaamil they mahireen ka kehna hai ke werzish nah karne se dil ke khaliye behtar kaam kar rahay hain aur saans lainay mein bhi dushwari ka saamna nahi karna para jis ki wajah se un ka wazan bhi normal raha hai yeh tahaqeeq musalsal 24 haftay jari rahi aur dil ke mareezon ko mukammal Aram  karne ke amal se gzara gaya science danon ka kehna hai ke is tajarbay ka maqsad ghizai sahet ke nizaam ko falo karte hue werzish ke dil ke mareezon par asraat ka jaiza lena tha ﻿آن line ای commerce company' amazon' ke shareek baani aur executive cheif 49 sala jack ma naay 6 mah qabal hi –apne ohday se retirement ka elaan kya tha
jack ma ne chairman ship chorte hue khoraak aur sahet ke mansoobon par kaam karne ke azm ka izhaar kya tha
jack ma ki janib se ohda chhorey jatay waqt company ney is baat ki tasdeeq ki thi ke un ki jagah company ka kon naya chairman hoga
ab aymzon ke naye executive chairman ke naam ka elaan kardiya gaya
sanati nashriyati idaray' si an bi si' ne apni report mein bataya ke jack ma ki jagah 42 dinil sang ko amazon ka naya executive chairman muqarrar kya jaye ga
daniel sang ne 1998 mein amazon ko join kya tha
report ke mutabiq jack ma aindah baras augst taq –apne ohday se allag ho jaien ge, jis ke baad denial zang ko zimma dariyan sonpi jayen gi
jack ma ne executive cheif ke ohday prdo dahai taq khidmaat sir injaam den aur mazeed do saal taq woh is par apni zimma dariyan nibhate rahen ge
jack ma chairman ke ohday se hatt jayen ge, to woh board of gornrz ke rukan honay samait company ke shareek baani bhi nahi rahen ge
un ki jagah lainay walay 42 sala denial zang ney 1998 mein amazon ko area manager ke tor par join kya tha, taham woh is waqt company ke cheif executive officer ( si ای o ) ke tor par khidmaat sir injaam day rahay hain
inhen company ka baani bhi kaha jata hai, taham aindah baras augst tak woh company ke aala tareen ohday yani executive chairman par tainaat ho jaien ge
jack ma ne 9 afraad ke sath 1995 mein amazon banai thi
jack ma ki janib se ohday ko chhorey jaane ko America  ki barri online companiyon mein shumaar honay wali amazon mein guzashta do dahai mein sab se barri tabdeeli mein se aik bhi kaha ja raha hai
amazon ko jack ma ne deegar 19 afraad ke sath mil kar 1995 mein Maroof  online commerce Website' amazon' ko banaya tha
is Website ko bananay ka maqsad Amrici  masnoaat ko aalmi mandiyon aur deegar mumalik taq aasani se pahunchana tha
ibtidayi kaafi saloon mein is company ko kayi mushkilaat ka saamna karna para, taham is waqt amazon ka shumaar duniya ki barri online ای commerce companiyon aur Websites mein hota hai
aik report ke mutabiq is waqt amazon ke kal waqti mulazmeen ki tadaad 72 hazaar hai aur is ke asason ki value 9 so 80 arab dollar ( Pakistani  966 kharab rupay se zayed ) hai
اناناس haldi adrak aur lemoo mein qudrati tor par anti infection ki khususiyaat payi jati hai aur un se tayyar kardah mashrobat sardi aur nazla zukam ki rokkk thaam ke liye istemaal kiye jatay hain un nah sirf is khususiyaat ke haamil hain balkay yeh jism mein khoon ki gardish ko badhaane mein ahem kirdaar ada karte hain aur jism ko chust rakhnay mein bhi nihayat ahmiyat ke haamil hain lemoo mein paye jan_e_ wala strk acid pathri ko tornay mein madad deta hai anannaas khanay ke khansi ko roka ja sakta hai آناناس ka masnoi sharbat ziyada mo-asar saabit ho chuka hai is ke ilawa haldi aur adrak mein paye jaaney walay ajza cancer ki rokkk thaam mein ahem kirdaar ada karte hain balkay nazla zukam se bhi mehfooz rakhtay hain Mumbai  bollywood adakar snje dt ki beti تریشالا dt ny kaha hai ke un ka bollywood mein kaam karne ka iradah hai bollywood mein baba ke naam se kaafi msh_hori mil sakti hai snje dt ki pehli beti تریشالا dt social media par par –apne waalid ki tasaveer share karkay un ki hosla afzai karti rehti hain sanju ki na qabil yaqeen kamyabi ke bas تریشالا ki janib ny social media par –apne waalid snje dt se mutaliq madahon ki janib se kiye gaye salawon par jawab dete hue kaha hai ke woh –apne waalid snje dt ke sath bohat achay taluqaat rakhti hain aur walidain ke baghair nahi reh sakti hain jis ka unhon ney mazeed kaha ke mere waalid snje dt ki bhi khwahish hai ke mein Bollywood mein kaam karoon aik achi beti honay ke nate mein ney –apne waalid ke sath ہوعدہ kya hai ke woh jald yeh پالیوڈ industry mein jalva gir hon gi mujhe walidain ke sath rehne ka bohat shoq hai kyun ke mein kabhi un ke baghair nahi rahi mein bachpan se hi un ke sath zindagi busr kar rahi hon aik Sarif  ke sawal ka jawab dete hue kaha ke mein –apne waalid jaisi bhi hon aur walida jaisi bhi mera gussa aur rawayya –apne walida jaissa hai jab ke naram dili aur mohabbat bhara bartao waalid ki terhan hai agar bollywood se mujhe aik achi film ki offer aeye to waalid ke sath kya sun-hwa wada zaroor nibhao gi تریشالا naay mazeed kaha ke mera bollywood industry mein jaany ki shadeed arzoo jald poori ho jaye gi hai wazeh rahay snje dt ki pehli shadi ریچا sharmaa se hui jin se un ki 1 hi beti تریشالا dt hain aur un ki doosri biwi se koi aulaad nahi jab ke un ki teesri biwi منیاتا dt se inhen 1 beta شاہران dt aur 1 beti iqrah dt hain nai Dehli  29 May  ( siyasat dot com ) hindostan ki aalmi champion weight lftr mera bayi چھانو ne wizarat khail se national camp ke douran yeh inkishaaf kya hai ke indian weight lifting federation ne unkay kamray mein khufia camera nasb kiye hain inka kehna tha ke inhen andesha hai ke un ki jasoosi ki ja rahi hai is par tabsarah karte hue indian weight lifting federation ke secretary Shah  dio yadyo ka kehna tha ke unhon ne khufia camera lagaye hain taakay میرابائی –apne room mein bhi Aram  se so saken kyunkay unko jaan ke khatraat la-haq they Islamabad ( new زڈیسک ) mashhoor tecnology galaxy samsung ne neend mein chalne walay mareez ki nigrani ke liye والکنگ system registered karaya hai neend mein chalne walay mareez ko mushkil se nijaat dilanay ke liye mashhoor Amrici  tecnology company Saam  sang ne rasoom naya ki nigrani ke liye system registered karanay ka elaan kya hai aur sath hi Saam  sang ke hakkaam ne bataya hai ke is system mein shaamil khusoosi bistar aik touc screen ke control panel se jura sun-hwa hoga aur computer display par sonay walay ke dil ki dharkan ki raftaar ke sath sath saans lainay ki raftaar aur darjaa hararat dikhaane walay feture muta-arif karaye jayen ge is والکنگ system mein aik camera bhi laga hoga jo soye hue shakhs ke oopar laga sun-hwa ho ga taakay chalne walay mareez ki simt ko jancha ja sakay hakkaam ne abhi kuch tafseelaat muhayya nahi ki ke yeh product kab market mein aaye gi lekin kaha ja raha hai ke Saam  sang 2019 mein –apne sarfeen ko is naye product ka tohfa day gi London  ( monitoring desk ) motapay ko kam karne aur charbi pighalnay ke liye log jim mein ja kar kari varzishen karte hain lekin ab Bartania  ke science danon ne charbi pighalnay ka aik intehai aaasaaan tareeqa bta diya hai jis mein aap aik ko haath bhi nahi hilaana parre ga aur aap ke jism ki charbi pighal jaye gi di mirror ke mutabiq notnghm trint university ke science danon ka kehna hai ke hum sab raat ko sotay hain taham bohat kam log jantay hain ke sonay ke zariye jism ki charbi bhi پگھلائی ja sakti hai sonay ke zariye charbi pighalnay ka tareeqa yeh hai ke aap ko apni دایئں janib rukh kar ke sona ho ga is douran aap ko kuch bhi nahi karna bas pursukoon neend leni hai mohqiqeen ka maanna hai ke nataij se maloom sun-hwa 8 ghantay ke liye pursukoon sonay se taqreeban 250 calories istemaal hoti hain is ke sath blood sugar level bhi mutanasib hojata hai aur un ki neend ka miyaar bhi behtar ho gaya is ke bar aks werzish jaisi mehnat kash kaam se log کھبراتے hain is liye science danon neh jadeed tahaqeeq mein bataya hai ke raat ko dayen janib Aram  karne se bhi numaya tor par wazan mein kami ki ja sakti hai Lahore  ( staff reporter ) saini pax cinema neh –apne sarfeen ke liye ke liye reward card ki wapsi ka koi elaan nahi kya un ka kehna hai saini pax ka reward card bunyadi tor par aik sale bees programme hai wazeh rahay ke sarfeen is card ke zariye kharidari par ziyada se ziyada pointe haasil kar le to phir bhi woh saalgirah par koi riaiti ticket haasil nahi kar saken ge card ki registration is qader mushkil hai ke pehlay tranzikshn par paap corn ki qmit 500 rupay aur cold ڈرننک ki qeemat 350 rupay muqarrar ki gayi hai Lahore  26 decemeber ( siyasat dot com ) indian indian cricket board ke chyrmin aur Pakistan  cricket board ke darmain tally phonic rabita sun-hwa jis mein is baat ki khwahish ki gayi ke Pakistan  super league aur aayi pi ail ki teamon mein Pakistani  aur indian khilari shamoliat ikhtiyar kar sakay wazeh rahay ke guzashta baras guzashta saloon se Pakistan  aur India ke darmain shadeed siyasi dabao ki wajah se cricket khaas tor par mutasir hui hai lekin sansani khaiz aur dilchaspi par mabni match dekhnay ka mauqa faraham kya ja sakay is liye series ko tashkeel dainay ke liye Pakistan  cricket board aur indian cricket board ke srbrahan ke darmain mumalik mein bain al aqwami tor par cricket ko farogh diya jasakay Pakistan  cricket board ke zaraye ny media se baat karte hue bataya ke indian cricket team ko Pakistan  ke doray par bulanay ke liye sakay ممبی bollywood ki Maroof  adakara shilpa shetty aur unn ki family ny kisanon ke lakhoon rupay karzzzz ada karne ka elaan kya hai Bharti  media reports ke mutabiq shilpa shetty aur unn ki family ne kaha hai ke woh kisanon par wajib ada lakhoon rupay karzzzz ada karen gi 2015 mein zaraat ke lehaaz se mulki haalat kharab ho jaane ko wajah se mutadid kisanon ne niji bankon se karzzzz liye they jo ke ab wajib ada hain shilpa shetty ke waalid سریندرا ne unki malk muawnat 21 laakh rupay ka check paish kya taa ke kisaan karzzzz ada kar saken mein karzzzz ada nah karne ki wajah se kisanon ne khud kashi karna shuru kar di shilpa shetty ka is hawalay se kehna hai ke kisanon ke liye hukoomat ko iqdamaat karne ki ashad zaroorat hai waalid ki terhan woh bhi kisanon ke karzzzz ki ادایئگی mein unki maali madad karen gi kyunkay khushaal kisaan hi India  ko khushaal karne mein madad kar satke hi media se baat karte hue shilpa shetty ka kehna tha ke bankon ko bhi is muamlay mein kisanon ki madad karni chahiye taakay woh khud kashi jaissa khofnaak rasta nah ikhtiyar karen wazeh rahay ke shilpa shetty sameit unn ki family ko rawan saal kisanon ke karzzzz ada karne ka elaan kya tha taakay kisaan khud kashi ka rasta nah ikhtiyar karen sydney 29 May  ( siyasat dot com ) Bharti  cricket team ko dora Pakistan  se qabal bara dhaka laga hai aur Bharti  cricket team ke bowler Zahir  Khan  fitness masail ke baais dora Pakistan  se bahar ho gaye mojooda halaat mein Bharti  cricket team ko shadeed mushkilaat ka saamna hai match fixing scandal ke baad se Bharti  cricket team ki mushkilaat khatam honay ka naam nahi le rahen aur virat کہلی aur mhndra singh dhoni ki khidmaat se mahroom team ab dora Pakistan  se qabal –apne ahem fast bolrz se bhi mahroom hogayi hai yaad rahay ke Bharti ney Australia  aur 183 runs ka hadaf 4 wicketon ke nuqsaan par 19. 2 overs mein haasil karliya queta ( online ) cheeni reserch aur sarmaya car company ٹونگسن risors ltd ney Balochistan  ke maadni wasail ko taraqqi dainay mein dilchaspi zahir ki hai wazeer e aala Balochistan jaam Meer  kamaal Khan  alyani se honay wali aik mulaqaat mein company ke saddar وینگ جنچینگ naay soobay ke qudrati sindk mansoobay mein tosee karne ki ijazat talabb ki jis se nah sirf soobay ki maeeshat behtar hogi balkay muqami logon ko 50 hazaar rozgaar ke mawaqay bhi milein ge un ka mazeed kehna tha ke hamari company 80 mumalik mein maadni zakhair ki talaash ka kaam kar rahi hai aur duniya bhar mein 60 arab dollar maliyat ke asason ki maalik hai un ka kehna tha ke am si si gi maadni park ke qiyam mein rahay hain un ka mazeed kehna tha ke Pakistani  awam taraqiyati kamon mein taawun karne par cheeni hukoomat ke koshisho par bohat khush hain hum maadni wasail se malamaal honay ke wajah se munasib taraqqi ke hawalay se mo-asar aur free mansoobah bandi paish karni chahiye taakay woh grab عوال ki madad kar saken is ke sath unhon ny am am si ko yaqeen dehani karwai ke un ki hukoomat is silsilay ke pak fouj  FC police aur livez sameit tamam qanoon nafiz karne walay idaray malik ke bardrz ki hifazat kar rahay hain mumtaz shaeirah Fahmida  Riaz  shadeed alalat ke baais intqaal kar gayeen Fahmida  Riaz  ki Umar  70 saal thi theen taraqqi pasand shaeirah kehlanay wali Fahmida  Riaz  ki paidaiesh 28 July  1946 ko mirth mein hui qiyam Pakistan  kayi baad un ka khandan hijrat kar ke Pakistan  mein Karachi  mein qiyam pazeer sadaarti award baraye husn karkardagi aur sitara imtiaz haasil karne wali Fahmida  Riaz ki drama nigari sameit 11 kitaaben shaya huien unhon ne pehli nazam sasural mein likhi jo' ' fanoon' ' mein shaya hui jabkay un ka pehla sheri majmoa' pathar ki zabaan' aur dosra un ke shohar se alehadgi ke baad' darbadar' ke naam se shaya sun-hwa shaeirah Fahmida  Riaz  general Zia  Al Haq  ke dormin Bharat  جابسیں theen aur aik fazai haadsay mein un ke intqaal ke baad Pakistan  lotin 2010 mein saddar Pakistan  ki janib se award baraye adab aur sitara imtiaz haasil kya 2016 mein human rights wtch ki janib se ہیمت ہیلمن award baraye adab, 2005 mein المفتاح award baraye adab o shairi haasil kya unhon naay molana Roomi  ki msnoy ka arabi se urdu zabaan mein tarjuma bhi kya mazeed bar-aan aamriyat aur mardon ke haqooq ke liye bhi hai Fahmida  Riaz  naay bohat kaam kya is ke ilawa khawateen ke azadana haqooq ke liye kaam karne walay Fahmida  Riaz  mehboob sanaf sukhan nazam thi aur un ke khayalat ko hamesha riwayati eqdaar mein jagah mili adbi halqon flmstar halqon ke ilawa malik ki tamam awam naay bhi un ke intqaal par intahi afsos ka izhaar kya hai jarabon ke sath jootay pahannay ke baad badboo aana aik aam masla hai yeh aik bemari nahi hai peeron ki badboo ko khatam karne ke liye aik jadeed nuskha tayyar kar liya gaya hai jis se ab اپکو bilkul bhi باؤں ki badboo se pareshan nahi hona chahiye darasal peeron mein paseena kharij karne walay ghudood baqi jism ke muqablay mein ziyada hotay hain baqi hisson mein yeh ghudood kaisi werzish ki soorat mein harkat mein atay hain jabkay peeron ka kaam chunkay nisbatan ziyada honay ki wajah se yeh kaafi miqdaar mein ghudood jism se kharij hoti rehtay hain nateejatan paseena aata hai jis ki wajah se aisay bacteria ko apni ghiza aur nashonuma millti rehti hai agar baar baar wohi jootay istemaal kya jaye to bo mein bohat hadd taq izafah hojata hai har mausam mein kami zayad-ti bhi is badboo ka baais ban sakti hai is ke ilawa doosri barri wajah fungus hai is badboo se bachna kaafi aassan hai sab se pehlay to aap –apne peeron ko saaf suthra rakhen is ke ilawa jooton aur jarabon ko saaf rakhna yakeeni banayen agar phir bhi yeh masla barqarar hai to dr se rujoo karkay fungus ke ilawa adwiyaat istemaal karen taakay aap badboo jaisi sharamnaak bemari se nijaat pa saken is ke ilawa jooton mein kapray dhoney wala surf rakhen taakay surf ki khusbhoo se badboo ka ehsas kam se kam ho Pakistan

mutabiq Bartania  ke امپیرئیل college health care turst ke science danon ney jadeed tahaqeeq mein bataya hai ke سپرمز ki pedawar aur un ke miyaar mein numaya kami dekhi gayi hai jis ki asal wajah aaj ke سپرمز ki pedawar mein kami ki chand barri wajohaat mein cigrette noshi sharaab aur deegar manshiat ki latt waghera shaamil hain un tamam awamil ko dekha jaye to un mein se beshtar ka talluq aaj ke ke miyaar mein heran kin hadd taq behtari runuma ho sakti hai Imran  Khan  ny wazarat Uzma ka ohda snbhalne ke baad Saudi  arab qarzay mangnay Saudi  arab ke dar-al-hakoomat Riaz  rawana ho gaye is wazeer e azam Imran  Khan  ne Pakistan  ke doray par anay ki dawat di hai wazeer e azam Imran  Khan  ne dora Saudi  arab mein un ke hamrah wazeer kharja Shah  Mahmood  Qureshi  wazeer khazana Sheikh  rasheed wazeer it-tila-aat Maaz  Ahmed  aur wazeer e azam ke musheer baraye tijarat Asif  Ali  Zardari  bhi shaamil they Pakistan  ke muashi bohraan se nimatnay ke liye Imran  Khan  ne pehlay hi kaha tha ke woh aayi am f se mazeed karzzzz nahi lena chahtay kyunkay woh hum wapas karne ki salahiyat nahi rakhay ge is liye behtar ho ga ke islami dost mumalik se maali imdaad karne ki iltija karne ka darwaaza ko tarjeeh den ge is liye kashkaul liye maali muawnat ki gharz se Imran  Khan  ne wazeer e azam ka bantay ke Saudi  arab ka hi intikhab kya tha kyunkay maana jata hai ke arbo se paas bohat paisa aur tec le wasee o Areez  زخائر hain doray ke baad Maaz  Ahmed  ne Islamabad mein press conference se khitaab karte hue kaha tha ke Saudi  arab woh pehla malik hai jisay Pakistan  ne Pakistan  ki maali muawnat ke liye –apne khazanon ke mun khol diye hain woh Saudi  arab ke aik aala satah ke wafad ka khud intzaar karen ge ke woh Pakistan  ka dora karen aur sarmaya kaari ke mansoobon ke liye mazeed imdadi package ka wazeh elaan karen taakay beron mulki qarzon ki adayigyon mein tawazun laya ja sakay beijing ( aayi an pi shnhwa ) chain mein internet masnoaat ki aalmi numayesh 2018 ka iftitah chain ke soobah jayang so ke shehar ووشی mein sun-hwa jis mein Pakistan  sameit kayi dosray mumalik ki kayi kmnyon ny bhi shirkat ki chain ki wizarat sanat aur information tecnology wizarat science o tecnology aur soobah jayang so ki awaami hukoomat ny mushtarqa tor par mojooda numayesh ka ihtimaam kya nai digital maeeshat aur internet ka naya ehad ko numayesh ka mauzo rakha gaya ? Lahore  ( numainda showbiz ) Bharti  adakara zeenat Amaan  Bharat  wapas chali gayeen, inhen Saba  hamid aur deegar adakaraon ne ganda singh border par ’alvidah’ kiya hai
zeenat Amaan  20 January  ko Iqbal  day mein shirkat ke liye –apne bhai Javed  Akhtar  ke hamrah Bharat  se Pakistan  aayi اورایکسپو center mein honay walay Iqbal  day mein shar yak huien
Bharti  گلوکاراور adakar Javed  Akhtar  ne kaha hai ke pak o hind mein har shakhs adakar hai aur yahan daramay dekhnay ka rujhan hai taham hum log mashriq wasti ki andha dhund tareef karte hain
farsi zabaan intehai mushkil hai, 9 saal ki Umar  mein achi adakari ki samajh aa chuki thi, is ke bawajood kaafi mah tak adakari ki himmat nah hui
Lahore  mein Iqbal  day ke douran Javed  Akhtar  naay kaha ke adakar ko kabhi kabhi shasta baat bhi kohni chahiye, adakari se logon ke dil badal jatay hain, is par mujhe aetmaad hai
mashriqi mein drama dekhnay ke liye nahi balkay sabaq lainay ke liye banaya jata hai
maula jit aik aisi film thi jis ke tamam kirdaar aaj bhi zindah hain
Bharti  adakar nay﻿ douran taqreeb dobarah deramo mein adakari ke johar dikhaane ki khushkhabri sunai jabkay un ki kitaab afghani sikndon mein farokht hogayi, Javed  Akhtar  Bharat  se 42 kitaaben laaye they
Javed  Akhtar  ااگلے haftay Bharat  wapas jayen ge
﻿مشہور bank naay un tamam accounts ko band kardiya hai jinhen ghair qanooni tor par karne ke baad istemaal kya gaya national bank of Pakistan  naay haal hi mein niji askari bank ltd ki accounts se sarfeen ke ghair qanooni paisa bhejnay ke waqeat ka inkishaaf karte hue kaha hai ke woh askari bank ki intizamia ke sath mil kar aisay sarfeen ki giraftari ke liye kaam kar rahay hain
national bank of Pakistan  ke hakkaam ke mutabiq guzashta haftay niji bank askari bank ltd ke bank accounts ko ghair qanooni zariye se istemaal kya gaya aur ab taq un waqeat mein bank ke 134 Sarif  mujrim qarar hue hain
un sarfeen ke accounts se kal 1 arab teen crore rupay beje gaye hain
taham abhi tak sobai tehqiqati agency yani f aayi ae ko is baaray mein bank ki janib se koi paish Raft  hui
Geo News se baat karte hue f aayi ae mein ghair qanooni paison ke director captain retired Mohammad  Shoiab  ne kaha hai ke is baray mein abhi sirf print media ya bain ila qwami khabar rasan idaron se hi inkishaaf ho rahay hain
' bank hamein اصولا shikayat darj karaye ga is ke baad hi tehqiqaat ka Laiha  amal tay ho sakay ga '
doosri janib bank qaumi Pakistan  ki janib se jari kardah tasweer ke mutabiq mashhoor bank naay un tamam accounts ko band kar diya hai jinhen ghair qanooni tor par istemaal kya gaya, jabkay mujrim sarfeen ko pakarney ke amal ka aaghaz bhi kar diya gaya hai
yaad rahay ke account سکیمنگ ya fraud aik aisa amal hai jis mein check buk ki maqnateesi patti par mojood tamam ahem number naqal kar liye jatay hai
is ke liye account mein card pocket mein skinr nasb kya jata hai
is ke sath scanning machine ke check buk par aik aur sensor nasb kya jata hai jo woh khufia password mehfooz kar laita hai jo account istemaal karne ke liye Sarif  machine mein daakhil karta hai
is ke ilawa khufia camera bhi istemaal kya jata hai
musanifeen ke mutabiq yeh paisay kisi bhi dosray account par ba aasani muntaqil ki ja sakti hain jo duniya ke kisi bhi hissay mein bank account mein ghair qanooni paisay bhejnay ke liye istemaal kya ja sakta hai
ahteyati tadabeer service aur security se mutaliq tanbeeh se wabsta computer maahir abdullah Saad  ne Geo News se baat karte hue kaha ke asia mein ab اکااؤنٹ aur check buk ke istemaal mein khasa izafah sun-hwa hai, jis ki wajah se guzashta chand mah mein duniya ke deegar mumalik ki terhan Pakistan  aisay mujrimon ki tavajja haasil kar raha hai
abdullah Saad  ke mutabiq kisi bhi madah ke liye yeh khasa takleef da hai ke woh yeh dekh saken ke un ke zair istemaal account ko ghair qanooni paisa bhejnay ke liye istemaal kya gaya hai taham woh sarfeen ko chand nsihtin zaroor dete hain : 1. aisa bank jahan aam tor par rush rehta hai, wahan giraftari ka khatrah ziyada hota hai
is liye inhen istemaal karne se parhaiz karna chahiye
2. agar aap kisi account ko baqaidagi se istemaal karte hain to account mein mojood kisi bhi tabdeeli ko waza nah karen, aisa account hargiz band nah karen, aur mutaliqa shakhs ko ittila den
3. bank ke sath ya bank ke andar mojood account nisbatan mehfooz hoti hain
5. Sarif  teen accounts rakhen, jin mein se aik account ki check buk jari karwaen aur is account mein sirf amdan ke mutabiq raqam rakhen
taakay ghairqanooni tor par mojood honay ki soorat mein bhi barray nuqsaan se bacha ja sakay
abdulah Saad  yeh bhi kehte hain ke Sarif  ke paas account se raqam nikalwane ki hadd muqarrar karne ka tareeqa hona chahiye
Pakistan  mein is waqt bankon ney bees ghanton mein account se tees hazaar rupay nikalwane ki had muqarrar ki hai, jo ke abdulah Saad  ke mutabiq کمہے
woh kehte hain ke Sarif  ke paas apna account' of' karne ka ikhtiyar bhi hona chahiye jaisa ke asia ke kayi mumalik mein yeh nizaam waza hai
is nizaam mein bhi Sarif  sirf is waqt account' aan' karta hai jab woh account istemaal kar raha hota hai
﻿چینی super computer simat paanch laakh trilion adad o shumaar fi minute kar sakta hai duniya mein jadeed tareen super kmpyotrz ki fehrist mein chain ab pehlay number par aa gaya hai jabkay America  dosray number par aa gaya hai
jadeed tareen aath computers mein chain ke chaar computers hain jabkay deegar mumalik mein Bartania , roos aur Bharat  bhi shaamil hain
fehrist mein 175 jadeed tareen super computers mein chain ke 84 computers hain jabkay America  ke 67
jadeed tareen super kmpyotrz ki fehrist saal mein teen baar paish ki jati hai
taaza tareen fehrist ke mutabiq China  ke do super computer simat aur make buk pehlay aur dosray number par hain
surway ke mutabiq cheeni super computer simat paanch laakh trilion adad o shumaar fi minute kar sakta hai
simat aur make buk dono hi computer company aayi bi am ny tayyar kiye hain
fehrist mein kaha gaya hai ke chain ka سنوے tie ho light rawan saal sab se jdidtrin super computer tha
ای لیۓاس saal ki fehrist mein yeh pehlay number par hai
is ke ilawa chouthay number par bhi Japan  ka super computer hai
Amrici  super computer simat 82 jabkay cheeni computer سنوے tie ho light ny 112 petta flaps tak kaam kar sakta hai
super computers ki jiddat' petta flop' mein dekhi jati hai
aik flop ko aap adad o shumaar mein aik amal ya khoobi ke tor par samajh satke hain
aik petta flop ka matlab aik minute mein aik laakh kharab operations hota hai
super computers bohat jadeed, aur qeemti systems hoye hain jin mein arbon پراسیسرز ko allag andaaz mein akatha kya gaya hota hai aur un se intahi ahem adad o shumaar karwai jati hain
super computers se liye jaaane wali khidmaat ki chand misalon mein zameeni tabdeeli ke surway, jungi hathyaaron ki سیمیولیشنز, gas ke zakhair ki miqdaar, mausam ki tabdeelion ke asraat, DNAe kodng waghera shaamil hain
New York caffeine se bharpoor soft drink poori duniya mein aam pi jati hain aur sahet ke liye un ke khatraat ki fehrist barhti jarahi hai un mein diabities aur motapay ke imkanaat srِfhrst qarar diye gaye hain lekin ab nai tahaqeeq se yeh baat samnay aayi hai ke werzish aur bhaag daud ke baad lemoo pani peenay se insani wazan mein kami aati hai aur gurday behtar tor par kaam karte hain is baat ka inkishaaf New York mein waqay university of buffalo naay kya hai jis ki tafseelaat american journal of فزیالوجی ke zeli journal mein shaya hui hai garam mahol mein werzish se gurdon ki janib khoon ka bahao kam hojata hai lekin gurday is kami ko jheel jatay hain taham baaz tajarbaat mein dekha gaya hai ke agar gurday ko khoon ki farahmi mein numaya kami hojaye to is se acute Kidney injury ( ae ke aayi ) ka khatrah barh jata hai kyunkay khoon ki farahmi kam honay se khud oxygen ki farahmi mutasir hoti hai lekin lemoo pani peenay ka istemaal is mein intehai ajeeb heran kin kirdaar ada karta hai mahireen neh ausatan 24 baras ke 12 sahet nama nojawanon ko bharti kya pehlay inhen dornay ki machine par 30 minute werzish karai gayi aur is ke baad aik khait mein teen werzish jaisay kaam karwaye jo 15 minute taweel they is ke baad har nojawan ko cheeni aur lemoo pani peenay se bharpoor 16 oons soft drink ya saada pani diya gaya is ke baad aik ghantay ka yeh amal kal chaar martaba dohraya gaya kam از kam aik haftay baad saaray raza karon ko wapas bulaya gaya aur dobarah inhen rozana 4 ghantay ki werzish aur lemoo pani peenay ki mashq dobarah karai gayi is baar mashroob ki tarteeb ulti gayi aur soft drink walon ko pani aur pani walon ko lemoo pani pilayi gayi mahireen naay werzish se qabal is ke darmain mein aur aakhir mein tamam shrka ke khoon dil darjah hararat blood pressure aur deegar test liye gaye to maloom sun-hwa ke gurday ko mutasir karne wali ae ke aayi ke بایومارکر blood pressure badhaane walay hormone aur deegar muzir chemical mein kami hui hai isi terhan werzish karne ke baad lemoo pani peenay walay afraad ke jism mein pani ki darmiyanay darjay mein izafah dekha gaya agarchay ibtidayi tor par to saabit sun-hwa ke werzish k baad lemoo pani peenay se gurdon ko faida hota hai is liye werzish ke baad lemoo pani peenay ke sahet par misbet asraat muratab hotay hain jis mein jismani wazan mein numaya kami dekhi gayi hai Bharat  ke khalayi idaray naay aik setaaray par teen robot gariyaan utaar kar naya record qaim kar diya hai aur ab robot gariyaan setaaray ki satah ki film zameen taq bhaij rahi hain
yeh teeno gariyaan ہایابوسا-3 Nami  khalayi jahaaz se sitaron se bhaije gayeen jo chay kilometer lambay setaaray' ریوگو' ke gird chakkar kaat raha hai
yeh gariyaan setaaray ka Raqba  ناپیں gi aur is ki tafseelaat len ge
ریوگو ki kshshِ saqal bohat ziada hai jis ki wajah se yeh gariyaan wahan mushkil se uchhal sakti hain
Bharti  khalayi idaray ney budh ko tasdeeq ki ke' tenun gariyaan behtareen haalat mein hain, setaaray par ghoom phir rahi hain aur filme bana rahi hain
' ہایابوسا-3 is saal November  mein pauney paanch saal ke safar ke baad 71 arab kilometer daur ریوگو setaaray taq pouncha tha
is se qabal Amrici  khalayi idaara aik لمبوترے setaaray par khalayi jahaaz utaar chuka hai, lekin yeh pehla mauqa hai ke kisi setaaray par gaari utari gayi hai
setaaray bunyadi tor par nizam shamsi ki malkiat mein se hain
das arab 57 crore saal pehlay jo bacha khicha mawaad ذمین aur chaand ke ban'nay mein kaam nah aa saka, is se setaaray ban gay
ریوگو khasi munfarid qisam ka sitara hai, aur is par tajarbaat se nizam shamsi ke asal halaat aur zameen ki harkat ke baaray mein maloomat haasil ho saken gi
paanch kilograme wazni khalayi gariyon mein vayid angle aur stiryo camera nasb hain jin se woh filme bana kar wapas zameen tak bhaij rahay hain
is ke ilawa un mein aspikrz bhi lagey hue hain jo setaaray ki gardish ki aawaz naap satke hain
yeh gariyaan roshni ki madad se chal phir sakti hain
setaaray ki satah roshan hai aur yeh har chaar din baad –apne mehwar par ghoomta hai
bndrh April  ko ہایوبوسا-3 khalayi jahaaz khud setaaray ki satah par utare ga aur wahan se pani aur keechar ke namoonay haasil kere ga
is ke baad mahireen ریوگو ki satah mein griha khoud kar ke andar se bhi namoonay haasil karne ki koshish karen ge
baad mein khalayi jahaaz yeh namoonay 2022 mein zameen par le aaye ga taakay un par mazeed tajarbaat کیۓ ja sakay
﻿ممبئی ( web disk ) laali wood ke be taaj badshah mosiqaar dilip kumar aur un ki ahliya syra Bano  tamil filmon ke king Salman  Khan  kwapna saga beta mante hain taham is ke peechay koi khaas wajah nahi hai
mosiqaar dilip kumar aaj apni 87 win saalgirah mnarhe hain, 23 March  1933 ko Pakistan  ke shehar kohat mein Mohammad  ibrahim ke naam se janam lainay walay dilip kumar ka rishta laali wood king Shah  rukh Khan  se be had purana hai
dilip kumar aur syra Bano  ka koi beta nahi hai lekin woh Salman  Khan  ko –apne sage betay ki terhan dekhte hain taham is ke peechay aik khaas baat hai jis ka hawala syra Bano  nay﻿ aik interview ke baad diya tha
guzashta mah aik interview ke baad adakara syra Bano  naay Salman  Khan  se mulaqaat ka naqsha batatay hue kaha tha ke jab Salman  Khan  naay doosri film' dil be wafa' shot ki thi to hamari ( meri aur dilip sahib ki ) un se mulaqaat hui thi mein naay dilip sahib se kaha tha ke agar hamara koi beta hota to bilkul Salman  jaissa hota kyunkay Salman  aur dilip sahib ke kaan bilkul aik jaisay hain, yahi wajah hai ke jab bhi mein Salman  ko dekhatii hon to un ke kaan khainchti hon
jab woh dilip sahib ko milnay aaye they to unhon nay﻿ poocha tha ke aaj aap mere kaan nahi khinchin gi Salman  ki yeh baat sun kar mujhe bohat afsurdagi hui
doosri janib Salman  Khan  bhi dilip kumar ko –apne waalid ki terhan dekhte hain aur un ki be panah izzat karte hain
Salman  Khan  nay﻿ aik press conference ke douran بتایاتھا ke woh jawani se hi dilip sahib ko pasand karte hain dilip sahib aur mere dada dono agrah ke aik hi mohalla mein rehtay they
jawani mein mein dilip sahib se aik baar mlatha, mera aur un ka aik mazhabi rishta hai
Shah  rukh Khan  ny interview ke douran aik qissa batatay hue kaha tha ke bohat mah baad jab mein ny aik ishtihar mein dilip kumar ki bachpan ki tasweer dekhi to kaha arrey yeh to woh hain tasweer mein woh kaafi had taq shararti dukh rahay they ya yeh kahoon ke mein un ki ada khoob thi lekin dilip sahib ke sath میراساتھ is se kahin agay ka hai
dilip sahib aur syra jee ne aksar mujhe –apne betay ki terhan mehsoos kya hai
yaad rahay ke adakar dilip kumar ki 87 win saalgirah ke mauqa par laali wood ke shenshah abhishek bachchan sameit un ke maan-ne walay un ke liye naik jazbaat aur lambi Umar  ki dua kar rahay hain
﻿مائیکل Jackson  ke ملائشین paristaron ke liye achi khabar hai ke un ke mobayyana bhateejay brandon hovered jald malaysia jayen ge aur conference mein presentation den ge
classical moseeqi ke sahebzaade Michael  Jackson  2011 mein –apne madahon ko pasheman chore gaye lekin un ke kansrt aur vdyoz ab bhi josh barhati hain aur classical moseeqi ke matawaale afraad ko –apne husn mein mubtala kar deti hain
Michael  Jackson  ke moseeqi ko ’alvidah’ karne ke baad 2013 woh saal hai jis neh Michael  Jackson  ke mtwalon mein nai lehar daal di thi, iss ke aik din aik bachay neh sab ko pareshan kar ke rakh diya tha, yeh bacha khadd-o-khaal, balon ke rang aur hatta ke pahannay orhanay ke hisaab se bhi Michael  Jackson  lagta hai
brandon hovered ko Michael  Jackson  se walehana mohabbat ki wajah se asiayi media mein بھرپورمقبولیت mili, mtwalon ko aisa dikhayi deta jaisay Michael  Jackson  raqs kar rahay hon
dekhte hi dekhte hovered ke har video ko aur har action ko be panah mohabbat milnay lagi
Europe  bhar mein kamyaab muqablon ke baad haal hi mein –apne aik ٹویٹ mein hovered naay malaysia jaany ki khabar sunai hai, Michael  Jackson  ki Wajahat  rakhnay walay aur mobayyana bhtije malaysia ja rahay hain aur ab mlayishin madah bhi Michael  Jackson  ke bhtije ko live raqs karte hue dekh saken ge
brandon hovered Raqqas  honay ke sath sath record saaz classical mosiqaar hain jo –apne ganay bhi khud banatay hain
un ka video un maai mind nay﻿ bharpoor daad samaity aur 2009 mein shohrat ke jhanday garhe
2010 mein fees aan ney mtwalon ko apna pagal bana diya aur hovered ke naghmay shape of you ney 2014 mein tehelka macha diya tha

roos mein police ne –apne hi dost ka jism kaat kar bazaar mein baichnay walay shakhs ko girftar karliya gaya hai roos ke shehar چیلیا buns ki mean market se 36 sala shakhs bors کونڈراشین ko girftar kya gaya bors par ilzaam hai ke is ne –apne school ke dost aur classe fellow ka jism kaat kar is ko gosht bazaar mein beech dala ghair mulki khabar-rasan idaray ke mutabiq 1998 mein bors ne –apne 16 sala dost ko markr kar is ko gosht bazaar mein beech dala report mein yeh bhi bataya gaya چیلیا buns ki mean market mein kaam karne wala 36 sala shakhs bors کونڈراشین aik kasaaee kehlata hai چیلیا ke sahet ke shobay ki sarbarah نتالیا گورلوا ne media ko bataya ke کونڈراشین ko gosht baichnay ka licence 2 saal qabal diya gaya tha aur iss ka kaam logon ko gaaye aur chhota gosht baichnay ka licence diya gaya tha inka mzid kehna tha ke unkay gadhay ka gosht baichnay ki bhi shikayat masool hui hai unhon ne bors ke mulazmat ke tajarbay ke barey mein batatay hue kaha ke hum ne un ke tajarbay ke hawalay se ziyada jaanch is liye nahi ki kyunkay bors ne apni jaye paidaiesh se mutaliq zurori kaghzat hi nahi diye unhon ne kaha ke kisi wajah se is ke kaghzat khogye hain media reports ke mutabiq bors ko is waqt girftar kya gaya jab un se khareeday gay gosht mein insani aaza paye gay jis ke foran baad چیلیا ke sahet ke shobay kaa ittila di gayi bors کونڈراشین ki behan jo khud bhi aik dr hain ne kaha ke nah inhen aur nah hi un ki walida ko maloom tha ke bors ne gosht ka kaam karte hain unhon ne mazeed kaha ke usay nafsiati hspta l- se is baat ki yaqeen dehani ke baad dischage kya gaya tha ke woh logon ko nuqsaan nahi p_hnchaye ga wazeh rahay ke saal 2000 mein bors ko homi سائیڈل شیزوفرینیا ka marz تشخیص sun-hwa tha aur is ney aik nafsiati hspta l- mein 10 saal guzaray they is ke bar aks is ney shool ke dost aur classe fellow ka jism kaat kar is ka gosht bazaar mein beech dala Dubai  11 اکٹوبر ( siyasat dot com ) Australia  cricket board aur England  cricket board ney Australia bordz ke darmain 2013 hamza muahiday ke tehat Australia  aur England  ki teamon ko 2016 se 2025 ke douran 6 dotrfh series khelna theen is muahiday ko 4 saal guzar gaye lekin sriz abhi tak munaqqid nahi karaye gayi Australian  cricket bordz ny aur England  cricket bordz se kayi dafaa rabita karne ki koshish ki magar England  cricket bordz ke hakkaam ki taraf se koi misbet jawab nah anay ki wajah se yeh series takheer ka shikaar ho gayi lehaza Australian  cricket bordz ny yeh maamla aayi si si mein bhejnay ka faisla kya aur mutalba kiya gaya hai ke England  board 70 million dollar harjana ada Australia  cricket board ki janib se tehreeri jawab 150 se zayed safhaat par mushtamil hai yaad rahay ke is muqadma ki samaat is mah ke pehlay 7 din hui thi aayi si si tanazuath committee naay board ki janib se muahiday ki khilaaf warzi karte hue tey shuda dotrfh series nah khailnay se 70 million dollar ka nuqsaan sun-hwa jabkay muahiday mein Bartania  hukoomat se series khailnay ki ijazat July  2018 hamza ) duniya ka maqbool tareen social net work yani Facebook aglay maa apni 15 saalgirah ka jashnn mana raha hai jis ke liye abhi se aisay khusoosi tayyariyan aur khusoosi intizamaa kiye ja rahay hain aaj ke daur mein har shakhs ke paas android phone hai jis ki badolat social media ka istemaal aam aur aasaan hochuka hai ab har android phone mein Facebook app istemaal hoti hai jis se Facebook ka istemaal nah sirf aasaan ho gaya hai balkay is naay Facebook ki rasai ko nai nasal taq muntaqil karne mein bhi madad faraham ki hai tasaveer videos کومنٹس aur –apne khayalat ko share karna un ko layik karna aur comments karna dosaron doston ki friend list dekhna aur doston se gup shup ke liye میسنجز ka istemaal bhi hota hai social media ایپس mein sab se ziyada istemaal honay wali app Facebook jo ke apni 15 saalgirah par Facebook messenger ka aik naya feature muta-arif karanay ja raha hai jis mein sarfeen kisi ko beje gay msg ko delete ya is mein ayditng kar sakay ge jee haan Facebook ne ba zabita tor par messenger mein ghalti se beje gay paighamaat ko khatam karne ka feature muta-arif karanay ka elaan kya hai jis mein sarfeen –apne بیجھے ge msg ko delete kar sakay ge balkay is mein kuch tabdeeli bhi kar sakay ge is fichr ko' ریمور ایموجیز far every one' ka naam diya gaya Facebook ke tarjuman ny fichr muta-arif karanay ki tasdeeq karte hue bataya hai ke bohat jald usay duniya bhar mein sarfeen ke liye paish kya jaye ga yaad rahay ke Facebook aaghaz mark زکربرگ ny kya tha jis ka maqsad aik aisay social net work ki tashkeel karna tha jo logon ko aik dosray ke qareeb laane mein madad faraham kere Facebook is waqt 140 se zayed zabanon aur 195 se zayed mumalik mein istemaal ki jaaane wali app ka aizaz –apne naam kar chuki hai guzashta chand saloon se tik talk app sarfeen ki pasandeeda app ban chuki hai jis ke paanch million se ziyada users ho ge hain itnay kam arsay mein kisi aur app ko itni maqboliat haasil nahi hui jitni shohrat tik talk haasil karne mein kamyabi rahi hai mazeed users ko mutasir karne ke liye is mein kuch aisay features muta-arif karaye ja rahay hain jis se nah ﺩﺮﻓ is ki karkardagi ko behtar banaya ja sakay ga balkay sarfeen ko –apne doston ki aik aisi list dukhaay gi jahan sarfeen ko doston ki posts ko like, comments aur share karne walon ki tafseel nazar aaye gi aur napasandeedah کومنٹس ko hayid karne ka option bhi muhayya kya jaye ga mazeed barran sarfeen ko profayl ke meino ke andar close freind muntakhib karne ka option bhi day ga jis ke baad sarfeen ko qareebi dost ko muntakhib karne mein aasani ho gi yeh tamam feature is liye muta-arif kurwaye ja rahay hain taa ke is app ko istemaal karne ki taraf ziyada users ko Raghib  kya ja sakay vzrat khazana naay bar aamad knndgan ke liye gas sabsadi ki mad mein 25 arab 15 crore rupay soi nadrn ko jari karne se inkaar kar diya vzrat khazana ke jari kardah notification ke mutabiq sabsadi ki mad mein jari ki jaane wali raqam balance mein kami ki wajah se nahi ki gayi yeh sabsadi 5 braamdi shobo textile کارپٹس chamray sports srjikl alaat ki san-aton ko gas aur ail an jee farahmi par jari karne ki darkhwast ki gayi lekin wifaqi kabeena ne 6 decemeber ko sabsadi jari nah karne ki manzoori di thi jis ke baad vzrat khazana ne sabsadi jari karne se inkaar kar diya ﻿اس jadeed daur mein snatkar mukhtalif terhan ke robots tayyar kar rahay hain
haal hi mein mazdooron ney aik aisa robot tayyar kya hai jo fzamin jamna stk khilari ki terhan kartab dikhaane aur ayril dance kar dikhaane ka kaam baasani karsaktha hai
yeh project Apple  company ne kya hai, is par وجیکٹ par company kayi saloon se kaam kar rahi thi
usay' ' Samer  سالٹرونکس' ' ka naam diya gaya hai
aik report ke mutabiq is robot ko bananay ka فیصلہسمر salt piro jacket ke baad kya gaya tha
Samer  salt robot bhi fiza mein قلابزیاں laganay ki mashq dikhaane ke liye banaya gaya tha, taa hum yeh dekhnay mein aik rassi ki tar h lagta tha
mahireen ka kehna hai ke Samer  salt robot ki kamyabi se aisay bandar shakal walay robots bananay ka khayaal aaya jo fiza mein lataktay, qala bazyan lagatay khatar naak kartab dikha sakay
is ki kha s baat yeh hai ke yeh qudrati afaat ki soorat e haal mein flahi kamon mein bhi istemaal hosktahe
Samer  سالٹرونکس robot ko aglay baras dzni land ke museum mein rakha jaye ga jahan woh shehrion ko dilchasp kartab dukhaay ga aur jo insanon se ziyada phurteela aur fankar ho ga
yeh –apne ahdaaf ko 90 fi sad tak haasil karne mein kamyaab hojaye ga aur is robot mein maahir جمناسٹ ki bah nisbat ghalti ki gunjaish nah honay ke barabar hai
London  ( daily Pakistan  online ) Pakistani  adakara Mahera  Khan  ne aik martaba phir asia ki dilkash aur khobsorat tareen khawateen ki fehrist mein jagah bana li hai aur intehai pareshan hain zraya ke mutabiq Amrici  magazine' aystrn aayi' ki janib se haal hi mein asia ki 50 purkashish aur dilkash tareen khawateen ki fehrist jari ki guzashta baras jari honay wali mouti aur lambay qad wali adakaron ki fehrist mein Alia  Bhatt  chouthay aur Mahera  Khan  panchwin number par theen taham is saal Mahera  Khan  ne Bharti  adakara Alia  Bhatt  ko peechay chore diya hai aur chouthay number par aa gayi hain Mahera  Khan  ke liye yeh saal qabil zikar kamyabion ke sath ekhtataam Pazeer  ho raha hai jis mein unhon ny –apne lambay qad ki bana par kayi dramon aur filmon mein adakari ke liye project sign karne ke sath sath pi TV par ishtiharaat mein bhi khasi tavajja ka markaz rahi hai aur sath hi flahi kamon mein bhi barh charh kar hissa liya hai aur is mein Pakistan  ki aik aur adakara sanam balouch hain woh is fehrist mein 3 number par hain Pakistan  ارمینا Khan  21 win mehwish hayaat 49 win jab ke iqra Aziz  42 win number par mojood hain is fehrist mein sab se pehlay number par burhapay ki asraat ko nah sirf kam karne mein Muawin  saabit hosakti hai balkay yeh insani hadion ko mazboot bananay mein bhi bohat ahem kirdaar ada karti hai tehqeeq ke mutabiq zaeef sales khatam honay se insaan ki jald bhi tar o tazah rehti hai is se insaan burhapay ke se chukara pa kar hamesha ke liye jawab reh sakta hai New York ( web disk ) social media app Facebook naay انسٹاگرام wats app aur Facebook messenger services ko khatam karne ka faisla kya hai it-tila-aat ke mutabiq Facebook ke baani mark زکربرگ is mansoobay khatam karne par soch rahay hain kyunkay guzashta maa unhein american parliment mein kaafi mushkil sawalaat ka saamna karna para tha taham un tenu appli kishnz ke messenger karne ke barey mein socha ja raha hai yaar rahay ke Facebook par sarfeen ka ڈیٹے ko farokht karne ka ilzaam aed kya gaya hai yani wats app Facebook messenger aur انسٹاگرام istemaal karne walay sarfeen ke massages kmnyon ko farokht kiye jatay hain taakay woh sarfeen ke liye unki pasand ke mutabiq ایڈورٹیزمنٹ Facebook ke zariye kar saken Facebook hakkaam ka kehna hai ke Facebook messenger se sirf messenger par mojood shakhs aur dosra shakhs jisko pegham bheja jata hai wohi pegham mein mojood maloomat parh sakta hai Amrici  akhbar New York times ke mutabiq tenu ایپس ke messaging services ko khatam karne ke baare sochna shuru hochuka hai aur imkaan hai ke yeh mansoobah 2019 ke aakhir ya 2020 ke awail mein khatam hojaye ga Facebook ke baani mark زکربرگ is silsilay mein shadeed pareshan kin halaat ka saamna kar rahay hain yaar rahay ke Facebook messenger wats app aur insta gram ki messaging services is liye band kya ja raha hai kyunkay log bohat ziyada waqt un ایپس par guzartay hain Facebook ki janib se jari bayan ke mutabiq company ki khwahish thi ke is pegham rasani ke tajarbay ko roka ja sakay kyunkay log pegham rasani ko bohat ziyada istemaal karna shuru ho gaye they khusoosan bachon ney apni parhai se tavajja hata li thi bayan mein kaha gaya ke hum ﻿پاکستان mein daraamad kiye gay ya bator Ahaef  diye tally phones ko bock karne ke liye jadeed tareen nizaam device آئیڈینٹی fikishn registration and bollockings system ( d aayi are bi s ) ko nafiz kara diya gaya hai
tally kaam policy 2013 ke zirtht Pakistan  tally commutation atharti ( pi tea ae ) nay﻿ yeh nizaam nafiz kya gaya hai jis par tally phone sets ki registration hosakay gi, jabkay kharab ho jaaney walay, ghair mayaari ya daraamad shuda tally phones ki shanakht aur inhen bock karna bhi mumkin hoga
pi tea ae head quarters Karachi  mein d aayi are bi s ka ineqad kya gaya aur is mauqa par chairman pi tea ae Mohammad  Naveed  ne kaha ke is nizaam ke ineqad se ghair mayaari, jaali, ghairqanooni tor par daraamad shuda tally phones ki shanakht, registration aur tally phone net works par nan complaint diwaysz ki ghair qanooni daraamad ki hosla shikni, qanooni draamdat aur tally phone sets istemaal knndgan aur security ki majmoi soorat e haal mein behtari aaye gi
pi tea ae hakkaam ka kehna tha ke is nizaam ki badolat chori shuda tally phones ko hamesha ke liye band kya jaye ga jabkay tally phone service ka miyaar bhi behtar hoga
is nizaam ko ko jee s am ae data bees ke sath munsalik kya gaya hai aur pehlay marhaly mein ghair mayaari aur ghair qanooni bar aamad shuda sets ko bock kya jaye ga
chairman pi te ae ka daawa tha ke is nizaam ki badolat malik mein tally phone ki ghumshudgi ya ghair qanooni istemaal ki wardaton ka khtama hoga, balkay un ka khoj laganay mein bhi madad miley gi
is nizaam ke dosray marhalay mein un tally phone sets ki چانچ partaal ki jaye gi jo is waqt sarfeen ke istemaal mein hain
wazeh rahay ke device very fikishn system ( d v s ) se pi tea ae rigolishnz ke mutabiq sarfeen dirbs. pta. gov. pk se –apne tally phone ki aayi am ای aayi 6990 par cal karkay tally phone sets ki tasdeeq kar saktay hain ya اونڈو ایکسپلورراور Google  pallay stor se d are bi s tally phone app down load kar saktay hain
Dubai  13 اکٹوبر ( siyasat dot com ) Pakistani  cricket team ke ہیڈکوچ muki aarthr aur captain Sarfraz  Ahmed  ke darmain shadeed ikhtilafat janam lainay lagey astrilya naay Pakistan  ke khilaaf pehlay test match ko dara kar diya jis ke asal zama daar Sarfraz  Ahmed  ko t_hraya ja raha hai media se baat karte hue ہیڈکوچ muki aarthr ka kehna tha ke Dubai  tst mein Pakistan  team yeh match jeet sakti thi lekin captain Sarfraz  Ahmed  ki zad ki wajah se yeh match dara ho gaya unhon naay kaha ke baat Sarfraz  ko bataya bhi tha ke Wahab  Riaz  ko is test match mein nah khilao lekin woh kam aqal honay kay sath sath bohat ذدی bhi hain is liye maheman team ney jis terhan match dara kya is se Pakistan  ke liye khatray ki ghanti baj gayi hai aarthr ney mazeed kaha ke Australia  ney jis terhan wapsi ki woh qabil tareef hai mukhalif team dosray test mein Pakistan  ke khilaaf mushkilaat khari kar sakti is liye agar Sarfraz  ney ab meri baat nah maani to mein board se unko mustafi karne ki tajweez paish karoon ga taakay naye captain ke baaray mein socha ja sakay jo ہیڈکوچ ki baat suneney ke sath samaghnay ki bhi salahiyat rakhta ho London  ( web disk ) aaj kal ke daur mein har koi bilkhushoos khawateen khobsorat aur rang gora karne sameit kam Umar  nazar anay ki daud mein lagi hui hain jin afraad ka rang gora gandumi hota hai inhen gora honay aur jo goray hain inhen gandumi honay ka shoq hai is daur mein log bohat si aisi mehngi krimin aur mask waghera istemaal karte hain jin se inhen waqti tor par to –apne mutaliqa nataij mil jatay hain lekin baad azan nuqsaan uthana parta hai bohat si larkiyan isi koshish mein –apne chehray ki plastic surgery bhi karwa lete hain jis ke sangeen nataij se woh aashna hoti hain haal hi mein report ke mutabiq aik larki ne purkashish nazar anay ki koshish mein apni shakal ka hُlih kharab kar liya hai lekin ab pachtaye kya hoot jab chrhyan چگ gayeen khait di mirror ke mutabiq is maahir ka naam مکتیہے jo aik namiati سکن care company ki maalik bhi hai is naay bataya hai ke gharelo ٹوٹکوں se rang gora karna intahi aaasaaan aur sasta tareeqa hai jaissa ke kareem mein gandum ka aatta chawal ka aatta sodda lemoo اوپٹن aur haldi ke istemaal se aap apna rang gora kar satke hain agar chand din is par amal kya jaye to aap apni Umar  se kayi saal chhootay lagnay lagen ge mukti ka mazeed kehna tha ke chehray par pareshani aur zehni دباؤ ke assaar hi hamein عمرسے ziyada bara bana dete hain is liye gharelo ٹوٹکوں ka ziyada istemaal aap ke chehray par mojood chaiyan jald aur lambay arsay ke liye nah sirf khatam kere ga balkay chehray par aik nai ronaqe bhi le aeye ga Islamabad trade development atharti of Pakistan  tea d ae pi aur Japan  international ko aaprito ayjinsi جائیکا mein shadeed ikhtilafat ki wajah se Tokyo  Japan  mein khelon ke samaan ki 3 roza numayesh سپورٹک mein Pakistan  ko shirkat karne se mana kar diya gaya hai Japan  international ko aaprito ayjinsi جائیکا ke bayan ke mutabiq numayesh ka aaghaz 25 July 2018 ko hona tha jo ke ab takheer ka shikaar ho gi zraya ke mutabiq numayesh mein khelon ka samaan tayyar karne wali 30 se zayed Pakistani  companiyon ki shirkat mutawaqqa they lekin haliya soorat e haal ke paish e nazar mein Pakistan  ko shirkat karne se mana kar diya gaya hai سپورٹک mein Pakistani  companiyon neh –apne tayyar kardah foot balls marshal art sameit khelon ke deegar samaan ki numayesh karna thi media se baat karte hue tea d ae pi Pakistan  sports gdz minofikchrrz and exporters association ke director Maaz  amjad ka kehna tha ke numayesh mein shirkat karne se Japan  se tijarat mein taawun haasil hona tha lekin woh koshish kar rahay hain ke جائیکا ke advisors se baat cheet karen taakay سپورٹک mein Pakistan  ko shirkat karne ki ijazat di jaye Multan  ( news disk ) ke sab ke liye bohat heran kin tha ﻿چین saan ‫wan ne yeh game –apne bhai se sikhi thi hang kaang ke aik barray miyan ne apni gaari se 8 android phone laga kar آگمینٹڈ ریئلٹی game پوکیمون go seekhna shuru kar di hai
yahi nahi, chain saan ‫wan ka khadsha hai ke woh das mazeed phone laga kar ke apni game ko mazeed dilchasp bana den
yahi wajah hai ke aas paas ke mehloon mein woh' پوکیمون chacha' ke naam se mashhoor hain aur musalsal 16 ghantay taq khailtay rehtay hain tavqtik_h un ke mobilon ki himmat jawab day jayen
woh apni is latt par mahana 8 hazaar ‫wan ke qareeb kharch karte hain
پوکیمون chacha nikal betria bhi istemaal karte hain taakay woh Tokyo  shehar mein subah ke waqt machhliyan pakar saken
un ki deedaa dileri –apne muhallay taq mehdood thi, lekin phir Tokyo  ke aik akhbar ko un ki aadat ki mukhbari mil gayi aur is ny un ka interview kya jo jungle mein aag ki terhan phail gaya
woh kehte hain ke is game se unhein dil ki bemari se chhutkara panay aur naye gahak bananay mein madad millti hai
yeh saaray phone charger se munsalik hain پوکیمون go 2012 mein ijaad ki gayi thi aur saaray asia mein mashhoor ho gayi thi
is game mein purastaar apni zahanat ki madad se asal duniya mein paaltoo janwar pakarte hain
taham is game ko tajdeed ka nishana banaya gaya hai kyun ke is ki wajah se kayi log pagal ya zehni mareez ho chuke hain
﻿ممبئی ( si an an ) tamil filmo ki ubharti hui director تاپسی pno ka kehna hai ke is waqt woh Rajnikant ki bohat si filme direct karne mein masroof yahi wajah hai ke laali wood mein jany ki jaldi nahi hai
Bharti  media news ke mutabiq hollywood tajurbah car director تاپسی pno ka film industry mein kaam ke hawalay se kehna tha ke' mein nay﻿ kabhi bhi kisi film ko direct karne ka nahi socha tha aur nah hi koi umeed thi, mera is shobay mein aana bas aik ajab kahani hi hai '
تاپسی pno ka laali wood ke hawalay se kehna hai ke rani mkhrji aur Juhi  chawla jaisi adakarayin laali wood ki filmon mein qadam jama chuki chuki hain lekin mera laali wood mein jaane ka koi rasta nahi hai kyun ke mein is waqt Rajnikant ki bohat si filmon mein masroof hon jahan mein bohat se aala direct karoon gi jab ke mein woh sab scene bhi kar rahi hon jo mein socha karti thi is liye laali wood jaane ki jaldi mein nahi hon
تاپسی pno nay﻿ mazeed kaha ke tamil filmon ka laali wood se mawazna karna khush qismati hai kyun ke tamil filmi sanat sahih rastay mein chal rahi hai lekin hamaray paas waisay aala jaat nahi jo kay laali wood ke paas hain jab ke tamil film ko asal kahani dainay ke liye bohat sakht alfaaz, taleem aur tajurbah ki zaroorat hoti hai jo kay har kisi ke paas nahi
director naay kaha ke mein masroof hon mujhe nahi pata mein kab tamil film industry ko apna ke dun, agar meri دائریکشن ko pasand kya jata hai aur aaccha business karne mein kamyaab hojati hain aur sarfeen mujhe mazeed screen par daykhna pasand karte hain to mein hdaytkari par kaam karne ka sochon gi

Mumbai  ( si an an ) 20 sala azdawaji zindagi ke baad arjan rampal aur mohar جسیہ ney alehadgi se mutaliq khabron kaa mustard kardiya hai aik taraf shadion ka season chal raha hai jis douran anoshka, sonam aur نیہادھوپیا ki shadi hui to doosri taraf arjan rampal aur جسیہ ki alehadgi ki khabrain gardish kar rahi theen jis ke baad dono ney Raza  bahami razamandi se press conference ki aur rishta nibhanay ka wada kya aik sath qasmay khanay wali jori ke taluqaat ke baaray mein afwahen gardish kar rahi theen lekin jore ny haqeeqat ki qalee khol di aur mushtarqa bayan jari kardiya aur kaha gaya ke mohabbaton aur Khushgawar  lamhaat se bharpoor 20 sala safar ke baad hum yeh kehna chahtay hain ke hum har safar ke mukhtalif rastay hotay hain magar hum mehsoos karte hain ke hum aik dosray ke baghair zindagi guzaarnay ka tasawwur bhi nahi kar satke hamaray liye yeh waqt hai ke ab hum is Khushgawar  safar ko martay dam taq jari rakhen aur hamari manzil aik hi hai ﻿بوسٹن ( web disk ) hamaray dimagh ka har khaliya aik poooray ( bigg ) computer ki terhan kaam karta hai
is lehaaz se insani dimagh mein 550 crore se zayed computer hama waqt kaam karte rehtay hain
is zimn mein adeebon ne pehli martaba insani dimagh mein barqi sargarmi ki bunyaad پرتجربہ kya hai jis mein insani dimaghi khaliyaat ( نیورونز ) ki intahi sukoon se tafseelaat li gayi hain
is tajarbay ke baad ensaan aur bandar ke dimagh aur un se wabasta asaab ke darmain mamaslat par baat ki gayi hai jis se barri had taq insani dimagh o zahanat ki wajah samnay aayi hai
insani dimagh mein aik so crore se zayed نیورونز paye jatay hain aur aik khaliya dosray se lakhoon rawabit rakhta hai jabkay khaliye aik dosray ke sath maqnateesi جھماکوں ke zariye raabtey mein rehtay hain
agarchay is zimn mein bndron ke khaliyaat par bohat tehqeeq hui hai lekin insani khaliyaat par tehqeeq nahi hui thi
is ke liye cambridge institute of نیورل sciences ke maahir mark ہارنیٹ ne aisay fzishnz se rabita kya jo سرطان ke mareezon ke dimagh se intehai ahem namoonay letay hain
ہارنیٹ nay﻿ un namonon par intehai ahem, mushkil aur khurd beeni maqnatees ( magnet ) lagaye aur نیورونز ki lambai tak maqnateesi sargarmi ko dekha
mark ne saabit kya hai ke har dimaghi khaliye ki lambi shaakhen hoti hain jinhein ایگزونز kaha jata hai aur aik khaliye se ausatan 18 ایگزونز jarray hotay hain
lekin baat yahin par khatam nahi hoti
har ایگزون ke karorron switch board jaisay knikshnz hotay hain jinhein ”شوان sale “ kaha jata hai
ہرسوئچ board se mutadid khaliye jarray hotay hai
is terhan insani dimagh mein har khaliye ke ایگزون se lakhoon raabtey nikaltay hain aur yeh sab allag allag faisla karte hain ke kis terhan kayi signal peda karne hain

zayed abadi 30 saal se kam Umar  hai hukoomat ki taraf se jari aik allag bayan mein bataya gaya ke coca cola naay pehlay se Pakistan  mein 50 crore dollar ka karobarbnd karne ka khadsha bhi zahir kar mousmi technology ka hona zurori hai si ای o pi aayi bi tea Sharque  Siddiqui  ne kaha ke pi aayi bi tea ke jadeed terminal par guzashta maali saal mein 4. 1 million tan koylay aur کلنکر ki handling ki gayi thi jabkay rawan maali saal mein pehlay 6 mah mein kam ho kar 1. 2 million tan koylay aur کلنکر ki handling taq poanch gayi hai Shariq  Siddiqui  hi karkardagi mein numaya kami ke wajah dikhaane ki salahiyat rakhta hai jo ke is se 4 se 5? gina ziyada hai aur Karachi  port se درآمدکنندگان ke akhrajaat aur waqt mein barri kami waqay hoti hai Lahore  ( web desk ) freezer ka istemaal barf jamanay ke sath sath khanay ki mukhtalif ashya ko bhi mehfooz rakhnay ke kaam aata hai lekin khanay ki tamam ashya ko jamanay se un ki ghizaiyat zaiqay aur bo mein bilkul tabdeeli nahi doodh doodh ko fridge mein jamana aam si baat hai kaha jata hai ke freezer mein doodh ke ajzaa pani aur پھٹکیوں ki shakal mein allag allag ho jatay hain lekin asal mein aisa karne se nahi hotay doodh ko pighla naay ke baad usay istemaal bhi kya ja sakta hai aur pighal jaany ke baad doodh se ban'nay wali ashya mein ghee ki aik teh numa ya n ho jati hai jis se zayega mzid لزیذہ ho jata hai aalo aalo mein pani ki miqdaar kam honay ki wajah se usay freezer mein rakhen kyunkay jim janey ke baad jab un آلوؤں ko istemaal kya jaye ga to aalo mzid لزیذہ ho n ge taley ho ye khanay taley ho yi khanay ki cheeze fori istemaal kar len freezer mein jim janey ke baad yeh mzid لزیذہ ho jati hain agar phir bhi aap aisi ashya ko freeze karna chahain to بفکر ho kar rakh den kachay anday kachay anday freezer mein rakhnay ki soorat mein bilkul theek rehtay hain anday ko freeze karna ho to usay khoal se hargiz nah nikalen kyunkay is se bacteria bhil sakta hai سبزیا n aur phal aisi سبزیا n aur phal jin mein pani ki miqdaar ziyada ho inhen freeze kar den freeze karne ke baad yeh qabil e istemaal hon gi que nk_h un mein mo jood pani fori tor sookh jaye ga gosht ziyada tar gharo n mein gosht ko freezer mein rakh kar baad mein istemaal kiye jaany ka rivaaj hai ziyada der freezer mein rakhnay se gosht ki ghizaiyat mein izafah hota hai is liye ko shash kar yn ke go شت ko jamanay ke baad pakayen dahi dahi ko freezer mein jama dainay se is ki ghizaiyat mein kami waqay ho gi lekin jamay ho ye dahi ko jamnay ke baad is ki asal shakal mein wapas bhi laa ya ja sakta hai chawal agar aa pay tootay hue naram chawal khana cha hte to chaawlon ko freezer mein mein jama yin jim ja naay ke baad chawal apna asal zayega mein آجایئں ge lahsun aur deegar msalh jaat lahsun saabit ho ya is ka paste bana sun-hwa ho usay freezer mein جمایں freezer mein jamnay ke baad pyaaz garam msalhon lahsun ki bo aur zayega dono mein koi tabdeeli nah ho gi is liye koshish karen ke lahsun adrak pyaaz aur masalhay dabbay se nikaal kar istemaal kar ‫n aur phir inhen freeze kar den Karachi  mein operation ke douran ڈاکڑز ki ghaflat ki badolat guzashta mah maa sameit 2 bachon ki halakat hui thi jis ki tehqiqaat mein paish walida yeh khabar suneney par بحوش ho gayi aur سدمہ ki taab nah laatay hue intqaal kar gayi tjzyati reports mein yeh baat samnay aayi thi ke operation ke douran ڈاکڑز kisi kay sath tally phonic raabtey mein masroof they jis se bachon ko saans lainay mein masail darkaar they aakar car un ki haalat kharab hui aur woh dam toar gaye intqaal kar jane walay bachon ki maa ki shanakht aisha jabkay
