do Tarfah  taluqaat ki چیقلش aur siyasi tanazuath ki wajah se chain naay Amrici  companiyon ko aindah saal shanghai mein honay wali doosri China  international import aykspo mein shirkat se rokkk diya hai China  international import aykspo بیوروکے deputy director sun چینگ hayi ki qayadat mein 1 wafad naay New York mein 100 se ziyada Amrici  companiyon ke numaindon se mulaqaat ki jis mein unhon naay Amrici  companiyon ke numaindon ko November  2019 hamza mein shanghai mein honay wali numayesh mein shamoliat se rokkk diya hai un ka kehna tha ke America  barri Ilmi  taaqat honay ke bawajood is conference mein shirkat nah kar sakay ga jabkay doosri taraf Amrici  numaindon ka kehna hai ke Amrici  companian wasee tar tijarti ashya aur engineering khidmaat faraham karne wali behtareen companian hain karobari shaksiaat naay cheeni hukoomat ke is iqdaam par na pasandeedgi ka izhaar kya hai yaad rahay ke guzashta chaynh international import aykspo mein 170 se ziyada mulkon ke numaindon naay shirkat ki aur America  174 companiyon ke sath taqreeb mein shareek honay mumalik mein uska shumaar number 3 par raha ﻿ہوسکتا hai ke aap ko –apne انسٹاگرام نیوزفیڈ pehlay se behtar lag raha ho ya bohat jald woh kuch behtar nazar anay lagey ga
chaar crore se zayed madahon ke sath انسٹاگرام ko America  ki naamwar tareen samaji raabtey ki app ka khitaab haasil hai aur is ka gurda aur dimagh نیوزفیڈ hai, jis mein haliya mahino ki sab se barri jiddat aap ko jald nazar aeye gi
is baat ka elaan انسٹاگرام ke baani mark زکربرگ nay﻿ itwaar ko –apne aik ٹوئیٹ mein kya
unhon ne kaha ke industry ki نیوزفیڈ ko behtar kar diya jaye ga aur ab wahan vayrl tasaveer, news blitn aur deegar malomati mawaad ab madahon ko bohat kam nazar aeye ga, jin ki jagah aap ke khandan walon, parosion ya daftari logon ki video, status up dates waghera len ge
is terhan yeh news fid par ki jane wali sab se achi behtari hai
mark زکربرگ ka kehna tha ke hamara matlab madahon ko –apne parosion se ziyada ba izzat raabtey ka waqt faraham karna hai aur is baat ko kaar amad banana hai ke انسٹاگرام par ziyada waqt guzaarna un ke zehan par manfi khadshaat peda nah kere
guzashta saal aik tahaqeeq mein انسٹاگرام nay﻿ khud inkishaaf kya tha ke انسٹاگرام par mojood mawaad madahon par manfi khadshaat se asar andaaz ho sakta hai, yani fuzool اسکرولنگ karna manfi khadshaat peda karta hai jabkay posts karna ya layik karna misbet khayalat ka baais bantay hain
انسٹاگرام ke baani ke mutabiq' hum yeh kami mehsoos karte hain ke hamari app ko sirf malomati maqsad ke liye istemaal kya jaye balkay logon ke mustaqbil ke liye behtar ho, ab hum ne apna naara badal liya hai aur hamari company is baat par nazar markooz kere gi ke madah malomati mawaad hi haasil kar sakay jis se ba himmat rfahi kamon mein madad mil sakay '
rawan mah ke aaghaz par bhi mark زکربرگ nay﻿ –apne 2016 ke mahana daaway ke hawalay se kaha tha ke انسٹاگرام se bherne walay inteshaar jaisay hiqarat aur na pasandeedgi waghera ko khatam karna chahtay hain aur نیوزفیڈ mein nai behtari ka zareya bhi yahi hai
guzashta mah ki ٹوئیٹ mein unhon ney inkishaaf kya ke is nai behtari se kuch arsay ke liye idaara ka business bhi kam hoga, taham un ke khayaal mein yeh behtar haal ke liye ahem sang mil hai

couple sharmaa 8 saloon baad اسٹ un comedy mein wapsi karne ke sath logon ko hansaney ke liye tayyar hain
comedian aur TV maizban you tube par لافٹرز Nami  show par jalva gir honay jarahay hain jahan woh har is cheez ke hawalay se mazaaq karen ge jo un ko nazar آۓ gi
is show ka poster bhi bana diya gaya hai, jis mein bataya gaya ke' woh ensaan jin se hum sab mohabbat karte hain wahein wapas kar rahay hain jahan se unhon naay kamyabi haasil ki thi '
couple 9 saloon se stage par prfarm karte nazar nahi aeye
st un comedy show mein couple 2009 mein –apne career ke aaghaz se ab taq ki mushkilaat par mazah karen ge
is douran unhon naay kya halaat dekhe aur inhen kis terhan doulat mili
couple ney 2009 mein –apne career ka aaghaz aik رئیلٹی programme se kya, un ka aakhri comedy show 2015 mein samnay aaya tha, jis ke baad unhon ney di couple sharmaa show ka aaghaz kya
' لافٹرز' rawan mah 22 tareekh se youtube par Nashar  hoga
﻿امریکا ka khalayi tehqeeqi idaara ناساکی report ke mutabiq qutub janoobi ( pisfk اوشن ) ki mustaqil barf ki aadhi miqdaar nah sirf ghul kar khatam hochuki hai balkay bachi hui barf bhi bohat taizi se patli ho rahi hai
Nasa  ke mahireen mobile data aur redar ki madad se taweel Ar  se se pisfk ki barf ka jaiza le rahay they
mahireen ke mutabiq zair-e aabb redar ke zariye maloom sun-hwa hai ke ab yahan jo barf mojood hai is ki 70 fi sad miqdaar aabb o huwa ki badolat hai jo kam aur ziyada hoti rehti hai
jab ke mouti aur mustaqil barf' ' par ma frost' ' ki barri miqdaar taizi se ghul kar khatam ho nay﻿ se bach gayi hai
science daano ka kehna hai ke mausam garma mein Bar  sunay aur jama honay wali barf jitni bhi taiz ho lekin woh nai aur earzi barf ki jagah nahi le sakti, kyonk_h پرمافراسٹ ghair mamooli ahmiyat ki haamil nahi hai
mausam sarma mein is ka pighla o barh jaye ga, phir yeh soorat ِhal daryaaon ke garam honay se mazeed kharab ho jaye gi
jet par ویلشن laboratory ke maahir dr ron کووک ke mutabiq poooray pisfk mein mustaqil barf ke bherne, pighalnay aur shakal badalny ka inhisaar aabb o huwa aur brfbari par reh gaya hai
Nasa  ke science daano ka kehna hai ke 1978 hamza se pisfk barf ki motai do tahai kam hochuki hai, jis mein qadeem barf ka 50 laakh murabba klov meter Raqba  pighal kar khatam ho gaya hai
Bostan  misa چیوسیٹس insti tute of technology ( am aayi tea ) ke mahireen ne jelly numa robot banaya hai jisay aasani se khaya ja sakta hai yeh gaind numa robot pait mein jaakar phool jata hai aur 1 mah taq wahan rehtay hue maiday ki androoni kefiyat dil ki دھرکن aur amraaz se aagah karta hai phoolnay wala yeh goli numa robot maiday mein rehtay hue 30 roz taq dil ki دھرکن andar ke darjaa hararat aur deegar af-aal ki khabar muhayya karta hai jab is goli ko badan se kharij karna maqsood ho to mareez ko calcium mehlool pi laa den is ke baad goli numa robot khud bakhud jism se پیخانے ke rastay bahar aajay ga is robot mein bohat se sensor lagey hue hain jo ensaan ke اندرونئی اعضائ ke mutaliq aaga yeh faraham karte hain am aayi tea mahireen nay﻿ ہائیڈروجل aur پالیمر ke milaap se is goli numa robot ko 2 saal mein tayyar kya gaya hai jo pitt mein jaakar phool jata hai uska wazan itna kam hai ke khanay ke baad maiday mein bhaari pan mehsoos nahi hota mahireen nay﻿ usay bananay mein پفر fish se madad li hai پفر fish khatray mein khud ko phulanay ki salahiyat rakhti hai isi terhan ہائیڈروجل se bana yeh robot –apne andar pani jama karkay mota ho jata hai mahireen ne sensor laga kar is robot ko soor par aazmaaya hai un tajarbaat mein soroon ke maiday ke darjaa hararat aur deegar maloomat akhatta ki gayi hai aakhir mein calcium mehlool pila kar usay jism se kamyabi se kharij kar diya gaya mahireen ka khayaal hai ke jald hi yeh tecnology insani istemaal ke liye market mein dastyab kar di jaye gi Karachi  5 decemeber ( siyasat dot com ) Pakistani  cricket team ke fast bowler Wahab  Riaz  world cupp ne passion goi ki hai ke hindostan Pakistan  kay khilaaf fatah haasil kere ga unhon ne kaha ke Pakistani  team mehez ویراٹ kohli nahi balkay poori hareef team ke liye mansoobah karti hai is liye haar Pakistan  ka muqaddar banti hai Pakistani  cricket team ke 33 sala fast bowler Wahab  fi al-waqt squad ka hissa nahi hain inka kehna tha ke woh world cupp mein hindostan kay khilaaf Pakistan  ko shikast zada dekh rahay hain aindah baras 16 June  ko world cup mein Pakistan  ka muqaabla hindostan se manchester mein muqarrar hai aur is high voltage muqablay par shaiqeen ki nigehain abhi se markooz hain jis mein Wahab  Riaz  bhi shaamil Wahab  ne mazeed kaha ke Pakistani  team ki tarz rasai yeh hona chahiye ke woh sirf kohli par fox karen kyunkay poori hindustani team ke liye mansoobah bandi karna fuzool planning hai kyunkay hindustani team mein sirf kohli hi match wins player hai is ke ilawa koi bhi aaccha khilari nahi hai yaad rahay ke Pakistani  team guzashta asia cupp mein kohli se mahroom hindustani team kay khilaaf bhi dono matches mein bhaari runs se jeet gayi thi bain al aqwami maliyati fund ( aayi am f ) ny Pakistan  ki iqtisadi sorat e haal par apni report jari kar di hai jis ke mutabiq Pakistan  ke zar e mubadla ke zakhair barh kar 20. 8 arab dollar ho gaye hain aayi am f ke mutabiq un zar e mubadla ke zakhair se sirf 5 mah mein hi Pakistan  ke zar e mubadla ke zakhair barh gay hain doosri janib report mein kaha gaya hai ke Pakistan  ki mustaqbil qareeb mein iqtisadi soorat e haal bohat behtar نظرآرہی hai aur sunah 2018 aur 2019 mein maeeshat ki sharah numoo 8. 8 feesad se bherne ki tawaqqa hai jis ki barri wajohaat nai hukoomat bijli ki farahmi mein behtari chain Pakistan  iqtisadi raahdaari ke mansoobay ke tehat honay wali sarmaya kaari malik mein khapat mein taizi Saudi  imdaad aur zarayi shobay ki bahaali bataaye gayi hain aalmi maliyati idaray aayi am f naay guzashta saal maali policy ki kamzoriyon ki wajah se maali khasara kal qaumi pedawar ka 2. 4 feesad taq poanch jaany ka khadsha zahir kya hai jis se maeeshat mein behtari anay ke tamam imkanaat barh satke hain report mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke malik ki barhti hui draamdat ki wajah se Jaria  khasaray mein honay wali kami ke baais malik ke zar mubadla ke zakhair barh ho kar 20. 8 arab ho gay hain jo ke heran kin hain is soorat e haal ka tajzia karte hue aalmi maliyati idaray naay kaha hai ke Pakistan  ke zar e mubadla ke zakhair barh gay hain jis ki wajah se malik ko androoni aur bairooni qarzon ki adayigyon aur draamdat ke liye darkaar zar e mubadla ki dasteyabi mein koi mushkilaat ka saamna nahi karna parre ga report mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke guzashta 4 saal mein musalsal izafah dekhnay ka mila hai aur is ke sath sath beron malik se anay walay zar mubadla mein bhi pichlle saal ki izafay ke baad aik baar phir mazeed taizi dekhnay mein aayi hai report mein is khadshay ka izhaar kya gaya hai ke is saal honay walay election ki wajah se Pakistan  ki aayi am f ko qarzay ki adaigi bilkul mutasir nahi ho gi kyunkay Pakistan  ke zar e mubadla ke zakhair barhay hain is ke ilawa aalmi manndi mein tail ki kam hui qeematon aur baraamdaat ki bahaali hona bhi qarzon ki adaigi mein aasani peda ho kere gi doosri janib Pakistani  hakkaam ka kehna hai ke woh rupay ki qader mein izafah aaya hai aur Pakistani  rupay ki qader kaa mazboot karne ke liye mazeed iqdamaat kiye ja rahay hain melaan mein honay wali mobile world numayesh ki taqreeb mein Nokia  ke aik aur puranay phone ko dobarah ijaad karaya gaya hai
x mean series Nami  film mein dukhaay jaaane walay Maroof  mobile phone 2200 ko dobarah se ijaad kya gaya hai
is mobile phone par Nokia  ki mohar to mojood hai taham usay each MD globle Nami  company ne banaya hai
isi company ny guzashta saal mobile world numayesh mein Nokia  ke hi aik Maroof  mobile phone 3100 ko dobarah runuma karwaya tha
aisa lagta hai ke company nay﻿ 3100 ke dobarah ijaad ki kamyabi ke baad waisa hi kuch dohranay ki koshish ki hai
each MD ki janib se ijaad kiye janay wala mobile phone 2200 aik fichr phone hai jis ke processing system par chand games hi chalaye ja saken gi
jo games is fichr phone par chalaye ja saken gi un mein sab way سرفر, car race aur laddu star shaamil hain lekin is phone par انسٹاگرام, Google  ya Facebook nahi chalaya ja sakay ga
is mobile phone ko bara banaya gaya hai aur is ke touch pad par aik سلائیڈر bhi hai aur yeh 5 jee internet ko bhi support karta hai
company ki janib se si an an ko bataya gaya hai ke is qeemat 65 dollar ke qareeb hogi
is ke ilawa company ki janib se do deegar mobile phones bhi muta-arif kurwaye gaye hain
un mein aylominim se bana window phone' سوروکو' bhi shaamil hai, jis ki qeemat 870 dollar taq ho sakti hai
﻿اومواموا ab aankhon se oojhal hota ja raha hai aap ko yaad ho ga ke guzashta mah 7 July  ko nizam shamsi mein aik baizvi maheman sayarchay ko talaash kya gaya tha jis ka naam mahireen naay' اومواموا' rakha tha
aik nai tahaqeeq mein shak zahir kya gaya hai ke sitaron ke darmain waqay rabton se nizam shamsi mein daakhil honay wala syarch_h khalayi makhlooq ka hawai jahaaz ho sakta hai jis ko chaand ke baaray mein tafseelaat haasil karne ke liye bheja gaya ho
is sayarchay ko 7 July  ko talaash kya gaya tha aur is ki banawat aur hajam se zahir hota hai ke yeh nizam shamsi se bahar kisi aur khalayi nizaam se aaya hai
is ke baaray mein mahireen ka kehna hai ke woh ab tak maloom ajraam falki mein se sab se kam baizvi hai
yeh taaza inkishaaf America  ki کارنیل university ke smith سونین center far geo فزیکس ne ki hai
is inkishaaf mein is imkaan ko zahir kya gaya hai ke yeh baizvi syarch_h jis ki golai ke muqablay par is ki oonchai kam از kam bees gina ziyada hai aur saat crore 17 so mil fi ghanta ki raftaar se harkat kar raha tha kisi khalayi makhlooq ka ho
geo physical journal letters ko di gayi is inkishaaf mein mahireen ka kehna hai' اومواموا mukammal tor par mutharrak hawai jahaaz tha jis ko chaand ke baaray mein jan-nay ke liye khalayi qoum ny bheja ho
' cambridge university ka yeh tajurbah falkiat ke sarbarah professor ایبراہم lubh aur Shamil  بیالی ne ki hai
professor abhi tak no kitaaben aur 922 se ziyada tajribati papers black houlle, kaayenaat ka dosra rukh, khalayi makhlooq ki aamdavr sitaron par likh chuke hain
yeh taaza tajurbah is baizvi syarche ki shakal ki bunyaad par likha gaya hai
inkishafaat mein kaha gaya hai ke' is baizvi sayarchay ko khalayi makhlooq ki malkiat samjha jaye to aik yakeeni baat yeh ho sakti hai ke' اومواموا' sitaron ke darmain bhaag raha hai
inkishafaat mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke' اومواموا' ki banawat aur hajam madaar ka matlab ho sakta hai ke yeh ab mutharrak nah ho
professor lubh ne kaha hai ke is tajarbay ko sirf is liye alehda nah kya jaye ke yeh ajeeb khalayi makhlooq ki mojoodgi ki mukhbari kar rahi hai
' is qisam ka khayaal hamein nah rakhna chahiye
science misbet zehnon ke liye hai
' hawai mein waqay doorbeen se is ka tajurbah karne wali Bartanwi  maahir falkiat kirn match aur un ke talib ilmon ny andaza lagaya tha ke is syarche ki golai 155 meter hai aur taizi se bhaag raha tha, jis ki wajah se is ki khoubsurti mein taizi se kami hoti rehti thi
اومواموا ki raftaar aur zawiye se andaza hota hai ke yeh nizam shamsi ke bahar se aaya hai khoubsurti mein isi kami ki wajah se اومواموا ki shakal ka takhmeenah laganay mein madad mili
taham yeh yaad karna zaroori hai ke is tajarbay mein mahireen yeh nahi keh rahay ke' اومواموا' yaqeenan khalayi makhlooq ka hawai jahaaz hai
mahireen ka kehna hai ke aisa honay ke kuch nishanaat mojood hain
mahireen ka kehna hai ke yeh baizvi sayarcha khalayi makhlooq ka khalayi ghar bhi ho sakta hai, ghair mamooli sale craft bhi ho sakta hai jo bhoolay se yahan aa gaya
ya phir mutharrak hawai jahaaz jo hamaray chaand ke baaray mein mazeed tafseelaat haasil karne aaya ho
﻿انیل کپوراور Juhi  chawla ke baad Shahid  Kapoor  ko bhi diabities ho gayi? adakar ke ahal khanah nay﻿ elaan kar diya Aneel  کپوراور Juhi  chawla ke baad Shahid  Kapoor  ko bhi diabities ho gayi



? Mumbai  ( daily Pakistan  online ) laali wood adakar Aneel  کپوراور Juhi  chawla ke baad ab Amrici  film industry ke maqbool tareen adakar Shahid  Kapoor  ke baarey mein bhi afwahen gardish kar rahi hain ke woh diabities mein mubtala hain taham ab adakar ke ahal khanah ney un ki tasdeeq kar di hai
Amrici  media mein afwahen gardish kar rahi hain ke Shahid  Kapoor  diabities mein mubtala hain aur inhen khoon mein sugar ki miqdaar khatarnaak had taq barh jany par تشخیص hui hai
guzashta roz media mein yeh khabrain bhi gardish kar rahi theen Shahid  Kapoor  film' آٹونومس' ki shooting adhuri chore kar ansolin lagwanay New York rawana hue hain yeh khabar samnay anay ke baad hi un ki diabities ki khabar jungle ki aag ki terhan phail gayi aur Shahid  ke madah herangi ka shikaar hogaye
taham adakar Shahid  Kapoor  ke ghar walon ney inhen diabities honay ki khabron ki tasdeeq karte hue kaha hai ke' kuch log kaisay yeh bemari seh letay hain? aakhir is bemari ki wajah kya hai? is terhan ki bemari ka saamna kis terhan kya ja sakta hai ?' doosri janib adakar Shahid  Kapoor  ney haal hi mein apni ahliya karina Kapoor  ke sath aik tasweer social media par share ki hai jis mein woh dono Khushgawar  barish ko enjoy karte hue nazar aarahay hain aur bilkul pareshan nahi hain
ade poor 10 dsmbr ( agency ) reliance industry ke chairman mukesh ambani ki beti ishaa ambani ki high profayl shadi mein malik o beron malik se senkron maheman puhanche, pari وڈنگ taqreeb Dehli  mein taaj mehal hotel mein chal rahi hai, is event mein kayi international stars sameit deegar siyasi o samaji mehmanon ny shirkat ki hai dance پاڑٹی ke liye mashhoor international sngrz ko madoo kya gaya jis mein byons bhi shaamil hain bad qismati se ny byons douran dance stij se gir gayi jis se un ki بایئں taang toot gayi hai inhen qareebi hospital muntaqil kar diya gaya hai jahan unki haalat khatray mein batayi jati hai tafseelaat ke mutabiq ade poor mein beo nas ney apni 80 dansrz par mushtamil team kay sath prfarm kya aur prfarm karne ke liye byons ney koi muawza wusool nahi kya money sota nai Amrici  tahaqeeq se yeh tashweesh naak baat samnay aayi hai ke khanay peenay ki ashya mein die کلورو فینولز ( d si pi ) aur deegar aisay chemical paye jatay hain jo dil ke amraaz aur سرطان ke khatray ka baais bantay hain journal of اوکیوپیشنل and aynwayrmintl medicine mein shaya report ke mutabiq toth paste waghera mein d si pi aam paaya jata hai is ke sath un mein khatarnaak try کلوسان bhi aam mojood hota hai yeh baat qabil ghhor rahay ke try کلوسان ki tabahiyoo par pehlay bhi bohat kuch likha aur kaha gaya hai aur ab kayi mumalik naay is chemical par pabandi lagadi hai jo toth paste aur khaano ki darjanon ashya mein aam istemaal hota hai is hawalay se university of mِni sota school of public health naay national health and nutritional ایگزامنیشن surway ke tehat aik surway kya hai is mein 3617 afraad shareek hue jis mein tamam shrka naay sawal naame bharay shrka se un ke bemaar honay ke baray mein poocha gaya aur un ki pishaab ke nmonon mein 2 terhan ke chemical 2, 5? dcpاور 2, 4-dcp ki miqdaar note ki gayi jin shrka ke pishaab mein 2, 5-dcp ki miqdaar waafar thi un mein dil ke amraaz aur tamam کینسروں ka khatrah ziyada paaya gaya taham 2, 4 dcp mein aisi koi baat note nahi ki gayi dono kimiklz se pehphron ka marz saans mein takleef thai رائیڈ ghudood ka aarzah aur amrazِ jigar jaisi bemariyan samnay aayi hain shrka mein mojood 81 feesad afraad mein dono aqsam ke d si pi ki mojoodgi dekhi gayi jo pareshan kin hai mahireen nay﻿ tashweesh ka izhaar karte hue is par mazeed tehqeeq ki zaroorat par zor diya hai Pakistan  23 May  ( siyasat dot com ) Pakistan  mein siyasi o muashi tor par halaat behtar honay ki wajah se international mirathn ka ineqad kya gaya jis mein muqami logon ke ilawa bain al aqwami logon ny bhi shamoliat ki Khyber  Pakhtunkhwa  ki hukoomat ny chain ke darmain sun-hwa is daur mein mardon mein pehla maqam haasil walay Pakistani  jin ka naam Hamza  imam hai unhon ny sab se pehlay 150 kilometer ka faasla uboor k ke record qaim kya gaya aur khawateen mein chain ki larki jin ka naam packing Hussain  hai unhon nay﻿ 23 minute 55 second mein yeh faasla uboor kya tha un dono fathin nay﻿ kaha ke yeh intehai heran kin hai ke hum nay﻿ itna faasla kis terhan kya hai inka mazeed kehna tha Pakistan  aik khoubsurti rakhnay wala malik hai aur khaas tor par woh hukoomat Khyber  Pakhtunkhwa  ka shukar ada karte hain ke unhon nay﻿ aik nihayat hi dilfaraib aur purkashish jagah ka intikhab kya Multan  ( showbiz desk ) America  ki maqbool tareen fashion model jee jee Hadid  ka kehna hai ke woh jitni dutch hain itni Falasteeni  nahi hain فلسطیننے siwaye barbadi ke aur diya hi kya hai jee jee Hadid  ne haal hi mein sydney mein honay wali aik taqreeb mein khud par tanqeed karne walon ko jawab dete hue kaha hai logon ne mujhe kaha ke mein arabi hon haqeeqat mein mein bilkul arabi nahi hon is liye mein sirf khawateen ki numaindagi karti hon lekin log kehte hain ke mein arabi hon aur mujhe arab tahazeeb ki numaindagi karni chahiye is par jee jee Hadid  ka kehna tha ke woh pedaishi Falasteeni  zaroor hain hain lekin ab woh dutch hain is ke woh sirf dutch tahazeeb ka akkaasi karti hain jee jee Hadid  naay douran taqreeb –apne boy friend zain malik ke baaray mein kaha zain malik nah to Pakistani  hai aur nah hi angraiz mujhe lagta hai woh Iran  se talluq rakhtay kyunkay woh baaz auqaat ajeeb o ghareeb harkatein karte hain? Mumbai  : –apne khobsorat baal aur سراپے ki badolat hollywood mein barbie girl ke naam se mashhoor Katrina  Kaif  naay zindagi ki 40 baharen dekh len
24 September  1977 ko manchester mein peda honay wali Katrina  Kaif  ke waalid' ' Mohammad  Kaif ' ' ka talluq Azad Kashmir  jabkay walida' ' سوسانا ٹرکیوئٹ' ' Bartanwi  shehri hain, Katrina  Kaif  nay﻿ bachpan mein hi showbiz ke maidan mein qadam rakh diya tha, theatre par raqs ke douran hi inhen Canadian  nazaad Bartanwi  film adakar کیزاد گستاد nay﻿ film' ' rfyoji' ' mein adakari ki Hadayat  ki jis mein Amitabh  bachchan aur Aneel  Kapoor  jaisay barray sitaron nay﻿ kaam kya, jis ke baad unhon nay﻿ japaani aur Korean  filmon mein bhi adakari ke rang dukhaay
bollywood mein un ki asal shakal mein entry 2008 ki Shahrah  Afaq  film' ' baagh' ' se hui jis ke baad unhon ney nakami nahi dekhi, un ki aqalmandi ka saboot yeh hai ke woh mojooda daur ki un chand adakaraon mein shaamil hain jinhon ney bollywood par hukoomat karne walay sabhi خانز ke sath raqs kya hai
Katrina  Kaif  ki shohrat mein sab se bara kirdaar Shah  rukh Khan  se un ki dosti hai, jinhon naay har halaat mein un ka sath nibhaya
hukoomat ne nai saal ki aamad par mobile sarfeen ke liye phones ki daraamad پرسبسڈی dainay ka elaan kya hai mehakma khazana ki taraf se jari kardah aalamia ke mutabiq mukhtalif aqsam ke smart phones 3 hazaar se 60 hazaar rupay taq sastay ho gay hain mobile phones dealers association ke ne hukoomat ke is iqdaam ko sahatay hue ne kaha hai ke awam ke liye smart phones khareedna ab intahi asan ho jaye ga tax mein kami ki khatir hukoomat ne mobile phones ki daraamad par duty 3 hazaar se 60 hazaar rupay taq kam kar di jis ke baad 7 hazaar wala smart phone 5 hazaar rupay mein farokht hoga 20 hazaar wala smart phone ab 11 hazaar rupay mein farokht hoga 40 hazaar wala smart phones 13 hazaar izafay ke mutabiq 27 hazaar rupay mein farokht hoga jabkay 1 laakh 50 pachaas hazaar wala smart phones ab aik laakh 13 hazaar rupay mein farokht hoga taaza tareen tahaqeeq ke mutabiq ab aik aisa tareeqa ijaad kar liya gaya hai jis se qismat ko badla ja sakta hai yani ab aisa raaz mojood hai jisko agar aap janna chahtay hain to aap bad qismati ko khush qismati mein aasani se badal satke hain kaha jata hai ke khush qismati bas aik baar dastak deti hai lekin bad qismati is waqt hoti hai jab taq darwaaza khol nah diya jaye aap is cheez ko pehchan satke hain ke kab khush qismati neh aap ke darwazay par dastak di hai jee haan bilkul aap yeh jaan kar heran hon ge ke maahir nafsiat رجڑ baaiy ki nai tahaqeeq ke mutabiq yeh ensaan ke bas mein hota hai ke kab woh apni qismat ko khush qismati aur kab bad qismati mein badal sakta hai ensaan saari zindagi is kashmakash mein mubtala rehta hai ke dosra shakhs kaisay is se ziyada khush naseeb hai is ke paas duniya ki har Nemat  har khoshi mojood hai jabkay yeh woh bhool jata hai ke woh shakhs agar khush naseeb hai to kin wajohaat ki wajah se hai hum ensaan sirf nateeja par ghhor karte hain aur woh nateeja kis terhan aaya is cheez par bilkul tavajja markooz nahi karte richards ke mutabiq ensaan ki khush qismati is ke –apne hathon mein hai yeh ensaan hi faisla kar sakta hai ke is nay﻿ kis terhan ki zindagi guzaarni hai sab se zurori cheez jo is tahaqeeq se pata ki gayi hai woh museebat mein manfi soch ka rakhna hai jo ke zindagi yahan taq ke sahet bohat assar runuma karti hai is tahaqeeq mein un ka kehna tha ke khush qismat logon ka mawazna un logon se kya jo ke khud ko bad qismat samajte hain lekin nay﻿ yeh nateeja akhaz kya ke jo log manfi soch rakhtay hain un ki zindagi ke faislay woh khulay zehan se karne ki bakhoobi salahiyat rakhtay hain is ke bar aks woh log jo misbet soch rakhtay hain un ki zindagi ke mamlaat bhi un ki khwahish ke mutabiq nahi hotay log apni zindagi mein is terhan se masroof hogaye hain inhen –apne kaam apni khushii ke lamhaat talaash karne ka time hi nahi muyassar aata zindagi ki daud mein dorrtay dorrtay woh thak gaye hain aur ab isi se nawaqif hain khud ko kis terhan khush rakha ja sakta hai tahaqeeq se yeh bhi pata chalaya gaya hai ke manfi soch rakhnay walay log kam bimarion ka shikaar hotay hain aur yeh bemariyan un ki zindagi par nihayat hi misbet asraat muratab karti hain aur ensaan mazeed depration aur mayoosi se daur chala jata hai misbet soch rakhnay walay log har cheez ko misbet nazar se dekhte hain aur zindagi ke har rang ko rang برنگھا samajte hain aur jo inhen Nemat  ataa ki gayi hain is se mazeed panay ki koshish karte hain aur qudrat ka shukar ada nahi karte jis ke bar aks manfi soch rakhnay walay log zindagi ke har pehlu ko bakhoobi aur achay tareeqay se nibhate hain aur woh kaayenaat ki har ataa kardah har Nemat  par is ka shukar ada karte hain science daano ka mazeed kehna tha ke khush qismat log ziyada kamiyabiyan samettay hain jabkay budqismat log kamiyabiyan samettay mein khasay nakaam rehtay hain misbet soch rakhnay walay log hamesha barbadi ka saamna karte hain mashhoor qoul hai ke insaan ko ziyada umeeden وابستی nahi karni chahiye aur har waqt manfi soch rakhna hi rakhnay mein hi is ki kamyabi hai insaan zindagi ki har mushkil ko ba aasani se hal kar sakta hai aur apni qismat ke sath sath apni sahet ko bhi khush gawaar bnaskta hai Mumbai  motapay mein mubtala honay walay bollywood adakar rashi Kapoor  ny kaha hai ke ab werzish karna million dollar fndz 2 September  ko roknay ka elaan kya tha jis ke baad 5 September  ko Amrici  wazeer kharja mayik پومپئو ne Pakistan  ka dora kya jis mein unhon ne siyasi o askari qayadat se sukoon laane ke liye yeh ijaad nihayat hi kaar amad saabit hon gi lekin yeh robot kaisay kaam karta hai is report ki Musanifa  rbika slitr ka kehna hai ke chone ka yeh amal kisi muzir asar ya Said  افییکٹ ke baghair dard se nijaat ka zareya bantaa hai tahaqeeq mein bataya gaya hai ke bachay ko تھپکنے ki raftaar teen centi meter fi second thi professor slitr ka kehna hai ke walidain qudrati tor par hi bachon ko isi raftaar se thapki dete hain woh kehti hain ke agar hum aasabi nizaam ( nervous سسسٹم ) ke bunyadi dhanchay ko achi terhan samajh len to hum bachon ko behtar aaraaam dainay ke hawalay se walidain ki rahnumai kar satke hain tahaqeeq mein yeh bhi samnay aaya hai ke agar hum teen centi meter fi second ki raftaar se thapki dete hain to hamari jald mein mojood mehsoos karne walay raishay ya سینسری نیورون mutharrak ho jatay hain jis se dard mein kami mehsoos hoti hai un reshon ko si ٹیکٹائل bhi kehte hain rafahi idaray bliss ki cheif executive kirolin li dyoy naay is ) bollywood ki khobsorat jori virat kohli aur anoshka sharmaa ki mangni ko aik baras mukammal hogaya star jori ney is mauqa par mangni ki tasaveer aur videos madahon ke sath Facebook aur insta gram par share karkay intehai musarrat ka izhaar bhi kya guzashta baras aapni honay wali dulhan ko mangni ki angothi پہننانے walay virat kohli aur anushka sharmaa ki tasaveer aur video madahon ke sath share kee un ka kehna tha ke mangni ko aik baras beeet gaya aisa mehsoos ho raha hai ke jaisay bohat barson ki baat hai waqt bohat jald rukhsat ho raha hai virat kohli ny apni mangetar ko x المغنی rehne par tanzia mubarakbaad di aur kaha ke woh un ki dost hain magar zindagi bhar sath dainay ke qabil nahi hain anushka sharmaa ka kehna tha jab aap aik pagal ensaan se cha hain woh kitna bara yeh star kyun nah ho is se mangni karte hain to aisa lagta hai ke aap jahannum mein hain 12 decemeber 2017 ko dono naay اندیا mein mangni ki thi dono naay apni mangni ki tasaveer social media par aik sath share ki thi un dono ki mangni ki khabar sun kar tamam log heran hue aur un ke chahanay walon aur poori boli wood industry naay yeh dua ki ke bohat hi acha sun-hwa ke yeh mangi nah tootay aur un ka injaam shadi par ho Islamabad : aalmi maliyati credit ritng agency modiz investors service naay Pakistan  ke kam hotay zar mubadla ke zakhair aur barhatay hue qarzon par khadshaat ka izhaar kardiya
rating agency ne salana tajziye mein tehreek insaaf ki hukoomat ke adarati islahat ke wadoun ko misbet andaaz mein dekha
mazeed padhan : modese ka Pakistani  maeeshat ke mustahkam honay ka Andia  unhon ny malik ki rating bi 3 negative ( b3 negative ) ki bhi tasdeeq kar di, jo khudmukhtaari mein bairooni mudakhlat, karzzzz ko bardasht karne ki salahiyat mein kami, aalmi satah par muqablay mein kami ki akkaasi karti hai
agency ke mutabiq sab se bara khatrah barhta sun-hwa qarza aur girtay hue zakhair hain
un ka kehna tha ke Pakistan  ki bairooni karzzzz ki adaigi mamooli hai taham zakhair mein kami ki wajah se hukoomat ke balance of pimnt ke khasaray ko ada karne ki salahiyat ko khadshaat la-haq hain
yeh bhi parheen : modiz : Pakistan  ki' bi three' ritng barqarar unhon naay umeed zahir ki ke Pakistan  ka kal qarza 2020 taq jee d pi ka 76 feesad hojaye ga jab ke haliya karzzzz 72 feesad hai
un ka kehna tha ke bairooni qarzay barh rahay hain taham ghair mulki zar mubadla kam tareen satah par anay se usay khatraat la-haq hain

yeh khabar dawn akhbar mein 14 November  2018 ko shaya hui America  ( web disk ) smart phone bananay wali Maroof  Amrici  company' Apple ' nay﻿ cheeni company' huawei' ke smart phone ka istemaal karte hue company ke official twitter account se saal-e no ki mubarakbaad ka pegham post karne par –apne do mulazmeen ki bator saza tanzuli kar di
میش able ki aik report ke mutabiq Apple  ki janib se jari kiye gaye aik mehakma jati ailamiye mein company ke corporate senior naib saddar ka kehna tha ke' is waqeye se Apple  brand ko nuqsaan pouncha
' waqeye ke baad Apple  ney –apne do mulazmeen ki aik darjaa tnzli karte hue un ki thankhowa mein se taqreeban 728 dollars ki katoti bhi kar daali
ailamiye ke mutabiq huawei phone ke zariye ٹوئیٹ ka waqea uss waqt paish aaya, jab Apple  ki out source social media ke' ( sapient ) vrchoyl private net work ( v pi an ) ke disk taap computer mein kharabi peda hui Pakistan  ke shumali ilaqon mein chand baras pehlay jab shadeed brfbari shehar ko jaanay walay rastay band kar deti thi to yahan janam layte nai zindagion ki sansen rukti mehsoos hoten aur bachay ki paidaiesh ke douran yeh masla mazeed paicheeda ho jata tha kyunkay barf ki wajah se road par gariyon ka jalna kaafi mushkil ho jata hai jis ki wajah se amad o raft ka nizaam darham barham ho kar reh jata tha aur zichki jaisay pchid_h mamlaat ka hal bhi mushkil ho jata hai aisay ilaqay mein wahan ki muqeem Sherbano  aur mdwayf ghar ghar ja kar bachon ki paidaiesh mein khawateen ki madad karti hain un khawateen ko wahan ki super vomn kaha jata hai skrdo ke aik gaon ki tang galiyo se hotay hum patharon se banay aik ghar ke darwazay par puhanche andar dayen janib aik kamray se nomolood bachay ke ronay ki aawaz aa rahi thi yeh sakeena hai jo aik hafta pehlay peda hui hain shehar Bano  is nanhi si pari ko goad mein liye sakeena ki maa Gul  ko bta rahi hain ke unhon ne kya khana hai lekin bachi ko dabbay, gaaye ya bakri ka doodh nahi pilana, usay maa ke doodh ki zaroorat hai shehar Bano  hain skrdo mein dareaye Sindh  ke kinare mojood gaon' gole' ki rehaishi shehar Bano  ne kabhi hisaab to nahi rakha lekin woh kehti hain ke pichlle das saloon mein 100 se Ziyad  bachay un ke hathon se peda hue hain un ka mazeed kehna tha ke kis woh mausam sarma mein wahan ke pathirelay ilaaqon se guzrtay hue gharron mein jati hain aur haamla aurton ki madad kehti hain mein ne aik khaas qisam ka libaas pehna hota hai jo ke nishandahi karta hai ke woh kisi ghar mein check up ya zichgi ke liye ja rahi hain unhon nay﻿ khaas qisam ke jootay pehnay hotay hain jo unhein un pathreli ilaqon mein chalne mein bhi khasi madad faraham karte hain un khawateen mein se kuch khawateen se jab poocha gaya to un ka kehna tha jab mere haan bachay ki paidaiesh hui to poooray gaon hatta ke aas paas ke gaon mein bhi koi daai nahi thi mein 15 din taq takleef mein rahi magar meri madad ke liye koi daai nahi thi tab mein nay﻿ faisla kya ke mein khud daai ki tarbiyat haasil karoon gi aur mere baad mere gaon ki koi aur aurat is takleef se nahi guzray gi un mein se aik khatoon naay bataya ke kuch saal pehlay mein naay apna bacha apni terhan khoya tha kyunkay mere paas ain waqt par koi madad nahi pohanchi theen tab mein naay iradah kya tha ke mein ab zichgi ke mamlaat ke liye logon ki madad karoon gi aur bil akhir mein super ومین par mabni list mein shaamil ho gi super momin ki training ke liye wahan aik special shool banaya gaya hai jahan par khawateen ko zichgi ke mutaliq tamam sahuliyaat ozaar aur mutaliqa hakkaam training faraham karte hain un khawateen ko hukoomat ki janib se imdaad bhi faraham ki jati hai taakay yeh apna kirdaar bakhoobi sar-anjaam day saken yeh khawateen aurton ko hamal sanbhalne aur khanay peenay ki Hadayat  bhi faraham karti hain jab aurat hamal mein aati hai to is ke ghar aik khaas qisam ka aala laga diya jata hai jis se bachay ki paidaiesh ke qareeb aur is se milnay wali signal se super ومین ka amlah wahan poanch jata hai aur bachay ki paidaiesh mein madad faraham karta hai yeh sab khawateen kin ki tadaad taqreeban 500 hai pichlle das saloon mein taqreeban 900 se ziyada bachon ki paidaiesh se mutaliq case ko hal kar chuki hain yeh khawateen baghair thankhowa ke bachay ki paidaiesh krwati hain yeh mushkil waqt mein un ke kaam aati hain hukoomat ki taraf se unko special imdaad faraham ki jati hai taakay woh –apne roz marrah ke akhrajaat ka bandobast kar saken ilaqay mein aik dispensary bhi kholi gayi hai jahan free ilaaj ki sahoolat dastyab hai wahan aik laboratory ka bhi qiyam kya gaya hai jahan se muft x raiz kurwaye jasakte hain yeh sab vomn kisi super hero se kam nahi hain aur aisi ba himmat khawateen hi Pakistan  ke roshan mustaqbil ka sarmaya hain? laali would ki nai for d اینیمیٹیڈ action film di sikrt life of birds ka poster jari kar diya gaya
2012 mein release honay wali film di sikrt life of birds ke is sikoyl ki kahani jungli parindon ki zindagi par mushtamil hai

aik risalay ko interview dete hue Hareem  Farooq  ney kaha ke mere jan-nay walay mujhe aik se ziyada fashion wake mein daikhna chahtay hain magar mein poori diljoi ke sath aik waqt mein aik hi designer ke sath kaam karne ko tarjeeh deti hon
Hareem  ne kaha ke mein is baat ki qaail nahi hon ke fashion week mein kaam karne walay models ko aam ishtihar par jalva gir nahi hona chahiye, malik ki media industry ki islaah ke liye yahi munasib hai کہفیشن week mein kaam karne walay log ishtiharaat mein bhi apna bakhoobi kirdaar nibhate rahen, Bartania  aur Japan  jaisay mumalik mein bhi bohat si models bain al aqwami satah par kaam karne ke baad ishtiharaat par kaam karne ko ahmiyat day rahay hain is mein kuch baeed nahi
chicago aik naye mutalay se maloom sun-hwa hai ke kayi amraaz se bachanay wala jaadoyi robot tayyar kar liya gaya hai jo ke insani jism se fasid madon ko bahar nikaalte ki salahiyat rakhta hai aur is terhan woh aariz qalb, gurdon الزائیمر aur ڈیمنشیا jaisay marz ke khatray ko kam se kam karne mein muawnat karta hai is ke ilawa الزائیمر ke marz ki shiddat ko bhi kam karta hai is robot ko check karne ke liye choohon par tajarbaat kiye gaye jis se yeh nateeja akhaz kya gaya hai ke yeh robot dimagh ke un zahreeley protein ko khatam karta hai jo ke nah sirf cancer ka baais banti hai balkay sahet ke dimaghi khaliyaat ko bhi tabah karte rehtay hain chicago mein rush university ke medical center mein science daano ki aik team nay﻿ choohon par tajarbaat mein kiye hain jis ke mutabiq yeh robot dimagh se khaliyaat ke darmain fasid موادں ko saaf karsaktha hai aur الزائیمر sameit kayi amraaz ko daur karne mein bhi madad faraham karta hai kamyaab tajarbaat ke baad yeh umeed zahir ki ja rahi hai ke yeh robot choohon ke baad insanon par bhi istemaal kya ja sakay ga rush university ke professor kaali پاڈا پاہن ka kehna hai ke الزائیمر ko bherne se roknay wali koi dawa hamaray paas nahi lekin yeh robot is mein ahem kirdaar ada karsaktha hai inka kehna hai ke امائی لوئڈ bi ta par mabni fasid khalwi mawaad dimagh mein jama hota hai aur yeh tao protein ki wajah se bantaa hai is se dimagh ke sehat mand khaliyaat tabah honay lagtay hain aur الزائیمر sameit kayi amraaz janam letay hain is tanazur mein yeh robot nihayat ahmiyat ka haamil hai is ke علاوہاس robot ka musalsal istemaal dil cancer aur ڈیمنشیا jaisay amraaz ko bhi daur karne ki salahiyat rakhta hai ilawa azeen robot jism ki androoni soozish bhi kam karsaktha hai ab maloom sun-hwa hai ke yeh dimagh mein yad dasht ke ahem maqam ہپوکیمپس mein jama honay walay امائی لوئڈ bi ta ko saaf karsaktha hai mahireen ke mutabiq yeh protein barhta hai to الزائیمر ka marz janam laita hai robot mein mojood الیفراریڈ raiz aisay kimiklz ko barhati hai jo نیورونز saaf karte aur dimagh se muzir mawaad ko nikaal bahar karte hain is terhan robot is khatarnaak marz ko roknay mein madadgaar saabit ho sakta hai aayi bi am university of واٹرلو aur technical university of myonkh ke mohqiqeen ney saabit kya hai ke jo kaam kwantm kmpyotrz karne ki salahiyat rakhtay hain woh riwayati computer ke liye hal karna namumkin hai tajarbaat se yeh saabit kya gaya hai ke kwantm kmpyotrz riwayati computer ke muqablay mein 1000 gunah ziyada jaldi karne ki salahiyat rakhta hai kuch saal pehlay namumkin lagnay wala task jo riwayati computer prfarm karne se qassar they haliya tahaqeeq ke mutabiq ab kwantm computer naay un mushkil aur paicheeda task ko hal mein kaafi ahem kirdaar ada kar sakta hai jaissa ke computer ke parts ko control karna jadeed dormin kwantm kmpyotrz ke istemaal mein bohat ziyada izafah sun-hwa hai mohqiqeen ke mutabiq kwantm kmpyotrz ajraam falki ki tahaqeeq aur مصجوعی satellite ki knrhol karne mein bhi bohat ahem kirdaar ada karen ga bollywood filmo ke nazreen ke liye hain yeh tey karna kuch mushkil nahi hai ke payrits of di ae kiribin series ki filmo se adakar johnny dip ki shohrat ko dhachka laga hai 55 sala johnny dip' payrits of di kiribin' mein pichlle 18 saal se behri qazzaq jack sparrow ka markazi kirdaar ada kar rahay they magar ab it-tila-aat hain ke woh nai film ki cast ka hissa hain kyun ke yeh dzni astodyoz naye andaaz se paish kere ga duniya bhar ke media is zimn mein khamosh hai nai film par kaam shuru kya ja raha hai ho sakta hai ke johnny dip behtar prfarm karte dikhayi den majaboori hai film ke musannif stuart بییٹی ka kehna tha ke contract ho chukay hain lehaza johnny dip se daman nahi churdaya ja sakta un ka yeh bhi kehna tha ke film ny nakami ke baais kam business kya aur records mein bhi nahi rahi jabkay johnny dip ki janib se ada kya gaya kirdaar hi badnami ka baais bana khud un ke liye bhi aur series ke liye bhi unhon ny jitni johnny dip se bila waja tawaquaat lagai hui thi stuart بییٹی ny tasleem kya ke mera khayaal hai ke jack sparrow ka kirdaar johnny dip ke liye takhleeq nahi kya gaya tha yeh kirdaar un par zara bhi nahi bhaayaa is qisam ke kirdaar ada karna un ki meeras nahi stuart بییٹی ke bakol yeh woh wahid kirdaar hai jo joni ne 3 martaba da kya jisay is duniya bhar ke bachay bator mazaq yaad rakhen ge kyunkay yeh bachon ke zehnon mein hai ke jack sparrow ka kirdaar joni dip ne Ahsen  tor par nahi nibhaya jab bhi woh jack sparrow ka naam sunen ge un ke zehan mein flop hero joni dip ka hi chehra bharay ga stuart بییٹی ka mazeed yeh bhi kehna tha ke series ki anay wali filmon par naye siray se kaam shuru kya jana tha lekin contract ho chukay hain lehaza joni dip se umeed hai ke is dafaa woh behtar perform karen ge? aisay engine walay jahaaz apni raftaar batadreej taiz karte rehtay hain aur bil akhir roshni ki raftaar ke 20 feesad taq poanch satke hain

Islamabad ( new زڈیسک, 19 october 2018 ) science danon naay dil ke aisay nanhay hissay ko daryaft kar liya hai jo sirf insanon mein paaya jata hai aur yahi inhen deegar jandaroon ke maqabil mein munfarid banata hai mohqiqeen ka kehna hai ke yeh herat angaiz daryaft dil ke amraaz ke ٹرانسپیرنٹ ke ilaaj mein Muawin  saabit ho sakta hai se 45 saloon se is tahaqeeq mein masroof science danon ko yeh shak tha ke dil mein aik aisa hissa zaroor mojood hai jo insanon ko deegar jandaroon ke maqabil mein munfarid banata hai magar woh usay dekhnay se qassar they mazeed bar-aan mohqiqeen ka kehna hai ke Australia  ke aartho وسائنس mohqiqeen nay﻿ dil ke is chupay hue hissay ko daryaft karne mein kaafi ahem kirdaar ada kya hai unhon nay﻿ usay اینڈو rifarmz ka naam diya hai aur un ka kehna tha ke yeh daryaft intahi ahmiyat ki haamil hai kyunkay deegar jandaroon mein yeh kahin nazar nahi aaya yeh hissa douran operation daryaft sun-hwa hai yeh woh hissa hai jo khoon ki supply ko poooray jism mein muasar banata hai jis se khoon aik mutawatar tareeqay se poooray jism mein gardish karta hai yeh hissa si ae v jaisi siriyas hard ٹرانسپیرنٹ station ko kam karta hai lehaza yeh aik tecnology aur tibbi tahaqeeq mein aik bohat barri ijaad hai ﻿ویب desk : wats app nay﻿ apni service mein for d calling feature ka bhi izafah kardiya hai jo ke آئیمو aur asnip cheat ke liye challenge ban sakta hai
ab taq wats app mein dakyomnts, record ki gayi awazon aur lambi videos share karanay ki sahoolat to mojood thi lekin ab for d calling fichr ke izafay se wats app ko yaqeenan chaar chaand lag gaye

yeh feature wats app ke makhsoos vrsnz ke liye muta-arif karwaya gaya hai
yeh guzashta chand saloon ke douran wats app ki janib se muta-arif karwaya gaya teesra naya fichr hai jabkay guzashta saal ( June  mein ) aik naye fichr ke tehat wats app mein share ki gayi tasaveer par ایموجی laganay aur astits likhnay ki sahoolat ka izafah kya gaya tha
Islamabad ( new زڈیسک ) Amrici  mahireen ny کینسرسمیت mukhtalif amraaz ki bemari ki تشخیص karne wala kam kharch aur taiz raftaar sensor tayyar kya hai jis se amraaz ki تشخیص mein ghair mamooli madad miley gi yeh sensor canada ki university of british columbia aur university of kilgri ny mil kar banaya hai yeh سینسرمختلف bimarion ko wahein khatam karne ki salahiyat rakhta hai jis se is marz ki تشخیص aur is ke ilaaj mein madad miley hai hai bio sensor 7 hurts ki مائیکرو shuaaein kharij karta hai jo namoonay se guzarti hai is ke baad mahireen is namoonay ka jaiza letay hain aur rizonns aur is mein tabdeeli ko dekhte hue batatay hain ke is mein kon se bacteria kis tadaad mein mojood hain taakay bemari ki noiyat ka jaiza lagaya sakay aur is se honay walay nuqsaan ka bhi pata chalaya ja sakay is sensor mein aik laser lagaya gaya hai jis ke zariye un bacteria ke phelnay ki taaqat ko kam kya ja sakta hai aur cancer jaisay mozi bemari ko pehli stij par khatam kardaita hai mahireen ke mutabiq baaz infection itnay khatarnaak hotay hain ke agar shanakht mein kuch takheer hojaye to mareez ke marnay ka khadsha 60 feesad taq brh jata hai is bayyo sensor ki wasatat se mukhtalif namuraad bimarion ka jaldi ilaaj karna mumkin ho jaye ga ﻿چند saal qabal africi university ke science danon ki team naay mil kar aik aisa murakkab tayyar kya hai jo shamsi roshni ko tawanai mein tabdeel kar ke bijli peda karsaktha hai
science danon ne shamsi roshni se bijli peda karne ke liye solar sheets ka istemaal kya hai
is tar ‫qe mein laagat bhi bohat munasib aati hai aur yeh intehai aaasaaan bhi hai
is ke ilawa yeh ensaan dost bhi hai science daano ka kehna hai ke shamsi roshni ko hararti shakal mein jama karne mein bohat munasib laagat aati hai jab ke solr sale mein yahi amal batrion se kya jata hai
barray pemanay par istemaal ke liye ٹربائن ka istemaal bhi kya ja taa hai jo bohat ziyada mushkil lagta hai
science danon naay solar sale se guzar kar jama honay wali roshni ko hararat mein tabdeel karne ke amal ke baad usay bijli mein badalny ke liye مستندطریقہ astama l- karte hue solar shits ka istemaal kya hai, jis se hararti tawanai baasani bijli mein tabdeel ho jati hai
room ( web disk ) motapa aur barha sun-hwa pait insaan ko be haal kardaita hai aur ab mumkina tor par is ka ilaaj roshni ki soorat mein samnay aaya hai room mein waqay molecular بایولوجی laboratory ( ای am bi ail ) ke mahireen ne musalsal tahaqeeq se barhay hue pait ka aik naya aur kam takleef da ilaaj daryaft kya hai is tareeqay se kiye gay ilaaj ke bohat mo-asar nataij bar aamad hue is tareeqa ilaaj ke baad pait ki charbi bilkul khatam ho jaye gi jo ke dobarah nahi barhay gi 17 درسمبر ko nature bayo medical engineering mein shaya aik report mein science daano ne kaha hai ke is tareeqa ilaaj mein roshni se hassas baaz chemical jism mein daakhil kiye jatay hain jo fori tor par bairooni jald par khujli ki wajah ban'nay walay aasabi khaliyaat ( نروسیلز ) se jarr jatay hain tajribati tor par ماٹاپے kt shikaar insanon mein pait par charbi bohat ziyada hoti hai jisske liye surgery karna padtee thi lekin ab usay surkh shu-aon ke zariye ( near anfra red light ) jald par dala jata hai is roshni ki badolat brown charbi bananay walay asaab jald ki oopri satah se daur ho jatay hain aur charbi khatam hona shuru ho jati hai yahan aik baat zurori hai ke ensaan mein charbi bananay wala malecule jis ka naam انٹرلیوکن 31 ( aayi ail 31 ) hai usay waza karne walay science daano ka maanna hai ke aik martaba roshni daalnay ke baad kayi mahino ke liye charbi se nijaat mil jati hai aur ab yeh ilaaj insanon par azmaish ke liye tayyar hai dilchasp baat yeh hai ke tajurbah gaah mein is ilaaj ke baad insanon par koi manfi assar nah sun-hwa aur un ki jald roz bah roz behtar hoti chali gayi aur charbi batadreej kam hoti gayi aur umeed hai is se motapay jaisay pareshan kin marz ka ilaaj bhi mumkin hosakay ga wazeer e khazana Asad  Umar  nay﻿ janoobi aur wasti asia ke liye Amrici  deputy assistant secretary else wheels se mulaqaat mein wazeh kar diya hai ke Pakistan  neh dehshat gardi ke khilaaf barri qurbaniyan di hain agar America  hamari qurbanion ko تسیلم nahi kere ga to hum مریکا ko bhi maat dainay ki salahiyat rakhtay hain Pakistan  dehshat gardon ki maali muawnat roknay aur money laundering ke khatmay ke liye iqdamaat jari rakhay ga Islamabad mein wifaqi wazeer khazana Asad  Umar  ka kehna tha ke Pakistan  neh haliya barson mein dehshat gardi ke khilaaf arbon dollar simt 90 hazaar jaanen qurbaan ki hain aur isi terhan dehshat gardi ki maali muawnat aur money laundering ke jarr se khatmay ke liye tamam mumkina iqdamaat badastoor karta rahay ga Asad  Umar  ka mazeed kehna tha ke mojooda Amrici  hukoomat ko Pakistan  ke sath taawun karna ho ga is liye aisay doray bahami dilchaspi ke ahem mamlaat par aik dosray ke nuqta nazar ko samajhney mein ahem kirdaar ada karte hain Asad  Umar  ne else wheels ko hukoomat Pakistan  ke vision se bhi aagah kiya aur kaha ke hukoomat american imdaad ka intzaar kar rahi hai taakay malik ke muashi soorat e haal mein tabdeelian laa sakay is mauqa par else wheels ne wazeer khazana ko khittay ki security ke hawalay se Amrici  koshisho se aagah kiya aur wada kya ke America  har jung mein Pakistan  ke sath shana bshanh khara ho ga aur jald Pakistan  ko rokay gaye funds jari kar diye jaye ge khayaal rahay ke guzashta roz Pakistan  aur America  ke aala satah ke wafad naay dono mumalik ke darmain kasheedgi kam karne aur awaami satah par روبط badhaane par zor dete hue do Tarfah  taluqaat mein behtari aur ilaqai aman o aman sameit mushtarqa maqasid ke husool ke liye koshishen jari rakhnay par ittafaq kya tha Amrici  principal deputy assistant secretary of staate baraye janoobi o wasti asia aur safeer els wheels aur wizarat kharja ke aala hakkaam se wafood ki satah par mazakraat hue they mazakraat mein Pakistani  wafad naay dono mumalik ke mabain taluqaat ke farogh ke liye iqtisadi o tijarti taawun aur awam ki satah par rawabit ko kam karne par zor diya kyunkay Pakistan  naay dehshat gardi ke khilaaf barri qurbaniyan di hain aur America  hamari qurbanion ko تسیلم nahi karta mulaqaat mein Afghanistan  sameit khittay mein security soorat e haal par tabadlah khayaal kiya gaya aur khaas kar Afghanistan  mein aman o aama ki soorat e haal mauzo guftagu rahi is mauqa par else wheels ki sarbarahi mein Amrici  wafad naay zor diya ke khittay ka ahem malik honay ke natey Pakistan  ke sath shana bshanh khara honay ki zaroorat hai senate pitrzbrg 23 June  ( siyasat dot com ) asia cupp mein Pakistan  ki kamyabi nay﻿ badolat mean of di match ka aizaz –apne naam karliya yaad rahay ke aajkal Dubai  mein asia cupp jari hai jis mein asia ki teamon nay﻿ hissa liya hai Pakistan  nay﻿ abhi taq koi match nahi haara jis ki wajah se woh sab se ziyada پوائینٹس kay sath pehlay number par mojood hai Srilanka Pakistan  se kam پوائینٹس kay sath is fehrist mein dosray number par mojood hai group mein Pakistan  ka India  ke sath muqaabla sun-hwa is mein Pakistan  ko jeet haasil hui is se qabal group ae mein khailay gaye match ke douran abbu dabi mein Srilanka aur Bangladesh ke darmain match zabardast josh o kharosh ke sath shuru sun-hwa aur dono teamon ne aik dosray kay khilaaf kamyabi ke liye dao aazamaa_e lekin Bangladesh Srilanka kay khilaaf match mein mayoos kin khail ka muzahira karte dikhayi diye aur بلاخر match barabar karne mein bhi nakaam rahay Pakistan  ( web desk ) naye tahaqeeq ney plastic ki duniya mein nai halchal macha di hai insani zindagi mein plastic ka istemaal is terhan aam ho gaya hai jisay khuli fiza mein saans lena lekin insaan is cheez se laa ilm hai ke yahi plastic aisi fiza ko aaloda karne mein bohat bara ahem kirdaar ada kar raha hai agar hum apni roz marrah ki zindagi par ghhor karen to is baat ka andaza bakhoobi lagaya ja sakta hai ke kis terhan hamaray din ki shuruvaat se le kar ekhtataam taq har chhote barray kaam mein plastic zair istemaal hai office mein baithy koi worker ڈسپوزیبل cupp mein chaye pi raha hon ya طلبائ ڈسپوزیبل plate mein samose ke sath chatni kha raha hon ghar mein rehne wali khawateen pila stk ki bottlon se minral water ka istemaal kar rahi hon ya chhota sa bacha plastic mein pack kya gaya لولیپوپ kha raha hon har shakhs aur har shobay se talluq rakhnay wala ensaan khuwa woh kisi bhi Umar  ka kyun nah hon plastic ke istemaal se ghira sun-hwa hai tahaqeeq se yeh akhaz kya gaya hai ke plastic nah khatam honay wali cheez hai jo jal to jata hai lekin mukammal tor par khatam nahi hota is ka kuch nah kuch hissa fiza mein rehta hai jis se fiza abr alood ho ti hai aur is se mahol buri terhan mutasir hota hai plastic fazai aloodgi mein bohat bara kirdaar ada kar raha hai is ke asraat fiza mein bikhar kar reh jatay hain avrjs se ensaan allergy ki bimarion samait saans ki bimarion mein bhi mubtala hojata hai haliya tahaqeeq se yeh bhi heran kin inkishaaf sun-hwa hai ke plastic ke zaraat insani jism ka hissa ban'nay ja rahay hain jis ki wajah se ensaan ki qowat مدافت bohat kam ho kar reh jaye gi mahireen ka gumaan tha insanon ke sath sath machhliyan bhi plastic ke nuqsanaat se dochar hain kyunkay plastic west samandar mein dspoz kya jata hai jis ke baais machhliyan is ko khanay se mar jati hain aur is ka zikar bi bi si ki taaza tareen report mein bhi kya gaya hai ke samandar kuch saloon mein itna aaloda ho jaye ga ke aabi makhlooq mein shadeed halakat ka rujhan paaya jaye ga Australia  ke mehakma maholiyaat ke taawun se aik surway karaya gaya hai jis mein italy Bartania  America  roos Pakistan  India  ke logon ka mutalea kya gaya tha un logon ko samandari machhli khilaye gayi yahan taq ke un ke rehne sehney ka samaan bhi پلاسسٹک ka rakha gaya aur unkay bistar bhi plastic ke banaye gay is ke baad un ke jism ke khalion ki numoo ne kiye gay nmonon par ghhor karne ke baad yeh nateeja آخز gaya ke plastic ke chhootey chhootey زرے insani khalion mein shaamil ho rahay hain aur insani jism ka hissa ban'nay ja rahay hain jis se bohat saari mohlik bimarion ka khatrah bhi la-haq ho sakta hai plastic insani jism ko lachak daar bananay mein bohat ahem kirdaar ada karta hai aur yun andaza lagaya ja raha hai ke agar isi terhan plastic ka istemaal jari rakha gaya to woh din daur nahi jab insaan bhi plastic ka ho jaye ga plastic ki ashiayi ka kam se kam kya jaye taakay insaan aur plastic ki ashya mein wazeh farq pata chal sakay newzea land 10 May  ( agency ) America  mein mahireen ne ghizaiyat ki tehqeeq se pata chalaya hai ke kachi sabzian bohat ziyada ghizai ahmiyat ki haamil nahi hoti hain mahireen ka kehna hai ke sabzion ko bhon-nay aur pakanay se un ki ghizaiyat mein bohat hadd taq izafah runuma hota hai aur kachi sabzion mein kuch aisay ghizai ajzaa ki kami hoti hai jo ke pakanay se poori ho jati hai paki hui sabzian hamari blood vehicles mein khoon ke bahao ki raftaar ko control karne mein bhi madad karti hain inka mazeed kehna tha ke khoon ke bahao ki raftaar ka talluq depration se hai mahireen ki tehqeeq do aisay groups par mabni thi jo ke depration ke marz mein mubtala they mahireen ny mushahida karne ke liye aik group ko kachi sabzian den aur dosray group ko paki hui sabzian den aur is mutalea ka dorania do haftay tha paki hui sabzian khanay walay group mein depration mein bohat kami mehsoos ki gayi ﻿ایک japaani kahawat hai' agar aap barray nahi hue to aap aik ensaan hain' aur mojooda sadi mein yeh Facebook ke hawalay se durust saabit hoti hai
awaami raabtey ki is Website ke nawway crore ke qareeb madah hain aur yahan aap ko har terhan ki maloomat aasani se dastyab hai jo hafton taq madahon ko –apne andar mashgool rakhta hai
aur Facebook mustaqbil mein chahti hai ke madahon ke qiyam ka dorania mazeed ziada hojaye ya woh yahan se ja kar bhi isi ki Websites jaisay Google , jee mil aur twitter mein کھوۓ rahen
magar kya aap ko maloom hai Facebook jitna waqt madahon ko apni site par rakhti hai, itna hi woh hum mein se har aik ke ird gird baray mein jaan layte hai
yeh maloomat is plate form mein khabar rasani ke liye istemaal hota hai aur Facebook ko hafta waar karorron dollars ki aamdani hoti hai
logon ki web ساغٹس mein masrufiyat badhaane ke liye Facebook jo maloomat ikathi karti hai inhen khobsorat chhootey Khanoon  ki shakal day deti hai
aur yeh to is maloomat ka bas nuqta nazar hai jo Facebook aap ke baray mein rakhti hai magar itni maloomat bhi kisi aisay ensaan ke liye aap ki khadd-o-khaal ka khaka bananay ke liye kaafi hai jis se aap ki kabhi bht nah hui ho, jaisay aap kya hain aur kin programme mein dilchaspi rakhtay hain, waghera waghera
Facebook ko andaza hai ke aap ka laip taap kis company kaahe ya konsa istemaal kar chukay hain, konsa disk taap processing system aur qisam istemaal karte hain, roz marrah aadaat kya hain aur khanay peenay ke hawalay se kya dilchaspi rakhtay hain
Facebook aap ke baray mein kuch haqayiq ka andaza un tasaveer se lagati hai jo aap لپسند karte hain, isi terhan window up dates, aap ke ghar walay kya pasand karte hain, khail, game fox aur deegar اکاؤنٹس ya ishtiharaat se rishta waghera se bhi bohat kuch samajh ajata hai
is terhan Facebook har aik ki pasandeedgi ke baaray mein kaafi mufasil tasweer tayyar krliti hai aur yeh to woh معلممات hai jo Facebook hamaray samnay bhi wazeh karti hai
yeh pareshan honay ke sath gang kardainay wala bhi hai kyunkay yeh woh maloomat hai jo hum hansi khushi Facebook ke hawalay karte hain aur dobarah sochte bhi nahi, yani hikrz se to drtay hain magar online privacy ki koi parwa nahi

﻿واشنگٹن : tecnology joint Google  ke saddar sunder پیچائی ne cheeni insaaf committee ke samnay naqal aur ڈیٹاچوری ke hawalay se ilzamaat ki sakhti se muzammat kar di
khabar ke mutabiq chain mein tecnology joint Google  ke saddar sunder پیچائی paish hue, is mauqa par unhon ne lbrl meanz ke aitrazaat ke jawabaat dete hue bataya ke Google  ne kabhi bhi sarfeen ke sath badtameezi se sulooq nahi kya hai, baat Google  sarfeen ki ho ya data chori ki baat ho Google  ne hamesha قوائدوضوابط ke mutabiq kaam kya hai
unhon naay kaha ke hum naay data chori aur naqal aur istemaal ke mutaliq zawabit qaim kiye hain jis ke mutaliq sarfeen ko iraadi ya ghair iraadi tor praagah kiya jata hai, is muamlay mein sarfeen se jaan boojh kar kisi قائدے ya zaabtay ko khufia rakha jata hai
lbrl meanz ne aitraaz uthaye aisa kaisay ho sakta ke sarfeen Google  ki pachaas safhaat par dyie gay usool o zawabit parheen is ki bajaye Google  khud un ko ahmiyat ke mutaliq zaroorat ke sath aagah karta rahay kyunkay Google  ke usool o zawabit kaafi daqyanoosi ho chuke hain ab sarfeen ko umeed hai ke is mein kya inqilab aaye ga
aik aur lbrl party rukan naay aitraaz uthaya ke kya Google  sarfeen ko har roz is se mutaliqa maloomat bhaij sakta hai aur phir Sarif  se poocha jaye ke woh kya istemaal karna chahta hai is ki khwahish se istemaal ho, is sawal ko Google  saddar gole kar gay aur bataya ke is ke mutabiq company ki kuch majboriyan hain
saddar sunder ne bataya ke Google  sarfeen ko calls ke zariye apni tarmemaat ke hawalay se mutnabba karta rehta hai ab sarfeen ko chahiye ke woh Website par jaakar usoolon ko parh liya karen
aik party rukan naay aitraaz uthaya ke kya Google  ki maloomat taq liye pehle aur jee mil ki rasai mumkin hoti hai to is sawal ke haan, liye pehle aur jee mil Google  data taq آرسائی hoti hai
committee baraye insaaf ke rukan ny aitraaz uthaya ke agar mahireen aur designer mil kar aik soft wear tayyar karen aur is mein apni zaroorat ke mutabiq ki tabdeelian karen jis se Google  malomt taq rasai ho ya wahan se kisi tasweer ko naqal karne ki koshish ki jaye to kya Google  ko is ke mutaliq andaza ho ga
is aitraaz ke jawab mein Google  saddar ny bataya ke ke mahireen aur designer ke darmain soft wear ki zaroorat aur is mein istemaal ki gayi taknik se Google  ko kaafi maloomat haasil hoti hain ke mahireen ny kis cheez ko jan-nay karne ke liye kya tareeqa istemaal kya, Google  sirf apni maloomat ki shfafit ko yakeeni banata hai
Google  saddar nay﻿ bataya ke naqal aur data chori ko mehfooz bananay ke liye Google  ki koshishen jari hain, zaroorat ke sath sath is mein inqilab laya ja raha hai
Lahore  city 14 october Pakistani  cricket team ke captain Sarfraz  Ahmed  ko un ke haliya bayan ki wajah se shadeed tanqeed ka saamna karna par raha hai Shahid  afridi ney Pakistan  cricket team ke mojooda captain Sarfraz  Ahmed  par tanqeed karte hue kaha hai ke un mein qayadat ki salahiyat nahi hai kyunkay woh aisay ensaan hain jo ke khail ke douran 10 martaba to baath room mein jatay hain jis ki wajah se poori team ko masail ka saamna karna parta hai un ka mazeed kehna tha ke Sarfraz  Ahmed  aur virat kohli ka koi muqaabla nahi hai virat aik nihayat hi sanjeeda aur behtareen khilari kay sath leader hai is ke bar aks Sarfraz  jaisay kisi khilari ko leader bananay ki koshish nahi karni chahiye Sarfraz  Ahmed  sirf hadsati tor par kamyaab hotay chalay ja rahay hain inka mazeed kehna tha ke jab se Sarfraz  Ahmed  ko Pakistani  cricket team ke captain ki zama daari sonpi gayi hai tab se Sarfraz  Ahmed  –apne aapko hi bhool gaye hain aur un ke paon zameen par nahi lag rahay hain media se baat karte hue Pakistan  cricket team ke sabiq captain shayad afridi ka kehna tha ke khailnay ka to Sarfraz  ko pata nahi lekin سرفرازاحمد khush fehmiyon mein mubtala ho kar doosron ko gaaliyan dena shuru kardete hain ke agar Sarfraz  ko aap is terhan se khailtay daykhna chahtay hain jaissa aap chahtay hain to un se qayadat wapas le lijiye yaad rahay ke Mohammad  Sarfraz  Ahmed  ko haliya matches mein kamzor performance ki wajah se awam ki taraf se bhi shadeed tanqeed ka nishana karna par raha hai aur yeh gumaan kya ja raha hai ke woh un ko jald hi Pakistan  cricket team ki numaindagi ke ohday se subukdosh kardiya jaye ga Karachi  ( web disk ) Wazeer e Aala Sindh  morad Ali  Shah  ke samnay is baat ka inkishaaf sun-hwa hai ke Karachi  ke mukhtalif ilaqon mein mein khasray aur polio jaisi biman par mukammal tor par qaboo pa liya gaya hai Wazeer e Aala Sindh  morad Ali  Shah  ki zair sadarat insidaad polio aur khasray se mutaliq ijlaas sun-hwa jis mein wazeer e sahet wifaqi wazeer e sahet cheif secretary principal secretary commissionaire Karachi  aur deegar hakkaam naay shirkat ki ijlaas ke douran insidaad polio programme incharge Fayaz  jtoyi naay breifing dete hue bataya ke mah September  mein Karachi  ke 15 maqamat se polio ke namoonay liye gay unhon naay bataya ke Gulshan  Iqbal  Sohrab  goth چکورہ naala Mohammad  Khan  colony baldia aur avrngi naala se liye gay nmonon ke manfi nataij aaye hain breifing ke douran unhon ney bataya ke September  mein Sindh  ke shehar Sukkur  mein bhi polio virus ke khatmay ki tasdeeq hui wazeer aala ko breifing dete hue bataya gaya ke March  se decemeber 2018 ke darmain Karachi  mein 3 laakh 68 hazaar 9 so 37 bachon ke walidain ney –apne bachon ko polio vaccine karwai hai is terhan un 6 mah mein 1 laakh 62 hazaar 4 so 8 bachay gharon mein honay ke baais vaccine haasil kar sakay breifing ke douran bataya gaya ke dehi Sindh  ke ilaqon mein 62 hazaar 9 so 14 bachay gharon par honay ke baais khasra aur polio vaccine karwa sakay is mauqa par Wazeer e Aala Sindh  ney kaha ke Allah ka karam hai ke mushtarqa kawishon ki badolat is saal Sindh  mein polio ka koi case samnay nahi aaya wifaqi wazeer e sahet bhi ijlaas mein mojood thay Wazeer e Aala Sindh  naay kya ke hum apni kawishon ko mazeed taiz aur behtar karkay poooray Pakistan  mein khasra aur polio par qaboo pa naay mein kamyaab ho gaye hain is muhim ka maqsad yeh hai ke Pakistan  mein muqeem har bachay ko polio aur khasra ki vaccine faraham ki jayen wifaqi wazeer e sahet naay is baat ki yaqeen dehani karai ke Pakistan  ka har bacha khasra aur polio ki vaccination karaye ga inka mazeed kehna tha ke schoolon mein polio temen bhejen aur bachon ko vaccine faraham karen taakay Pakistan  ke mustaqbil ko behtar aur mazboot banaya ja sakay kyunkay Pakistan  ka mustaqbil hamaray aaj kal ke bachon par munhasir hai hamaray bachay aaj mehfooz aur mazboot hon ge to mustaqbil ko sanwarain ge breifing ke douran wifaqi wazeer e sahet ko bataya gaya ke Sindh  mein 2015 se khasra mein kami aa rahi hai aur isi saal 1149 kisz hue jis mein 371 ki mout waqay hui jabkay 2016 mein 722 kisz hue aur 199 amwaat hui jabkay 2017 mein 400 kisz mein se 3 log zindagi ki baazi haar gaye w each o ki report se bhi saabit kar liya gaya hai ke Pakistan  ny ab mukammal tor par polio aur khasra par qaboo pa liya gaya hai Mumbai  ( daily Pakistan  online ) bollywood adakara anushka sharmaa ny maa ban'nay ke hawalay se ghalat khabrain bananay walon ka kher muqaddam kya aur kaha hai ke unhon ny sahih kaha ke inhen media ya press council ki zaroorat hi paish nahi aayi kyunkay maa ban'nay wali hain unhon ny faisla kya tha ke woh kisi ke khilaaf mahaaz aarai nahi karen gi aur oodati khabron ny to aur bhi aasani muhayya kar di hai virat kohli aur anushka sharmaa ki shadi ke baad social media par un khabron ka bazaar garam tha ke anoshka aur virat ke ghar naye maheman ki aamad jald mutawaqqa hai jis ke baais unhon nay﻿ kayi naye prajikts sign nahi kiye Bharti  media se guftagu karte hue anoshka sharmaa nay﻿ kaha ke is khabar ki tardeed karti hain aur kaha ke logon ke sath woh bhi khush hain jo un ki khoshi mein shareek hain unhon nay﻿ mazeed kehte hue kaha ke shadi to khufia nahi rakh satke magar naye maheman ki aamad se qabal hi koi aurat kahin bhi ja kar is خبرکو khufia rakh sakti hai aur alamaat to phir zahir honay ka sawal hi peda nahi hota mujhe lagta hai ke saari adakaron ko is sorat e haal ka saamna karna parta ho ga kyunkay is ke baad kuch tabqa aisa hai jo chahta hai ke aap maa banay yeh sorat e haal hil aik larki ke liye bohat musarrat hoti hai university of newzea land ke science danon ki tahaqeeq ke mutabiq leemo ka ras insani sahet ke liye مضرکا baais ban sakta hai jo kay mukhtalif khalion ko mutasir karta hai aur lemoo pani nah piya jaye yeh gole gole moti –apne andar bohat hi khoobiyon wala ras rakhtay hain lekin yeh lazzat aur faida mand honay ke sath sath kuch aisay nuqsaan bhi karsaktha hai jis ka ziyada tar logon ko ilm nahi hai lemoo ka juice banana mushkil nahi usay har bacha boorha mard khawateen sab bana satke hain lekin tahaqeeq ke mutabiq mahireen ka kehna hai ke leemo ka juice mein aik qisam ka acid mojood hota hai jo hadion ko مجبوط karta hai aur aap ke andar tezabiyat barha deta hai woh shakhs jaisay dil ka masla ho woh khaali pait lemoo ka ras piye kyunkay is se is ka masla ho sakta hai rozana aik glass leemo ka juice kamzor balon ki parwarish mein bohat misbet kirdaar ada karta hai aalmi idaara sahet ke khawateen ki jabri aur late shadion se 17 laakh se zayed Afghan  zehni dabao ka کشار hain jo khud kshyon ki wajah hai bi bi si ki report ke mutabiq khudkushi ki sharah mein din badan izafah ho raha hota ja raha hai bi bi si ki report mein is baat ka zikre kya gaya hai ke is tadaad mein izafay ki wajah barhatay hue zehni masail gharelu tashadud jabri shadian aur aurton ko darpaish kayi samaji dabao hain jin mein izafah ho raha hai kabul barray aur riwayati sobon mein shaamil hai yeh adaad o shumaar hatmi nahi hain lekin kabul mein khud kashi ki sharah sab se ziyada hai hrat mein tibbi hakkaam ke mutabiq sirf 2017 mein hi 3783 afraad ne khudkushi ki koshish ki jin mein 3100 khawateen theen un mein se 1251 apni jaan lainay mein kamyaab rahen yeh tadaad guzashta saal ke muqablay mein 7 gina hai agarchay Afghanistan  mein zehni sahet ke hawalay se adaad o shumaar dastyab nahi taham aalmi idaara sahet ke andazay ke mutabiq 17 laakh afghani zehni dabao ke masail ka shikaar hain jabkay 14 laakh afraad ko انزائٹی ke masail darpaish hain aur un ki shadi unki marzi ke baghair hi kar di jati hai aur un ko behtareen hal khudkushi lagta hai jo ke sara sar ghalat aur depration par mabni faisla hota hai report se zahir hota hai ke wahan ke log is jadeed daur mein bhi kis qader ki soch rakhtay hain islami talemaat ke mutabiq bhi aurat ki raye is ke saathi ke chnao ke liye bohat zaroori hai lekin khawateen ko yeh bhi jaan lena chahiye ke khudkushi haraam hai is ke ke ilawa aik report mein yeh bhi dekha gaya hai ke ziyada der tak mangni rakhnay se bhi shadian toot jati hain aur aakhir kaar larki ko khudkushi aakhri hal nazar aata hai Afghanistan  mein musallah larai ko sunah 2018 mein 55 wahn saal shuru ho gaya aur w each o ke mutabiq zehni masail ka shikaar afraad ki tadaad mein izafah ho raha hai aqwam mutahidda ke population fund ke andazon ke mutabiq 93 feesad Afghan  aurton jismani jinsi ya nafsiati tashadud mein se kisi nah kisi ka shikaar hoti hain jabkay 83 feesad ko mukhtalif aqsam se istehsal ka saamna rehta hai jadeed andazay ke mutabiq ab taq aurton ki sharah amwaat jung azaadi mein honay wali amwaat se coach kar gayi hai shadi aurat ki zindagi ka behtareen marhala hota hai aur is mein maslay is ki zindagi ko nah pasand bana dete hain jisay woh zehni dabao mein aakar depration ka shikaar ho jati hai w each o ki taaza tareen report ke mutabiq aurtain zehni dabao depration aur dimaghi tor par dimaghi tor par kaafi pareshaniyon mein mubtala rehti hain doctors ka mazeed kehna tha ke aurton mein depration ki asal wajah un ki shadi ke faislay hotay hain Afghanistan  mein logon se larkiyon ki shadian kam Umri  mein hi kar dete hain woh miyan biwi ke rishtay ki paicheedgi ko samajh hi nahi paati aur Talaq  ho jati hai aur biwi bacha dono khudkushi ka sahara le letay hain kyunkay Talaq  Afghanistan  mein maa baap ke liye be izzati ka sabab bantaa hai is liye beti ko koi aur charah nazar nahi aata hukoomat ko is liye iqdamaat karne chahiye ke hukoomat is ka notice le aur is ke liye khatir khuwa iqdamaat kere jahan kahin bhi aisi zayad-ti runuma horahee hon ya kisi aur ke sath zayad-ti se shadi karai janay ki koshish ki jarahi ho to hukoomat ko chahiye ke wahan par sakhti se notice le aur is ke khatmay ke liye khatir khuwa jee pi s nizaam se lais drone system ko jaisay hi kisi imarat mein aag lagnay ka ishara miley ga chaar quad copter wahan pahonch kar rassi philayin ge aur khud logon ki shanakht karkay inhen bachaiyen ge
charon taraf se drone rassi ko khech kar cross ki manind taan len ge
yeh idea gwang dong poli tiknk normal university ke shoba mkinikl engineering ke 2 taalib ilmoon ne khud design kya hai jis par inhen behtareen design ka award diya gi

taham abhi yeh aik design marhala hai aur is ki amli tabeer mein kaafi ziada waqt lag sakta hai
design ko hatmi soorat dainay ke baad usay kayi mushkilaat aur imaarton mein aazmaaya jaye ga aur is ke baad hi jaan bachanay walay yeh drone aam hosakin ge

haliya hafton mein England  ke baad Bharat  aur canada bhi un dono cheeni companiyon se 8gآلات ki kharidari aur daraamad par pabandi laga chuke hain

un mumalik ke baad bhotan ney bhi hifazati iqdamaat ke tor par cheeni companiyon ke kaarobar ko farogh dainay ki mansoobah bandi kar raha hai
malaysia mein un dono companiyon par barah e raast to koi pabandi nahi lagai ja rahi lekin aisay iqdamaat kiye ja rahay hain, jin se dono companian hi ziyada faida mand hongi
is faislay se cheeni companiyon ke laip taap ke kaarobar ko bhi faida hoga aur dono companiyon ke shiraakat daaron ki mushkilaat mein bhi kami hogi

yeh mansoobah bhi ab urooj par jata dikhayi day raha hai

ki sharianon mein sakhti ka jaiza liya gaya aik nai tahaqeeq ke mutabiq dil ki markazi sharianon ko sakht honay se roknay ke liye haftay mein 4 se 5 baar werzish karna intehai mufeed hai lekin ab science daano ny dil ki markazi sharianon ko sakht honay se roknay ke liye aik aur tareeqa bhi daryaft kar liya hai jis mein 30 minute garam pani se nahana jo ke dil ki markazi sharianon ko sakht honay se rokta hai saath saal ki Umar  walay 100 afraad ke liye 15 minute garam pani mein nahanay se dil ki markazi شریانے naram ho jati hain mohqiqeen ka kehna hai ke ab kisi bhi qisam ki werzish
