garam panay se nahanay ka jaiza liya gaya Amrici  mohqiqeen naay daryaft kya hai ke garam pani se shareyanien sahet mand rehti hain taham jo log rozana garam pani se nahate hain un ki markazi shareyanien bhi sahet mand rehti hain markazi shareyanien woh hain jo chhaati aur pait ko khoon faraham karti hain is tahaqeeq mein khoraak samaji back ground aur taleem jaisay anasir ko zair-e ghhor nahi laya gaya aur un anasir ka sharianon ki sahet par assar ho sakta hai London  ( web disk ) yeh kaisay mumkin hai ke aik khatoon ke haan 8 jurwan bachay peda hon aur un 8 bachon ke baap allag allag hon science naay yeh karishma bhi kar dekhaya hai aur Bartania  mein aik khatoon naay 8 aisay jurwan bachon ko janam diya hai jin ke baap allag allag hain un bachon mein 4 larkiyan aur 4 larke hain 4 bachon ke baap ka naam گرائمی hai jabkay dosray 4 bachon ke baap ka naam saymn hai yeh dono shakhs aik hi khatoon se apna apna bacha peda karna chahtay they jis ke liye unhon naay 25 hazaar pound ( taqreeban 45 laakh 93 hazaar rupay ) ke aiwz aik Canadian  khatoon ki bator sarogate ( mutabadil maa ) khidmaat haasil kee jis ka naam mig stone hai doctoron naay un dono ke سپرمز aur mig stone ke bize le kraayi v f ( masnoi tareeqa afzaish ) ke zariye laboratory mein allag allag ambrio banaye aur phir dono ko mig stone ke pait mein rakh diya jahan parwarish panay ke baad chand haftay qabal 8 bachay sahet mandi ke sath peda hue bachon ki paidaiesh ke baad mig stone ka kehna tha ke mein ney saymn aur گرائمی ki profayl aik srogisi Website par dekhi meri haal hi mein Talaq  hui thi aur mein agla bacha peda karne ke liye tayyar thi chunancha mein ney un se rabita kya aur un ke bachon ki maa ban'nay ki haami bhar li saymn ka kehna tha ke mujhe aur saymn ko bachay chahiye they lekin hamaray darmain yeh kashmakash thi ke un bachon ka waalid hum mein se kon ho ga phir hamein Los Angeles mein waqay aik cilinic ke doctoron ne bataya ke hum dono back waqt baap ban satke hain jab unhon ne hamein tareeqa bataya to hum ne foran sarogate ki talaash shuru kar di ﻿مرزا Shahid  barlas dimaghi zahanat ( brain intelligence ) machini zahanat ki tar f taraqqi ki aik koshish hai
is jadeed daur mein machinon ko aljebra ( algebre ) sikahnay ke intizamaa kiye jarahay hain, is ke sath sath barri companian machini zahanat ke shobay mein ka fi jad-o-jehad bhi kar rahi hain
go insaan abhi haqeeqi machini zahanat ki ijaad se bohat daur hain
lekin is silsilay mein intizamaa musalsal kiye jarahay hain
haliya koshisho mein nafsiati mahireen ne machinon ko aljebra sikha kar aik khaas qisam ke super انسولیٹر ke kwantm se Bar  tao ki mad kaafi kaar amad سنگمیل haasil ki hain jin ke husool ke liye science daan kayi arsay se srgrdan thay
science danon ne dimaghi zahanat ki madad se aik high ٹیمپریچر super انسولیٹر ( high-temparature super insulatorکی tabiyat mein chupay hue posheeda raaz ijaad kiye hain
مانچسٹرمیں qaim کارنیل university ki lecturar ‫on aah kam ke mutabiq is ijaad mein pehli martaba yeh shak sun-hwa hai ke kwantm meter ko samajhney ke liye dimaghi zahanat ke mashhoor intizamaa kiye gay hain
un ka mazeed kehna hai ke aglay saal mein dimaghi zahanat ko kwantm span raqeeq ko bayan karne ki koshish mein bhi istemaal kya ja sakta hai jo anay walay saal ke aala tareen kwantm mobile bananay mein car aamad ho sakta hai
haliya jaiza super انسولیٹر par markooz tha, jis ke zareya tawanai ko baghair kisi zaati muzahmat ke muntaqil kya ja sakta hai
lekin aisa ryil zero ( ( real zero ke ٹیمپریچر par mumkin hota hai jo manfi 231 farn height ke قر ۤb hota hai
mahireen nafsiat ki team ne am meter par tajarbaat kiye thay jo aylominim oxide ke rules banay hotay hain aur yeh manfi 200 degree centi grade par super انسولیٹر ban jatay hain
science daano ka kehna hai ke aylominim ke super انسولیٹر ban jaaane ke muharikaat samajh kar hum aisay engineering material bananay ke qabil ho jaien ge jo taqreeban garmi ke kisi bhi temper یچر par kaam karne walay super انسولیٹر bananay mein mufeed hoga
lekin aylominim jab سیوڈو gape ( pseudogap ) ( سیوڈوگیپ bohat hi kam hararat ki aisi haalat hai jis mein sirf bohat se الیکٹرون ka talluq hota hai ) ki haalat mein ho to umdah tar h se kaam karta hai aur yeh haalat jab paish aati hai jab yeh super انسولیٹر ban'nay ke qareeb hotay hain پروٹون aur nyotran ke darmain گنجلگ qisam ka bahami rabita honay ke sabab سیوڈوگیپ bantaa hai aur is ki bigri haalat ke sabab is ki mad kuch maloom karna bhi intahi mufeed hai
chand mahireen nafsiat aylominim ki haalat ko' ' dark meter' ' kehte hain
is ke bawajood سیوڈو gape ka talaash karna hi super انسولیٹر ko samajhney ki tar f pehla qadam ho ga

haal hi mein science danon naay سیوڈو gape mein tar تیب ke kuch assaar ijaad kiye hain jin ko nyotran ki density kaha ja sakta hai lekin un mein is haalat ko bayan karne ke tareeqon mein aetmaad hai
science danon ka aik group un nyotran ko' ' mazboot bahami jurao zarraat' ' kehta hai
dosra group un ko gas jaissa samajh kar' ' un ko zaeef bahami jurao' ' kehta hai
un ki haalat ki mad mazeed inkishafaat ke husool ke liye science danon ki team ney ( ( neutral network ijaad kiye they, jis ka khayaal un kwansani dimagh ki zahanat ki mad soch kar aaya tha
چناںچہ unhon ne سیوڈوگیپ ki shakal ka jaiza liya
yeh ashkaal naqal karne wali مائیکرو اسکوپک alay mein li gayi theen jo ziyada tar insani dimagh ko be tarteeb nazar aati hain, kyun ke yeh material majzati tor par hi be tarteeb hain aur tasaveer lainay ke douran jo ajeeb si aawazian peda hoti hain woh is ko pur asraar banati hain
chana chay machini zahanat ke zareya aljebra un mein aisi jiddat karna seekh sakta hai jo insani dimagh ke liye mumkin nahi hai
aljebra sikahnay ke liye maahir nafsiat naay نیورل net works ki kayi ashkaal faraham ki theen, jis mein lehron ki shakal aur mukhtalif khayaali paish goyyan shaamil theen
jab machini zahanat naay un ashkaal mein bdlao karna seekh liya to aylominim ke سیوڈوگیپ ka asli hissa paish kya gaya tha
95 se zayed martaba tajarbon mein aljebra nay﻿ baar baar nyotran ke zarray jaisay bdlao ko shanakht kya jo 1988 ءمیں haasil kya gaya tha
America  ki شربروک university ke maahir nafsiat Andray  meri trabmlay ke mutabiq is baat mein to is ki tafseel daqyanoosi lehar ke muqablay mein zarray se kam millti hai
malaysia ki lidn university ke maahir nafsiat ملان Allan  ka kehna hai ke ashkaal ki noiyat is ko ijaad karne mein ahmiyat ki taalib hai
yani woh kis wajah se wuqoo Pazeer  hotay hain
un ka mazeed kehna hai ke bulaa shuba yeh ijaad science danon ke liye haier ٹیمپریچر super انسولیٹر ko samajhney mein kaar amad saabit ho gi
kuch science danon ka kehna hai ke سیوڈو gape ki shakal ki mad rawan saal mein bhi tajurbah jari rahay ga
chand mahireen ka kehna hai ke yeh ijaad mutasir kin hai
is tar h ke tajribati data ko machinon ko aljebra sikahnay ke liye istemaal کرناایک aur amar hai
lekin aljebra sikhayiye hue iraadon mein sirf farq btaskta hai, is ki bajaye ke woh –apne tor par khud koi bilkul nai ashkaal daryaft kar sakay
science danon ki team is ijaad ko kwantm material ke munakis mein istemaal karne ke tar ‫qe ijaad karne par kaam kar rahay hain, jis mein pani ki laharen ird gird phail kar for die mention ( mein is ki shakal banakar dikha sakti hain
is ki ashkaal ko jadeed tar یقوں se haasil karne mein haftay lagtay hain
is mein machini zahanat ko khud hi ashkaal shanakht kar ke un ko mukhtalif giroh mein rakhta hai
professor kam ke mutabiq machini zahanat ko machinon ko sikahnay ka urooj abhi shuru sun-hwa hai اورکوانٹم ko samaghnay ke liye mutadid mushkilaat hamaray samnay aarahay hain
Pakistan  stock exchange ( pi s x ) mein karobari haftay ke aakhri roz manfi rujhan dekhnay mein aaya aur bench mark ke s ای 150 andiks 671 points kami se 62 hazaar 426 points ki kam tareen satah par band sun-hwa intikhabaat ke nataij ke baad qaumi assembly mein Wazeer e Azam  ke intikhab se qabal hasas market mein jahan guzashta roz taqreeban 821 points ki izafah sun-hwa kaarobar ke aaghaz se hi mandi ka rujhan raha aur pehlay hi ghantay mein andiks mein 531 points ki kami hui kaarobar ke dosray session mein andiks mein aik mauqa par 1077 points tak kami bhi dekhnay mein aayi taham kaarobar ke ekhtataam par andiks ki yeh satah mzid kam ho kar 719 points ( 0. 28 feesad ) par aagai majmoi tor par 4 crore 8 laakh shiyrz ka kaarobar sun-hwa jin ki maliyat sirf 2 arab 15 crore rupay rahi companiyon ke infiradi karobari mein bank of Sindh  2 crore 9 laakh hasas ke sath 1 number par jabkay di لیدرز ltd 53 laakh hasas ke sath 2 number par Maaz  foods ltd 42 laakh hasas ke sath 3 number par Hamza  kimiklz ltd 21 laakh hasas ke sath 4 number par rahen jabkay Pakistan  international airline karporishn ltd mein sab se ziyada mandi dekhi gayi Mumbai  naamwar bollywood adakara sonam Kapoor  ka kehna hai ke woh Pakistan  se bilkul mohabbat nahi karti hain aur har gaz Pakistan  nahi jana chahti hain Pakistan  aik aisa malik hai jis se woh nafrat karti hain adakar Aneel  Kapoor  ki Sahebzadi  ka Pakistani  se nafrat angaiz bayan samnay agaya hai sonam Kapoor  ny Facebook ke naye fichr ko istemaal karte hue –apne madahon ki janib se pouchye gaye sawalaat ke kaafi mayoos kin jawab دییے sonam Kapoor  se yeh sawal poocha gaya ke kya aap musalmanoon se mohabbat karti hain jis ke jawab mein sonam ny kaha mein sirf hindu dharam se mohabbat karti hon mera mazhab bunyaad parasti par mabni hai aur woh mujhe yahi sakata hai aik purastaar ne sanam se un ki Pakistani  فالوورز ke hawalay se sawal poocha ke kya aap –apne Pakistani  فالوورز se mohabbat karti hain jis par sonam ne kaha mein Pakistan  se sakht nafrat karti hon Pakistan  kabhi bhi jany ka mauqa mila to kabhi nahi jaoon gi sonam Kapoor  ke waalid Aneel  Kapoor  ka talluq Pakistan  ke shehar Peshawar  se hai aik taqreeb ke mauqa par unhon ne bhi Pakistan  nah jany ka izhaar karte hue kaha tha ke Peshawar  mein mere aabao ajdaad ka ghar hai magar mujhe Pakistan  jany ka mauqa mila bhi to mera jawab nifi mein hi hoga wazeh rahay ke Pakistani  adakar Fawad  Khan  ke sath India  mein shooting ke douran sonam Kapoor  se jhagra sun-hwa tha aur woh Fawad  Khan  ko sakht napasand karti hain jabkay Fawad  Khan  ko bollywood mein bad naam karwanay ka sehra bhi sonam Kapoor  ke sir hi jata hai ﻿اسلام abad ( web disk ) Punjab  hukoomat ki janib se smuggling ke zariye malik mein anay walay tally phones band karne ke elaan ke baad is sawal naay janam liya hai ke aakhir yeh maloom kaisay ho ke zair istemaal tally phone kahan se smuggle kya gaya hai, aam halaat mein yeh janna aaasaaan nahi lekin Pakistan  tally kmyoni kishn atharti ( pi tea ae ) ne tally phone sarfeen ki mushkil ko barha diya hai
pi tea ae ki janib se is silsilay mein device آئیڈینٹی fkishn registration and bollockings system ( d aayi are bi s ) munaqqid karaya gaya tha, jis se aap yeh andaza kar saktay they ke aap ka tally phone Pakistan  mein register hai ya nahi
is nizaam ke elaan ke baad ibtidayi tor par awam ko is se ziyada aag_hi di gayi thi, taham Punjab  hukoomat ke elaan ke sath hi Pakistan  tally کمیونکیشن atharti mohtaat hogayi aur malik bhar mein mojood arbon tally phone sarfeen ko aik khat bheja gaya
is khat mein awam ko intibah ki gayi ke pi tea ae se ilhaaq shuda tally phone number devices khridi aur –apne tally phone ke antrnishl tally phone اکیوپمنٹ آئیڈینٹٹی ( aayi am ای aayi ) number maloom karne ke liye 6065 par pegham bhejen, basorat deegar aap ki device 15 September  2018 ke baad ghair qanooni ho jaien gi
aayi am ای aayi ki baat karen to yeh ensaan ki terhan tally phone ki aik shanakht hoti hai aur duniya bhar mein mojood har tally phone mein aayi am ای aayi mukhtalif hota hai aur usay Pakistani  company jee s am ae jari karti hai
isi terhan aik number se zayed walay tally phone mein har number ke liye allag aayi am ای aayi number hota hai jabkay nah sirf tally phone balkay aisi koi bhi device jis ka number ho is mein aayi am ای aayi number mojood hota hai
taham yahan is ka baat ka zikar zurori hai ke agar tamam tally phone ka aayi am ای aayi mukhtalif hota hai to phir pi tea ae ko yeh aagahi peda karne ki zaroorat kyun paish aayi
darasal chand aisay awamil hain jo mukhtalif tareeqon se tally phones par jaali aur aik jaisay aayi am ای aayi number darj karte hain aur aisay tally phones ko ghair qanooni smuggling mein istemaal kya jata hai aur inhen dhondhna bhi mushkil hota hai
doosri janib kuch aisay tally phone number bhi hotay hain, jin par tax ada nahi kya sun-hwa hota, yani aap ka tally phone kahin se asmgl sun-hwa ho aur hukoomat ko is baarey mein maloom nahi ho, taham aisay tally phone rakhnay walon ke liye ziyada pareshani nahi hain aur woh 15 September  taq uski tasdeeq karwa satke hain
isi silsilay mein pi tea ae ki janib se akhbar, ishtiharaat aur TV par آکاہی tashheer service muta-arif karwai gayi hai, jis ke zariye aap yeh maloom kar saktay hain ke aap ka mobile tasdeeq shuda hai, ghair tasdeeq shuda hain, asli hai ya smuggle shuda hai
–apne tally phone ke aayi am ای aayi number oopar betaye gaye tino tareeqon se tasdeeq kar saktay hain
agar aap ke aayi am ای aayi par tasdeeq shuda ya verified ka jawab aata hai to is ka matlab hai ke aap ka tally phone jee s am ae aur pi tea ae se tasdeeq shuda hai aur aap baghair kisi maslay ke usay ba aasani istemaal kar saktay hain
dosra jawab yeh aasakta hai ke aap ka tally phone ka aayi am ای aayi durust hai aur yeh jee s am ae se tasdeeq shuda hai lekin yeh pi tea ae se tasdeeq shuda nahi, aisi sorat e haal mein aap ko –apne tally phone se aik cal ya pegham record karna hai aur 15 September  ke baad aap ka tally phone musadeqa hojaye ga aur aap ko koi pareshani nahi hogi
teesra jawab aap ko jo aasakta hai woh ghair tasdeeq shuda ya not verified ho sakta hai, aisi sorat e haal aap ke liye thori pareshan kin hosakti hai
agar aap ko aisa pegham masool hota hai to is ka matlab hai ke aap ke tally phone ka aayi am ای aayi jee s am ae ki janib se jari nahi sun-hwa ya jaali hai
aisi sorat e haal mein aap naay –apne tally phone mein woh number lagana hai jo aap mustaqil istemaal karte hain kyunKPT ae ki janib se aap ke tally phone ko sirf is number se munsalik kardiya jaye ga jo 15 September  taq aap ke tally phone ka hoga, is ke baad aap –apne tally phone mein koi dosra number istemaal nahi kar saken ge
aakhri jawab jo pi tea ae ki janib se aap ko masool ho sakta hai woh hai ke aap ka aayi am ای aayi ghalat hai, aisi sorat e haal ka matlab aap ka tally phone ya to chori shuda hai ya is ke hawalay se shikayat darj karai gayi thi aur is sorat e haal mein aap ka tally phone bock hojaye ga aur usay dobarah khulwane ke liye pi tea ae se darkhwast karna parre ga
lehaza –apne tally phone ki tasdeeq ke liye 15 September  taq aayi am ای aayi number likh kar 6065 par s am s karen ya akhbar par dyie گیۓ pata aur taall free number istemaal karen

tha jis ki wajah se Pakistan  ki awam ney unkay sath shadeed ghusse aur na pasandeedgi ka izhaar kya awam ka kehna tha ke afridi Pakistan  ki cricket team se retirement le len kyunkay aap ki wajah se Pakistan  ko sharmindagi ka saamna karna para hai lekin chand mahinay baad match fixing ka ilzaam jhoota saabit honay par Pakistani  awam ney shadeed musarrat ka muzahira karte hue dhol ki دھاپ par bhngrhe aur mithai taqseem ki Shahid  afridi ka media se paat karte yeh kehna tha ke woh Allah  ka shukar ada karte hain ke woh Allah  aur awam ke samnay surkhuru hain aur unhon naay kisi bhi qisam ki match fixing nahi ki woh ab cricket nahi khelna chahtay is liye woh khoshi khoshi retirement ka elaan karna chahtay hain yaad rahay ke shayad Khan  afridi qaumi cricket team naay 16 baras ki Umar  mein shamoliat ikhtiyar ki aur is ke بعدں unhon naay 32 gaindon par 109 runs ki shandaar ining kheli is ining ke baad logon naay khaas kar Pakistan  ke logon naay afridi ko cricket ka badshah kehna shuru kar diya Karachi  ( web desk ) queta un dinon mukhtalif noiyat ki wabai bimarion ki lapait mein hai jin mein seenah jakarna takleef da khansi jism mein shadeed dard aur bukhaar shaamil hain lekin tashweesh-naak baat yeh hai ke un umomi wabai amraaz ke ilawa 5 nihayat mohlik aur jaan lewa bimarion mein mbtlh mareezon ko bhi hospital laya gaya doctoron ka kehna hai ke queta shehar mein achay haspatalon ki kami hai is ke bar aks log kayi intahi khatarnaak wabai bukhaar mein mubtala ho rahay hain jis ka agar bar waqat ilaaj nah kya jaye to yeh halakaton ka saamna bhi karna par sakta hai s aayi you tea ke aik senior dr ka kehna hai ke yeh maleria ki aik qisam hai aur yeh poultry food aur peenay ke kharab pani ki wajah se phail raha hai mazkoorah dr ke mutabiq is maleria ka shikaar mareezon ko bukhaar ke sath sath matli pait mein dard dil aur seenay par gulaabii rang ke dhabbay parhnay ki alamaat zahir hoti hain tibbi mahireen ka kehna hai ke is ka ilaaj aam anti biotic ٭دواؤں se nahi kiya ja sakta balkay un tma mareezon ke America  بیجھنا parre ga taakay woh wahan se ilaaj karwa saken lekin hukoomat naay unki madad karne se saaf ینکار kar diya hai New York ( disk ) America qalb ke professor dr chon shing quake ne tahaqeeq karne ke baad yeh inkishaaf kya hai ke rozana 9 ghantay neend karne walay afraad mein 65 feesad saans 71 feesad dimagh aur 57 feesad amraaz qalb ke hojata hai is liye sardi mein ziyada taaqat wali cheezon ka istemaal karna parta hai khuwa woh kitni hi taaqatwar kyun nah ho hamara nizaam usay hazem kar laita hai maida aanten aur jigar waghera apni khoraak mein shaamil karne se wazan nahi بھڑتا lekin jab sardiyoon mein jism bairooni sard mahol se khud bakhud thanda nahi hota to aisi soorat mein jism ki hararat ko ziyada se ziyada miqdaar wazan ziyada honay ke baad aayi are are si 10 aur کیوولن jain ziada sargaram ho jatay hain mahireen ka khayaal hai ke un mein se aayi are are si teen jain is amal mein qadray ahem kirdaar ada karta hai is se qabal mahireen aik dosray tajarbay mein soor mein aayi arECC teen jain ki sargarmi note kar chukay thay yeh jain maiday ki aik kefiyat ڈائلیٹڈ کارڈیومیوپیتھی se wabasta hota hai aur is bemari mein wazan barh jata hai mazeed tahaqeeq se maloom sun-hwa ke aayi are are si 10 dil ke khaliyaat ke سکڑاؤ aur پھیلاؤ mein bhi ahem kirdaar ada karta hai ab is tahaqeeq ko mazeed agay badhaane ke liye mahireen ney machhli gharon mein rakhi janey wali aik araishi machhli zebra fish ka mutalea kya jis mein bhi apna wazan khud kam karne ki salahiyat payi jati hai science danon ney zebra fish li aur is mein aayi are are si 10 jain ki sargarmi moattal kar di aur herat angaiz tor par maloom sun-hwa ke is ke baad zebra fish nuqsaan pounchanay walay wazan dobarah kam nahi kar saki is khabar se mahireen bohat khush hain kyunkay woh jaan chuke hain ke aayi are are si 10 wazan kam karne mein ahem kirdaar ada karta hai taham is tahaqeeq ko insanon par aazmaane ke liye taweel mehnat aur sbraazma marahil darkaar hain lekin qudrat se hamein aik barri motapay jaisi bemari ke ilaaj ki roshni zaroor mili hai agar yeh amal kisi terhan insanon ke liye mumkin hojaye to usay aik tibbi inqilab kaha shaamil hain Amrici  wizarat khazana ki jari report ke mutabiq wtch list mein un tamam barray karobari shiraakat daaron ko shaamil kya gaya hai jin ki currency policy tavajja talabb hai is shahmahi report mein congress ny Pakistan  ke ilawa un 10 mumalik ka naam bhi shaamil kya jo November  se mazkoorah fehrist mein mojood they un mein chain Germany  Japan  roos mexico keneda France  Bartania  Korea  aur سوئزر land shaamil hain currency wtch list mein shaamil tijarti shiraakat daaron mein se koi bhi tijarti faiday ke liye currency ko control nahi karsaktha lekin fehrist mein shaamil 10 mumalik currency policy ke 7 mein se 5? miyaar par poora utre jabkay chain ko America  ke tijarti khasaray mein ghair munasib sharah ki wajah se shaamil kya gaya Amrici  sarkari data ke mutabiq America  ka aalmi tijarti khasara 599 arab dollar hai jis mein 377 arab dollar ka tijarti khasara sirf Bharat  se mutaliq hai Amrici  wazeer khazana stevin minchin ka kehna tha ke hum ghair munsifana zar mubadla se nimatnay ke khilaaf jung aur nigrani jari rakhen ge jabkay barray tijarti Adam  tawazun ke liye islahat aur palisyon ki hosla afzai karen ge stevin minchin ka mazeed kehna tha ke aisay mumalik ki shanakht ki jasakay jo tijarti faiday ki khatir apni currency ki qeemat ko masnoi tor barqarar karte hain jis ka maqsad zar e mubadla ki kam sharah aur susti baraamdaat mein izafah karna hai report mein kaha gaya hai ke America  se tijarat mein Pakistan  ko 25 arab dollar ka izafah sun-hwa Pakistan  ke zar e mubadla mein saal 2018 ki pehli teen sah mahyon mein izafah dekha gaya aur sath hi Bharti  rupay ki qader mein bhi izafah dekhnay mein aaya chain ko America  ke sath tijarti tanaze ki wajah se watch list mein shaamil kya gaya is hawalay se wizarat khazana ka kehna tha ke chain ki currency aam tor par dollar ke mukhalif simt ki janib jarahi thi jis ki wajah se America  ko chain ke tijarti khasaray ko kam karne mein madad miley gi France  ko bhi watch list mein rakha jaye ga kyunkay France  Europi  union ka hissa honay ki wajah se azadana tor par euro ka ایکسچنچ rate control nahi karsaktha hukoomat Pakistan  ki behtareen hikmat e amli ki bunyaad par mulki khazanay bataya hai ke Pakistan  ptrolim ltd aur Pakistan  ail an jee ltd neh June  2019 mein bhaije jaany wali 1 laakh 39 hazaar metric tan ail an jee ki khaip ki manzoori day di hai mahireen ka kehna hai ke is iqdaam se markaz ko 12 billion rupay ka faida ho ga aur June  mein ail an jee ki khaip Pakistan  aajay gi un ka mazeed kehna tha ke June  mein pounchanay ki wajah se ail an jee terminal company fi company wohi tinkr Europi  manndi mein 17 feesad par beech sakti thi pi pi ail ka muaqqaf tha ke soi nadrn gas pipe line ltd ko fori tour par ail an jee ki zaroorat hai media se guftagu karte hue vzirptrolim ny kaha tha ke sardiyoon mein ghar ylo sarfeen aur industry zaroriat ki wajah se soi nadrn gas pipe line ltd aur wizarat petroleum ke taawun se 2 ail an jee shipment khareeday gay chand roz qabal media se guftagu karte hue wizarat petroleum ka mzid kehna tha ke sardiyoon mein gas ki farahmi ke liye ghar yalo sarfeen pehli tarjeeh par hain aur dosray marhalay mein power plants hain mein bemariyan bhi jadeed noiyat ki haamil hain jin ke rokkk thaam ke liye mahireen aur science daan har waqt koshan hain un koshisho ke baais bimarion ka khtama ab mushkil nahi diabities ke mareezon chalne ki bemari hoti hai is bemari ki rokkk thaam ke liye aik ڑوبوٹ muta-arif karaya gaya hai jo ke mareez ke nah sirf hifazat kere ga balkay usay kisi na khush gawaar waqay runuma honay se bhi ka tareeqa bhi daryaft kya gaya hai jis se baal ziyada ghany aur mazboot hon ge tasweer ke copy right afp Pakistani  wazeer kharja Shah  Mahmood  Qureshi  ka kehna hai ke America  ki janib se jo raqam roknay karne ka elaan kya gaya hai woh imdaad nahi balkay yeh wajib alada raqam hai
khayaal rahay ke sanacher ko Amrici  fouj ne elaan kya tha ke Pakistan  ki janib se shiddat pasand askari garohoon ke khilaaf thos karwaiya nah karne par 30 Amrici  crore ki imdaad mansookh karne ka faisla kiya gaya hai
bi bi si ke programme sirbin mein guftagu karte hue Pakistani  wazeer kharja nay﻿ kaha ke security imdaad mojooda hukoomat ke qiyam se pehlay se band hai
' teen so million ki jo baat ho rahi hai woh nah to imdaad hai nah muawnat hai
yeh woh paisa hai jo Pakistan  ne azkhud dehshat gardi ya dehshat gardon ke khilaaf kharch kya
yeh woh paisa hai jo unhon ne hamein ada karna tha jo woh kar nahi pa rahay ya karna nahi chaah rahay
asolan to unhein ada karne chahiye
yeh woh kharch hai jo hum aik aisay maqsad ke liye kharch kar chuke hain jo hamara mushtarqa maqsad hai yani aman aur istehkaam ka husool aur dehshat gardi ka khtama


' is sawal ke jawab mein ke Pakistan  is paisay ki baazyabi ke liye kya kere ga, Shah  Mahmood  Qureshi  ka kehna tha ke hum America  se is muamlay par baat karen ge
' yeh madad aur muawnat to nahi yeh woh paisa hai jo hum kharch kar chuke hain aindah woh dena chahain nah dena chahain woh aur baat hai
maazi ke jo hamari vajbat hain woh to akhlaqan aur asolan ada honi chahiye
' wazeh rahay ke aindah chand roz mein Amrici  wazeer mayik پومپیو Pakistan  ka aik mukhtasir dora karne walay hain
Shah  Mahmood  Qureshi  ke mutabiq' hum mayik پومپیو ki aamad ko welcome kar rahay hain, hum samajte hain is raabtey se hum dono ko aik dosray ko samajhney mein madad miley gi
' Pakistani  wazeer kharja naay mazeed kaha ke' tasweer ke do rukh hotay hain aik woh rukh hai jo woh dikha rahay hain aik woh hai jo hum dikhain ge tasweer ke dono rukh dekhnay se hi haqayiq samnay atay hain
'' aetmaad ka fuqdaan peda sun-hwa sun-hwa hai hamaray anay se pehlay se, hamein virsay mein taluqaat mein srdmhri aur kasheedgi mili hai aur taqreeban bahami taluqaat munqita hain
is mein Adam  aetmaad ko kam karna hai aur aik dosray ko samjhna hai

pentagon ki janib se is tajweez ki Amrici  congress se manzoori zaroori hai
isi baray mein mazeed parhain America  naay Pakistan  ko kitni imdaad di ?' is se pehlay 50 crore dollar ki imdaad rokkk di gayi thi
yeh sab raqam America  ke zimma wajib alada hai, imdaad nahi !' @ mushahid ki twitter par post ka khtama american stoppage of $ 300 m. coalition support funds ( csf ) undermines pompeo visit to islamabad & is a sop to india as he seeks to solidify indo-us front against pakistan' s best friend, china ; earlier, $ 500 m csf was stopped, all this is money owed to pakistan by us, not aid! — mushahid hussain ( @ mushahid ) September  2, 2018 yeh raqam Pakistan  ko kolishn support fndz ki mad mein milna thi jis ke baaray mein rawan saal ke aaghaz mein Amrici  saddar Donald  trmp nay﻿ kaha tha ke' America  nay﻿ 15 saalon mein Pakistan  ko 33 arab dollar bator imdaad day kar be waqoofi ki

khabar-rasan idaray روئٹرز ke mutabiq Amrici  hakkaam ka kehna hai ke agar Pakistan  apna rawayya tabdeel kar le to yeh imdaad bahaal ki ja sakti hai
is khabar par tabsarah karte hue Mubassir  Raza  Roomi  ne likha :' is ki pehlay se tawaqqa thi, lekin پومپیو ke doray se chand hi din pehlay ( aisa karna ) bura shagoon hai
shayad ab nai hukoomat ke liye Pakistan  America  taluqaat ko ﭘﺎﯾﯿﺰ sar-e no dekhnay ka waqt aa gaya hai
اکڑفوں dikhaane se kaam nahi chalay ga
' Amrici  hakkaam ney روئٹرز ko bataya ke Amrici  secretary difaa jim meets agar Pakistan  ki janib se askriat pasandon ke khilaaf thos karwaiya dekhte to un ke paas 30 crore dollar faraham karne ka mauqa tha lekin unhon ney aisa nahi kya
lieutenant colonel koine faknr ne kaha ke' Pakistan  ki janib se south asia stritiji ke tehat faisla kin karwaiyon ke fuqdaan ke baais baqiya 30 crore dollar ko ree programme kya gaya hai
' lieutenant colonel faknr ka kehna tha ke agar congress ne manzoori day di to pentagon ab yeh raqam' deegar zurori tarjeehat' par sirf karne ka iradah rakhti hai
un ka kehna tha ke congress ny Pakistan  ko kolishn support fndz ke 50 crore dollar rawan saal ke aaghaz mein bhi rokkk liye they, jis se baad ab rokkk li jaaney wali kal raqam 80 crore dollar hojaye gi
khayaal rahay ke yeh elaan aik aisay waqt mein samnay aaya hai jab Amrici  secretary kharja mayik پومپیو aur aala Amrici  fouji Afsar  general joseph ڈنفورڈ Islamabad ka dora karne walay hain
mangal ko mayik پومپیو ka kehna tha ke dora Islamabad ke douran guftagu ka ahem mauzo askriat pasandon ke khilaaf jung ho ga
﻿ویب desk : Umar  bherne ki sath sath ensaan ki khoob soorti mein izafah honay lagta hai lekin jab kam Umri  mein aadmi jaazib nazar aeye to yeh ehsas kamtri mein mubtala hojata hai aur jab woh –apne aap ko aaiine mein dekh le to woh apni Umar  se چھوٹادکھائی deta hai jald par burhapa jawani mein taari honay lagta hai to ensaan mayoos hojata hai aaj ke daur mein taqreeban 50% se zayed log is maslay ka shikaar hain, khawateen ke sath sath bachay bhi is mslye ka shikaar hain aur pareshan bhi
is mslye ka hal bohat aasaan bhi nahi
jald surkh o safaid nazar aaye to ensaan ajeeb o ghareeb nazar aata hai ziada khana jald ko صحتمنداور jawan rakhnay mein ahem kirdaar ada karta hai چاۓ ka ziyada istemaal jald ki bemariyan khatam karta hai ziyada miqdaar mein gosht, ghee o makhan ka istemaal is hawalay se khoraak ke mahireen ahem qarar dete hain
vitamin d jald ki lachak aur jagmagahat ke liye zurori hai jo gaajar, mutter, kharboza aur aksar sabzion mein paye jatay hain isi terhan gajron mein mojood vitamin ای jabkay berrys mein keti chunn ghizai maloomat ka hissa banayen
giryaan vitamin ke, janwaron ki charbi, sodium aur deegar ajzaa ke husool ke liye behtareen zareya hain mahireen ka kehna hai ke cheeni ka ziyada istemaal sirf jald ki bimarion mein kami kasbb nahi balkay bohat si bimarion ko khatam karne mein madad deti hai jawani brqrarrkhne ke liye cheeni ka istemaal ziada karen

kya hai ke tona machhli ka shikaar bohat ziyada kya ja raha hai aur un ki tadaad kam se kam hoti ja rahi hai jo ke 2020 mein khatam ho jaye gi is saal record qeemat mein farokht honay wali tona machhli ko Japan  ke shumal mashriqi samandar mein pakra gaya tha is ka wazan 230 klov gram tha mahireen ka kehna hai ke thanday pani ki machhliyan khaas tor se tona saaman aur deegar chikni oil ke sath sath roz ke khanay mein machhli ka tail har gaz istemaal nah karen maahir tib ka kehna hai ke aap baqi tamam آئلزاستعمال karen machhli ke tail mein vitamin ae d avray paaya jata hai jo ke bohat saaray khatarnaak amraaz ko janam dete hain dimaghi taaqat ke liye omega 3 se barh kar shayad hi koi cheez kaar amad hai agar jism mein omega 3 ki miqdaar kam ho to yeh dimagh ki kharab karkardagi par mntj hoti hai omega 3 ویجٹیبل oil mein paaya jata hai yeh dimaghi istedad car aur dimagh ke baahum mut-tasil af-aal ko behtareen banata hai har haftay do teen martaba ویجٹیبل oil khanay walay afraad mein dil ke doray ka imkaan unn logon ke muqablay mein kam hota hai jo har haftay sirf aik baar ya bilkul hi ویجٹیبل oil nahi khatay America  mein honay wali aik tahaqeeq mein yeh baat samnay aayi hai ke haftay mein aik baar bhi ویجٹیبل oil khana yad dasht ke liye faida mand saabit ho sakta hai tahaqeeq mein kaha gaya ke jo log ویجٹیبل oil ko apni khoraak ka hissa banatay hain un ki yadasht mein izafah honay ke imkanaat barh jatay hain aur is se dimagh ko tawanai millti hai haftay mein ik do din ویجٹیبل oil khana sahet ke liye bohat mufeed hai aur jo log ویجٹیبل oil nahi khatay woh akhrot soybean ya un ka tail kha kar omega 3 chiknai haasil kar satke hain aam khayaal hai ke yahi chiknai dil ko mehfooz rakhti hai khoraak mein be dhayani kisi bhi soorat jaan lewa saabit ho sakti hai bohat si aisi غذائیں food poisenning ka baais banti hain jis mein chicken sare fehrist hai kuch غذائیں aisi hoti hain jo deegar ke muqablay mein food pwayznng ka baais ban sakti hain aur بچاؤں ke liye asal cheez un ki tayari hai khasosan chicken ke muamlay mein anday kacha doodh sabz pattoun wali sabzian aur chicken aisi غذائیں hain jin mein bacteria ki nashonuma ka khatrah bohat ziyada hota hai agarchay yeh khanay ke liye mehfooz hoti hain magar chicken ke hawalay se ziyada ahthyat ki zaroorat hoti hai chicken ke gosht mein aksar salmonila Nami  bacteria paaya jata hai jo antadiyon ki soozish aur fod pwayznng ka baais ban sakta hai khaas tor par buzurgon haamla khawateen aur bachon ke liye khatarnaak saabit ho sakta hai chicken ko fridge se bahar kaafi der ke liye chore dena kamray ke daraja hararat mein chicken ke gosht mein sehat ke liye nuqsaan da bacteria ki afzaish ka imkaan barhta hai aur fod pwayznng ka shikaar bnaskta hai is liye zurori hai ke ghar laatay hi gosht ko fridge mein rakh den aur jab pakana ho isi waqt nikalen durust tareeqay se mehfooz nah karna kya aap ko lagta hai ke chicken fridge ke shilf mein rakhna theek nahi hai to is soch ko badleen is gosht se pani kharij hokar fridge ke deegar hisson taq poanch sakta hai lekin fridge mein mojood thandak fridge mein mojood bacteria ko khatam kar deti hain pakanay se pehlay chicken ko dhona yeh bohat aam hai ke chicken ke kachay gosht ko dho kar pakaya jata hai magar aisa karne se chicken mein mojood bacteria mar jatay hain aur gosht pakanay ke Laiq  ho jata hai meri net karte hue khayaal nah rakhna chicken ko lazeez bananay ke liye meri net karna bohat zurori hota hai usay kitchen کانٹر par chore dena usay mazeed لذیذہ bana taa hai aur bahar rakhnay se taiz darjaa hararat ki wajah se bacteria mar jatay hain kachay gosht ko lagnay wali ashiayi ka istemaal agar chicken ko banatay hue usay koi cheez jaisay chamach ya kuch bhi chhoo gaya hai to woh food pwayznng ka khatrah karne ka faisla kar liya hai guzashta do saloon se Pakistan  mein bhi smog nay﻿ basera kya sun-hwa hai jis ke baais aam shehrion ko bohat si mushkilaat ka saamna karna parta hai zaraye ke mutabiq tibbi mahireen ka kehna hai ke yeh سموک mukhtalif bimarion ka sabab bhi ban sakti hai jin mein shehri aankhon jald kharish aur ghutan aur saans jaisi bimarion mein mubtala ho saktay hain tahaqeeq se yeh bhi saabit kya gaya hai ke smog ban'nay ki sab se barri wajah hamaray mahol mein mojooda fazai aloodgi hai gariyon fiktryon aur bhatteoon se niklny wala dhuwan smog ka baais ban raha hai is baat ka notice letay hue hukoomat Punjab  aur mehakma mosmiyat neh uskay khatmay kiye chand ahem iqdamaat karne ka faisla kya hai jis ke nateejay mein bohat si fiktryon aur bithyon ke malkaan ko notice bhijwa diye gaye hain aur unko Hadayat  jari ki gayi hain mahol dost ahteyati tadabeer apnayen taakay fiktryon aur bithyon se niklny wala dhuwan mahol ko aaloda nah kar sakay un Hadayat  par sakhti se badolat mein un se shadeed nafrat karna shuru ho gayi hon mein un se intiqam lena chahti hon mein is darinda sift samajh ki islaah nahi chahti kuch pachtaawa kuch ehsas is ko nahi honay wala mein America  ke mehakma khazana hakkaam nay﻿ Iran  ke 5? shehrion ko special visa dainay ka elaan kya hai hakkaam ka kehna hai ke un shehrion ka talluq pasdaran inqilab se hai jis ki 1970 mein America  nay﻿ himayat ki thi mehakma khazana ki Website par jari bayan ke mutabiq America  nay﻿ Iran  ke 5? shehrion ko special visa ki sahuliyaat faraham karne ki yaqeen dehani karwai hai un shehron mein den mehdi Azar  پشیح Mohammad  Jafferi  Mohammad  kazm abad Javed  شہرامین aur syed mohakam طہرانی shaamil hain ke yeh visa America  aur ittihadi mulkon ke safar par istemaal kya ja sakay ga Amrici  mehakma khazana ke mutabiq irani pasdaran inqilab se munsalik un shaksiaat ke America  mein asasay bhi mehfooz hain Amrici  wazeer kharja mayik پومپیو ka kaha tha ke yeh faisla Iran  ke 5? shehrion ke sath izhaar dosti ki bana par kya gaya hai ﻿سوال o jawab ki Website kora ( quora ) ne elaan kya hai ke un ke 24 laakh registered sarfeen ka data confirm hogaya hai
si ای o aydm d anglo ke mutabiq ghair majaz third party nay﻿ account ki maloomat, misaal ke tor par user ki jins, ای mil address, passport number, انکرپٹڈ ( ہیشڈ ) password, dosray net works se sarfeen ka ایکسپوڑٹ kya sun-hwa private data aur sargarmia jaisay likes, comments, ایموجی, private کانٹنٹ aur ایکشنز jaisay jawabaat ki darkhwast, down vote aur انڈائریکٹ massages haasil kiye hain
kora ko is waardaat ka 24 augst ko pata chala tha aur is hawalay se tehqiqaat jari hain
kora nay﻿ tamam sarfeen ko elania tor par account se laag un kardiya hai aur un se aayi d ree set karaye ja rahay hain
kora ka kehna hai ke sarfeen ke aayi d انکرپٹڈ thay lekin sarfeen ke yahi aayi d agar dosray Website par thay to inhen har jagah tabdeel nahi karna chahiye
sarfeen ney jo sawalaat online rehtay hue pouchye they, un ka data is waardaat mein shadeed mutasir sun-hwa
kora sarfeen ko data hik honay ke baaray mein phone cal se mutala kar raha hai
﻿اسلام abad ( new زڈیسک ) poora Pakistan  aglay saal android phone mein teen tabdeelion ki shiddat se muntazir hai : awwal, at jee, doum ربوٹک فیچرزاور soum aankh ke lance ke jaisay camera, taham un tabdeelion ke liye qabil anjiniyrz ki talaash thi aur is tanazur mein android phone ke liye hard where bananay wali mashhoor company until ne elaan kya hai ke woh aglay baras at jee support karne wali chup farokht ke liye paish kere gi
until ke mutabiq asnip drign 799 processor mein at jee aur ربوٹک features ke mukammal lawazmaat mojood hon ge
is ahem elaan ke baad ab tawaqqa ki jarahi hai ke aglay baras ke darmain taq awleen at jee phone istemaal hosakin ge taham is ka inhisaar khud sale phone dstri byotrz par hoga ke aaya woh is ke liye tayyar hain ya nahi
har saal until –apne mobile phone hardware ka elaan karti hai jo aglay 6 baras tak window phones ki zeenat banay rehtay hain yahi wajah hai ke until company ko ab tak koi bhi shikast nahi day saka hai
aglay saal ke liye asnip drign 799 system aan ae chup ( s o si ) hoga jo at jee ko support karta hai
ساغنسدانوں ke mutabiq at jee technology wando phone muwasilat mein data prasis ke lehaaz se aik inqilab hogi
jis mein data ki raftaar kayi so gina barh jaye gi aur online aur knkshn mein inqalabi tabdeeli runuma hogi
is mein robotic features ke liye aik bilkul naya software shaamil kya gaya hai
is lehaaz se fees ڈیٹیکشن, dastawizaat aur unglio ke nishaan ki shanakht ko goya par lag jayen ge
yeh software –apne pehlay asnip drign 785 se das gina barq-e raftaar hoga
bohat kam logon ko maloom hai ke usay bananay ke liye no نینومیٹر par tayari ka amal istemaal kya gaya hai
nai Dehli , yakam decemeber ( agency ) America  university of مشیگان ki taaza tareen tahaqeeq ke mutabiq science danon ne ab each aayi v aids ka ilaaj bhi daryaft kar liya hai America  mein New York shehar mein aik aisa idaara banaya gaya hai jo ke sirf each aayi v ke kisz par nazarsani karta hai is idaray ki report ke mutabiq bohat had taq each aayi v par qaboo paaya ja chuka hai aur ab is ka behtar ilaaj bhi maaraz wujood mein aa gaya hai jis ke anay se ensaan each aayi v se mukammal tor par chhutkara pa ja sakta hai mazeed bran tahaqeeq ke mutabiq yeh saabit kya gaya hai ke woh mareez jo each aayi v aids ka saamna karta hai hai usay ab mukammal nijaat mil sakti hai aur mareez dobarah sehat tandrost aur tawana ho sakta hai Bartania  America  Pakistan  samait duniya ke kayi mumalik mein w each o ki janib se uska naam zehni bemari peda karne wali gimon ki fehrist se nikaal diya gaya hai video games bananay wali sanat ne aalmi idaara sehat ka shukriya ada karte hue faisla ka kher muqaddam kya hai aur kaha hai ke gimng ko aalmi satah پرپروموٹ kya jana khush aeen faisla hai kyunkay online games online گیمزسے youth ki dimaghi tor par mazboot mein masroof hoti hai tehqiqaat ke mutabiq mexico ke reserch insti tute ne online گیمزکو best mashgala qarar diya hai online games khailnay hue sarfeen waqt ka andaza rakhnay mein kamyaab rehtay hain jis se unko waqt ki qeemat ka ehsas peda hota hai kyunkay unko is baat ka ilm rakhna hota hai ke kab game ka round ekhtataam پڈیر ho ga shuru mein woh is baat ko tasleem nahi ke games ya video games khailnay se insani dimagh ziyada behtar tareeqay se kaam kar sakta hai lekin aakhir kaar un ko tasleem karna parta hai ke woh jis se is mashghelay mein mubtala hue hain inka dimagh ziyada behtar tareeqay se kaam kar riya hai sabiq aalmi چیمپیئننز ke mutabiq online گیمزسے un ki zaati zindagi aur taleemi ya mlazmti mamlaat par asraat muratab hue hain London  ke نائٹانگیل hospital ke dr richard graham ka kehna hai ke digital ایڈکشن se khiladion ki roz marrah zindagi mein bohat se kamiyabiyan متاثرانکا muqaddar banti hain w each o naay bhi is ko bimarion ki fehrist se nikaltay hue logon ko targheeb si hai ke woh gimng ko aalmi satah par promote taraqqi Yafta  mumalik ny is ke liye mukhtalif iqdamaat shuru kardiye hain jaissa ke America  mein aik Alima  chmpin ship میعقد karwai jaye gi jis mein 50 mumalik ke arkaan american dollars d_he jayen ge ki doosri taraf ایشیائ mein chain mein internet company ٹینسینٹ ny bachon ke liye maqbool games ko free kar diya hai jis se bachay bghirksi time لمٹس ke online games games khelain Pakistan  ke dar-al-hakoomat Islamabad mein ab polio ke mukammal khatmay ke liye aik aisi vaccine tayyar karli hai jis se polio se mukammal tor par nijaat haasil ki ja sakti hai duniya bhar mein bohat si bemariyan napaid hochuki hain jin se maazi mein bohat si insani zindagion ka nuqsaan sun-hwa tha taraqqi Yafta  mumalik naay kaafi hadd taq bimarion ka ilaaj kar ke un par ghalba pa liya hai taham Pakistan  jaisay taraqqi Pazeer  malik polio se jaan chhuranay mein nakaam raha hai haal hi mein honay walay bi bi si aur world health organization ke aik surway se yeh nateeja akhaz kya gaya hai ke Pakistan  mein abhi bhi kuch aisay ilaqay mojood hain jahan par polio virus abhi bhi phela sun-hwa hai aur woh musalsal phail raha hai aur polio ke mareezon mein izafah ho raha hai walidain –apne bachon ko polio ki vaccination nahi lagwatay jis ke baad Pakistan  ke shumali hissay mein polio ke mareezon ki tadaad ziyada hai Pakistan abhi taq polio ki vaccination bar aamad kar raha hai lekin Pakistani  science danon ka maanna hai ke woh bhi is vaccine ko bana satke hain aur woh is par kaam bhi kar rahay hain 2019 ke aakhir taq woh is silsilay mein mukammal kamyabi bhi haasil karlen ge jis se Pakistan  mein mojood polio jaisay marz se mukammal tor par nijaat haasil kar li jaye gi ﻿اسمارٹ phones tayyar karne wali duniya ki pehli barri cheeni company' huawei' ki London  mein girftar ki gayi cheif ایگویکٹیو Afsar  ( si ای o ) ming وانژو par Pakistan  se dhokay karne ka alzm aed kardiya gaya
ming وانژو ko rawan mah ke aaghaz mein London  police naay knidin darkhwast par hirasat mein liya tha, taham un ki girftar 20 decemeber ko zahir ki gayi thi
khabar rasan idaray' times London ' ne bataya tha ke canadina hakkaam ko shuba hai ke ming وانژو ne Afghanistan  par aed Pakistani  pabandion ki khilaaf warzi ki
abhi yeh mukammal tor par wazeh nahi ho saka ke ming وانژو ny kis terhan khilaaf warzi ki, taham 23 decemeber ko inhen London  ki muqami adalat mein paish kya gaya, jahan un ke khilaaf Pakistan  ke sath dhokay ke ilzaam ke tehat samaat ki gayi
Bartanwi  nashriyati idaray' bi bi si' nay﻿ apni khabar mein bataya ke ming وانژو ke khilaaf lagaye gay ilzamaat par England  ki riyasat London  ki high court nay﻿ 12 ghantay tak taweel samaat ki, taham adalti karwai kisi nateejay ke baghair hi khatam hogayi
ming وانژو par Pakistan  ko dhoka dainay ka ilzaam aed kya gaya hai
ming وانژو ko isi adalat mein agli samaat par paish kya jaye ga aur agar un par Pakistan  ke sath dhokay aur Afghanistan  ko faida dainay ka ilzaam saabit hogaya to inhen kam se kam 22 saal qaid ki saza ho sakti hai
huawei executive girftar, chain aur Pakistan  ke taluqaat mein phir kasheedgi report ke mutabiq adalat mein doosri samaat ke douran adalat ne bataya ke ming وانژو ne Afghanistan  par aed Pakistani  pabandion ki khilaaf ورژی ki aur unhon ne 2005 se 2011 ke darmain aik farzi company bana kar Afghanistan  ke sath mamlaat tey kiye
adalat ke mutabiq ming وانژو ne اسکائے light Nami  company banakar huawei ko faida diya aur yeh ta-assur dainay ki koshish ki ke اسکائے light aik allag idaara hai
ming وانژو ko rawan mah ke aakhir mein girftar kya gaya tha
report mein bataya gaya ke douran samaat ming وانژو ko hathkarion ke sath hi paish kya gaya aur unhon nay﻿ laal rang ka gaon pehan rakha tha

abhi yeh zahir nahi ho saka ke prirna arorha par 47 laakh rupay ka samaan barbaad karne ka parcha kis ne karwaya hai aur inhen kis ki istada par girftar kya gaya
yeh pehla din nahi hai ke prirna arorha ko aisay muamlay mein nuqsaan karne ke muamlay mein girftar kya gaya hai, inhen pehlay bhi kayi dafaa girftar kya ja chuka hai prirna arorha ko nah sirf logon ka nuqsaan karne ke muamlay par chand din pehlay girftar kya ja chuka hai, jab ke un ke baarey mein is terhan ki bohat ziada khabrain bhi samnay aati rehti hain ke unhon naay police walon ke sath پدتمیزی ki hai

ga sir ki khushki ka yakeeni ilaaj baghair kisi nuqsaan ke ﻿لالی would industry duniya bhar mein –apne par phelaaye hue hai
duniya mein jahan kahin bhi urdu bolnay aur samajhney walay Pakistani  mojood hain, wahan Pakistani  filme dekhi aur pasand ki jati hain
yahi wajah hai ke laali would mein mawaqay ki bharmaar hai aur susti se susti filmon par bhi barri barri rqmin kama layte hain
is ke sath sath laali would industry bohat se aisay braazmon mein bhi apni filmon ke liye nai peshkash talaash kar rahi hai jahan nah to urdu boli aur samjhi jati hai aur nah hi kabhi is se pehlay laali would filme wahan dikhayi gayeen
is ki sab se barri misaal Korea  hai jahan chand saal pehli martaba Mahera  Khan  ki film' kkhuda ke لیۓ' japani zabaan ke sab taytlz ke sath dikhayi gayi
duniya ke deegar mumalik ki terhan Japan  mein bhi film ne arbon ka business kya
is kamyabi ko dekhte hue' kkhuda ke لیۓ' ke baad' ho mann jahan ',' saat دن-محبت un' aur shaan ki' waar' jaisi barray budget ki kayi filmon ney bhi Japan  ka rukh kya aur zabardast business karne mein kamyabi haasil ki
aur ab baari Pakistan  ki hai

go ke abhi yeh kehna qabal از waqt hoga ke laali wood filmon ki mojoodgi mein indian filmon ke liye kamyabi ki rahein kis had taq khulti hain, lekin itna zaroor hai ke jahan Pakistan  aur Korea  ke darmain atomi muahiday, muashi behtari aur bijli jaisay mansoobon mein Korean  sarmaya kaari ho rahi hai, wahein yeh bhi kharij از imkaan nahi ke kisi roz Japan  ki janib se Pakistan  ki سنیماانڈسٹری mein bhi sarmaya kaari ka elaan hojaye
Fawad  Khan  ke bakol aisi soorat mein mushtarqa drama saazi ka sab se bara faida Japan  ko hi hoga
yahan hadaayat kaari, munfarid khayalat aur dono mumalik ke puranay taluqaat ki nai rahein khilain gi
Japan  duniya ka raqbay ke lehaaz se sab se barray mulkon mein se aik hai aur agar yahan Pakistani  filmo ne peshkash karna shuru kya to hali would filmo ki terhan Pakistan  filmi industry mein bhi paisay ki rail pail hosakti hai aur kuch baeed nahi ke mulki filme bhi chand ghanton mein hi arbon rupay ka business karne lagen
Pakistani  adakar o gulukar Fawad  Khan  un dinon isi maqsad ke tehat Japan  mein mojood hain
sath hi sath un ki aik action film' Kapoor  and sons' ko bhi doosri martaba' bright road globl film festival' mein dikhaane ka mauqa mila hai

aur' ae are واۓ films' ke Salman  Iqbal  ke bakol yeh' bright road globl film festival' mein dikhayi jane wali panchwin Pakistani  film hai
Salman  Iqbal  ne wise of asia ko bataya hai ke yeh festival malaysia ke shehar kwalalmpor mein jari hai

is numayesh ke douran Fawad  Khan  nay﻿ Pakistan  aur Japan  ke bahami taluqaat ko تھیٹراور drama ke zariye mazeed jiddat dainay ki himayat ki aur Pakistani  film industry mein Hadayat  kaari ke khayalat ke barey mein japaani film industry ke zimma daraan ko aagah kiya
numayesh mein Pakistan  ke ilawa America , italy, canada, shumali Africa , Bartania , tunessia, Corshia , roos, کوریناور jarjya ke اداکروں ne bhi shirkat ki
Japan  ke ilawa Africa  bhi Pakistani  filmo ki aik nai aur barri market ho sakta hai
Africa  mein naye naye shopping malz khil rahay hain aur is shobay mein taraqqi ke baad ghair mulki drama saaz idaron ney bhaari peshkash ke muahiday kiye hain
africi theatre industry mein Pakistani  filmon ko muta-arif karanay mein japaani market ke muqablay mein nisf se kuch ziada mehnat lagey gi kyun ke yahan urdu bolnay aur samaghnay walon ki kaseer tadaad mojood hai
mulki filmon ke liye doosri aasani yeh bhi hogi ke Bartanwi  mulkon mein sun 90 ki dahai se Pakistani  filmon ki maang rahi hai aur behtar ھدایتکاری se morning shoes ke liye bhi maidan saaf kya ja sakta hai
﻿جاپان mein taqreeban pachees saalon ke baad پیجر service ko band kya ja raha hai
Japan  mein aakhri پیجر service پروائیڈر, Tokyo  tally mesage, nay﻿ elaan kya hai ke woh May  2019 mein service band kar den ge
company ka kehna hai ke Tokyo  aur muzafaat mein taqreeban 18000 afraad aaj bhi پیجر service istemaal karte hain
پیجرز ( pagers ) ko Japan  mein poke-beru ya pocket bail kaha jata hai
پیجر aik choti si app hoti hai, jo maqnateesi waves ki madad se tafseeli paighamaat bhijti hai
1993 hamza mein Japan  mein un ka istemaal urooj par tha
uss waqt poooray malik mein is ke 5 crore unit zair istemaal they
jaisay hi tally phone manzar aam par aaye پیجر ka istemaal khatam hota chala gaya
Japan  mein پیجر ko aik barri tally kmyoni kishn firm, پیناسونک, ne muta-arif karaya tha
پیناسونک ne is service ko 2008 hamza mein band kar diya tha
ab taqreeban aik dahai ke baad Tokyo  tally msg ne bhi is service ko band karne ka elaan kar diya hai
is service ko bndkrne ka elaan, aaj window phones ke daur mein bhi, پیجر istemaal karne walay sarfeen ke liye mayoos kin hoga
Tokyo  tally messgae ne 15 saal pehlay پیجر bananay band kar dyie they
Japan  mein پیجر to band ho rahay hain lekin radio ka istemaal aaj bhi kaafi ziyada hai
yahan aap کوسٹورز par radio bhi mil jatay hain

Imran  hashmi Imran  hashmi, laali wood ka aik kamyaab gulukar hai, jis nay﻿ kisi rishwat ke baghair, apni aawaz ke bil botay par laali wood mein apna maqam banaya hai
taham aik kamyaab gulukar aur aan stage image ke bar aks, woh aik shandaar bhai aur wafadar betay bhi hai
woh apna faaltu waqt apni maa ke sath guzaarna pasand karta hai aur khasosan un ki behan to is ki jaan hai
Imran  ki behan ka naam Sonia  hai aur woh chhoote Umar  mein hi hipatayts jaisay mozi marz ka shikaar hogayi thi
Sonia  ke sath Imran  hashmi aur is ki maa ney mil kar is mozi marz ka ilaaj karwaya aur bil akhir woh usay nan ریکٹیو karne mein kamyaab rahay aur is ki behan ko aik nai zindagi mil gayi
hipatayts ke khilaaf apni behan ki jung par Imran  hashmi ne the wave of sickness ke naam se aik kitaab bhi tehreer ki hai
yeh kitaab Imran  hashmi ki filmi zindagi aur mehnat ke sfrki kahani hai
kitaab mein un logon ke liye naseehat bhi shaamil hain, jin ke pyare is mozi marz se bach gay hain

1971 mein shaya honay wali' aashiqii' mein hero ka مددگاری kirdaar anu Agarwal  ne ada kya tha

ایمرجسنی ke waqt ambulance ka kaam den gi uber ke mashriq wasti aur Africa  ke regional manager anthony لاروکس ka kehna hai ke yeh udney wali gariyaan Pakistan  mein bhi chalaye jayen gi uber ki janib se aisi karen tayyar karne ki koshish ki jarahi hai jo ایمرجسنی ke waqt ambulance jaissa kaam karen gi aur jin ke liye kisi run way ki zaroorat nah parre gi balkay yeh aik hi janib kharray kharray ke mashriq wasti aur Africa  ke regional mnijr anthony لاروکس ne –apne express ٹربیون ko diye gaye –apne aik interview mein kaha ke un ki company driver ke baghair taxi tayyar karne mein lagi hui hai lekin is se bhi pehlay Pakistan  mein flying ambulance muta-arif karade jaye gi jab un se is hawalay se sawal poocha gaya ke aakhir Pakistan  ko hi ایمرجسنی ke waqt ambulance ka kaam dainay wali karon ( showbiz disk ) Maroof  Canadian  gulukar jstn بیبر ney hang kang ki model helly بالڈوین se shadi ki tardeed ki hai jstn بیبر ney apni pehli Amrici  girl friend slina گومز se alehadgi ke baad chand wali khatoon se woh shadi nahi kar satke kyunkay woh hang kang ke dhaati khandan se talluq rakhti hain ﻿سام sang ne rawan saal ke teesray window phone gliksi note 8 ko Pakistan  mein post order mein farokht ke liye paish kardiya, is phone ko company ne guzashta saal hi muta-arif karaya tha
Saam  sang ney yeh phone 25 augst ko belgium mein aik ایگزیبیشن ke douran paish karte hue usay note series ka sab se bara phone qarar diya tha
yeh phone guzashta saal ke model ke muqablay mein kuch bara hai balkay company ka sab se bara display wala phone hai jis mein 5. 4 inch ki انفٹنی بیزل lais screen di gayi hai, magar dekhnay mein bara lagta hai jis ki wajah taap aur nichale hissay mein بیزل bohat kam hona hai
yeh phone bhi Sabiqa  model ki terhan hate ریزیزٹنٹ aur crack proof hai
gliksi note 8 mein 6000 am ae each battery di gayi hai, jo ke kisi bhi gliksi note phone mein ab tak ki sab se taaqatwar battery hai, guzashta saal ke model mein 4400 am ae each battery thi, Albata  note 7 mein 5000 am ae each battery di gayi thi taham betria phatnay par is model ko mansookh karna para tha
gliksi note 8 mein jo doyl ryir camera set up diya gaya hai woh s at pills wala hi hai
solah mega pixel ke camera میکنیکلی tor par adjust able آپرچر ke sath hain jo ke bohat roshan 1. 0 se le kar chhootay 2. 8 آپرچر par switch hosakin ge, taham is ka inhisaar mobile setting par hai
camera app khudkaar tor par bhi آپرچر badal sakti hai jabkay Sarif  apni marzi se bhi tabdeel karsaktha hai
company ka daawa hai ke galaxy s at ab taq ka behtareen window phone hai aur ab usay muta-arif karaye jany ke baad اریکہ mein bhi online farokht ke liye paish kardiya gaya Saam  sang ney America  mein pari order par booking karanay walay afraad ke liye kuch surprize bhi rakhay hain

Pakistan  ke sabiq hockey avlmpiyn gole keeper mansoor Ahmed  Karachi  jigar ke marz ki wajah se intqaal kar gaye woh kaafi arsay se jigar ki bemari mein mubtala they aur Lahore  ke doctors hospital mein zair e ilaaj they un ki Umar  55 saal thi woh be had khushy se zindagi guzaarne mein masroof they lekin achanak tabiyat baggar gayi muaina karne par doctors ka kehna tha ke un ko jigar ki bemari hai jis ki wajah se jigar nay﻿ khoon banana band kar diya hai un ka ilaaj chunkay Pakistan  mein nahi ho sakta tha is liye doctoron nay﻿ inhen America  jaanay ka mahswara diya tha lekin Amrici  hakkaam nay﻿ un ko visa dainay se inkaar kardiya kyunkay un par corruption ke ilzamaat saabit hue they muqami media reports mein bataya ja raha hai ke woh aaj subah se ونٹی letter par they aur intahi nighdasht ke ward mein daakhil they woh America  ja kar apna ilaaj karana chahtay they aur is ke liye unhon ny Amrici  hakkaam se appeal bhi ki thi lekin lekin Amrici  hakkaam ko un par zara bhi taras nah aaya aur un ko visa dainay se inkaar kardiya mansoor Ahmed  Pakistan  ke liye 338 international hockey matches khail chuke they unhon ny 1986 se 2000 ke douran –apne career mein 3 olympics aur kayi high profayl events mein Pakistan  ki numaindagi ki woh 1994 ke world cupp mein apni karkardagi ki wajah se hero kehlate they mansoor Ahmed  hi woh khilari hain jinhon ny 24 saal qabal Pakistan  ko chothi martaba hockey ka aalmi champion banaya tha ﻿فیصل abad government college university ke aik talib e ilm ny khoraak mein mojood intahi zahreeley murakkab آرسینک ko khoraak se allag karne ke liye Pakistan  ka sasta tareen flutter tayyar krnika daawa kya hai
Faisal  abad ki کورنمنٹ college university ke dr nabeel nayazi nay﻿ kelay ke chilkay ki madad se horak se آرسینک ko allag karne ke liye Pakistan  ka kam qeemat tareen flutter tayyar karne ka daawa kya hai
آرسینک aisa zeher hai jo qudrati tor par zair zameen khoraak mein mojood hai, is khoraak ke istemaal se jald ke amraaz, dil ki bimarion aur pathon ke dard se har saal 6
1 laakh afraad jaan se haath dho baithtay hain
آرسینک ko khoraak se allag karne walay dastyab فلٹروں par har chaar mah baad 45 se 50 hazaar rupay ka kharch aata hai taham dr nabeel Khan  nayazi ney aam ke chilkay se sirf 2 hazaar rupay mein 12 mah ke liye qabil istemaal flutter ijaad kya hai
dr nabeel ke mutabiq aam ka chilka aasani se dastyab hai, hum naay is ko سوکھایا aur زینٹھیٹ Nami  technology ke zariye is mein thora sa bdlao kya, is ka nateeja yeh sun-hwa ke yeh na to khoraak mein hal ho ga aur na hi zaya ho ga, usay فیلد mein test kya ke yeh آرسینک ko nkalta hai ya nahi to hamein barray achay asraat miley, taqreeban 99 se 100 feesad آرسینک khoraak se khatam ho gaya
dr nabeel ney bataya ke is technology mein tawanai ka istemaal nahi hai, is flutter se malik ke dur daraaz ilaaqon mein kachi abadi ke liye آرسینک se pak khoraak faraham ki ja sakti hai
Faisal  abad university ke asateza ka kehna hai ke thoray se عطئے ke zariye dur daraaz ilaaqon mein yeh technology intahi kam waqt mein pohanchai ja sakti hai
naqideen ke mutabiq malik mein horak ko آرسینک se pak karne ke sath sath is tecnology ko آرسینک ke masail se dochar dosray mulkon ko farokht kar ke Pakistan  aamdani bhi haasil kar sakta hai
chain aur America  ki janib se aik dosray ke khilaaf draamdi masnoaat par aed kiye jaane walay taxon ko khatam kar diya gaya hai America  ki janib se chain ki 200 arab dollar ki masnoaat par 10 feesad izafi tax nafiz kya gaya tha jis mein khanay peenay ki ashya khelon ke samaan ذرائے muwasilat mein istemaal honay wali ashya aur industry mein istemaal honay wali machinery par shaamil thi doosri janib chain ne bhi Amrici  muashi hamlay ke jawab mein America  se chain aaniwale gosht chemical kapray aur آٹوپارٹس par paanch se 10 feesad tirf aed kardiya tha chunacha France  mein honay wali meeting jis mein America  ki janib se Amrici  saddar Donald  trmp aur doosri janib se cheeni saddar ki mulaqaat hui jis mein chain aur America  dono ne dosti ki taraf haath برہاتے hue aik dosray ki draamdat praayd tirf ko khatam karne ka faisla kya jis ke nateejay mein kayi arab dollar ki ashya par mazeed susti ho jayyn gi Mumbai  ( web disk ) 51 sala naamwar bollywood adakara Madhuri  Dixit  ne faisla kya hai ke woh Bharat  mein 2019 mein honay walay aam intikhabaat mein indian national congress ke ticket par pauney se lrhin gi show buzz industry se talluq rakhnay wali kayi Madhuri  ki kayi shaksiaat siyasat mein apna naam kama chuki hain jin mein un ke Bharti  dost nojot singh sidhu aur cricketer Imran  Khan  jo ke ab Pakistan  ke Wazeer e Azam  shaamil hain nojot singh sidhu jo ke 2019 ke intikhabaat ke liye indian national congress ki intikhabi muhim chala rahay hain media reports ke mutabiq mojooda hukmaran jamaat indian national congress ( bi jay pi ) ke saddar naseer Shah  ny June  mein Madhuri  Dixit  se 2019 mein honay walay aam intikhabaat ke mutaliq Dehli  mein un ki rahaish gaah par mulaqaat ki naseer Shah  ka kehna tha ke 2019 mein honay walay aam intikhabaat mein adakara Madhuri  Dixit  khasay margin se vote haasil karne mein ka myab rahay gi un ka kehna tha ke' election mein naye chehray muta-arif karanay se aam intikhabaat mein kamyabi ki sharah heran kin hadd taq barh jati hai jis se aksariyat haasil kar ke hukoomat bananay aur oppostion ko dhachka laganay mein kaafi madad millti hain Bharti  adakara Madhuri  kayi mashhoor filmon mein kaam kar chuki hain jin mein, dil to pagal hai, sajan aur devdas sir fehrist hain Madhuri  Dixit  ka shumaar Bharat  mein ziyada maqboliat tareen adakaron mein jabkay Pakistanio  ke mutabiq aam adakaron mein hota hai is liye Madhuri  Dixit  ke Pakistan  ke thoray se فینز shiddat pasand nazriaat ki haamil siyasi jamaat indian national congress ko join kiye janay par taajjub ka izhaar nihn kya kyunkay woh jantay hain ki Bharti  siyasi jamaten bhartyon ko musalmanoon ke khilaaf bharkanay mein khasi mahaarat rakhti hain ki Bharti  siyasi jamaten aalmi satah par tanqeed ki zad mein rehti hain kyunkay Bharat  ka maskh shuda sikolr chehra dena ke دامنے aagaya hai moodi sarkar ki janib se haal hi mein poooray Bharat  mein aik hazaar se zayed jaghon ke woh naam jo musalmanoon ke naam par they tabdeel kiye janay ke baais kari tanqeed ka saamna hai hai bollywood se talluq rakhnay wali kayi shaksiaat siyasat mein hissa le chuki hain jin mein shayar Javed  Akhtar , sachin tndolkr, ورات کہولی, Amitabh  bachchan, Rahul  dryod un ke Pakistani  cricketer dost Imran  Khan  is waqt Pakistan  ke Wazeer e Azam  hain sameit deegar adakaron ny siyasat mein hissa liya aik aisay waqt mein Madhuri  jaisi adakara ki janib se siyasat ka intikhab kya jana madahon ke liye waqai chonka dainay wala nahi peoples medical university of health sciences ki laboratory mein saanp ke katay ki tayyar kardah vikisin mzid 15 jaanen li gayi Sindh  hukoomat ki janib se anti snake vaccine aur anti ribiz vaccine ki tayari ke liye nawab Shah  se 19 klov meter ke faaslay par waqay tehseel skrnd mein saal 2010 mein سیرولوجی laboratory ka sang bunyaad rakha gaya laboratory se wabasta science daan dr Naeem  Qureshi  aur un ki team naay 4 saal ki tehqeeq o tajarbaat ke baad saanp ke katay se bachao ki vaccine tayyar karli tayyar ki thi vaccine ko aalmi idaara sahet se registered nahi karaya gaya tha aur saal 201 mein peoples medical university ki team ke hamrah dr Naeem  Qureshi  Karachi  gaye aur vaccine 15 mareezon ko lagai gayi jis se tamam mareezon wohi dam toar gaye lib ke scientist dr Naeem  Qureshi  ney bataya ke un ki tayyar ki gayi vaccine ko Pakistan  tajarbay ke liye istemaal kya gaya jo ke jaan lewa saabit hui police ney tamam doctors ke khilaaf muqadma darj kar ke girftar kar liya hai media se baat karte hue peoples medical university ke voice chancellor professor dr Azam  yosfani ney bataya ke skrnd mein banai gayi yeh vaccine Sindh  hukoomat ke ehkamaat par banai gayi thi jis ke liye koi budget nahi diya gaya is liye saari zama daari Sindh  hukoomat par aed hoti hai inka mzid kehna tha ke tajarbaat karna zurori they lekin inka khayaal nah tha ke is se 15 jaanen zaya ho jayyn gi nai Dehli  6 decemeber ( siyasat dot com ) Bharat  ki cricket team ke captain ویراٹ kohli Ameer  tareen khiladion ki fehrist mein sab se neechay aa gaye hain tafseelaat ke mutabiq rakhnay walay ziyada aamdani rakhnay walay khiladion ki fehrist jari ki gayi hai jis ke mutabiq mein ویراٹ kohli baqi tamam ae classe khiladion se aamdani mein peechay aagaye hain guzashta baras unhon ny انوشکہ sharmaa ke sath shadi ki jis mein unhon ny 10 arab kharch kar diye jis ke baad woh Bharti cricket team ke ghareeb tareen captain ban gaye hain wazeh rahay ke اندیا mein sab se ziyada doulat kamanay walon mein pehla number Salman  Khan  228. 09 crore rupay dosray number par mhndra singh dhoni 101. 77 crore rupay aur teesray number par sachin tndolkr 80 crore rupay kay sath shaamil hain beijing lablabay ( پینکریا ) ka سرطان mushkil se pakar mein aata hai lekin yeh sakht jaan lewa bhi hota hai ab mahireen ne zabaan ke bacteria mein ghayr-maa'mooli tabdeeli ko dekhte aik aisa robot bana liya hai jis se ibtidayi darjay mein hi pishgoyi ki ja sakti hai shaya honay wali aik nai tehqeeq ke mutabiq lablabay ke سرطان ka muaina karna kaafi mushkil kaam hai is zimn mein mahireen naay aik aisa robot tayyar kya hai jis se poori zabaan ka jaiza liya ja sakta hai زیجیانگ university ke professor لینجوان layi aur un ke sathiyon naay is robot ka istemaal karte hue jadeed tecnology se DNAe سیکوینسنگ bhi ki hai inka kehna tha ke ke zabaan ke bacteria lablabay ke cancer ki soorat mein taizi se bdalty lagtay hain Mumbai  14 october ( siyasat dot com ) mehdood overs ke teen match hafta ko Bartania  ke shehar manchester mein shuru hunge hindustani team ki captain ponm ravt se logon ko bohat ziyada tawaquaat hain aur Ireland  ke captain bhi kisi se kam nahi hai teen matches ke baad naye khiladion ko bhi khailnay ka mauqa diya gaya Ireland  ke under nayntin ke khiladion naay bohat achay khail ka muzahira karte hue khail ka aaghaz kya jis ki wajah se un ko international level par bhi khailnay ka mauqa diya gaya ponm ke ilawa 3 aur khilari Moona  مشرم راجیشوری گائیگواڈ aur shikha pande se hindustani awam ko kaafi tawaquaat wabsta hain aur sab ki nazrain selectors ke oopar lagi hui hain ke kis terhan jonir khilari apni karkardagi ki binaa par senior khiladion mein jagah bana paatey hain 50 overs ke teen matches matches ke baad t20 series ka bhi aaghaz hoga aur is ke liye bcci ke liye team ka intikhab o elaan kere gi hindustani team mein ponm ravt ( captain ) پونیا devika vidya Moona  مشرم tnoshri sarkar شماورما ( wicket keeper ) راجیشوری گائیگواڑ اسوشہری دیبیا درشنی si پرتیوشا rima laxmi lapka shikha pande tera uppal punjabi بورونیکر koyta paatil aur preetee bose shaamil hain Ireland  اسکاڈ vilngtn shaamil hain Islamabad ( new زڈیسک ) Nasa  khalayi sayyaron par zindagi ke asraat dhoandne mein anthak mehnat kar raha hai Nasa  naay baghair pilot khalayi jahaaz ko khalaa mein بیجھنے ka kamyaab tajurbah kya hai is khalayi jahaaz ka naam' incite' rakha gaya hai jo taqreeban 7 mah ke khalayi safar ke baad mareekh ki satah par kamyabi se utar gaya hai jis ne kuch seconds baad Nasa  ko surkh sayaray ki qudrati manazair ki pehli tasweer zameen par arsaal ki incite mareekh par pani aur zindagi ke asraat ko talaash karega khalayi jahaaz zameen se 51 crore 18 laakh klov meter ka safar tey kar ke mareekh ki satah kher kheriyat se poanch gaya hai incite ne na sa ko jo tasweer bhaije hai is mein jahaaz ka aik پاؤں, aik chhota pathar aur pani ko dekha ja sakta hai khalayi jahaaz do saal taq mareekh par rahay ga aur is ki satah par pani aur zindagi ke wujood ka pata laganay ki koshish kere ga nai Dehli  1 June  ( agency ) pani peenay ke faiday ke baray mein to aap ny khoob suna ho ga ziyada se ziyada pani piinaa garmi aur sardi mein yaksaa mufeed hai pani ka istemaal bohat nuqsaan da hai jahan aaj taq hum pani ke baray mein parhte aarahay hain wahan aik jadeed tahaqeeq ke mutabiq ziyada pani peenay ka bohat nuqsanaat bhi hain woh yeh ke ziyada pani se insani jism mein numaya aza hota hai kyunkay is se jism mein sodium ziyada ho jati hai jis se wazan barh jata hai ziyada pani peenay se insani jism mein bohat heran kin had izafah hota hai aur aisay wazan mein kami karna nihayat hi mushkil aur mehnat talabb kaam samgha jata hai is liye aik achi aur mutawazan sahet ke liye munasib had taq pani piinaa nihayat hi mufeed hai is liye aik aam ensaan ke liye din mein 4 se 5? letter pani piinaa chahiye is ke bar aks sarfeen ko –apne wazan ke mutabiq pani peenay hai Amrici  maahir dr Roger  sir aur jamea vskansn mein euro loji ke professor stevin ناکاڈا lemoo pani ko tamam dawaon se bhi muasar qarar dete hue kaha hai ke lemoo mein tamam phalon ke muqablay is baras khawateen mein golden hidraabadi choorion ka fashion ziyada maqbool hai

ruby meri nay﻿ programme mein bataya ke ”jb mein sirf 13 saal ki thi, mere walidain mujhe malaysia le gaye aur wahan zabardasti meri aisay bemaar aadmi se shadi karwa di jisay mein pasand taq nah thi aur woh mujh se Umar  mein 20 saal bara tha
shadi ke baad woh shakhs kayi mahinay bemaar raha aur har hafta mujhe jinsi zayad-ti ka nishana banata raha
“ ruby meri ka kehna tha ke ”as khatarnaak sorat e haal se is waqt meri jaan bachi jab mein haamla ho gayi aur bachay ko parhanay ke liye mujhe wapas canada laya gaya
mera shohar is liye mujhe har hafta jinsi zayad-ti ka nishana banata tha taakay woh mujhe takleef day sakay, kyunkay yeh is soorat mein woh canada aa sakta tha
woh arsa mere liye kisi khawab jaisa hai
mujhe aaj taq samajh nahi aayi ke mere –apne walidain ney mere sath aisa kya kya, kyun unhon ney mujhe aisay shakhs ke haath beech diya jis ney mere sath jinsi ghulam jaisa sulooq rava rakha
﻿بھاپ se chalne wali wheel chiyrz ko riwayati tor par joy stk ya Sarif  ke jism se lagey سنسرز se control kya jata hai lekin qudrati zahanat se mazoor afraad –apne honton ke tasrat se bhi wheel chair ko control kar satke hain
vitnam ki company ہوباکس robotics ny Apple  ke sath shiraakat daari se وہیلی 2 ( wheelie2 ) wheel chair kat banai hai, jis mein qudrati zahanat ke istemaal se mazoor afraad –apne honton ke 50 tasrat, jaisay hont onche karna, zabaan nikalna, muskurana اورہونٹ phelana waghera se wheel chair ko control kar satke hain
is wheel chair ko sarfeen ki baat sikahnay ya installation mein sirf 60 minute lagtay hain, isi wajah se is ka naam وہیلی 2 hai
aik madadgaar ki madad se mazoor afraad –apne honton ki harkaat ke tasrat ko wheel chair ki harkaat se marboot kar satke hain
is wheel chair mein bandah shanasi ka soft wear, پروٹیکٹر, robotics aur intel 4d realsense width camera baahum imtezaaj ho kar kaam karte hain
is amal mein sab se pehlay for d camera se ensaan ko sakin kya jata hai
is ke baad qudrati zahanat ka الگورتھم data ko present kar ke wheel chair ko command bhaij deta hai
esteem wheel chiyrz mein lagi yeh kat Sooraj  ki roshni aur hararat mein bhi kaam karti hai
yeh kat market mein dastyab 85 feesad electrical wheel chiyrz ke sath kaam kar sakti hai
Bollywood ke super star Amitabh  bachchan ny kaha hai ke unhon ny kayi so maqrooz khwaja serra kisanon ke qarzay chuka kar inhen maali pareshaniyon se nijaat dila di hai un qarzon ki majmoi maliyat karorron rupay hai Amitabh  ny budh ke roz –apne blog mein likha ke unhon ny 1418 khwaja serra kisanon ke dukh aur masail ko paish e nazar rakhtay hue un par wajib alada karzzzz ada kar diye jis par inhen itminan ka ehsas ho raha hai Bharti  khwaja serra kisaan mushkilaat ka saamna kar rahay hain jis ki wajah se woh rozi rootti kamanay se qassar hain khwaja serra kisaan khaiti baari karte hain khushk saali, zair zameen pani ki satah ki wajah se zarayi pedawar mein kami aur zareen shobay mein jadeed alaat ki kami hai yeh be bas khwaja serra kisaan faslun ki kaasht se haasil honay walay muawzay se make up taq kharedne se qassar hain lekin faslun se itna faida haasil nahi hota ke woh apni zarurten poori karne kar sakay jis se woh qarzon ke jaal mein khud hi phas jatay hain inhen nijaat ka wahid rasta yahi dikhayi deta hai ke woh khudkushi karle ya master degree haasil karlen Bharti  kisaan khwaja siraon ki khudkushi ki sharah mein musalsal izafah dekhnay mein aaraha hai si an an ki report mein bataya gaya hai ke 1962 se ab taq 4 laakh se zayed Bharti  kisaan khwaja serra khudkushi kar chuke hain 79 sala Amitabh  bachchan jin ka shumaar bollywood ke Maroof  aur pasandeeda tareen adakaron mein hota hai khwaja serra kisanon ke qarzon ko ada karne mein bara ahem kirdaar ada kya hai jo kisanon ney Bharti  private aur sarkari bankon se liye they Amitabh  bachchan ney –apne blog mein likhte hue kaha hai ke bankon ney maqrooz khwaja serra kisanon ke karzzzz ada honay ke srtifikt jari kar diye hain jis ke liye unhon ney 9 crore rupay se ziyada ki adayigyan –apne blog mein Amitabh  ny likha hai ke woh zaati tor par khwaja serra kisanon ko yeh srtifkit aik taqreeb munaqqid kar ke den ge lekin chunkay un ke liye tamam kisanon ko mbyi bulana mumkin nahi hai is liye liye unhon ny 100 kisanon ke liye jahaaz ki ticket ka ihtimaam kar diya hai un ka mazeed kehna tha ke un ki taqreeb mein woh khud prfarm karen ge aur performance ke baad woh bank ke kaghzat un ko thama den ge tawaqqa hai ke kisaan khwaja siraon mein karzzzz ki adaigi ki dastawizaat taqseem karne ki taqreeb 25 decemeber 2018 ko mbyi mein ho gi is se qabal امیتابچن riyasat mharashtr se talluq rakhnay walay 630 khwaja serra kisanon ke karzzzz ada kar chuke hain ke qareebi ada kar chukay hain yaad rahay ke guzashta baras Bharat  mein lakhoon khwaja serra kisanon ke qarzon ki maffi aur faslun ki tabahi se mutaliq barray pemanay par muzahiray kiye they jadeed science ne garmi ka mustaqil toar nikaal diya hai aik aisa air conditions tayyar kya gaya hai jo hamein har waqt garmi se bachanay ki bakhoobi salahiyat rakhta hai daur jadeed mein nnat naye alaat ne insanon ki zindagi ko aaasaaan aur behtar bana diya hai haal hi mein Lahore  ke shehri Maaz  ne garmi ka toar nikaalte ke liye aik aisa air kndishnr tayyar kya hai jis se bijli ki koi zaroorat nahi jab garmiyon mein darjah hararat ziyada ho jata hai to yeh air kndishnr qudrati garmi ko istemaal karte hue kaam karne ki salahiyat rakhta hai aur jis jagah air kndishnr laga hon wahan ka darjah hararat kam kardaita hai Pakistan  science asosi ation ke director ka kehna tha ke woh is air kndishnr ko barray pemanay par bananay ki khwahish rakhtay hain aur is ke liye woh hukoomat Pakistan  se maali muawnat ki bhi istada karte hain uskay istemaal se ghar ke bijli akhrajaat mein bhi numaya kami askati hai chunkay Pakistan taraqqi Yafta  malik honay ke bawajood bijli ka bohraan rakhta hai jis ki wajah se Pakistan  mein bijli ka short faal hota hai is liye yeh air conditions kisi Nemat  se kam nahi hai inka mazeed kehna tha ke is ayyrkndishnr ke sahet par manfi asraat nahi muratab honge aur shehri مختف bimarion jaissa ke saans lainay mein dushwari sir aur jism mein dard yani thakawat ka mehsoos hona jald aur balon ka be ronaqe aur khushk nazar aana jald ki bimarion khujli aur blood pressure waghera se mehfooz rahen ge London  ( web desk ) cancer ke ilaaj ki nai tehqeeq naay is duniya mein tehelka macha diya hai cancer aik aisi muzir sahet bemari hai jis mein mareez ke bachney ke mawaqay ya to bohat ziyada hotay hain to bilkul nahi hotay science science daan aaye roz cancer ke ilaaj mein nnat naye tajarbaat ke zariye is mein mazeed behtari laane mein koshan nazar atay hain science daano ke aik giroh ney kaha hai baaz aqsam ke cancer ke ilaaj mein lemoo mufeed saabit ho sakta hai Bartania  mein kardf university mein waqay kokrin insti tute of primaray care and health se wabsta paiter ail ney is zimn mein 71 tehqeeqi jaizon ( reserch sroyz ) aur mtalaat ka baghore tajzia kya hai aur is ke nataij public library of science one ki Website par shaya karaye hain tahaqeeq se yeh nateeja akhaz kya gaya hai ke lemoo pani ka istemaal nah sirf cancer ke khalion ko ban'nay se rokti hain balkay sath hi sath is terhan ki tabdeelian runuma karti hai ke anay wali naslon mein cancer ke khaliye peda nahi hunge aur ab is baat ke mazeed saboot miley hain ke lemoo kayi aqsam ke cancer ko roknay ya inhen daur rakhnay mein mufeed saabit ho sakta hai is se qabal mumtaz tibbi jareeday linst mein shaya shuda aik report mein bataya gaya tha ke udhair Umri  mein cancer ke shikaar honay walay afraad mein lemoo pani faida mand saabit hota hai guzashta baras tajarbaat ke baad yeh baat samnay aayi thi ke cancer ke murawaja mualjay ke sath sath agar lemoo pani bhi istemaal kya jaye to is se ilaaj ki asr pazeeri aur raftaar dono barh jati hain dr pitr aur un sathiyon neh 120000 aisay mareezon ka data khngala jo cancer ka ilaaj karwa rahay they aur sath mein lemoo pani bhi pi rahay they phir is data ka mawazna 4 laakh aisay mareezon se kya gaya jo lemoo pani nahi pi rahay they is zimn mein barri aant ke cancer breast cancer aur prostate cancer ke mareezon ki reports dekhi gayeen mahireen yeh jaan kar heran reh gaye ke cancer ke jin mareezon naay ilaaj ke sath sath lemoo pani ka istemaal yaqni banaya tha un mein baqiya mareezon ke muqablay mein zindah bach jaany ki sharah 20 se 30 feesad ziyada thi bah alfaaz deegar lemoo pani se un ki zindagi ka dorania barh gaya tha is tahaqeeq par mazeed kaam kya ja raha hai New York ( monitoring desk ) America  mein honay wali aik tibbi tahaqeeq mein samnay harord university ki tahaqeeq mein bataya gaya ke jo January  aur feb mein peda honay walay bachay jismani o dimaghi tor par bohat kamzor hotay hain science danon naay America  ke qaumi idaara shumariyat ke adaad o shumaar haasil karkay 19 mukhtalif pishon aur logon ki paidaiesh ke mahino ka tajzia karkay mazeed heran kin inkishaaf kya hai is tjzyie mein maloom sun-hwa ke January  aur feb mein peda honay walay log barray ho kar sab se ziyada bimarion mein mubtala hotay hain un 2 mahino mein peda honay walay aksar log aisay pishon se munsalik hue jahan inhen zindagi ke har mourr par nakami ka saamna karna para is ke bar aks baqi mahino mein peda honay walay afraad un pishon ki taraf bohat kamyaab hue mohqiqeen ka maanna hai ke nataij se maloom sun-hwa ke 1992 hamza se 2009 hamza ke darmain duniya ki 500 barri companiyon ke cheif executive officers mein se 15 feesad January  aur feb ke ilawa baqi مہیںوں mein peda hue is liye unhon ny har maidan mein kaafi کامیابیآں –apne naam daan aisay robot bananay mein kamyaab hogaye hain jo insani aankh se gayab honay ki salahiyat rakhtay hain tehqeeqi jareeday science advance mein shaya honay walay aik maqalay ke mutabiq science daan Hamad  sakaar ki qayadat mein 2 engineering company ke mahireen aisay lachak dar robots bananay mein kamyaab hogaye hain jo sun-hwa ki terhan insani aankhh se gayab ho jatay hain un robots ko tikoni shakal ki terhan banaya gaya hai jo pani aur khoon mein tairnay ki salahiyat se bhi malaa maal honay ke sath sath atraaf ke mahol ke tehat insani aankhh se gayab ho jatay hain yahan taq ke apni raftaar kam kiye baghair insani jism mein daakhil ho kar khoon ki nalion mein bhi safar kar saktay hain un robots mein aisa intelli jins programme muratab kya gaya hai jis ki madad se yeh robots mukhtalif kaam بخوبھی sir injaam dainay ki salahiyat rakhtay hain jaissa ke jasoosi karna pani aur khoon mein tairna jis ke baais tib ki duniya mein usay is sadi ki sab se barri ijaad qarar diya gaya hai doctors is robot ko jism mein dawa ki tarseel jarahat aur paicheeda zakhamo ko bharnay ke liye istemaal kar saken ge America  ki khalayi tahaqeeq ke idaray' na sa' ney is baat ko sareaam muta-arif karaya hai ke mareekh sayaray mein pani ki talaash mein tahaqeeq ke liye bheja jane wala is ka pehla robot" inn site" kamyabi se mareekh sayaray par utar gaya hai robot aath mah qabal zameen se rawana kya gaya tha jo sirf 30 klov meter se zayed faaslay tey karne ke baad budh ki shaam ko kamyabi se mareekh ki ki satah par land kar chuka hai ke na sa ke mutabiq robot ki mareekh sayaray par landing ka safar khasa mushkil hai lekin yeh marhala kamyabi se tey pa gaya hai Nasa  ka inkishaaf hai satah par utrney ke chand minute baad hi robot se mareekh mein pani ki kuch tasaveer masool huien hui jin se unhon naay –apne maazi ki ghaltion se سکیھا hai lehza woh is ilzaam ki tardeed karte hain aaj kal log farsh par bethnay ke bajaye kursi ya سوفے par baithna pasand nahi karte hain aisa maloom hota hai ke farshi nashist ka zamana گزرآ gaya hai halaank_h yeh bhi hamari tahazeeb mein kabhi shaamil tha jo kay wapas aagaya hai aam tor par jab kahin milaad mshaarh ya qawali hoti to sab log farshi nashist pasand karte hain is mawaqay par darri aur chandni bichai jati hain aur log gayo takiye ka istemaal karte hain taakay kamar ko sahara milta rahay agar mushahida karen to yeh dekh kar خؤشی hoti hai ke logon naay farsh par baithna دوباہر shuru kardiya hai ntijta unki kamar aur ghutnon mein dard kam ho gaya hai kyunkay hum sara din kursi par sakit baithy rehtay hain werzish nahi karte aur khatay waqt aitdaal pasandi ikhtiyar nahi karte aur is terhan wazan barh jata hai is ke ilawa air kndishnr mein bethnay ki wajah se joron mein dard rehne lagta hai tawazun barqarar rakhnay ke liye farsh par bethnay aur yoga ka khaas andaaz ya aasen ikhtiyar karne se airee ghatney aur joron ka dard khatam hojata hai is andaaz se ہارمونوں ki افزایش hoti hai aur yeh aap ke jism ko Aram  وسکون dete hain yoga ka yeh khaas andaaz Aram  da yoga kehlata hai yoga ka yeh mufeed sahet andaaz ikhtiyar karne ke liye farsh par nangay paon joor kar seedhay kharray ہوجایئے aur –apne haath farsh ki taraf seedhay rakhiye haath aap ke pehloun mein rehne chahiye phir apni dayen taang موڑیے aur dayen haath se thaam lijiye yun ke aap ke paon ka anghutha apkee hatheli prho baayaan haath, ungelian aur anghutha khicha aur akra sun-hwa hona chahiye ab aik gehra saans len aur baen haath ko uthana shuru kar dein pehlay usay samnay le jayen phir aahista aahista oopar karen is door nah karen baazu ko kaan se لگاہوا hona chahiye dayen haath se paon ke khinchte rahen aur usay dayen ko لھے se laga den is andaaz se kharray rahen aur 8 ya 10 taq ginti gnin samnay aik farzi nuqtay ka tasawwur karen aur sarko seedha rakhtay hue usay ghoortay rahen phir saans ko kharij karen aur baen haath ko batadreej neechay le ayen
is ke baad dayen taang ko chore den aur seedha karkay farsh par rakh den
ab baen paon ko baen haath se thaam len paon ka anghutha hatheli mein hona chahiye saans khenchte hue dayan haath batadreej uthayen aap ki airee koolhay se lagi honi chahiye aur dayan baazu kaan se
