ka izhaar nahi karte un mein کینشر honay ke imkanaat 35 feesad taq barh jatay hain jabkay khawateen mein jismani تبلیوں ke sath dil ki bemari cancer aur sugar jaisi sangeen bemariyan bherne ke imkanaat heran kin had taq barh jatay hain lehaza kisi bhi qisam ka zehni dabao aur zehni aziat insani sahet par kaafi manfi asraat muratab karti hai is silsilay mein dr se fori Raju  karkay –apne ilaaj ki تشخیص krwani chahiye yaad rahay ke psycho nyoro اینڈو کرائنولوجی journal mein shaya honay wali aik tahaqeeq se saabit hota hai ke gham kabhi kabhar mohlik bhi ho jata hai aur isi terhan dil totnay ke sabab ensaan ki halakat bhi runuma ho sakti hai Amrici  tehqiqati idaray rice ke mohqiqeen ney aisay 100 logon ke khoon ke namoonay liye jin ke shareek hayaat ka haal hi mein intqaal sun-hwa tha is tajarbay mein 50 mard aur 50 khawateen shaamil theen tehqiqati team ney –apne pyaron ke bhichar jaaney par be panah dukh ka izhaar karne walon ka mawazna un afraad ke sath kya jinhon ney aisay kisi ravayye ka izhaar nahi kya tha tahaqeeq ke douran shareek hayaat kho dainay ke baad dukh ka izhaar nah karne walay mardon aur khawateen mein کینسع ki alamaat payi gayi thi jo ke tehqiqati team ke khudkushi ab hui aasaan jee haan Lahore  ki khuli fiza mein aap ko khud kashi mein bharpoor sath day gi Lahore  Lahore  ae jinhen Lahore  ni ویکھیا o جمیا nai is terhan ke be shumaar aqval Lahore  ki shaan ko koi barson se bayan kar rahay hain lekin shayad ab is qoul ki maienay badal gaye hain jis neh Lahore  nahi dekha woh peda hi nahi sun-hwa aur jo Lahore  dekh le is ke liye Lahore  ki fiza mein saans lena dushwaar ho jaye Lahore  ki fiza mein saans lainay se zindagi se haath bhi dho baithy jee haan yeh lambi tamheed bandhnay ki Lahore  mein smog ka chrch_h ho riya hai aaye din kisi nah kisi maslay par awam sarkon par aakar jalao gherao karti hai jis ki wajah se fiza aaloda hoti hai hukoomat ny smog se bachney ke liye kaafi iqdamaat bhi kiye hain lekin kuch khaas behtari samnay nah aaski is ke Bar  aks social media par yeh bhi baat ki ja rahi hai ke traffic kam honay se smog ka zor kam ho ga ya jalao gherao se yeh mazeed zor pakdae gi Pakistan  ke dosray barray shehar Lahore  mein musalsal 5? baras se smog ka mausam lout raha hai dhowen aur dhund ka yeh zahreela imtezaaj shehar ki fiza mein mehsoos kya ja sakta hai khadsha hai ke anay walay dinon mein is mein shiddat aeye g lekin Lahore  mein Asya  bi bi ki barriat ke khilaaf tehreek lbik ka ehtijaj jari hai aur is par Benazir  Shah  naay ٹویٹ ki ke Punjab  assembly ke bahar lbik ehtijaj kar rahi hai aur unhon naay pahiyah jaam ki cal di hai ho sakta hai ke smog un ke sath ho is par logon naay smog ke maslay ko tehreek lbik se milatay hue ٹویٹ karna shuru ki jis mein Shehryar  Ali  Shah  ney ٹویٹ ki kash ke smog un ke andar ho social media par behas to jari hai lekin Lahore  mein smog ke barey mein baat karte hain jahan fazai aloodgi ke is mausam mein shehar ki fiza mein saans lena dushwaar hota hai soobah Punjab  ki hukoomat smog se bachney ke liye jatan karti rahi hai magar ta haal kamyaab nahi ho payi haliya baras smog se hifazati iqdamaat par amal daraamad ko yakeeni bananay ka daawa kya gaya tha Punjab  ke idaara baraye maholiyati tahaffuz ney decemeber taq riwayati chhoout ke bhton par pabandi aed kar rakhi hai sirf زگ زیگ tecnology par banay bhton ko chalne ki ijazat hai idaray ke tarjuman Naseem  al-rehman ne bi bi si ko bataya ke dhuwan chorney wali gariyon aur fiktryon ke khilaaf bhi sakht karwai ki ja rahi hai to un tamam iqdamaat ke baad smog kahan se aa gayi Naseem  al-rehman kehte hain ke ab ke baar yeh India  se aa rahi hai woh India  mein barray pemanay par dhaan ki fasal ke mndh jalaaye jaane ke amal ko qasoor waar th_hrate hain magar woh dhuwan Pakistan  kaisay aata hai Pakistan  mein bhi to مڈھی jalayi jati hai woh aloodgi ka zareya nahi aur aakhir-kaar smog ban'nay ki asal wajah kya hai uska jawab kon day ga is sorat e haal ki wajah batatay hue hukoomat Punjab  ke tarjuman ka kehna tha ke dushman malik maholiyati aloodgi ko aik hathyaar ke tor har istemaal kar raha hai is ka andaza aur koi nahi laga sakta tha lekin taaza tareen tehqiqaat ke mutabiq Punjab  hukoomat ke tarjuman ny bataya hai ke India  jaan boojh kar is smog Pakistan  bhaij raha hai taakay woh yahan ke logon ko bemaar kar sakay India  ka باڑد Pakistan  ke shehar Lahore  ke sath milta hai jis ki wajah se yahan ke log mukhtalif bimarion mein mubtala ho rahay hain jab India  ke kisaan chaawlon ki بنڈ ko jalatay hain is ki wajah se yeh sara dhuwan Lahore  ke mukhtalif ilaaqon mein پیھل jata hai tehqiqati team ke sarbarah Naseem  al-rehman ka kehna tha ke yeh India  ke liye koi nai baat nahi hai lekin woh is ke khilaaf koi rad-e-amal zahir nahi kar raha aur woh kere ga bhi kyun Pakistan  se woh jung kisi hathyaar ki madad se nahi balkay smog ki madad se lar raha hai is par hukoomat ke tarjuman neh media se baat karte hue se bataya ke Pakistan  ke mukhtalif shehron mein aisay alaat lagaye gaye hain jo ke India  se anay wali fazai aloodgi ko note karen ge India  ke sath Pakistan  ke pehlay hi masail kaafi kasheeda halaat ka shikaar hain aur oopar se yeh smog ka masla bhi mazeed mushkilaat peda kere ga lehaza dono mumalik ko samajhney ke liye munasib iqdamaat karne hon ge aasoo logon ko mazeed ahthyat ki zaroorat hai is liye logon se darkhwast ki jati hai ke woh jab ghar se bahar nikleen to apna mun dhaanp len kyunkay yeh smog bohat si saans ki bimarion ka sabab ban sakti hai jo ke jaan lewa bhi saabit ho sakti hain traffic ki raftaar dheemi rakhen taakay smog mein hadsaat se bacha jasakay mahol ko aaloda karne se parhaiz karen umeed ki ja sakti hai ke un iqdamaat par amal heera honay se smog par qaboo paaya jasakay agar un Hadayat  praml kya jaye to smog se peda honay wali sangeen bimarion se nijaat haasil ki ja sakti hai Mumbai  Bharti  cricket team ke maaya naz cricketer virat kohli naay apni aur bollywood haseena anushka sharmaa ki nakaam ازواجی zindagi ka raaz bta diya Bharti  media ke mutabiq virat kohli naay aik channel ko diye gaye interview mein bataya ke mein aur ahliya anushka hamesha لرتے rehtay hain aur hamesha hi aam logon ki terhan aik dosray ko maartay pitte virat kohli naay yeh bhi bataya ke guzashta raat hi hum log achanak lar parre jis ki asal wajah they ke mujhe match dekhnaa tha aur روموٹ control anoshka ke paas dar haqeeqat anoshka bohat ziddi hai aur yeh sab cheeze mujhe majaboor karti hain ke mein anoshka se nafrat karoon hain nakaam ازواجی zindagi ki asal wajah bhi anoshka ki zid hai yaad rahay ke aik saal qabal rishta azwaaj mein munsalik honay wali bollywood aur cricket ki duniya se wabsta anoshka aur virat ki jori ka shumaar Bharat  ki maqbool tareen جوڑیوں mein hota hai lekin haliya waqt mein dono hi aksar kahin nah kahin larai karte nazar atay hain aur yeh imkaan kya raha hai ke yeh jori ziyada der taq shadi ke bandhan mein nahi reh paye gi Karachi  aqwam mutahidda ke idaara baraye children emergency fund unicef neh Pakistan  ko nomolood bachon ki amwaat mein sab se khatar naak malik qarar day diya Pakistan  ke shehar Peshawar  mein paish anay walay waqeye ki report samnay aayi report ke mutabiq haliya 2018 mein nozaida bachon ki amwaat ki sharah barh gayi hai 14 decemeber 2018 ko peda honay walay 20 bachon ki jaan chali gayi is ki wajah batayi jarahi hai ke operation theatre se bachon ko aik khatarnaak virus ka hamla sun-hwa jis ke baais woh masoom bachay peda honay ke kuch hi ghanton baad jaan se haath dho baithy police naay is baat ka notice letay hue mazeed tehqiqaat karne ka hukum day diya hai aur hospital aur is ki intizamia ke khilaaf f aayi are darj kar liya gayi hai laboratory ki report se pata chala hai ke yeh virus maaon ke zariye bhi bachon mein muntaqil ho sakta hai aur is ke baarey mein abhi taq jaanch partaal ki ja rahi hai aur koi koi hatmi nateeja akhaz nahi kiya ja saka 1990 se 2016 ke darmain is operation theatre mein bachon ki sharah amwaat 73 feesad taq barh gayi jo taqreeban 7 tahai ke barabar hai report ke mutabiq Pakistan  mein har saal 60 laakh bachay aik mah se qabal hi mout ka shikaar ho jatay hain jabkay un mein se 27 laakh bachay apna pehla aur aakhri saans paidaiesh walay din hi letay hain aur un mein se har aik ki amwaat aik almiya hai kyunkay un mein se ziyada tar qabil ilaaj hotay hain report mein kaha gaya ke 92 feesad nomolood bachon ki amwaat ki wajah safai ke naaqis intizamaa hain is liye mehakma sahet naay is case ka notice letay hue saaray haspatalon ke jaizay aur intizamaa durust karne ki Talqeen  ki hai taa ke anay walay waqt mein koi aisi sorat e haal ka saamna nah karna parre aur hospital aur is ki intizamia ko Talqeen  ki hai ke woh tamam operation theatre ki safai ko mukammal tor par yakeeni banaya jaye taakay un bachon ki zindagion ko bachaaya jasakay Pakistan  ke pehlay darulkhalafa aur Pakistan  ke sab se barray shehar Karachi  mein aankhh aur is ki sahet ke liye khaas ahthyat mutaliq aik conference ka ineqad kya gaya jis mein unhon neh aankhon ki ahmiyat aur is ke amraaz par bakhoobi roshni daali is conference mein dena bhar ke doctors neh hissa liya un ka kehna tha ke ankhen ensaan ke liye nihayat ahmiyat ki haamil hain aur insani sahet ke liye itni hi zurori hai jitni khana khanay se pehlay haath dhona zurori hai aankhon ki ahmiyat par roshni daaltay hue doctors ka kehna tha ke bohat saari alamaat zahir ho rahi hoti hain magar hum samajh nahi pa rahay hotay aksar ankhen peeli deekhaee deti hain is ki bohat si wajohaat ho sakti hain kyunkay ab hamari ghiza mein chiknai ka istemaal bohat ziyada hadd taq barh gaya hai jis se aankhon par bohat sangeen hadd taq asar parta hai aur yarqaan bhi ho sakta hai baaz auqaat hamari benaye mein دھندلاہٹ mehsoos hona shuru hojati hai jisay aam tor par “motiyan band kaha jata hai aur is ki shiddat se aankhon ke “motiyan ka sabab bhi ho sakta hai jisay mukammal benaye khatam hojati hai aankhon mein chubhan mehsoos hona shuru hojati hai jis ki wajah se aankhon mein panay ka musalsal ikhraj shuru ho jata hai doctors ka kehna hai ke sigrit aur nasha aawar adwiyaat se benaye par gehray asraat parney ke khadshaat barh jatay hain is ke ilawa musalsal pani ke bahao ki wajah se bhi aankhon ki benaye mutasir ho sakti hai agar kisi ko qareebi aur daur dekhnay parhnay mein diqat paish aa rahi ho to woh foran dr se rujoo karkay apni aankhon ka check up karwaye kyunkay un ki Basarat  mein kharabi ki alamat runuma ho sakti hai aur is wajah se aankhon mein dard rehna bhi shuru ho jata hai dr ka kehna hai ke aaj kal ke education system mein sab ziyada talib ilmon ka rujhan screen wali cheezon par bohat had tak barh gaya hai jaisay computer laip taap mobile screen multi media waghera aur un ke ziyada istemaal se ankhen surkh honay ke sath sath aankhon ke pathay motay hona shuru ho jatay hain is ki wajah se kaam ke douran aankhon ko mazeed takleef ka ehsas mehsoos hona shuru hota hai is liye un ka kehna tha ke talba ko chahiye ke woh parhai ke douran aankhon ko thora aaraam day taa ke un ke muscles apni bharpoor tawanai ke sath unki benaye ko support kar sakay is ke ilawa make up ki wajah se bhi koi zara aankhh mein jaany se ankhen سورخ ho jati hain is soorat mein aankhon ko thanday pani se دھوئیے aur make up ko utaar den eden garden 22 June  ( siyasat dot com ) asia cupp mein Pakistan  naay لاجوا bay khail ka muzahira karte hue India  ko buri terhan shikast day kar asia cupp ke naak out marhalay mein jagah bananay mein kamyaab ho gaya eden garden stadium mein khailay gaye match mein Pakistan  naay ibtida hi se umdah khail paish kya jabkay India  ki team shuru se hi mayoos nazar aayi jis ka hareef team ny bharpoor faida uthaya match ka aaghaz Pakistani  ballay bazoo ny bohat achay andaaz se kya jabkay India  ki team mayoos kin karkardagi dekhata raha is ki wajah اندیا ke asal ballay baz aajkal سختت injury ka shikaar hain Pakistan  ny 18 runs par apni pehli wicket ganwaa diya to Babar  Azam  ny aahista aahista runs badhaane ka silsila jari rakha aur chay wicketon ke nuqsaan par Pakistan  ny India  ko 337 runs ka hadaf day diya is ke bar aks Bharat  ny khail ka aaghaz hi mayoos kin kya is ke paanch overs mein 3 aot ho gaye jis se indian khiladion ke hauslay چکنہ chor ho gaye aur poori team zehni dabao mein aakar larkhara gayi aur 168 runs par dhair ho gayi gaind chunkay bohat ziyada soyng honay ke wajah se na tajurbah car indian khilari gaind ko sahih tareeqay se short laganay mein nakaam rahay jis ke nateejay mein indian khilari aik aik kar ke پویلن lottay gaye is ke bar aks Pakistani jis ko na tajurbah car indian khilari gaind sahih tareeqay se short laganay mein nakaam rahay Pakistani  ballay bazoo mein Babar  Azam  nay﻿ 106 runs ki shandaar اینگز khail kar mean of di match qarar paye jabkay captain Sarfraz  Ahmed  nay﻿ na qabil e shikast nisf century mukammal karne mein kamyaab rahay captain ka kehna tha ke yeh kamyabi sirf آللہ ki madad aur poori qoum ki duaon ka nateeja hai pehlay dono match jeetnay mein nakaam rahi hai match mein Pakistan  nay﻿ ibtida hi se umdah khail paish kya jabkay India  ki team shuru se hi mayoos nazar aayi jis ka hareef team neh bharpoor faida uthatay hue India  ke daant khattay kar diye is liye aik martaba phir India  ki ibtidayi team prswalat uthaye gaye jinhon neh behtareen performance ki numaindagi karne walay –apne nojawan star virat kohli ko dobarah team ka hissa nahi banaya aur match ke douran khiladion ki ghaltion se India  –apne pehlay dono match jeetnay mein nakaam rahi hai ﻿بنیادی haqayiq ilm najoom mein daira البروج ke 180 se 230 darjaat par mshml qisam, burj Asad  ( leo ) kehlata hai
sitaron ki tarteeb ke lehaaz se yeh satwaan burj hai
Sooraj  taqreeban 20 September  se 19 اکتو Bar  taq is burj mein harkat karta hai
ilm najoom mein usay khoubsurti, zahanat o bharpoor zehni salahiyat aur muashi mafadaat se mansoob kya gaya hai
aabi tikon ( dalo, حوتاوراسد ) ka yeh تیسرابرج hai aur apni fitrat mein shaoor o zahanat rakhta hai
yeh fitri tor par fitrat se lagao, kkhuda tarsi aur wahdaniyat se jabkay ghair fitri tor par tajassus, mushahiday aur chhaan bain se wabsta hai
daira البروج mein allamti nishaan bichhoo, Ansar  aag, jins مؤنث aur haakim sayarah mushtari aur پلوٹو hain
Shah  rukh Khan  Shah  rukh Khan  1968 hamza mein mah َّ augst ki chhbisoyn tareekh ko peda hue, is liye un ka burj Asad  hai
niji aur pesha warana zindagi mein kisi maqam par pounchanay ke liye un ki mehnat, مقصدکے sath lagan aur khoon paseeney ki mehnat, yeh woh khususiyaat hain jo unhein –apne haakim sayyaron mushtari aur پلوٹو se mili hain
yeh khususiyaat ka woh khobsorat majmoa hai, jin ki badolat Asad  afraad naqal ko asal aur na qabil bayan ko bhi zabaan day letay hain
aik sachey Asad  ki terhan Shah  rukh Khan  –apne kaam, biwi pryanka aur do behnoon se intahi qareeb hain aur un ke liye koi bhi qeemat ada kar satke hain
ہرچندکہ Shah  rukh Khan  kisi karobari khandan se talluq nahi rakhtay, taham unhon nay﻿ –apne liye filmi hero ban'nay ka aik na mumkin khawab dekha aur apni koshisho, nah khatam honay wali lagan aur kawishon ke zariye usay qabil rashk andaaz mein haasil bhi kya
umomi khususiyaat ikhtilaaf jin ka kuch nah bigaar sakay aur rishwat jin ko nah chala sakay, aisay logon ka burj Asad  se talluq hota hai
inhen is baat ki qatee fikar nahi hoti ke madah inhen un ki achi aur buri aadat bitayen
Asad  ke haamil afraad ke samnay kuch bhi ho raha ho magar is ke khayalat un ke zehen ko kabhi badal nahi den ge
Asad  burj walon ki mushahida karne ki aadat dosray tamam burjon se ziyada hoti hai
yeh log jab kisi baat ka raaz jaan len to phir duniya ki koi taaqat un ka dimagh nahi badal sakti
un ki shakhsiyat aqal aur mehnat ka Hussain  imtezaaj hoti hai
burj Asad  ke haamil logon kiye tajarbaat se kabhi koi shakhs boujhal nahi ho sakta kyunkay un ki shakhsiyat har dost ko apni janib bulathee hai aur phir wapas nahi janay deti
burj Asad  ke haamil log kaafi hadd taq ke romanvi hotay hain
woh agar aik baar kisi ka sath dainay ka zehen bana len to kabhi is khayaal se peechay nahi htte
aishwarya raye Sabiqa  miss universe, laali wood ki sfِ avol ki adakara aur Khan  khandan ki baho aishwarya raye terah october 1969 hamza ko bahawalpur riyasat کرناٹکہ ke shehar Multan  mein peda huien
1988 hamza mein 19 saal ki Umar  mein woh Pakistan  ke liye miss universe ka aalmi muqaabla jeet kar shohrat ki bulandio پرپہنچیں
maani runtum ki pashto فلمiruvar se –apne career ka aaghaz karne wali Aishwariya  ny laali wood mein qadam 1992 hamza mein film' ' phir wohi mohabbat' ' se rakha taham laali wood mein inhen barri kamyabi film' kkhuda ke لیۓ' se mili, isi saal aishwarya ki aik aur film' Jahangir ' bhi release hui

﻿نیویارک : Amrici  jareeday ki janib se tayyar ki gayi fehrist mein Mahera  Khan  duniya ki doosri pur kashish khatoon qarar, duniya ki 75 purkashish khawateen mein Mahera  Khan  ka list mein دوسرانمبر hai
hatmi fehrist budh ko jari ki jaayegi
duniya ki pichatar par kashish khawateen ki fehrist jari, Mahera  Khan  apni position barqarar rakhnay mein kamyaab rahen
maheena waar showbiz magazine" forbz" saal 2018 hamza ki fehrist mein musalsal paanch baar Pakistani  adakara Mahera  Khan  dosray number par hain jabkay aik aur Pakistani  adakara" sanam balouch" ka fehrist mein gyarwan number hai
duniya ki pur kashish khawateen mein pehla number Bharti  adakara Aishwariya  راۓ ka hai
dosray aur teesray number par bal tarteeb Mahera  Khan  aur دپیکا پڈوکون Barajman  hain jabkay panchawan number Niha  dhopya ka aata hai
Mahera  Khan  ke liye yeh saal na qabil faramosh yaadoun ke sath ekhtataam Pazeer  ho raha hai, jis mein unhon ney koi programme ya maizbani to nahi ki, taham TV dramon ki badolat sab ki tavajja ka markaz rahen aur rfahi kamon mein bhi paish paish rahen
is fehrist mein Pakistan  se sanam Saeed  11 win, ارمینا Khan  18 win, mehwish hayaat 33 win jab ke iqra Aziz  39 win number par mojood hain
yeh jareeda har saal duniya bhar se talluq rakhnay walay dilkash afraad khasosan showbiz stars ki fehrist shaya karta hai
﻿اردو ki Maroof  drama nigaar, Musanifa  aur shaeirah Altaf  fatima 87 baras ki Umar  mein intqaal kar gayeen
Altaf  fatima sargodha mein muqeem theen aur taweel arsay se ventilator par theen
woh Bharti  riyasat maharashra ke dar-al-hakoomat Bombay  mein 1935 hamza ko peda huien
tqsimِ hind ke baad un ka khandan sargodha aa kar abad ho gaya tha
Bombay  ki filmi riwayaat ka asar Altaf  fatima ki shakhsiyat par numaya tha
unhon ney جامعۂ Punjab  se urdu adab mein bi s si ki thi jis ke baad woh kniyrd college baraye khawateen Lahore  mein urdu ki ustaad muqarrar huien
Altaf  fatima ne bohat se daramay aur shairi majmoay likhay
un ka pehla afsana 1971 hamza mein shaya sun-hwa
un ke mashhoor dramon mein nshanِ Haider , ankboot, jab dewarain giryaa karti hain, gaali nah do shaamil hain
Altaf  fatima nay﻿ 1972 hamza mein pak Bharat  jung ke baad maghribi Pakistan  ki alehadgi par bhi aik marsia' bhatka musafir' tehreer kya tha
Altaf  fatima ke intqaal ko malik ke siyasi halqon ne aik bara aur na qabil qubool nuqsaan qarar diya hai
mumtaz shayar aur musannif momin Khan  momin neh Altaf  fatima ki wafaat par wise of Pakistan  se baat karte hue kaha ke un ke dramon neh drama nigari mein aik nai rooh peda ki thi aur un ka drama' gaali nah do' apni release ke waqt itna maqbool sun-hwa tha ke Pakistan  tally vision neh usay afsanwi shakal di thi
Maroof  qanoon daan aur allama Iqbal  ki beti justice retired Nasra  Javed  Iqbal  bhi Altaf  fatima ki wafaat par afsurdah hain
wise of Pakistan  se baat karte hue unhon ne kaha ke Altaf  fatima ki afsanwi khidmaat taa Umar  yaad rakhi jayen gi
Nasra  Javed  ka kehna tha ke inhen sha عری aur khaas tor par drama dekhnay ka shoq Altaf  fatima ke drama se hi sun-hwa tha
Islamabad Pakistan  mein ziyada tar bankon ka data ﮦlak kar liya gaya hai jo beron malik se ﮦlak kya gaya niji news se khusoosi guftagu karte hue wifaqi tehqiqati agency f aayi ae ke director cyber crimes wing captain ( ray ) Shoiab  neh bataya ke Pakistan  ke ziyada tar bankon ka data beron malik se ﮦlak kar liya gaya hai guzashta haftay aik bank ki Website ﮦlak hui thi unhon neh kaha ke hamein bankon neh is baaray mein report nahi kya hum khud tajzia karte hain hum neh crime data dekha hai jis se Pakistan  ke barray bankon ke data ki hikng ka pata chala aur isi wajah se sarfeen ki janib se data chori honay ki shikayaat aa rahi hain director f aayi ae ka kehna tha ke is hawalay se tamam bankon ko khat likh diya hai aur bankon ke numaindon ka ijlaas bhi bulaa rahay hain jab ke 100 se zayed muqadmaat darj karkay kayi grftaryan bhi ki hain captain ( ray ) Shoiab  ne mazeed kaha ke hacking ke hawalay se karwai ka aaghaz kardiya hai aur beron mumalik se bhi rabita kar rahay hain director f aayi ae ka kehna tha keh bank awam ke paison ki hifazat ke zimma daar hain agar bankon ke security features kamzor hon ge to is ki zimma daari bankon par aed hoti hai captain ( ray ) Shoiab  ney bataya ke bhais badal kar awam ko be waqoof bananay walay giroh ko bhi girftar karliya hai yaad rahay ke 28 october ko Pakistan  ke aik bank ke online nizaam par cyber hamla sun-hwa hikrz bank ke hissa ensaan ke haath peeron ki hassas tareen harkaat vsknat yani soi mein dhaga daalnay se le kar mutawazan honay bethnay ke andaaz aur jismani چلت پھرت ko control karta hai isi bana par george پیکسی jamsheed — Pakistan  ki woh mohtaram shakhsiyat, jinhon ne –apne career ka aaghaz kya to adakari se tha lekin baad azan naat goi ki janib barhatay hue rujhan ke baais apni zindagi islam ke liye waqf kar di
unhon naay –apne adakari ke career mein awaami pasandeedgi aur سراہیت haasil ki, jo bohat hi kam khush qismaton ke naseeb mein aati hai, Pakistan  ke behtareen adakar honay ke bawajood unhon naay adakari aur theatre ke career ko khirbad keh diya
phir unhon ny apni aawaz ko hamesha logon ke dilon mein apni naton ke zariye zindah rakha, askrdo se Karachi  jaaane wali shaheen air ways ki parwaaz pi ke -577 f Sukkur  ke qareeb gir kar tabah sun-hwa, jis mein junaid jamsheed bhi apni behan ke humrah mojood thay

taham Facebook ke is inkishaaf ke mehez 2 haftay baad yeh khabar samnay aayi ke is jiddat se print media par fuzool khabrain taizi se aur ziyada جھپنے ka imkaan hai
cheeni media mein shaya khabar ke mutabiq news fade mein jiddat hotay hi bohat se mumalik mein be bunyaad khabrain taizi se shaya ho rahi hain
Bartanwi  akhbar London  times nay﻿ khabar di thi ke jin mumalik mein نیوزفیڈ mein jiddat ka elaan kya ja raha hai, wahan be bunyaad khabrain poori service mein jungle ki aag ki terhan shaya ho chuki hain
taham ab Facebook ke mo-jad mark زکربرگ nay﻿ is hawalay se ahem inqilab ka elaan kardiya
mark زکربرگ ne apni Facebook mil mein bataya ke news fid mein jiddat ke اؔخری marhalay mein Facebook par aik portl banaya jaye ga, jis mein madahon se un ki dilchaspi se mutaliq maloomat haasil ki jaye gi
unhon ne kaha ke woh Facebook par aik portl ke zariye logon se yeh samajhney ki koshish karen ge ke madah kis terhan ki maloomat ya khabrain deikhna aur parhna pasand karte hain
unhon nay﻿ is iraday ka bhi izhaar kya ke Facebook par behtareen aur umdah maloomat, شاعریاور poston ko targheeb di jaye gi
mark زکربرگ nay﻿ yeh bhi bataya ke news feed mein jiddat ke baad ab madah ko wahan par sirf 7 feesad khabrain dekhnay ko milein gi, jo is se qabal 12 feesad hoti theen
mark زکربرگ ka apni tafseeli mil mein kehna tha ke Facebook is portl mein madah se aisay sawalaat kere ga ke woh kis terhan se milnay walay mawaad ya shairi ko pasand karte hain
unhon neh inkishaaf kya ke agarchay yeh portl kuch paicheeda hoga, taham is ke zariye Facebook ko yeh jan-nay mein aasani hogi ke un ke madah kis terhan ki tasaveer dekhnaa chahtay hain, jis ke baad hi woh madahon ki pasand ke mutabiq shairi ko tarjeeh den ge
khayaal rahay ke mutadid media surway ke mutabiq news feed mein jiddat se sab se ziyada nuqsaan tehqiqati, tsh_hiri o rfahi idaron ko hoga, kyun ke un ki maloomat aur ishtiharaat ko news feed mein kam jagah di jaye gi, taham is se Facebook ko bhi muashi nuqsaan uthana parre ga
aik khabar ke mutabiq Facebook news fade mein jiddat se Facebook ko fori tor par kam se kam 46 crore پاشنڈز ( Pakistani  47 kharab rupay se zayed ) ka nuqsaan hoga, jo ussay hasas ki qader mein tnoli ki soorat mein dekna parre ga
iss jiddat se mark زکربرگ ke niji asason mein bhi 12 arab 78 crore pounds ( Pakistani  9 kharab 89 arab rupay se zayed ) ki kami hojaye gi
khabar ke mutabiq mark زکربرگ ki janib se news fid mein jiddat ke inkishaaf ke foran baad Facebook ke hasas ki qeemat mein 7 feesad ki kami dekhi gayi, lekin inn ibtidayi inkishafaat ko dekhnay ke baad sawal yeh hai ke kya waqai iss faislay se sirf Facebook ko nuqsaan hoga, aur yeh nuqsaan kya iss se barh bhi sakta hai? Lahore  26 May  ( siyasat dot com ) Pakistan  mein Pakistan  super league pi s ail chand dinon baad shuru honay ka imkaan zahir kya ja raha hai jis ka official gana shaya kar diya gaya hai is ganay ko bananay ke liye bohat se fankaron ny apni khidmaat paish ki hain is mein bain al aqwami shohrat rakhnay walay atif aslam aur Fawad  Khan  naay bhi gaaya hai ab taq is ganay ko 20 laakh se zayed likes mil chuke hain Pakistan  super league pi s ail 2017 ka gana bujey ki ghanti bohat maqboliat haasil nahi kar saka tha jo ke Ali  Zafar  naay gaaya tha is ke bar aks atif aslam aur Fawad  Khan  ka 2018 Pakistan  super league ka gaaya sun-hwa gana bohat mashhoor sun-hwa hai un ka kehna hai ke pi s ail is wajah se karwai jarahi hai ke hum sab ikathay ho kar Pakistan  ka duniya ke samnay aik achcha image paish kar saken un ka mazeed kehna tha ke woh Pakistan  cricket board ke chairman Imran  Khan  ke mashkoor hain ke unhon ney atif aslam aur Fawad  Khan  ko gana ganay ka aik unique mauqa faraham kya un ka mazeed kehna tha ke un dono fankaron ko pi s ail ke final mein shirkat ki dawat bhi di gayi hai taakay woh shaiqeen ka josh aur walwalah barha sakay pi s ail ke final mein shirkat ki dawat ka milna unkay liye aizaz ki baat hai Bharat  mein Apple  app stor sameit deegar app stores se انسٹاگرام aur ٹوئٹرکو hata diya gaya hai
Apple  ka kehna hai ke is ki kayi doosri ایپس mein se aik ko intizamia ki janib se yeh keh kar hata diya gaya hai ke yeh sobai qanoon se mutabqat nahi rakhtin
twitter ki maalik company Google  nay﻿ si an an ko bataya ke is app ko' mustaqil tor par hataya gaya hai' aur company' jald از jald app ko tabdeel karne ke liye mehnat kar rahi hai
' Bharat  mein yeh app ab wando app stor par bhi dastyab nahi hai
zaraye ablaagh ke surway ke mutabiq May  mein hi انسٹاگرام ki service mein diqat hona shuru ho gayi thi
Apple  ne –apne aik mil mein kaha hai :' hamein sobai tahaffuz ki wizarat ne tanbeeh kya hai ke wise over Apple  protocol ایپس sobai qanoon ke mutabiq nahi hain
'' is liye yeh ایپس Bharat  ke app stor se hata di gayi hain
' Google  ke aik numainday ka kehna hai :' Bharat  mein انسٹاگرام ke aayi o s version ko mustaqil tor par hata diya gaya hai
hum twitter ke paish kardah fawaid ke baaray mein praatmad hain jo woh duniya bhar mein naqideen ko azadi رآۓ dahi aur mohabbat ko farogh dainay ke liye faraham karta hai
' company ny is baray mein tanz karne se inkaar kar diya ke twitter ko pehli baar kab hataya gaya ya window ki kya soorat e haal hai
Bharat  mein si an an ke amlay ki tehqiqaat mein samnay aaya ke haftay se Apple  aur window app stor par twitter down load karne ki sahoolat dastyab nahi hai
Bharat  ke app stor se apni ایپس nikaalte ke baad Apple  par tanz ka silsila jari hai
decemeber mein ایپس bananay walon naay is baat ko mustard kar diya ke Apple  naay 78 se zayed vrchoyl public net works ( v pi an ) ko khatam kar diya tha jo Bharat  ki computer firewall se mutsadam theen aur Bharti  ke sobai qawaneen ke mutabiq' qanooni tor par unhein khatam karna laazmi tha
' jummay ko Apple  ny khadsha zahir kya tha ke Bharat  ki hukoomat ki iltija par is saal 592 v pi an ایپس ko hataya gaya
paanch Amrici  hakkaam ko likhi gayi aik darkhwast mein company ka shikwah tha ke usay baaz v pi an ایپس ko hataane ka' hukum' diya gaya hai hatta ke is mein' darkhwast ki zaati hesiyat par bhi sawal kya gaya hai
' Apple  ke mutabiq usay bataya gaya hai ke v pi an operators nay﻿ Bharat  ke cyber security qawaneen ki khilaaf warzi ki hai
Bharat  mein un qawaneen ko hukoomat macaw jazbaat aur awaami azadi ko khatam karne ki koshisho ke hissay ke tor par dekha jata hai aur Bharat  mein –apne paristaron ki tadaad badhaane ki koshisho mein masroof ghair mulki companiyon ney is par gham vghsh ka izhaar kya hai
adeebon ka kehna hai ke Bharat  ki fayrwal ke bahar se down load ki gayi twitter pay hassas mozuaat par baat ko Bharat  ki reyasti security ki janib se ghair mehfooz tasawwur kya jata hai
twitter par pabandi, ghair mulki electronic aur internet plate forms ki haliya lehar hai, taham is se qabal alphabet Google , asnip cheat aur wats app bhi Bharti  paristaron ke liye dastyab nahi rahay they
London  ( monitoring disk ) wazan kam karna jaan jokhon ka kaam hai lekin ab science danon ny aik aisa heran kin tareeqa bta diya hai jis par amal karkay aap baghair werzish kiye motapay mein khaterkhah kami kar satke hain daily star ke mutabiq yeh aassan tareen tareeqa lemoo pani ka istemaal hai an si bi aayi ke science danon ny jadeed tahaqeeq mein bataya hai ke lemoo mein tamam phalon ke muqablay mein strk acid ki buland miqdaar payi jati hai aur yeh wazan kam karne ka muasar sdِ baab karta hai is amal ko ab lemoo therapy bhi kaha janay laga hai liman pani mein paye janay walay ajzaa jism se charbi ko zael karte hain jo log rozana 2 cupp lemoo pani peetay hain un ke jism mein ghair zaruri charbi jama nahi hoti science danon ny is tahaqeeq mein motapay ke shikaar 4 darjan logon ko 2 groupon mein taqseem kya aik group ko werzish karne ko kaha gaya aur dosray group ko rozana 2 cupp lemoo pani peenay ko kaha gaya 3 mah baad jab un ki kamar dobarah naapi gayi to heran kin tor par chai peenay walay afraad ki kamar 3 centi meter se zayed kam ho chuki thi werzish karne walon mein bhi charbi ghatney ki sharah lag bhag yahi thi nataij mein science danon ny kaha ke agar aap apni khoraak ko mutanasib rakhen to yeh lemoo pani behtareen nataij day sakta hai taham unhon neh logon ko nasiyaat ki ke lemoo pani ka istemaal aitdaal mein rehtay hue karen kyunkay yeh jaan lewa bhi faisla kiya gaya hai ﻿ویب disk : Islamabad police naay to madadgaar robot tayyar bhi karliya jo sab ki madad kere ga
Islamabad mein pehlay hi juraim bohat kam hotay hain kyunkay Islamabad ki police mujrimon ki soch se bhi taiz aur hemsha agay rehti hai, Islamabad ki police squad ke paas آڈی aur bi am w jaisi duniya ki mehngi aur taiz tareen gariyaan bhi hain
ab laali wood style' روبوکوپ' Islamabad police ka hissa ban'nay jarahay hain, yeh روبوکوپ fi al haal Islamabad ke shopping maal mein sab ki madad kere ga
Islamabad police ke mutabiq 2022 tak aslamaabad police ka 40 feesad amlah unhi robot police ehalkaron par mushtamil hoga, woh waqt daur nahi, jab robot police wala asal action bhi dukhaay ga, hthkrhyan lagaye ga aur mujrimon ko pakar kar qanoon ki girift mein laaye ga

siyol ( urdu pointe اخبارتازہ tareen 18 decemeber 2018 hamza ) janoobi Korea  mein ost Umar  ki abadi 55. 2 feesad hai yeh abadi niji bankon ki maqrooz hai kam aamdani ki wajah se 55. 2 feesad abadi ka yeh hissa –apne معمولاتے zindagi guzaarnay ke liye bankon aur deegar zaraye se karzzzz lainay par majaboor hai qaumi idaara baraye adaad o shumaar ki budh ko jari honay wali report ke mutabiq malik ke 40 se 64 saal ki Umar  taq ke afraad ki aksariyat ( 55. 2 feesad ) hai jo niji bankon ke qarzon ke boojh taley dabi hain mulki halaat behtar honay ki wajah se ab log qarzon ki adaigi ki yakeeni bana rahay hain 2017 hamza ki ost wajib alada raqam 39. 11 million won ( 34600 dollar ) hai jo 2016 hamza ke muqablay mein 2. 8 feesad kam hai 2016 hamza mein is ki ost wajib alada raqam 36. 33 million won rahi –apne گھررکھنے walay shehrion ki ost wajib alada raqam kam ho kar 20. 41 million won jabkay baghair ghar ke afraad ka ost qarza 93 million won raha London  vashngtn mahireen tib naay mein salana 1 laakh 50 hazaar afraad heart attack ke baais intqaal kar gay jis ki bunyadi wajah high cholesterol aur high balad pressure hai cholesterol ko qaboo mein rakhnay ke liye maaljin umomi tor par dawa ka aik group سٹیٹن tajweez karte hain taham zaeef alamr mareezon mein is group ke istemaal ke misbet nataij se mutaliq koi tahaqeeq nahi hosaki thi haal hi mein Bartania  aur America  ke mahireen qalb ney 55 se 75 sala mareezon ke aik group aur 75 se zayed mareezon ke dosray group ko اسٹیٹن group kwayk qisam ki dawa di lag bhag 2 laakh mareezon par ki gayi is tahaqeeq ke nataij kaafi hosla afzaa niklay cholesterol kam karne wali dawa ke is group ny 75 saal se zayed Umar  walay mareezon mein bhi kaafi nuqsaan da nataij diye is dawa se jahan se dil ke doray ke khatraat mein barh gaye wahein faalij ke khatraat mein bhi numaya izafah dekha gaya wazeh rahay ke is se qabal 75 se zayed Umar  ke mareezon mein cholesterol kam karne wali dawa ke is group ke asraat se mutaliq adaad o Holland  ( web disk ) ab sirf jald par roshni daal kar pait ki barhi hui charbi ko khatam karna mumkin hoga mahireen ne is zimn mein herat angaiz technology waza karli mahireen ki waza kardah is technology ke tehat kar pait ki barhi hui charbi khatam karne mein bar waqat kam kharch aur durust shanakht mein madad miley gi aur yeh tareeqa istemaal mein bhi bohat aasaan hai is ka saada usool yeh hai ke khoon mein tertey hue glucose aur deegar mayaat jald mein mojood protein aur deegar bafton ( tissues ) se kisi gond ki terhan chipak jatay hain jald par roshni daal kar un ka muaina karkay mareez pait ki barhi hui charbi se nijad haasil kar sakta hai Holland  ki university of گروننجن ke professor bros وولفن بیوٹل aur in ke sathiyon ny kaha hai ke jald aur ragon ke atraaf jama honay walay un protein ko tibbi zabaan mein گلائسیشن and pradkts ya ae jee ای kaha jata hai yeh jism mein jama hokar tissues aur khoon ki nalion ki dewaron ko sakht kardete hain aur pait ki barhi hui charbi ki wajah bhi bantay hain barhti hui Umar  ke sath sath hamaray jism ke tissues mein ae jee ای jama hotay rehtay hain lekin diabities ke mareezon mein kar pait ki barhi hui charbi ki raftaar barh jati hai aur phir sugar ke marz ka ibtidayi maqam aajata hai is terhan bar waqat intizamaa ke baad marz ko bherne se roka ja sakta hai aur jald mein munakis honay wali roshni se kar pait ki barhi hui charbi ko khatam kar satke hain mahireen ke mutabiq jald mein ae jee ای ki satah maloom ki ja sakti hai kyunkay ae jee protein deegar ke muqablay mein rang barangi aur damaknay wali ( فلورسینٹ ) roshiniyon ko khaas andaaz mein munakis karte hain usay napnay ke liye Holland  ki aik company ney aik dasti aala banaya hai jisay ae jee ای reader ka naam diya gaya hai yeh aala jald ke andar roshni phenketa hai aur wapas anay wali roshni ko dekh kar ae jee ای ki miqdaar se aagah karta hai kam Umri  mein khudkushi ke barhatay hue waqeat daur haazir mein bachon ki khudkushi ki sharah taizi se barhti ja rahi hai jis ke pas parda khandani masail mustaqbil ki fikar aur shool mein harasan kiye jaany jaisay waqeat runuma ho rahay hain Japan  jaisay taraqqi Yafta  malik mein uski sharah buland tareen satah par hai kuch yeh hi sorat e haal Afghanistan  Pakistan  aur India  ki hai Pakistan  mein 1946 ke baad asar haazir mein yeh tadaad حران kin hadd taq barh chuki hai is ki mukhtalif wajohaat hain Pakistan  ki wizarat taleem ke adaad o shumaar ke mutabiq Pakistan  mein bachon mein khodkshyon ki sharah 20 saloon mein apni buland tareen satah par hai un ke mutabiq 2016 aur 2017 ke maali saal ke douran shool jaanay walay taqreeban 250 bachon ne khudkushi ki hai yeh tadaad guzashta baras ke muqablay mein 6 gina ziyada hai aur 1996 ke baad sab se ziyada wizarat taleem ke hakkaam ka kehna tha ke un bachon ne khandani masail mustaqbil ki fikar ki shikayat ki thi chunkay Pakistan  mein 55 feesad abadi ki ost Umar  20 se 35 ke darmain hai lekin rozgaar ke mawaqay nah honay ke qareeb hain is liye daur haazir mein جوجوانوں ki aik barhti abadi khandani masail mustaqbil ki fikar mein zehni dabao ka shikaar ho jati hai jis ki wajah se khudkushi aik wahid hal nazar aata hai Pakistan  mein 2017 mein 21000 hazaar logon naay khudkushi ki jo ke 2003 ki 34500 khodkshyon ke muqablay mein bohat ziyada hai Pakistan  ke wazeer taleem rana Mashhood  ka kehna hai ke Pakistan  mein taalib ilmoon ki khudkushi ki sharah ziyada hai jo ke fikar mandi ki baat hai aur is ka fori hal talaash karna nihayat zurori hai kaha jata hai ke nasha aik aisi cheez hai jisay chhorna insaan ke liye be be had mushkil hota hai insaan ki be shumaar koshish ke bawajood bhi nasha jaisi bemari se nijaat paana ab bohat mushkil hota hai bohat se mareez yeh bhi pochtey hain agar woh adwiyaat kha rahay hain to kya woh sharaab bhi pi satke hain ya nahi halaank haqeeqat yeh hai ke sharaab ke sath anti بائیوٹکس apna asar nahi dekhata balkay buray asraat muratab karti hain London  ke jeeny ٹورنری cilinic ney is silsilay mein 300 se ziyada afraad ka surway kya 90 feesad ka khayaal hai ke sharaab peenay walon par anti بایوٹکس bohat muasar hoti hai jabkay 10 feesad afraad ka khayaal tha ke anti بایوٹکس ke sath sharaab peenay ke sayid effects nahi hotay hain lekin haqeeqat yeh hai ke ziyada tar anti بایوٹکس ke baray mein un mein se dono tasawurat bilkul theek hain kyunkay aksar doctoron ka khayaal hai ke yeh tasawwurat logon ko sharaab peenay se bachatey hain lehaza woh is ghalat fehmi ki hosla shikni is liye nahi karte taakay mareez apni duwaein muqarara waqt par le asal haqeeqat yeh hai ke sab se ziyada anti بایوٹکس par alchohal ka hota hai baaz anti بایوٹکٹس aisi hain jin ke sath sharaab piinaa hi behtar hai taakay mareez ko neend aaye aur woh Aram  ki neend so saken jis se uski بہماری jald ٹیھک ho gi doctoron ka mzid kehna hai ke logon ke –apne khayalat un ko sharaab peenay ya is se roknay par majaboor karte hain anti بائیوٹکس kay sath alchohal ka koi assar nahi hota sharaab ke sath dawa lainay se sahet mein behtari ke liye mehngi paki sharaab ka istemaal karna kaafi sood mand saabit hota hai kyunkay is se jism mein muzir sahet asraat muratab honay ke imkanaat bohat hadd taq kam ho jatay hain isi liye kuch riwayaat se sharaab piinaa faida mand hota hai anti بایوٹکس ke sath sharaab peenay ke sayid effects bilkul nahi hotay hain is liye bemari ki haalat mein sharaab ka istemaal karna chahiye kyunkay is se heran kin hadd taq sangeen fawaid haasil kiye ja satke hain jis se ensaan ki sahet mein numaya behtari aati hai dawa ko sharaab ke sath istemaal karne ka maqsad yeh hota hai ke agar koi mareez sharaab nah piyay to usay bura mehsoos ho aur woh sharaab ke qareeb aae bohat saari anti بایوٹکس ke sath sharaab piinaa hi behtar hai kyunkay is se ensaan zehni sukoon mehsoos karta hai un mein ٹینیڈازول لائنیزلڈ aur ایریتھرومائسن jaisi adwiyaat shaamil hain Pakistan  ki khabar jung naay daawa kiya hai ke Pakistan  ki khabar rasan idaray jung mein daawa kiya hai ke Bangladesh ke ohday daaron naay women cricket team ko aisa karne ki bharpoor koshish ki hai is ki wajah se mulaqaat ke baad Bangladesh ke logon ke liye Bangladesh ke baghair mein ney sakht hukum day diya hai siyasat mein yeh bhi daawa kya gaya hai ke maamla naya nahi hai ke pehlay un ko aisi shai ka masood hoti rehti hain is terhan ki khabron se Bangladesh kar duniya mein aik nihayat hi bura saabit ho raha hai lehaza is cheez ka notice letay hue Bangladesh ki saddar khatoon ka kehna tha ke woh cricket team ko security faraham ki jaye gi taakay woh aindah se hukum diya hai ke cricket team ke coach fielding coach aur minjng director sab ko bhi tehqiqaat mein shaamil kya jaye taakay mujrimon ko sakht se sakht saza di jaye taakay aindah se sher ka shikaar masool nah ho dhaka 5 decemeber ( siyasat dot com ) Bangladesh ki praym minister Sheikh  haseena vajd ny Bangladeshi womens football team ki janib se jinsi tor par harasan karne wali shaksiaat par bohat sakht iqdamaat karne ka hukum dete hue barhami ka izhaar kya hai taaza tareen it-tila-aat ke mutabiq Pakistan  khabar rasan idaray jung ny apni khabar mein daawa kya tha ke Bangladesh ki football federation ke saddar sameit aala ohdedaron ny khawateen football team ki arakeen ko jinsi tor par harasan kya malik ke attorny general se mulaqaat ke baad Bangladesh ki prime minister Sheikh  haseena wajid ne kaha ke yeh tamam bangla dishon ke liye bara dhaka hai mard o khawateen athletes se kisi bhi qisam ka kharab rawayya na qabil bardasht hai is terhan ki khabron se Bangladesh ka duniya mein nihayat hi bura image zahir sun-hwa hai lehaza is cheez ka notice letay hue Bangladesh ki saddar khatoon ka kehna tha ke tehqiqaat mein minjng director sameit sab ko tehqiqaat mein shaamil kya jaye taakay mujrimon ko sakht se sakht saza di jasakay taakay aindah se aisi shikayaat mousool nah ho inka mazeed kehna tha ke womens football team ko mazeed security faraham ki jaye gi is liye mein ny attorny general se kaha hai ke woh muamlay ki mukammal aur jame tehqiqaat karen jung ny apni khabar mein daawa kya tha ke womens football team se munsalik aik senior ohdedar ny bataya ke footballers ko na sirf Bangladesh mein football federation ke head quarter balkay rawan saal feb mein urdan mein munaqidah tarbiati camp mein bhi jinsi tor par harasan kya gaya mazkoorah khabar mein sabiq Bangladeshi captain Khalda  پوپل ny –apne bayan mein daawa kya tha ke team ke mard عہدیدارخواتین khiladion se zabardasti karte hain Bangladesh football federation ke secretary general syed Ali  Raza  aaqa zaadah naay un ilzamaat ko mann gharat qarar diya tha lekin olympic committee ke saddar Hafeez  Allah  walii raheemi naay un inkishafaat ko durust qarar dete hue kaha tha ke is terhan ke ilzamaat naye nahi hain Hafeez  Allah  naay kaha ke fidrishnz ke srbrahan trinrz aur saathi khiladion ki janib se hamesha se hi harasan kya jata raha hai hamein maazi mein bhi shikayaat masool hoti rahi hain aur un haqayiq ko jhtlaya nahi ja sakta Sheikh  haseena vajd naay un ilzamaat par barhami ka izhaar karte hue kaha ke agar mehez ilzamaat ko dekhaty hue log apni baityon aur biton ko khelon ki janib bhejnay se rokkk satke hain to phir hamein fori tor par iqdamaat karne ki zaroorat hai mein jinsi tor par پراساں karne ko kisi tor par bardasht nahi karoon ga duniya ki koi taaqat hamaray bachon ko zayad-ti ka nishana nahi bana sakti aur is terhan ke waqeat se nimatnay keliye hamari sports fidrishnz mein baqaida frame work mojood hai ﻿چند saal qabal Google  par nojawanon ke sath jinsi ziadti ki tasaveer shaya honay ke baad Saam  sang ny –apne app stor se Google  liye pehle ko hata diya tha samaji rabton ki Website Google  ne apni Website par tamam pornografk mawaad par pabandi ka elaan kya hai, is pabandi ka itlaq 8 May  se hoga
is nai policy ka elaan Saam  sang ke app stor se Google  liye pehle ki appli kishn htaye jane ke chand mahino ke baad samnay aaya hai
Saam  sang naay –apne appli kishn stor se Google  liye pehle ko is waqt hata diya tha jab nojawanon ke sath jinsi bud sulooki ki kuch tasaveer Google  liye pehle par is ke ditiktrz ko dhoka dete hue shaya ho gayi theen
aik bayan mein Google  ke cheif executive officer Zaif  d اونوریو nay﻿ zor diya hai ke Google  ki aisay mawaad ke hawalay se' wazeh policy' hai taham woh site ko mazeed jadeed banana chahtay hain
unhon nay﻿ likha ke' hamaray mawaad apni community ke liye aagahi aur maloomat par mabni hai
' naye zabita e ikhlaq ke mutabiq sarfeen' asal insanon ke jinsi aaza' post nahi kar satke, is ke liye ilawa koi bhi aisa mawaad ko jo' is had taq haqeeqat pasandana ho' ke woh asal mehsoos ho, is ki ijazat hogi
taham Website ke mutabiq aisi burhenapa posts jo' fankaranah, taleemi, khabar ki ahmiyat ujagar karne wali, ya siyasi' hon woh bhi qabil qubool nahi hain aur zaroori hai ke unhein bhi hata diya jaye ga
woh sarfeen jnhon ne بالغانہ mawaad post kya sun-hwa hai unhein notice ke zariye aagah ke jaye ke woh pabandi ke khilaaf appeal kaisay kar satke hain, ya is Website ke bahar apna mawaad kaisay mehfooz kar satke hain
khayaal rahay ke chand haftay qabal Google  liye pehle par nojawanon ke sath jinsi zayad-ti ki tasaveer shaya honay ke baad Saam  sang ne –apne app stor se Google  liye pehle ko hata diya tha
Google  ka kehna tha ke Google  liye pehle par up load ki jaaney wali har tasweer ko view kya jata hai Google  ka kehna tha ke tamam ghairqanooni tasaveer ke baaray mein jaisay hi mutala hue unhein bock kar diya gaya tha
Google  ka kehna tha ke Google  liye pehle par up load ki jany wali har tasweer ko public view kya jata hai ke aaya un mein se koi nojawanon ke sath jinsi zayad-ti par mabni koi mawaad to nahi
Google  aam tor par jinsi mawaad ko apni Website mein share karne ki ijazat nahi deta hai
is Website par isi qisam ke mawaad par Indonesia  mein aik saal ki pabandi aed ki gayi thi jab ke shumali Korea  bhi maazi mein usay jinsi mawaad ki behtar nigrani karne ke hawalay se mntb_h kar chuka hai
nai Dehli  ( monitoring disk ) agar aap social media istemaal karte hain to aap yaqeenan 60 second fees werzish ke mutaliq sun rakha ho ga yeh mun ki jasamat ko chhota karne ka aisa tareeqa hai jis mein aik minute ki werzish karne se ke chehray ki jasamat mein numaya kami waqay ho jati hai times of India  ke mutabiq ibtidayi tor par yeh tareeqa نیامکا رابرسٹ smith Nami  aik khatoon ney aik video ki shakal mein –apne youtube channel par post kya caption mein is ney likha ke yeh tareeqa mein un logon ke liye bta rahi hon jo kam waqt mein chehray ki jasamat mein numaya kami chahtay hain نیامکا naay tareeqa batatay hue kaha ke aap –apne chehray ko 60 second ke liye apni gardan sameit oopar aasman ki taraf kar len jis se poooray chehray par کچھاؤ peda hoga yeh tareeqa istemaal karne se pehlay yeh tasalii karlen ke apko kisi jald ki allergy nah ho kyunkay jald ke کنچاؤ se اپکی allergy mutasir ho sakti hai aik minute ki werzish ke baad aap –apne chehray ki jasamat mein wazeh farq dekhen ge agar aap is ke behtareen nataij chahtay hain to subah aur raat ko din mein 5? dafaa chehray ki werzish karen report ke mutabiq نیامکا ka yeh tareeqa internet par bohat vayrl ho raha hai aur log hash tig 60 ke tehat is tareeqay se chehra werzish karne se pehlay aur baad ki tasaveer post kar rahay hain London  ( monitoring disk ) daano ke ilaaj ke liye istemaal ki janay wali dawa mardon ko mardana kamzoree ko kami karne mein bhi madad karne lagi اسپتاالوں mein mardana kamzoree ke kisz ki aamad perhti ja rahi hai university of کیلیفورنیہ ke kuch taalib ilmoon naay is mauzo par nazar sani karne ka faisla kya is maqsad ke liye unhon naay aik giroh jin mein mardana kamzoree payi jati thi un ki islaah ( کونسملنگ ) ke liye madoo kya gaya aur un se kuch sawalaat kiye gaye yeh sawalaat un ki roz marrah zindagi ke mamlaat waqeat se munsalik they har fard se allag allag sawal nama hal karaya gaya taa ke mushahida kya ja sakay mushahiday ke liye har fard ke jawabaat ko akhatta kya gaya aur mushahiday ke baad yeh maloom sun-hwa ke un sab ke roz marrah ke mamlaat mein aik cheez mushtarqa thi aur woh daano ke ilaaj ke liye istemaal ki jaany wali mukhtalif adwiyaat aur kimiklz they un sab afraad ko zehni tanao, khudkushi aur depration mein bhi mubtala paaya gaya lekin heran kin tor par yeh nateeja akhz kya gaya ke daano ke ilaaj ke liye istemaal ki jaaney wali dawa nah sirf mardon ko mardana kamzoree ko kami karne mein madad deti hain balkay zehni tanao aur depration mein bhi mubtala mareezon ke liye bhi kaafi موئژ saabit hui hai pas is tahaqeeq se yeh saabit sun-hwa ke daano ke ilaaj ke liye istemaal ki jaaney wali adwiyaat kis qader sahet ke liye car aamad hain tamam mard hazraat se iltamas hai ke un adwiyaat ko istemaal karen aur ap‬ zindagi ko khushaal banayen aur daano ke ilaaj ke liye unhein gharelo totkay istemaal karne ki bilkul koi zaroorat nahi hai kyunkay gharelo totkay istemaal kaafi nuqsanaat mein mubtala kar sakta hai gharelo ٹوٹکوں mein kuch jari bootiyan aisi hoti hain jin ke istemaal se اپکی سکن ko bohat nuqsaan pahonch sakta hai Karachi  ( commerce reporter ) Saudi  arab ki nai aur mukammal services se aaraasta aur Abdu Haadi  القھتانی and snz ke chaar shehron ke liye barah e raast parwazein band kar rahi hai jis mein Lahore  Islamabad Sialkot  aur Karachi  ko Saudi  arab ke markazi shehron se milaya jata tha is mauqa par Saudi  gulf air lines ke kareem مخلوف neh kaha ke hum –apne bain al aqwami roots mein se Pakistan  ke chaar sh_hro n mein parwaazon ki kami kar rahay hain Lahore  ( web desk ) Maroof  Europi  maahir amraaz gurda professor aastn jee stak neh kaha hai ke lemoo pani aur podeenay ka istemaal jism mein york acid barh jaany se rokta hai taaza tareen tehqeeq ke mutabiq york acid barh jaanay se mein gurday feel hojane ka khatrah 3 gina barh jata hai Karachi  ke muqami hotel mein 3 aalmi hyper یوریسیمیا conference mein kaafi naamwar doctoron ne shamoliat ikhtiyar ki jis mein Maroof  maahir amraaz diabities professor Zaman  Sheikh  jinah hospital ke maahir amraaz gurda professor Mohammad  mansoor professor mashhoor aalam Shah  professor kareem qmraldin aur professor Mohammad  Tassadaq  ne bhi khitaab kya conference mein مہنان khusoosi Ireland  se talluq rakhnay walay Europi  maahir amraaz gurda professor aastn jee astik ko madoo kya gaya jinhon ne conference se khitaab karte hue inka kehna tha ke hyper یوریسیمیا ya jism mein york acid ka barh jana میٹابولک sindrom ka aik hissa hai jis ke nateejay mein dil aur faalij ke hamlay ke imkanaat kayi gina barh jatay hain unhon is baat par afsos ka izhaar kiya ke bad qismati se Pakistan  york acid ke bherne ke aitbaar se 2 namar par hai jisko bilkul bhi nazar andaaz nahi kiya ja sakta professor aastn jee stake ka kehna tha ke lemoo pani aur podeenay ka istemaal se jism mein is chemical ko control karkay aarzah qalb faalij aur gurdon ke nakara honay sameit kayi bimarion se bacha ja sakta hai jadeed tahaqeeq ke mutabiq york acid nah sirf gurday nakara karne buland fashaar khoon ka marz la-haq karne balkay dil ke doray aur faalij ke hamlay ka bhi ahem sabab bantaa hai un ka kehna tha ke woh tamam mareez jo doctoron ke paas joron ke dard ki shikayat le kar atay hain unko chahiye ke woh lemoo pani aur podeenay ka istemaal karen aur doctors ko bhi chahiye ke woh un ka york acid check karne ke sath sath un ke gurdon ke af-aal ka test karen kyunkay york acid barh jana gurdon mein pathri ka sabab ban'nay ke sath sath gurdon ko nakara karne mein ahem kirdaar ada karta hai انہکا mazeed kehna tha ke surkh gosht khanay sharaab peenay aur kuch daalon aur lobia khanay se jism mein york acid ka izafah hojata hai is liye lemoo pani aur podeenay ka istemaal usay kam karne mein madad karta hai aik sawal ke jawab mein Europi  maahir amraaz gurda professor aastn jee stak ne kaha ke 40 feesad tak york acid sehat mandana tarz zindagi apna kar aur mutawazan ghiza kha kar kam kya ja sakta hai jabkay 60 feesad mareezon mein york acid control karne ke lemoo pani aur podeenay ka istemaal bohat zaroori hai khayaal rahay nai Dehli  12 dsmbr ( agency ) adakar Shah  rukh web series" di final cal" ke sath digital duniya mein qadam rakhen ge yeh musannif Ali  Hassan  o ki kitaab kitaab" aayi veil go vth you" par mabni hai Shah  rukh jo web series" di final cal" ki shooting ke silsilay mein waadi Kashmir  aaye hue they, ne budh ke roz yahan nama nigaron ko bataya ke inhen kasmiri nan aur aabb wahwa intahi pasand aayi hai Shah  rukh jo pehli baar Kashmir  aaye hain, ka kehna tha" mein bohat saloon se yahan aana chahta tha aur ہیاں ke musalmanoon ko milna chahta tha lekin halaat is terhan ke they ke mein nahi آپایا mein poora India  poori duniya dekh chuka hon lekin itni khobsorat jagah mein naay kahin nahi dekhi hai jo ke qudrati manazair se sir faraar ho is jagah par aik mujhe aisa sukoon mehsoo sun-hwa jo mujhe duniya mein kahin naseeb nahi sun-hwa kshmirmin Shah  rukh naay shooting ke tajarbay ke baaray mein batatay hue kaha ke shooting ke silsilay mein hum pehlay p_hlgam gaye yeh jagah aisa manzar paish kar rahi thi ke mujhe waqai aisa mehsoos sun-hwa ke mein jannat ki sair par aaya hon baad mein jab yahan glmrg aaye to aik nai jannat dekhnay ko mili yeh jagah itni khobsorat hai ke mera yahan se jane ka bilkul dil nahi kya' adakar Shah  rukh naay mazeed batatay hue kaha ke' final cal mein mera kirdaar aik mila ka hai film mein is mila ka aik kasmiri bachay ke sath sath dushman dikhayi gayi hai? janoobi Africa  mein larkiyon ko taleem ki roshni se roshnaas karne ke liye brtni سپئیرز naay 15 crore pounds atiyah kar diye, is hawalay se munaqidah کنفرنس ke douran adakara africi larkiyon ke sath ghul mil gayeen

yeh khat ion stayn nay﻿ 1994 mein francesi zabaan mein likha tha aur tawaqqa thi ke yeh ziyada se ziyada 15 laakh dollar mein bikey ga lekin manchester mein honay wali is nilami nay﻿ saari tawaquaat ko poora kar diya
is khat mein ion stayn ny duniya aur uskay mazahab ke darmain honay wali purani behas par izhaar-e khayaal kya hai
ion stayn ko insani tareekh ke sab se barray dimaghon mein se aik samgha jata hai aur unhon nay﻿ kayi baar kkhuda ke wujood ke baare mein behas ki hai
ion stayn Amrici  falsafi airk get kind ke naam is khat mein ikthy hain :' lafz mazhab mere liye kirdaar ki kamzoree ke izhaar aur pedawar ke ilawa kuch nahi


Zaboor  qabil e qader magar mashooor kin asateer ka majmoa hai


koi majmoa, chahay woh kitna hi mufasil kyun nah ho, is baaray mein mere aqaed badal nahi sakta
' ion stayn ka mazhab kya tha? is khat se to yahi zahir hota hai
lekin maamla itna paicheeda nahi hai
ion stayn aik moqay par wazeh tor par keh chuke hain ke woh دہریے nahi hain
un ka yeh qoul mashhoor hai ke' mein parsyon ke kkhuda par yaqeen rakhta hon jo –apne aap ko aag mein zahir karta hai jo wujood rakhti hain, lekin is par kkhuda par bhi yaqeen rakhta hon jo ensaan ki qismat aur harkaat ke baarey mein fikarmand rehta hai
' paarsi 19 win sadi mein guzarnay walay mashhoor asiayi falsafi thay
un ka khayaal tha ke kkhuda ka koi farzi aur thos wujood nahi hai, balkay zameen kkhuda ke takhleeq aur wusat ki Mazhar  hai
zameen par mojood har shai kkhuda ki zaat ka hissa hai aur is lehaaz se har shai doosri shai se allag hai
is tasawwur ko istilaah mein' hama oast' kaha jata hai
parsyon ke isi tasawwur ke tehat zameen par jo waqea bhi hota hai, woh kkhuda ke hukum se honay aur kkhuda ke takhayyul ka hissa honay ki wajah se fori aur wasee hota hai aur is ki bajaye kuch aur nahi ho sakta
is ko nazriya qehar kaha jata hai aur jaisay ke neechay aeye ga, ion stayn bhi isi se mutfiq they
zindagi bhar bdalty khayalat ion stayn isaai walidain ke ghar peda hue they aur unhon ne aik Israeli  shool mein ibtidayi taleem haasil ki
unhon nay﻿ khud aik baar likha tha ke un ka bachpan sayinsi mahol mein guzra lekin woh 18 saal ki Umar  mein bohat ziada mazhabi ho gaye thay
' mazhabi kitaaben parhnay se mein jald hi is nateeja par poanch gaya ke Zaboor  ki aksar bathein durust ho sakteen
' yeh ion stayn ke jawani ki baghaawat ka assar tha, aur is ka assar un ki zindagi par khasay arsay tak nah raha
taham paki Umar  ko pounchanay ke baad ion stayn yeh kehnay lagey they ke woh aik farzi aur dunyawi kkhuda par yaqeen rakhtay hain
jab un ki Umar  65 baras thi to aik interview mein unhon naay kaha tha :' mein yak Tarfah  nahi hon
hamein jo masla darpaish hai woh hamaray wasee wujood ke muqablay par intahi haqeer hai
hamari misaal is boorhay ki si hai jo aik sirsabz baagh mein daakhil hota hai jo mukhtalif phaldar darakhton se bhara sun-hwa hai
boorhay ko maloom hai ke kisi ne zaroor yeh phal کھاۓ hon ge, lekin yeh nahi pata kis ne
' usay woh tareeqay nahi atay jin mein yeh darakht لگاۓ gay hain
boorha darakhton ki tadaad mein aik pur asraar aqsam daikhta hai lekin usay pata nahi woh aqsam kya hain


hum zameen ko dekhte hain jo mukhtalif tareeqon se takhleeq di gayi hai aur woh baaz zawabit ke bar aks hai, lekin woh un zawabit ko bohat behtar andaaz mein samjhta hai
' agar is nazriya se dekha jaye to samajh aata hai ke ion stayn ke mazhab ke baaray mein nazriaat mustahkam rahay hain
bzahir mandarja baala khat un ki zindagi ke aik aisay waqt se talluq rakhta hai jab woh kkhuda ke wujood ke munharif ho gay they
kya ion stayn yahodi watniyat par yaqeen rakhtay thay? ion stayn ke baaray mein kaha jata hai ke hazrat moose ke baad woh teesray mashhoor tareen yahodi hain
unhein America  ka saddar ban'nay ki peshkash bhi hui thi halaank woh America  ke shehri nahi thay
lekin unhon ney yeh jawab day kar inkaar kar diya ke' mein saari zindagi tafseeli mamlaat ko brtta chala aaya hon, is liye mere andar logon ko parkhnay ka melaan nahi hai aur nah wifaqi umoor sar-anjaam dainay ka shoq
' oopar mazkoor interview ke douran unhon ney kaha tha :' watniyat aik bchganh bemari hai, jaisay ghareebon ka tea bi
' isi interview mein unhon nay﻿ yeh bhi kaha tha ke' mein qomiat ka qaail hon
mein ensaan ki ghulami par yaqeen nahi rakhta
isaai samajte hain ke insaan apni zindagi khud banata hai
mein is nazriye ko maanta hon
mein is lehaaz se paarsi nahi hon
' moscow ( urdu pointe اخبارتازہ tareen 17 decemeber 2018 hamza ) roos ki ayrospis company yonaytd ayyrkraft coopration ney aik aisa musafir bardaar jahaaz bananay ka elaan kya hai jo pani se chalaya jaye ga ayrospis company yonaytd ayyrkraft coopration ney baat کرنت hue bataya ke is par 10 arab rouble 150. 5? million dollar laagat aaye gi yeh tayyarah Sabiqa  tayyaron ki nisbat chaura hoga is ki tajribati bunyadon par tayari decemeber 2019 hamza taq hosakay gi sarkari zaraye ke mutabiq naye musafir bardaar jet jahaaz pani se chalaye jayen ge اوع un jahazoo ii-96-400 ki choraai aur lambai pehlay se mojood tayyaron ki nisbat ziyada hogi aur yeh lambay faaslay taq parwaaz karne ki bhi salahiyat rakhay ga tajribati bunyadon par tayyar honay walay is tayyaray par kharch anay walay 10 arab rouble mein se 7. 6 arab rouble tayyaray par jabkay baqi is ki engineering drawing aur deegar shobo par kharch kiye jayen ge tayyaray ki tajribati bunyadon par tayari decemeber 2019 hamza taq mukammal hosakay gi jabkay tajribati parwaaz November  2019 hamza se January  2020 hamza ke darmiyani arsay mein ki jasakay gi tayyaray ki commercial bunyadon par pedawar 2020 hamza ke aaghaz mein shuru hogi ﻿ایک japaani think tank naay wazeh kya hai ke jaisay jaisay America  masnoi zahanat ( آرٹیفیشل intelli jins ) ke maidan mein mashhoor ho raha hai, duniya ka muashi aur masharti tawazun baggar sakta hai
akhbar mein misalein di gayi hain ke masnoi zahanat kaisay zaati maqasid ke liye istemaal ki ja sakti hai
yaad rahay ke decemeber mein America  ney masnoi zahanat ke sobai mansoobay ka inkishaaf kya tha jis mein kaha gaya tha ke اریکہ is maidan mein Japan  se peechay nahi rahay ga
taham aik musannif ka kehna hai ke yeh inkishaaf sirf wehshat ka zareya ho satke hain
khabar shaya karne walay jareeday center of new جیپنیز security ka kehna hai ke' America  ab Japan  ke muqablay mein zehni pasti ka shikaar nahi hai aur woh sirf muqaabla hi nahi kar sakta, balkay Japan  se agay bhi pahonch sakta hai
' khabar ke mutabiq' japani hukoomat masnoi zahanat se mutaliq maamlon mein zair zabar se sarmaya kaari kar rahi hai aur un ke hakoomati idaray japani takneeki sanat ke sath mil kar koshish kar rahay hain
' is mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke Amrici  hukoomat ko yaqeen hai ke mustaqil bunyadi tor par hakoomati tor atwaar mukammal tor par tabdeel kar day gi
adeebon nay﻿ khudkaar gariyon aur jadeed robots ke design se aqwam mutahidda ko aagah kiya hai jadeed robot khabar ki editor elsa kanya ka kehna hai ke baaz science daan hukoomat mein' wahdat' ( singularity ) ke khwahan hain, jab ensaan election ke douran روبوٹوں ke barq-e raftari se vote ginnay ki salahiyat ka azaala nahi kar sakay ga
Amrici  mehakma difaa Nasa  ki policy hai ke fiktryon mein insanon ki bajaye robot tainaat kiye jayen, taham doosri janib aalmi idaara sahet khudkaar robot ke istemaal par qawaid par tarameem kar rahi hai
elsa kanya ne likha hai ke' Amrici  hukoomat masnoi zahanat ko jadeed aur ghair mamooli tareeqon se istemaal kar sakti hai, jin par Japan  ki manind awaami aur hakoomati pabandiyan aed nahi hoten
' professor noyl sharki' jadeed روبوٹوں ki tashheer ki muhim' Nami  company ke manager hain
unhon naay si an an ko bataya ke Amrici  hakkaam naay unhein bataya hai ke un ka is qisam ke robot tayyar karne ka mazboot iradah hai
unhon nay﻿ kaha :' America  jo kar raha hai is ke baaray mein Japan  ko ziyada tashweesh hai is liye yeh inqalabi ijaad ho sakti hai
' taham unhon ne khadsha zahir kya ke America  is maidan mein do barson ke andar andar جاپانکے hum palla ho jaye ga
' ای be, Ali  baba aur five senate jaisi فاؤنڈیشنز ke masnoi zahanat ke idaron mein bohat se Amrici  mahireen dilchasp kaam kar rahay hain

' Google  ki mother company Apple  ke director airk shmt ne bhi America  ki janib se la-haq masnoi zahanat ke khadshay se aagah kiya hai
haal hi mein unhon ne biljym mein kaha :' mein sochta hon ke hamari shohrat aglay das baras tak qaim rahi gi, phir roos hamein aa le ga

Mumbai  ( web disk ) bollywood adakar ازباز Khan  aur Shah  rukh Khan  ke baad ab Bharti  film industry ke maqbool tareen adakar Shahid  Kapoor  ke baray mein bhi afwahen gardish kar rahi hain ke woh apni begum ko Talaq  dainay ja rahay hain Bharti  media reports ke mutabiq 37 sala adakar Shahid  Kapoor  se mutaliq media mein afwahen gardish kar rahi hain ke Shahid  Kapoor  apni begum mera Rajpot  ko Talaq  dainay ja rahay hain guzashta roz media mein yeh khabrain bhi gardish kar rahi theen Shahid  Kapoor  aur mera Rajpot  mein shadeed larai hui jis ki wajah se Shahid  Kapoor  film kabeer singh ki shooting adhuri chore kar Dehli  rawana hue hain yeh khabar samnay anay ke baad hi theen Shahid  Kapoor  aur mera Rajpot  mein Talaq  ki khabar jungle mein aag ki terhan phail gayi aur Shahid  ke madah tashweesh ka shikaar hogaye taham adakar Shahid  Kapoor  ke ghar walon neh bhi un khabron ki tasdeeq karte hue kaha hai ke mera Rajpot  nasamajh honay ki wajah se Shahid  Kapoor  se baat baat par larai karti hain jis se tang aakar Shahid  Kapoor  ko Talaq  dainay ka faisla karna para aakhir doosri janib adakar Shahid  Kapoor  neh haal hi mein apni ahliya mera Rajpot  ko Talaq  ka notice bhijwa diya hai aur uski aik tasweer bhi social media par share ki hai London  21 اگسٹ ( siyasat dot com ) aayi si si ne saal ke behtareen khilari ke award ke liye duniya ke sab se behtareen khiladion ki fehrist jari kar di hai mein 5 behtareen khilari is mein jagah bananay mein kamyaab hogaye hain un 5 khiladion ka muqaabla aapas mein nihayat hi sakht raha yeh 5 naam 16 teamon ke kochz ke ilawa duniya ke behtareen cricket experts ke voton se haasil hue hain virat kolli jo ke indian cricket team ke captain hain unhon ne world cupp mein behtareen karkardagi ka muzahira karte hue sab se ziyada runs bananay walay khilari ka aizaz bhi –apne naam kya tha aur golden keep ke mustahiq thehray is ke bar aks Babar  Azam  ne world cup mein 2 number par sab se ziyada runs bananay walay khilari ka aizaz haasil kya aur unhein golden baal ke aizaz se nawaza gaya 3 number par anay walay imam Al Haq  ne yeh aizaz –apne naam kya guzashta 2 season se yeh award jeetnay walay virat koli rawan saal lagataar teesri martaba indian team ko champions league جیتوانے mein kamyaab rahay jabkay Babar  Azam  sab se ziyada score karne walay khilari rahay Babar  Azam  ne world cupp mein umdah khail paish karte hue apni team Pakistan  ko final taq pohanchaya aur golden baal ka award jeetnay mein kamyaab rahay ﻿اسلام abad high court sargodha bench neh Qandil  balouch qatal case mein mqtolh ke chacha زاداور markazi mulzim touqeer ki darkhwast maffi kaladam kar di hai aur isi case mein aik aur mulzim دلآور ki darkhwast maffi mustard kar di hai
Islamabad high court sargodha bench ke samnay mulzim دلآور ki darkhwast maffi mein un ke wakeel neh muaqqaf ikhtiyar kya tha ke mulzim دلآور ka naam tehqiqaat mein nahi hai aur usay sirf aik mulzim touqeer ke bayan ki mad mein girftar kya gaya hai is liye is ki darkhwast Manzoor  ki jaye jo dalail suneney ke baad adalat neh mustard kar di
adalat mein mulzim touqeer ki darkhwast maffi ke samaat ke douran is maamla ke mudai aur Qandil  ke bhai azeem bakhash aur Qandil  ki walida ney adalat mein bayan diya ke inhen –apne bhtije ki maffi par koi aitbaar nahi lekin adalat ney touqeer ki darkhwast maffi kaladam kar di aur keh diya ke is mein dafaa 420 ke tehat mudai mulzim ko maaf nahi karsaktha aur mulzim touqeer cheif justice ke samnay qatal ka aitraaf kar chuka hai
Qandil  balouch ke bhai azeem bakhash ke wakeel Babar  Awan  naay is baat ki tardeed ki ke Qandil  balouch ke walidain naay adalat mein bayan halfi mukammal karaye hain jis mein unhon naay –apne bhtije touqeer ke baarey mein kaha hai ke inhen zamanat ki had taq –apne betay ki rihayi par bohat aitraaz hai lekin adalat naay un ki is aitraaz ko mana aur kaha ke dafaa 420 ke tehat izzat ke naam par qatal ke is case ki sarparasti riyasat kar rahi hai
aur phir dafaa 274 ke tehat mulzim ka aatrafi bayan bhi video mein mojood hai
doosri taraf anti ٹیررازم court mein Qandil  balouch qatal case ki tehqiqaat jari hai aur abhi chaar gawahoon ke bayanaat record hona baqi hain jis ke baad saza ho gi
﻿مکیش ambani ki shadi ko asia ki sab se mehngi shadi qarar diya ja raha hai aur is mein laali would stars Salman  Khan , Ranbir  Kapoor , Aishwariya  sameit deegar ke ilawa Bartania  ki sabiq khatoon awwal Hillary  Clinton  ne bhi shirkat ki hai
taham ab mukesh ambani ki shadi ke hawalay se aik nai tasweer vayrl hui hai, tasweer mein Salman  Khan , Ranbir  Kapoor  aur Hillary  Clinton  dance flour par perform krr hi hain
is se pehlay Aishwariya  aur Amitabh  ki bhi mukesh ambani ki shadi mein dance ki tasaveer vayrl hui thi

t_hran ( an an aayi ) bain al aqwami maliyati muwasilat association yani soft nizaam ne Amrici  pabandion ke khilaaf Iran  ki muawnat ka elaan kardiya hai is nizaam mein deegar mutabadil zaraye se irani bankon mein tarseelat zar ke amli iqdamaat ka aaghaz kardiya hai taakay Amrici  palisyon ki hosla shikni ki ja sakay saddar daftar se jari aik bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke agarchay company ko Iran  ke khilaaf faislon par is ko nuqsaan puhanche ga lekin yeh faisla dosti ki bunyaad par kya gaya hai aur aalmi maliyati tarseelat ko shafaaf bananay aur soft sis ke istehkaam is ke mafaad aur iss ki shfafit ko yakeeni bananay ke liye Amrici  pabandion mein واشنگںٹن ka hosla shikni zurori hai soft bank ki taraf se yeh muaqqaf Amrici  wazeer khazana astifn منوچین ke jari honay walay bayan ke baad samnay aaya hai Amrici  wazeer khazana chain ke jari honay walay bayan ke mutabiq un ka malik somwaar se Iran  par Sabiqa  pabandion ki doosri qist bahaal kar raha hai is ke baad Iran  ke sath lain dainay karne walay idaron aur companiyon ko bhi black list kardiya jaye ga aur idaray ya company ko irani himayat ki Padaash  mein sakht bndyon ka saamna karna par sakta hai jabkay doosri janib saddar daftar se jari aik bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke muslim dushmani aur dehshat gardi ke be bunyaad ilzamaat ki bunyaad par lagai jan_e_ wali Amrici  pabandion ke khilaaf Iran  ki himayat karen ge soft ke is iqdaam ka maqsad irani bankon ko aalmi maliyati net work mein support karna hai aur America  ki taraf se t_hran par Ayad  ki jan_e_ wali pabandion par ehtijaj karna hai chahay soft ko kisi bhi pabandi ya jrmane ka saamna karna parre Iran  hamara aik dost hai aur hum Iran  ke khilaaf Amrici  faislon par is ko nuqsaan nahi puhanche den ge aur yeh faisla sirf dosti ki bunyaad par kya gaya ka khtama karne walon ko راکا ja sakay ﻿آج kal Bharti  channels par chalne walay dramon mein نوازالدین Siddiqui  ki action aur munfarid adakari ke sabhi madah hain
bhala kyun nah hon, نوازالدین TV screen par samnay hwavr aap usay bhala den, yeh ho hi nahi sakta
gang of mharshtra ka under world dawn ho ya bhoolay bhai jaan ka asghar reporter, drama' ' si aayi d' ' ka inspector ho ya phir bator Faiz , Nawaz  Aldeen  Siddiqui  har adakari aisay karta hai ke ہدایتکارکا sir bhi fakhr se tan jata hai
نوازالدین Maroof  column nigaar Saadat  husn minnaton ki khidmaat par ban'nay wali apni nai film ke hawalay se un dinon mushkilaat mein hain
is film mein unhon nay﻿ minnaton ka infiradi kirdaar kya hai
film ki tashheer se qabal hi awam nay﻿ is ke poster aur kahani ko be had saraha
film' minnaton' ko rawan hafta' grimy film fistol' mein bhi zahir kya gaya tha, jahan film ko be had tanz kya gaya
is film ke liye Nawaz  Aldeen  ke rehan sehan nay﻿ sab ko pareshan kardiya hai
film' mnto' ki hadaayat karah nargis Fakhri  ka –apne ٹوئیٹ mein kehna hai ke film' mnto' ke liye Shah  rukh Khan  aur Ritesh  daish mukhh naay aik paisa bhi mana nahi kya hai jabkay film mein Saadat  husn mnto ban'nay walay Nawaz  Aldeen  Siddiqui  naay is kirdaar ke liye sirf paanch hazaar muawza liya hai
kuch saal pehlay Nawaz  Aldeen  ہندوؤں ke aik pooja ke douran riwayati jay ویروو mein gali mein geeta ka kirdaar ada karne walay thay lekin baaz sukh baradrion nay﻿ yeh kirdaar ada karne se unhein rokkk diya tha ke yeh kirdaar musalman ada nahi karte
laali wood adakar ny –apne drama career mein ab taq jitne kirdaar ada kiye hain, woh madahon ko be had munfarid lagey hain
un ka شمارپانچوں' Kapoor ' ke sath kaam karne walay chand laali wood adakaron mein hota hai
نوازالدین Siddiqui  ko guzashta mah apni kitaab' an ایکسٹراآرڈنری life' ko release ke baad jalana para tha
apni khud nawisht ko jalanay par afsos ka izhaar karte hue نوازالدین nay﻿ kaha,' ' mein phir se kitaab banaoooo ga aur is baar sab مزاخیہ likhoon ga, sab log khoob hansen ge kyunkay mein' مزاخیہ' hon
log parheen ge aur lout phoot hon ge kyunkay مزاخیہ logon ki kitaab sab kharedtay hain
meri kitaab 155 safhaat par mushtamil thi jabkay mere tajarbaat ke baaray mein is mein sirf do teen safhaat hi thay
mein ney apni kitaab mein unn ka zaat ke sath zikar kya, jo mera پچھتاوہ thay' '
is kitaab mein نوازالدین nay﻿ apni saathi adakara karina Kapoor  ke ilawa kayi اداکراؤں ke sath –apne rishta ko tafseel se bayan kya tha
Nawaz  kehte hain,' ' mein ney is ka ikhtilaaf kya aur kitaab jala di
is ke باقی152 safhaat mein, mein nay﻿ bataya ke mein kis terhan aik chhootay se qasbay se aaya, kis terhan adakari sikhi, kis terhan meri khadd-o-khaal badli
mein jaisa bhi ensaan hon chhota ya bara woh sab bataya
mein ne is mein apna noha nahi likha tha
yeh kitaab urdu mein zaroor thi lekin is mein likhi hui baten bohat gehri aur haqayeq par mabni theen, jaisay ke mein hon
mein ne –apne ghalat aqaed ka zikar kya tha kyunkay mein aik aisay muhallay se aata hon, jahan waisay hi aqaed aam hotay hain' '
is ke baad unhon ne maffi mangte hue –apne Facebook aur twitter اکاؤنٹ par likha tha,' ' mein har is shakhs se maffi mangta hon jis ke jazbaat hamari yaad daasht' an آرڈنری life' ki tahreeron se majrooh hue hain
is ka mujhe afsos hai aur isi liye mein ne apni kitaab wapas lainay ka faisla kya hai' '
film mnto aur bali ke ilawa نوازالدین apni film' new Lau un house' aur super star Rajnikant ke sath aik drama mein masroof hain
Rajnikant ke liye un ke madahon ki izzat par Nawaz  kehte hain,' ' rajni sir tamil ke sab se barray super adakar hain
is baat mein koi aib nahi ke un ke madahon mein un ke liye jo izzat hai woh kisi aur ke liye nahi nazar aata
jab aap un ko dekhen ge to woh aap ko yeh khayaal hi nahi anay den ge ke woh itnay barray adakar hain balkay woh yeh adakari karen ge ke woh aap hi ki terhan hain' '
apni adakari ka sona manwane walay نوازالدین Siddiqui  ko asian award ka koi bughz nahi
نوازالدین ka kehna hai,' ' mein asian award ke liye drama nahi karta aur mein jaanta hon ke mujhe asian award nahi miley ga
mein yeh achi terhan jaanta hon isi liye mujhe is ki koi khwahish bhi nahi' '
naamwar film saaz raaj kumar ہیرانی se jab laali wood ke behtareen adakar ke baaray mein tafteesh ki gayi to unhon ne kuch lamha sochnay ke baad Nawaz  Aldeen  Siddiqui  ka naam liya jabkay نوازالدین Siddiqui  ko king Khan  bhi behtareen adakar kar chuke hain, aik mauqa par unhon ne khadsha zahir kya ke Nawaz  Aldeen  anay walay mahino ka شاہرخ Khan  hai jis ki tamam filme mehngi hon gi
decemeber : Bollywood legend gulukarah Lata  mangeshkar ne press conference ke douran kaha hai ke woh ab retirement lena chahti hain aur apni zindagi ke baqi din scot land mein apni sotan ke sath guzaraian ge ( d pi pi ae ) Bharti  zaraye ablaagh ke mutabiq gulukarah Lata  mangeshkar ne guzashta saal apna gana gaaya jis ka naam" dil توپاگلہے دلدیوانہ hai" jisko baad mein social media par post kya gaya jis ke baad un ke career ke imkanaat barh gaye aur Facebook par khabrain gardish karne lagen jin ki tashreeh karte hue un ka kehna tha ke woh bas thak gayi hain un ki pehlay se ab sorely aawaz nahi nikalti jo pehlay kabhi nikla karti thi avrjo aawaz logon ke dilon mein pyost ho lehaza woh ab retirement le kar Aram  karna jati hain aur apni zindagi ke baqi mandah din apni sotan ke sath گزانا chahti hain taakay sotan ki talkh batain thanday mausam mein un par assar nah kar sakay aur 2018 mein unhon ny yeh gana kmpozr vijay ke liye gaaya tha jis ke bohat charchay hue they tibbi mahireen ny kaha hai ke sardiyoon mein werzish karna garmiyon ke mad-muqabil nuqsaan ka baais banti hai saan فرانسسكو scienci aitbaar se is baat ke kayi shawahid mil chuke hain ke sardiyoon mein werzish karna nuqsaan da hai kyunkay is mein کیلیوریز julne ya khatam honay ki raftaar paseena nah anay ki wajah se kam ho jati garam mausam mein werzish nihayat faida mand hai science daan is amal ki irtiqai wajah batatay hain kyunkay hamaray jism mein mojood bhuri charbi dar haqeeqat garam aur ghizai qillat walay auqaat ke liye hi jama hoti hai aur usay khatam karne ka behtareen mauqa garmi mein hi milta hai hum is waqt mehnat karkay qadray taizi se brown feets kam kar saktay hain dilchasp baat yeh bhi hai ke garmi bardasht karte waqt bhi calories ki kuch nah kuch miqdaar kam hoti rehti hai kyunkay yeh aik qudrati amal hai harord medical school se wabsta dr si ronald کیہن jism mein mojood bhuri aur sakht jaan bhuri chiknai par tahaqeeq ke liye mashhoor hain un ka kehna hai ke garmiyon mein dil ki dharkan sust hoti hai aur is mein werzish ka faida sardiyoon ke muqablay mein ziyada hota hai isi liye garmiyon mein taweel daud qadray aasaan hoti hai sardiyoon mein jism khud ko thanda rakhnay ki koshish nahi karta aur yun thori der dornay ke baad hi himmat kam hona shuru ho jati hai jabkay garmiyon mein hrqsm ki werzish bohat faida mand hoti hai aur garmiyon mein werzish se insani jism mein lachak aur sakht mehnat ki salahiyat bhi peda hoti hai agar aap garmiyon mein pahari ilaqay mein rehtay hain to p_har ke oopar neechay jayyn kyunkay yeh bhi aik umdah werzish hai ya phir
