se ab kayi adakaren aisi filmon mein kaam karne ke liye agay nahi آیئں gi heran kin baat yeh hai ke film amaavas mein bhoshn patel hadaayat kaari ka kaam kar rahay hain jinhon nay﻿ is se qabal Ragni  am am s 2 aur alone jaisi filmon ko nakaam bananay mein koi kasar nahi choari thi ﻿کیا duniya mein allergy waqai barh rahi hai? duniya bhar ke bachon mein lakri aur is se banay furniture se allergy ke maamlon mein izafah dekha ja raha hai
haal hi mein Bartania  mein jab do no umar bachay lakri ki bani kursion par baithy shool ka kaam karne ki wajah se mout ke mun mein chalay gay to yeh baat samnay aayi ke is qisam ki sorat e haal ke tabah kin nataij samnay aa satke hain
augst mein maghribi Australia  mein aik chay sala larki ki halakat darakht ke sath take laga kar bethnay se hogayi
haliya dahaiyo mein waisay to maghribi mumalik mein allergy ke kisz mein batadreej kami dekhi gayi hai
bachon mein lakri se allergy ke kisz mein Bartania  mein satrah feesad izafah sun-hwa hai, Australia  mein baara feesad jabkay Europe  mein majmoi tor par chaar feesad
is qisam ki allergy ki wajah se mareez ka khandan bhi khauf mein mubtala rehta hai aur bethnay, sonay aur parhnay ke لیۓ istemaal mein parhaiz aur pabandi khandan ke liye aur muashi tor par bhi aik boojh ban sakti hai
abhi is baaray mein hatmi tor par kuch nahi kaha ja sakta ke aisa kyun hai aur allergy ke کسیز ki tadaad kyun barhti ja rahi hai
taham duniya bhar ke mahireen is ki wajah jan-nay ke liye kaam kar rahay hain
Bartanwi  bachi lakri ke chamach se khailtay ہوۓ zindagi kho baithi thi
allergy kyun hoti hai? allergy is waqt hoti hai jab hamara pathon ka nizaam –apne mahol mein mojood cheez par hamla aawar hota hai, yani har woh cheez jo aam tor par be zarrar honi chahiye
is ke assaar mein jald ki aankhon ke peechay dard, taiz bukhaar aur bohat kharab sorat e haal mein pait mein shadeed dard, buland fashaar khoon aur joron mein dard hoti hai
bachon ko umooman lakri ki un aqsam se allergy hoti hai
dewdaar cheer sheesham sandal daar cheeni ki lakri Sanober  lakri se allergy kaisay hoti hai? guzashta 5 saal ke douran lakri se allergy ke kisz mein izafah khaas tor par mashriqi maashron mein nazar aaya hai
misaal ke tor par Pakistan  mein sunah 2010 se sunah 2015 ke darmain lakri se allergy ki sharah mein pachees gina izafah sun-hwa hai
sheesham kings college London  ki janib se ki jaaane wali aik stdi mein paanch saal ke 100 bachon ko tahaqeeq ka hissa banaya gaya
tahaqeeq mein yeh samnay aaya ke chodan feesad bachay lakri se allergy ka shikaar thay
Australia  mein lakri se allergy ka tanasub sab se kam hai
aik tahaqeeq ke mutabiq wahan aik saal tak ke aik فیصدسے bhi kam bachon ko Sanober  aur sheesham se allergy hai
allergy ke kisz ki barhti hui tadaad ki aik mumkina wajah lakri ka ghair zurori istemaal aur furniture ki safai sthrayi ka khayaal nah rakhna btai ja rahi hai
hum jantay hain ke taraqqi Yafta  mumalik mein lakri se allergy ka tanasub kam hai aur wahan ke shehri ilaaqon mein yeh tadaad kam dekhnay ko millti hai
is ki wajohaat mein jo awamil shaamil ho satke hain un mein aloodgi, khoraak mein tabdeeli, jaraseem ka kam se kam saamna kyunkay is se hamara mdafati nizaam jo ke jaraseem ka muqaabla karta hai is mein bhi tabdeeli aa jati hai
–apne malik se hijrat karne walon mein bhi –apne malik ki nisbat yahan dammey aur lakri se allergy ziyada dekhi gayi hai
is ki wajah maholiyati awamil ho satke hain
kuch mumkina wazahaten abhi is baarey mein koi aik hatmi wazahat samnay nahi aaski ke duniya mein wood allergy itni ziyada kyun ho gayi hai taham science mein is hawalay se kuch thyoriz hain
is mein safai ka naaqis nizaam bhi aik sabab qarar diya jata hai ke isi wajah se bachon ko bohat se infection ho jatay hain
jab jism mein koi tufaili infection hota hai to jism ke mdafati nizaam ko is se larna parta hai aur is amal mein jism be zarrar ajza ke khilaaf bhi mutharrak ho jata hai
aik aur khayaal ke mutabiq vitamin ae hamaray jism ke mdafati nizaam ko behtar bana sakti hai ke woh misbet rad-e-amal zahir kere aur hamein allergy se bachaaye
duniya ki ziyada tar abadi ko kaafi miqdaar mein vitamin ae nahi mil paati aur woh apna kam time Sooraj  ki roshni mein guzartay hain
sirf America  mein vitamin ae ki kami ke shikaar afraad ki tadaad mein aik dahai mein do gina izafah sun-hwa hai
aik nai theory ke mutabiq allergy ke hlaf anti bodies ko jald ke zariye bhi liya ja sakta hai khaas tor par bachon mein jo ھیپاٹائیٹس ka shikaar hon
jab bacha doodh chore raha ho to usay hayateen aur tafyan khilai jaye to woh aant ke andar mdafati nizaam ko behtar karti hai aur allergy se bachati hai kyunkay is terhan woh bacteria, bairooni ajza maslan lakri ko bardasht karne ke liye tayyar ho jati hai
kngz college London  mein ki jaaney wali lib stdi mein bataya gaya ke paanch saal ke woh bachay jinhon nay﻿ paidaiesh ke saal se lakri ki kursi par baithna shuru kya tha un mein lakri se allergy ka tanasub 80 feesad kam paaya gaya
is tahaqeeq ne is se qabal America  mein mojood ahteyati tadabeer ke is usool ko bhi tabdeel kar diya ke bachon ko bachpan mein lakri ke furniture par bethnay hi nahi dena chahiye
Bartania  mein walidain se kaha jata hai ke woh –apne dr se bhi rujoo karen
lakri se allergy ke ilaaj mein ahem dawa daryaft' rozana aik buscuits ka half rule bachon ki nashonuma mein mufeed' insani asraat haal hi mein Bartania  mein kam Umar  bachon ki allergy ki wajah se amwaat naay is baat ki ahmiyat ko ujagar kiya hai ke is hawalay se durust aur wazeh maloomat honi chahiye
abhi wood allergy ke liye koi ilaaj nahi hai bas yahi hai ke is qisam ka فرنیجر mareez ko nah diya jaye aur agar aisa ho jaye to emergency bunyadon par usay ilaaj faraham kya jaye
lekin yeh bachon ke liye bohat pareshan kin hai aur unhein allergic ree action ka khatrah bhi ho sakta hai
kngz college ney un ke liye pehlay se mojood test ke tareeqon ke bajaye aik mutabadil blood test istemaal kya hai jis mein wood se allergy ka wazeh tor par pata chal jata hai
is test se bachon ki nawway feesad allergy ka pata chalta hai aur umeed hai ke yeh aglay chand saloon mein bachon ke liye muyassar ho ga
kamyaab تشخیص ke bawajood aksar auqaat mareezon mein achanak se lakri se ree action ho jana aam si baat hain kyunkay is ka sabab ban'nay wali lakri ko chhorna bhi mushkil hota hai
is zimn mein aik aisi therapy ka istemaal kya jata hai jisay الرجن امیونو therapy kehte hain
aik maday ki madad se mareez ko allergy ki shiddat se bachaaya jata hai taakay hadsati tor par agar is ny mamnooa lakri ka istemaal kar liya to woh is ki sahet ko khatraat la-haq nah hon
deegar qisam ke ilaaj par abhi kaam ho raha aur bohat sa kaam abhi baqi hai
doosri janib mutasirah bachay aur un ke walidain ke liye roz marrah ki zindagi ke andar allergy aik pareshani ki soorat mein mojood hai
? nai Dehli  ( si an an ) sabiq investi gation officer Mumbai  wayad bhoshn nay﻿ inkishaaf kya hai ke Maroof  gulukarah sri devi ko baqaida intizam kar ke qatal kya gaya hai
Bharti  media ke mutabiq sabiq investi gation Afsar  vid bhoshn ney aik akhbar ko interview mein shak zahir kya hai ke Maroof  gulukarah ki mout tabee nahi thi balkay inhen baqaida intizam kar ke qatal kya gaya tha
ghusal khanaay mein kisi ko bhi gala ghoont kar qatal kar dena nihayat aaasaaan hai
khadsha hai ke sri devi ke sath bhi aisa hi kya gaya ho
sabiq investi gation officer wayad bhoshn jo aaj kal aik sarkari tehqiqati agency bhi chala rahay hain
sri devi ki mout ke baad bhoshn malaysia ke is rest house mein tehqiqaat ke liye bhi gay thay jahan sri devi ki mout hui thi taham rest house malkaan ney inhen haadsay walay hissa tak rasai nahi di thi
jis ke baad woh Bartania  chalay gaye they
wazeh rahay ke April  mein sri devi dost ki aik shadi ki taqreeb mein shirkat ke liye malaysia mein apni beti ke hamrah masroof theen jahan woh ghusal khanaay mein murda haalat mein mojood theen

khushhali ka pegham deta hai yaad rahay Amitabh  bachchan har saal musalmanoon ko eid qurbaan ki mubarakbaad paish karte hain is saal unhon ney guzashta baras bhi unhon ney tamam musalmanoon ke sath siyasat dot com ) asia cupp 2018 mein Pakistan  ko Afghanistan  se bad tareen shikast se dilbardashtah ho kar Shahid  Khan  afridi ke aik Pakistani  madah ney darya mein kood kar khud kashi kar li Shahid  Khan afridi ki qayadat mein تیم ko shikast ka saamna karna para jis par kuch madah bohat ziyada aabdeedah hokar ground se bahar chalay gaye Pakistan  ko Afghanistan  se bad tareen shikast se duniya bhar mein Shahid  Khan  afridi ke shaiqeen ko shadeed mayoosi aur sadma sun-hwa lekin Shahid  Khan  afridi ke aabadi gaon Peshawar  se talluq rakhnay wala aik madah yeh sadma bardasht nah kar saka aur afridi ki mayoos kin karkardagi se دلبرداشہ ho kar unhon ne mobayyana tor par darya mein kood kar khudkushi kar li shayad afridi bain al aqwami tor par khasi shohrat rakhnay walay khari hain lekin asia cupp ke douran buri performance ki wajah se un ke madah shadeed pareshan deekhaee diye kuch madah to shayad Khan  afridi ki buri performance dekh kar aabdeedah hogaye is ke bar aks kuch madahon ney khud kashi karne ki bhi koshish ki hai unhon ney mobayyana khudkushi se qabal ملیالم mein likhay gaye –apne khat mein kaha ke mein ney jo kuch dekhna tha sab dekh liya ab yahan dekhnay ko kya hai mein gehraion mein chhalang lgarha hon reports ke mutabiq match se qabal Shahid  Khan  afridi ki 8 number wali tea shirt bhi khareed kar laaye they aur inhen khadsha tha ke agar woh match haar Shahid  Khan  afridi koi runs banaye baghair hi pehli baal par hi out hogaye hain jis ki baad baqi khari bhi polin ki rahein dekhte rahay aur aakhir-kaar Pakistan  ko Afghanistan  se bad tareen shikast ka saamna karna para Dubai  21 اگسٹ ( siyasat dot com ) asia cupp cricket ٹورنمنٹ ke match ke online ticket aik hi din mein farokht karne ka record qaim hogaya asia cupp ka aaghaz 21 September  2018 ko Dubai  mein hoga aur aaghaz hi mein ibtidayi match ka bara muqaabla Pakistan  aur sri India  ke mabain hoga is match ke tamam ticket online khareed li gayi hain 21 September  ko honay walay is match ki tamam tkts aqwami aur bain al aqwami satah par khareed ki gayi hain kaha ja raha hai ke Dubai  ke shehar abozbi mein yeh match dopehar ke waqt khela jaye ga is match ko tournament ka sab se ahem tareen is liye qarar diya ja raha hai kyunkay ibtidayi match honay ke sath sath yeh match Pakistan  aur India  ke mabain khela jaye ga hamaray jism ke andar har waqt mutadid ahem amal jari rehtay hain jo harmonz control karte hain magar mardon ke muqablay mein khawateen mein harmonz ka nizaam ziyada paicheeda hota hai aur is mein inteshaar ka imkaan bhi ziyada hota hai harmonz ka nizaam mutasir ho to mizaaj rawayya achi shakhsiyat aur zahiri roop bhi mutasir hotay make up ka ziyada istemaal khawateen ke liye khatray ka baais ban sakta hai qaryin ke liye yeh baat koi nai nahi hogi ke mard hazraat ke maqabil mein khawateen ke andar harmonz ka nizaam paicheeda hota hai aur khawateen ke mukhtalif kimiklz ke istemaal se jism par bohat buray asraat muratab karta hai mukhtalif kimiklz se banay make up ke istemaal se khawateen ka ہارمونیل system buri terhan mutasir hota hai make up mein make up chunkay mukhtalif qisam ke chemical se tayyar kya jata hai jo ke bzahir to un ko khobsorat aur purkashish bananay mein bara ahem kirdaar ada karta hai magar andar se harmons ke nizaam mein bhi koi kami nahi chhorta misaal ke tor par اینڈروجن ki satah mein izafah poooray jism par keel mahason ka baais banti hai aisa nojawani ke daur mein khawateen ke sath aksar hota hai taham darmiyani Umar  mein bhi is ka imkaan hota hai agar kisi khatoon ko aksar sar dar ki shikayat rehti hai zehni تناؤ ya thakawat se hatt kar to yeh ایسٹروجن ki satah mein izafah ka nateeja ho sakta hai ایسٹروجن aisa hormone jo khawateen mein dimagh aur reerh ki haddi ke میٹابولک prasis ko control karta hai agar is ki satah mein izafah hojaye to adhay sarka dard ya chirchiray pan ki shikayat honay lagti hai be khwabi aik khatarnaak alamat hai kyunkay yeh پروجسٹرون ki intahi kam satah se jari hoti hai tibbi mahireen ke mutabiq yeh hormone qudrati tor par pursukoon rakhta hai aur neend ko mamool par lata hai is ki satah mein tabdeeli aksar be khwabi ka baais banti hai aam tor par khawateen jab bachon ko janam deti hain to ایسٹروجن aur پروجسٹرون ki satah mein izafah dekhnay mein aata hai magar is se hatt kar aisa nahi hota to agar aisa ho to yeh dr se rujoo karne ka ishara hai mukhtalif کیمیکز se banay make up ke istemaal se mukhtalif harmonz mein izafah aur kami waqay hoti hai is ke ilawa aur bhi bohat se manfi asraat bhi un ke harmonz par muratab hotay hain jaissa ke wazan mein kami chehray mein balon ka ugna balon ka girna jismani wazan mein izafah sir mein musalsal dard ka rehna neend nah aana bohat ziyada thakawat rehna ziyada paseena aana zehni kamzoree chehray par chambal chehray par chaiyon ka namodaar hona waghera shaamil hain un alamaat ki mazeed tahaqeeq se maloom sun-hwa hai ke aik ہارمونوں اینڈروجن hai jis ki kami chehray par keel mahason ka sabab banti hai aur yeh khawateen mein paye jany walon mein shaamil hai agar un mein se kisi bhi alamat رع numa ho to un ko fori tor par dr se rujoo karna chahiye aur mazeed nuqsaan se bachney ke liye adwiyaat ka istemaal fori shuru kar dena chahiye is liye khawateen make up ke istemaal mein kami layein aur apni zindagi ko sayhat mand aur mehfooz بنایئں so bah Sindh  ke zila thar paar kar ke qeht zada ilaqay mein saaf pani ki qillat kayi hazaron jaanen li gayi ilaaj ki تشخیص ke live munasib intizamaa nah honay ki wajah se wahan ke rehaishi mout ki agosh mein ja rahay hain mehakma sehat ke hakkaam ke mutabiq thar park ke soul hospital muthi mein 3 mazeed bachay غدائیت ki qillat ke baais intqaal kar gaye tafseelaat ke mutabiq mehakma sehat ke hakkaam ka kehna hai ke intqaal karne walay bachon mein 2 nomolood shaamil thay jabkay aik ki Umar  15 din thi un bachon ki amwaat guzashta 24 ghanton ke douran huien jin ka sabab saaf pani ki qillat sameit deegar amraaz thay inka mazeed kehna tha ke guzashta meem 4 mahino mein saaf pani aur ghizaiyat ki qillat se mukhtalif bimarion ny janam liya hai jis ke baais ke halakaton ki tadaad 40 ho gayi hai canada duniya bhar ke emergency room mein jab julne walay dil ko laya jata hai to pehlay dr ای si jee ke zariye dil ki noiyat ka andaza lagatay hain jis mein waqt lagta hai lekin digital انفراریڈ tharmo graphi se yeh kaam bohat aasaan ho sakta hai canada ki mِk gِl university ke maahir hoze loyis رامریز garshya لیونا aur un ke sathiyon ny pi ail o s one mein aik report shaya karai hai jis mein kaha gaya hai ke kisi takleef ke baghair digital انفراریڈ تھرموگرافی ke zariye fori tor par dil ki دھرکن ka andaza lagaya ja sakta hai is technology mein jism se kharij honay wali hararat ko dekha jata hai insani jism mein hararat ka inhisaar khoon ke bahao par hota hai is terhan dil ke andar khoon ke bahao aur mojoodgi ko dekhnay ke liye yeh aik behtar tareeqa hai is terhan baar baar mahireen thrml امیجنگ ke zariye maloom kar saktay hain ke dil theek tareeqay se kaam kar bhi raha hai ya nahi hum jantay hain ke dil ke pump nah karne ke amal mein khoon ki ragein shadeed mutasir hoti hain is terhan khoon ke zariye ahem ajza agay nahi poanch paate aur yun laakh koshisho ke bawajood bhi khoon ka bahao durust nahi hopata mahireen ne is digital انفراریڈ tharmo graphi ke zariye dil ke marz ki تشخیص ki paishgoey ka aik tareeqa bhi waza kya hai is mein dil ke تھرموگرام le kar is ka mawazna sahet mand jald se kya jata hai dil ke تھرموگرام ki tabdeelian is waqt tak dekhi jati hain jab tak woh sayhat mand mand dil ki terhan ka aks nahi deta is ke baad kayi تھرموگرام ko masnoi zahanat ke zariye jancha jata hai aur sirf darja hararat ki tabdeeli se hi dil ke kaam karne ki paishgoey ki gayi jis mein 90 feesad durusti dekhi gayi mِk gِl mahireen ke mutabiq yeh nizaam mareez ke liye aik behtareen pishgoyi karta hai is ki badolat dil mein murda hissay bhi shanakht kiye jasakte hain yahan tak ke ilaaj ke tareeqay aur mareez yeh btai jati hai ke sardiyoon mein hamara dil khoon ko androoni tor par ziyada سڑکولیٹ karta hai jis ki wajah se ziyada darja hararat ziyada honay ki wajah se haath aur paon thanday hi rehtay hain lekin agar garmiyon mein bhi haath thanday day mehsoos ho aur musalsal thanday hi rahen to yeh sangeen bemari ki taraf ishara hai unko foran dr se rujoo karna chahiye khoon ki gardish ki ravani mein masail New York ke ail aayi jay health system ki tahaqeeq mein bataya gaya hai ke khoon ki farahmi mein masail ke baais bhi logon ki ungelian har waqt thandhi reh sakti hain aisa is wajah se hota hai ke nutrition aur oxygen se bharpoor khoon ka بہاؤ jism mein kam honay lagta hai ya dil ki khoon pump karne ki salahiyat mutasir hochuki hoti hai mohqiqeen ka kehna hai ke jab dil jism ke mukhtalif hisson ko munasib miqdaar mein khoon faraham nahi kar paata to is ka asar hathon aur peeron mein thandak be hisi ya soyyan chubne jaisay ehsas se hota hai اینیمیا ( khoon ki kami ) New York university ke mutabiq اینیمیا ke marz mein jism mein khoon ke surkh khaliyaat ki kami hojati hai ya khoon mein haemoglobin ki sharah kam hojati hai is marz mein mubtala honay ki soorat mein jism mein oxygen ki supply mutasir hoti hai jis ka nateeja hathon ki thandak ki shakal mein nikalta hai is marz ki mumkina wajohaat mein ghiza mein iron ki na kafi miqdaar kisi wajah se khoon ka ziyada miqdaar mein beh jana kuch aqsam ke kinsrz aur maiday ke masail waghera shaamil hain hathon ko thanda karne ke sath sath yeh marz sar dar sir chakranay saans lainay mein mushkil aur zard jald jaisay masail ka bhi baais ban sakta hai high blood pressure blood pressure ki satah mein kami ki wajohaat mein jism mein pani ki kami, khoon ka ziyada miqdaar mein beh jana aur makhsoos adwiyaat waghera hosakti hain, jab blood pressure ki satah kam hoti hai to khoon ki shareyanien barah e raast ahem aaza ko khoon faraham karne lagti hain jis ke nateejay mein ungelian thandhi prhjati hain
agar aap ko sir chakranay, nazar dhndlane, matli, kamzoree aur uljan jaisi alamaat mehsoos hon to dr se rujoo karna ziyada behtar hota hai تناؤ aur khauf yeh to aksar afraad ko maloom hai ke zehni تناؤ jism ke mukhtalif hisson par asraat muratab karta hai aur jab kisi fard ko shadeed تناؤ ya khauf ka saamna hota hai to jism aik makhsoos rad-e-amal ka izhaar karta hai jis ke nateejay mein khoon ki shareyanien skrh jati hain aur ungelian aur haath thanday par jatay hain, –apne تناؤ ki satah ko mamool par rakhna is takleef se nijaat dila deta hai tambaku noshi aur sharaab agar aap ke paas cigrette se mun mornay ki wajohaat kam hain to is mein aik aur ka izafah karlen, cigrette noshi se jism mein daakhil honay wala نکوٹین khoon ki sharianon ko sukairh deta hai aur yeh sharianon mein rukawat ka bhi baais bantaa hai, jis se khoon ki ravani mutasir hoti hai aur ungelian barf ki dali ki terhan mehsoos honay lagti hain ﻿اسلام abad ( new زڈیسک ) cheeni science danon naay chaand aur matti jaisay qabil e tahleel ( رینیوایبل ) zaraye se ban'nay wali tawanai ko مؤثر andaaz mein ziada karne wala aik nizaam ijaad kya hai jisay' sandooq mein Sooraj ' ka naam diya gaya hai
yaad rahay ke qabil e tahleel zaraye tawanai ko ziada karne ka مؤثر nizaam Pakistan  mein kahin raaij nahi aur isi bana par yeh hota hai ke lakhoon shamsi tkhtyon ( solr pinlz ) ki tawanai Sooraj  doubtey hi zaya hojati hai
isi amar ke tehat misa چیوسیٹس insti tute of technology ( am aayi tea ) ke naqideen ka naya andaaz wind ٹربائن aur solr plant zaya honay ki soorat mein bhi aik lambay ilaqay ko bijli faraham karsaktha hai
jis se sandooq mein Sooraj  kaha ja raha hai woh aisay barray barray sandooq hain jin mein thos slikon rakhi jasakay gi aur yeh jari hui batrion ( maslan sodium ion ) se kahin ziada mukhtalif bhi hoga
is ke zariye tawanai faraham karne walay nizaam ya grid ko bhi tawanai faraham ki jasakay gi
am aayi tea ke shoba electrical engineering ke پروفیسرایسی gun henry aur un ke taalib ilmoon ny kaha hai ke agar yeh technology mashhoor hojati hai to tawanai ko jama karne ka aik bohat bara masla hal hojaye ga
is amal ki tafseelaat journal of anrji and aynwayrmintl science mein chhupi hui hai
lekin naya tareeqa sale ki bajaye shamsi shu-aon ki murtakiz honay wali tawanai ko jama karta hai aur roshni ki bajaye tawanai ko jama karna qadray munfarid aur kam mehnat talabb hota hai
is mein thandhi thos سلیکن ko istemaal kya jaye ga avrphr usay aik hate pipe se guzaar kar kisi thos ko maya mein tabdeel karkay is se ٹربائن chlakr tawanai banai jasakay gi
lekin is ke liye poooray amal ko buland darjah hararat haasil karne karne ke barabar banana hoga taakay woh is amal mein istemaal honay wali 300 darjay degree centi گریڈگرمی ko bardasht kya ja sakay
is ka dosra version فوٹووولٹائک ya sale tawanai ko bhi hararat mein tabdeel karkay mehfooz kya ja sakta hai
poooray amal ka naam tea ای jee s am pi v rakha gaya hai
sodium aur thos سلیکن ke barray barray sndoqon mein garam honay ke baad slikon shaam ke waqt ubalta sun-hwa گرممٹیریل ban jaye ga
phir usay paypon mein bhar kar solr sale ke اندرسے guzara jaye ga aur woh is roshni se tawanai banayen ge
ab yeh garam maya dobarah sandooq mein aaye ga aur subah Sooraj  niklny par usay dobarah garam kya jasakay ga
isi terhan sandooq se tawanai haasil karne ka amal jari rahay ga

﻿کولاراڈو : duniya ka sab se chhota transformer ijaad karliya gaya hai jis ke oonchai sirf 0
3 mili meter hai, usay duniya ka sab se sasta 3D transformer bhi kaha ja sakta hai, is waqt jitne bhi transformer ban rahay hain yeh un se aik chothai chhota hai
misa چیوسیٹس insti tute of technology ( am aayi tea ) aur university of north kerolina ke science danon nay﻿ usay mushtarqa taknik se banaya hai
transformer ki tayari mein مائیکرو processing tareeqa ikhtiyar kya gaya hai jo wazeh karta hai ke ٹرانسسفارمروں ko mazeed behtar karna mumkin hai
yaad rahay ke puranay tareen kaarkhanon mein 24 mili meter ounchay ٹرانسسفارمر aam they jin ki had pehlay 20 mili meter aur phir 14 mili meter taq pohanchi jin ke zariye Saam  sang ne ae aayi two بایونک processor bana kar duniya mein izzat haasil ki
taham yeh ijaad bilkul nai technology مائیکرو processing tareeqay mein kuch inqalabi tabdeelion ke baad kya gaya hai
tajdeed shuda مائیکرو processing tareeqay ko' thermal nyoklyir layer ایچنگ' ( thermal an ail ای ) ka naam diya gaya hai
science danon ne pehlay mashhoor Simi  انسولیٹڈ انڈیئم گیلیئم آرسینائڈ istemaal kya aur is ka amal hydrogen oxide se karaya
is terhan dhaati oxide ki aik mouti substrate ( androoni ) parat amal mein aayi
is ke baad aik dhaati murakkab die ایتھائل sodium کلورائیڈ ( d ای s si ) dala gaya jis se aik taamul wuqoo Pazeer  sun-hwa
is amal mein ion dhaati oxide se milnay lagey aur dhaati satah par atom ikathay honay lagey
is amal ko lakhoon baar d_hraya gaya jisay mahireen aalo ke chilkay utaarnay ka amal batatay hain
ahem amar yeh hai ke teen mili meter ouncha yeh 3D transformer karkardagi mein deegar ٹرانسسفارمر se 75 feesad behtar hai aur eendhan kam istemaal karta hai
is achi khabar se yun lagta hai ke America  mein barqiyat ka mazeed phelao jari rahay ga aur hum is ki qudrati hudood ke andhay kunvey mein pounchanay se bach jayen ge
Mumbai  ( شوبزڈیسک ) Bollywood adakar Amitabh  bachchan aur Shah  rukh Khan  ab kisi bhi film mein aik sath nazar nahi ayen ge Bharti  zaraye ablaagh ke mutabiq dono adakar فلمسا zay shadeed larai hui hai jiski wajah se woh ab سجو ye gho sh ki تھریلر film badla mein aik sath dikha yi nahi den ge Shah  rukh nay﻿ is se mutaliq paat karne se inkaar kar diya hai jabkay doosri taraf Amitabh  bachchan ka kehna tha ke Shah  rukh Khan  –apne aapko bohat bura hero samajte hain lekin haqeeqat is ke bar aks hai jis ke baad لرائی shiddat ikhtiyar kar gayi wazeh rahay Amitabh  aur Shah  rukh kabhi khushi kabhi gham mohabbtain kabhi alwida nah kehna aur bhoot nath jaisi filmon mein aik sath kaam kar chukay hain? yonayitd nations ka matehat idaara inter گورنمنٹل panel of kalla ئمیٹ chenge ( aayi pi si si ) ki janib se paish kardah surway mein aalmi hiddat ( global waar mng ) se bachao karne ke liye zameeni darjaa hararat mein ki jaaney wali kuch koshishen manzar aam par layi gayi hain
go ke is mein geo science ki baabat tafseeli tor par bta ya gaya hai
science danon ka kehna hai ke kuch maholiyati tabdeelion se zahir hota hai ke aalmi hiddat ko 4 degree centi gir ‫d se ziyada nah badhaane ke liye geo science ki khidmaat na گذیر hain
geo science ki ziyada tar tiknalojiz mein ya to barqi shu-aon ko asli baadalon se khala mein munakis kya ja taa hai ya zameen ki satah mein mojood green house gasson ki kasafat karkay un ki taaqat mein kami ki jati hai
baad azan tecnology ko manfi ikhraj ke naam se mansoob kya ja taa hai, jis mein kamrah bana kar zameen se carbon mono oxide ko kasheed kya jata hai jo pani mein hal hui chitta no n se mil kar zameen se rafa ho jati hai
lekin baaz science danon ka kehna hai ke yeh tiknalojiz abhi taq ghair fa-aal hain jin ke asraat maloom hain
aayi pi si si ka surway tayyar karne walon ka kehna hai ke is baat ke saboot miley hain ke sirf ikhraj mein kami kaafi had taq nateeja khaiz ho gi
science danon ke mutabiq is surway mein khaas tor par is baat ka tajurbah kya gaya hai ke chhote pemanay pur aab wahwa ki makoos tabdeeli ke liye aik makhsoos arsay taq zameeni mahol se carbon mono oxide ki kasafat zurori ho gi
chand کلائمیٹ model se pata laga ya gaya hai ke temper یچر ko 4 degree centi gir ‫d se kam rakhnay ke liye mahol se carbon mono oxide ka misbet ikhraj zurori hoga
is ke baad barqi inikaas tar تیب magnetic radiation management اورکاربن muno oxide ke misbet ikhraj carbon mono oxide removal jaisay awamil ka mukammal maloomat le kar un ki aabb wahwa ki tabdeeli par asraat ke record haasil karne hon ge
America  mein qaim york yonyo rusty mein کلائمیٹ astdiz ke par وفیسر پائرس فارسٹر jo is surway mein bhi shaamil they, un ka kehna hai ke is baat ka saboot mojood hai ke agar aap ikhraj mein qaboo ki hikmat e amli nahi apnatay to aindah baras mein aisay na guzeer tajarbaat karne parrin ge
mojooda waqt mein bohat barray pemana par geo science ke tehqiqati mansoobay kaam kar rahay hain, jis mein zameen se carbon nikaalte ke liye dobarah karkhanay laganay ke ilawa bayo feul ha salle karne walay prajikts se carbon ko allag karna hai
un mansoobon par tahaqeeq karne walay usatza is par barham hain ke un mansoobon par tahaqeeq karne ke liye wasail ki kuch kami hai
lekin is surway ke baad yeh iradah tabdeel ho sakta hai
is surway se yeh bhi shuba hota hai ke ab kaafi had taq un tahaqeeq par amal Dur  aamad ke liye logon ki be cheeni barh rahi hai
yeh baat can کالڈیرانے kahi thi jo mexico ke آٹونومس university ke car نیگی insti tution of science mein kalla ئمنٹ par tajurbah karte hain
un ka mazeed kehna tha ke is ka pata lagana mushkil hoga ke kitney dollars ka izafah awaami dil chaspi bherne ke baais hoga aur kitna surway anay ke baad hoga
science danon ke mutabiq geo science tiknik ki baabat sirf maloomat ka masla nahi hai balkay is ki technical awamil, awaami qabuliat, phelao aur is ke mumkina asraat ki baabat kayi mazakraat peda ho te hain
Bar  tanih ki manchester university ke جیوانجینئرنگ department ke numainday ka kehna hai ke qanoon daan aisay zurori aatrazat ki wajohaat jane baghair hi khush hain
geo science ke bohat se science danon koyh masla hai ke is shoba mein malomt ka shadeed fuqdaan hai, is liye a noon science ka barray pemanay par istemaal bohat kam ho raha hai
Albata  is baat par tajurbah kya ja raha hai ke tahaqeeq aur taraqqi ke baad kon si science behtareen hain aur ھمالیہ ki barf par tahaqeeq se science danon ko yeh samaghnay ko bhi miley ga ke kis tar h iqdamaat kar ke daryaaon ki satah mein izafay ko sust kya ja sakta hai
ilawa azeen baadalon par tahaqeeq kar ke yeh tajurbah kya jasakay ga ke maqnateesi shu-aon ki ridishn ko kis tar h badhaaya ja sakta hai
Pakistan  gurday nakara honay ki bemari se njad panay laga Islamabad guzashta barson mein malik bhar mein gurday nakara honay ki bemari bohat phail gayi thi jab ke gurdon ki bemari ke baais Pakistan  mein salana 20 hazaar afraad amwaat hoti thi gurday nakara honay ke baais wifaqi dar-al-hakoomat Islamabad ke pmz hospital mein waqay dialisis unit mein guzashta 5 baras ke douran kal 72294 martaba mareezon ke dialisis kiye gaye thay di mirror ke haliya reports ke mutabiq rawan saal Pakistan  ny heran kin had tak is bemari par qaboo pa kar kayi zindagion ka khatam honay se bacha liya hai guzashta chand Bar  soon mein mareekh ke hawalay mutadid khabrain samnay aa rahi hain ab mahireen ny mareekh par pani aur oxygen ki munasib miqdaar daryaft ki hai aik report ke mutabiq yahan par mojood matti mein pani aur oxygen mojood hai mareekh par beje gaye khalayi robot کیوروسٹی ny chand pathar bhi dekhe hain jo pani aur oxygen se bhar poor hain mahireen ka andaza hai ke shayad yeh pani aur oxygen zindagi ke liye kaafi hoga ilawa azeen mareekh par namkeen pani ke zakhair bhi miley hain jahan oxygen bohat ziyada miqdaar mein mojood hai is California mein qaim jet proplshn laboratory ( jay pi ail ) ke science daan اسٹاکن کووچ ka kehna hai mareekh ke mukhtalif maqamat par herat angaiz Dur  یافتیں ki hain jaissa ke mareekh ki matti taley mojood pani aur oxygen ki miqdaar saada hayaat ke liye kaafi hai is ke ilawa wahan namkeen pani ke zakhair bhi mojood hain is mein bacteria aur sponge ki nashonuma ke liye oxygen ki bhar poor miqdaar payi jati hai jo jandaroon ko baasani zindah rakh sakti hai is liye mahireen ka kehna hai ke un daryafton ka yahi matlab hai ke mareekh par zindagi mojood hai aur zindagi ki azmaish ke liye tecnology bhi dastyab hai taa hum is zimn mein 2020 hamza mein Nasa  apna aik jadeed tareen robot mareekh par beje ga jo mareekh par zindagi mojood honay ki nishandahi kere ga turkey mein roos ke tmatron ki barhti ho maang ke baad 5 mazeed turkey companiyon ne roos ke tmatron ki daraamad ka faisla kya hai turkey ke wizarat zaraat ki zair sadarat aik ahem satah ka ijlaas sun-hwa jis mein yeh faisla kiya gaya turkey mein roos ke tmatron ki barhti ho maang ke paish e nazar turkey ab roos ki 5 companiyon se tmatron ki daraamad par amal daraamad ka silsila jummay ko shuru kere ga wazeh rahay ke turkey mahireen naay guzashta saal timatar daraamad karne walay mutaliqa 5 roosi companiyon ka mukammal mushahida kya tha jis ke baad inhen mazeed timatar daraamad karne ki ijazat di thi mahireen ka kehna hai ke turkey mein roos se tmatron ki daraamad ke baad mulki talabb ko poora kya ja sakay ga science daano ka kehna hai ke khawateen –apne hum Umar  mardon ke mad-muqabil teen saal ziyada jawan rehti hai vashngtn Amrici  scienci journal national academy of science mein shaya honay walay aik mutanazia maqalay mein science daano ka kehna hai ke khawateen apni Umar  ke mardon ke muqablay mein 3 saal ziyada jawan hoti hain yahi wajah hai ke khawateen zaefi ki Umar  ko poanch kar bhi jawan nazar aati hain vashngtn university ke science daano ney logon ke ki تحولی Umar  jan-nay ke liye jadeed scienci bunyadon par tahaqeeq ki jis ke liye aik khaas tareeqay ایروبک galai کولائسس ka istemaal kya gaya is tareeqay mein bachpan se burhapay taq dimagh ki numoo mein honay wali tabdeelion ko jhanchne ke liye glucose ki sharah record ki jati hai zaeef afraad ke dimagh se glucose ki nihayat kam miqdaar pump hoti hai jis ke baais dimagh ke khaliyaat aur نروز ko muqarara tawanai muyassar nahi hopati lekin is Umar  ki khawateen mein bhi dekha gaya ke mardon ke muqablay mein un ke dimagh mein glucose ki waafar miqdaar mojood hoti hai science daano nay﻿ is tahaqeeq ke liye aik hi Umar  ki 121 khawateen aur 84 mardon ka intikhab kya un tamam afraad ke dimagh ka pi ای tea scan karaya gaya is test mein dimagh mein oxygen aur glucose ke بہاؤ ko naapa jata hai test ke nataij heran kin saabit hue khawateen apni Umar  ke lehaaz se 3 saal 8 mah jawan jab ke mard hazraat 2 saal 4 mah ziyada boorhay nazar atay hain kaha jata hai ke aabb zam zam mein mout ke ilawa har terhan ki bemari se Shifa  ka ilaaj mumkin hai usay Rohani  aur muqaddas pani kehna ghalat nah hoga quran o ahadees se bhi is ki fazeelat wazeh bayan hoti hai bohat si aankhon dekhi kahaaniyon ke mutabiq aabb zam zam mein bohat si bimarion ka ilaaj yakeeni hai sugar aur blood pressure ke mareezon ko bhi is se afaqa sun-hwa hai aur kayi mahino taq to inhen khana khanay ki zaroorat bhi mehsoos nahi hui kaamil imaan se yeh pani piinaa mukammal Shifa  deta hai nabi pak sale Allah  aleh wasalam ke mutabiq is pani mein Shifa  hai un ke mutabiq is mein bimarion ke liye Shifa  chhupi hui hai is liye blood pressure aur zehni dabao ke shikaar mareezon ko chahiye ke woh ab zam se honay walay faiday bhi gayab hogaye Bartania  mein الزائیمر ki maahir dr Rosa  سانچو ny kaha ke khasosan Umar  Raseedah  afraad mein jismani mushaqqat aur werzish dil ki sahet ko behtar banati hai bartarfi ka notification jari karna para ﻿امریکی business companiyon' کوال com' aur' Apple ' ke درمیاب customer care ke tanaza par chain ki adalat naay' aayi pod' ki chain mein farokht par pabandi aed kar di
adalat naay –apne bayan mein kaha ke فوژو intermediate peoples part کوال com ki darkhwast par fori tor par aayi pod 6ایس, aayi pod 6ایس plus, aayi pod 7, aayi pod 7 plus, aayi pod 8, aayi pod 8 plus aur aayi pod x ki farokht ka hukum deti hai
adalat ne Apple  ko کوال com ke soft viyrz ke saat patent ki khilaaf warzi ka murtakib qarar diya
America  ki do barri business companiyon کوال com aur Apple  ke darmain aik arsay se pitnt aur kstmr care par sard jung jari hai
کوال com ke wakeel don rosin barg ney –apne bayan mein kaha ke appeal hamari personal properly se faida utha raha tha jabkay hamein software ada karne se bhi mana kardiya
software ke pitnt ke hawalay se masail ke baad Apple  mazeed masail se bachney ke liye apna data tayyar kere gi taakay woh –apne aayi pod beech sakay
کوال com ney Amrici  hakkaam se bhi mutalba kiya hai ke woh kstmr care ke masail ke sabab aayi pod par pabandi aed kere lekin is hawalay se inkaar karte rahay hain
﻿نئی Dehli  / 16 augst ( agency )' dream girl' pryanka chopra Australia  ke askrpt writer nuk جونس se shadi kar ke jald hi canada jany wali hai, is se pehlay yeh premi aaj ( 16 augst ) ko agrah mein –apne valima ka dawat nama dainay jari hai, prinka chopra aur nuk ki shadi agrah ke taaj mehal ke ihatay mein hui hai, jahan chopra aur جونس khandan ny kaafi masti ki hai, lekin is ke darmain pryanka ki honay wali bhabhi ka راجھستانی style pryanka ke Amrici  madahon ko kuch ziyada hi pasand aaraha hai. pryanka chopra ke jaith جونس ki mangetar سوفی ٹنر kindin film industry ka jana maana naam hai, btadin ke duniya bhar mein mashhoor TV series سیکرڈ games mein سوفی turner ahem kirdaar mein hai. London  ( monitoring desk ) zehni tanao ke shikaar ensaan ko mukhtalif mushkilaat ka saamna karna parta hai ke bachay bhi ho saktay hain agar un mein peda honi wali khwahisaat ko poora nah kya jaye to ensaan zehni dabao ka shikaar honay ki wajah se depration jaisi muzir sahet bemari mein mubtala ho jata hai aisay mauqa par intehai koshish ke bawajood ensaan –apne aap ko un manfi pehlu se daur nahi kar paata mukhtalif t_hwaron par ensaan ko kayi terhan ki trghibat ka saamna hota hai jin mein kayi manfi bhi hoti hain maslan ziyada cigrette ki talabb ziyada khana waghera agar un khwahisaat ko poora nah kya jaye to ensaan zehni تناؤ ka shikaar ho jata hai aik maahir nafsiat naay un manfi trghibat se chhutkara panay ka aik intahi aaasaaan hal bta diya hai di mirror ke mutabiq jo ہیمنگزنامی maahir naay saabit kya hai ke kuch afraad muzar e sehat ashya chorney ki koshish mein masroof hotay hain koi tehwar aa janay ki soorat mein un ki koshish nakaam ho jati hai himngz ke mutabiq aisay logon ko chahiye ke aisay moqaon par agar mukhtalif waqfon mein paon par barf rakh di jaye is se un ke andar mukhtalif ashya ke liye uthnay wali talabb kam ho jaye gi is se inhen zehni تناؤ se bhi nijaat mili gi jo log nasha aawar cheeje jaissa ke cigrette sharaab waghera chhorna chahtay hain yeh tareeqa un ke liye behtareen aur faida mand ho sakta hai nai Dehli  15 decemeber ( agency ) bain al aqwami satah par khaam tail ki qeemat mein gravt se diesel musalsal sasta ho raha hai Dehli  mein hafta ke roz petrol ki qeemat mein 5 pesey ka izafah hogaya jabkay diesel ki qeemat mein 7 pesey ki kami waqay hui is kami ke baad Dehli  mein hafta ko petrol 70. 34 rupay fi letter aur diesel 64. 50 rupay fi letter ki satah par aa gaya agarchay maana ja raha hai ke petrol ki qeemat jald hi 70 rupay fi letter ke neechay aur diesel ki qeemat 64 rupay fi letter ke neechay aa sakti hai kyunkay rupiya mazboot ho raha hai aur bain al aqwami market mein khaam tail halki rikori ke baad phir se gir gaya hai Dehli  mein nai qeematein petrol 70. 34 rupay fi letter diesel 64. 50 rupiye fi letter kehte hain اگرخود priqin hoto ensaan himalaya bhi sir karsaktha hai

barray bhai متلو اوزل aur دوبہنیں نیسی اوزل aur ڈوگیو اوزل hain
1967 میںمسعود اوزل ke khandan naay behtar zindagi guzaarne ke liye turkey se hijrat ki aur Germany  ke zila بسمارک par aakar bas gaye, جہاںان ke ilawa مزیدتارکین watan panah gzin camp mein rahaish Pazeer  they

lekin dada dainee padtee hai science danon ko jo aisay bohat se digrmsayl ki terhan is maslay ka hal nikaalte mein bhi kamyaab ho gaye hain
ghair mulki tehqeeqi jareeday science mein shaya honay wali report ke mutabiq science danon naay aik aisi battery tayaar karli hai jisay mahinay mein sirf 2 baar charge karna parre ga
yeh battery kamray ke daraja hararat mein behtareen kaam kere gi
is floride ion battery ko jet laboratory, کالٹیک, larns برکلی national laboratory Nasa , honda reserch insti tute ke mahireen par mushtamil team neh tayyar kya hai jisay aik بارچارج karne ke baad taqreeban do hafton tak dobarah charge karne ki zaroorat nahi rehti
tehqeeqi team ke sarbarah aur 2005 hamza mein noble inaam haasil karne walay chemiya ke professor Robert  grbs ney bataya ke floride ion battery murawaja لیتھیم batrion ke muqablay mein 8 gina taaqat war hoti hain aur inhen 15 din taq charge karne ki zaroorat nahi padtee
team ke sarbarah professor Robert  grace ke mutabiq aam istemaal ki jany wali لیتھیم batrion ke muqablay mein yeh floride ion battery 8 gina ziyada taaqatwar hai isi liye usay kaafi dinon taq ree charge karne ki zaroorat paish nahi aati
fi al haal yeh nai ijaad tayari ke marahil mein hai lekin is ke nataij heran kin hon ge
1970 hamza mein bhi science daan floride ion battery bananay mein kamyaab hogaye thay taham is ki tayari mein thos ajzaa istemaal kiye gaye thay jis ki wajah se yeh betria sirf buland darjah hararat par hi kaam kar paati theen chunancha science daano ki yeh koshish nakaam rahi
is baar science daan is maslay ka hal bhi dhoandne mein kamyaab hogaye aur pehli martaba aisi floride ion battery tayyar karli hai jo kamray ke darjaa hararat par bhi behtareen tareeqay se kaam kere gi
world bank ka kehna hai ke Pakistan  aur Bharat  ke darmain tijarat ka hajam 2 arab dollar hai jo mumkina tor par 37 arab dollar taq ho sakta hai jumaraat ko glass aadha bhara sun-hwa janoobi asia mein علاقاتی tijarat ke wada ke naam se jari honay wali world bank ki report ke mutabiq Pakistan  aur Bharat  ke darmain tijarat un ki salahiyat se bohat ziyada kam hai aur is mein izafah tab hi mumkin ho sakta hai jab dono mumalik –apne darmain banai gayi masnoi ruukawaton ko khud khatam karen report mein bataya gaya hai ke Pakistan  janoobi asia mein 39 arab 70 crore rupay ki tijarat karne ki salahiyat rakhta hai lekin is ka mojooda tijarti hajam sirf 5 arab aik crore dollar hai aalmi bank ki janib se report guzashta roz jari ki gayi jis mein tijarat se mutaliq 4 rkavton ko numaya kya gaya hai maahir iqtisadiat snje کتھوریا naay wrld bank ke daftar par sahafion se guftagu karte hue is report ke cheeda cheeda nakaat bayan kiye un ka kehna tha ke mera maanna hai ke bharoosay se tijarat farogh paati aur tijarat ke bherne se bharosa aur aman ke liye hum ahangi mein izafah hota hai unhon naay kaha ke Pakistan  aur Bharat  ki hukoomaton ki janib se krtar poor raahdaari ke khilnay se dono mumalik ke darmain Adam  aetmaad ki fiza kam hogi aur is iqdaam se dono mumalik ke darmain bharosa barhay ga dono humsaayon ke darmain tijarat ko badhaane ka mahswara dete hue report ke musannif ka kehna tha dono mumalik ko ibtidayi marahil mein makhsoos masnoaat ki tijarat ko barhana hoga snje کتھوریا ney yeh bhi bataya ke Pakistan  ke janoobi asiayi mumalik ke sath hawai raabtey bhi kam se kam hain aur yahan se Afghanistan  aur Bharat  ke liye hafta waar 6 flayts jati hain Bangladesh aur Srilanka ke liye 10 flayts jati hain nepal ke liye aik jabkay bhotan aur maldip ke liye Pakistan  se hafta waar koi flight nahi jati unhon ney Bharat  ki misaal dete hue bataya ke Bharat  se Srilanka ke liye hafta waar 147 flights jati hain Bangladesh ke liye 67 maldip ke liye 32 nepal ke liye 71 Afghanistan  ke liye 22 aur bhotan ke liye 23 flights Bharat  se jati hain پیساڈینا, California  : Nasa  ke jadeed tareen khalayi jahaaz ney haal hi mein pehli martaba zameen ki janib' mareekh' ki aawaz record karkay arsaal ki hai jo wahan sun-hwa chalne ki baais peda horahee thi
yakam decemeber ko Nasa  ko incite khalayi laboratory ki janib se mareekhi aawaz ki file masool hui hai
agarchay is khalayi jahaaz ko aawaz record karne ke liye design nahi kya gaya tha balkay is mein mareekhi zlzlon, fazai tahaqeeq, hawai dabao aur mausam ka ahwaal maloom karne walay jadeed tareen alaat nasb kiye gaye hain taham audio file bhi masool hogayi hai zail mein di gayi video rerecording mein aawaz aap bhi sun satke hain
masool shuda aawaz ki file khud mareekhi hawaon ka shore nahi balkay yeh incite par lagey gole shamsi ( solar ) pinlz se sun-hwa ke takaraane ke baad peda shuda irtiaash ki soorat mein record hui hai
incite par nasb jadeed tareen s ای aayi s nizaam mein do hassas tareen zalzala pema ( سیسمومیٹر ) nasb hain un mein aik mukhtasir muddat ke artaashat mehsoos karne wala سلیکن sensor bhi laga hai jo 50 hurts ki aawaz mehsoos karsaktha hai jo insani samaat ke kam tareen darjay mein shaamil hai
سلیکن sensor London  ke imperial college nay﻿ tayyar kya hai
incite science team ke rukan tam پائک ne kaha ke yeh aik bohat barray kaan ki terhan hai
solr pinlz ke atraaf lagey sensor aur is se takaraane wali aawaz aasani se record hogayi hai jo suneney mein kuch ajeeb bhi lagti hai
Nasa  nay﻿ aawaz ki file mein koi tabdeeli nahi ki hai aur usay waisay hi jari kya hai lekin usay suneney ke liye head phones aur ووفر ki zaroorat hogi

tibbi mahireen neh kaha musalsal aik jagah par bethnay ke bajaye waqfay waqfay se tally vision dekhanaa chahiye Dubai  23 November  ( siyasat dot com ) newzea land cricket team ke head coach Gary  اسٹیڈ neh kaha hai ke Pakistan  is khittay mein kaafi mazboot team hai jin ko shikast dena qatee aassan nahi lekin Pakistani  team ab newzea land ko aassan samajhney ki ghalti nahi kere gi abozhbi tst mein maheman team ne ghair mamooli halaat mein mehez chaar runs se kamyabi haasil kar ke 141 sala tareekh mein runs ke aitbaar se panchwin qareeb tareen fatah ko yakeeni banaya jo Gary  اسٹیڈ ki awleen kamyabi bhi thi jinhon ne augst mein mayik hisn ki jagah head coach ka ohda sanbhala hai newzea land ke head coach ko yaqeen hai ke un ki team ki kamyabi dosray test se qabal Pakistani  team ka Pakistani  team inhen aaasaaan samajhney ki ghalti hargiz nahi kere gi Gary  اسٹیڈ ke بموجب inhen tawaqqa hai ke Pakistani  team Dubai  mein ziyada behtar khail paish kere gi aur woh bhi is ka jawab dainay ke liye tayyar hain kyunkay newzea land naay beron malik 1969 hamza ke baad Pakistan  kay khilaaf koi series nahi jeeti lehaza is nateejay ko badalny ke liye inhen kahin ziyada mehnat darkaar ka yahi miyaar Dubai  mein bhi qaim rakhen ge California  ( web disk ) Facebook ki tajurbah gaahon mein is waqt Facebook messenger ke liye un send option ki azmaish shuru kar di gayi hai jisay jald hi Facebook ka hissa banadiya jaye ga
aik aur khabar ke mutabiq usay mark زکربرگ bhi istemaal kar rahay hain
pehlay marhaly par usay messenger app ke liye muta-arif kya jaye ga
mark زکربرگ is option ko kayi baar istemaal karkay –apne paighamaat delete kar chukay hain
taham is ahem option ka Facebook ki janib se bazabta elaan nahi kya gaya hai

سوریز ka 100 win muqablay mein faisla kin gole یوروگوے naak out marhalay mein daakhil kazan, moscow
21 June  ( siyasat dot com ) Fifa  world cupp mein spain aur Portugal  ki kamyabi ke sath hi aglay marhalay mein rasai ke imkanaat roshan hogaye hain jabkay –apne kryir ke 100 muqablay mein faislay kin gole karte hue سوریز ney yorogoye ko naak آؤٹ marhalay mein pouncha diya hai
اسپینی team ne mega event mein apni jagah ko bachanay ka samaan karliya jaissa ke is ke Iran  kay khilaaf 1-0 se kamyabi mein digo kosta ke gole ka ahem کرداررہا
Portugal  ko کرسٹیانو Ronaldo  ny مراقش kay khilaaf jeet se ہمکنارکروایا to loys سواریز ke 100 win match mein gole ny team ko 1-0 se fatah دلادی-سعودی gole keeper Mohammad  الاویس karnr se lagai hui kk par ریباؤنڈ ko roknay mein nakaam rahay jis ke baad teen temen ghar wapsi ke liye tayyar ho gayeen
tafseelaat ke mutabiq kazan ayrina mein khailay gaye group bi muqablay mein spain ka saamna Iran  se sun-hwa to dono teamon nay﻿ poori qowat ka muzahira kiya lekin pehlay half mein koi gole nahi kiya ja saka
khail ke 54 win minute mein spain ke digo kosta naay gole kar ke apni team ko bartari dilae jo khail ke aakhir tak barqarar rahi jis ki badolat spain ke event mein baqi rehne ka mauqa mil gaya
is se qabal din ke pehlay match mein لوزنیکی stadium par group bi ki teamon Portugal  aur مراقش ne maidan sanbhala to Ronaldo  ne shumali africi team ko shikast dainay mein der nahi ki aur khail ke chouthay minute mein perfect hidr par pehla gole kar ke apni team ko bartari dladi jo khail ke ekhtataam taq rahi
yeh purtagali sticker رونالڈوکا events mein choutha gole raha jo مراقش ke events se ikhraj ke liye kaafi hogaya aur is ke liye inhen mean of di match bhi qarar diya gaya
purtagali team pehlay half mein khail par mukammal haawi rahi jis naay dosray half mein bohat aaccha khail paish nahi kya lekin hareef team is ka faida uthany mein nakaam rahi
group ae ke match mein روسٹوف ayrina mein yorogoye ne Saudi  arab ko 1-0 se maat day kar naak آؤٹ marhalay ke liye qualify کرلیاجو chay nishanaat ke sath roos ke baad fehrist mein dosray maqam par hai
is match mein yorogoye ki kamyabi ke markazi kirdaar loys سواریز they jinhon naay –apne malik ki janib se 100 win match ko yadgar بنایاجب khail ke 23 win minute mein karnr se lagai gayi kk ko unhon naay gole post mein daakhil kardiya taham is mein Saudi  gole keeper Mohammad  الاویس bhi barabar ke hissay daar they jo baal ko roknay میںناکام rahay aur un ki team amli tor par events se bahar ho gayi

Afghanistan  football federation ke secretary general syed Ali  Raza  aaqa zaadah naay un ilzamaat ko mann gharat qarar diya tha lekin malik ki olympic committee ke saddar Hafeez  Allah  walii raheemi naay un inkishafaat ko durust qarar dete hue kaha tha ke is terhan ke ilzamaat naye nahi hain
Hafeez  Allah  naay kaha ke fidrishnz ke srbrahan, trinrz aur saathi khiladion ki janib se hamesha se hi harasan kya jata raha hai, hamein maazi mein bhi shikayaat masool hoti rahi hain aur un haqayiq ko jhtlaya nahi ja sakta
Afghan  saddar ne un ilzamaat par barhami ka izhaar karte hue kaha ke agar mehez ilzamaat ko dekhte hue log apni baityon aur beton ko khelon ki janib bhejnay se rokkk satke hain to phir hamein fori tor par iqdamaat karne ki zaroorat hai, mein jinsi tor par پراساں karne ko kisi tor par bardasht nahi karoon ga
un ka kehna tha ke duniya ki koi taaqat hamaray bachon ko zayad-ti ka nishana nahi bana sakti aur is terhan ke waqeat se nimatnay ke liye hamari sports fidrishnz mein baqaida frame work mojood hai

tasweer ke copy write epa guzashta haftay America  tail bar aamad karne wala malik ban gaya, yani is ki khaam tail ki kal daraamad ke muqablay mein is ki tail ki baraamdaat mein izafah ho gaya hai
aisa pichlle 75 barson mein pehli baar sun-hwa hai kyunkay America  ab tak tail ke liye deegar mumalik se draamdat par ziyada inhisaar karta raha hai
saddar Donald  trmp America  ko tawanai ke shobay mein khud kafeel bananay ki baat kayi baar keh chuke hain
America  mein tail ki pedawar mein dramayi andaaz mein izafah sun-hwa hai
riyasat tikss ke پیرمیئن ilaqay mein, new mexico, janoobi ڈکوٹا ke beckon aur riyasat pinsloynya ke ilaqay مرسلز mein tail ke hazaron knoon se tail nikala ja raha hai
un knoon par America  barson se kaam kar raha tha
pichlle haftay jo adaad o shumaar samnay aaye is se pata chalta hai ke America  ki tail ki daraamad mein kami aayi aur bar aamad mein bhaari izafah sun-hwa hai
ho sakta hai ke America  tail ka chhota daraamad kanandah malik hamesha rahay lekin ab pehlay wali baat nahi reh gayi ke woh ghair mulki tail par hi inhisaar karta rahay ga
America  ke anrji stritijk aur economic reserch ke sarbarah Michael  lunch ne bloom barg se baat karte hue kaha ke' hum log tawanai ki pedawar wala duniya ka taaqatwar malik ban gaye hain
' yeh bhi parheen! tail ki qeematon ki siyasat' irani tail ki farokht par pabandiyan aahista aahista lagayen ge' tail ki tarseel sirf niji oil tinkrz par kyun? Saudi  arab ke paas tail ka kitna zakheera mojood hai? pichlle 50 barson mein avpik duniya bhar mein tail ki siyasat ka markaz raha hai lekin roos aur America  mein tail ke barhatay zakhair ke baad avpik ki ajarah daari chilinj hoti nazar aa rahi hai
guzashta haftay vyana mein avpik aur is ke dost mumalik ka aik ijlaas sun-hwa tha
avpik ko dar hai ke agar America  tail ki pedawar berhata hai to is ka aalmi manndi par barah e raast asar parre ga
tasweer ke copy write epa avpik kya kere ga? ای aayi ae ke sabiq tajzia car ہیلما craft ka kehna hai ke' avpik athl pthl ke daur se guzar raha hai
' America  ki anrji information administration yani ای aayi ae ke mutabiq America  pichlle haftay se har din do laakh 11 hazaar barrel kacha tail aur ریفائنڈ pedawar beron malik farokht kar raha hai
un mein diesel aur gasoleen ahem hain
ای aayi ae ka kehna hai ke sunah 1991 se pehlay America  mein tail ki daraamad ka data hafta waar hota tha jabkay mahana data jari karne ka silsila 1973 mein shuru sun-hwa tha
Amrici  petroleum insti tute ka kehna hai ke America  ne 1940 ki dahai se tail daraamad karna shuru kya tha
aaj ki tareekh mein America  tail ke muamlay mein khodkfil malik ban chuka hai
Amrici  hukoomaton ke liye tail ke muamlay mein khud kifalat hamesha se aik khawab raha hai
America  tail ke kam se kam no mazeed ٹرمینلز par kaam kar raha hai
decemeber ke aakhri mahinay se America  se tail ki bar aamad mazeed bherne ke imkanaat hain
ڈیلویئر besan se tail nikaalte ka kaam ab bhi barray pemanay par shuru nahi ho paaya hai
ڈیلویئر besan ke baaray mein khayaal hai ke tail ka zakheera mdlind besan se do gina hai
tasweer ke copy right getty images ab America  tail beech raha hai haliya adaad o shumaar ke mutabiq America  ab tail khardney se ziyada tail farokht kar raha hai
you s jyolojikl surway ka kehna hai ke America  duniya bhar se har din 70 laakh barrel se ziyada kacha tail apni rifaynri ke liye daraamad kar raha hai
un rifaynriz ko har din aik crore 70 laakh barrel kachay tail ki zaroorat padtee hai
America  mein tail ki pedawar har saal 20 feesad ki sharah se barh rahi hai
pichli aik sadi mein America  ki tail ki pedawar sab se taizi se barhi hai
sunah 2016 mein ریسٹاڈ anrji ki aik report aayi thi, jis mein bataya gaya tha ke America  ke paas 264 arab barrel tail ke zakhair hain
is mein mojooda tail ke zakhair, naye پراجیٹکس, haal mein daryaft kiye gay tail ke zakhair, sab shaamil hain
is report mein bataya gaya hai ke America  ke paas roos aur Saudi  arab se ziyada tail ke zakhair hain
ریسٹاڈ anrji ke andazay ke mutabiq roos mein tail 256 arab barrel, Saudi  arab mein 212 arab barrel, canada mein 167 arab barrel, Iran  mein 143 aur brazil mein 120 arab barrel hai
tasweer ke copy write getty images Saudi  arab ke paas kitna tail hai tail bar aamad karne walay mumalik ki tanzeem avpik ko Saudi  arab ki hukoomat ne tail ke zakhair ka jo andaza bataya hai is ke mutabiq is ke tail ke zakhair 266 arab barrel hain
avpik ne sunah 2015 mein –apne salana blitn mein is baray mein maloomat di theen
agar yeh miqdaar sahih hai to ostan 1. 2 crore barrel yomiya pedawar ke hisaab se Saudi  arab ka tail aglay 70 barson mein khatam ho jaye ga
lekin sarkari adaad o shumaar ke hawalay se kaafi shukook o shubhat hain
is ki wajah yeh hai ke sunah 1987 mein Saudi  arab naay –apne tail ke zakhair 170 arab barrel betaye they, jisay sunah 1989 mein barha kar 260 arab barrel kar diya gaya tha
ryoyo of world anrji 2016 ki report ke mutabiq Saudi  arab 94 arab barrel tail beech chuka hai ya kharch kar chuka hai, phir bhi sarkari adaad o shumaar ke mutabiq is ke zakhair 260 se 265 arab barrel hi hain
agar sarkari data sahih hai to is ka matlab yeh hai ke Saudi  arab ne tail ke naye thikaanay talaash kar liye hain ya phir mumkina zakhair ko hi barha diya hai
Saudi  arab mein 1936 se 1970 ke darmain hi tail ke zakhair ke barray aur be shumaar thikanon ki daryaft hui thi
is ke baad is ke muqablay mein Saudi  arab mein tail ke naye zakhair ki daryaft nahi hui hai
masla yeh hai ke jahan jahan tail ki pedawar ho rahi hai is ke baaray mein maloomat hukoomat kaafi khufia rakhti hai
is ki maloomat andar ke gannay chuney logon ko hoti hai
aisay mein kisi bhi daaway ki tasdeeq karna namumkin sa lagta hai
tail ke tajzia karon par inhisaar par bhi yeh sawalia nishaan hai ke woh is baat ko bitanay ki position mein nahi ke Saudi  arab mein tail ki pedawar kab girna shuru hogi
Saudi  arab ab bhi sab se ziyada tail ki pedawar kar raha hai
is se is paish goi ko jhatka laga hai jis mein bataya gaya tha ke Saudi  arab ki pedawar buland tareen satah par jane ke baad neechay aa jaye gi
tasweer ke copy write getty images Saudi  arab aur America  ke taluqaat kis qader badal gay? Saudi  arab tail ki pedawar walay mumalik ki tanzeem avpik ka sab se ahem malik hai
avpik duniya ke 40 feesad tail ko control karta hai
America  haliya barson tak duniya ka sab se bara tail daraamad karne wala malik raha hai aur is liye Saudi  arab ke sath is ki dosti mazeed ba maqsad ho jati hai
lekin jab America  ziyada tail daraamad karne wala malik hi nahi rahay ga to Saudi  arab is ke liye kyun ahem rahay ga? kya America  mashriq wasti mein Saudi  arab ka sath chore sakta hai? zahir hai sifarat kaari aur bahami taluqaat do Tarfah  mafadaat par qaim hotay hain
Saudi  arab aur America  ke darmain ahem tijarat tail aur hathyaaron ki hoti hai
web desk : cheeni company naay Karachi  mein munaqidah Pakistan  auto show 2017 ke plate form se kam qeemat electric gariyaan muta-arif karade hain, jadeed aur deedaa Zaib  design ki haamil electric karon ki factory price 3 hazaar se 5 ہزارڈالر hai
company ki janib se 3 darwazon aur 4 siton wali bayi money ای v car ke 3 models aindah saal Pakistan  mein farokht ke liye paish kiye jayen ge jin mein akanomi, kmfrt able aur luxury models shaamil hain
akanomi ki qeemat 3 hazaar dollar, kmfrt able ki qeemat 4 hazaar dollar jabkay luxury model ki factory price 5? ہزارڈالر btai jati hai
aykspo center mein shirkat karne wali cheeni company ke numaindon ney bataya ke un ki company chain mein electric gariyaan bananay wali sare fehrist companiyon mein se aik hai jo yomiya 1 hazaar gariyaan tayyar karti hai
electric karon ki fi klov meter masafat ki laagat 1 rupay se bhi kam hogi, gaari ko gharelo barqi nizaam se bhi charge kya ja sakta hai jabkay khusoosi power charging system ke zariye intahi kam waqt mein mukammal battery charge ki ja sakti hai
aik martaba mukammal charge honay ke baad 60 klov meter fi ghanta ki raftaar se 120 klov meter ka faasla tay kar sakti hai
company ke numaindon ke mutabiq electric karon ki Pakistan  mein farokht ke liye partnrz aur dealers talaash kar rahay hain, company aindah saal taq gariyaan Pakistan  mein farokht karne ka iradah rakhti hai, cheeni company Pakistan  mein farokht ki janay wali gariyon ki 5 saal ya 80 hazaar klov meter running ki warranty bhi faraham karegi jabkay Pakistan  mein gariyon ki murammat aur purzah jaat ki farahmi ke liye bhi baad از farokht service net work qaim kya jaayegaa
wazeh rahay ke barqi gariyon mein power window, aluminium الائے rim, disk break, central lakng system, remote keys, ایئرکولر ( aapshnl ) air ہیٹرسمیت radio, you s bi, ae you x, uqbi camera display, video aur aspikrz ki sahoolat bhi mojood hai
( بشکریہ ) yeh to sab hi jantay hain ke boli would hadaayat car snje Laila  bhnsali ka shumaar un ڈائیریکٹرز mein kya jata hai, jin ke sath showbiz industry ki har adakara kaam karne ki khwaahan hai

taham ab anoshka sharmaa ne un khabron ko be bunyaad thera diya hai
adakara ki team naay aik bayan jari karte hue kaha ke' anoshka sharmaa snje Laila  bhnsali ke sath kisi film mein kaam karne ki khwahish mand zaroor hain, lekin fi al haal un khabron mein koi sachaai nahi, aap se darkhwast hai ke is qisam ki khabron ko shaya nah karen '
agar aisa hota to yeh anushka sharmaa aur Salman  Khan  ki aik sath doosri film hoti, yeh dono is se qabal 2016 ki film' Sultan ' mein kaam kar chukay hain
anoshka sharmaa is waqt –apne shohar virat kohli ke sath Australia  mein mojood hain, jahan yeh dono apni shadi ki pehli saalgirah mana rahay hain
mazeed padhan : anoshka aur virat ki shadi ki taqrebaat par aik nazar khayaal rahay ke anoshka sharmaa aur virat kohli ki shadi guzashta saal 11 decemeber ko italy ke shehar melaan mein hui thi

jabkay un dono ki shadi ki chand yadgar tasaveer bhi social media par vayrl hain

vashngtn 7 May  ( agency ) khawateen apni jald ke sath sath aankhon ko deedaa Zaib  aur roshan bananay ke liye kayi jatan karti hain mahireen ghzayyat ke mutabiq aisi غذائیں mojood hain jo aankhon ko Hussain  aur honton ko tar o tazah aur deedaa Zaib  banati hain khatta meetha aur khush zayega phal kyoy ab Pakistan  mein bhi dastyab hai is phal mein vitamin si کولاجن omega three fatty acids aur kayi terhan ke امائنو acids paye jatay hain yeh sab mil kar jald ko dhoop ki tamazat aur jhlsne se bachatey hain is ke ilawa jald ki khushki daur karne mein bhi kyoy aik lajawab phal hai dilchasp baat yeh hai ke kiwi phal khanay ke sath sath is ki قاشوں ko aankhon ki taazgee ke liye bhi istemaal kya jata hai haldi pak o hind mein hazaron baras se desi make up ke tor par istemaal horahee hai
jald ke liye haldi aik behtareen taank hai اورکھانوں mein is ka baqaida istemaal chehray par bhi nikhaar ki wajah bantaa hai kachay doodh mein nisf chamcha haldi mila kar usay –apne honton aur chehray par lagayiyae 10 minute baad chehra دھولیجیے taakay haldi doodh sameit jazb hojaye aap note karen gi ke chehra aur hont dono ki rangat aur mulaimat par farq para hai haldi ka istemaal جھائیوں ko daur karta hai aur jald ko tar o tazah banata hai tasweer ke copy right jack dongarra, sunway taihulight system report image caption aik taaza tareen surway ke mutabiq duniya ke taiz tareen 500 super computers mein se 202 chain mein mojood hain
duniya ke taiz tareen 500 super kmpyotrz ki fehrist mein sab se ziyada super kmpyotrz walay malik ke hawalay se chain naay America  se Sabqat  le li hai
aik taaza tareen surway ke mutabiq duniya ke taiz tareen 500 super computers mein se 202 chain mein mojood hain
is ke muqablay mein America  mein 143 super computers hain aur is ke paas doosri position hai
35 super kmpyotrz ke sath Japan  teesray jabkay 20 super kmpyotrz ke sath Germany  chouthay number par tha
yeh bhi padhiye windows 10 mein naye feature aur naya surface stodyo computer ab' vatsn' computer anokhay amraaz ki تشخیص kere ga 25 saal qabal is fehrist ka aaghaz kya gaya tha aur har do saal baad is ke taaza adaad o shumaar shaya kiye jatay hain
yaad rahay ke guzashta fehrist mein America  ke paas 169 jabkay chain ke paas 160 super computers thay
report ke mutabiq chain ki bartari ki wajah chain ki janib se tehqeeq mein sarmaya kaari mein izafah hai aur is waqt duniya bhar mein tehqeeq ke akhrajaat ka 20 feesad chain mein kharcha jata hai
super kmpyotrz bohat barray, aur mehangay systems hoye hain jin mein hazaron پراسیسرز ko مخشوش andaaz mein akatha kya gaya hota hai aur un se intehai makhsoos کیلکیولیشنز karwai jati hain
super computers se liye jaaane kamon ki chand misalon mein mosmyati tabdeeli ke jaizay, johri hathyaaron ki سیمیولیشنز, tail ke zakhair ki khoj, mausam ki haal ki pishgoyyan, DNAe سیکونسنگ waghera shaamil hain
super computers ki taizi' petta flop' mein gani jati hai
aik flop ko aap کیلکیولیشنز mein aik operation ya qadam ke tor par samajh satke hain
aik petta flop ka matlab aik skind mein aik hazaar kharab operations hota hai
duniya ka taiz tareen sapath computer chain ka سنوے tie ho light hai jo ke 93 petta flaps taq kaam kar sakta hai
is ke muqablay mein America  ka taiz tareen computer titan hai jo ke 17. 6 petta flaps taq ja sakta hai
Lahore  ( web desk ) agar is saal ko shadion ka saal kaha jaye to ghalat nah ho ga kyunkay bollywood aur Pakistani  showbiz industry mein naamwar shaksiaat rishta izdiwaj mein munsalik ho gayeen hain
shadion ki season mein har koi p_hnave ke barey mein pareshan nazar aatahe aur aisay mein Maroof  brindz dulhan ke liye khusoosi libaas tayyar karne ki zimma daari sambhaalte hain jo ke un ke dinon ko yaad gaar bana deta hai
isi rivayet ko barqarar rakhtay hue پینٹین ki janib se Shayan  shaan brayidl wake ka ineqad kya gaya jis mein Pakistan  ki Maroof  aur خوبصور t- adakaraon ne ramp par walk kar ke taqreeb ko chaar chaand laga diye
bride wake ko ki ronaqe is waqt barhi jab hiran jaisi chaal chaltay hue Maroof  adakara neelam Munir  khobsorat lehenga pehnay hue ramp par ayen
taqreeb mein back gravnd mein ” mera baabo chean چھبیلا“ gana chal raha tha jis par neelam Munir  se jazbaat qaboo nah hue aur unhon neh ramp par chaltay hue halkay halkay ٹھمکوں ke sath raqs kya jis par شرکائ neh سیٹیوں bajayen aur khoob daad di
neelam Munir  ke ilawa model o adakara Hara  maani neh bhi Reem  par سلوررنگ ka lehenga pehan kar walk kya aur halka phulka raqs karte hue شرکائ mein –apne پہنواے ki numayesh ki
agar yeh kaha jaye ke is taqreeb ki theme mein hi ramp par walk ke sath mamooli raqs bhi shaamil tha to ghalat nah ho ga aur yeh ramp par walk mein aik jiddat bhi hai
yahan yeh amar bhi qabil zikar hai ke neelam Munir  ki is se qabal bhi aik video vayrl ho yi thi jis mein woh gaari mein aik ganay par raqs kar rahi theen
kamaan se nikla teer ya zabaan se niklee baat ki wapsi to namumkin hai magar ab kam از kam Facebook messenger par beje gaye pegham ko wapas karna ya un send karna zaroor mumkin hogaya hai
jee haan Facebook nay﻿ bazabta tor par messanger mein ghalti se beje gay paighamaat ko wapas bulanay ka feature muta-arif kara diya hai jisay ریموو far every one ka naam diya gaya hai
magar yeh fichr abhi aap ko fori tor par azamane ke liye nahi mil sakay ga
Facebook naay yeh feature fi al haal Poland , bolivia, columbia aur lthwanya mein android aur aayi o s sarfeen ke liye muta-arif karaya hai
Facebook ke tarjuman ne fichr muta-arif karanay ki tasdeeq karte hue bataya ke bohat jald usay duniya bhar mein sarfeen ke liye paish kardiya jaye ga
tarjuman ka kehna tha ke is feture mein behtari ke liye bhi abhi kaam kya ja raha hai, jaisay kisi pegham ke delete honay ki tareekh ya poori thread ko hi kisi makhsoos waqt ke baad expire karne ka option
is fichr ki badolat sarfeen ko kisi pegham ko arsaal karne ke baad 10 minute ke andar delete karne ki sahoolat dastyab hogi, magar aisa karne par aik pegham dosray Sarif  ko nazar aeye ga ke aap naay aik pegham ریموو kya hai
is feture ko istemaal karne ke liye matlooba pegham ko daba kar rakhna hoga aur phir ریموو button par click karna hoga, jis par ریموو far every one ya ریموو far you ke option samnay ayen ge, jis mein se ریموو far every one par click karna hoga
Facebook messenger mein yeh un send msg kuch waqt ke liye mehfooz rahay ga taakay woh company ki policy ki khilaaf warzi ki rokkk thaam kar sakay
Facebook messenger ke sarbarah astan chudnovsk ke mutabiq hum is baat ko یقیی banayen ge ke is naye fichr ko logon ki tauheen ka zareya nah banaya jasakay, hum yakeeni banayen ge ke log aap ke sath bad zubani nah kar saken aur phir ریموو karkay khud ko bachanay ki koshish karen
khayaal rahay ke mein yeh inkishaaf samnay aaya tha ke Facebook khamoshi se –apne si ای o mark زکربرگ ke messanger par beje jaaane walay paighamaat ko delete kar rahi hai
is inkishaaf ke baad company ne elaan kya ke beje jane walay paighamaat ko wapas bulanay ka feture bohat jald tamam messanger sarfeen ko dastyab hoga
messenger mein is waqt sikrt کنورزیشن mood mojood hai, jis mein Sarif  –apne paighamaat ko khudkaar tor par khatam karne ka waqt tey kar saktay hain
wats app ke ilawa Facebook ki زیرملکیت aik aur app انسٹاگرام mein bhi un send ka feture mojood hai
Fifa  wrld cupp Ronaldo  se Portugal  ko quwwat tawaquaat سارنسک
24 June  ( siyasat dot com ) aakhri 16 teamon mein jagah bananay ke liye Portugal  aur Iran  ka muqaabla honay wala hai jis mein saaray shaiqeen ki tawaquaat کریسٹیانو Ronaldo  par lagi hui hai aur irani shaiqeen ki tawaquaat Portugal  ke sabiq coach aur Iran  ke mojooda manager karlos کویروز mein tiki hui hain
karlos aur Ronaldo  ka sath chaar world cupp se hai aur Ronaldo  se un ki mulaqaat 2003 hamza se hai jabkay Ronaldo  ne manchester united ke liye aik nojawan khilari ki hesiyat se pehli baar hissa liya tha
65 sala کارلوسنے pehli dafaa aliks نرگوسن jo real midrd ke incharge hai, ke assistant ki hesiyat se –apne career ka aaghaz kya tha
is douran Ronaldo  ney bhi 2009 hamza club mein dakhla liya tha jahan par carlos se un ki mulaqaat hui, lekin 2010 hamza world cupp dosray round mein Portugal  ki shikast ke baad Ronaldo  aur carlos mein ikhtilafat peda hogaye they kyunkay Ronaldo  ney shikast ki zimma daari carlos ke sar daal di thi
chaar saal qabal Portugal  ko brazil ke sath shikast ka mun dekhnaa para tha lekin roos ke Fifa  world cupp ke muqablon mein Ronaldo  waisay jumla 4 goals banakar apni team ko istehkaam bakhsha hai
مراقش ki shikast ke baad group bi mein spain ke sath Portugal  ke 4 points ke sath oopar hai chunancha ronald ny kaha ke hamari koshish rahay gi ke hum group bi mein apni mehnat aur karkardagi ke baais –apne maqam ko barqarar rakhen ge aur haan agar hum aisay maqam par poanch jatay hain jahan par khail se bahar hojane ka khatrah mehsoos ho raha hai to is barey mein socha jaye ga
golden boat award ( jo aaccha score karne walay khilari ko diya jata hai ) ko haasil karne ke liye Ronaldo  aur رومیلو لوکاکو ke darmiyan sakht musabqat darpaish hai
argentina jo group d mein sab se aakhir mein hai
is ke khilari لائنل meese golden boat award ke liye kharij ho chukay hain
Portugal  ke 33 sala coach frnando سانٹیوز ne apni qabliyat aur mudabirana salahiyat se apni har team ko jatanay ke liye Wasiqa  bardasht nah chorney ka teh karliya hai
ae ٹیکو ماڈریڈ coach ڈیکو satam din, sabiq argentina ke made fildr ne –apne yahan mein kaha hai ke woh karkardagi ke lehaaz se Ronaldo  ko meese par tarjeeh dete hain
siyaam one nay﻿ mazeed kaha ke meese behtareen khilari is ke liye hain ke woh aala darja ke khiladion mein hamesha ghiry rehtay hain ( barslona mein )
Portugal  team ke gole Muhafiz  khilari pay pay jo real midrd mein Ronaldo  ke sath rahay hain kaha ke woh fakhr mehsoos karte hain ke Ronaldo  jaisa khilari un ki team mein shaamil hai
toyota nay﻿ apni nai s you v rush Pakistan  mein muta-arif kara di hai
piro Pakistani  ki aik report ke mutabiq ands motor company ne aik event ke douran yeh money s you v gaari muta-arif karai jo 2010 mein die ہاٹسو terios ke naam se paish kya gaya tha magar baad mein toyota ne is ka naam badla
photo بشکریہ toyota Pakistan  mein yeh gaari 3 version mein dastyab hogi jo ke 1500 si si euro two engine aur 2 mukhtalif transmission اپشنز jaisay five speed minoyl ya for speed automatic ke sath hogi
mazeed parheen : toyota ki nai فورچنر Pakistan  mein paish is gaari ke teen version ko jee am tea, jee ae tea aur s ae tea ke naam diye gaye hain aur is ka engine 104 Paras  power ki taaqat rakhta hai
company ke mutabiq yeh gaari har terhan ke rastay ke liye behtareen hai jis mein 1. 5? letter for سلینڈ engine aur doyl very able walo timing intelli jnt mojood hai jo ke raftaar ke sath eendhan ki bachat bhi karta hai

Lahore  ( web disk ) sahet se mutaliq Pakistani  start up' marham' ne shnghayi mein honay walay Google  demo day asia mein آڈیئنس choice award –apne naam karliya event mein shurka ko das start ups mein se –apne pasandeeda ka intikhab karne ka mauqa diya gaya tha jis mein se unhon ne Pakistani  start up ko apna pasandeeda qarar diya
' marham' ke zariye Pakistan  mein awam online doctors se rabita kar saktay hain, un ko dhoond sakta hain ya un ki khidmaat haasil karne ke liye waqt le satke hain yeh start up teen saal qabal shuru kya gaya tha jis ka maqsad Pakistan  mein logon ke sahet ke shobay ke hawalay se tajarbay ko behtar banana tha start up ke baani Ahsen  imam ka kehna hai ke un is award ka credit apni poori team ko dete hain un ka kehna tha ke award ke baad hamaray hauslay mazeed buland hogaye hain aur Pakistan  ke liye mazeed mo-asar kirdaar ada karna chahtay hain' marham' woh wahid Pakistani  start up tha jisay Google  demo day mein shirkat ki dawat di gayi Mumbai  29 November  ( siyasat dot com ) bi si si aayi neh aindah aymrjng national cupp ke liye hindustani team ko Pakistan  bhejnay se inkar kardiya hai haal hi mein muawzay ke silsilay mein muqadma jeetnay walay bi si si aayi neh hindustani team ko Pakistan  bhejnay se انکارکیا hai national cupp ki maizbani Pakistan  avrSrilanka mushtarqa طورپرکررہے hain lekin bi si si aayi ke انکارکے baad hindustani team Srilanka mein –apne muqablay khailay gi jabkay ٹورنمنٹ ka final bhi کولمبومیں hoga saal 2008 mein Mumbai  mein dehshat gird hamlay ke baad se hindostan ny Pakistan  kay sath dotrfh cricket nahi khela hai ٹورنمنٹ mein Bangladesh you ae ای avrhang kaang ki temen Karachi  marhalay ke muqablay khelain gi jabkay Srilanka hindostan avrafghanstan ki temen Srilanka ke کولمبومیں match khelain gi bi si si aayi dono mumalik ke darmiyan kasheeda taluqaat ki wajah se Pakistan  ke sath bahami sirizse musalsal انکارکرتا raha hai jis ki wajah se PCB ny is ke khilaaf muahiday ke bawajood do Tarfah  sirizse انکارکرنے ke sabab aayi si si mein is ke khilaaf qareeb 460 کروڑروپئے muawzay ka muqadma dayrkya gaya tha is پرحال hi mein bi si si aayi ke haq mein faisla aaya hai Lahore  ( commerce reporter ) Lahore  chember ke saddar almaas Haider  naay hukoomat par zor diya hai ke woh karobari baradri ke liye jadeed tecnology aur one window operation system ke zariye properly ki registration ke amal mein aasani peda kere Lahore  chember ke saddar naay kaha ke karobari baradri ke liye properly ki registration aik bara masla hai saddar Lahore  chember naay kaha ke anfrastrkchr ki mazbooti zameeni hudood maloom karne ke liye electronic data bees maloomat mein shfafit geographiyai coverage zameeni tanazeaat ka hal aur properly rights ke husool taq sab ki yaksaa rasai jaisay masail par kaafi kaam ki zaroorat hai Lahore  chember ke senior naib saddar khwaja Shahzad  nasir ny kaha hai ke teen so arab dollar se zayed ki aalmi halal tijarat mein Pakistan  ka hissa mayoos kin jabkay ghirmslm mumalik is tijarat par ghalba paye hue hain
halal tijarat mein numaya maqam haasil karne ke liye thos aur fori iqdamaat uthana hunge unhon ny kaha ke لائیوسٹاک siktr Pakistan  ke muashi istehkaam mein ahem kirdaar ada karsaktha hai kroshya ke بورنا کوریک ny un ko shikast day di haley ( Switzerland  ) 24 June  ( siyasat dot com ) ae tea pi haley grass muqaabla mein Roger  Federer  ko kroshya ke khilari بورنا کوریک ny 7-6 ( 8 / 6 ) 3-6 6-2 se shikast day kar un ke career ke 99 rank par lakar rokkk diya is shikast ke sath hi ranking mein number one ae tea pi position haasil karne se bhi mahroom reh gaye is shikast ki wajah se woh Germany  se muqaabla mein 10 wahn maqam haasil karne ke mauqa se bhi haath dho baithy hain Federer  ne ibtidayi nisf hissa mein barabari par they lekin dosray nisf hissa mein کوریک ne inhen shikast day di isi douran Roger  Federer  ne ae tea pi muqablay series ke final muqablay mein –apne hareef dins کوڈلہ ko 7-6 ( 7 / 1 ) 7-5 se hara diya itwaar ko is title par Switzerland  se qabza karliya aur Federer  ki yeh sae darasal un ki world number one position ki dasvin kamyabi hai is jeet par unhon ne kaha ke woh is jeet par be had khush hain aur yeh match darasal wambildon ki tayari ka aik tasalsul hai aur woh aik behtareen khail khailnay ke mutlashi hain mujhe umeed hai ke meri final tak rasai bah aasani hojaye gi Federer  nay﻿ sirf 90 minute ke andar hi apna nishana haasil karliya aur 109 walay rank کوڈلا ko mazeed paish qadmi se 2-0 se mazeed agay bherne se rokkk diya north sound
25 November  ( siyasat dot com ) of spiner ayshle gardnr ( 22 run par teen wicket ) aur league spiner jarjya وئیرھیم ( 11 run par do wicket ) ki badolat Australia  ney yaktarfa final mein England  ko aath wicket se shikast day kar chothi baar khawateen world tea 20 khitaab jeet liya
musalsal panchwin martaba final mein khail rahay Australia  neh of spiner ayshle gardnr ( 22 run par teen wicket ) aur league spiner jarjya وئیرھیم ( 11 run par do wicket ) ki badolat England  ko 19. 4 over mein 105 runs par dhair kar دیاتیز gaind baz میگان shut neh bhi 13 run day kar do wicket haasil kiye astrilya neh is ke jawab mein 44 runs taq dono salami ballay bazoo a یلسا helly ( 22 ) aur beeet muni ( 14 ) ke wicket ganwa diye they lekin gardnr ( nat out 33 ) aur captain ming لیننگ ( nat out 28 ) ke darmain teesray wicket ki 62 run ki shiraakat ki badolat 15. 1 over mein hi team neh do wicket par 106 run bana kar asaan jeet darj ki
gardnr ko un all rounder karkardagi ke liye player of di match muntakhib kya gaya jabkay wicket keeper ballay baaz aیلسا ko player of di tournament muntakhib kya gaya
elsa ne tournament mein sab se ziyada 225 runs bananay ke ilawa chaar astmpng aur chaar catch se aath shikaar bhi kiye
tournament mein un se ziyada shikaar sirf hndstan ki tanih bhatih hi kar saki jinhon naay do catch aur nawa سٹمپنگ se 11 shikaar kiye
Australia  ko kabhi kisi khatoon world cricket chmpyn ship ke final mein England  ke khilaaf shikast ka saamna nahi karna para hai aur yahan bhi yeh record barqarar raha hai
England  ko is silsilay ko tornay ke liye ab kam از kam 2020 mein honay wali agli aalmi chmpyn ship ka intzaar karna parre ga
sir vyoyn rchrdz stadium mein khail gaya yeh final 2014 mein Bangladesh ke Meer  poor mein khailay gay world tea 20 final ki barri had tak takraar raha
Meer  poor mein bhi England  ki team pehlay batting karte hue muqarara 20 overs mein aath wicket par 105 run hi bana saki thi aur is waqt bhi Australia  nay﻿ 15. 1 over mein chaar wicket par 106 run bana kar jeet darj ki thi
is se pehlay England  ki janib se opener dinil white ( 43 ) aur captain ھیتھر night ( 25 ) hi Australia  ke gaind bazoo ka tik kar saamna kar saken dinil aur ھیتھر ke ilawa England  ki aur koi ballay baz double points taq nahi poanch payi jis se England  ka doosri baar world tea 20 title jeetnay ka khawab toot gaya
England  ne 2009 mein apni sarzamen par hue pehlay khawateen wrld tea 20 ka khitaab final mein newzea land ko shikast day kar jeeta tha
wazeh rahay ke yeh australvi khawateen ka musalsal 5 wahn T20 final hai jis mein se woh 4 mein kamyaab huien aur aik mein nakami ka saamna karna para
2 saal qabal hndstan mein honay walay khatoon T20 world cupp mein west indies nay﻿ final mein Australia  ko shikast di thi
Mumbai  ( si an an ) maazi ki saf awwal adkarah ﺭﻭﻳﻨﺎ tndn ne madah ki janib se shadi ki peshkash par dilchasp jawab day diya
tafseelaat ke mutabiq Maroof  adakara ﺭﻭﻳﻨﺎ tndn naay gzsh_h roz hi samaji muamlay se mutaliq kisanon ke hawalay se aik ٹوئٹ ki jis mein unhon naay kisanon se hmdri ka izhaar kya bas phir kya tha un ke aik madah ko un ka ghareeb kisanon ke sath yeh rawayya bohat pasand aaya aur foran se adakara ko twitter par hi shadi ki peshkash kar di
ﺭﻭﻳﻨﺎ tndn ney madah ki ٹوئٹ ka dilchasp jawab deta hue kaha ke mai moazrat chahti hon aap ney shadi ki peshkash karne mein bohat der kar di aur usay 13 saal beeet chuke hin“
wazeh rahay maazi ki saf awwal adkarah ﺭﻭﻳﻨﺎ tndn aur akshe kumar qareebi dost they taham adakara nay﻿ akshe ke bajaye film dstri byotr anl ٹھادانی se shadi ki jo apni pehli biwi ko Talaq  day chuke اورانڈس motrz company ltd nay﻿ mafahmat ki aik dastaweez prdstkht kardiye hain jis ke tehat bank –apne sarfeen ko malik bhar mein barri gariyon toyota فارچونر ryo camera aur rush mein fnansng ki sahuliyaat faraham kere ga budh ko jari bayan ke mutabiq muahiday ke tehat bank islami آٹوفنانس ke tehat fnansng ki khidmaat faraham kere ga muahiday par bank islami ke کنزیومربنکنگ ke sarbarah bilal Faiz  aur ands motrz company ke general میجرسیلزسید Umar  ny dastakhat kiye bilal Faiz  ny kaha ke mafahmat ki is dastaweez se sarfeen ko faida puhanche ga syed Umar  ny is mauqa par kaha ke dono idaron ke mabain ishtiraaq car se naye mawaqay samnay ayen ge chain ny ab woh bachay peda karne ki tayari shuru kar di jinhein kabhi aids jaisay sangeen amraaz hon ge hi nahi, magar kaisay beijing ( monitoring desk ) aids aur deegar kayi amraaz aisay hain jin ka ilaaj ta haal daryaft nahi ho saka taham ab chain mein science danon ne aisay bachay peda karne ki tayari shuru kar di hai jinhein yeh amraaz kabhi la-haq hi nahi hon ge ke mutabiq yeh محیرالعقول karnaama cheeni shehar Shin  sn ki southern university of science and technology ke science daan sar-anjaam dainay ja rahay hain science daan masnoi tareeqa afzaish nasal ke zariye un bachon ke laboratory mein ambrio peda karen ge aur phir inhen khawateen ke pait mein rakh kar nashonuma di jaye gi aur peda kya jaye ga taham ambrio ko maa ke pait mein muntaqil karne se qabal science daan un ke DNAe mein kuch aisi tabdeelian karen ge ke peda honay ke baad aids cheechak aur haiza sameit kayi amraaz mein mubtala hi nahi hon ge science daan un bachon ke DNAe mein jis tool ke zariye jeneati tabdeeli karen ge usay kaha jata hai sasta aur istemaal mein aasaan tool hai is ke zariye science daan bachay ke DNAe se ccr5 Nami  jain nikaal den ge yahi jain hai jo mazkoorah bimarion ka sabab bantaa hai is ke khatmay ke baad un bachon ke jism mein un bimarion ke khilaaf itni mudafat peda ho jaye gi ke inhen yeh kabhi la-haq hi nahi hon gi report ke mutabiq science danon naay aisay bachay peda karne ke liye mard o khawateen ki bharti shuru kar di hai jin ke سپرمز aur bize le kar yeh bachay peda kiye jayen ge professor hi jayan koi ki qayadat mein university ke science danon ki team is se qabal maa ke pait mein mojood 24 haftay ke bachon par is ke kamyaab tajarbaat kar chuki hai wazeh rahay ke 2015 hamza mein bhi cheeni tahaqeeq karon naay insani ambrio ka DNAe edited karkay is mein tabdeelian karne ka elaan kya tha jis par duniya mein bohat shore macha اوردرجنوں mumtaz science danon naay un cheeni tahaqeeq karon se darkhwast ki thi ke yeh kaam nah karen jis par unhon naay iradah tark kar diya tha Lahore  Bharti  gulukar vrindr ویرسنگھ Lahore  poanch gaye Bharti  gulukar Pakistani  adakara o gulukarah megha ke maheman hain se guftagu karte hue kaha unko Lahore  aa kar bohat khushy ho rahi hai Pakistan  ka pyar aur mohabbat ki battain hum Bharat  mein suntay rahay hain jiska saboot hamein yahan aa kar bhi mil raha hai
