jinay Lahore  nahi ویکھیا o جمیا hi nahi aur mujhe aisa lag raha hai ke mein aaj peda ho gaya hon is mauqa par megha nay﻿ kaha Pakistan  maazi mein bhi Bharti  fankaron ki bharpoor maheman nawazi karta raha hai aur ab bhi kar raha hai vrindr ke anay se hamein bohat khoshi hui hai aman ki koshisho mein hum sab nay﻿ apna apna hissa dala hai ab Bharat  ki janib se bhi barf pighal rahi hai jo achi baat hai Islamabad : idaara baraye shumariyat ( pi bi s ) ke adaad o shumaar ke mutabiq musalsal dosray mahinay barray pemanay par minofikchrng ( ail s am ) mein kami waqay hui, jis se decemeber 2017 mein salana taraqqi ki sharah mein 1. 4 feesad manfi asr para hai
barri sanat ki pedawar mein manfi izafah is khatray ki taraf bhi ishara karta hai ke kahin rawan maali saal malik ki muashi taraqqi ke mutawaqqa hadaf haasil karne mein peechay nah reh jaye
adaad o shumaar mein yeh baat samnay aayi hai ke guzashta do mah mein sanati pedawar mein kami ki wajah Sindh  aur khyber pakhtunkhwa mein gannay ki krshng mein takheer thi, jis ke baais guzashta baras ke muqablay mein cheeni ki pedawar mein 37. 4 feesad kami dekhnay mein aayi
mazeed parheen : Pakistan  mein ghair mulki sarmaya kaari mein 3 feesad kami pi bi s ke adaad o shumaar mein mahana jaiza liya gaya jis ke mutabiq cheeni ke ilawa pedawar mein kami ki wajah khoraak aur mashrobat, petroleum masnoaat, chemical, engineering, lakri aur chamray ki masnoaat aur khad ki pedawar mein kami bhi hai
July  se decemeber ke douran barray pemanay par manufacturing ki taraqqi ki sharah 5?. 6 feesad rahi jabkay 18-2017 ke liye yeh hadaf 6. 3 feesad tha
wazeh rahay ke barray pemanay par manufacturing 80 feesad مینوفکچرنگ aur malik ki majmoi پیداورا ( jee d pi ) ki 10. 7 feesad par muqarrar ki jati hai jabkay is ke bar aks chhootey pemanay ki manufacturing ke liye jee d pi ka 1. 8 feesad aur manufacturing ka 13. 7 feesad istemaal hota hai
taham san-aton ki wizarat ki janib se masool honay walay 36 ajza ka pedawari adad o shumaar is baat ki nishandahi karte hain ke decemeber mein 1. 5? feesad manfi izafah dekha gaya jabkay sobai idaara baraye shumariyat ke mutabiq 65 ajza ki shiraakat 0. 67 feesad misbet rahi
isi terhan oil companies aydwayzi committee ( o si ae si ) ki janib se 11 ajza ke masool shuda pedawari data mein 0. 61 feesad kami dekhnay mein aayi
is ke ilawa sanati makhsoos data se yeh maloom hota hai ke sab se ziyada manfi izafah lakrion ki masnoaat mein 55. 4 feesad record kya gaya jabkay khoraak, mashrobat aur tambaku ki masnoaat mein 13 feesad, chamray ki mnsoaat mein 11.6 feesad, petroleum mnsoaat mein 10. 5? feesad khad mein 3. 02 feesad aur engineering masnoaat mein 1. 9 feesad kami dekhnay mein aayi
lohay aur stil ki masnoaat ki pedawar mein 22.5 feesad taraqqi, auto mobile mein 10. 03 feesad, aliktronks mein 9. 96 feesad, rabar masnoaat 9. 91 feesad, dwasazi 6. 83 feesad, ghair dhaati maadni masnoaat mein 5. 83 feesad, kaghaz aur board mein 3. 32 feesad, textile mein 0. 21 feesad aur chemical mein 0. 95 feesad taraqqi record ki gayi
yeh bhi parheen : muqami car asmblrz neh guzashta mah record gariyaan farokht kee auto mobile siktr mein tracktor ki pedawar mein decemeber mein 10. 6 feesad izafah sun-hwa jabkay jeep aur car mein 17. 6 feesad, halki tijarti gariyon mein 16. 6 feesad aur motorcycle mein 10. 5 feesad izafah sun-hwa, taham basoon ki pedawar mein 67. 9 aur truck mein 8. 09 feesad kami waqay hui
dawa saazi ke shobay ke adaad o shumaar dekhen jayen to kipsol mein 79. 2 feesad, anjikshnz mein 116. 6 feesad aur tablets mein 54. 7 feesad manfi taraqqi dekhi gayi taham sarp ki pidwar 78. 9 feesad kam hui
yeh khabar 18 feb 2018 ko dawn akhbar mein shaya hui Karachi  ( desk ) doctoron ki kami poori kar naay ke liye Sindh  hukoomat naay interviews ki bunyaad par dr zay bharti kar naay ka faisla kya hai wazeer e aala Sindh  ke musheer baraye it-tila-aat barrister murtaza Wahab  ka kehna hai ke baghair tehreeri imthehaan ke soobay mein daidh hazaar se zayed doctors bharti kiye jayen ge Sindh  public service commission ke zariye imthehaan lena taweel marhala hai lehaza waqt bachana aur awam ko fori relief dena chahtay hain murtaza Wahab  naay kaha ke yeh faisla sarkari aspatalon mein doctoron ki kami ke paish nazar kya gaya aur Sindh  kabeena is hawalay se faislay ki manzoori day chuki hai ibtidayi tor par maahir aur am bi bi s doctoron ko kantrikt ki bunyaad par taleemi Asnad  ki jaanch partaal ke baad bharti kya jaye ga musheer it-tila-aat ka kehna tha ke bharti kiye gay doctoron ko baad mein Sindh  public service commission ka imthehaan paas karna hoga doctors ki bharti fori tor par shuru ki jaye gi jab ke wazeer e aala Sindh  ne is zimn mein mehakma sahet ko Hadayat  bhi jari kar di hain arjntayn ne Israel  ke khilaaf world cupp 2018 ke liye maqboza beeet almuqaddas mein 9 June  ko schedule apna aakhri warm up match mansookh kardiya
Bartanwi  akhbar di garjin ki report ke mutabiq arjntayn ke اسٹرایئکر گونزالو ہنگوئین nay﻿ kaha hai ke' hum nay﻿ theek faisla karliya ', sath hi tasdeeq ki ke arjntayn aur Israel  ke darmain honay wala match mansookh kya ja chuka hai
mazkoorah elaan ke baad Falasteeni  foot baal association ( pi f ae ) ki janib se aik aalamia jari kya gaya jis mein unhon ny arjntayn ke captain aur star ftbalr لیونل meese aur un ki team ka match mansookh karne par shukriya ada kya
pi f ae ke chairman ki janib se jari kardah is ailamiye mein kaha gaya hai ke' pi f ae arjntayn ke captain aur khiladion ka khelon ke barkhilaf muhim ka hissa ban'nay se inkaar par be hadd mashkoor hai '
mazeed parheen :' meese hamara dil nah toreen ', Falasteeni  bachon ki darkhwast Jibraiel  Rajab  ka kehna tha ke' aaj warm up match ki mansookhi se khail, ikhlaqiaat aur eqdaar ki fatah hui jabkay Israel  ko red card dikha diya gaya '
doosri janib Israel  ne daawa kiya hai ke mazkoorah muqaabla match ke douran kisi nakhushgawaar waqeye ki dhamkion ke pishِ nazar mansookh kya gaya hai
khayaal rahay ke chand roz qabal yeh it-tila-aat samnay ayen theen ke football world cupp se qabal arjntayn aur Israel  ke darmain honay walay dostana match par Falasteeni  bachon nay﻿ ehtijaj karte hue aalmi shohrat Yafta  ftbalr لیونل meese se yeh match nah khailnay ki darkhwast ki thi
dono mulkon ke darmain jari tareekhi tanaza aur haal hi mein Falasteeni  awam par ki gayi Israeli  fouj ke zulm o sitam ke baad 70 Falasteeni  bachon par mushtamil group ney arjntayn ke foot bowler لیونل meese ko khat likh kar darkhwast ki thi ke woh Israel  ke khilaaf dostana match mein shirkat nah karen
mazkoorah khat 3 June  ko Israel  mein urgentine ke sfartkhane ke hawalay kya gaya jis mein Falasteeni  bachon ney daawa kya ke woh un khandano ke bachay hain jin se cheani gayi zamiinon par ab tidi stadium dobarah qaim kya gaya hai
yeh bhi parheen : نیمار, meese ke har gole par bhukay bachon ko khana khilanay ka elaan khat ke matan mein mazeed kaha gaya tha ke' hamein bataya gaya hai ke aap hamaray tabah shuda gaon par taamer shuda stadium mein –apne doston ke sath match khelna chahtay hain jis par hamari khusi is waqt aanswoun mein badal gayi aur hamaray dil toot gaye ke hamara hero meese hamaray abao ajdaad ki qabron par taamer honay walay stadium mein khailnay ja raha hai '
Falasteeni  bachon ne kaha ke 9 June  ko jab Israel  aur arjntayn dostana match khelain ge to yeh hamaray liye aik udaas din ho ga aur khat ke ekhtataam kuch yun kya ke' aayiyae, hum kkhuda se dua karen ke meese hamaray dilon ko nah torhin '
doosri janib Palestine  ki football association ke sarbarah Jibreel  Rajab  ny bhi meese se match nah khailnay ki darkhwast karne ke sath sath shaiqeen ko mukhatib karte hue kaha tha ke agar meese yeh match khelain to Falasteeni  shaiqeen un ki shirt jala den
khayaal rahay ke arjntayn aur Israel  ke darmain world cupp 2018 ka warm up match مقبضہ beeet almuqaddas mein waqay tidi stadium mein 9 June  ko khela jana tha
diabeties aik aisa marz hai jis ki تشخیص mareez ko un ginat nematon aur mukhtalif qisam ki ghizai lzton se mun mornay ke ehkamaat jari kardeti hai khaas tor par cheeni se bani cheezon ke aur jab baat ho phalon ki to un ka zikar hi mun mein sheereeni si ghol deta hai chunkay phalon mein aik khaas qisam ki shukar فرکٹوس payi jati hai aur mahireen ke mutabiq un ka istemaal diabeties ke mareezon sameit motapay ka shikaar afraad ki sahet prbhi manfi asraat muratab karta hai yahi wajah hai ke aisay mareezon ko phalon ke istemaal mein khaas ahthyat ki takeed ki jati hai to phir sawal yeh uthta hai ke kya sugar ke mareez har qisam ke phalon se mun mourr len ya phir woh kon se makhsoos phal hain jin ka istemaal diabeties ke mareezon ki majmoi sahet par misbet asraat muratab karne ke sath sath khoon mein ansolin ka level bhi durust rakhnay ka kaam sir injaam den to aayiyae aaj zikar karte hain un khaas phalon ka jin ka istemaal diabeties ke mareezon ke liye mufeed saabit ho sakta hai maaltay sngtre tibbi science maaltay aur sngtre jaisay tursh phalon ko bhi diabeties ke mareezon ke liye mufeed qarar deti hai un ke nazdeek diabeties ke shikaar afraad ke jismon mein vitamin si ki miqdaar mein kami aajaate hai aur yahi wajah hai ke maaltay grepp fruit lemoo kinnu ya isi qisam ke deegar anti آکسائیڈنٹس phal behtareen intikhab saabit hotay hi, jo diabeties type two ko control mein rakhtay hain ترشاوا phal diabeties ke mareezon ke liye behtareen California university mein ki gayi tehqeeq ke nataij ke mutabiq ترشاواپھل sugar ke mareezon ke liye intahi mufeed hai yahi nahi Amrici  mahireen ka kehna hai ke tursh phal mtape ko kam karne ke sath dil jigar ki bemari aur diabeties se بچاؤ mein bhi mufeed hain tursh phal mein vitamin si aur ghair تکسیدی madon maslan anti آکسڈنٹس اجزاءسے bharay hotay hain aur yeh ghair تکسیدی maday free ریڈیکلز ke khilaaf hifazat karte hain
mahireen diabeties ke mareezon ke liye jin phalon ka mahswara dete hain agar aap ko sugar hai to chukotra tamam phalon mein aap ke liye behtareen hai California university ke mahireen ke nazdeek چکوترے ka istemaal jism mein mojood muzir sahet sugar mein kami ka mojab bantaa hai is mein mojood vitamin si vitamin ae folaad phosphorus aur choona ki barri miqdaar sugar ke mareezon ke mdafati nizaam ko taqwiyat pohanchanay mein ahem kirdaar ada karti hai mahireen chukotra ki be panah khususiyaat ke baais diabeties ke mareezon ko aam tor par rozana aadha grepp fruit choosnay ka mahswara dete hain kya aap jantay hain jaman mein diabeties sameit kayi bimarion ka ilaaj posheeda hai jaman sard aur khushk mizaaj rakhnay wala phal hai is ka mutawatar istemaal sugar ki bemari mein be had faida mand hai agar diabeties ke mareez jaman ka ras aur aam ka ras hum wazan mila kar istemaal karen sugar control karne mein madad miley gi sath hi yeh aik umdah ghiza ka kaam karta hai jaman ke ilawa is ke phool bhi pani mein ragar kar peenay se mareez ko faida hota hai a aadu mein vitamin ae aur si ki waafar miqdaar payi jati hai yahi nahi aadu potassium aur fibre ki bhi achi khasi miqdaar rakhnay wala phal hai diabeties ke mareezon ko yeh phal khanay ka aksar mahswara diya jata hai chunkay is ke istemaal se jism mein sugar level neechay rehta hai yeh mazedar phal jism ki zayed charbi ghol deta hai آڑوفائبر aur potassium se malaa maal hai diabeties ke mareezon ko yeh phal khanay ka aksar mahswara diya jata hai chunkay is ke istemaal se jism mein sugar level neechay rehta hai surkh ya irani angoor mahireen diabeties ke marz mein surkh angoor khanay ka mahswara dete hain Amrici  mahireen ke tehqeeqi nataij ke mutabiq surkh angarro mein aisay kayi ajza daryaft kiye gay hinjo motapa, amrazِ qalb aur diabeties ki type two ko nah sirf roktay hain balkay un amraaz ke ilaaj mein bhi mufeed hain
ghair mulki jareeday' ' ڈائیبٹیس, , mein shaya shuda aik report ke tehqeeqi nataij mein diabeties ke mareezon ke liye do mufeed phalon ka zikar kya gaya un do phalon mein se aik surkh angoor hain
mahireen ke mutabiq surkh angarro mein trans race وریٹرل aur نارنجیوں mein ہیسپریٹن Nami  murakabat sugar, motapay aur amrazِ qalb ko control karne mein mufeed saabit ho saktay hain berrys aik aisa phal hai jis mein mojood fibre aur kayi اقسا meem ke vitamins diabeties ke mareezon ki sahet par misbet asraat muratab karte hain mahireen ke nazdeek بیریزایک behtareen anti oxidant hai jis ke baais diabeties ke mareezon ko din mein teen chothai cupp berrys ki ijazat di ja sakti hay berrys میںکرانس berry ras berry aur blue berry ka istemaal diabeties ke mareezon ke liye sood mand saabit hota hai chay bachon ki parwarish karne wali angelina joly, 43 saal ki honay wali hain

glycerine gharon mein aam istemaal honay wali aisi cheez hai jo lag bhag har ghar mein hi hoti hai yeh khushk aur nami se mahroom jald ke ilaaj ke liye mo-asar saabit hoti hai jisay hewani charbi aur vegetable fate ki madad se tayyar kya ja sakta hai meethay zaiqay wali glycerine ko mukhtalif krimon موئسچرائزر شیمپوز aur kndishnrz mein istemaal ki jati hai glycerine jald ki nami bahaal ke liye behtareen zareya hai usay mausam sarma mein istemaal aadat banakar jald ki nami barqarar aur tar o tazah rakhnay mein madad millti hai agar jald khushk hogayi hai to glycerine ka istemaal is maslay ko daur kere ga glycerine jald mein پوٹینشینل hydrogen ko barqarar rakhnay mein madad deta hai usay aksar lagana jald se pani kam honay ke asraat kam karta hai glycerine ke astmal se jald par nami ki aisi teh banti hai jo ke Sooraj  ki muzir shu-aon se tahaffuz faraham karkay jald ko sahet mand, چمکداررکھتی hai glycerine qudrati dawa ke tor par kaam karkay jaldi bimarion jaisay chanbal ka ilaaj karne mein madad deti hai glycerine ke istemaal se jald ke murda khaliyaat jald se kharij hotay hain, jis se naye jaldi khaliyaat bantay hain aur sahet mand aur shafaaf jald ke husool mein madad Pakistan  naay aindah baras March  ke aakhir mein Australia  ke khilaaf one day series ko April  taq moakhar karne par razamandi zahir kar di hai jis se is baat ka Qawi  imkaan peda ho gaya hai ke baal tempering ke jurm mein saza panay walay australvi khilari styo smith, david warner aur Cameron  bain craft bain al aqwami cricket mein wapas aa jayen ge
cricket Australia  nay﻿ un khiladion ki saza mein takhfeef par sanjeedgi se ghhor karna shuru kar diya hai taakay bain al aqwami cricket mein un ki wapsi ka rasta hamwar kya ja sakay
taham dono cricket bordz ka kehna ke March  ke aakhir mein honay wali one day series ko April  tak moakhar karne se dono mulkon ki cricket teamon ko aalmi cupp ke liye tayari ka bharpoor mauqa muyassar ho ga
aalmi cupp ke liye teamon ke khiladion ki hatmi fehrist aayi si si ko faraham karne ki aakhri tareekh 23 April  hai
is faislay ke baad tawaqqa ki ja rahi hai ke hatmi fehrist mein saza Yafta  tenu khiladion ke naam bhi shaamil ho satke hain
is silsilay mein Pakistan  aur Australia  ke cricket bordz ke darmain guzashta haftay baat cheet mein is pehlu par bhi ghhor kya gaya ke paanch one day matchon mein se kuch Pakistan  mein khailay jayen jabkay baqi matchon ka ineqad mutahidda arab emirate mein kya jaye
Pakistan  cricket board ke naye chairman ahsaan maani ne khaas tor par australvi board se Pakistan  mein kuch match karanay ki darkhwast ki hai
ahsaan maani ka kehna hai ke agarchay is silsilay mein hatmi faisla karne se qabal australvi board ko Pakistan  mein Australia  ke high kmshn se mahswara karna ho ga
taham Pakistan  mein aman o Amaan  ki soorat e haal ke baaray mein aik makhsoos ta-assur paaya jata hai jo haqeeqat par mabni nahi hai
Australia  ke saza Yafta  cricketers ki bain al aqwami cricket mein jald wapsi par mutazaad aaraa payi jati hain aur Australian  cricketers association ne cricket Australia  se darkhwast ki hai ke un tenu khiladion ki saza mein takhfeef kar di jaye
cricket Australia  ke aboori chairman arl ایڈنگز aur naye cheif executive knyu roberts ney is par ghhor karne par amaadgi zahir kar di hai
khayaal hai ke un ki 12 mah ki saza mein takhfeef ke baad sab se pehlay inhen shifild Sheild  tournament ke aakhri matchon mein khailnay ka mauqa diya jaye ga
mahireen ka kehna hai ke agar un khiladion ko shifild shild tournament mein khailnay ka mauqa mil jata hai to phir April  mein Pakistan  ke khilaaf khelii jaaney wali one day series mein un ki shirkat taqreeban yakeeni ho sakti hai
is series mein australvi selectors aur coach jstn lengar ke liye mauqa ho ga ke aik bain al aqwami series mein un par nazar rakhtay hue world cupp ke liye australvi team mein inhen muntakhib kya ja sakay

lekin haal hi mein niji TV ke aik morning show mein diye un ke aik bayan par social media par unhein shadeed tanqeed ka saamna hai
sama TV ke morning show mein maizban sanam balouch ne Aamir  Liaqat  Hussain  aur un ki doosri ahliya tuba Aamir  ko bator maheman madoo kya tha

ٹووٹیو ki mobile app ke zariye be Hooda  aur fehash mawaad shaya karne par mobile app aur v cheat اکاؤنٹ نیہان دوانزی ko band kardiya hai un اکاؤنٹس par ikhlaq se giri hui tasaveer aur videos shaya press release mein kaha gaya hai ke fehash ltife phelanay wali mobile app dirty jokes aur v cheat ko تنبہیہ ke bawajood fehash mawaad shaya karne ke jurm mein band kardiya gaya Website aur mobile app zabita e ikhlaq ki musalsal khilaaf warzi ke murtakib ho rahay they jis ki ijazat nahi di ja sakti hai dirty jokes aur v cheat ke khilaaf hukoomat ko kaafi awaami shikayaat masool ho rahi theen jis ke baad cheeni hukoomat ney unki bandish ka faisla kya web desk : internet ka istemaal karne walay sarfeen hooshiyar rahen un par 480 se zayed idaray nazar rakhay hue hain
prnstn university ke mahireen ne kaha hai ke secron companian apni Website par anay walay har visitor ki janib se type kiye jane walay aik aik lafz ko record kar rahi hain
un companiyon ki tadaad 480 se bhi ziyada hai jo aik amal' session ree pallay' ke zariye type ki jane wali har' ki' ko record kar rahi hain
session ree pallay ke is amal se Websites yeh jan-nay ki koshish karti hain ke sarfeen un ki Website par aakar kis terhan ki ashya talaash karte hain lekin tamam sarfeen is se aagah nahi aur yun un ki ijazat ke bana companiyon ka yeh amal kayi qanooni sawalaat atharha hai
prnstn university ki janib se kiye gay aik surway ke mutabiq un Websites par chalne walay اسکرپٹس aur software, ki board par dubaiee janay wali har ki, mouse ki harkat aur اسکرولنگ ke amal کونوٹ kar rahay hain aur yeh tamam tafseelaat kisi third party suroor par bhaije jarahi hain
third party ree pallay اسکرپٹس ke zariye Sarif  ki hassas maloomat jin mein medical records, crdt card ki tafseelaat aur deegar zaati maloomat kisi namaloom teesray fareeq tak jarahi hain un se shanakht ki chori, online fraud aur deegar mamnooa amal injaam diye jasakte hain

faislay ki himayat karte hue is iqdaam ko saraha hai Mumbai  ( web disk ) boli would desi girl Priyanka  chopra bhallay hi fobz ki sab se ziyada kamaai karne wali Bharti  اداکاراو¿ں mein دپیکا پڈوکون pryanka chopra naay –apne انسٹاگرام par share kya ke inhen forbz ki is ahem tareen fehrist mein kayi taaqatwar khawateen ke hamrah shaamil kya gaya, jis ke liye unhon naay forbz ka shukriya bhi ada kya

do arab se zayed afraad is waqt Facebook ko har mah istemaal karte hain aur yahi wajah hai ke is social net work ke نیوزفیڈ mein nnat nai tabdeelian lana lagta hai ke kaafi mushkil kaam hai jis neh company ko chakra kar rakh diya kuch arsa pehlay Facebook neh sarfeen ko bataya ke ab نیوزفیڈ par khabrain bohat kam nazar ayen gi is ke baad yeh bataya gaya ke qabil aitbaar khaberi zaraye ko agay laya jaye ga aur ab is neh muqami idaron ko tarjeeh dainay ka elaan kya hai –apne is naye elaan mein company ka kehna tha ke sarfeen ab muqami zaraye ya media idaron ki posts ziyada dekh saken ge taakay aap mozuaat ke barey mein jaan saken jo barah e raast aap aur baradri par asraat muratab kar saktay hain aur jaan saken ge ke argrd kya ho raha hai is hawalay se apni aik post mein Facebook ke baani mark زکربرگ ny kaha ke sarfeen ki janib se social media par ziyada muqami khabron ka mutalba kya jata hai un ka kehna tha muqami khabrain hamein hamari baradrion aur zindagion par asraat muratab karne walay mamlaat ko samajhney mein madad deti hain aassan alfaaz mein Facebook ke baani ka kehna tha ke agar aap kisi muqami pblshr ko falo kar rahay hain ya koi bhi fard kisi muqami khabar ko share karta hai to woh aap ke نیوزفیڈ par ziyada numaya nazar aaye gi yeh up date sab se pehlay America  mein muta-arif karai jarahi hai aur anay walay chand mah ke douran usay deegar mumalik taq tosee di jaye gi company ke mutabiq chhootey pages ko is se ziyada faida honay ka imkaan hai kyunkay un ke فالورز kisi aik maqam se talluq rakhtay hain company ki janib se un tabdeelion ka Andia  guzashta haftay ke elaan ke baad samnay aaya hai jis mein qabil aitbaar khaberi zaraye ko tarjeeh dainay ki baat ki gayi thi waisay yeh wazeh hai ke Facebook ki janib se abhi mazeed tabdeelion ka elaan mutawaqqa hai kyunkay yeh mayaari khabron ki tarjeehat ke liye koshisho ka aaghaz hai company ko tawaqqa hai ke un tabdeelion se jaali khabron aur afwahon ke phelnay ki sharah par qaboo panay mein madad miley sakay gi har saal nnat naye mobile phones samnay atay rehtay hain aur log naye models ko khareedna bhi pasand karte hain
magar har aik –apne puranay smart phones ko badalna pasand nahi karta magar waqt guzarnay ke sath un diwaysz ki raftaar mutasir hoti hai jo aksar sarfeen ke liye pareshani ka baais banti hai
agar to aap ke puranay android phone ko bhi yahi masla darpaish hai to achi khabar yeh hai ke is ke andar kuch khufia سیٹنگز aur اپلیکشنز mojood hoti hain jin ki madad se aap chand second mein apni device ki raftaar mein numaya izafah kar saktay hain
jee haan aap ke phone mein hi aisi setting mojood hai jo phone ki raftaar ko taiz kardeti hai jabkay usay par amal karna itna aaasaaan aur mo-asar hai ke har aik ko usay zaroor aazmana chahiye
waisay is truck se pehlay yeh jaan len ke yeh kaam kaisay karti hai
jab aap kisi app ko open karte hain, band karte hain, poop ups ko open ya band karte hain ya ایپس switch karte hain to is ٹرانزیشن ke douran aynimishn ki speed user antrfis ki speed ko bohat ziyada asraat muratab karti hai
bzahir to aisa lagta hai ke bohat taizi se hum aik se doosri app par chalay gaye magar un اینیمیشنز se phone ki raftaar manfi andaaz se mutasir hoti hai aur un اینیمیشنز ki raftaar dugna taiz karna android phones ko taiz kar sakti hai
to android سیٹنگز mein aisa khufia setting minyo mojood hai jisay doylpr aapshnz kaha jata hai jo ke mutadid advanced aapshnz se bhara sun-hwa hai
yeh aam tor par bayi difalt hayid hota hai magar is tak rasai bohat aasaan hai
bas phone سیٹنگز ko open karen, agar android 8 ya 9 operating system wala phone istemaal kar rahay hain to system par click karen, jabkay puranay version walay phones mein neechay scroll karkay اباؤٹ phone par click karen
is mean scroll karkay blood number ( build number ) par 7 baar lagataar dabayen jis ke baad سیٹنگز mein wapas jayen jahan doylpr aapshnz samnay ajayeen ge
usay open karen aur scroll karkay neechay darj zail سیٹنگز ko talaash karen
window animation scaletransition animation scaleanimator animation scaleان teeno سیٹنگز ke agay 1x likha nazar aaye ga jis ka matlab hai ke اینیمیشنز 100 feesad raftaar par pallay ho rahay hain
to un ki raftaar dugna karne ke liye tenu aapshnz ko kholeen aur 1x ko 0. 5x se tabdeel kar dein aur phir doylpr aapshnz se bahar nikal jayen
aisa karne par woh اینیمیشنز pehlay ke muqablay mein dugna taizi se kaam karen ge
yeh truck puranay ya naye tamam android phones par kaam karti hai aur inhen pehlay ke muqablay mein taiz kardeti hai
mahireen falkiat nizaam e shamsi mein nnat nai inkishafaat karne mein sir garam hain
haal hi mein sayarah mushtari ke chaand یوروپاپر mutadid aisay Bar  فیلے sutoon daryaft hue hain jo 50 fate ( 15 meter ) tak buland hain
mahireen ka kehna hai ke inhen dekh kar ایسالگتا hai ke farsh par un ginat Bar  فیلے naizay aasman ki tar f rukh kiye hue hain
yeh nokdaar sutoon yahan utar ne walay kisi bhi khalayi jahaaz ko chand lamho mein tabah kar saktay hain
zameen ke Bar  فیلے ilaaqon se jab Sooraj  ki roshni nasheeb mein mojood barf se takra kar lotti hai to is tar h ki nokili barf wujood mein aati hai
bilkul isi tar h yoropa par bhi nokeelay ubhaar wujood mein aagaye hain
mahireen ki janib se inhen' ' penny tints' ' ka naam diya gaya hai
yoropa chaand zameen ke muqablay mein kayi gina khushk aur sard hai
ab taq jo maloomat haasil ki gayi hain, un ke mutabiq is par fiza nah honay ke barabar hai, yani yeh kisi bhi qisam ki gasson mein liptay hue nahi hain
mahireen ke mutabiq is par saqal bohat kamzor hai aur yahi wajah hai ke yahan jamnay walay Bar  فیلے sutoon kayi meter buland dekhe gaye hain
card f university ke dr daniel ہوبلے aur un ke sathiyon ka khayaal hai ke shayad is se bhi barray aur ghair mamooli ubhaar ho saktay hain
un ke atraaf saarhay saat meter gehraiyaan ya nasheeb hain aur aik sutoon kam azkam 15 meter tak buland hai
yoropa chaand par nokeelay ubhaar is waqt ziyada bantay hain jab Sooraj  ain un ke oopar hota hai
yoropa ke khat istewa ( ایکویٹر ) par aisa hi hota hai aur un ki bohtat khat istewa par aik pitay ki soorat mein dekhi ja sakti hai
yahan par koi bhi khalayi جہازنہیں utaar sakta, kyun ke ubhaar ke darmain ہموارر jagah nahi hoti, isi liye khalayi jahaaz yahan phas jatay hain
mahireen ko khadsha hai ke yoropa par namkeen pani ka samandar mojood ho sakta hai aur kuch mahireen ka yeh bhi kehna hai ke is ke andar ghair ar zi makhlooq kisi jr ثومے ya hayatiati malecule ki soorat mein bhi mojood hosakti hain

mahireen rozay ke jism par asraat par ghhor kar rahay hain aur haal hi mein avki nava insti tute of science and technology ke askalr profsr تاکایوکی ٹیرویا ney tehqeeq ke baad kaha hai ke janwaron ke model par faqay ke herat angaiz asraat samnay aaye hain jinhein samajhney ki koshish ki jarahi hai mahireen ney chaar sayhat mand raza karon ko bharti kya aur inhen 10 34 aur 58 ghanton taq khanay se baaz rakha lekin yeh bayo markr ki bajaye kisi aur mauzo se mutaliq thi herat angaiz tor par mahireen neh daryaft kya ke faqay ke bayo مارکرز par gehray aur ahem asraat muratab hotay hain mahireen neh dekha ke 58 ghantay ke baad jism ke andar 44 aisay میٹابولائٹس mein izafah sun-hwa jin mein se 30 par is se qabal ghhor nahi kya gaya tha yani faqay se un ke afraaz par ghhor nahi kya gaya tha is ke ilawa jism mein tawanai ke mutabadil zakhair par سگنلنگ badhaane walay بایومارکرز mein izafah sun-hwa jin mein بیوٹائریٹس aur branch chain امائنو acid qabil e zikar hain is ke ilawa anti oxydents ka farogh bhi dekha gaya jis se maloom sun-hwa ke roza ya faqa عمررسیدگی ko rokta hai doosri ahem baat yeh samnay aayi ke khanay se doori ki soorat mein مائٹوکونڈریائی sargarmi barhti hai is se jism mein lachak aur sayhat mand burhapa farogh paata hai taweel Umar  ki wajah ban'nay walay teen ahem ajza لیئوسین آئسولیئوسین aur آپتھیلمک acid ki sharah faqay ki soorat mein barhi hui dekhi gayi yeh tenu میٹابولائٹس burhapay mein kam hotay jatay hain lekin jawani mein ziyada hotay hain wazeh rahay ke میٹابولائٹس un la tadaad malecule ( saalmaat ) ko kehte hain jo hamaray jism mein bohat saaray kaam sar-anjaam dete hain mahireen naay kaha hai ke faqay ki tahaqeeq par mazeed kaam ki zaroorat hai taakay is ke mazeed fawaid ko samnay laya jasakay aap ko yeh to maloom hoga ke mardon aur khawateen ke chalne ka andaaz ya chaal aik dosray se mukhtalif hoti hai magar kya yeh jantay hain ke yeh farq kyun hai to is ka jawab ab tibbi science naay dhoond liya hai California  university New York university aur Texas  ae and am university ki mushtarqa tahaqeeq ke mutabiq waisay to ho sakta hai ke kuch mawaqon par mard aur khatoon ki chaal ka andaaz aik ho magar aam tor par yeh farq wazeh hota hai aur is ki wajah samjhna bhi aassan hai aur woh dono ke jismani saakht ka farq hai tahaqeeq mein yeh bhi bataya gaya ke khawateen ke sath chaltay hue mard aksar apni raftaar sust kardete hain jabkay bachon ke sath woh un ka khayaal rakhnay wala rawayya apnate hain aur un ki raftaar ke mutabiq chaltay hain aisa khawateen bhi karti hain mard jismani tor par khawateen se barray hotay hain aur un ke jism jismani kamon ke liye banay hotay hain to chalna mardon ke liye nafsiati tor par aik ahem nuqta hota hai yani chalne ka maqsad kisi makhsoos feal ka husool hota hai jaisay aik se doosri jagah pohanchna mard hazraat seedha aur aik line mein chaltay hain doosri janib khawateen ki chaal bawaqar hoti hai aur chhootay qadam chalti hain aur bohat kam hota hai jab woh lamba qadam chalein bunyadi tor par khawateen ke chalne ke andaaz aur jismani harkat par barson ka irtiqa asar andaaz hota hai mardon aur khawateen ke jooton ka farq bhi chaal par asar andaaz hota hai misaal ke tor par mard jogr pehantay hain jis se inhen bohat taiz chalne mein madad millti hai is ke muqablay mein khawateen high hil ya mamooli hil ka joota bhi pehan len to un ke liye chalna mushkil hojata hai yeh farq to sab ke liye wazeh hai ke mard lambay dug bhartay hain aur taang ko jitna agay barha satke hain berhate hain jis se woh kam waqt mein ziyada faasla tey kar lete hain aur yahi wajah hai ke woh decemeber 2018 hamza ) Saudi  arab duniya mein asleha daraamad karne wala sab se bara malik ban gaya stak home international ریشرچ institute ki janib se jari kardah عداد o shumaar ke mutabiq Saudi  arab ne 2017 hamza mein duniya bhar mein sab se ziyada asleha khareeda hai jabkay France  bhi is shobay mein saf awwal ke mumalik mein shaamil hai Saudi  arab ne 2017 hamza ke douran 61. 21 arab euro askari shoba par kharch kiye is terhan Saudi  arab ke askari akhrajaat یوروگوائے ki majmoi qaumi pedawar ke barabar لتھویا ki qaumi pedawar se dugna aur Afghanistan  ki qaumi pedawar ke hawalay se 3 gina ziyada hain Saudi  arab ne 2015 hamza mein jung Yemen  ke baad se fouji akhrajaat mein izafah kya hai America  ne Saudi  arab ko sab se ziyada asleha farokht kya hai aur is ke baad Bartania  France  spain italy Switzerland  aur canada ke naam atay hain gaaye, bakray, oont, میمنے aur doodh dainay walay deegar janwaron se haasil honay walay gosht ko surkh gosht kaha jata hai musalman, aydِ qurbaan ( eid ul azhha ) ke mauqa par un janwaron ki qurbani karte hain aur un ka gosht jee bhar kar khatay aur enjoy karte hi surkh gosht, ghizaiyat se bharpoor aik zabardast غذاہ jis mein vitamins, madniyaat, اوراینٹی aaksi ڈنٹس waghera paye jatay hain aur is ke insani sahet par bhi isi lehaaz se asraat muratab hotay hain insani sahet par surkh gosht ke asraat par achi khasi tahaqeeq ki ja chuki hai taham yeh tahaqeeq ziyada tar مشاہداتی mutalay par mushtamil hai jin mein surkh gosht aur mukhtalif bimarion mein talluq qaim karne ki koshish to ki gayi hai taham is ki wajohaat bayan nahi ki gayeen isi terhan ke kayi مشاہداتی mtalaon mein surkh gosht ke ziyada istemaal ko dil ki bimarion cancer aur amwaat se jora gaya hai is silsilay mein aik ahem tahaqeeq Europe  mein ki gayi hai jisay yoropin پراسپیکٹو investi gation inn two cancer and nutrition ka naam diya gaya hai jaissa ke naam se zahir hai is tahaqeeq mein insani ghiza aur cancer ke mabain talluq par mutalea kya gaya hai is silsilay mein 12 laakh 18 hazaar 380 afraad par barray pemanay par 20 mukhtalif mutalay kiye gay un mtalaon mein dil ki bimarion aur ذبابیطس ke amraaz ka prasis shuda surkh gosht ke istemaal se talluq bataya gaya hai taham un mtalaon mein yeh baat wazeh tor par kahi gayi hai ke taaza surkh gosht ke kisi bhi qisam ke sayid ایفیکٹس nahi dekhe gay yeh aik aur tibbi mubaligha aarai hai ke surkh gosht insanon mein کینسرکا baais bantaa hai is hawalay se mukhtalif auqaat par kayi mulkon mein مشاہداتی mutalay kiye gay hain un mtalaon mein taaza surkh gosht ko sahet ke liye intahi mufeed qarar diya gaya hai jabkay پراسیسڈ surkh gosht ka bhi barah e raast cancer ke marz ke sath koi talluq saabit nahi sun-hwa mohqiqeen is nateejay par puhanche hain ke surkh gosht barah e raast cancer ki wajah nahi bantaa taham kuch sooraton mein ghalat tareeqay se pakaya gaya surkh gosht khanay se barri aant ka سرطان peda honay ke khatraat barh jatay hain darasal surkh gosht insani sahet par manfi ya misbet asraat ka talluq is ke pakanay se hota hai mohqiqeen ke mutabiq surkh gosht ko buland darjah hararat par pakanay se is se nuqsaan da murakabat peda honay ke khatraat barh jatay hain agar kisi insaan mein surkh gosht khanay se cancer ka khatrah barh jata hai to is ki wajah gosht ka buland daraja hararat par pakaya jana ho sakta hai taaza aur mandarja بالاطریقوں ke mutabiq durust tareeqay se pakaya gaya surkh gosht apkee sehat ke liye intehai mufeed hai janwar ka intikhab karte waqt ghaas khatay janwar ko tarjeeh deeni chahiye
surkh gosht sahet mand protein, fats vitamins madniyaat aur mukhtalif ghizai anasir se bharpoor hota hai jis ke insani jism aur dimagh par misbet asraat saabit shuda hain t_hran
23 June  ( siyasat dot com ) Iran  ki football team ko spain ke khilaaf bhallay hi shikast ka saamna karna para lekin irani khawateen ny is waqt tareekh raqam kar di, jab inhen 1979 ke baad pehli baar apni team ko kheltaa dekhnay ke liye t_hran ke aik stadium mein jaane ki ijazat mili
Iran  mein kayi دہوں se khawateen ko khelon ke muqablay dekhnay ke liye stadium mein janey se roka jata raha hai lekin ab pehli martaba Iran  mein is hawalay se qawaneen ko naram karte hue mardon aur khawateen dono ko mushtarqa tor par t_hran ke azaadi stadium mein irani team ke matches barri screen par dekhnay ki ijazat di gayi hai
is hawalay se drama is waqt dekhnay mein aaya jab security ehalkaron naay stadium ke darwazay band kardiye lekin phir wazeer e dakhla naay mudakhlat karte hue khawateen ko andar jany ki ijazat day di

Ireland  ( web desk ) mahireen naay kaha hai ke Umar  Raseedah  afraad mein aik intahi aam jazo vitamin d ki kami depration ki wajah banti hai aur 75 feesad kisz mein vitamin d jaisay ahem jazo ki kami hi depration ka marz peda karti hai charsalh tahaqeeq aur surway ke baad mahireen naay inkishaaf kya hai ke Umar  Raseedah  afraad kis terhan mamooli si ahthyat karkay zehni tanav se mehfooz reh satke hain agar nojawan bhi vitamin d ki munasib miqdaar ko yakeeni banayen to agay chal kar depration ke shikaar nahi bantay darmiyani Umar  ya zaefi mein depration miyaar zindagi ko mushkil bana deta hai aur yahan taq waqt se qabal mout se humkenar karsaktha hai is tanazur mein vitamin d ka kirdaar ubhar kar samnay aata hai jo zaeef afraad ko is khofnaak kefiyat se bahar nikaal sakta hai isi bana par mahireen buzurgon ke liye baqaida tor par vitamin d splimnt tajweez karne par zor day rahay hain share karen : model Ayaan  Ali  ney currency smugling case mein custom adalat ki janib se jari honay walay na qabil zamanat warrant giraftari ko challenge kardiya
hafta ko Rawalpindi  ki custom adalat mein currency smugling case mein Ayaan  Ali  case ki samaat hui, custom judge ke chhutti par honay ke baais samaat duty judge banking adalat ny ki, douran samaat mulzima Ayaan  Ali  ny naye wakeel ke tavassut se –apne na qabil zamanat warrant giraftari ko challenge kardiya
mulzima ke wakeel ney adalat mein muaqqaf ikhtiyar karte hue kaha ke Ayaan  Ali  ki bemari ki darkhwast aur medical srtifkit paish karne ke bawajood warrant giraftari jari kar diye gaye, Ayaan  Ali  ke naye wakeel ney adalat ko yaqeen dehani karate hue kaha ke mulzima 8 decemeber taq adalat mein paish ho jaien gi
adalat ney mulzima Ayaan  Ali  ki darkhwast samaat ke liye Manzoor  karte hue custom team ko notice jari kardiya aur muqadma ki samaat 8 decemeber taq multawi kar di
doosri janib Ayaan  Ali  ke naye wakeel ne express news se guftagu karte hue kaha Ayaan  Ali  ki sahet bohat behtar hogayi hai, woh jald Pakistan  wapas aa rahi hain
wazeh rahay ke Ayaan  Ali  ke puranay wakeel sardar lateef khosa ko baqaida tabdeel kardiya gaya un ki jagah barrister Sarfraz  میتو aur Iftikhar  bajoh Ayaan  Ali  case ke naye advocates muqarrar hue hain, do rukni wukla ki nai team neh adalat mein waqalat naame paish kiye
model Ayaan  Ali  ko 14 March  2015 ko Islamabad se Dubai  jatay hue Benazir  international airport par currency smuggle karne ke ilzaam mein girftar kya gaya tha aur un ke paas se 6 laakh Amrici  dollar bar aamad hue they
mahireen is daur mein heran kin cheez تیارکررہے hain
aglay saal aik aisi car muta-arif kar y jaye gi, jis mein digital side mirror nasb hon ge
a seen ko tayyar karne ke liye aik Ar  se se kaam jari hai
is مررکو لیکسس Nami  company nay﻿ tayyar kya hai
digital aaeenay ko company ne' ' digital aaoo tarrrrr mirror' ' ka naam diya hai
is mein display nahi balkay camera nasb kiye gaye hain jin ki askrinz car ke andar nasb ki jayen gi jo bairooni مناظردکھائیں gi
un digital cameron ki badolat kisi bhi shai ki shanakht hosakay gi aur aam sheeshay se oojhal blaynd aspat bhi zahir ho jaien ge
is ki khaas baat yeh hai ke yeh kamera barish, barf baari, dhund aur toofaan mein bhi kaam kere ga aur car ke atraaf ka manzar screen par zahir kere ga
agar chay gaari rivers karte hue kamera zaum kere ga aur kuch fir zi linen bana kar car parking mein bhi madad faraham kere ga
mahireen ke mutabiq sayid mirror display kisi chhootay computer ya tablet display ki manind dikhayi deta hai
company ka khayaal hai ke is se logon ko sarrak ka behtar andaza hosakay ga
Australia  mein doctors ny bhotan ki dhar jari behnoon ko taweel operation ke baad allag kardiya 20 se zayed doctors aur narson ki team ny 6 ghantay taweel kamyaab operation karkay pandrah mah ki Neema  aur داوا ko allag kya mlborn ke royal chldrnz hospital ke srjnz ki team ke sarbarah jo کرامیری ny operation ke baad sahafion ko bataya ke dono bachiyan achi terhan rikor kar rahi hain aur woh unn ki sahet ke hawalay se pur-umeed hain taham aindah 24 se 48 ghantay ahem hain Neema  aur داوا ki walida australvi Khairati  idaray ki madad se operation ke liye aik mah qabal bachiyon ko le kar Australia  pohanchi theen aur october mein unn ki surgery hona thi taa hum bachiyon ke liye izafi ghizai zaroriat ke paish e nazar aakhri lamhaat mein operation mokhar kardiya gaya tha bhotan ka shumaar taraqqi Pazeer  mumalik mein nahi hota hai jahan seenay se kamar taq aapas mein jari un bachiyon ko operation ke zariye allag karne ki sahuliyaat mojood nahi hain America  ny roos پرایکسپورٹ sector aur security alaat se mutaliq pabandiyan aed kar di hain roos ka kehna hai ke Amrici  pabandion ke khilaaf jawabi iqdamaat karen ge Amrici  mehakma e kharja ke senior ohdedar ke mutabiq roos par pabandion mein aliktronks laser sinsrz aur oil gas products tiknalojiz ki baraamdaat par pabandi shaamil hogi mehakma e kharja ke senior ohdedar naay mazeed bataya ke roos ki airline ayroflot par pabandi nahi hogi lekin is ke zariye pabandi mein shaamil ashya ءکی tarseel pabandi mein shaamil hongi senior ohdedar ka kehna hai ke roos par pabandion ke dosray Fez  ki umeed nahi hai wazeh rahay ke football team ke mdfildr ftbalr paal پوگبا ney omra karne ki Saadat  haasil karli world cupp ke liye France  ke 23 rukni team ka hissa aur football season se allag hokar paal پوگبا omra ki adaigi ke liye Saudi  arab puhanche jahan unhon ney omra ki Suad  t- haasil ki paal پوگبا ney 30 second ki aik video social media par shaya ki hai jis mein unhon ney kaha ke khanah kaaba aik intahi khobsorat jagah hai mere ehsasat yahan aakar kya hain inhen mein lafzon mein bayan nahi karsaktha sab ko yahan anay ki Saadat  haasil ho ameeen tasweer ke copy write getty images aaj kal har taraf digital aur vrchoyl currency butt coin ka shore hai
mein jis chhootay barray se milta hon uss ny kam از kam iss ka zikar zaroor suna hota hai
bohat se log aisay bhi mlitay hain jo chahtay hain ke kisi terhan mein unn ki butt coin khridne mein madad kardoon kyunkay iss ki khareed o farokht bhi kisi science se kam nahi
aisa nahi ke aap –apne bank jayen kuch note kishiyr ko تھمائیں aur butt coin le kar ghar aa jayen
iss mein itni ziyada dilchaspi is liye hai kyunkay aksar logon naay butt coin se Ameer  honay walon ki bohat si kahaniyan suni hoti hain jin mein unhein kharedne walon naay chand korion ke butt coin khareeday aur aaj malaa maal hain
phir kis ka dil nahi chahta ke woh bhi Ameer  se Ameer  tar ho jaye
is baarey mein mazeed padhiye misar ke mufti Azam  ka butt coin ke istemaal ke khilaaf Fatwa kon hai jis nay﻿ Butt  coin farokht nahi kiye? dijtl currency Butt  coin ki qeemat mein zabardast izafah digital currency Butt  coin ki maliyat 5000 pound se tajawaz kar gayi butt coin ko aik jaadoyi chhari jaisi shohrat mil gayi hai jo khote sakay ko sona bana deti hai
agar aap ke haath mein aisi talismati chhari aa jaye jo har khote sakay ko sona bana day to aap kya karen ge? yaqeenan aap is chhari se akhrot to nahi toreen ge
sonay ka dhair laga den ge lekin aagr aap logon ko bitayen ke aap ke paas aisi jaadoyi chhari hai to shayad log aap ko deewana samjhein
aaj kal butt coin ki duniya jo aik کرپٹو currency hai is mein bzahir kuch aisa hi ho raha hai
stak market clock ke mutabiq London  stak exchange jo hasas market ka aik ahem bazaar samjha jata hai is mein teen aashariya no kharab dollar ka sarmaya laga sun-hwa hai
coin market cap ke mutabiq کرپٹو currency market mein is waqt 750 arab dollar ka sarmaya lag chuka hai aur bohat taizi se aik kharab taq poanch raha hai
is baat se andaza hota hai ke کرپٹو currency ko sarmaya car ab ahmiyat day rahay hain
jin logon ne shuru mein –apne khote sakun se barri tadaad mein butt coin khareeday aaj uss ki maliyat aasman se baten kar rahi hai aur unn logon ke samnay sonay ke dhair lagey hain
bohat soon ne butt coin kharidne walon ko deewana kaha lekin aaj aahein bhar rahen hain ke kash kuch deewangi hum bhi dikha dete
jahan bohat soon ke liye butt coin ab bohat mehanga ho chuka hai wahan aur bohat si nai کرپٹو کرنسیاں samnay aayi hain
un mein sab se qabil zikar rpl aur ایتھیریم hain
جنوری2017 mein aik rpl ki qeemat 0. 006 $ thi
is ki qeemat mein 62400 % izafah sun-hwa hai aur is waqt is ki qeemat 3. 75 dollar ho chuki hai aur yeh sarmaye ke hisaab se dosray number par hai
mein jab is mein izafah ki tanasub ka hisaab kar raha tha to khud bhi jawab dekh kar heran reh gaya
bzahir yeh koi talismati chhari se kam nahi
aik taraf rpl shuru karne walay idaray naay currency ka ijra kya hai to doosri janib woh duniya bhar mein paison ki ٹرانزیکشنز ka naya taiz raftaar nizaam bhi muta-arif krwane ki koshish mein hain
rpl ke mutabiq yeh naya nizaam bankon mein istemaal honay walay mojooda system se kahin ziyada taiz raftaar ho ga
کرپٹو currency market mein teesray number par ایتھیریم hai jo aik d سینٹرلائیزڈ globle nizaam muta-arif karwanay chahtay hain jo unn ke mutabiq technology ki duniya mein halchal macha day gi
ایتھیریم coin is nizaam mein lain deen ka ahem hissa ho ga
sunah 2017 ke shuru mein aath dollar ka tha aur is waqt is ki qeemat 1000 dollar se tajawaz kar chuki hai
guzashta saal ke shuru mein butt coin ki qeemat taqreeban 1000 $ Amrici  dollar thi
jahan saal mein is ki qeemat barhi kayi baar achanak is ki qeemat giri magar phir snbhli aur barhatay barhatay decemeber mein 20000 $ dollar taq poanch gayi aur phir achanak gir kar 10000 $ ke qareeb aa gayi
butt coin ho ya doosri کرپٹو currency un ki qeemat jahan taizi se oopar jati hai wahan taizi se neechay bhi girty hai lekin is waqt kon kambakht inn khatraat ko dekh raha hai
is waqt bohat se log junoon ki had taq butt coin aur doosri کرپٹو currency mein paisa laganay ke khwahish mand hain
jis cheez ki demand barh jaye uss ki qeemat bhi barh jati hai aur کرپٹو currency ka bhi yahi haal hai
inn ki demand bohat ziyada hai aur qeematein taizi se barh rahi hain
log کرپٹو currency ko fi al haal mustaqbil mein is ki qader vqimt mein izafay ke barey mein qiyaas aarayyon ki bunyaad par khareed rahay hain
samajhney ki baat yeh hai ke butt coin aik currency hai
iss jaisi aur bohat si doosri کرنسیاں bhi hain
yeh sirf aur sirf online duniya mein hain aur unhein kisi malik ke stit bank ne jari nahi kya balkay technology ki duniya se munsalik idaron ne inn ka ijra kya hai
tasweer ke copy write getty images un afraad ka maqsad un mumalik ke stit bankon ki jari kardah krnsyon ka mutabadil paish karna hai jis par kisi ka control nah ho
inn krnsyon ke note nahi chaptay aur unhein haasil karne ke liye aap ko kisi کرپٹو currency ke aykschnj mein account kholna parta hai
aap apni malik ki currency exchange ko day kar کرپٹو currency haasil kar satke hain
sawal yeh hai ke haasil karne ke baad yeh kahan jayen gi
ya to aap ko apni کرپٹو currency exchange ke account mein rakhni padtee hai ya phir unhein aik digital walit ya batwa haasil karkay is mein rakhna parta hai
digital walit ka ای mil account ki terhan address hota hai jis par log aap ko pesey bhaij satke hain
yeh walit mobile phone app ki soorat mein bhi mlitay hain aur computer par bhi unhein istemaal kya ja sakta hai
currency ka aik bunyadi istemaal to khareed o farokht ya ujrat dena hota hai
sawal yeh hai ke kya aap کرپٹو currency se dukaan par ja kar kuch khareed satke hain
fi al haal is ke imkanaat kam hain kyunkay yeh bohat mehdood jaghon par istemaal hoti hai
mumkin hai mustaqbil mein unhi se khareed o farokht ho magar abhi aisa nahi hai
kulsoom jahan foot baal mein mutadid musalman foot بالرزکی hukum rani qaim hai

is taraqqi Yafta  daur mein science daano ke sath talib e ilm bhi nnat nai chizin ijaad kar rahay hain haal hi mein cheeni taalib ilmoon naay aik aisa robot tayyar kya hai jo talaab, jheel aur deegar aabi ذخائزصاف karsaktha hai is ki khaas baat yeh hai ke yeh insani salahiyat se 7 gina zayed taizi se jheel ki safai kar taa hai aur kharch bhi 70 fi sad taq hota hai is robot ko' ' avrka' ' ka naam diya gaya hai yeh khud car andaaz میںجھیل aur talaab saaf karta hai mahireen ke mutabiq yeh poooray amal ki tasaveer bhi bhejta rehta hai is ki taizi aur salahiyat insani pahonch se bhi bahar hai is ki ahem khasiyat is ki taizi hai, kyun ke yeh bohat taizi se pani ki satah se kachra aur gannd saaf karta rehta hai is ki lambai 1. 2 meter aur choraai 0. 8 meter hai 15 klov gira meem wazni robot ko is tar h design kya gaya hai ke usay kam se kam mushkilaat ka saamna kar na parre aur yeh hamwar andaaz mein agay barh sakay is mein nasb lamba baazu pani mein tairtay hue kora jama karkay andar lagey kachra daan taq pohanchata hai yeh isi waqt mein tasaveer aur video bhi dekhata hai jisay app ke zariye smart phone par یکھا ja sakta hai is mein تھرسٹر bhi nasb hai jo 50 neton ki qowat peda karta hai isi wajah se pani ki jha ڑیاں usay roknay mein nakaam rehti hain mahireen ke mutabiq yeh azkhud barri ruukawaton ki nishaan dahi bhi karsaktha hai ilawa azeen yeh pani mein aloodgi ki shanakht aakhri tst match November  2016 mein England  ke khilaaf khela tha wahein unhon ney mehdood over ki cricket mein aakhri martaba January  2013 mein England  ke khilaaf vnde match اوردسمبر 2012 mein Pakistan  ke khilaaf tea 20 bain al aqwami match khela tha indian permier league ( aayi pi ail ) ke pehlay season mein gautam گمبھیرنے Dehli  ڈیئرڈیولس ke liye 534 runs banaye woh pehlay season mein dosray sab se ziyada runs bananay walay khilari they ibtidayi do seasons mein گمبھیرنے 1000 runs –apne khatay mein darj kiye they un ki behtareen karkardagi ko dekhte hue Shah  rukh Khan  ki فرنچائزی کولکاتا night رائیڈرس ( ke ke are ) ne 2010 mein inhen 2. 4 million dalrkhrch karkay inhen apni team mein shaamil kya tha gautam گمبھیرکو is team ki kamaan bhi saump di gayi thi unhon ne apni captani mein ke ke are ko 2012 aur 2014 mein chmpyn banaya gmbhir 2017 mein ke ke are کوچھوڑ kar Dehli  dear ڈیولس wapas aagaye they
inhen is team ki captani sonpi gayi lekin ibtidayi matchon ke baad pehlay unhon ney captani choari samaji rabton ki Website Facebook ke baani mark زکربرگ ney Facebook ki siniyr managment ko mahswara diya hai ke woh aayi phone se android phone par muntaqil ho jaien
New York times mein shaya honay walay aik article ke mutabiq mark زکربرگ Amrici  company Apple  ke si ای o ke bayan ke baad ghusay mein thay
Apple  company ke si ای o tِm kُk naay Facebook ki data پرائیوسی ke muamlay ko baratnay par tanqeed ki thi
isi tabsaray ke baad mark zikre barg ne company ki siniyr managment ko aayi phone ka istemaal roknay aur android phone istemaal kar ne ka kaha hai
yeh hadaayat jari karte hue mark zikre barg ne kaha ke android phone Apple  ke muqablay mein istemaal ke liye ziyada behtar hai

up ki device par pallay back support dastyab nahi Pakistan  mein chaand girhan raat siwa 10 bajay dekha ja sakay ga jummey ko duniya ke mukhtalif hisson mein log chaand girhan ka nzarah kar saken ge aur yeh koi mamooli chaand girhan nahi ho ga
Amrici  khalayi agency Nasa  ka kehna hai ke yeh 21 win sadi ka sab se taweel tareen chaand girhan ho ga
Nasa  ke بعقول agar aap khush qismat hain to aik ghanta 43 minute taq chaand girhan ka nzarah kar satke hain
mukammal chaand girhan kya hota hai? mukammal chaand girhan mein zameen, Sooraj  aur chaand –apne madaar mein rehtay hue seedhi lakeer mein aa jatay hain aur chaand, Sooraj  se zameen ke mukhalif janib aa jata hai
jon jon poora chaand hamaray sayaray ke saaye mein chala jata hai, is ki roshni dramayi tor par kam hoti jati hai lekin zameen ki fiza se guzarnay wali Sooraj  ki roshni ke baais yeh nazar aata rehta hai
is baray mein mazeed padhiye daidh sadi baad chaand girhan, blue aur super moon ka nzarah duniya bhar mein' barfani chaand' ke nazare 151 saal baad blue moon ko girhan lagnay ka nzarah 31 January  ko 2017 mein science ki duniya ke ahem waqeat tasweer ke copy write getty images mukammal chaand girhan ko' blood moon' kyun kaha jata hai? mukammal chaand girhan ke douran chaand tanbay ke rang ka nazar aaye ga jis ki wajah se is ka naam' blood moon' bhi par gaya hai
is ki wajah yeh hai ke zameen ki fiza nilgon roshni ko surkh ki nisbat ziyada taaqat se bikhearti hai jabkay is baar fiza ko neelay ke bajaye tanbay ke rang ki roshni bikhairna hogi
yahi wajah hai ke chaand ki satah taq pounchanay wali roshni neelee nahi balkay tanbay ke rang ki dikhayi day gi
tasweer ke copy right nasa image caption mukammal chaand girhan ke douran chaand tanbay ke rang ka nazar aaye ga jis ki wajah se is ka naam' blood moon' bhi par gaya hai
mukammal chaand girhan ko kahan kahan dekha ja sakta hai? 27 July  jummey ko chaand girhan ka nzarah Europe , Africa , mashriq wasti, wasti asia aur Australia  ke ziyada tar hisson mein dikhayi day ga
chaand girhan ko dekhnay ke liye aap ko tally scoop ki zaroorat nahi hai lekin aap ke paas doorbeen ho to ziyada achaa nzarah kya ja sakta hai
agar aap ny chaand girhan dekhnay ke maqam ka intikhab kar liya hai to chaand ko girhan lagnay ke nazare ko grinich ke mayaari ke waqt ke mutabiq aath baj kar 21 minute par dekh satke hain
tasweer ke copy right getty images sab se aaccha nzarah kahan se hoga? chaand girhan ka sab se aaccha nzarah mashriqi Africa , mashriq wasti aur wasti asia mein dekhnay mein aaye ga
Pakistan  mein chaand girhan raat siwa 10 bajay dekha ja sakay ga
taham wasti aur shumali America  ki awam is nazare ko nahi dekh payen ge jabkay janoobi America  ke mashriqi hisson mein جزوری chaand girhan ka nzarah kya ja sakay ga
Bartania  mein chaand girhan shuru honay ke nazare ko nahi dekha ja sakay ga kyunkay is waqt chaand ufaq se neechay ho ga

tasweer ke copy right getty images tally kaam alaat o masnoaat bananay wali cheeni company huawei ko Pakistan  mein kon nahi jaanta
is ke banaye mobile phone se le kar راؤٹرز aur ڈونگل tak har cheez yahan nah sirf dastyab hai balkay kaafi maqbool bhi hain
har kuch arsay baad huawei ka naya smart phone Pakistan  mein muta-arif karwaya jata hai
is ke Pakistan  mein maqbool honay ki aik barri wajah is ki qeemat aur mobile phones mein di janey wali khususiyaat hain
is ke ilawa baaz adaad o shumaar ke mutabiq Pakistan  mein three jee aur for jee market ka aik bara hissa bhi huawei ke paas hi hai
ab sawal yeh peda hota hai ke jahan Pakistan  jaisay malik mein cheeni company huawei aur is ka zeli brand honor itna maqbool hai aur tally kaam market ka aik bara hissa is ke paas hai, wahein taraqqi pasand mumalik is company se khaufzadah kyun hain? newzea land ko hi le len jo haal hi mein un mumalik ki fehrist mein shaamil ho gaya hai jis ny qaumi salamti wajohaat ki bana par huawei ke banaye tally kaam alaat ke istemaal ki tajweez ko mustard kar diya hai
newzea land ki aik company –apne five jee mobile net work ke liye huawei ke alaat istemaal karna chahti thi lekin newzea land ki sarkari security agency ka kehna hai ke is muahiday se khatraat peda ho satke hain
tasweer ke copy right getty images aakhir un mumalik ko khauf kya hai? yeh mumalik cheeni tecnology company se is liye mohtaat hain kyunkay unhein dar hai ke chain huawei jaisi companiyon ko sanati raaz aur deegar khufia maloomat haasil karne mein madad karne ke liye majaboor kar sakta hai
mahireen ka kehna hai ke un mumalik ko chain ki janib se jasoosi ke khatraat la-haq hain
Australia  stritijk policy institute mein international cyber policy center ke tam یورن kehte hain ke' cheeni hukoomat kayi saalon se maloomat chori karne ke maqasid ka wazeh muzahira kar chuka hai
' unhon naay kaha ke' cheeni riyasat kayi cyber aur deegar jasoosi aur antilikchoyl properly ki chori mein mulawis raha hai
' tom یورن ne mazeed kaha ke' companiyon aur hukoomat ke darmain qareebi talluq ki wajah se khadshaat mein mazeed izafah sun-hwa hai ke chain riyasat se jari companiyon ko khusoosi mara-aat day kar jasoosi ke operation ki koshish kar sakta hai
' un khadshaat mein is waqt mazeed izafah ho gaya jab guzashta saal naye qawaneen muta-arif kurwaye gay jin ke tehat cheeni tanzeemon ko national intelli jins koshisho mein madad ka kaha gaya
jasoosi ki tareekh aur un naye qawaneen ke imtezaaj huawei aur zid tea ای jaisi companiyon ke istemaal ko khatray mein daal diya hai
tasweer ke copy right getty images ab kyun? five jee net work kayi mumalik mein bana diya gaya hai aur is se mobile anfrastrkchr mein aik nai aur ahem lehar aaye gi
huawei duniya mein tally communication alaat bananay wali sab se barri company hai, aur tally kaam company spark newzea land –apne five jee net work ke liye huawei ki technology istemaal karne ka mansoobah rakhti thi
lekin huawei ko deegar mumalik ki janib se rukawat ka saamna karna par raha hai jis ki wajah yeh hai ke un mumalik ko khatrah hai ke huawei un alaat ki aarr mein jasoosi ka mauqa faraham kar sakti hai
spark Nami  is company ka kehna hai ke' newzea land ke government kmyonikishnz security beuro ke sarbarah ne kaha hai ke agar yeh moahida hota hai to is se national security ko khatraat la-haq ho satke hain
' intelli jins services ke wazeer andrew little naay kaha hai ke spark agency ke sath kaam kar ke un khatraat ko kam kar sakti hai
tasweer ke copy right getty images dosray mumalik ko kya khadshaat hain? is se qabal Australia  ne bhi huawei aur zid tea ای ko national security bunyadon par malik ko five jee technology faraham karne se rokkk diya tha
huawei ne australvi hukoomat ke is ki palisyon aur masnoaat par tabsaray par tanqeed karte hue kaha ke' yeh tabsarah ghalat maloomat aur haqayiq se hatt kar hai
' company naay apni azaadi ka difaa karte hue kaha :' yeh aik private company hai jis ke maalik is ke mulazim hain aur koi share holdr nahi
' lekin America  aur Bartania  naay bhi huawei par khadshaat ka izhaar kya hai aur company ko Germany , Japan  aur Korea  mein bhi shadeed jaanch partaal ka saamna hai
guzashta haftay wall strit journal ne report kya tha ke Amrici  hukoomat mobile companiyon se rabita kar rahi hain ke woh huawei ke alaat istemaal karne se guraiz karen
aisay mein Pakistan  ke ilawa bzahir shayad aik hi malik hai jo huawei ke sath khara dikhayi deta hai aur woh hai papwa new گینی jis ka kehna hai ke woh –apne internet anfrastrkchr ko qaim karne ke liye huawei ke sath moahida kere ga

un tamam flag ship phones mein کوالکوم ki hi 5g bees bind chup hongi

( jari hai ) apni taqreer ke douran کوالکوم ke saddar naay aik slayid bhi dikhayi, jis mein un companiyon ki fehrist thi jo کوالکوم ke sath 5g اینڈروئیڈ phone par kaam kar rahi hain
un companiyon mein اسوس, فوجسٹو, Google , each MD, each tea si, inseego, ail jee, motorola, net gear, net com vayrlis, one plus, اوپو, Saam  sang, sharp, Sera  vayrlis, sooni, ٹیلیٹ, wing take, w an si, ?me aur zid tea ای shaamil hain

woh musalman malik jis ne plastic ke currency note jari karne ka elaan kardiya woh musalman malik jis ne plastic ke currency note jari karne ka elaan kardiya qahira ( daily Pakistan  online ) arab malik misar ne plastic ke currency note muta-arif karanay ka elaan kardiya hai
hukoomat ki janib se 2020 mein malik bhar mein plastic ke currency note muta-arif karaye jayen ge
is iqdaam ka maqsad jealsaazi se bachna hai
misar ke sntrl bank ke governor tarek ke mutabiq 2020 mein misar mein پولیمر maday se tayyar kardah plastic ke currency note muta-arif kradie jayen ge
plastic ke Misri  پاؤنڈ ki taba-at ki laagat mein kaghaz ke note ki nisbat kam akhrajaat hon ge
is ke ilawa plastic ke currency noton ki ja-al saazi nahi ki jasakay gi
unhon naay plastic ke currency noton ki khususiyaat ke barey mein baat karte hue bataya ke aisay note mahol dost, mazboot, water proof, kaghaz ki nisbat ziyada arsay taq kharab nah honay walay aur kam se kam aloodgi phelanay walay hain
unhon nay﻿ bataya ke is waqt chain, Bartania , Australia , سینگاپور, Indonesia , romanya aur vit naam jaisay mumalik plastic ke currency note tayyar kar rahay hain
misar ke sntrl bank ke governor ka kehna tha ke ibtida mein 10 پاؤنڈ maliyat ke plastic ke currency note chaapay jayen ge
is ke baad batadreej deegar tamam maliyat ke currency noton ko plastic ke noton mein tabdeel kardiya jaye ga
yaad rahay ke msrmin currency note pehli baar 1836ءمیں raaij hue they
taweel arsay tak misar par Bartanwi  qabza rehne ki wajah se yahan ab bhi currency ka naam پاؤنڈ hai

42 sala japani arab patti, karobari shakhsiyat aur fashion tiecon یوساکا مائیزاوا space x ke rocket ke zariye chaand taq safar karne walay pehlay niji musafir hon ge
unhon ne elaan mein kaha :' mein ne chaand tak jaaane ka iradah kar liya hai
' un ki sawari bi f are, yani' big فیلکن rocket' ho gi, jis ki ronmayi aylon museek ne 2016 mein ki thi

tasweer ke copy write afp image caption aylon musk nay﻿ sunah 2017 mein' moon loop' ka اعکان kya tha lekin yeh baat wazeh nahi ke yeh mission kab lanch kya jaye ga, aur jis rocket ki zariye musafir ko chaand taq le jaya jaye ga, woh bhi abhi taq taamer nahi sun-hwa
sunah 2017 mein aylon museek neh elaan kya tha ke woh do swaryon ko paison ke aiwaz chaand ke madaar ka chakkar lgwayin ge aur yeh mission 2018 mein jaye ga
is waqt space x ka khayaal tha ke woh is maqsad ke liye apna taaqatwar' فیلکن heavy' rocket aur' drign' khalayi jahaaz hi istemaal kere ga
lekin is saal feb mein elvin misk ne kaha ke insanon ko madaar mein bhejnay ke liye space x' bi f are' par hi inhisaar kere ga
yeh rocket kabhi ura nahi hai, lekin jari kardah takneeki maloomat ke mutabiq rocket ki oonchai 106 meter aur qtr no meter hai
is ke muqablay mein' فیلکن heavy' 70 meter ouncha hai
is ke cover mein do rocket nasb hain, jin ka infiradi qutar 3. 6 meter hai
paiir ke roz aylon musk nay﻿' bi f are' aur khalayi jahaaz ke khakay jari kiye, jin mein khalayi jahaaz ke design mein kayi tabdeelian nazar aa rahi theen
space x ke khayaal mein' bi f are' 150 tan tak ka wazan madaar tak pouncha sakta hai
yeh Nasa  ke puranay سیٹرن-5 rocket se bhi ziyada hai
space x ke baani aylon masac aaj kal ghalat wajohaat ki bana par srkhyon mein hain

douran khud khasi maqbool adakara rahen lekin dilip kumar se shadi ke baad unhon naay apni poori zindagi unhi ke naam kar di woh dilip kumar ke dukh aur sukh mein saaye ki terhan un kay sath rahi dilip kumar ki 96 win saalgirah par syra Bano  ney Bartanwi  nashriyati idaray ko interview dete hue kaha saalgirah par qareebi doston ke liye aik choti si party rakhi hai, dilip sahib bemari ki wajah se ab bohat kam boltay hain aur kaafi modi bhi hain, kabhi logon ko pehchan letay hain aur kabhi nahi bhi pehchan paate hain unhon ney kaha aaj bhi dilip sahib ko bohat jaldi nazar lag jati hai is liye mein unki nazar utaarnay ke liye sadqa diya karti hon unhon ney kaha mein dilip sahib kay sath guzaraa sun-hwa har lamha apna aaccha naseeb samjhti hon, jo Allah  ney mujhe bakhsha hai unhon ne kaha hum dono ko aik dosray ke sath rehna bohat aaccha lagta hai
Karachi  پیڈیاٹرک کنجینیٹیل heart diseases ( pedaishi طورپردل mein sorakh ) mohlik magar qabil ilaaj bemari hai jis ke bar waqat ilaaj se bohat saari amwaat ko roka ja sakta hai dil ke pedaishi amraaz ke haamil bachon ke liye mustaqbil nai umedon se bhar poor nzraata hai ae ke یوایچ chldrnz hospital ke service line cheif dr Babar  husn ka kehna hai ke aik mohtaat andazay ke mutabiq har saal 60, 000 bachay si each d ke sath is duniya mein atay hain jin mein se se beshtar bachay dehi ilaqon mein peda hotay hain un mareez bachon mein aik barri tadaad mein khatarnaak noiyat ka si each d paaya jata hai aur unhein zindagi ka pehla saal mukammal karne ke liye operation ki zaroorat hoti hai aagha Khan  university naay aisay bachon aur in ke khandano ki muawnat ke liye aik qadam agay badhaya hai bachon ke dil ke amraaz ke ilaaj ke liye shuru ki gayi ae ke you ki muhim مینڈنگ kids ہارٹس ke aaghaz ko 4 saal ho chuke hain yeh muhim aisay khandano ke liye umeed aur madad ki kiran hai jo maali tor par mustahkam nahi hain muhim ke aaghaz se le kar ab taq 1800 se zayed dil ke amraaz mein mubtala bachon ke پروسیجرزآغا Khan  university hospital mein kiye ja chuke hain jin mein se beshtar ko taqreeban 400 million rupay ki maali imdaad faraham ki gayi مینڈنگ kids ہارٹس muhim ki rasai aur wusat mein izafay ke liye is saal ae ke you each ney muhim ka daira 300000 afraad taq badhaaya hai aur is ke liye aagha Khan  میٹرنل and child care center hyderabad ke ishtiraaq se aik camp qaim kya hai camp ka maqsad aisay bachon ka ilaaj hai jo sahet ke mojooda nizaam mein ilaaj ki saholaten haasil nahi kar paate university hospital mein un ka mayaari ilaaj faraham kya jaye ga dr Babar  husn kamzid kehna tha ke hum ney har saal si each d ke mareez 1000 bachon ka ilaaj karkay un ki zindaganian bachanay ka hadaf muqarrar kya hai aur hum –apne hadaf ke husool ke bohat qareeb hain مینڈنگ kids ہارٹس ke tehat پیڈیاٹرک si each d se mutaliq awaami aagahi mein izafay ki muhim ke sath sath fndz jama karne ki muhim bhi jari hai jis ke liye ae ke you each patients vilfiyr programme bharpoor muawnat faraham kar raha hai is silsilay mein Karachi  golf club mein ae ke you each golf tournament munaqqid kya gaya tha jis mein dil ki durusti ke zariye jaan bachanay walay operations ko srahne aur muawnat karne walay afraad ki barri tadaad naay shirkat ki ﻿زندگی ki masrofiyat aur mukhtalif masail insaan ko nah sirf jismani balkay zehni tor par bhi thaka dete hain aisay mein kuch log halaat ka muqaabla kar lete hain magar kuch zehni تناؤ aur depration ka shikaar ho jatay hain mahireen mutfiq hain ke zehni تناؤ aur depration ka shikaar afraad ke sath mohabbat aur shafqat ka برتاؤ kya jaye un ke sath sakht rawayya rakhna un ki haalat ko nazar andaaz karna ya mamooli samjhna un ke marz ko badhaane ke mutradif hota hai zehni تناؤ ka shikaar afraad ki janib se buray ravayye ya kharab alfaaz ki bhi umeed rakhni chahiye un ki haalat ko mad e nazar rakhtay hue usay nazar andaaz karna chahiye lekin khayaal rahay ke yeh rawayya mtshdd soorat ikhtiyar nah kere mareez ke khayalat aur jazbaat ko suntay hue aahista aahista chhoti chhoti cheezon ki taraf is ka dheyaan mabzol karwaya jaye jaisay ke kisi lazeez khanay kisi dilchasp TV programme khaas tor par mazahiy khandan mein anay wali kisi taqreeb ki tayari shopping kisi ahem shakhsiyat se mulaqaat ya kahin ghoomnay ke programme ke baaray mein guftagu isi terhan depration ke shikaar afraad ko jismani tor par qareeb rakha jaye aur inhen gilaay lagaya jaye tibbi mahireen naay baqaida reserch se saabit kya hai ke qareebi rishton jaisay walidain behan bhai shareek hayaat ya doston ke gilaay lagna depration aur dimaghi تناؤ mein kami lata hai thakan pareshani depration aur zehni تناؤ ke shikaar khawateen o hazraat mahireen nafsiat se mahswara karne ke ilawa mukhtalif tareeqon se khud ko pُrskon rakh satke hain rozana chand minute muraqba jismani aur zehni تناؤ ko khatam karne mein madadgaar aur kisi cheez par dimagh yaksu honay ki salahiyat mein bhi izafah karta hai bhagna dorna dimagh ke un kimiklz ki miqdaar mein izafah karta hai جواسے khusi ka pegham signal dete hain
taaza reserch ke mutabiq jo log baqaidagi se dorrtay hain, woh un afraad se ziyada mutmaen paye gay hain jo dorrtay ya uchhal kood nahi karte lazeez khana zehni تناؤ aur thakan kam karne ka aik tareeqa lazeez khana hai aap ke pasand ka behtareen khana aap ke mood par Khushgawar  assar chhorta hai aisay mauqa par aap ke pasandeeda flavor ki ice kareem bhi behtareen nataij day gi seedhiyan chrhhin seedhiyan charhne se aap ki saanson ki aamad o Raft  taiz hogi aur aap ziyada oxygen ko jazb karen ge ziyada oxygen jazb karne se aap ke jismani aaza fa-aal hon ge nateejatan jism ke liye muzir asraat rakhnay walay hormone kam peda hon ge safai karen baaz dafaa hamaray aas paas phaily aur bhikri hui cheeze bhi dimagh ko دباؤ ka shikaar karti hain cheezon ko un ke thikaane par wapas rakha jaye aur aas paas ki jagah ko simta sun-hwa aur saaf suthra karliya jaye to zehni تناؤ mein kaafi hadd taq kami askati hai Saudi  arab ki janib se Pakistan  mein 10 arab dollar ki sarmaya kaari ka imkaan hai media report ke mutabiq wazeer e azam Imran  Khan  ka dora Saudi  arab bohat kamyaab raha hai Saudi  hukoomat si pack mein bhaari sarmaya kaari karne ka iradah rakhti hai doray ke douran is hawalay se tafseeli baat hui hai zaraye ka kehna hai ke Saudi  arab Gwadar  mein oil city banaye ga mutahidda arab amarat ( you ae ای ) naay bhi Pakistan  mein bhaari sarmaya kaari par amaadgi zahir kar di hai Saudi  arab ki si pack mein shamoliat ke liye Pakistan  naay chain ko aetmaad mein le liya hai Wazeer e Azam  ke dora Saudi  arab ke douran Pakistan  naay 15 arab dollar ke package ki khwahish ka izhaar kya jis ke jawab mein Saudi  hukoomat 10 arab dollar dainay par Raza  mand hogayi hai yeh raqam iqtisadi mansoobon ki soorat mein Pakistan  ko milein ge zaraye ka kehna hai ke Saudi arab Pakistan  mein oil city bhi taamer kere ga yeh oil city Gwadar  mein si pack mansoobay ka hissa hoga is se qabal oil city chain ko banana tha zaraye ka mazeed kehna hai ke Wazeer e Azam  Imran  Khan  aur wafad ney Bharti  shur angizyon ke baarey mein bhi Saudi  arab ko aetmaad mein liya wifaqi wazeer e itla-aat Fawad  chohadry ney bhi apni press conference mein kaha hai ke Pakistan  aur chain ke sath Saudi  arab bhi si pack ka teesra ahem shiraakat daar ho ga aur is mansoobay mein barri sarmaya kaari kere ga unhon ney bataya ke october ke pehlay haftay mein Saudi  arab ka aala sathi wafad Pakistan  aaye ga jis mein Saudi  وزیرتوانائی aur aala shaksiaat shaamil hon gi beijing ( aayi an pi ) chain aur America  ke darmain tijarti jung ke baais chain ab deegar mumalik se soybean daraamad karne laga hai jin mein janoobi America  aur behar Aswed  ke mumalik shaamil hain media reports ke mutabiq maloom sun-hwa hai ke America  ke daraamad y soya bain ka 60 feesad chain mein farokht kya jata hai chain America  tijarti jung ke shuru honay ke baad cheeni hukoomat ny Amrici  soybean par 25 feesad izafi tirf laganay ka faisla kya to cheeni manndi mein Amrici  soybean ki qeemat bohat barh gayi aur is ki msabqti qowat kaafi had taq kamzor ho gayi guzashta chand mahino mein chain ny America  ko chore kar brazil urgentine یوراگوئے aur canada sameit deegar mumalik se barri tadaad mein soybean khareeda un ke ilawa roos yokrayn sameit di belt and road se wabsta mumalik mein soybean ki bharpoor kaasht ki jati hai doosri janib cheeni mahireen ka khayaal hai ke un mumalik se soybean ki farahmi cheeni manndi ki zaroorat se kaafi ziyada saabit hogi is liye Amrici  soybean par inhisaar nahi rahay ga tasweer ke copy right afp Pakistan  ke baare mein kayi aisi cheeze hain jo ke aap ko heran kar sakti hain chahay woh cricket team ki performance ho ya malik ke bazarِ hasas mein shadeed mandi se zabardast taizi ka rujhan ho
do din pehlay tak Pakistan  stak exchange ka andiks mandi ka shikaar tha lekin mangal ki raat ko Saudi  arab ki janib se imdadi package ke elaan ke baad do din se mandi ki jagah taizi ne le li hai aur jumaraat ko asiayi bazarِ hasas ko shadeed mandi bhi Pakistani  بازارحصص ki taizi ko nahi rokkk saki
Pakistan  stak exchange andiks mein taizi ki wajohaat tasweer ke copy right afp Pakistan  stak exchange ka andiks taqreeban is waqt se dabao ka shikaar tha jab se mojooda hukoomat aayi hai jis mein aik barri wajah hukoomat ke aalmi maliyati idaray aayi am f ke paas jaaney ya nah jaaney ke faislay par payi jaaney wali kashmakash thi

mangal ki raat ko hukoomat ki janib se Saudi  arab se chay arab dollar ka imdadi package milnay ke elaan naay aglay din budh ko stak exchange mein jaan daal di aur aik din mein andiks taqreeban saarhay baara so points barha
ae ke d group ke chairman Aqeel  kareem dhidi ny bi bi si se baat karte hue kaha ke bazarِ hasas mein taizi hukoomat ko Saudi  arab se imdaad milnay ke baad aayi hai aur is ke sath sarmaya karon ko yeh umeed bhi ke anay walay dinon mein wazeer e azam Imran  Khan  ke chain ke doray se achay nataij nikal satke hain unhon ny is ke sath kaha ke un tawaquaat ki wajah se ho sakta hai ke is waqt ghair mulki sarmaya car market se sarmaya nikaal rahay hain woh silsila ruk jaye

honay wali aik tibbi tahaqeeq mein samnay aayi Dublin  college university ki tahaqeeq mein bataya gaya ke mehez 3 cupp chai ya 2 cupp kaafi rozana piinaa bhi kam wazan ya qabal از waqt bachon ki paidaiesh ka khatrah barha sakta hai mohqiqeen ka maanna hai ke chai ya kaafi mein mojood caffeine maa ke pait mein khoon ki supply mein rukawat ban kar bachay ki nashonuma ko mutasir kar sakti hai is tahaqeeq ke douran aik hazaar aisi khawateen ka jaiza liya gaya jin ke haan bachay ki paidaiesh hui thi nataij se maloom sun-hwa ke har izafi 100 mili gram caffeine hamal ke awleen 3 mah ke douran jazo badan banana bachay ka wazan 72 gram kam karta hai caffeine ki itni miqdaar bachay ke qad aur sir ki golai ko bhi kam karti hai mohqiqeen ka kehna tha ke ziyada caffeine istemaal karne wali mujawaza iqdaam par sakht tanqeed ki hai

unhon nay﻿ –apne aik ٹویٹ mein likha ke America  tijarat mein arbon dollar ka nuqsaan utha raha hai aur is ke liye tijarti jung jeetna aaasaaan ho ga

mahireen ka kehna hai ke saddar trmp ki janib se steel aur ایلومینم پردرآمدی duty ke nifaz se America  mein rozgaar ke ziyada mawaqay peda nahi kiye ja saken ge is ke nateejay mein ashya ki qeematon mein izafah ho ga

Donald  trmp ne –apne aik twitter pegham mein kaha ke tijarti palisyon ne America  ki steel aur الومینیم industry ko tabah o barbaad kar diya
' hamein kisi ko –apne malik, apni companiyon aur –apne vrkron ka faida nahi uthany dena chahiye
America  duniya ke taqreeban 100 mulkon se steel daraamad karta hai aur is ki steel ki daraamad –apne malik se steel ki bar aamad se chaar gina ziyada hai
America  ki steel andsri sunah 2000 se mutasir hui hai aur is ki salana pedawar 11. 2 crore tan se kam ho kar 8. 6 crore tan reh gayi hai

kayi siyasi tajzia car is faislay par hukoomat ke lte le rahay hain aur bohat se muashi mahireen is faislay ko durust qarar day rahay hain
awaami rad-e-amal umomi tor par karzzzz lainay ke is faislay ke khilaaf hai
yeh bhi padhiye maliyati bohraan : hukoomat ka aayi am f ke paas janay ka faisla stak exchange aik din mein gayarah so pointe kyun gira? Pakistan  mein' money budget ', taraqiyati akhrajaat mein kami paneer hi Pakistan  ko aayi am f se bacha sakta hai? aakhir kya wajah hai ke Pakistan  mein siyasi aur awaami halqay aayi am f se karzzzz lainay ke khilaaf hain, is ki aik wajah to shaed aayi am f ko baaz siyasi rehnumao ki janib se aik viln ke tor par paish karna hai jin mein khud wazeer e azam Imran  Khan  bhi shaamil hain jnhon nay﻿ container par ki gayi apni mashhoor tqriron mein aik mauqa par kaha tha ke agar woh wazeer e azam hon aur hukoomat ko karzzzz lainay ke liye kisi ke samnay haath phelana para, to woh waqt anay se pehlay woh khudkushi kar len ge
yeh to kher un ka siyasi bayaniya tha jo unhon naay is waqt ki hukoomat ke aayi am f ke sath karzzzz ke husool ke liye honay walay mazakraat ke waqt diya tha lekin agar dastyab haqayiq par nazar daali jaye to jahan aayi am f se karzzzz ke husool ke jahan bohat se nuqsanaat hain wahan kuch faiday bhi hain
tasweer ke copy right getty images yeh dono cheeze un sharait se jari hui hain jo aayi am f karzzzz khuwa malik par karzzzz dete waqt aed karta hai
mukhtalif surathaal mein yeh sharait mukhtalif ho sakti hain lekin baaz sharait aisi hain jo Pakistan  ke tanazur mein pichli chaar dahaiyo se tasalsul ke sath laago ki ja rahi hain
Pakistan  ny pehli baar sattar ki dahai mein aayi am f se karzzzz liya tha is ke baad se ab taq har anay wali hukoomat ny karzzzz ki yeh me chakhi hai siwaye fouji Amir  zia Al Haq  ke jin ke zamane mein Afghan  jung ki wajah se dollar ki itni rail pail thi ke unhein karzzzz lainay ki kuch khaas zaroorat mehsoos nahi hui
zail mein inhen mumkina sharait ki roshni mein aayi am f ke programme ke faiday aur nuqsanaat ka jaiza paish kya ja raha hai
tasweer ke copy right getty images sabsadi ( reayati narkhon ) ka khtama mahireen maeeshat ka khayaal hai ke Pakistan  ke akhrajaat aur amdan mein Adam  tawazun ki barri wajah sabsadi ka woh nizaam hai jo kayi dahaiyo se nafiz hai
aayi am f is raye se nah sirf mutfiq hai balkay is nizaam ke khatmay ka mutalba bhi karta raha hai
yeh sabsadi ka nizaam hai kya? is ko samaghnay ke liye misaal ke tor par bijli ko le lijiye
Pakistan  mein farz karen ke bijli fi unit das rupay mein peda hoti hai lekin sarfeen se hukoomat fi unit chay rupay layte hai
baqi ke chaar rupay hukoomat apni jaib se ada karti hai
yeh sabsadi hai jo hukoomat bijli ke ilawa, gas, petrol aur tail ki deegar یوٹیلیز par deti hai
aayi am f ka hamesha mutalba hota hai ke un sbsdiz ko khatam kya jaye
har hukoomat har dafaa kuch cheezon par sabsadi khatam karne ke liye tayyar ho jati hai aur yun is ki qeemat achanak barh jati hai
is baar hukoomat ne aayi am ke paas jane se pehlay hi gas ki qeemat par sabsadi kam ki hai aur imkaan yahi hai ke ayi am f se muahiday ke nateejay mein bijli aur petrol waghera par bhi sabsadi kam karna ho gi jis ki wajah se un cheezon ki qmit mein izafah ho sakta hai
maeeshat ki sust raftari aayi am f ka hamesha se hadaf hota hai ke sarkari akhrajaat mein kami ke zariye adayigyon ka tawazun bahaal kya jaye
is chakkar mein aayi am f hukoomaton ko kharch karne mein itni ziyada ahthyat baratnay par majaboor karti hai ke is ki wajah se maliyati nizaam par jamood taari ho jata hai aur rafta rafta muashi taraqqi ki raftaar sust par jati hai
mahireen ko yaqeen hai ke is baar bhi aisa hi ho ga aur pichlle saal 5 feesad se ziyada taiz raftari se safar karne wali maeeshat chaar feesad se kam satah par aa jaye gi
aur jab maeeshat ki raftaar sust hoti hai to is ka nuqsaan aam aadmi ko berozgari mein izafay ki shakal mein pohanchana hai
afraat zar ( mehengai ) mein izafah aayi am f ko aik aur masla Pakistani  rupay ki qader ( value ) ke sath hai
aayi am f ka hamesha yeh israar raha hai ke Pakistani  currency apni fitri satah se ziyada mehanga hai lehaza usay kam kya jaye
is baar hukoomat ne aayi am f se jaisay hi karzzzz lainay ka elaan kya, rupay ki kami mein aath se das feesad kami aik dam dekhnay mein aayi
mahireen ka khayaal hai ke mazakraat ke douran aayi am f hakkaam rupay ki qader mein mazeed kami ka mutalba karen ge aur hukoomat aindah chand mah mein rupay mein mazeed das feesad taq kami par majaboor ho gi
ab is tafseel mein jaanay ki zaroorat to baqi nahi reh jati ke rupay ki qader mein kami kis terhan afraat zar ka baais banti hai jis ki wajah se aam ashya ki qeematon mein bhi isi tanasub se izafah hota hai jitni rupay ki qader mein kami ki jati hai
aayi am f se karzzzz haasil karne ke nuqsanaat ki fehrist taweel hai jis mein awaami mansoobon ke liye paisay dastyab nah hona, taxes aur duties mein izafah, sharah sood mein izafah, qarzon ( kisanon waghera ke liye ) ke husool mein mushkilaat aur sarkari idaron mein kaam karne walon ki mara-aat mein kami ya mulazmat se faraghat waghera shaamil hain
ab sawal yeh hai ke agar aayi am f se karzzzz haasil karne ke nuqsanaat itnay hain to hakoomaten phir yeh karzzzz layte hi kyun hain? is ka jawab yeh hai ke aayi am f ke kuch faiday bhi hain
muashi istehkaam aam tor par hota yeh ke hakoomaten aayi am f se karzzzz ki karvi goli isi waqt lete hain jab maeeshat ke haalat kharab ho
malik muashi haalat ki kharabi aik had taq to bardasht kar letay hain lekin jahan inhen ehsas ho ke ab maamla muashi Adam  istehkaam ki taraf ja raha hai, woh kisi bhi qeemat par is kharabi ko roknay ki koshish karte hain
wajah is ki yeh hai ke muashi Adam  istehkaam ka asar aik pahar ki chouti se girtay hue barf ke golay ki terhan hota hai jo aik dafaa chouti se larakh jaye to phir zameen par grkr hi rukta hai aur is douran –apne rastay mein anay wali har cheez ko rondta chala jata hai
muashi Adam  istehkaam bhi aisay hi hota hai
aayi am f ke mahireen jo sharait nama karzzzz ki raqam ke sath karzzzz khuwahon ke haath mein thamate hain is mein fori tor par aisay iqdamaat karne ki zaroorat par zor diya jata hai jo muashi Adam  istehkaam ko, jis mein bairooni qarzon aur androoni akhrajaat ki adaigi waghera shaamil hai, khatam kya ja sakay
yun Pakistan  samait kayi mulkon ki tareekh mein aisa kayi baar sun-hwa hai ke aayi am f nay﻿ inhen bhranon se nikala hai
idaron mein islahat mujh sameit jin Pakistanio  nay﻿ kari dhoop aur garmi mein line mein lag kar bijli, gas aur phone ke bil jama kurwaye hain sirf wohi yeh baat samajh satke hain ke Pakistani  bnkari ke shobay mein pichlle bees saloon mein kitni barri tabdeeli aayi hai
agar yeh kaha jaye ke bankari ke shobay mein yeh islahat aayi am f ki marhoon minnat hain, to be ja nahi ho ga
aayi am f ne Pakistan  ke mukhtalif idaron mein is terhan ki islahat par taqreeban zabardasti amal karwaya hai
Pakistani  ke maali masail ki aik barri wajah woh barray barray sarkari idaray hain jin ki pedawar ke muqablay mein un ke akhrajaat bohat ziyada hain
Pakistan  steal mills, Pakistan  riloyz aur Pakistan  antrnishl air lines ka naam to aksar samnay aata hai ke un ki wajah se Pakistan  ko kitney so arab rupay ka nuqsaan uthana parta hai
is terhan ke sarkari idaray aur bhi hain jin ka naam media ki zeenat nahi bantaa
aayi am f ki hamesha koshish hoti hai ke hakoomaten un safaid hathion ke nuqsaan ko kam kere
aayi am f ke dabao ke nateejay mein un mein se baaz idaron ki karkardagi kuch behtar hui hai lekin bohat sa kaam abhi baqi hai
ghair zaroori akhrajaat mein kami yeh khasa purana bayaniya hai jisay Imran  Khan  ki hukoomat ne naye tareeqay se paish kya hai
yeh hain sarkari hakkaam ke" alle tlle "
yani hukoomat chalanay ke hoshrba akhrajaat
teesri duniya ke beshtar mumalik ki terhan Pakistan  mein intizami akhrajaat bohat ziyada hain jinhein aayi am f kam karne ki zaroorat par zor deti hai
usay kifayat shiari bhi kaha ja sakta hai
ghair taraqiyati ya intizami akhrajaat mein kami se nah sirf qaumi khazanay ki bachat hoti hai balkay awam mein bhi aik terhan se bachat ka pegham jata hai
