Islamabad ( desk ) drug rigolitri atharti naay malik bhar mein adwiyaat ki qeematon mein izafah kardiya dawa saaz companiyon ki janib se guzashta kayi arsay se adwiyaat ki qeematon mein izafay ka mutalba kya ja raha tha jis ke liye companian Supreme Court bhi gayeen aur adwiyaat ki farahmi band karne ki bhi dhamki di thi drug rigolitri atharti ( ڈریپ ) naay farmasyotikl companiyon ka mutalba tasleem karte hue adwiyaat ki qeematon mein izafah kardiya jis ka n-aughty fkishn bhi jari kardiya gaya hai n-aughty fkishn ke mutabiq mukhtalif adwiyaat ki qeematon mein 9 se 15 feesad taq izafah kya gaya hai aur yeh izafah dawa ki packing par tehreer karna hoga New York ( urdu pointe اخبارتازہ tareen 08 decemeber 2018 hamza ) America  mein soybean ke narkh paanch haftay ki buland tareen satah par rahay jis ki wajah chain ke sath tijarti kasheedgi mein kami ke baais jins ki baraamdaat mein izafay ki tawaqqa hai gandum aur makayi ke narkhon mein bhi izafah record kya gaya chicago board of ٹریڈمیں soybean ke waqfay se qabal January  ke liye saudey 6. 50 senate barh kar 9. 16 dollar fi بشل tey paye gandum ke March  ke liye saudey 15. 25 senate barh kar 5. 31 dollar fi بشل ke qareeb tey paye makayi ke March ke liye saudey 2. 25 senate izafay ke sath 3. 85 dollar fi بشل tey paye trint burj 23 augst ( siyasat dot com ) hindostan naay teesray test match mein England  ko 203 runs se shikast day di jis ke sath hi ویراٹ kohli –apne malik ke dosray kamyaab tareen test captain ban gaye hain hindostan ki janib se test cricket mein sab se kamyaab captain mhndr singh dhoni hain jinhon naay 60 matchon mein –apne malik ki qayadat karte hue 27 matchon mein fatah haasil ki jabkay 18 mein inhen nakami ka mun dekhnaa para is fehrist mein dosray number par sorrow ganguly mojood they jinhon naay 49 matchon mein qayadat karte hue 21 martaba hindostan ko fatah se humkenar karaya aur 13 mein inhen shikast hui thi taham England  ke khilaaf natnghm mein khailay gaye series ke teesray tst match mein fatah ke sath hi kohli ab hindostan ke dosray kamyaab tareen tst captain ban gaye hain kohli ne ab taq 38 matchon mein hindustani team ki qayadat ki hai jin mein se 22 mein kamyabi ne un ke qadam chume aur 7 martaba hindustani team ko haar ka saamna karna para hindostan ne England  ke khilaaf match mein 203 runs se kamyabi haasil ki jo is ki runs ke aitbaar se England  ke khilaaf teesri barri fatah hai hindostan naay England  ke khilaaf runs ke aitbaar se sab se barri fatah 1986 mein haasil ki thi jab is naay hidngle test mein maizban team ko 279 runs se zair kya tha jabkay 2016 mein vshakaptnm mein 246 runs se maat di thi beijing ( web desk ) chain duniya ki sab se taaqatwar ( am are aayi ) machine tayyar kere ga
jis se pehli baar rooh کاوجود samnay aasakay gaavr insani shaoor ki mukammal tasweer duniya dekh paye gi
scienci baradri pehli baar rooh ka maadi وجودحاصل krpaye gi
chain ne duniya ke sab se taaqatwar dimagh ke scanner tayyar karne ka mansoobah shuru kya hai
yeh اسکینرانتہائی mazboot maqnateesi field peda karne ki salahiyat rakhay ga jis se pehli baar zindah insani dimagh mein har nyoran ki saakht aur sar garmion ke mushahida hosakay ga
is mansoobay ka maqsad duniya ki se taaqatwar am are aayi magnetic resonance imagingڈیوائس tayyar karna hai
mutawaqqa scanner nah sirf tasweer ( snap shot ) faraham kere گابلکہ aasabi nizaam mein ahem signals dainay walay sodium, phosphorus aur potassium jaisay mukhtalif qisam ke keemiyai agents ki bhi nishandahi hosakay gi jin se پاکنسنزاور الزائمز jaisi shaoor aur dimagh se mutaliqa bimarion ka mutalea mein madad miley gi
mansoobay par kaam karne walay senior science daan ka kehna hai ke arbon yoaan maliyat ki is device se dimaghi mutalay mein inqilab barpaa hojaye ga
yeh aala mukhtalif تصویرپیش kere ga jo is pehlay duniya ke samnay nahi aaski, yahan taq ke rooh ko bhi dekha jasakay ga
venzella hadion aur is ke reshon se bana soop nah sirf dil ko qowat deta hai balkay kayi terhan ke amraaz ko roknay ki salahiyat bhi rakhta hai agar hadion ko goday aur is se chupkay hue reshon sameit sirkay mein dheeray dheeray pakaya jaye to is shorbay ke kayi fawaid samnay atay hain ghizai mahireen usay aik nai kaafi qarar day rahay hain jis mein kayi terhan ke ghizai ajza madniyaat aur امائنو acids paye jatay hain hadion ke shorbay ya soop mein کولاجن ki barri miqdaar mojood hoti hai jis se jald hamwar aur khobsorat hoti hai jabkay joron ke af-aal behtar hotay hain taham کولاجن hamari jald tak nahi pahonch paati kyunkay woh nizam haazma mein toot phoot kar امائنو acids mein badal jati hai dil ke liye mufeed mahireen neh yeh note kya ke بھنی hui haddiyan ghaliban aisay protein kharij karti hain jo nizam hazem ke douran pehlay امائنو acid aur phir پیپٹائڈز mein taqseem ho jatay hain
is paicheeda amal mein jo پیپٹائڈز mlitay hain woh asal protein se qadray mukhtalif hotay hain venzella mein insti tute of tecnology se wabsta professor لیٹیسیا morya kehti hain ke shorbay ke پیپٹائڈز dil ke liye mufeed hotay hain aur un mein mojood teen terhan ke anzaim ( khamray ) aisay paye jatay hain jo dil ke poooray nizaam ko baqaida banatay hain
maslan aik aynzaym ae si ای one high blood pressure ko qaboo mein rakhta hai aur dil ki bemari se wabsta soozish bhi kam karta hai ilawa azeen hadion ke shorbay mein paye jany walay deegar ahem ajza type two diabities, sharianon ki tangi aur deegar amraaz ko bhi roktay hain yeh yaqeen karna mushkil hai ke ریہانا abhi sirf 30 saal ki hai aur woh –apne 10 sala career mein solo signer ki hesiyat se bil بورڈہاٹ 100 chart par 14 martaba apna naam sab se oopar darj krwachki hai, nah sirf woh kam Umar  tareen balkay تیزترین gulukarah hai jis ney yeh sang mil uboor kya hai

Islamabad ( monitoring disk ) each MD globle naay aik aur klasik Nokia  phone nai shakal mein muta-arif kara diya hai
Nokia  106 aik feature phone hai jo sab se pehlay 2013 mein paish kya gaya tha aur ab usay kuch behtari ke sath dobarah Nokia  106 ( 2018 ) ke naam se muta-arif karaya gaya hai
yeh phone sab se pehlay roos mein farokht ke liye rawan mah ke aakhir taq 1590 rouble ( 3 hazaar 200 Pakistani  rupay ke qareeb ) mein dastyab hoga, jabkay deegar mumalik mein bhi jald paish kya jaye ga
Nokia  3310 ki wapsi yeh teesra feature phone hai jo Nokia  برانڈکا licence haasil karne wali company each MD global ne naye dizayn ke sath muta-arif karaya
is se pehlay yeh company Nokia  3310 aur Nokia  8110 phone bhi nai tabdeelion ke sath samnay لاچکی hai
Nokia  106 ( 2018 ) mein 1. 8 que que v jee ae display diya gaya hai jis mein 160×120 پکسلز resolution hai
media take am tea 6261 d prasisr, 4 am bi Reem  aur 4 am bi internal storage bhi is phone ka hissa hai aur company ke mutabiq is mein 2 hazaar کانٹیکٹس aur 500 paighamaat mehfooz kiye jasakte hain
Nokia  ke aik aur puranay phone ki nai shakal mein wapsi is phone klasik snake game pari loaded hai jabkay mukhtalif games ko kharidne ka option bhi diya jaye ga
is phone mein 800 am ae each ریمووایبل battery di gayi hai jis ke baray mein company ka daawa hai ke aik charge par yeh 21 din taq astind bayi rehti hai, jabkay lagataar 15 ghantay taq baat ki ja sakti hai
Nokia  106 doyl sm support aur مائیکرو you s bi port ke sath hai jabkay ail ای d flesh aur f am radio support bhi di gayi hai
Karachi  ( commerce disk ) auto industry ki aalmi shohrat Yafta  numayesh آٹومکینیکا Germany  mein Pakistan  se bhi 14 companiyon ny wasee pemanay par shirkat ki Frankfort  mein 11 September  se 15 September  taq jari rehne wali is numayesh mein gariyon ke purzah wali companiyon ko be hadd aaccha rspans mila hai tea d ae pi mazkoorah numayesh mein guzashta do dahaiyo se shareek horahee hai aur rawan saal bhi is numayesh mein trade development atharti Pakistan  ny aik khobsorat pavellion qaim kya jis mein 9 companiyon ny –apne astalz lagaye numayesh mein 170 mumalik ke aik laakh 33 hazaar se zayed kharidaron ki mojoodgi numayesh ki ahmiyat ko wazeh kar rahi thi Pakistan  se tijarti kharidaron mein aik ahem naam Pakistan  auto اسپیئرپارٹس امپورٹرزاینڈ ڈیلرزایسوسی ation ka bhi hai jin ke numaindgaan neh is numayesh mein shirkat ki is ke ilawa bhi 100 se zayed Pakistani  industries shareek rahen jin mein Pakistan  association of auto parts and اسیسریز minofikchrrz bhi shaamil hai پاپام skill development insti tute ke chairman aur Pakistan  auto parts show ke knoynr Mashhood  Ali  Khan  neh bataya ke آٹومکینیکا Pakistan  ki auto industry ki salahiyat ko ujagar karne aur aalmi market mein honay wali jiddat se aag_hi ke husool ka ahem zareya hai tasweer ke copy right pa image caption police ke mutabiq ڈرن ke zariye sunah 2016 aur 2017 ke douran phone aur sm card smgl kiye gaye Bartanwi  hakkaam nay﻿ drone ke zariye barray pemanay par jailon mein manshiat aur phone smgl karne ke mansoobay mein mulawis honay ke ilzaam mein das afraad par frdِ jurm aed ki hai
jin afraad par frdِ jurm aed ki gayi hai un mein aath mard aur do khawateen shaamil hain
police ke mutabiq un afraad ko Birmingham , deadly aur maghribi England  ke deegar shehron se girftar kya gaya hai
Bartanwi  police ki janib se jari kiye gay bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke girftar kiye gay afraad drone ke zariye jailon mein منوعہ ashya phainkte rahay hain
police ke mutabiq ڈرن ke zariye sunah 2016 aur 2017 ke douran phone aur sm card smgl kiye gaye
Bartania  ki jin jailon mein drone ke zariye smugling ki gayi un mein brmngm, اوکوڈ, ہینل veil, رضلی, ویموٹ aur lyorpol ki jilin shaamil hain
is baaray mein baat karte hue police inspector ایریکا field ka kehna tha ke' yeh grftaryan bohat ahem paish Raft  hain aur yeh aik paicheeda tehqiqaat ke nateejay mein amal mein aayi hain
' ایریکا field ka mazeed kehna tha ke jailon mein honay walay ziyada tar pur-tashaddud waqeat manshiat ki smugling ki wajah se hi hotay hain is liye yeh intahi zurori hai ke hum is smugling ko rokain, aur jo bhi smugling mein mulawis hoga woh khud bhi jald hi jail ki salakhon ke peechay hoga
tasweer ke copy right getty images image caption khaam tail ki qeemat mein guzashta do barson ke douran aik din mein honay wali sab se ziyada kami hai
Pakistan  mein guzashta chand mah ke douran petroleum masnoaat ki qeematon mein izafah ho raha hai wahein bain al aqwami market mein khaam tail ki qeematon mein kami aayi hai
libya ki janib se khaam tail ki pedawar mein izafay ke elaan ke baad bain al aqwami market mein khaam tail ki qeemat mein taqreeban saat feesad kami aayi hai
is baray mein jan-nay ke liye mazeed padhiye khaam tail ki qeemat do saal ki buland tareen satah par tail ki qeematon mein izafah, avpik naay pedawar ki had kam kar di tail ki qeematon ki siyasat mojooda saal ki buland tareen satah taq pounchanay ke baad ab is haliya kami ke baad brint crude 73 dollar 40 saints, aur you s crude 70 dollar 38 saints mein farokht ho raha hai
yeh guzashta do barson ke douran aik din mein tail ki qeemat mein honay wali sab se ziyada kami hai
guzashta aik baras ke douran aalmi market mein khaam tail ki qeemat mein izafay ke baad Pakistan  mein guzashta chand mah ke douran petroleum masnoaat ki qeematon mein izafah sun-hwa hai
Pakistan  apni zaroorat ka beshtar khaam tail aur pitrolim masnoaat daraamad karta hai aur Pakistan  mein dollar ke muqablay mein rupay ki qader kam honay se bhi pitrolim masnoaat ki qeematon mein izafah sun-hwa hai
agarchay America  ki janib se Iran  par aed ki gayi pabandion ke baad haliya kuch عرصوں mein tail ki qeematon mein kaafi utaar charhao aaya hai
budh ko libya ki national oil karporasion ne tail ki daraamad ke liye chaar braamdi terminal dobarah kholnay ka elaan kya
tail ki qeematon mein kami aik aisay mauqa par hui hai jab America  mein tail ke zakhair chaar feesad tak kam honay ki report samnay aayi hai
tail bar aamad karne walay mumalik ki tanzeem avpik ke sarbarah ka kehna hai ke' utaar charhao sahih nahi hai, hum tail ki qeematon mein ziyada utaar charhao ke haq mein nahi hain
' Pakistan  mein petroleum ki qeemat kam ho gi? tasweer ke copy right pa aalmi market mein khaam tail ki qeemat kam hui hai lekin kya bain al aqwami market khaam tail ki qeematon mein kami ka asar Pakistan  mein ho ga? is silsilay mein yeh janna bohat zurori hai ke Pakistan  arabian sweet khaam tail daraamad karta hai jis ki qeemat you s aur brint krod se kam hoti hai
dosra dollar ki qeemat bherne se bhi muqami market mein khaam tail mehanga ho jata hai
Pakistan  mein petroleum masnoaat ki qeematon ko mutayyan karne ke liye poooray mah ke liye bain al aqwami market mein khaam tail ki qeematon ka ost qeemat nikaal kar uss mein naqal o hamal ki laagat aur dollar ke muqablay mein rupay ki qader mein tabdeeli ko shaamil kar ke qeemat nikaali jati hai
tasweer ke copy write getty images is ke baad hukoomat apni zaroorat ke mutabiq uss mein 17 feesad sales tax aur petroleum ڈوپلمنٹ lyoy sameit deegar mehsoolat shaamil kiye jatay hain
khayaal rahay ke Pakistan  mein nigran hukoomat nay﻿ guzashta mah pitrolim masnoaat ki qeematon mein izafah kya tha jabkay rawan mah ke liye bhi qeematon mein izafah kya gaya tha taham Supreme Court mein pitrolim masnoaat ki qeematon ka maamla zair samaat tha aur adalat nay﻿ hukoomat ko qeematon mein nazarsani karne ka kaha tha
is par nigran hukoomat nay﻿ yakam July  se pitrolim masnoaat ki qeematon mein jo izafah kya tha is ko mukammal tor par wapas nahi liya gaya taham qeematon mein taqreeban 4 se saarhay chay rupay katoti kar di
Lahore  Pakistan  film industry ki Maroof  adakara rima Khan  ka kehna hai ke unn ko aik saathi adakara ki janib se zeher day kar jaan se maarny ki koshish ki gayi rima Khan  naay niji channel ko diye gaye interview mein inkishaaf karte hue kaha ke –apne urooj ke daur mein har terhan ki kamiyabiyan haasil kee lekin kayi pareshaniyon ka saamna bhi kya hatta ke saathi adakaraon ki wajah se mujhe bُra waqt bhi daikhna para aur kayi baar to meri kirdaar kashi bhi ki gayi rima naay bataya ke aik baar mere ghar par fayrng bhi ki gayi yahan taq ke Asif  Raza  میرکے aik kmrshl ki shooting ke douran bhi mujhe zeher dainay ki koshish ki gayi aur zeher dainay walay ko aik laakh rupay bhi diye gaye they lekin uss khatoon ny aisa karne se mana kardiya is ke bawajood mein ny is waqeye ki police mein koi shikayat darj nahi karai adakara ny mazeed inkishaaf karte hue kaha ke mujhe kayi project karne se rokkk diya gaya aur mukhtalif terhan se mere scandal banaye gaye wazeh rahay ke laali wood mein jab arbaz Khan  se ideal rishte ke hawalay se sawal poocha gaya to unhon nay﻿ hanstay hue kaha ke woh is sawal ka jawab dainay ke liye bilkul bhi sahih shakhs nahi hain kyunkay woh nahi jantay ke aik behtar talluq kisay kehte hain arbaz Khan  nay﻿ apni nakaam shadi ka hawala dete hue kaha ke unhon nay﻿ 21 saal taq –apne azdawaji talluq ko behtar bananay ki koshish ki lekin nakaam rahay unhon nay﻿ kaha aik behtar talluq woh hota hai jisay behtar bananay ke liye rozana koshishen ki jayen lekin koshishen kabhi kaam karti hain aur kabhi nahi kartin arbaz Khan  aur un ki sabiq ahliya mulaika arorha Khan  ki 21 sala shadi ka ekhtataam guzashta baras sun-hwa tha taham ab mulaika ne zindagi mein agay bherne ka faisla karliya hai woh aglay saal adakar arjan Kapoor  se shadi kar rahi hain jab ke arbaz Khan  bhi zindagi mein agay barh chuke hain Mumbai  ( web disk ) Bharti  film and tally ویڑن association ne bollywood hadaayat car Sajid  Khan  par jinsi ہراسانی muamlay mein mulawis honay par aik saal ki pabandi aed kar di bollywood adakara tnoshri dta ki janib se khawateen ko kaam karne ki jagah par harasan karne aur un ke sath bud sulooki karne ke khilaaf shuru ki gayi' ?me two' muhim ab kuch thandhi padtee نظرآرہی hai taham mukammal tor par khatam nahi hui hai
khatoon sahafi sameit mukhtalif khawateen ko harasan karne walay hadaayat car Sajid  Khan  par indian film and tally ویڑن dayriktrz association ( aayi f tea d ae ) ne aik saal ki pabandi aed kar di Sajid  Khan  par khatoon sahafi, adakara salloni chopra aur rachel white ne jinsi ہراسانی kaalzam lagaya tha jab ke adakara bpasha baso ne bhi Sajid  Khan  ke mutaliq kaha tha ke woh khawateen ke sath wahyat mazaq karne ke aadi hain doosri janib adakara diya Mirza  ne Sajid  Khan  ke khawateen ke sath ravayye ko qabil nafrat qarar daitay hue un par lagey tamam ilzamaat ki tasdeeq ki thi اداکاراؤں sameit mukhtalif khawateen ki janib se ilzamaat lagaye janey ke baad aayi f tea d ae ki janib se banai janey wali committee ney un ke khilaaf tafteesh ka aaghazkya tha aur November  mein Sajid  Khan  ko show cause notice jari kya tha jis mein Sajid  Khan  se saat din mein wazahat talabb karte hue kaha gaya tha ke aap ke ravayye ney indian film and tally ویڑن dayriktrz association tanzeem ko badnaam kya hai notice ka jawab dete hue Sajid  Khan  ney –apne oopar lagey ilzamaat ki tardeed kar di thi taham aayi f tea d ae ney Sajid  Khan  par aik saal ke liye pabandi aed kar di chand roz qabal science daano ne aik aisi app tayyar ki hai جومٹی ki kharabi ko bakhobi jaanch sakay gi, matti ki kharabi jhanchne ke liye jo test hotay hain woh bohat mehngay aur waqt talabb hotay hain
yeh app aayi bi am brazil ke mahireen ne tayyar ki hai
yeh آرٹیفشل intelli jins ( masnoi zahanat ) ki bunyaad par kaam kere gi, jis se kisaan khud apni matti ki sahet ka jaiza le satke hain
mahireen ke mutabiq yeh app zarayi inqilab ki zamanat ban sakti hai
aayi bi am ke mahireen ka kehna hai ke duniya bhar mein chhootey dehqaan 80 fi sad zarayi amal injaam dete hain aur yeh app behtar ka شت kaari mein bohat madad faraham kar y gi
is ke liye aik zaheen kaghazi aala bhi banaya gaya hai
yeh jasamat mein bilkul visiting card ki tar h hai, is ka غذ ko mahireen ki janib se' ' aygro pad' ' ka naam diya gaya hai
is mein maya bhari khurd beeni nlkyan mojood hain jo sirf 10 second mein matti aur pani ka tajzia karti hain
kisaan ko sirf is par matti ka namona rakhna hota hai aur rangon ke dairay matti ki kefiyat zahir karte hain
is app ke zariye kisaan fori tor پردرست tareen nataij haasil kar saktay hain
yeh app آرٹیفشل intelli jins ke zariye card par namodaar honay walay rangeen dairon ka jaiza le kar un mein mojood kimiklz ki miqdaar aur tadaad zahir karti hai
app aur zarayi kaghaz ke zariye matti mein mojood pi each, nitrogen die oxide, aluminium, میگنیشیئم aur chlorine ki kamyabi se shanakht hosakti hai, taham ایگروپیڈز ko zaroorat aur kaam ke lehaaz se tabdeel karkay is se dosray kaam bhi liye jasaktay hain
alav hay azeen آرٹیفشل intelli jins ki badolat hazaron lakhoon matti ke namonon ka data kisi barray data bees mein bhi rakha ja sakta hai
Islamabad : cheif justice sprim court of Pakistan  miyan Saqib  Nisar  ne Pakistan  inter national airline ( pi aayi ae ) tayyaron par qaumi parcham ki jagah markhor ki tasweer laganay ka notice letay hue idaray ko mazkoorah iqdaam se earzi tor par rokkk diya
miyan Saqib  نثارنے ریماکس diye ke qaumi parcham ki jagah aik janwar ki tasweer lagai ja rahi hai, is par MD pi aayi ae ne jawab diya ke markhor qaumi janwar hai is ki tasweer tayyaray ki tell par paint ki jarahi hai
jis par adalat ne barhami ka izhaar karte hue kaha ke hukoomat ki janib se pi aayi ae ki behtari ke liye 20 arab ka bil out package diya gaya tha, nah ke tayyaron ko paint karne ke liye yeh raqam di jarahi hai
adalat ne remarks diye ke kya pi aayi ae munafe mein hai jo aisay kaam kar rahi hai
cheif justice nay﻿ MD pi aayi ae se istafsaar karte hue kaha ke agar aik janwar, qaumi parcham ki jagah le ga is ke paint honay par kitni laagat aeye gi, jis par MD pi aayi ae nay﻿ jawab diya ke aik jahaaz par laagat 27 laakh aeye gi, aur har jahaaz ko 4 saal baad dobara paint karna hota hai
mazeed parheen : naye Islamabad airport par pehli aazmaishi parwaaz land kar gayi jis par cheif justice naay remarks diye ke laagat 27 laakh nahi balkay 34 laakh hai
unhon ny MD pi aayi ae se sawal kya ke meri pi aayi ae ki flayt daidh ghanta takheer ka shikaar thi kya aap takheer ki wajah bta satke hain? MD pi aayi ae ka kehna tha ke jahaaz ki murammat, takheer ki wajah bani
cheif justice nay﻿ MD pi aayi ae se istafsaar kya ke aap ki qabliyat kya hai, mein aap ki karkardagi ka jaiza bhi lon ga
Supreme Court ne pi aayi ae ko tayyaron se qaumi parcham hataane se roktay hue case ki samaat multawi kar di
khayaal rahay ke 7 April  2018 ko Pakistan  ki qaumi air line ( pi aayi ae ) ne –apne tayyaron par peechay aur engines par qaumi janwar, markhor ki tasaveer muta-arif kradin
pi aayi ae ke logo ka font bhi tabdeel karkay usay tayyaray ke neechay hi awezan kya gaya taakay parwaaz ke waqt usay zameen se bhi dekha jasakay
dawn akhbar ki report ke mutabiq pi aayi ae ke tarjuman mshavd Tajwar  ka kehna tha ke is se qabal aisi tabdeeli 10 saal pehlay samnay aayi thi aur yeh tabdeeli prwazon ko behtar bananay, khush numa karne aur business plan ka hissa hain
Wazeer e Azam  ke musheer baraye sun-hwa baazi sardar mehtaab Ahmed  Khan  nay﻿ taqreeb ke douran markhor ki tasweer aur pi aayi ae mein is hawalay se ki jaanay wali tabdeeli ko muta-arif karaya tha
yeh bhi parhi : pi aayi ae mein khawateen paylts ka kota 10 feesad mukhtas karne ka hukum sardar mehtaab Khan  ka kehna tha ke pi aayi ae ny duniya mein apni shanakht bahaal karne ke liye yeh qadam uthaya aur is ke liye zurori tha ke pi aayi ko aik mukhtalif brand ke tor par paish kya jaye
un ka kehna tha ke pi aayi ae ka yeh iqdaam qoum ki janib se markhor janwar ke tahaffuz ke waday ki akkaasi karta hai
unhon naay kaha ke' mein is koshish ko srahta hon, markhor hamara qaumi aur aik jangju janwar hai jo mushkil waqt mein bhi himmat nahi haarta '
idher sardian ayen اورادھر moong phali baazaaron mein aayi haf mein ghis kar ghro alon ke sath باتیںکرتے karte garma garam moong phali khanay ka allag hi maza hai gali mehloon mein kharray moong phali ke thelay aap ko apni janib khinchte hain aur aap moong phali khareeday bana reh nahi paate moong phali pehli martaba piragoye ki waaadiyon mein kaasht ki gayi yeh salana kaasht kya jane wala poda hai is pouday ki lambai 30 taa 50 centi meter hoti hai moong phali ki kaasht aur pedawar mein chain awwal number par hai duniya ki mukammal pedawar mein se % 42 feesad yahin kaasht hota hai Bharat  ka dosra number aur teesray maqam par America  hai moong phali sardiyoon ki khaas soghaat hai lekin bohat se log nahi jantay ke is ke besh baha faiday bhi hain Misri  tahaqeeq ke mutabiq ایجپشن society of allergy and ایمونالوجی ke rukan dr mjdi Badran  ki tahaqeeq se yeh baat saabit hui hai ke moong phali bohat se ahem ghizai anasir se bharpoor hoti hai jo insani jism ke mdafati nizaam ko behtar karte hain moong phali ka istemaal dil aur khoon ki sharianon ke awarz alzaimar aur سرطان se bachanay mein madad karte hain aur burhapay ke asraat ko kam karti hai moong phali mein mojood 25 feesad protein insani jism mein خلیوںکی tajdeed mein madad karta hai moong phali mein mojood mutadid ghizai anasir jaisay folic acid, tanbah, nayasan aur deegar vitamin insani sehat ke liye fayd hay mand hain yeh anasir dil aur sharianon ka tahaffuz karte hain aur nuqsaan da cholestrol ko kam karte hain jabkay jrsomon aur zahreeley mawaad se bhi mehfooz rakhtay hain moong phali ka chilka anti oxydents ka haamil hota hai is ke roghan mein protein, anti oxydents aur jism ke liye ahem madnyati namkiyat hotay hain moong phali mein raishay ki bhi waafar miqdaar payi jati hai yeh resha wazan kam karne aur dammey se tahaffuz faraham karne mein madad deta hai un ka kehna hai ke qudrat ka yeh anmol tohfa –apne andar ٹرپٹوفان bhi rakhta hai jo jism mein سیروٹونن madah peda karta hai yeh madah insaan ko depration aur aasabi tanav ki haalat se bacha kar mizaaj ko normal rakhnay mein madad karta hai Amrici  tehqeeq ke mutabiq America  ki university school of medicine se wabsta muhaqiq dr ژاؤ o show ny khushk meway aur mout ke khatray ki sharah ke darmain talluq ki tehqeeq ki jo online jareeda' جاما international medicine mein shaya hui tehqeeq ke mutabiq moong phali khanay se qalbi fawaid zahir hue hain mutalay mein jin logon ney khushk meway ke tor پرمونگ phali khayi thi un mein is muddat ke douran mout ka khatrah aisay logon ki nisbat kam tha jnhon ney khushk mewa kam khaya tha ya bilkul istemaal nahi kya tha muhaqiq ژاؤ o show ka kehna hai ke moong phali agarchay khushk mewa nahi hai aur is ki darjah bandi phali ke tor par ki jati hai lekin is ke ghizai ajza khushk meway se متماثل hain jin logon ko moong phali se allergy nahi hai unhein dil ki sahet ke fawaid ke liye ziyada se ziyada moong phali khaani chahiye jo dosray میووں ke muqablay mein kam qeemat bhi hai taham muhaqiq naay bataya ke mutalay mein shaamil logon ko din bhar mein 17 se 18 gram moong phali khanay ki zaroorat thi moong phali dublay aur kamzor afraad ke liye mufeed hai cancer se mehfooz rakhnay mein hamari Muawin  hai moong phali mein protein, calcium, vitamin ای, vitamin bi one, b6اور phosphorus shaamil hota hai moong phali se asaab ko taqwiyat millti hai diabeties type two mein moong phali ka istemaal mareez ko faida deta hai moong phali ke istemaal se ansolin ki satah barqarar rehne mein madad millti hai moong phali mein mojood folaad khoon ke naye khaliye bananay mein madadgaar hota hai exercise karne walay is se bhar poor faida utha satke hain moong phali mein mojood vitamins hadion aur danoton ko mazboot karne mein muawnat karte hain moong phali maiday aur phephray ke liye faida mand hai aur yeh dono aaza ko mazbooti bakhshti hai moong phali mein aisay anti oxydents paye jatay hain jo ghizai lehaaz se saib, chakandar aur gaajar ke muqablay mein waafar miqdaar mein hain agar aap ke baal gir rahay hain to moong phali ke istemaal se un mein kami aa sakti hai dr ke mashwaray se haamla khawateen moong phali khanay ke baare mein sochen kyunkay is se allergy honay ka khadsha hota hai kharish honay ki soorat mein moong phali ka istemaal nah kya jaye to behtar hai kachi moong phali ki bajaye hamesha بھنی hui moong phali khayi jaye taakay is ke behtar fawaid haasil ho saken Sindh  ke mehakma revenue nay﻿ Karachi  mein behria town ko di jaanay wali hazaron aekar zameen ki allotment mansookh kar di hai
yeh faisla sprim court ke ehkamaat ki roshni mein kya gaya hai
mlir development atharti ke liye mukhtas 14617 aekar zameen ki allotment ka hukum nama bhi mustard kardiya gaya hai
Supreme Court ke faislay par amal-dar-aamad ke liye qaim committee jis mein senior mumbar board of revenue Mohammad  Hussain  syed, secretary land yotilayzishn aftaab memon, secretary baldiyat Khalid  Haider  Shah , malir dolpmnt atharti ke qaim maqam director general Imran  ataa Somro , deputy commissionaire malir Shahzad  fasal shaamil thay ne 4 May  ke faislay ka jaiza liya
28 october ko committee ka yeh ijlaas munaqqid sun-hwa jis ke minutes ke mutabiq committee ney faisla kya ke Supreme Court ke faislay ke tehat malir development atharti ke liye mukhtas 17617 aekar zameen ki allotment ka hukum nama mansookh kya jaye ga isi terhan Supreme Court ke ehkamaat ki roshni mein malir ڈویلمپنٹ atharti ko di gayi 11680 aekar zameen wapas li jaye gi
malir development atharti ke qaim maqam director general Imran  ataa Somro  nay﻿ bi bi si se baat karte hue kaha ke adalti faislay ki tameel ki gayi hai
isi baray mein zaroorat hai, malik Riaz  ko' pehlay hakoomaten tabdeel karwa letay they lekin ab aisa nahi hoga' Supreme Court ke ehkamaat kya they Supreme Court ny behria town ko mlir development atharti ki zameen ki muntaqili ko ghair qanooni qarar diya tha aur faisla diya tha ke hukoomat Sindh  ki zameen hukoomat ko wapas kar di jaye aur behria town ny jis zameen ka tabadlah kya hai woh zameen wapas behria town ke hawalay ki jaye
sprim court naay qarar diya tha ke chunkay is waqt taq behria town mein barray pemanay par kaam ho chuka hai jis se teesray fareeq ( behria town ke alatiz ) ke mafadaat bhi wabsta ho chuke hain lehaza behria town ko 1912 kalonayzishn act ke tehat dobarah zameen allot ki jaye lekin is ke liye kya sharait honi chahaiyn, zameen ki qeemat kya ho? kya yeh qeemat woh ho jis ke tehat behria naay logon ko zameen farokht ki hai? development par behria town naay kitni sarmaya kaari hai, un sawalaat ke jawabaat ka taayun adalti faislay par عملدارآمد karanay wala binch kere ga
Karachi  mein behria town ki aamad Karachi  mein aik barray arsay taq bad amni ka saya aur bijli ki loadshedding ka andhera raha is sorat e haal mein behria town ney 2013 ke mah November  mein aik jadeed shehar ki taamer ka elaan kya, jis mein muqami power genration aur security ke faul proof intizamaa ka wada kya gaya
is shehar mein rahaish aur kaarobar ke liye darkhwasten talabb ki gayeen, is darkhwast form ki qeemat 15000 rupay muqarrar ki gayi jo raqam na qabil wapsi tha
un platon ka Raqba  125 gaz se le kar aik hazaar gaz tha, chand mah mein quraa andazi ke baad un platon, tameeri gharon aur flits ke file ki qeemat lakhoon rupay taq poanch gayi
dilchasp baat yeh hai ke jis waqt logon se yeh darkhwasten talabb ki gayeen is waqt taq yeh kisi ko bhi maloom nahi tha ke is haosng scheme ka aaghaz kahan kya ja raha hai
jis ka aks sprim court ke faislay mein bhi nazar aata hai
sprim court nay﻿ –apne faislay mein sawal kya hai ke akhbarat aur electronic media mein jab behria town nay﻿ mansoobay ka elaan kya to kya is waqt behria town ya is ke dayriktrz ke paas malir zila mein mutaliqa zameen mojood thi? kya logon se darkhwasten talabb karne se qabal behria town nay﻿ malir development atharti se yeh haosng scheme Manzoor  karai thi
behria town ke paas zameen kahan se aayi? behria town is waqt Karachi  hyderabad super high way par zair taamer hai
is ki ibtida Karachi  ke zila malir se hui aur yeh barhatay barhatay is waqt tak jamshoro zila ki hudood mein daakhil hochuka hai
Google  mip ke zariye is ki pemaiesh ki jaye to yeh 30 hazaar aekar par phail chuka hai
tasweer ke copy right getty images image caption cheif justice ka kehna tha ke behria town ke malkaan ko aik aik payi ka hisaab dena parre ga behria town ka kehna hai ke unhon ne paanch hazaar aekar zameen aam logon se khareed ki jabkay mlir development atharti ne usay 9385 aekar zameen faraham ki
behria town ny jin aam logon se zameen khridi un tamam ki zamenain behria town ke zair istemaal ilaqay mein nahi theen balkay Balochistan  aur zila thatta o deegar ilaaqon mojood thi
behria ne un zamiinon ka mlir development atharti se tabadlah kya
sonay ke badlay chandi behria town ke sarbarah malik Riaz  naay sprim court ko aagah kiya tha ke zameen ka tabadlah 1982 se jari hai, behria naay MD ae se chaar dehaat ki zamiinon ka tabadlah kya hai, jis ke liye chalees laakh rupay jama karaye gaye hain, is mauqa par behria ke wakeel Ali  Zafar  naay peshkash ki thi ke un ka mokl 1800 aekar zameen ke liye paanch arab rupay izafi jama karanay ke liye tayyar hai
sprim court ke cheif justice Saqib  Nisar  nay﻿ is par remarks diye ke chandi ke badlay sona liya gaya hai
adalat nay﻿ faisla mein kaha hai ke MD ae nay﻿ aik behtareen zameen ke tukraa ka do daraaz ilaqay mein mojood tkrhyon ke shakal mein tabadlah kardiya aur yeh tabadlah kalonayzishn act 1912 ki khilaaf warzi hai
susti zameen karorron ki tameeraat behria town ne mlir development atharti se se aik laakh 25 hazaar fi aekar ke hisaab se zameen kharidi
Sindh  board of revenue nay﻿ MD ae ko yeh zameen انکریمینٹل haosng sosayiti ( sastay gharon ki taamer ) ke liye di thi jis ki Wasf  mein bataya gaya hai ke hukoomat ke taawun se khandano ke liye gharon ki taamer ki jaye gi jin ka size 120 murabba gaz se ziyada nahi hoga
sprim court ke faislay se yeh bhi maloom hota ke behria town ke qiyam se chand saal qabal 2006 mein is ilaqay mein zamiinon ki qeematein ziyada theen lekin behria ki aamad se sirf do saal qabal yani 2011 mein qeematon mein achanak kami aagai, adalat ny remarks diye hain ke kuch waqeat mein to yeh qeematein 2006 mein mojood qeemat se bhi nisf taq chali gayeen
am d ae ka muaqqaf tha ke koi bhi builder 2006 mein is waqt ki muqarara qeemat par sarmaya kaari ke liye tayyar nah tha
behria town mein mojooda waqt 125 gaz ka plat mukhtalif kitgriz mein tees se pachaas laakh rpe mein dastyab hai
sprim court ne –apne faislay mein remarks diye they ke MD ae ne properly dealer ka kirdaar ada kya jabkay hukoomat Sindh  riyasat ki zameen ke tahaffuz ke bajaye behria town ki saathi ban gayi
behria town ke wakeel adalat ko bta chuke hain ke behria ne 500 arab rupay ki sarmaya kaari ki hai jis mein se 213 arab logon ke paas aqsat ki shakal mein mojood hain
muqami muzahmat aur mukhalfat mlir zila 2557 murabba kilometer par phela sun-hwa hai, jis mein pahari ilaqay ke sath, midani ilaqay, nadi naalay aur zarayi zamenain aajaate hain, yahan kayi so gaon mojood hain lekin unhein ریگولرائزڈ nahi kya gaya
bajod is ke yahan ke log qiyam Pakistan  se qabal se yahan abad hain
tasweer ke copy right afp image caption qanooni mahireen ka kehna hai ke adalti faislay mein alatiz ko tahaffuz diya gaya hai sirf behria town se asal raqam wusool ki jarahi hai dihh لنگجی, کونکر, کاٹھوڑ aur بولھاڑی mein muqeem logon aur un ke murghi form aur zameenen police ki madad se haasil ki gayeen, muqami rehaishi ilzaam aed karte hain ke un ke nojawanon ko hirasat mein le liya jata aur zameen se dastbrdar karwa liya jata, halaank un ke paas hukoomat ki lies mojood thi lekin unhein pehla haq dainay ke bajaye behria town ko zameen day di gayi
muqami logon ne Karachi  انڈیجنس rights الائیس ke naam se tanzeem banai jo guzashta chaar saloon se saraapaa ehtijaj hai
tanzeem ke rehnuma Gul  husn klmti ka kehna hai ke jin afsaraan naay ghair qanooni allotment ki hai un ke khilaaf bhi tehqiqaat honi chahiye jo nahi hui aur behria town ki lalach kahan taq jaye gi is ke samnay band bandhnay ki zaroorat hai
yaad rahay ke das roz qabal building control atharti ney bhi akhbarat mein aik ishtihar jari karkay awam ko mutnabba kya tha ke idaray ney 1330 aekar ki farokht aur tashheer ki ijazat di thi taham sprim court mein jari samaat ke douran yeh inkishaaf sun-hwa hai ke behria town jari kardah NOC se balatar sargarmia kar rahi hai, kayi marlah bngle aur imaarton ki taamer ki jarahi hai, jin ki Sindh  building control se ijazat nahi li gayi
behria town ke alatiz ne bhi super high way par ehtijaj karkay apna adalat se nazar sani ki appeal ki thi, un ka kehna tha ke is mansoobay mein un ki jama poonji lagi hai taham qanooni mahireen ka kehna hai ke adalti faislay mein alatiz ko tahaffuz diya gaya hai sirf behria town se asal raqam wusool ki jarahi hai

20 اگسٹ ( siyasat dot com ) asian games mein Pakistan  ki football team nay﻿ umdah khail paish karte hue nepal ko 1-2 se shikast day kar 44 saal se qaim jamood ko tora hai
jakarta mein jari asian games mein football ke muqablon mein Pakistan  ka match mein aaghaz kuch aaccha nah tha aur 12 win minute mein Shahbaz  Younis  ki ghalti ke sabab team nay﻿ oon gole kar ke nepal ko bartari dila di aur khud 0-1 ke khasaray mein chali gayi
بیکاسی mein khailay gaye group d ke match ke pehlay half mein Pakistani  team intehai koshish ke bawajood pehlay half mein muqaabla barabar nah kar saki jabkay nepal ko bartari dugni karne ke chand mawaqay miley lekin woh bhi is se faida nah utha sakay
taham dosray راؤنڈ mein team nay﻿ umdah khail paish kya aur do gole score kar ke nepal ko shikast day kar kamyabi haasil kar li
Pakistani  team ki janib se 54 win minute mein Mohammad  bilal ne gole score kar ke muqaabla برابرکیا jabkay khail ke 72 win minute mein Saddam  Hussain  ne gole score kar ke team ko bartari dilae jo match ke ekhtataam tak barqarar rahi
is match mein kamyabi ke sath hi Pakistan  ki football team ny 44 saal baad asian games mein koi match jeetnay ka aizaz haasil kya hai kyunkay is ny aakhri martaba 1974 mein koi football match jeeta tha
yeh Pakistan  ki football team ki asian games mein mehez teesri kamyabi hai avroh is se qabal sirf domrtb_h 1954 aur 1974 mein aik football match jeet saki thi
deegar muqablon mein kabaddi aur tennis mein team kamyaab rahi lekin swimming, shooting aur rislng mein Pakistani  athletes ki karkardagi mayoos kin rahi
kbdi event mein Pakistan  meanz team ne group match mein malaysia ko 17 ke muqablay mein 62 points se shikast di
tennis ke muqablon mein bhi Pakistan  naay kamyaab aaghaz kya jahan Aqeel  Khan  aur abid Ali  naay meanz snglz ke ibtidayi matches jeet liye
wrestling ke khail mein Pakistani  pehalwanon ki karkardagi mayoos kin rahi aur ریسلرز Mohammad  bilal, mudassar Hussain  aur Abdul Rehman ko shikast ka mun dekhna para
shooting, teraaki aur bidmntn ke muqablon mein bhi Pakistani  ethlate ibtidayi matches mein hi shikast se dochar hue

“ mazeed : khail Sialkot  : Wazeer e Azam  ke musheer baraye tijarat, textile, sanaten, pedawar aur sarmaya kaari Abdul Razzaq  dawod naay kaha hai ke hukoomat jald hi draamdi khaam maal par tamam dyotiz aur taxes ko khatam kardey gi
dawn akhbar ki report ke mutabiq Abdul Razzaq  dawod ne Sialkot  mein ewaan sanat o tijarat ka dora kya aur Sialkot  ke bar aamad knndgan ke ijlaas se khitaab kya, ijlaas ki sadarat ewaan sanat o tijarat ke saddar khwaja masood Akhtar  ne ki, is mauqa par senior naib saddar Waqas  akrm Awan , Riaz  Aldeen  Sheikh  aur hakoomati numaindgaan bhi mojood they
mazeed padhan : barhti hui draamdat ke baad bhi textile, kapron ki baraamdaat mein izafah ijlaas se khitaab karte hue Abdul Razzaq  dawod ka kehna tha ke tajir baradri ko apni baraamdaat badhaane ke liye Sialkot  ke braamdi culture se seekhna chahiye
unhon ny kaha ke hukoomat sanat ko taraqqi dainay ke liye mansoobah bandi aur پالیساں bana rahi hai, is ke ilawa un policies par mukammal amal daraamad ke liye tajir baradri ko aetmaad mein le rahi hai
Abdul Razzaq  dawod ka kehna tha ke hukoomat پولسٹر yarn ki daraamad par 5 feesad rigolitri aur 7 feesad anti dmpng duty ke muamlay ko isi mah hal kardey gi
is mauqa par unhon ne Sialkot  mein aik khusoosi iqtisadi zone ke qiyam ke liye mukammal himayat ka elaan kya
yeh bhi padhan : hukoomat mulki draamdat ko kam karne ke liye koshan Wazeer e Azam  ke musheer ka kehna tha ke Federal Board of Revenue ( f bi are ) ke kirdaar mein aed taxes se sirf tax vasuli ke liye islahat ki jarahi hain
unhon ne wazeh kiya ke' mein ne hukoomat ko aik smri arsaal ki hai jis mein f bi are barah e raast koi tax aed nahi kere ga kyunkay f bi are ka kirdaar sirf tax wusool karna hai '

jeneati bimarion ke chehray par asraat muratab hotay hain aur inhen pehchanana mushkil hota hai kyunkay yeh marz kayi sooraton mein zahir hota hai taham نیورل net work istemaal kar ke sirf chehra dekh kar moroosi amraaz ki shanakht karne wala aik inqalabi nizaam tayyar karliya gaya hai Bostan  mein waqay aik qadray nai company f DNAe se wabasta یارون گرووچ aur un ke sathiyon nay﻿ aik nizaam banaya hai woh majmoi tor par poora chehra daikhta hai aur is ke baad masnoi zahanat ( ae aayi ) aur نیورل net work ki madad se paanch ya das amraaz ki fehrist deta hai jis mein mumkina tor par kisi aik mein yeh mareez mubtala ho sakta hai tarbiyat Yafta  نیورل net work mein 17 hazaar aisi tasaveer hain jo kisi nah kisi aisay mareez se talluq rakhti hain jo moroosi marz ke shikaar ho saktay hain is terhan yeh system 200 jeneati amraaz ya aarzon ki shanakht karsaktha hai is ke baad masnoi zahanat ya آرٹیفیشل intelli jins se is marz ko jan-nay mein madad li jati hai company ke mutabiq yeh system sirf mareez ki tasweer dekh kar 91 feesad durusti ke sath marz ki pishgoyi karsaktha hai basa auqaat yeh nizaam sirf 500 tasaveer parhnay ke baad hi apna faisla سنادیتا hai agarchay ab bhi is mein behtari ki bohat gunjaish hai taham usay mazeed behtar bananay ki koshish ki jaye gi lekin ab bhi yeh insani aankh aur salahiyat se bohat agay hain naqideen ke mutabiq agar yeh nizaam karobari companiyon ke haath lag jaye to woh usay tafreeq aur imtiaz ke liye istemaal karen gi jis se muashray mein na-insafi barhay gi is ka jawab dete hue f DNAe naay kaha hai ke yeh nizaam sirf doctoron aur haspatalon ko hi farokht kya jaye ga washington software bananay wali duniya ki sab se barri company مائکرو soft ke shareek baani paal Allan  intqaal kargaye hain un ki Umar  95 baras thi Allan  ka intqaal un ke aabadi shehar syatl mein سرطان ki wajah se sun-hwa woh pichlle kuch barso n se is marz mein مبتلاء they paal Allan  bil Gates  ke bachpan ke dost they paal Allan  ne hi harord university mein bil ki bunyaad rakhi thi jis ka naam bhi Allan  ka tajweez kardah tha paal Allan  company ke qiyam ke ibtidayi aath saal tak is ke tiknik ke incharge rahay thay Allan  1983 hamza bil Gates  ke sath برٹینسکی ki barray farmit wali tasweeron mein kaan kinny, janglaat ki katai, san-aton ke fazlay, kachray, rubber aur plastic ke dhair, zameen par lagi machinery jo crystal ki terhan dikhti hai aur phphondi ki manind nazar anay wali insani bastiyan daur se to shandaar dikhayi deti hain, magar qareeb se aik bhayanak dakyomntri ka scene paish karti hain

is amal ki wajah se bohat sa khaam tail aur zahreeley maday qareebi janglaat aur bahtay pani mein mil jatay hain

Facebook par sangeen ilzamaat : New York times ki chasham kusha report Facebook ko 2017 se shadeed bohraan ka saamna hai jaisay Amrici  sadaarti intikhabaat mein roosi mudakhlat, sarfeen ki data privacy, nafrat angaiz mawaad aur deegar
un masail naay duniya ki maqbool tareen samaji raabtey ki Website ko mushkilaat ka shikaar krrkha hai aur is par ghaflat aur karobari mafadaat ko tarjeeh dainay ke ilzamaat ka saamna hai
New York times ney is hawalay se aik tehqiqati report jari ki hai jis mein bataya gaya ke Facebook ki janib se kis terhan naqideen par jawabi waar kiye jarahay hain
mamlaat ko iltiwa mein daalnay, tardeed aur vashngtn mein –apne haq mein muhim samait mutadid iqdamaat kiye jarahay hain, is report ke 6 ahem nakaat darj zail hain
Facebook ko roosi mudakhlat ka pehlay se ilm tha ae f pi file photo 2016 ke awakhr mein mark زکربرگ ne awaami satah par elaan kya ke yeh aik mazhaka khaiz khayaal hai ke un ki company ne intikhabaat mein faisla kin kirdaar ada kya, magar company ke security mahireen ko andar ke haqayiq ka ilm tha
un mahireen ny 2016 ke mausam bahhar mein daryaft kya tha ke roosi hikrz aisay Facebook اکاؤنٹس ke sath jurey hain jo ke Amrici  sadaarti muhim se munsalik hain, kayi mah baad mahireen ny dekha ke roosi control اکاؤنٹس se hikng ke shikaar democarate ای mails ki tafseelaat share ki jarahi hain
report ke mutabiq dar haqeeqat Facebook ko rosyon ki sar garmion ke shawahid aik saal pehlay mil chuke they jis ke barey mein Amrici  intikhabaat ke baad awam aur company ke board of dayriktrz se aagah kiya gaya
company ko trmp ke hamion ka dar tha shiter stock photo 2015 mein jab ree pblkn party ke sadaarti umeed waar Donald  trmp ney muslim tarikeen watan par pabandi ka mutalba kya to Facebook ke mulazmeen aur company se bahar mojood naqideen ney company se Donald  trmp ke khilaaf action ka mutalba kya
mark زکربرگ ney is par ghhor kya aur –apne mathton se raye li ke kya Donald  trmp ney company ke usoolon ki khilaaf warzi ki hai ya nahi aur kya un ke اکاؤنٹ ko moattal ya post ko hataya jaye
agarchay mark زکربرگ zaati tor par is post ke khilaaf thay magar unhon ne Donald  trmp ke khilaaf iqdaam ko iltiwa mein daal diya taakay ree publicans ke sakht rad-e-amal se honay walay nuqsaan ko taalla jasakay aur Donald  trmp ki woh post ab bhi Facebook par mojood hai
Facebook ki janib se naqideen ke khilaaf muhim shtr stock photo roosi mudakhlat ke Facebook ke takheer se aitraaf par tanqeed bherne par company ne –apne haq mein aik muhim shuru ki jis ki nigrani si o o sheril سینڈبرگ ne khud ki, taakay naqideen ka muqaabla karkay awaami ghusse ko mukhalif technology companiyon ki janib morra jasakay
Facebook ne is maqsad ke liye Amrici  senetor mark warner ke sabiq cheif of star ki khidmaat ko is muhim ke liye haasil kya
sheril سینڈبرگ naay zaati tor par senetor Aimi  کلوبوچر se rabita karkay un ki tanqeed par shikayat ki, company naay aik pi are company ki khidmaat bhi haasil kee taakay –apne siyasi naqideen ke khilaaf manfi khabron ko barha charha kar paish kya jaye jabkay Google  jaisi companiyon par ilzamaat aed kiye ja sakain
un koshisho mein arab patti donor george soros ko bhi nishana banaya gaya jo ke Facebook mukhalif muhim ke pusht par thay, jabkay Facebook ki tareef aur Google  o Apple  ke oopar tanqeed par mabni stories ko aik mutanazia news site par shaya karaya gaya
cambridge اینالیٹیکا par rad-e-amal shtr stock photo Facebook ko rawan saal March  mein is waqt duniya bhar mein tanqeed ka samaan karna para jab mukhtalif media idaron ki mushtarqa tehqiqaat mein inkishaaf sun-hwa ke cambridge اینالیٹیکا Nami  company naay kis terhan karorron Amrici  votrz ka data istemaal kya
magar Facebook ke andar ahdidaran ka khayaal tha ke is nuqsaan ki بھرپائی mumkin hai aur is maqsad ke liye company ne aik naya cheif of american labng tainaat kya taakay congress ke ghusay ko thanda kya jasakay
is ke ilawa khamoshi se company ke andar aik muhim' v gate att' ka aaghaz kya taakay mulazmeen ko yaqeen dehani karai jasakay ke company 2018 mein aik baar phir track par wapas aajay gi
tanqeed par jawabi iqdamaat shtr stock photo Facebook ki kamzoriyon ka ehsas karkay kuch mukhalif companiyon ney usay –apne brandz ki tashheer ke liye istemaal karna shuru kya, is hawalay se Apple  ke cheif executive tim cook ney aik interview ke douran kaha ke un ki company sarfeen ke data ko istemaal nahi karti to yeh baat mark زکربرگ ke dil par jaakar lagi
is ke jawab mein Facebook ke baani nay﻿ apni intizami team ko hukum diya ke woh aayi phone ki jagah sirf android phones ko istemaal karen ge, company ka israar hai ke android operating system ke sarfeen Apple  se ziyada hain
Facebook ke ab bhi kaafi dost hain shtr stock photo sniyr democrate aur New York se senetor chak schumer nay﻿ congress ke deegar arakeen ke muqablay mein Facebook ke mulazmeen se ziyada fund 2016 ke intikhabaat ke douran haasil kiye aur woh company ki mushkil ke waqt is ki madad ke liye mojood they
jab Facebook ki mushkilaat mein izafah ho raha tha to chak schumer ne Facebook ke khilaaf muhim chalanay walay senetor mark warner ka saamna kya
Facebook ki tardeed shtr stock photo دوسیر janib Facebook ne New York times ki report ki tardeed ki hai
Facebook ki janib se jari bayan mein is baat ki tardeed ki gayi ke usay roosi sar garmion ka ilm 2016 ke mausam bahhar mein hochuka tha aur is ny security cheif ko is muamlay par iqdamaat karne se roka tha
company ke mutabiq usay roosi mudakhlat ka ilm Amrici  intikhabaat ke baad sun-hwa aur is nay﻿ mutasirah اکاؤنٹس ko band kya
isi terhan company ka kehna tha ke Facebook mulazmeen mein aayi phones ke istemaal se roknay ka koi hukum tim kick ke bayan ke baad nahi diya gaya, magar company ke mutabiq' hum mulazmeen mein android phones ke istemaal ki hosla afzai karte hain kyunkay woh duniya ka sab se ziyada istemaal kya jaaane wala mobile operating system hai '
trmp ke hamion se khauf ke baaray mein Facebook naay kaha ke woh bayan company ke usoolon ke khilaaf nahi tha jaisa New York times naay bayan kya, Donald  trmp sadaarti umeed waar they aur un ka bayan logon ko behas ka mauqa faraham karta hai
company ka yeh bhi kehna tha ke sheril سینڈبرگ naay senetor se shikayat seks trifkng qawaneen par ki thi o is ka maqsad mukhalif companiyon ko bura dikhnana nahi tha
aakhir mein Facebook naay kaha ke is naay pi are company ko is liye istemaal kya taakay' Facebook mein azaadi' ko dekha jasakay
Karachi  ( online ) awam ko ab Pakistan  se باہرکریڈٹ ya debt card istemaal karna mehanga parre ga hukoomat naay tax aed kar diya guzashta hukoomat naay jatay jatay bhi awam ki mushkil mein izafah kya ab chahiye ab saudia arab omra ya hajj ke silsilay mein jarahay hain ya kisi kaam ke silsilay mein Dubai  samait kisi aur malik ja rahay hain bank debt ya kridt card ke istemaal par tax ada karna ho ga f bi are ke mutabiq beron mumalik card istemaal karne ki soorat mein nan فائلر par 3 feesad aur فائلر par aik feesad tax aed kya gaya hai yani is mein bhi فائلرز ko 2 feesad ka faida hi ho ga nai Dehli  4 decemeber ( siyasat dot com ) hindustani cricket team un dinon Australia  ke doray par hai aur is ke liye itminan ki baat hai ke stevin asmth aur david وارنز pabandi ki wajah se maizban team ka hissa nahi hain lekin woh fikar mand hain ke machal اسٹارک aur pait کومنز taiz wicketon par hindustani batsmanon ko pareshan kar saktay hain lekin sachin tndolkr ne isi pareshani ko dekhte hue khusoosi mahswara diya hai ke taap three batsman pehlay 30 overs mohtaat batting karen aur is baat ko yakeeni banayen ke middle آرڈرکو nai gaind ka saamna nah karna parre tafseelaat ke mutabiq sachin naay kaha hai ke Australia  aur England  ki wicketon par opening jori ki ahmiyat bohat barh jati hai aik do aur teen baaz auqaat chouthay number ki baari bhi jaldi ajati hai aisay mauqa par aik se teen number ke batsman ki zimma daari hoti hai ke woh tees over taq wicket par qiyam kere sachin naay mazeed kaha ke dora England  par bhi mein naay kaha tha ke pehlay chalees over bohat ahem hain is ke baad gaind ki sakhti khatam hojati hai lekin gaind kuch soyng zaroor hoti hai lekin usay aap hum aahang ho saktay hain lekin agar gaind sakht hoto woh batsmanon ko hum aahang honay ka waqt nahi Shahid  Khan  London  ki foot baal team فلہم ke bhi maalik hain aur agar ویمبلے stadium ki khareed ke liye foot baal association unn ki peshkash qubool kar lete hai to unn ke liye Bartanwi  dar-al-hakoomat mein nfl فرینچائز khareedna bhi mumkin ho jaye ga
aaj jari kiye gaye aik bayan mein Shahid  Khan  nay﻿ kaha ke جیگوئرز team ke London  ke sath mazboot rabton ke bohat se fawaid mein se aik english foot baal association aur ویمبلے stadium ke sath ishtiraaq amal hai
onhon nay﻿ kaha ke stadium ki khareed se yeh niji malkiat mein aa jaye ga aur is se haasil honay wali aamdani foot baal ke farogh mein ziyada ahem kirdaar ada kar sakay gi
udhar nfl ne bhi aik bayan mein kaha hai ke ویمبلے stadium ki khareed ke silsilay mein woh Shahid  Khan  aur unn ki team Jackson  ll جیگوئرز ke liye bohat khush hai
jakarta 23 augst ( siyasat dot com ) India  ke mardon ki hockey team neh چہارشنبہ ko hang kaang ko sifar ke muqablay mein 26 gole se hara kar ayshiyn games mein apni sab se barri jeet –apne naam ki bad qismati se hang kaang ki team aik gole bhi nah kar saki jakarta mein honay wali games mein India  ki team neh taqreeban har do minute baad aik gole kar ke apna woh 86 sala record tora jis mein is neh 1932 ke olympics muqablon mein America  ko aik ke muqablay mein 24 gole se shikast di thi aath martaba olympics chmpyn ban'nay walay India  ki team neh match ke pehlay paanch minute mein chaar gole kiye aur khail khatam honay se saat minute qabal –apne gole keeper ko bhi gole se hata liya aur agay aa kar hamlay karne walon mein shaamil kar liya paiir ko India  ne Indonesia  ko sifar ke muqablay mein 17 gole se shikast di thi India  ka agla match jummay ko Japan  ke khilaaf ho ga چہارشنبہ ko munaqidah aik aur match mein Pakistan  ne oman ko sifar ke muqablay mein 10 gole se shikast di hai Pakistan  ki green shirts jinhon ne yeh games pehlay aath martaba jeeti hain, poooray match mein oman ki team par haawi rahen aur oman ke gole par tabrh toar hamlay hotay rahay
Pakistan  ke mutabadil khilari Ali  shaan nay﻿ nihayat behtar khail ka muzahira karte hue hate truck bhi ki is se pehlay bhi aik match mein Pakistan  nay﻿ thai land ko 10 gole se shikast di thi doosri taraf Korea  nay﻿ Srilanka ko aath gole se shikast di is terhan yeh tournament aik high askorng tournament bantaa ja raha hai jis mein barri temen ziyada se ziyada gole kar rahi hain yaad rahay ke aaj taq newzea land ki team ka kisi bain al aqwami match mein kisi bhi team ke khilaaf sab se ziyada gole karne ka record hai
is ny 1994 mein سمووا ki team ke khilaaf aik ke muqablay mein 36 gole kiye they up ki device par pallay back support dastyab nahi agar koi fard ya idaara mohtaat aur mehfooz nahi to minton hi mein hikrz unhein lakhoon karorron ka nuqsaan pouncha satke hain internet ab roz marrah insani zindagi ka aik ahem jazo ban chuka hai
computer ho ya smart phone, ab technology ki madad se aap zroryatِ zindagi, asaishen aur sahuliyaat ghar baithy minton mein haasil kar satke hain
taham barq-e raftaar internet se kasheed kardah sayibr space Nami  is nizaam zindagi mein jahan aasaniyan hain, wahein khatraat bhi mojood hain
yahan aik mukhtalif noiyat ke chor mojood hain jinhen hikrz kaha jata hai aur agar koi fard ya idaara mohtaat aur mehfooz nahi to minton hi mein hikrz unhein lakhoon karorron ka nuqsaan pouncha satke hain
haal hi mein Pakistan  mein barray pemanay par bank sarfeen ka data ya maloomat chori honay aur un ki black market mein farokht ki khabar samnay aayi
yeh maloomat ziyada tar un mutasirah sarfeen ke kridt aur ae tea am card ki tafseelaat theen
hikng ke baare mein jan-nay ke liye mazeed padhiye Pakistani  banking sarfeen ka data baraye farokht? ae tea am fraud se kaisay bacha jaye? baalo toth aan rakha to maloomat chori ho sakti hain' 33 crore twitter sarfeen –apne paas words tabdeel karen' is chori se kitney bank aur un se munsalik kitney sarfeen mutasir hue, is hawalay se hakoomati idaron ki janib se wazeh tor par nahi bataya gyaavr nah hi فارنزک ya scienci bunyadon par tehqiqaat samnay ayen
dekhnay mein taham yeh aaya ke ziyada tar muqami bankon ki janib se sarfeen ke card bock kiye gay jo hifazati iqdamaat ki durustagi ke baad khol diye gay
be yakeeni ki is sorat e haal mein yeh khadshaat peda hue ke kayi bankon ki maloomat chori huien aur lakhoon sarfeen mutasir hue hon ge taham stit bank of Pakistan  ki janib se bhi is khadshay ki tardeed ki gayi
Albata  Pakistan  ki federal investigation agency ne is baat ki tasdeeq ki ke aik se ziyada bank mutasir ho satke hain
image caption Lahore  se talluq rakhnay walay 24 sala Shahmeer  Aamir  aik' ethical hacker' hain' un dono mein se koi aik jhoot bol raha hai' Lahore  se talluq rakhnay walay 24 sala Shahmeer  Aamir  aik' ethical hacker' hain yani woh nah to posheeda hain aur nah hi hacking ko ghalat maqasid ke liye istemaal karte hain
aik Amrici  company jo har saal duniya bhar ke 10 behtareen ikhlaqi hikron ki fehrist jari karti hai, is ki janib se Shahmeer  ko teesray number par shumaar kya ja chuka hai
bi bi si naay jab un se bank sarfeen ka data chori honay ke hawalay se sawal kya to un ka kehna tha ke' un dono idaron mein se koi aik jhoot bol raha hai
' Shahmeer  Aamir  ka maanna hai ke hukoomat ki janib se is waqeye ki tehqiqaat ke baad sarfeen ko haqayiq se aagah kiya jana chahiye tha taa ke mustaqbil mein idaray aur infiradi sarfeen dono khud ko mehfooz bana saken
' hacker ya chor is liye kamyaab nahi hota ke woh bohat chalaak hai, balkay woh is liye kamyaab hota hai ke is ka shikaar ban'nay wala Sarif  be waqoof hota hai
' bankon ka data chori kaisay sun-hwa? image caption ziyada tar bank raqum ki muntaqili ke liye' visa' ya' am net' par inhisaar karte hain bankon ke haliya data chori ke hawalay se un ka kehna tha ke is mein do soorten ho sakti hain
Shahmeer  nay﻿ bataya ke raqum ki card ke zariye adaigi ya muntaqili ke liye bankon ki darmain' gate way' istemaal hotay hain
ziyada tar bank is maqsad ke liye' visa' ya' am net' waghera par inhisaar karte hain
Shahmeer  ka kehna tha ke' aisa ho sakta hai ke un mein se kisi aik par hamla kiya gaya ho jahan se bankon ka mawaad chori sun-hwa ho
' raqum ki adaigi ke liye un gate ways ko sarfeen ki mukammal tafseelaat dastyab hoti hain
agar un mein se kisi aik gate way ke hifazati nizaam mein koi khaami mojood ho jisay hacker pakar le to woh un sarfeen ki maloomat taq rasai haasil kar sakta hai
taham unhon nay﻿ kaha ke aisa hona namumkin nahi magar intahi mushkil zaroor hai kyunkay aisay gate way security ke intahi sakht intizamaa karte hain
Shahmeer  ke mutabiq doosri soorat yeh ho sakti hai ke kayi bankon ko aik sath nishana banaya gaya ho aur un mein se chand aik ka mdafaati nizaam kuch der ke liye hikrz uboor karne mein kamyaab ho gaye hon ge
taham Shahmeer  ka maanna hai ke afraad hon ya idaray, chori tab hai mumkin hoti hai jab Sarif  apni khamion se aagah nah ho ya aisi ghalatiyan kere jin se woh hacker ke liye aaasaaan hadaf saabit ho
' big bounty hinting aur naaqis security' image caption Pakistan  mein bohat kam binks ya companian aisi hain jo big bounty hinting krwati hain Shahmeer  Aamir  ki company' ویلیکس' mukhtalif Pakistani  aur bain al aqwami idaron ko hikng ki khilaaf hifazat ya cyber security faraham karti hai
woh ab taq 400 se zayed bain al aqwami idaron aur companiyon ke liye big bounty hinting kar chuke hain
bigg bounty hinting companian از khud karwati hain
yani yeh companian apna difai nizaam mazboot banati hain aur phir ethical hikron ko dawat deti hain ke woh is mein big ya khaami talaash karen
jo hacker khaami talaash kar ke un ke difai nizaam ko uboor karne mein kamyaab ho jaye usay inaam diya jata hai
is terhan yeh companian is khaami ko daur kar ke –apne difai nizaam ko mazeed behtar aur mazboot banati hain
Shahmeer  ab taq jin companiyon ke liye big bounty hinting kar chuke hain un mein Facebook, air bi an bi, yahoo, Google  aur deegar shaamil hain aur un ke mutabiq Pakistan  mein bohat kam binks ya companian aisi hain jo is rivayet ko apnati hon gi
un ka yeh bhi kehna tha ke Pakistan  mein kayi muqami bank to aisay hain jin ki Website ka source code open hota hai yani woh jis code ya plate form ko istemaal kar ke banai jati hain woh pehlay se maloom hota hai
misaal ke tor par kayi Websites aik public source' word press' ko istemaal kar ke bani hoti hain
' zahir hai ke aisi Websites ko ﮦlak karna nisbatan aasaan hota hai
hikrz ko ibtidayi mehnat nahi karna parre gi
jin Websites ka source code maloom nah ho is ki liye hikrz ko ziyada maloomat akhatta karna padtee hain aur phir andazay par kaam karna parta hai
' yahi wajah hi ke haliya waqeat mein Pakistan  mein mojood koi bhi bain al aqwami bank mutasir nahi sun-hwa tha
hikng kaisay hoti hai aur is ka shikaar kon bantaa hai? image caption hacker ke paas Sarif  ki jitni ziyada maloomat hon gi, itna usay nishana banana aaasaaan ho ga Shahmeer  ke mutabiq hacker pehlay –apne shikaar ke baray mein maloomat ikathe karta hai
' jitni ziyada maloomat hon gi, itna usay nishana banana aasaan ho ga
' makhsoos alaat ke ilawa internet par beshumar aisi Websites mojood hain jin ko hikng ke liye istemaal kya jata hai
' baghair jacchay links ko click mat karen' pehlay kisi bhi shakhs ka aayi pi address maloom kya jata hai
phir aik Website ki madad se usay aik link bheja jata hai
agar woh is par click kere ga to is ke paas Google  ki aik file khulay gi, jabkay link bhejnay walay ke paas is ka aayi pi address chala jaye ga
is address ke zariye hacker uss shakhs ka maqam aur chand deegar geographiyai maloomat haasil kar le ga
un maloomat ki madad se aglay marhaly mein usay aik virus zada file bhaije jati hai
agar woh is par click kar day to hacker is virus ki madad se is ki tamam tar matlooba maloomat haasil kar laita hai
' is se bachney ke liye zurori hai ke aap baghair tasdeeq kiye kisi bhi link ko click mat karen
'' namaloom app ko down load nah karen' tasweer ke copy rite getty images hikng ka aik aur tareeqa Sarif  ke mobile phone mein ghusna hai
Shahmeer  ka kehna hai ke hacker ka kaam Sarif  se sirf link par click karwana ya app dwn load karwana hai
internet par aisi Websites mojood hain aap ko android phone par istemaal honay wali application bana kar deti hain
hacker aisi hi application ke sath apni virus wali file joor day ga
Sarif  jaisay hi usay down load kere ga pas parda hacker ki virus wali file bhi is ke phone mein down load ho jaye gi
' is ke baad hacker is Sarif  ki audio sun sakta hai, is ki video dekh sakta hai, is ka wats app aur s am s parh sakta hai, hatta ke har woh kaam kar sakta hai jo is ka phone kar raha hai
' is terhan woh dekh sakta hai ke aap naay kisi bank ki app ko kholnay ke liye kya maloomat faraham kee jin ko istemaal kar ke woh aap se qabal aap ka account khol kar is mein se raqam chori kar sakta hai
agar koi bank security code s am s ke zariye bhejhay to hacker woh bhi dekh sakta hai
yeh janna bhi zaroori hai ke kis app ko aap ke phone mein kis cheez tak rasai chahiye
tasweer ke copy right getty images image caption sarfeen –apne paas word ko tabdeel karte waqt dheyaan rakhen Shahmeer  ka kehna tha ke isi koi bhi app jo aap se aisi ghair zurori rasai mangay woh mashkook hai aur usay woh rasai nahi dainee chahiye
woh kehte hain :' aik torch ki app ko aap ki tasaveer tak rasai ki koi zaroorat nahi
'' kya aap apna paas word tabdeel nahi karte ?' aisay Sarif  jo baqaidagi se –apne paas word tabdeel nahi karte woh hikrz ke liye aassan hadaf saabit hotay hain
koi bhi hacker pehlay aasaan tareeqa aazmaata hai
agar kisi ne apna paas word apni tareekh paidaiesh rakhi hai to woh sab se aasaan tareen nishana ho ga
aap naay kayi aisi jaghon par apni tareekh paidaiesh day rakhi hogi jo aap ko yaad bhi nahi magar hacker aap ke barey mein maloomat haasil karte hue is ki barey mein jaan sakta hai
' public y fai ke istemaal mein dekh bhaal zaroori hai' kisi bhi awaami maqam par muft ya paisay day kar faraham kya jaaane wala vayrlis internet knkshn bhi mehfooz nahi
' aisa knkshn jis rastay se ho kar jata hai is ka rasta chhupa sun-hwa ya paas word ke zariye mehfooz nahi banaya gaya hota
ho sakta hai is par koi hacker mojood ho
' Shahmeer  ka kehna tha ke aisay net work istemaal kiye jane walay net work se hacker Sarif  ki maloomat chori kar sakta hai
tasweer ke copy right getty images image caption awaami maqamat par phone istemaal karte hue y fai nah istemaal karen' kya aap –apne phone ka firm where up tht nahi karte ?' aisay afraad bhi hikron ke liye aaasaaan hadaf saabit hotay hain jo baqaidagi se –apne mobile phone ya computer ka firm where ya is ka nizaam up tht nahi karte
phone ya computer jis nizaam par chaltay hain un ko bananay wali companian vqtan fawaqtan un ko up date karti rehti hain jo har Sarif  ko bheja jata hai
un ke zariye machinon ki security ko behtar banaya jata hai aur un mein mojood khamion ko daur kya jata hai
taham chand sarfeen susti ya phir be khaberi ke baais un up dates ko install nahi karte
' aisay sarfeen hikrz ke liye aasaan hadaf hotay hain
un ke phone ke software mein agar koi khaami hai jo hacker ko maloom ho chuki hai to woh is phone taq rasai haasil kar le ga
' coupon hign ( desk ) Denmark  mein science danon neh aik nai tibbi tehqeeq mein diabities ke mareezon ko haftay mein do baar foot baal khailnay ki tajweez di hai janoobi Denmark  mein medical science college ke mohqiqeen ki taraf se jari kardah tehqeeq mein kaha gaya hai ke dosray darjay ke diabities ke mareezon ko haftay mein do baar foot baal khailnay ki practice karne se bemari ki kamzoree daur karne mein madad miley gi is werzish se dil ki sahet par bhi misbet asar parre ga aur khoon ki shareyanien bhi sukarnay se bachchen gi jadeed tehqeeq ki tayari ke douran mahireen neh diabities ke foot baal khailnay walay mareezon ke 50 rukni aik group ki sahet ka jaiza liya is group mein 55 saal se 77 saal ki amrke mardo khawateen shaamil they mahireen ka kehna hai ke haftay mein do baar kuch der taq foot baal khailnay walay afraad mein motapay ke asraat bhi kam hue hain aur un ka wazan bhi kam sun-hwa yeh tahaqeeq musalsal 16 haftay jari rahi aur diabities ke mareezon ko haftay mein do baar foot baal khailnay ke amal se gzara gaya science danon ka kehna hai ke is tajarbay ka maqsad ghizai sahet ke nizaam ko falo karte hue werzish ke diabities ke mareezon par asraat ka jaiza lena tha online ای commerce company' Ali  baba' ke shareek baani aur executive cheif 54 sala jack ma nay﻿ 2 roz qabal hi –apne ohday se retirement ka elaan kya tha
jack ma ne chairman ship chorte hue taleem aur insani Falah  o behbood ke mansoobon par kaam karne ke azm ka izhaar kya tha
jack ma ki janib se ohda chhorey jatay waqt company naay is baat ki tasdeeq nahi ki thi ke un ki jagah company ka kon naya chairman hoga
taham ab Ali  baba ke naye executive chairman ke naam ka elaan kardiya gaya
karobari nashriyati idaray' blom barg' ne apni report mein bataya ke jack ma ki jagah 46 dinil sang ko Ali  baba ka naya executive chairman muqarrar kya jaye ga
denial zang naay 2007 mein Ali  baba ko join kya تھا—فوٹو : الیزلا report ke mutabiq jack ma aindah baras September  tak –apne ohday se allag ho jaien ge, jis ke baad denial zang ko zimma dariyan sonpi jayen gi
jack ma naay executive cheif ke ohday par aik dahai taq khidmaat sir injaam den aur mazeed aik saal taq woh is par apni zimma dariyan nibhate rahen ge
jack ma agarchay chairman ke ohday se hatt jayen ge, taham woh board of gornrz ke rukan honay sameit company ke shareek baani bhi rahen ge
un ki jagah lainay walay 46 sala daniel zang ney 2007 mein Ali  baba ko cheif financial officer ke tor par join kya tha, taham woh is waqt company ke cheif executive officer ( si ای o ) ke tor par khidmaat sir injaam day rahay hain
yeh bhi parheen : online cheeni company Ali  baba ke chairman ne ohda chore diya inhen company ka saddar bhi kaha jata hai, taham aindah baras September  taq woh company ke aala tareen ohday yani executive chairman par tainaat ho jaien ge
jack ma ne 18 afraad ke sath 1999 mein Ali  baba banai تھی—فوٹو : si an bi si jack ma ki janib se ohday ko chhorey jany ko duniya ki barri online companiyon mein shumaar honay wali Ali  baba mein guzashta aik dahai mein sab se barri tabdeeli bhi kaha ja raha hai
Ali  baba ko jack ma ne deegar 18 afraad ke sath mil kar 1999 mein Maroof  online commerce Website' Ali  baba' ko banaya tha
is Website ko bananay ka maqsad chain ki masnoaat ko aalmi mandiyon aur deegar mumalik tak aasani se pahunchana tha
ibtidayi chand saalon mein is company ko kayi mushkilaat ka saamna karna para, taham is waqt Ali  baba ka shumaar duniya ki barri online ای commerce companiyon aur web sayits mein hota hai
aik report ke mutabiq is waqt Ali  baba ke kal waqti mulazmeen ki tadaad 66 hazaar hai aur is ke asason ki value 4 so 20 arab dollar ( Pakistani  420 kharab rupay se zayed ) hai
anannaas haldi adrak aur lemoo mein kayi mushtarqa khususiyaat payi jati hain yeh tamam qudrati ajzaa anti infection khususiyaat ke sath sath ٹیومرکش bhi samjhay jatay hain un sab ko mila کرتیار kardah mashroob bulaa shuba سرطان ki rokkk thaam aur sardi ke nazla zukam ka behtareen jaadoyi akseer se kam nahi jism mein khoon ki gardish ko behtar bananay aur jismani chusti badhaane main bhi madad gaar hai darj zail mein un ajzaa ke tibbi fawaid paish hain lemoo mein سڑیک acids mojood hota hai jo pathri ko tornay mein madad dete hain anannaas ki badolat khansi ke masnoi sharbat se ziyada fa-aal hota hai haldi mein deegar ajzaa ke sath sath کرکمین Nami  aik anti cancer taaqat war murakkab paaya jata hai adrak do qisam ke cancer ki rokkk thaam mein madad deta hai usay nariyal ke tail aur siyah mirch ke sath mila kar aik jaadoyi mashroob banaya ja sakta hai mazkoorah tamam ajzaa ka mashroob tayyar karne ke liye darj zail tarkeeb hain taaza اناناس ke do cupp siyah mirch aadha chamach haldi adrak aur aik Adad  lemoo aur aik chhota chamach nariyal ka tail ab sab ko mila krayk mashroob banayen, کینسراور sardi ke nazla zukam se mehfooz rahen Mumbai  bollywood adakar snje dt ki beti تریشالا dt ny kaha hai ke un ka bollywood mein kaam karne ka koi iradah nahi bollywood mein baba ke naam se mashhoor snje dt ki pehli beti تریشالا dt social media par kaafi mutharrak rehti hain aur woh samaji raabtey ki Websites par –apne waalid ki tasaveer share karkay un ki hosla afzai karti rehti hain lekin sanju ki na qabil yaqeen kamyabi ke bawajood تریشالا ki janib se film ya –apne waalid se mutaliq kisi qisam ka rad-e-amal nahi aaya taham ab unhon ny social media par –apne waalid snje dt se mutaliq madahon ki janib se kiye gaye salawon par khamoshi toar di hai social media Website insta gram par aik feture muta-arif karaya gaya hai jis par aik madah ny تریشالا se sawal kya ke aap ke –apne waalid snje dt ke sath kaisay taluqaat hain aur walidain baghair rehna kaisa lagta hai jis ka unhon ny jawab dete hue kaha ke mere waalid snje dt ke sath aisay hi taluqaat hain jaisay aik beti ke –apne waalid ke sath hotay hain avrmjhe walidain ke sath rehne ka koi ehsas nahi hai kyun ke mein kabhi un ke sath nahi rahi mein bachpan se hi –apne nana aur nani ke sath rahi hon aik Sarif  ny sawal kya ke aap –apne waalid jaisi hain ya walida unhon naay jawab diya ke mera gussa aur rawayya –apne waalid jaissa hai jab ke naram dili aur mohabbat bhara bartao walida ki terhan hai aik aur madah naay sawal poocha ke agar bollywood se aap ko aik achi film ki offer aaye to aap ka kya jawab hoga تریشالا naay kaha shukriya mera bollywood industry mein jaaane ka koi iradah nahi hai wazeh rahay sunjay dt ki pehli shadi ریچا sharmaa se hui jin se un ki aik hi beti تریشالا dt hain aur un ki doosri biwi se koi aulaad nahi jab ke un ki teesri biwi منیاتا dt se inhen aik beta شاہران dt aur beti iqrah dt hain tasweer ke copy right getty images Saudi  arab ka daawa hai ke Iran  ke khilaaf Amrici  pabandion ki soorat mein woh tail ki aalmi maang ko poora kar satke hain
America  mukhtalif mumalik par dabao daal raha hai ke woh Iran  se tail nah khareedain magar aisay mein sawal uthta hai Saudi  arab ke paas kitna tail mojood hai guzashta paanch dahaiyo se is sawal ka jawab tail ke zakhair ke mahireen ke liye aik raaz hai
tail bar aamad karne walay mumalik ki tanzeem avpik ke 2015 ke andazon ke mutabiq Saudi  arab ke paas 266 arab barrel tail ke zakhair mojood hain
agar yeh adaad o shumaar durust hain to Saudi  arab ka tail aindah 70 saloon mein khatam hoga
is hisaab ke liye avstً rozana 12 laakh barrel ke istemaal ka andaza lagaya gaya hai
yeh bhi padhiye tail ki qeematon ki siyasat tail ki pedawar :' is dghabazi ki qeemat ada karni parre gi' Iran  par pabandi se India  ko khaam tail ki qillat ka khatrah taham Saudi  sarkari adaad o shumaar ke baaray mein shukook mojood hain
is ki wajah yeh hai ke 1987 mein Saudi  arab ney –apne zakhair ki tadaad ke baray mein kaha tha ke woh 170 arab barrel hain
taham 1989 mein unhon ney is tkhmine ki tadaad barha kar 260 arab barrel kar di thi
2016 ke سٹیٹسٹیکل rivo of world energy ke mutabiq Saudi  arab ne ab taq 94 arab barrel tail farokht kar chuka hai
taham un ke sarkari zaraye ke mutabiq un ke paas ab bhi 260 se 265 arab barrel tail mojood hain
tasweer ke copy write huw evans picture agency agar hakoomati it-tila-aat durust hain to is ka matlab hai ke ya to Saudi  arab nay﻿ tail ke naye zakhair daryaft kiye hain ya phir unhon nay﻿ mojooda zakhair ka dobarah jaiza le kar unhein tabdeel kar diya hai
zakhair mein izafay ka matlab yeh ho sakta hai ke jin thikanon se tail bar aamad ho raha hai wahein aur tail nikal aaya hai ya woh kunvey phir se bhar gaye hain
Saudi  arab mein 1936 se 1970 ke darmain tail ke be shumaar zakhair daryaft hue
is ke baad qadray nai dryaftin nahi huien
masla yeh hai ke jahan jahan tail ki pedawar ho rahi hai is ki tafseelaat ya zakhair ke baray mein hukoomat har baat khufia rakhti hai aur is ki tafseel kuch hi logon ko maloom hoti hai
aisay mein kisi bhi baat ki tasdeeq karna mushkil hai
mahireen bhi yeh baat yaqeen se nahi bta satke ke Saudi  arab mein tail ki pedawar kab kam honi shuru hogi
tail ke zakhair ka takhmeenah laganay ka aik tareeqa yeh hai ke is baat ka andaza lagaya jaye ke pedawar shuru honay se pehlay kitney zakhair mojood they
is andazay ko o o aayi pi kaha jata hai
1970 ki dahai mein is baat par ittafaq raye mojood tha ke Saudi  arab mein 530 arab barrel o o aayi pi mojood they
Saudi  o o aayi pi ke baaray mein maloomat Saudi  arab aur America  ki mushtarqa oil company aarmko ke liye Amrici  senate ki committee baraye aalmi muashi policy naay di theen
is waqt aarmko chaar Amrici  companiyon ایگزون, ٹیکسیکو, shall, aur mobil ki shirkat daar thi
1979 mein paish ki jaaane wali maloomat woh aakhri moqa tha jab awaami pas manzar par yeh maloomat jari ki gayi theen
taham mukammal o o aayi pi دخائر ko pedawar mein lana mumkin nahi hota
is ki wajah takneeki hai
tail ke o o aayi pi zakhair ki mukhtalif aqsam hoti hain
pehli to wazeh zakhair hotay hain jis ke baaray mein takhminay sab se ziyada durust hotay hain
is mein se aap taqreeban 90 feesad haasil kar letay hain
doosri qisam mumkina دخائر ki hoti hai
un ke hawalay se umeed aur andazay hotay hain aur un mein andazon ka 10 feesad hi nikala jata hai
America  ki company aarmko ne 1970 ki dahai ke aakhri saloon mein Saudi  arab ke tail ke mustand zakhair 110 arab barrel betaye they is ke sath hi mustaqbil aur mumkina zakhair بلترتیب 178 arab barrel aur 248 arab barrel bataya tha
aisay mein sawal uthnay laga ke kya Saudi  neh tail ke zakhair ko barha charha kar dikhaane ke liye ممکنمہ zakhair ko haqeeqi zakhair bta diya? di society of petroleum anjinyirz aur you s skyortiz and exchange commission neh tail ke zakhair ke mukhtalif zmron ki tareef tey ki hai
halaank yeh wazeh hai ke Saudi  aarmko nay﻿ avpik ko haqeeqi tail zakhair ke baaray mein jo maloomat den hain woh isi tareef ke tehat hain
is par bharosa nahi karne ki koi wajah nahi hai kyunkay yeh maloomat bahar walon ke liye khufia hain aur is ki haqeeqat ko parkhnay ka koi rasta nahi
yeh koi ghair mamooli baat nahi hai ke koi bhi malik shuru mein andazon se ziyada tail ke zakhair peda karta hai
naye tail aur gas ke zakhair ki talaash se kal tail zakhair mein izafah hota hai
zahir hai is se mumkina zakhair mein bhi izafah hota hai
tail ke zakhair ke baaray mein koi bhi andaza hatmi nahi ho sakta
kayi baar mustaqbil mein niklny walay ذخآئر mumkina zakhair ke ذمرے mein aa jatay hain aur aakhir mein haqeeqi ban jatay hain
lekin Saudi  ke sath masla yeh hai ke woh 1980 se hi 265 arab بیرلز ke aas paas hai
aarmko ke share ko baichnay par Saudi  arab mein tanaza Saudi  aarmko ke share ko stak market mein laane par ghhor kar raha hai
paanch feesad share sarmaya karon ko dainay ki baat ho rahi hai
agar aarmko share bazaar mein lstng ke qawaid par poora utarti hai to usay tail ke zakhair ke baaray mein maloomat ko zahir karna hoga
halaank yeh bhi kaha ja raha hai ke aarmko ke share bazaar mein anay ke baad bhi ziyada wazahat ki umeed nahi ki ja sakti hai
Saudi  arab mein tail ke zakhair kitney hain aur kab taq chalen ge, yeh ab bhi aik raaz hai

yeh khabar 18 feb 2018 ko dawn akhbar mein shaya hui Islamabad ( new زڈیسک ) mashhoor tecnology company Apple  naay khraton ki nigrani ke liye sleeping system register kara liya
kharatay ki mushkil se nijaat dilanay ke liye mashhoor Amrici  tecnology company Apple  ne khraton ki nigrani ke liye sleeping system register kara liya
bataya gaya hai ke is system mein shaamil khusoosi bistar aik touc screen ke control panel se jura sun-hwa hoga aur computer, display par sonay walay ke dil ki dharkan ki raftaar, saans lainay ki raftaar aur darjaa hararat dukhaay ga
multi sensor sleeping system mein aik camera bhi laga ho ga jo soye hue shakhs ke sir ke oopar laga sun-hwa ho ga taa ke khraton ko jancha ja sakay
yeh product kab market mein aaye gi, is hawalay se kuch nahi bataya gaya

Balochistan  anwayrnmnt protection agency ne gdani ship breaking aur بائیکو dono ka hi difaa kya
report ke mutabiq agency ka kehna tha ke is baat ke intahi kam imkanaat hain ke gdani ship breaking mein anay walay jahaaz se yeh tail nikla ho kyunkay Pakistan  anay se qabal un jahazoo ko saaf kar diya jata hai aur un ke paas international gas free srtifikt hota hai
بائیکو ki janib se bhi bataya gaya hai ke yeh khaam tail nahi hai aur yeh un ke company mein laaye jaany walay tail se mukhtalif hai, jabkay asal haqeeqat ka ilm tehqiqaat ke baad hi ho sakay ga
report ke mutabiq director general meri time security agency neh bataya hai ke un ki team neh samandar ke un hisson ka fazai muaina kya tha jis se maloom sun-hwa ke do maqamat par tail samandar mein phela sun-hwa hai jo aik dosray ke qareeb hain
yeh bhi padhiye samndron mein plastic ki aloodgi' aalmi bohraan' samandari aloodgi ki barri wajah tayron ka plastic national institute of اوشانوگرافی ka muaqqaf hai ke unhon nay﻿ tail ke namoonay haasil kiye hain jin ka idaray ki laboratory mein tajzia kiya jaye ga taham un ka khayaal hai ke tail بائیکو ki line se nahi nikla, balkay ziyada tar imkaan yeh hai ke is rastay se guzarnay walay behri jahaaz se nikla ho, is baat ki tehqiqaat ki zaroorat hai ke kis jahaaz se yeh tail kharij sun-hwa
image caption mubarak vlij ke roki shore aur sindi shore par jo janwar mlitay hain jinhein بینتھک اینمیل kehte hain woh kaafi tadaad mein marchukay hain jin mein kekray, کورال, اسپنج, ail aur deegar chhootey aqsam ke jandaar shaamil hain Balochistan  anwayrnmnt protikshn agency ki janib se darkhwast di gayi hai ke بائیکو ko operation bahaal karne ki ijazat di jaye kyunkay is ki muatali se muashi nuqsaan poanch raha hai, jis ke baad بائیکو ka operation bahaal kar diya gaya
doosri janib بائیکو ka kehna hai ke un ki tehqiqaat ke mutabiq yeh bunker oil hai jo nah to بائیکو ki refinery aur nah hi Pakistan  ki kisi aur oil refinery mein tayyar kya jata hai
wazeh rahay ke yeh tail behri jahazoo ke liye istemaal kya jata hai
darin Isna  meri time security agency, Pakistan  navy, Karachi  port trust ke ilawa بائیکو aur shall ki madad se saahil ki safai ki muhim ka aaghaz kardiya gaya hai
meri time security agency ka kehna hai ke aaloda rait ko kisi dosray maqam par thikaanay lagaya jaye ga
Balochistan  ke sahili ilaqay gdani ke qareeb se jumaraat ko tail ka rasao mubarak vlij taq poanch gaya, jis se samandar aaloda aur fiza mein tail ki bo phail gayi
tasweer ke copy right afp image caption yaad rahay ke 2003 mein yunan ke behri jahaaz تسمان sprt se 33 hazaar tan tail ka rasao sun-hwa tha jis ke baad yeh dosra bara waqea hai gdani ke qareeb ship breaking ki sanat waqay hai jahan puranay oil tinkron ko laane ki ijazat day di gayi hai
isi ilaqay mein بائیکو oil company ki jiti bhi mojood hai yeh company rozana 75 hazaar barrel khaam tail saaf karti hai
بائیکو company ke general manijar communication Shehryar  Ahmed  nay﻿ bi bi si se baat karte hue bataya ke tail ke rasao se qabal khaam tail ki muntaqili ka kaam jari tha taham بائیکو ki line se koi likij nahi sun-hwa

Africa  mein sarmaya kaari karne ke mansoobon se alehda hai aur yeh aindah teen saal mein ki jaye gi
cheeni saddar she jin ping naay paiir ke roz chand africi rehnumao se baat karte hue kaha hai ke chain ki un ke brِaazm mein sarmaya kaari ki koi siyasi sharait nahi hain
is moqay par saddar she jin ping naay chain ki janib se Africa  mein 60 arab dollar ki taraqiyati mansoobon mein mazeed sarmaya kaari ka elaan bhi kya
wazeh rahay ke chain par ghair mulki satah par bohat ziyada qarzon se ldi sarmaya kaari karne ke hawalay se tanqeed ki ja chuki hai
saddar she ne yeh elaan do roza chain
Africa  sarbarahi ijlaas ke aaghaz par kya jis mein tavajja ka markaz un ka one belt one road mansoobah hai
yaad rahay ke 60 arab dollar ki mazkoorah sarmaya kaari chain ki janib se 2015 mein Africa  mein sarmaya kaari karne ke mansoobon se alehda hai aur yeh aindah teen saal mein ki jaye gi
one ballot one road mansoobay ka maqsad chain ki ghair mulki marketon tak rasai ko behtar karne ke sath sath aalmi satah par cheeni asar o rasookh barhana hai
chain naay asia aur Africa  mein sarkon, railway ki partriyon aur bandar gaahon par arbon dollar laga diye hain
taham naqideen ka kehna hai ke cheeni sarmaya kaari kuch mumalik ko qarzon taley dbati chalay ja rahi hai
cheeni saddar ka kehna tha ke' chain ke Africa  ke sath taawun ka wazeh hadaf taraqiyati kamon mein haail masail ko khatam karna hai
hamaray taawun ke wasail ko kisi shahana mansoobon mein nahi lagaya jana balkay unhein wahan lagana hai jahan un ka sab se ziyada qaida sun-hwa

un ka kehna tha ke one belt one road koi bock ya makhsoos club bananay ki koshish nahi hai
