hai ab science danon ney is sorat e haal ki wajah bta di hai di mirror ke mutabiq Bartania  ke امپیرئیل college health care trust ke science danon ney jadeed tahaqeeq mein bataya hai ke mardon mein banjh pan ki sharah bherne ki wajah aaj kal ka jadeed life stayl hai jo mardon ke سپرمز par intahi manfi asraat muratab kar raha hai tehqiqati team ke sarbarah jonathn رمسے ka kehna tha ke mardon ke banjh honay ki chand barri wajohaat mein cigrette noshi motapa jinsi amal mein raghbat kho dena sharaab aur deegar manshiat ki latt waghera shaamil hain un tamam awamil ko dekha jaye to un mein se beshtar ka talluq aaj ke jadeed tarz e amal se jora ja sakta hai agar mard cigrette noshi tark kar den apna motapa kam karne par tavajja den shareek hayaat ke sath baqaidagi ke sath khalwat ke lamhaat guzaraian sharaab noshi waghera tark kar den avrgrm pani se nahana kam karkay –apne jism ko thanda rakhna shuru kar den to un ke سپرمز ka miyaar bohat behtar ho sakta hai Pakistan  ke wazeer e azam tarjeeh den ge Imran  Khan  ney wazarat Uzma ka ohda sambhalnay ke baad –apne pehlay doray ke liye Saudi  arab ka hi intikhab kya tha aur doray ke baad wazeer it-tila-aat Fawad  chohadry ne Islamabad mein press conference se khitaab karte hue kaha tha ke Saudi  arab woh pehla malik hai jisay Pakistan  ne chain aur Pakistan  ke darmain jari mansoobay si pack mein teesra partners ban'nay dawat di hai taham baad mein hukoomat ne –apne muaqqaf ko tabdeel kya tha lekin Saudi  arab ke aik aala satah ne Pakistan  ka dora kya tha taakay sarmaya kaari ke mansoobon par baat ho sakay aur is wafad ne Gwadar  ka dora bhi kya tha lekin is doray ke baad dono mumalik ke ردمیان sarmaya kaari ya imdadi package ke baaray mein koi wazeh elaan nahi kya gaya tha beijing ( aayi an pi shnhwa ) chain mein internet masnoaat ki aalmi numayesh 2018 ka iftitah chain ke soobah jayang so ke shehar ووشی mein sun-hwa chain ki wizarat sanat aur information technology wizarat science o technology aur soobah jayang so ki awaami hukoomat ne mushtarqa tor par mojooda numayesh ka ihtimaam kya نمائشکا mauzo hai nai digital maeeshat aur internet ka naya ehad numayesh ke douran cheeni ashya ki internet taraqqi ki salana report ka ajra bhi kya gaya report ke mutabiq 2017 se le kar cheeni ashya ki internet market haqeeqi maino mein taraqqi ke marhalay mein daakhil hochuki hai poooray saal ke douran market ki bha rati media ke mta bq yeh ba t- ada ka reh ne aik da nas reality شومقابلہ mein is waqt kahi jab maqa bala mein shareek aik umeed waar ne apni dance par فارمنسکو aankhon mein آنسوؤ n kaisa th apni ma n ke liye waqf karte hue kaha ke usay pachtaawa hai ke is ne apni ma n ko nazar اندازکیا aur to j_h nahi di, jis par ma dho ree Dixit  ne kaha kay' ' baaz اوقا t- Meer  y betay bhi mujhe nazar andaaz kar dete hain jab mein inhen bulaa ti hon, jis par mujhe sharmindagi mehsoos ho ti hai
unhon nay﻿ kaha ke darasal is duniya mein har maa –apne bachon ko mehfooz rakhna chahti hai
jab mein chuuti thi to mein ney bhi yahi kya lekin ab mein aik ma n hon aur samajh sakti hon ke yeh kaisa mehsoo seen ho taa hai
share karen : Lahore  ( numainda sports ) Bharti  adakara Shabana  aazmi Bharat  wapas chali gayeen, inhen Muniza  hashmi aur deegar muntazmeen ne vahg_h border par ’alvidah’ kiya hai
Shabana  aazmi 15 November  ko Faiz  fistyol mein shirkat ke liye –apne shohar Javed  Akhtar  ke hamrah Bharat  se Pakistan  aayi اورالحمرا hamza mein honay walay Faiz  fistyol mein shar yak huien
Bharti  shayar اورسکرپٹ writer Javed  Akhtar  ne kaha hai ke pak o hind mein har shakhs gulukar hai aur yahan geet suneney ka rujhan hai taham hum log maghrib ki andha dhund naqal karte hain
urdu zabaan intehai mushkil hai, 12 saal ki Umar  mein achi shairi ki samajh aa chuki thi, is ke bawajood kaafi baras tak shair kehnay ki himmat nah hui
Lahore  mein Faiz  international fistyol ke douran Javed  Akhtar  naay kaha ke shayar ko kabhi kabhi karvi baat bhi kohni chahiye, ashaar se logon ke imaan badal jatay hain, is par mujhe aitraaz hai
bar e sagheer pak o hind mein har shakhs gulukar hai aur yahan geet suneney ka rujhan hai jabkay maghrib mein music suneney ke liye nahi balkay dance ke liye banaya jata hai taham hum log maghrib ki andha dhund naqal karte hain
sholay aik aisi film thi jis ke tamam kirdaar aaj bhi maqbool hain
Bharti  naghma nigaar ne douran taqreeb dobarah film script likhnay ki khabar sunai jabkay un ki kitaab turkish minton mein farokht hogayi, Javed  Akhtar  Bharat  se 65 kitaaben laaye they
Javed  Akhtar  aaj Bharat  wapas jayen ge
tasweer ke copy right getty images image caption mutasirah bank neh un tamam ae tea am cards ko band kardiya hai jinhen ﮦlak karne ke baad istemaal kya gaya stit bank of Pakistan  neh haal hi mein niji habib bank ltd ki ae tea am machinon se sarfeen ki maloomat chori honay ke waqeat ka notice letay hue kaha hai ke woh habib bank ki intizamia ke sath mil kar sarfeen ki raqum lotane ke liye kaam kar rahay hain
stit bank of Pakistan  ke hakkaam ke mutabiq guzashta mah niji bank habib bank ltd ke bank accounts ko ae tea am ( آٹومیٹڈ tailor machine ) cards ke zariye heiek kar liya gaya aur ab tak un waqeat mein bank ke 296 Sarif  mutasir hue hain
un sarfeen ke accounts se kal aik crore do laakh rupay chori kiye gaye hain
taham abhi taq wifaqi tehqiqati agency yani f aayi ae ko is baray mein bank ki janib se koi shikayat masool nahi hui
yeh bhi padhiye ae tea am hikng : 26 laakh churanay par teen afraad ko jail' Amrici  hukoomat ney aalmi banking ke nizaam ko hik kya' yahoo par cyber hamlay se 1 arab sarfeen mutasir bi bi si urdu se baat karte hue f aayi ae mein cyber crimes ke director captain retired Mohammad  Shoiab  ney kaha hai ke is baarey mein abhi sirf social media ya muqami khabar rasan idaron se hi maloomat haasil ho rahi hain
' bank hamein bazabta shikayat darj karaye ga is ke baad hi tehqiqaat ka aaghaz ho sakay ga '
doosri janib bank doulat Pakistan  ki janib se jari kardah bayan ke mutabiq mutasirah bank nay﻿ un tamam ae tea am cards ko band kar diya hai jinhen heiek karne ke baad istemaal kya gaya, jabkay mutasirah sarfeen ko yeh raqam wapas karne ke amal ka aaghaz bhi kar diya gaya hai
ae tea am سکیمنگ ya fraud mein hota kya hai? wazeh rahay ke ae tea am سکیمنگ ya fraud aik aisa amal hai jis mein ae tea am card ki maqnateesi patti par mojood tamam ahem data chori kar liya jata hai
is ke liye machine mein card pocket mein skinr nasb kya jata hai
is ke sath ae tea am machine ke' ki pad' par aik aur ki pad nasb kya jata hai jo woh khufia pin code mehfooz kar laita hai jo card istemaal karne ke liye Sarif  machine mein daakhil karta hai
is ke ilawa khufia camera bhi nasb kya jata hai
mahireen ke mutabiq yeh maloomat kisi bhi dosray card par ba aasani muntaqil ki ja sakti hain jo duniya ke kisi bhi hissay mein bank account se paisay chori karne ke liye istemaal kya ja sakta hai
ahteyati tadabeer aayi tea aur security se mutaliq ashaat o tashheer se wabasta aayi tea maahir abdullah Saad  ne bi bi si se baat karte hue kaha ke Pakistan  mein ab debt aur credit card ke istemaal mein khasa izafah sun-hwa hai, jis ki wajah se guzashta chand saloon mein duniya ke deegar mumalik ki terhan Pakistan  aisay hikrz ki tavajja haasil kar raha hai
abdullah Saad  ke mutabiq kisi bhi Sarif  ke liye yeh khasa mushkil hai ke woh yeh jaanch saken ke un ke zair istemaal ae tea am machine par data chori karne ke liye koi aala nasb kya gaya hai taham woh sarfeen ko chand ahteyati tadabeer zaroor dete hain : 1. aisi ae tea am mashinen jahan aam tor par rush rehta hai, wahan سکیمنگ ka khatrah ziyada hota hai
is liye inhen istemaal karne se guraiz karna chahiye
2. agar aap kisi ae tea am machine ko baqaidagi se istemaal karte hain to machine par mojood kisi bhi tabdeeli ko nazar andaz nah karen, aisi machine par card hargiz istemaal nah karen, aur mutaliqa bank ko ittila den
3. bank ke sath ya bank ke andar mojood ae tea am mashinen nisbatan mehfooz hoti hain
5. Sarif  do accounts rakhen, jin mein se aik account ka ae tea am ya dibt card jari karwaen aur is account mein sirf zaroorat ke mutabiq raqam rakhen
taakay hacking honay ki soorat mein bhi barray nuqsaan se bacha ja sakay
abdallh Saad  yeh bhi kehte hain ke Sarif  ke paas card se raqam nikalwane ki had muqarrar karne ka ikhtiyar hona chahiye
Pakistan  mein is waqt bankon naay chobees ghanton mein ae tea am machine se pachaas hazaar rupay nikalwane ki hadd muqarrar ki hai, jo ke abdullah Saad  ke mutabiq ziyada hai
woh kehte hain ke Sarif  ke paas apna ae tea am cards' of' karne ka ikhtiyar bhi hona chahiye jaissa ke duniya ke kayi mumalik mein yeh nizaam raaij hai
is nizaam mein bhi Sarif  sirf is waqt card' aan' karta hai jab woh ae tea am machine istemaal kar raha hota hai

taiz tareen das kmpyotrz mein America  ke paanch kmpyotrz hain jabkay deegar mumalik mein soytzlind, Germany  aur Japan  bhi shaamil hain
fehrist mein 500 taiz tareen super computers mein chain ke 227 computers hain jabkay America  ke 109
taiz tareen super computers ki fehrist saal mein do baar shaya ki jati hai
taaza tareen fehrist ke mutabiq America  ke do super computer simat aur سیئیرا pehlay aur dosray number par hain
report ke mutabiq Amrici  super computer simat do laakh trilion کیلکیولیشنز fi second kar sakta hai
simat aur سیئیرا dono hi computer company aayi bi am ny tayyar kiye hain
fehrist mein kaha gaya hai ke chain ka سنوے tie ho light guzashta saal sab se taiz tareen super computer tha
taham is saal ki fehrist mein yeh teesray number par hai
is ke ilawa chouthay number par bhi chain hi ka super computer hai

super computers ki taizi' petta flop' mein gani jati hai
aik flop ko aap کیلکیولیشنز mein aik operation ya qadam ke tor par samajh satke hain
aik petta flop ka matlab aik skind mein aik hazaar kharab operations hota hai

super computers se liye jaaane kamon ki chand misalon mein mosmyati tabdeeli ke jaizay, johri hathyaaron ki سیمیولیشنز, tail ke zakhair ki khoj, mausam ki haal ki pishgoyyan, DNAe سیکونسنگ waghera shaamil hain

hai is baat ka inkishaaf New York mein waqay university of buffalo ny kya hai jis ki tafseelaat american journal of فزیالوجی ke zeli journal mein shaya hui hai garam mahol mein werzish se gurdon ki janib khoon ka bahao kam hojata hai lekin gurday is kami ko jheel jatay hain taham baaz tajarbaat mein dekha gaya hai ke agar gurday ko khoon ki farahmi mein numaya kami hojaye to is se acute Kidney injury ( ae ke aayi ) ka khatrah barh jata hai kyunkay khoon ki farahmi kam honay se khud oxygen ki farahmi mutasir hoti hai lekin soft drinks ka istemaal is mein intehai ajeeb aur pareshan kin kirdaar ada karta hai mahireen ne ausatan 24 baras ke 12 sahet nama nojawanon ko bharti kya pehlay inhen dornay ki machine par 30 minute werzish karai gayi aur is ke baad aik khait mein teen werzish jaisay kaam kurwaye jo 15 minute taweel they is ke baad har nojawan ko cheeni aur caffeine se bharpoor 16 oons soft drink ya saada pani diya gaya is ke baad aik ghantay ka yeh amal kal chaar martaba ulti gayi aur soft drink walon ko pani aur pani walon ko soft drink pilayi gayi mahireen naay werzish se qabal is ke darmain mein aur aakhir mein tamam shrka ke khoon dil darjah hararat blood pressure aur deegar test liye gaye to maloom sun-hwa ke gurday ko mutasir karne wali ae ke aayi ke بایومارکر blood pressure badhaane walay hormone aur deegar muzir chemical mein izafah sun-hwa hai isi terhan nuqsaan pounchanay ka andesha hota hai taham mahireen naay kaha hai ke yeh mutalea bohat chhootay pemanay par kya gaya hai jis ke nataij kaafi nahi taham is se yeh zaroor maloom sun-hwa hai ke werzish ke baad soft drink ke sahet par manfi asraat muratab hotay hain tasweer ke copy right twitter / hayabusa2 @ jaxa image caption aik khalayi gaari ne syarche ki satah se yeh tasweer bhaije hai Japan  ke khalayi idaray ne aik syarche par do robot gariyaan utaar kar nai tareekh raqam kar di hai aur ab robot gariyaan sayaray ki satah ki tasaveer zameen taq bhaij rahi hain
yeh dono gariyaan ہایابوسا-2 Nami  khalayi jahaaz se sayarchay se bhaije gayeen jo 1 Kilometer choray sayarchay' ریوگو' ke gird chakkar kaat raha hai
yeh gariyaan syarche ka darja hararat ناپیں gi aur is ki taswerain len ge
ریوگو ki kshshِ saqal bohat kam hai jis ki wajah se yeh gariyaan wahan aasani se uchhal bhi sakti hain
isi baarey mein japani robot syarche par utrney ke qareeb japani khalayi idaray ney haftay ko tasdeeq ki ke' dono gariyaan achi haalat mein hain, syarche par chal phir kar rahi hain aur taswerain le rahi hain
' ہایابوسا-2 is saal June  mein saarhay teen saal ke safar ke baad 32 crore kilometer daur ریوگو syarche taq pouncha tha
is ki ahmiyat kya hai? is se qabal Europi  khalayi idaara aik dumdar setaaray par khalayi gaari utaar chuka hai, lekin yeh pehla mauqa hai ke kisi syarche par gaari utari gayi hai
sayarchay bunyadi tor par nizam shamsi ki baqiyat mein se hain
chaar arab 60 crore saal pehlay jo bacha khicha mawaad sayyaron aur Sooraj  ke ban'nay mein kaam nah aa saka, is se syarche ban gaye
ریوگو khasi qadeem qisam ka sayarcha hai, aur is par tehqeeq se nizam shamsi ke ibtidayi halaat aur zameen ki tashkeel ke baaray mein maloomat haasil ho saken gi
1 Kilograme wazni khalayi gariyon mein vayid angle aur stiryo camera nasb hain jin se woh tasaveer le kar wapas zameen taq bhaij rahay hain
is ke ilawa un mein sensor bhi lagey hue hain jo syarche ki satah ka darjah hararat naap satke hain
yeh gariyaan motoron ki madad se chal phir sakti hain
sayarchay ki satah siyah hai aur yeh har saarhay saat ghantay baad –apne mehwar par ghoomta hai
teen october ko ہایوبوسا-2 khalayi jahaaz khud sayarchay ki satah par utare ga aur wahan se matti aur patharon ke namoonay haasil kere ga
is ke baad science daan ریوگو ki satah mein sorakh kar ke neechay se bhi namoonay haasil karne ki koshish karen ge
baad mein khalayi jahaaz yeh namoonay 2020 mein zameen par le aaye ga taakay un par mazeed tehqeeq ki ja sakay
Mumbai  ( web disk ) bollywood ke legend adakar dilip kumar aur un ki ahliya syra Bano  Bharti  filmon ke king Shah  rukh Khan  kwapna saga beta mante hain taham is ke peechay aik khaas wajah hai
legend adakar dilip kumar aaj apni 96 win saalgirah mnarhe hain, 11 decemeber 1922 ko Pakistan  ke shehar Peshawar  mein Mohammad  Yousuf  ke naam se janam lainay walay dilip kumar ka rishta bollywood king Shah  rukh Khan  se be had khaas hai
dilip kumar aur syra Bano  ki koi aulaad nahi hai lekin woh Shah  rukh Khan  ko –apne sage betay ki terhan chahtay hain taham is ke peechay aik khaas wajah hai jis ka zikar syra Bano  nay﻿ aik interview ke douran kya tha
guzashta baras aik interview ke douran adakara syra Bano  ney Shah  rukh Khan  se pehli mulaqaat ka ahwaal batatay hue kaha tha ke jab Shah  rukh Khan  ney pehli film' dil aashna' sign ki thi to hamari ( meri aur dilip sahib ki ) un se mulaqaat hui thi mein hamesha dilip sahib se kehti hon ke agar hamara koi beta hota to bilkul Shah  rukh jaissa hota kyunkay Shah  rukh Khan  aur dilip sahib ke baal bilkul aik jaisay hain, yahi wajah hai ke jab bhi mein Shah  rukh se millti hon to un ke balon mein ungelian پھیرتی hon
jab woh dilip sahib ko dekhnay aeye thay to unhon nay﻿ poocha tha ke aaj aap mere balon mein ungelian nahi pheren gi Shah  rukh ki yeh baat sun kar mujhe bohat khoshi hui
doosri janib Shah  rukh Khan  bhi dilip kumar ko –apne waalid ki terhan mante hain aur un se be had mohabbat karte hain
Shah  rukh Khan  naay aik interview ke douran بتایاتھا ke woh bachpan se hi dilip sahib ko jantay hain dilip sahib aur mere waalid dono dili ki aik hi gali mein rehtay they
bachpan mein mein dilip sahib se kayi baar mlatha, mera aur un ka aik jazbati rishta hai
Shah  rukh Khan  naay interview ke douran aik waqea batatay hue kaha tha ke bohat saal baad jab mein naay aik a? fes mein dilip kumar ki jawani ki tasweer dekhi to kaha arrey yeh to mein hon tasweer mein woh kaafi hadd taq meri terhan dukh rahay they ya yeh kahoon ke mein un ki terhan dukh rhatha lekin dilip sahib ke sath میرارشتہ is se kahin barh kar hai
dilip sahib aur syra jee ne hamesha mujhe –apne betay ki terhan samgha hai
wazeh rahay ke adakar dilip kumar ki 96 win saalgirah ke mauqa par bollywood ke shenshah Amitabh  bachchan sameit un ke chahanay walay un ke liye naik khwahisaat aur shtyabi ki dua kar rahay hain
share karen : Michael  Jackson  ke Pakistani  madahon ke liye achi khabar hai ke un ke mobayyana betay brandon hovered jald Pakistan  ayen ge aur concert mein perform karen ge
jadeed moseeqi ke badshah Michael  Jackson  2009 mein –apne madahon ko afsurdah chore gaye lekin un ke naghmay aur dhnin ab bhi lahoo grmati hain aur poop moseeqi ke dildada afraad ko –apne sehar mein mubtala kar deti hain
Michael  Jackson  ke intqaal ke baad 2014 woh saal hai jis nay﻿ Michael  Jackson  ke madahon mein nai zindagi phoonk di thi, iss saal aik nojawan nay﻿ sab ko mabhoot kar ke rakh diya tha, yeh nojawan shakal, andaz guftagu aur hatta ke chalne phirnay ke andaaz se bhi Michael  Jackson  lagta hai
brandon hovered ko Michael  Jackson  se mamaslat ki wajah se aalmi media mein bharpoor courage mili, madahon ko aisa mehsoos sun-hwa jaisay Michael  Jackson  live perform kar rahay hon
dekhte hi dekhte hovered ke har ganay ko maqboliat aur har dhun ko be panah paziirai milnay lagi
duniya bhar mein kamyaab knsrt ke baad haal hi mein –apne aik interview mein hovered naay Pakistan  anay ki khushkhabri sunai hai, Michael  Jackson  ki شبہیہ aur mobayyana betay Pakistan  aarahay hain aur ab Pakistani  madah bhi Michael  Jackson  ke Partu  ko live performance karte hue dekh saken ge
brandon hovered gulukar honay ke sath sath record saaz producer hain jo –apne ganay bhi khud likhte hain
un ka album un maai words ne bharpoor kamyabi smiti aur 2006 mein kamyabi ke jhnde garhe
2007 mein fees of ney madahon ko apna deewana bana diya aur hovered ke naghmay don’t se you lau ?me ney 2016 mein tehelka macha diya tha
Karachi  25 November  ( siyasat dot com ) Pakistani  cricket team coach miki arthur naay bayan diya hai ke Pakistani  cricket team ko douran khail sakht zehni dabao se nikaalte ke liye kisi khelon ke maahir nafsiat se rujoo karna zurori hai taakay un ki zehni madad ki jaye lekin herat ki baat hai ke captain Sarfraz  Ahmed  la ilm hain ke kis terhan aik khelon ke maahir nafsiat team ko zehni dabao se nikaal sakta hai unhon naay khayaal zahir kya ke mein naay is baarey mein suna hai lekin woh kis terhan khiladion ko zehni dabao se nijaat dila satke hain samajh se bahar hai lekin yeh aik haqeeqat hai ke hamaray ballay baz aik taweel ining khailnay se ghabra jatay hain aur –apne hadaf ko poora karne se qassar ho jatay hain Sarfraz  Ahmed  nay﻿ kaha ke un ke ballay bazoo ko is aadat ko tark karna zaroori hai jo vkts ko jama dainay ke baad vkts ko pheink dete hain arthur jo 2016ء se team ke coach hain pehlay tst mein newzea land ke sath sirf 4 runs ki shikast par tabsarah karte hue kaha ke Pakistani  team ke liye sab se bara masla un ka zehni dabao hai jis ka hal dhoond nikalna bohat zaroori hai yeh pehla mauqa nahi hai ke Pakistani  team ke liye nafsiati ilaaj ki baat kahi gayi hai balkay maazi mein bhi is terhan ke sawalaat uthaye gay they ke team ko khelon ke maahir nafsiat se rujoo kya jaye taakay zehni dabao ka ilaaj kya jasakay desk : ail jee ki janib se January  ke shuru mein las wegas mein schedule si ای s Nami  technology numayesh mein ke series ke chaar phones aur ail jee اسٹائلو three paish karne ka faisla kya hai
un mein se beshtar phones mein android نوگٹ operating system mojood hai
yeh phones 4. 5? inch se 5?. 3 inch tak hon ge
sab se chuti screen wala phone 2 mega pixel front camera, 5 mega pixel back camera, 2100 am ae each battery aur android marsh meelo operating system ke sath hai
5. 3 inch screen wala ke 10 ka front camera 5 mega pixel jabkay back camera 13 mega pixel hai
isi terhan 2800 am ae each battery aur android نوگٹ operating system bhi is ka hissa hain
ail jee اسٹائلو three 5. 7 inch display, 13 mega pixel back aur aath mega pixel front camera par mushtamil hai jabkay f am radio bhi is mein diya gaya hai
un phones ki qeematein abhi samnay nahi ayen taham yeh kaafi had taq sastay honay ka imkaan hai
roos mein police nay﻿ –apne hi dost ka jism kaat kar khoon peenay walay shakhs ko girftar karliya roos ke shehar چیلیا buns ke اورسلز city hspta l- se 36 sala shakhs bors کونڈراشین ko girftar kya gaya bors par ilzaam hai ke is nay﻿ doctriat ki jaali degree aur jaali kaghzat ki bana par guzashta baras November  mein hspta l- mein mulazmat haasil ki is ke ilawa bors par –apne school ke dost aur classe fellow ka jism kaat kar is ka khoon peenay ke ilzaam bhi hai ghair mulki khabar-rasan idaray ke mutabiq 1998 mein bors nay﻿ –apne 16 sala dost ko markr is ka khoon pi liya tha report mein yeh bhi bataya gaya ke bors کونڈراشین khud ko ویمپائرکہتا hai چیلیا buns city hspta l- ki sehat ke shobay ki sarbarah نتالیا گورلوا ne media ko bataya ke کونڈراشین ko primaray care dr ki hesiyat se hspta l- mein mulazmat di gayi thi aur iss ka kaam logon ko is baat ki janib mael karna tha ke log cigrette aur sharaab noshi ko chore kar werzish ki aadat ko apnayen unhon ne bors ke mulazmat ke tajarbay ke baaray mein batatay hue kaha ke hum ne un ke tajarbay ke hawalay se ziyada jaanch is liye nahi ki kyunkay bors ne –apne zaroori kaghzat hi nahi diye unhon ne kaha ke kisi wajah se is ke kaghzat 27 September  2018 hamza ) duniya ka maqbool tareen search engine Google  rawan mah apni 20 win saalgirah ka jashnn mana raha hai jis ke liye guzashta roz khusoosi aynimitd video doodle paish kya gaya kisi bhi cheez ki maloomat haasil karne ke liye aaj har shakhs Google  ka mohtaaj hai, yahi wajah hai ke Google  ko 20 baras se be shumaar sarfeen istemaal kar rahay hain
yun to Google  ko official tor par 4 September  1998 hamza ko muta-arif kya gaya tha lekin company ki janib se is ki saalgirah har saal 27 September  ko manayi jati hai guzashta roz Google  ka doodle اینیمیٹد video mein tabdeel kya gaya hai, jis mein angrezi huroof ke ghubaare banaye gaye hain khusoosi aynimitd doodle video 1 minute 37 second par mushtamil hai jis mein munfarid zabanon mein woh sab dekhaya gaya hai, jisay sarfeen search karte hain, jaisay khelon ki maloomat, tasaveer, khanay peenay ki ashya ki maloomat aur جفز waghera aynimitd video ke aakhir mein Google  ney mukhtalif zabanon mein sarfeen ka shukriya bhi ada kya
wazeh rahay ke Google  ka aaghaz اسٹینڈفورڈ university ke do tlba liri page aur srgi burn ne kya tha, jin ka maqsad aik aisa system tayyar karna tha jis se logon ko ba aasani har cheez ki maloomat haasil hosakin
Google  company ki janib se har baras yeh koshish hoti hai ke woh sarfeen ko ziyada se ziyada behtar service faraham karen aur yahi wajah hai ke Google  mein gahe bagahay mutadid features bhi shaamil hotay rehtay hain
Google  is waqt 150 zayed se ziyada zabanon aur 190 se bhi zayed mumalik mein istemaal kya jaany wala search engine hai
guzashta mah, insta gram ney sarfeen ke qareebi doston ka khayaal karte hue aisa feature muta-arif karwaya hai jis se sarfeen –apne doston ke qareeb tar ho jayen ge aur dosray logon se daur
naya fichr jis ka naam ayko maai space hai ke zariye sarfeen ko –apne doston ki aik aisi list dukhaay gi jahan sarfeen ko doston ki posts ko like, comments aur share karne walon ki tafseel nazar aaye gi
ab insta gram sarfeen ko profayl ke meino ke andar close friend muntakhib karne ka option bhi day ga jis ke baad sarfeen ko qareebi dost ko muntakhib karne mein aasani ho gi

haal hi mein mahireen ney aik aisa robot tayyar kya hai jo fzamin jamna stuck khilari ki terhan qlabazyan khanay aur khatar naak assistant dikhaane ka kaam baasani karsaktha hai
yeh project dzni company ney kya hai, is par وجیکٹ par company kayi dahaiyo se kaam kar rahi thi
usay' ' اسٹنٹرونکس' ' ka naam diya gaya hai
aik report ke mutabiq is robot ko bananay ka faisla stick mean piro jacket ke douran kya gaya tha
stick mean robot bhi fiza mein chhlangin laganay ka kartab dikhaane ke liye banaya gaya tha, taa hum yeh dekhnay mein aik chhari ki tar h lagta tha
mahireen ka kehna hai ke astik mean ki kamyabi se aisay insani shakal walay robots bananay ka khayaal aaya jo fiza میںاچھلتے kodtay khatar naak kartab dikha sakay
is ki kha s baat yeh hai ke yeh hungami soorat ِhal mein imdadi kamon mein bhi istemaal ho sakta hai

tauseef ke liye nahi kheltaa mera khail sirf –apne malik aur team ke liye hota hai aur mujhe is baat par fakhr hai ke mein ney kayi bain al aqwami tornamnts mein apni team aur malik ko fatah se hum kinar karaya science danon ney burhapay ya burhapay ki bimarion se bachanay wali anti biotic dawa tayyar karne ka daawa kar diya hai tehqeeq ke mutabiq ایزیتھرومائیسن Nami  anti biotic insani jism mein mojood nakara sale khatam kar ke naye sahet mand sale bananay ki salahiyat rakhti hai Bartania  ki سیلفرڈ university mein ki jaaney wali aik tahaqeeq mein daawa kya gaya hai ke ایزیتھرومائیسن Nami  anti biotic burhapay ki asraat ko kum karne mein Muawin  saabit hosakti hai is inqalabi drug ke zariye insani jism mein puranay aur nakara sales ko khatam karkay naye avrsht mand sales peda kiye jasaktay hain tahaqeeq ke mutabiq zaeef sales hi cancer dil ke amraaz aur ڈیمینشیا jaisi bimarion ka sabab bantay hain taham nai anti biotic se puranay sales khatam karkay burhapay ke asraat khatam kiye jasaktay hain New York ( web disk ) social media app Facebook naay انسٹاگرام wats app aur Facebook messenger services ko zam karne ka faisla kya hai it-tila-aat ke mutabiq Facebook ke baani mark زکربرگ is mansoobay mein zaati tor par dilchaspi le rahay hain aur fi al haal yeh mansoobah ibtidayi marahil mein hai takmeel ke baad Facebook messenger wats app aur انسٹاگرام bunyadi tor par to alehda appli kishnz hi rahen ge taham un tenu appli kishnz ke messenger aapas mein zam ho jaien ge yani Facebook messenger istemaal karne wala Sarif  sirf wats app ya انسٹاگرام istemaal karne walay Sarif  ko bhi msg kar sakay ga fi al haal aisa mumkin nahi hai aur Facebook messenger se sirf messenger par mojood shakhs ko hi pegham bheja ja sakta hai Amrici  akhbar New York times ke mutabiq tenu ایپس ke messaging services ko zam karne ka amal shuru hochuka hai aur imkaan hai ke yeh mansoobah 2019 ke aakhir ya 2020 ke awail mein mukammal hojaye ga Facebook ke baani mark زکربرگ ki khwahish hai ke Facebook messenger wats app aur insta gram ki messaging services ko zam kardiya jaye inhen pehlay se ziyada mo sr banaya jaye taakay log pehlay se ziyada waqt un ایپس par guzaar saken Facebook ki janib se jari bayan ke mutabiq company ki khwahish ke ke pegham rasani ke tajarbay ko behtar se behtar banaya jaye kyun ke log pegham rasani ko taiz aassan bharoosay mand aur mehfooz dekhna chahtay hain bayan mein kaha gaya ke hum –apne میسنجنگ products ko mehfooz tar aur aassan bananay ke liye kaam kar rahay hain taakay sarfeen un tenun net works par –apne doston aur rishta daaron ke sath aasani se raabtey mein reh saken share karen : chain ney America  ke is ilzaam ke si pack ki badolat Pakistan  ki maeeshat bohraan zada ho gayi hai mustard karte hue kaha hai ke si pack ka Pakistan  ki sharah numoo mein rawan saal 2.5 feesad hissa raha, bohat se taraqqi Pazeer  mumalik ney cheeni taawun ka kher muqaddam kya hai, America cheeni taawun ko durust نظرئے y se dekhe, America  dost mumalik baaray ghair zimma daarana bayanaat se guraiz kere, cheeni taawun ki badolat khittay mein khushhali aur istehkaam aaya hai, chain taraqqi Pazeer  mumalik ko mansoobon ke zariye karzzzz ke jaal mein nahi jakar raha, karzzzz mamooli aur mansoobon mein sarmaya kaari ziyada hai
tafseelaat ke mutabiq chain ki wizarat kharja ke tarjuman lau کھانگ naay kaha hai ke chain America  ke is ilzaam ko yaksar mustard karta hai jis mein mayik pains naay kaha tha ke si pack ke qarzon ki badolat Pakistani  maeeshat ki haalat kharab hai aur Pakistan  maali bohraan ka shikaar sun-hwa hai
unhon nay﻿ kaha ke Amrici  ilzaam ke Bar  aks si pack ka Pakistan  ki sharah numoo mein rawan saal 2.5 feesad hissa raha hai
tarjuman ne kaha ke yaad rahay ke Pakistani  wazeer khazana Asad  Umar  ne bhi America  ke si pack par ilzamaat ko yaksar mustard kar diya tha
taraqqi Pazeer  mumalik cheeni taawun ko qader ki nigah se dekhte hain aur cheeni taawun ka kher muqaddam karte hain
America  cheeni taawun par tanqeed ki bajaye –apne نظرئے y ko durust kere taakay usay maloom ho ke khittay mein khushhali aur istehkaam ka sabab chain ka taawun hai
America  ko chahiye ke aisay ghair zimma daarana bayanaat se guraiz kere
لوکھانگ ne mamool ki press breifing mein kaha ke aisa hi ilzaam Amrici  wazeer difaa james meets ne dora vitnam ke douran kaha ke chain taraqqi Pazeer  mumalik ko mansoobon ke zariye karzzzz mein jakar raha hai jab ke yeh mehez ilzaam hai aur haqayiq ke manafi hai
aadav shumaar ka jaiza liya jaye to maloom parta hai ke mukhtalif mansoobon mein sarmaya kaari ziyada aur karzzzz intahi mamooli hai
chain nay﻿ hamesha dost mumalik ki taraqqi mein taawun kya hai aur awam ki bhalai aur khushhali ke mansoobon par sarmaya kaari ki hai
chain ko apna اثظرو rasookh badhaane ki zaroorat nahi hai
chain chhootey mumalik ki mushkilaat samjhta hai aur hamesha taawun ke liye amaada rehta hai
2017 mein Srilanka par cheeni qarza ghair mulki qarzay ka 10 feesad tha
isi terhan philippine par bhi ghair mulki qarzon ki nisbat intehai mamooli tha
hum America  se mtalb_h karte hain ke woh cheeni taawun ko misbet nazron se dekhe

karne ki yaqeen dehani par hum ne doray ke liye apni team bhejnay par razamandi zahir kar di hai unhon ne kaha ke hum –apne squad ki hifazat ke liye izafi security dasta bhi bhejen ge aymrjng asia cupp mein Bangladesh ki team group bi mojood hai jahan is ka muqaabla maizban Pakistan  mutahidda arab amarat aur haank kaang se ho ga group ae ke matches ki maizbani Srilanka kere ga jahan mein Amman hue unhein ahteyati tadabeer ikhtiyar karne ka kaha hai x d are Nami  tayifayid ki is qisam ke baray mein 2016 mein maloom sun-hwa tha jab soobah Sindh  ke do ilaaqon lateef abad aur Qasim  abad mein is bemari ke chand cases report hue thay aagha Khan  university aur Bartania  ki cambridge university ke tibbi mahireen ki tehqeeq ke mutabiq is nai qisam par bohat kam anti بائیوٹکس asar karti hain aur yeh dobarah خوبخود janam le layte hai Amrici  idaray centers far diseases control and prevention yani si d si ki janib se jari honay walay notice mein kaha gaya hai ke janoobi asia Bashmool  Pakistan  safar karne walon ko apni sahet ke hawalay se ahteyati tadabeer ikhtiyar karni chahain jin mein tayifayid ki vaccine lagwana shaamil hai si d si ke mutabiq un ilaqon ke, jin mein is qisam ke tayifayid ke cases report ho chuke hain safar karne walon ko chahiye ke woh khoraak aur pani ke hawalay se Hadayat  par amal karen is barey mein aagha Khan  university se wabsta taher yosfzyi ny bi bi si ko bataya ke November  2016 mein is tayifayid ke barey mein maloom honay ke baad is par tahaqeeq ki gayi jis se mazeed pata chala ke is bemari ke jaraseem paanch anti biotic ke khilaaf muzahmat karte hain taher yousifzai ke mutabiq yeh bhi maloom sun-hwa hai ke is bemari se mutasir honay walon mein ziyada tadaad chhootay bachon ki hai, aur bachon ke liye jo vaccine is waqt mojood thi woh aalmi idaara sahet se Manzoor  shuda nahi thi taham unhon nay﻿ kaha ke jaisay hi aalmi idaara sahet nay﻿ nai type baar TV si vaccine ki manzoori di to usay hyderabad ke ilaqay lateef abad aur Qasim Pakistan  mein chaine gay ya asmgl mobile phones ko bock karne ke liye jadeed tareen nizaam device آئیڈینٹی fikishn registration and bollockings system ( d aayi are bi s ) ko muta-arif kara diya gaya hai
tally kaam policy 2015 ke zirtht Pakistan  tally commutation atharti ( pi tea ae ) ne yeh nizaam muta-arif karaya gaya hai jis par mobile phone diwaysz ki registration hosakay gi, jabkay chhin janay walay, jaali ya asmgl phones ki shanakht aur inhen bock karna bhi mumkin hoga
mazeed parheen : mobile phone companiyon ke woh code jo sab ke liye janna zurori pi tea ae head quarters Islamabad mein d aayi are bi s ka iftitah kya gaya aur is mauqa par chairman pi tea ae Mohammad  Naveed  ne kaha ke is nizaam ke nifaz se ghair mayaari, jaali, ghairqanooni tor par daraamad shuda mobile phones ki shanakht, registration aur mobile phone net works par nan complaint diwaysz ki ghair qanooni daraamad ki hosla shikni, qanooni draamdat aur mobile device istemaal knndgan aur security ki majmoi soorat e haal mein behtari aaye gi
pi tea ae hakkaam ka kehna tha ke is nizaam ki badolat chori shuda phones ko hamesha ke liye band kya jaye ga jabkay mobile service ka miyaar bhi behtar hoga
is nizaam ko ko jee s am ae data bees ke sath munsalik kya gaya hai aur pehlay marhalay mein chori aur gum shuda diwaysz ko bock kya jaye ga
chairman pi te ae ka daawa tha ke is nizaam ki badolat malik mein mobile chori ya cheenney ki wardaton ka khtama hoga, balkay un ka khoj laganay mein bhi madad miley gi
yeh bhi padhan : Google  ke is khufia fichr se apna gumshudaa phone dhunden is nizaam ke dosray marhalay mein un diwaysz ki چانچ partaal ki jaye gi jo is waqt sarfeen ke istemaal mein hain
wazeh rahay ke device very fikishn system ( d v s ) se pi tea ae rigolishnz ke mutabiq sarfeen dirbs. pta. gov. pk se –apne phone ki aayi am ای aayi 8484 par s am s karkay mobile diwaysz ki tasdeeq kar saktay hain ya Google  aur Apple  pallay stor se d are bi s android mobile app down load kar saktay hain
Dubai  13 اکٹوبر ( siyasat dot com ) Pakistani  cricket team ke ہیڈکوچ muki aarthr ney Australia  ko dosray test ke liye khatarnaak team qarar day diya hai aur kaha ke maheman team ney jis terhan match dara kya is se khatray ki ghanti baj gayi hai astrilya ney Pakistan  ke khilaaf pehlay test mein 462 runs ke taqub mein 8 wicket par 362 runs score kiye aur match ko dara kya aur Pakistan  ke liye khatray ki ghanti بجادی aarthr ney mazeed kaha ke Australia  ney jis terhan wapsi ki woh qabil tareef hai mukhalif team dosray tst mein Pakistan  ke khilaaf mushkilaat khari kar sakti hai lehaza inhen poori tayari kay sath abbu zhbi test khelna hoga unhon ne kaha ke Dubai  tst mein pehli ining mein batsmanon ne aaccha score karkay bolron ke liye kaam aaasaaan kya lekin aakhri ki do wickten nah lainay par afsos hai Pakistan  team yeh match jeet sakti thi Wahab  Riaz  ke bajaye abbas aur yasir se panchwin din ki subah bowling krwani chahiye thi yeh baat Sarfraz  ko btai thi aglay test mein imam Al Haq  ka nah khelna nuqsaan hai lekin kisi aur nojawan ko mauqa miley ga London  ( web desk ) log bilkhushoos khawateen khobsorat aur kam Umar  nazar anay ke liye mehngi krimin aur mask waghera istemaal karti hain lekin ab سکن care ki aik maahir khatoon ny asal Umar  se kayi saal chhootey nazar anay ka aik aisa aaasaaan tareeqa bta diya hai ke har koi is par ba aasani amal kar sakta hai di mirror ke mutabiq is maahir ka naam مکتیہے jo aik namiati سکن care company ki maalik bhi hai is ny bataya hai ke hamaray chehray par kuch aisay points hotay hain jin ki rozana sirf do minute maalish ki jaye to chand dinon mein hi aap asal Umar  se kayi saal chhootey nazar anay lagen ge mukti ny bataya ke yeh points aankhon ke ird gird mojood hain dono aankhon ke darmain ٭٭٭بھنوﺅں ke dono kono ke paas aur aankhh ke bilkul neechay 2 centi meter ke faaslay par yeh woh points hain agar mard khawateen khud –apne hathon se rozana un jaghon par do minute taq massage karen to un ke chehray par mojood zehni دباؤ aur tension ke assaar yaksar khatam ho jayen ge aur is ke nateejay mein chehra hashash bashaash ho jaye ga agar chand din is par amal kya jaye to aap apni Umar  se kayi saal chhootey lagnay lagen ge mukti ka mazeed kehna tha ke chehray par pareshani aur zehni دباؤ ke assaar hi hamein عمرسے ziyada bara bana dete hain is massage ke zariye yeh assaar hatmi tor par khatam ho سپورٹک ka ineqad kya jaye ga Japan  international ko aaprito ayjinsi جائیکا ke bayan ke mutabiq numayesh ka aaghaz 25 July  2018 ko ho ga jo 27 July  2018 ko khatam ho gi numayesh mein khelon ka cnnurdu ney tuesday, 22 may 2018 ko shaya kya. Mumbai  ( si an an ) bollywood ki ubharti hui adakara تاپسی pno ka kehna hai ke is waqt woh bollywood ki bohat si filmon mein masroof yahi wajah hai ke hollywood mein jany ki bhook nahi hai
Bharti  media reports ke mutabiq bollywood shokh chanchal adakara تاپسی pno ka film industry mein entire ke hawalay se kehna tha ke' mein nay﻿ kabhi bhi kisi film industry mein anay ka nahi socha aur nah hi koi plan tha, mera filmi duniya mein aana bas aik ajab ittafaq hi hai '
تاپسی pno ka hollywood ke hawalay se kehna hai ke دپیکا پڈوکون aur pryanka chopra jaisi adakarayin hollywood ki filmon mein adakari ka loha Manwa  chuki hain lekin mera hollywood mein jany ka koi iradah nahi hai kyun ke mein is waqt bollywood ki bohat si filmon mein masroof hon jahan mein bohat se aala krdaron mein nazar آؤں gi jab ke mein woh sab kirdaar bhi kar rahi hon jo mein socha karti thi is liye hollywood jany ki bhukhi nahi hon
تاپسی pno naay mazeed kaha ke bollywood ka hollywood se mawazna karna khush fehmi hai kyun ke Bharti  filmi sanat sahih simt mein chal rahi hai lekin hamaray paas waisay wasail nahi jo kay hollywood ke paas hain jab ke bollywood mein kisi film ko asal shakal dainay ke liye bohat sakht mushaqqat, paisa aur waqt ki zaroorat hoti hai jo kay har kisi ke bas ki baat nahi
adakara naay kaha ke mein modi hon mujhe nahi pata mein kab bollywood industry ko kher baad ke dun, agar meri filmon ko pasand nahi kya jata aur aaccha business karne mein nakaam hojati hain aur madah mujhe mazeed screen par dekhna pasand nahi karte to mein bollywood chore kar kuch aur kaam karne ka sochon gi
wazeh rahay ke bollywood nojawan adakara تاپسی pno un dinon film سورمہ, malik aur mann مرضیاں ki shooting mein masroof hain jab ke woh pink, jurwan two jaisi kayi filmon mein adakari ke johar dikha chuki hain is barray pemanay par par ائیویسی naqais se 52 million sarfeen ke naam ای mil Umar  aur deegar maloomat lake ho gayeen un wajohaat ki bana par Google  is service ko augst mein band karne ke bajaye April  mein band kar day ga Google  ne service ki bandish ke silsilay mein tareekh ka elaan –apne blog mein kya hai is mah mein doosri ba ray aisa sun-hwa hai jab Google  ne ghair qanooni tor par sarfeen ki maloomat taq rasai ka inkishaaf kya hai october mein company ny privacy nuqs maloom kya tha jis se pachaas million sarfeen mutasir hue hain Google  taizi se Google  pills ke privacy ke masail ko hal karne ki koshish kar raha hai November  mein bhi sarfeen is se mutasir hue jis ko hal karne ke baad Google  ny kaafi koshish ki Google  ke mutabiq maali maloomat aur paas words taq rasai nahi ho saki company ny yeh bhi kaha hai ke jin logo n ny ghair qanooni tareeqay se account taq rasai haasil ki hai un ke baray mein abhi taq maloom nahi ho saka yaad rahay ke Facebook ki terhan muahiday نافٹا ki jagah tey payi hai is naye tijarti smjhote ko Amrici  saddar Donald  trmp ki kamyabi qarar diya gaya hai unhon nay﻿ nai deal ke hawalay se kaha ke yeh Amrici  workers ke liye behtar mawaqay peda kere gi arjntayn ke dar-al-hakoomat byons Aires  mein is tijarti muahiday par dastakhat karne ki taqreeb ke mauqa par Donald  trmp naay kaha ke yeh aik misali samjhota hai yeh taqreeb jee twenty simat ke hashiye mein munaqqid ki gayi thi bad qismati se Pakistan  ki football team aalmi ranking mein aakhri nmbron par nzraati hai, lekin khush qismati se Pakistan  mein tayyar ki janay wali football aalmi satah par pehlay number prhe
cricket aur hockey ke ilawa Pakistani  shaiqeen football ke bhi deewany hain aur 14 June  se shuru honay walay football world cup mein un ki dilchaspi –apne urooj prhe
hum bhi football ke ishhq mein mubtala ہوکرپچھلے world cup se pehlay jahazi size ail ای d khareed chuke hain
is ka matlab yeh hai ke football world cup kahin bhi munaqqid ho Pakistani  maeeshat par is asar ضرورپڑتا hai aur jab Pakistan  mein tayyar ki gayi football bain alqwami khiladion ke peeron mein dgmgati hai to کہیںنہ kahin yeh ehsas jaag uthta hai ke is khail mein hum bhi shareek hain
Pakistani  football team world cup ke liye qualify nahi krpati مگرپاکستانی football world cupp ka final میںپہنچ jati hai, isi terhan Pakistani  khalaa mein nahi jasakay to kya ho a, roosi khalaa baz –apne sath Pakistani  foot baal bhi khalaa mein le gaye aur phir khalaa mein anokha foot baal match sun-hwa, zero gravity mein khela gaya match kaafi munfarid tha
Pakistan  ka sanati shehar Sialkot  khelon ke samaan ki tayari mein khasi shohrat rakhta hai aur khaas tor par is shehar mein tayyar kiye gaye football ko duniya bhar mein khasi maqboliat haasil hai
lekin maazi mein Pakistan  mein foot baal bananay wali fiktryon mein kam Umar  bachon se mazdoori lainay ke ilzamaat bhi samnay atay rahay hain jis se khelon ki masnoaat ki baraamdaat mein kami aayi thi
wazeh rahay ke Pakistan  ka shumaar duniya bhar mein football برآمدکرنے walay barray mumalik mein hota hai aur Pakistan  se salana chaar crore foot baal bar aamad ki jati hain
wazarat tijarat ke adad o shumaar ke mutabiq maali saal 18– 2017- ke ابتدائی10 mah mein Pakistan  nay﻿ 122 million dollar maliyat ki football bar aamad kee
khayaal rahay ke Fifa  world cupp 14 June  2018 hamza se roos mein shuru hochuka hai
Pakistani  wazarat tijarat ke mutabiq world cupp ke liye Sialkot  ki Nami  graami firm football faraham kar rahi hai
isi company nay﻿ brazil mein munaqqid honay walay 2014 hamza ke Fifa  aalmi cupp ke liye' ' بروزوکا' ' Nami  football bhi faraham kiye thay
hamara dost malik chain har muamlay mein hamari madad karta hai, isi liye football ke khail کوسنبھالا dainay ke liye bhi chain maidan mein aa gaya hai
haal hi mein adalti ehkamaat ke baad Pakistan  mein football ki sargarmia 3 saal ke taweel arsay ke baad dobarah bahaal hui hain, sath hi Fifa  ki taraf se aed muatali bhi khatam ki ja chuki hai
Pakistan  football federation ne rawan baras schedule qaumi avrbin al aqwami events ka bhi elaan kardiya hai jis se football shaiqeen koyh aik اورخوشخبری mil gayi hai
zaraye ke mutabiq Pakistan  aur chain ki football fidrishnz ke darmain moahida tey paaya hai jis ke mutabiq Pakistan  mein football ke khail kofrogh dainay ke liye chain Pakistan  ki بھرپورانداز mein madad karega
muahiday ke mutabiq dono mumalik ke darmain nah sirf youth exchange programme shuru kya jaye ga balkay dono fidrishnz mil کرڈیولپمنٹ programme, coach education programme aur refree education programme prbhi kaam karen gi
roosi safeer ney bhi Fifa  2018 world cupp mein Pakistani  foot baal istemaal karne ki tasdeeq karte hue kaha tha ke Pakistan  khelon ka mayaari samaan tayyar karne wala malik hai
Pakistan  ke sath mazeed shobo mein bhi taawun barhayain ge
duniya bhar mein haath se tayyar ki jaaane wali football ka 70 feesad hissa Sialkot  mein tayyar kya jata hai jisay phir mukhtalif mumalik ko bar aamad kya jata hai
Pakistan  mein football ki sanat hazaron afraad ko rozgaar faraham kar rahi hai

apni raye se aagah karen Facebook twitter tasweer ke copy right getty images image caption market mein 115 rupay mein khareeda gaya dollar ab bhi das rupay faida kamanay ke baad 125 rupay mein buk raha hai Pakistan  mein nigran hukoomat ke daur mein election ke ineqad se qabal Amrici  dollar 118 rupay se barh kar 130 taq pahonch gaya tha lekin election ke baad malik mein rupay ke muqablay mein dollar ab 122 rupay mein farokht ho raha hai
bzahir lagta aisa hai ke election ke baad malik mein dollar bohat ziyada aa gaye hain ya phir' naye Pakistan ' mein koi bhi ab dollar khareedna nahi chahta
currency dealers se baat karne par pata chala ke dollar ko baichnay walay to bohat hain lekin khredar koi nahi hai
Pakistan  mein dollar' tareekh ki buland tareen satah par' pahonch gaya Pakistani  rupiya Bharti  Athani ke barabar shayad yahi wajah hai ke ab dollar baichnay wala nuqsaan mein hai aur wohi dollar jo election se qabal 129 rupay mein buk raha tha aur hathon haath khareeda ja raha tha aaj ussay 115 mein khareeda ja raha hai
dilchasp baat yeh hai ke agar bad qismati se aap dollar ke khredar hain to aap ko dollar 122 rupay se 125 rupay mein mil raha hai yani 115 mein khareeda gaya dollar ab bhi das rupay faida kamanay ke baad 125 rupay mein farokht kya ja raha hai
is saari sorat e haal mein aam aadmi ko to koi faida nahi ho raha hai, agar munafe kama rahay hain to woh currency market mein mojood sarmaya car, jo 115 par khareed kar 125 rupay mein usay beech rahay hain
dollar neechay kyun aa raha hai? guzashta chay mah ke douran dollar ke muqablay mein rupay ki qader mein taqreeban 20 feesad kami aayi hai aur dollar 105 rupay se barh kar 131 rupay taq farokht sun-hwa hai lekin election ke ibtidayi nataij samnay anay ke baad rupay ki qader mein taqreeban saarhay chaar feesad izafah sun-hwa hai
Pakistan  ki maeeshat ko is waqt jin challenges ka saamna hai woh koi dhaki chhupi baat nahi hai
khasaray barh rahay hain aur zar e mubadla ke zakhair kam ho rahay hain
un halaat mein Pakistan  ko hungami bunyadon par 10 se 12 arab dollar ki zaroorat hai
baaz it-tila-aat ke mutabiq chain aur Saudi  arab jaisay dost mumalik Pakistan  ko kuch raqam dainay ko tayyar bhi hain
currency dealers ka kehna hai ke unheen khabron ki wajah se rupay ki qader' waqti tor' par mazboot ho rahi hai
tasweer ke copy right afp image caption staate bank ke paas zar e mubadla ke zakhair musalsal kam ho rahay hain currency ka kaarobar karne wali exchange companies association ke chairman Zafar  paracha ka kehna hai ke malik mein nai hukoomat ke anay se jo istehkaam aaya hai uss se bhi rupay ki qader barhi hai
unhon naay kaha ke election ke pur aman ineqad ke liye Afghan  badr band honay ki wajah se bhi currency ki smugling nahi hui hai aur is wajah se bhi market mein kaafi dollar mojood hain
dollar ki qader mein' waqti kami' election ke baad inter bank yani bankon ke mabain dollar ki khareed o farokht ke rate bhi kam hue hain
inter bank mein dollar 124 rupay mein khareeda ja raha aur 126 rupay mein buk raha hai
Zafar  paracha ka kehna hai ke open market mein dollar inter bank se kam qeemat par farokht ho raha hai aur aik do din mein market mein bhi dollar inter bank ke rate taq poanch jaye ga
unn ke mutabiq open market mein dollar ke rate ko ziyada der tak inter bank se kam nahi rakha ja sakta hai
doosri janib iqtisadi mahireen ka kehna hai ke dost mumalik se milnay wali raqam itni nahi ho gi ke tamam iqtisadi khasaara poora kya ja sakay aur unn ke khayaal Pakistan  ko iqtisadi sorat e haal se niklny ke liye aayi am f ka programme lena parre ga
mahireen ke mutabiq agar hukoomat aayi am f ke programme mein jati hai to rupay ki qader ko mazeed kam karna parre ga
maazi mein bhi aayi am f ka israar raha hai ke hukoomat dollar ke muqablay mein Pakistani  rupay ki qader ko kam kere

wazeh rahay ke yeh khabar bhi ghair musadeqa zaraye ki janib se jari ki gayi hai aur ta haal company naay khud is baaray mein koi elaan nahi kya musalmanoon ke liye Maroof  ftbalr کرسٹیانو Ronaldo  naay aisa pegham day diya ke poori muslim duniya ka dil jeet liya musalmanoon ke liye Maroof  ftbalr کرسٹیانو Ronaldo  naay aisa pegham day diya ke poori. .. lisbon ( news desk ) Portugal  se talluq rakhnay walay super star foot bowler کرسٹیانو Ronaldo  duniya ke mashhoor aur maqbool tareen khiladion mein se aik hain
foot baal shaiqeen ki aik barri tadaad ke liye woh is khail ke azeem tareen hero hain, lekin khail ke ilawa bhi un ki shakhsiyat ke kuch aisay pehlu hain jo inhen duniya bhar mein maqbool banaye hue hain
un ki shakhsiyat ka aik aisa hi pehlu uss waqt samnay aaya jab unhon naay mehez do alfaaz keh kar duniya bhar mein –apne musalman paristaron ke dil jeet liye
کرسٹیانو Ronaldo  ne haal hi mein –apne انسٹاگرام اکاؤنٹ par live strim ki to arab duniya se talluq rakhnay walay un ke paristaron ne un se arabi bolnay ki darkhwast kar di
pehlay to un ka kehna tha ke woh arabi bolna nahi jantay lekin phir unhon nay﻿ –apne paristaron ki khushy ke liye thori si arabi bolnay ka faisla kya
aur phir unhon ney jo do alfaaz adakye woh they ”السلام alaikum! “رونالڈو ke mun se un alfaaz ka niklana tha ke duniya bhar mein un ke musalman madah khoshi se jhoom uthay hain
social media par Ronaldo  ki arabi ke khoob charchay ho gay hain aur unn ke musalman purastaar ab unn aur bhi madah ho gay hain
mazeed : khail' ' polo' ' hockey ki tarz kakhil hai jis mein ghurr sawaron ki do temen hissa layte hain
19 win sadi tak yeh khail sirf ghoray ki pusht par baith kar khela jata tha lekin baad mein is ki doosri aqsam ijaad ہوگئیںجن mein water polo, ice polo, ایلفنٹ polo, cycle polo aur bike polo qabil zikar hain jab ke Pakistan  ke shumali ilaaqon mein' ' گدھاپولو' ' bhi Maroof  hai
is ko muqami zabaan mein' ' گوردوغ غال' ' kaha jata hai
is khail mein عمومانو Umar  bachay hissa letay benawar nihayat mahaarat se gadhay par sawaar hokar baghair muhaar ya rassi ke gadhay ko qaboo mein rakhtay hue polo khailtay hain
hamaray malik mein hars polo ke tornamnts aksar o beshtar hotay hain lekin elephent polo polo ) ( elephant aur cycle polo ka khail شایدپاکستانی awam ke liye ajnabi khail hon
is haftay elephent polo aur cycle polo ke baray mein padhiye
cycle polo cycle polo, ghoray ki pusht par bethnay ke bajaye cycle ki gaddi par baith kar khela jata hai
sarkari tor pras ka maidan 150 meter lamba hota hai, jab ke ghair sarkari khelon mein is ki Tawalat  120 se 150 meter jab ke choraai 80 se 100 meter hoti hai
khail میںڈھائی inch qutar ki gaind istemaal hoti hai, jab ke stick ki lambai 3 meter hoti hai, jis ke siray par dhaati dasta laga hota hai
har team 6کھلاڑیوں par mushtamil hoti hai jin mein se 4 khilari field mein khailtay hain, jab ke baqi do khilari, mutabadil ke tor par apni baari ka intzaar karte hain
khail ka dorania 30 minute par mushtamil hota hai, jis mein do half hotay hain, jinhein' ' chakkar' ' kaha jata hai, ہرچکرساڑھے saat minute ka hota hai, darmain mein aaraaam ka waqfa 15 minute ka hota hai
agar match ke aakhir taq score barabar rahay to dono teamon ko fazil waqt diya jata hai, koi team فاؤل karti hai to mukhalif team ko 15 se 25 minute ke faaslay se free hatt millti hai
jaan boojh kar فاؤل karne walay khilari کوایمپائر ki taraf se warning ke tor par zard card dekhaya jata hai aur agar wohi khilari apna mazkoorah amal dobarah duhraey to usay surkh card dikha kar maidan se bahar bhaij diya jata hai aur is ki jagah mutabadil khilari litahe
cycle polo ke khaaliq آئرلینڈکی کاؤنٹی' ' وکلو' ' ke sabiq sayiklng champion aur' ' di irish sayiklng magazine' ' ke ایڈیٹررچرڈ jay میکریڈی thay
woh hars polo ke bhi shoqeen thay aur sayiklng ke sath polo ke muqablon mein hissa letay thay
cycle ke khail se retirement ke baad  unhon ne sayiklng aur polo ko yakja karne ka khaka tayyar kya aur cycle ki gaddi par baith کرسائیکل پولوکھیلنے ka tajurbah kya
is ke liye unhon naay cycle ki set par baith kar aik lambi chhari li jis ke suray par lakri ka hathora laga sun-hwa tha
is se woh foot baal ki گیندکو hatt lagatay hue apni muqarrar ki hui gole post tak gaye
kuch dinon baad is khail ko کاؤنٹی ki satah par muta-arif karaya
1891 hamza mein پہلاسائیکل polo match' ' وکلو' ' ke qasbay' ' اسکالپ' ' mein' ' rath کلیرن روورز' ' aur' ' اوہن ہاسٹ sayiklng club' ' ke mabain khela gaya
19 win sadi ke aakhir mein yeh khail Bartania  aur America  tak pahonch gaya
America  mein yeh khail qadeem tarz ki american star cycle ki set par baith kar khela jata tha
pehla bain al aqwami match Bartania  aur Ireland  ke darmain 1901 mein munaqqid sun-hwa
1908 hamza mein London  olympics mein usay numaishi tour par shaamil kya gaya jis mein Ireland  ki team nay﻿ shandaar khail ka muzahira karte hue Germany  ki mazboot team ko hara kar talai tamgha haasil kya
1930 hamza mein Bartania  mein league ki satah par temen ban'nay ke baad is khail ki maqboliat poooray malik mein hogayi
French  league qaim honay ke baad yeh France  mein bhi maqbool hogaya, baad azan France  aur Bartania  ke darmain bain al aqwami tornamnts ka ineqad honay laga
doosri jung azeem ke douran yeh khail Bartania  se napaid hogaya lekin France  mein league ki satah پرکھیلا جاتارہا, wahan ab bhi is ki temen hain jin ke darmain league matches ka ineqad hota hai
1970 ke baad Bartania  mein dobarah is khail ka ineqad honay laga
1980 hamza mein America  aur Bharat , cycle polo ki do barri teamon ke roop mein chhaa gaye
1994 mein America  mein mulki satah par bicycle polo association qaim ki gayi
1996ء mein cycle polo ki pehli aalmi championship America  ke aik qasbay' ' rich land' ' mein munaqqid hui, jis mein Bharat  ny is khail ka پہلاعالمی title jeeta, baad azan is ka ineqad har saal duniya ke mukhtalif mumalik mein kya janay laga

2001 hamza mein bain al aqwami sayiklng union ka qiyam amal mein aaya, jis ke arakeen mein brazil, arjntayn, Australia , Germany , France , canada, Bharat , America , Pakistan , newzea land, Ireland , malaysia, janoobi Africa , Srilanka, swedan, Switzerland  shaamil hain
aalmi tanzeem ne is khail ko sarkari hesiyat dainay ka elaan kya
hars polo kakhil Bharat  mein bhi zamana qadeem se maqbool hai, Jaipur, jodh poor, aur alor ke mahraja is ke shoqeen thay
hindostan par Bartanwi  hukoomat qaim honay ke baad yeh khail british army mein bhi maqbool ‫t ikhtiyar krgya
doosri jung azeem ke baad jab Bartanwi  fouj mein ghoron ka istemaal kam hogaya to sipahiyon nay﻿ polo ke khail ke liye cycle ka istemaal shuru kardiya aur muqami bashinday bhi un ki dekha dekhi cycle polo khailnay lagey
Bharat  mein 1966ء mein yeh khail sarkari satah par parwan charha aur isi saal rajsthan ke shehar Jaipur mein cycle پولوفیڈریشن of India  ka qiyam amal mein aaya
1970 hamza mein nai Dehli  mein is ke pehlay mulki tournament ka ineqad sun-hwa
1973 mein Jaipur mein mardon ki qaumi championship munaqqid hui jab ke asُi saal rajsthan ke zila' ' جھنجھنو' ' ke qasbay' ' ڈنلوڈ' ' mein khawateen cycle polo championship kheli gayi
1973 mein Dehli  mein' ' pehlay mrchnts cupp cycle polo tournament' ' ka ineqad sun-hwa
bain al aqwami مقابلوںمیں shirkat karkay Bharat  ki cycle polo team ne canada aur America  jaisi mazboot teamon ko kayi barbin al aqwami matchon mein shikast di
ab tak cycle polo ke 8 aalmi tornamnts ho chukay hain, jin minbhart ne shandaar khail paish kar te hue 4 martaba kamyabi haasil ki jab ke canada ne 3 baravr America  ne aik baar aalmi cupp jeeta hai
nepal mein bhi yeh khail maqbool hai
2012 mein کرنالی mein tiger tops, برڈیا national parks mein' ' اکمومن anrji bicycle polo cupp' ' munaqqid sun-hwa, jis mein Bartanwi  team' ' پکاچکاس' ' ney Switzerland  ki team ای f jee ko shikast di
2007 hamza mein european cupp ka aaghaz hwajs mein France , Bartania , Ireland  ki teamon nay﻿ shirkat ki, pehlay do muqablay France  nay﻿ jeetay
Pakistan  mein bhi is ke matches ka ineqad hota hai lekin awam mein usay hars polo ki terhan maqboliat haasil nahi hosaki
2005 mein Pakistan  ki cycle polo team 6 matchon ki series khailnay ke liye Bharat  ke doray par gayi thi
amritsar mein dono mulkon ke mabain muqaabla sun-hwa jis mein Bharat  ne Pakistan  ko shikast day kar series jeet li
elephent polo ( elephant polo ) elephent polo, hars polo ki tarz ka khail hai jo Qawi  hekal janwar hathi ki pusht par baith kar khela jata hai
is khail ka aaghaz beeswi sadi mein hindostan mein sun-hwa, magar usay mojooda shakal nepal mein میگھائولی ke maqam par mili
khail ka yeh andaaz nepal, Srilanka, thai land aur Bharat  ke shehar rajsthan mein maqbool hai
Srilanka ke gaal shehar mein is ke salana tournament ka انعقادکیاجاتا hai
elephent polo ka گراؤنڈ, hars polo ke muqablay mein teen chothai chhota hota hai
yani maidan ki lambai 140 meter aur choraai 70 meter hoti hai
khail mein har team teen teen hathion par mushtamil hoti hai
har hathi par aik مہاوت aur aik khilari sawaar hota hai
مہاوت khilari ke kehnay par hathi ko dayen se بائیںاورآگے peechay دوڑاتا hai
khilari ke haath min6 se 10 foot lambi lakri ki chhari hoti hai, jis ke suray پردھات ki aik tea lagi hoti hai, jis se jhuk kar woh gaind ko zarb laga kar gole post tak pohanchanay ki koshish karta hai
elephent polo ki gaind bhi mazboot aur mayaari banai jati hai aur zarb lagnay se woh mutasir نہیںہوتی
mazkoorah khail das das minute ke do half yani' ' chakkar' ' par mushtamil hota hai
dono half ke darmain 15 minute ka waqfa diya jata hai taakay khilari aur hathi, dono kuch دیرسستا kar taaza dam hosakin
maidan ke darmain 10 meter qtr ka name daira bana hota hai jahan se match refree dairay mein gaind pheink kar khail shuru karata hai
maidan ki d 20 meter yani nisf qutar, par muheet hoti hai aur field ke dono janib gole post bani hoti hain, جہاںکھلاڑی gaind jaal mein pheink kar gole karne ki koshish karte hain
'' hathi polo' ' ki aalmi championship nepal mein' ' ٹائیگرٹاپس' ' ke maqam par munaqqid ki jati hai
nepal aur thai لینڈمیں is khail ki nigrani' ' world elephent polo association' ' ke qawaneen ke tehat ki jati hai, jis mein hathion ki Umar , sahet, dimaghi kefiyat aur khail ki behtari ke hawalay se sakht iqdamaat kiye jatay hain
is khail mein hathi ki zehni hum ahangi polo ke khail se hona zaroori hai
gaal mein elephent polo tournament ke aik match ke douran a ‫be abey ) ( Nami  yak hathi mushtael ہوکرپولو گراؤنڈ se nikal kar sarrak ki taraf bhaga is ny apni pusht par sawaar مہاوت aur khilari ko soond mein lapait kar daur phenka jis se woh shadeed zakhmi hue jab ke –apne rastay mein anay wali اسپینی team ki van ko takkar maar kar tabah kardiya
nepal mein tiger tops ke maqam par world elephent association ke zair e ihtimaam 1982 hamza se aalmi elephent polo championship ka ineqad kya jata hai
is khail ka tasawwur 4 ashray qabal Bartania  ke aik shehri bert jim adwerds ke zehan mein is waqt ubhra jab woh nepal ke junglon mein wild life ke mehakmay mein mulazim tha aur janwaron ki dekh bhaal ke faraiz injaam deta tha
Bartania  se is ka dost james mean klark is se milnay ke liye nepal aaya, james polo ka khilari tha
adwerds ne is ko hathi ki pusht par baith kar polo khailnay par amaada kya
is ke liye is nay﻿ hathi ki sust raftari ko dekhte hue hars polo ki bah nisbat nisf se bhi kam maidan muntakhib kya, 10 foot lambi chhari aur foot baal ki gaind ke sath aik سدھائے hue hathi ki pusht par sawaar hokar elephent polo ka tajribati game khela gaya
kuch arsay baad is khail mein is ke sath mehakma janglaat ke deegar mulazmeen bhi shareek hogaye aur yeh khail do teamon ke darmain munaqqid honay laga
aik saal ke mukhtasir arsay mein is ki maqboliat nepal ke ilawa Srilanka aur thai land taq jap_hnchi aur wahan is ke tornamnts munaqqid honay lagey
1982 hamza mein mukhtalif mumalik ki teamon par mushtamil world elephent polo association ka qiyam amal mein laya gaya
nepal ki aik sayahati company naay jo tiger taap mein waqay thi is ke baqaida aalmi tournament ka ineqad shuru kya jis ke liye aalmi elephent polo federation se ijazat li gayi, avrbharti sarhad ke qareeb kathmandu ke shumal maghrib mein میگھالی چتوانی ki fazai patti ke qareeb ghaas ke maidan mein har saal aalmi tournament ka ineqad kya jata hai
polo ground ke qareeb jungle laaj mein khiladion aur shaiqeen ke qiyam ka bandobast hota ha
un muqablon mein behtareen tarbiyat Yafta  4 tan wazni hathion ke sath hathi polo ke Maroof  khilari hissa letay hain
elephent پولوکے qawaid o zawabit polo ke khail ki deegar aqsam se mukhtalif hotay hain
hathi agar gole post ke qareeb late jaye to usay فائول qarar diya jata hai aur mukhalif team ko free hatt mil jati hai
khail ka ekhtataam dopehar ki tamazat se bachney ke liye Sooraj  sir par anay se qabal hi kardiya jata hai
ہرمیچ ke aaghaz aur ekhtataam par hathion ko un ki pasandeeda khoraak khilai jati hai
tournament ka ineqad har saal decemeber mein subah ke waqt hota hai jab ke ekhtataam dopehar ko kya jata hai
2017 ki aalmi elephent polo tournament ke douran bdhst tanzeemon naay tournament ke ineqad ke khilaaf sakht ehtijaj kya jab ke janwaron ke haqooq ki sargaram tanzeemen is khail ko tanqeed ka nishana bnarhi hain un ke mutabiq, hathi is khail ke liye ghirmozon janwar hai
is soorat e haal ko dekhte hue tiger tops par ab mazeed aalmi tornamnts ka ineqad namumkin nazar aaraha hai
thai land ke shehar' ' ہواہن' ' mein har saal March  ke mahinay mein elephent polo cupp munaqqid kya jata hai, thai land ke badshah, وجیرا loving korn ki sarparasti mein is riwayati hathi polo tournament mein das temen hissa layte hain
har team teen hathion par mushtamil hoti hai, jo saal bhar sayahati maqamat پرتفریحی maqasid ke liye istemaal hotay hain lekin sath mein un ki tarbiyat polo match ke khail ke liye bhi ki jati hai
Srilanka mein har saal 15 feb ko tournament ka ineqad hota hai jis mein duniya bhar se talluq rakhnay walay' ' elephent polo' ' ke khilari hissa letay hain
rajsthan ke shehar Jaipur mein bhi hathi polo ke khail ko maqboliat haasil hai aur Jaipur duniya ka wahid shehar hai jahan sara saal mehakma sayahat ki janib se chogaan stadium mein hathi fistol ke mauqa par ایلفنٹ polo tournament ka ineqad kya jata hai

mojooda liye pehle mein bock nahi hotay ab liye pehle ka version 71 un tamam Websites ke ishtihar bock kere ga jo sarfeen ko ishtiharaat kar click kere ya paap up ishtihar close karne ki targheeb den gi is terhan ki klks ke baad khud car down loadz shuru ho jati hain aur Sarif  ko mazeed ishtihar se peecha chhurana mushkil ho jata hai Google  ka kehna hai ke liye pehle 71 mein is terhan ki mashq ka khtama ho jaye ga Google  ke mutabiq bohat thori tadaad mein aisi ziddi Websites hain jo sarfeen ko gumraah kar ke ishtihar dikha rahi hain ab un Websites par liye pehle 71 tamam ishtihar hi bock ke kharab muzahiray ko leker tutor par tabsaray anay lagey hain bollywood aur south ke mashhoor adakar prkash raaj hamesha hi moodi ki palison ko leker mukhalif rehtay hain abhi taq aaye nataij mein bi jay pi chhatees garh aur rajsthan se Iqtidaar  se bahar hoti nazar aa rahi hai to wahein mdhih pradesh mein usay congress se kari takkar mil rahi hai Mumbai  ( si an an ) 20 sala azdawaji zindagi theen lekin jorey ne un afwahon ke khatmay ke liye khud hi elaan kardiya aur iss silsilay mein mushtarqa bayan jari kardiya bayan mein kaha gaya ke ” mohabbaton aur Khushgawar  lamhaat se bharpoor 20 “ mai jab barri hon gi to Mohammad  abbas ki


“ Australian  khatoon cricketer bhi Mohammad  abbas ki karkardagi par ”ﻣﯿﺮﯼ مٹی“ aisi baat keh di ke nojawan bowler ke gaal sharam se laal ho jayen ge mai jab barri hon gi to Mohammad  abbas ki


“ Australian  khatoon cricketer bhi Mohammad  abbas ki. .. sydney ( daily Pakistan  online ) qaumi cricket team ke nojawan باؤلر Mohammad  abbas ne Australia  kay khilaaf aisi umdah karkardagi dikhayi ke poori duniya hi un ki garweedah ho gayi aur barray barray ghair mulki khiladion ne bhi un ki tareefon ke pul bandh dyie
Mohammad  abbas Australia  kay khilaaf abozhbi test match mein 10 wickten le kar mean of di match aur series qarar paye aur jeet mein klidi kirdaar ada kya
un ki is karkardagi ka jaadoo Australia  ki khatoon cricketer par bhi chal gaya hai jis ka kehna hai ke woh bhi barray ho kar Mohammad  abbas ki terhan باؤلنگ karna chahti hain
australvi khilari' rine firl' ne samaji rabton ki Website twitter par jari –apne pegham mein likha ”عباس kitna hi zabardast hai
“ unhon naay agli ٹویٹ mein Mohammad  abbas ki terhan باؤلنگ karne ki khwahish bhi zahir ki
firl ne likha mai bhi barri ho kar Mohammad  abbas ki terhan باؤلنگ karwana chahati hon
“ mazeed : khail Bostan  ( web desk ) hamaray dimagh ka har khaliya aik chhootay ( money ) computer ki terhan kaam karta hai
is lehaaz se insani dimagh mein 100 arab se zayed computer hama waqt kaam karte rehtay hain
is zimn mein mahireen ne pehli martaba insani dimagh mein barqi sargarmi ki bunyaad par tahaqeeq ki hai jis mein insani dimaghi khaliyaat ( نیورونز ) ki intahi geherai se tafseelaat li gayi hain
is tahaqeeq ke baad ensaan aur choohon ke dimagh aur un se wabsta asaab ke darmain talluq par baat ki gayi hai jis se barri hadd taq insani dimagh o zahanat ki qowat samnay aayi hai
insani dimagh mein aik so arab se zayed نیورونز paye jatay hain aur aik khaliya dosray se hazaron rawabit rakhta hai jabkay khaliye aik dosray ke sath barqi جھماکوں ke zariye raabtey mein rehtay hain
agarchay is zimn mein choohon ke khaliyaat par bohat tehqeeq hui hai lekin insani khaliyaat par tehqeeq nahi hui thi
is ke liye میساچیوسیٹس insti tute ااف tecnology ( am aayi tea ) ke maahir mark ہارنیٹ ney aisay srjnon se rabita kya jo mirgi ke mareezon ke dimagh se intahi bareek namoonay letay hain
ہارنیٹ neh un namonon par intehai bareek, hassas aur khurd beeni برقیرے ( الیکٹروڈ ) lagaye aur نیورونز ki geherai taq barqi sargarmi ko note kya
mark nay﻿ saabit kya hai ke har dimaghi khaliye ki bareek shaakhen hoti hain jinhein ڈینڈرائٹس kaha jata hai aur aik khaliye se ausatan 50 ڈینڈرائٹس jarray hotay hain
lekin baat yahin par khatam nahi hoti
har ڈینڈرائٹ ke secron taar jaisay knikshnz hotay hain jinhein ”سائنیپسز“ kaha jata hai
ہرتار se aik khaliya jura hota hai
is terhan insani dimagh mein har khaliye ke ڈینڈرائٹ se hazaron raabtey nikaltay hain aur yeh sab mil kar faisla karte hain ke kis terhan kayi signal kharij karne hain
is lehaaz se mahireen ne kaha hai ke har khaliya apni qowat ke lehaaz se aik money computer hi ki terhan hai
mahireen falkiat ne taqreeban 60 saal qabal is baat ka khadsha zahir kya tha ke zameen ke gird madaar mein gird aur dhool ke baadal gird sh kar rahay hain lekin ab taq un ki koi khaas tasdeeq nahi ki wazeh shakal bayan nahi ki ja sakti shandaar khushkhabri 2 barri companiyon naay Pakistan  mein 1. 4 arab dollar ki sarmaya kaari ka elaan kardiya Islamabad ( monitoring disk ) pepsi aur coca cola duniya ki barri companiyon mein se do hain jin ke mashrobat baqi duniya ke sath sath Pakistan  mein bhi be hadd maqbool hain ab un dono companiyon naay Pakistan  mein 1. 4 arab dollar ki sarmaya kaari ka elaan kya hai Website ke mutabiq wazeer e azam Imran  Khan  se pepsi ke aik wafad ki mulaqaat hui bayan mein bataya gaya hai ke pepsi aglay paanch saloon mein Pakistan  mein 1. 2 arab dollar ki sarmaya kaari kere gi pepsi ki taraf se wafad ki qayadat company ke cheif executive baraye ایشیائ mashriq wasti o shumali Africa  mayik سپانوس kar rahay they report ke mutabiq wazeer e azam Imran  Khan  ki taraf se wafad ko bataya gaya ke hukoomat sarmaya karon ko pakistan mein aasaniyan faraham karne ke liye prazm hai jis ki 10 crore se zayed abadi 30 saal se kam Umar  hai hukoomat ki taraf se jari aik allag bayan mein bataya gaya ke coca cola pehlay se Pakistan  mein 50 crore dollar ka kaarobar kar rahi hai is ne bhi 20 crore dollar ki mazeed sarmaya kaari karne ka elaan kya hai coca cola ki taraf se bhi yeh nai sarmaya kaari aglay do se teen saloon mein ki jaye gi Karachi  Pakistan  ki tareekh mein pehli baar Karachi  mein Pakistan  international bilk ٹرمینلز ltd ne pitrolim kook aur koylay ki cargo handling ki hai jo is noiyat ki pehli handling hai pi aayi bi tea ke bayan ke mutabiq am v zong you 89 jahaaz port Qasim  par 10 decemeber shaam 4 bujey pouncha tha jo pi aayi bi tea par apni noiyat ke aitbaar se mushkil tareen pait kook کنسائنمنٹ thi aur aam koylay ke muqablay mein bara jahaaz honay ki wajah se ziyada dushwaar hoti hai taham is ki kamyabi ke sath handling ki gayi kargo ki se koylay ki muntaqili ka amal tamam tar maholiyati mayarat ke mutabiq 11 decemeber ki subah mukammal karliya gaya si ای o pi aayi bi tea Shariq  Siddiqui  ne kaha ke pi aayi bi tea ke jadeed terminal par guzashta maali saal mein 2. 7 million tan koylay aur کلنکر ki handling ki gayi thi jabkay rawan maali saal mein pehlay 6 mah mein hi karkardagi ko mazeed behtar banatay hue 3. 2 million tan koylay aur کلنکر ki handling karli gayi hai Shariq  Siddiqui  ne bataya ke hamaray mukammal jadeed میکینیکل terminal par 60 hazaar tan koylay ki 30 ghanton mein handling karli jati hai aur yeh Karachi port se teen gina ziyada behtar karkardagi hai jis se درآمدکنندگان ke akhrajaat aur waqt mein barri kami waqay hoti hai Lahore  ( web disk ) freezer ka istemaal barf jamanay ke sath sath khanay ki mukhtalif ashya ko bhi mehfooz rakhnay ke kaam aata hai lekin khanay ki tamam ashya ko jama ya nahi ja sakta is se un ki ghizaiyat zaiqay aur bo mein tabdeeli askati hai doodh doodh ko fridge mein jamana aam si baat hai lekin aisa karne se doodh ke ajzaa pani aur پھٹکیوں ki shakal mein allag allag ho jatay hain doodh ko pighla neh ke baad usay istemaal to kya ja sakta hai lekin pighal janay ke baad doodh se ban'nay wali اشیاءمیں ghee ki aik teh numa ya n ho jati hai jis se zayega tabdeel ho ja taa hai aalo aalo mein pani ki miqdaar ziyada honay ki wajah se usay freezer mein na rakhen
jim jaaney ke baad jab un آلوؤں ko istemaal kya jaye ga to aalo پ±لپلے aur naram ho chukay ho n ge
Albata  pakay ho ye آلوؤ n ko freezer mein jama kar baad mein qabil e istemaal bana ya ja sakta hai taley ho ye khanay taley ho yi khanay ki cheeje fori istemaal kar len
freezer mein jim jaaane ke baad yeh naram par jayen ge
agar phir bhi aap aisi ashya ko freeze karna chahain to unhein taley baghair freezer mein kisi sun-hwa band bartan ya theli mein rakh den kachay anday kachay anday freezer mein rakhnay ki soorat mein un ke khoal mein Durra  ڑیں askati hain ya phir woh phatt sakta hai anday ko freeze karna ho to usay khoal se nikaal kar khoob phaint len aur kisi sun-hwa band dabbay mein band kar ke rakh den سبزیا n aur phal aisi سبزیا n aur phal jin mein pani ki miqdaar waafar ho inhen freeze mat karen
freeze karne ke baad yeh qabil e istemaal nahi reh jayen gi que nk_h un mein mo jood pani fori tor par barf ban jata hai gosht ziyada tar gharo n mein gosht ko freezer mein rakh kar baad mein istemaal kiye jaany ka rivaaj hai
ziyada der freezer mein rakhnay se gosht ki ghizaiyat mein kami waqay ho jati hai
is liye ko shash kar yn ke go شت kam muddat ke liye jama ya jaye
aik dafaa fridge se nikaal lainay ke baad usay dobarah freezer mein rakhnay se guraiz kar yn is tar h gosht sahet ke liye nuqsaan da saabit ho sakta hai dahi dahi ko freezer mein jama dainay se is ki ghizaiyat mein kisi qisam ki kami waqay nahi ho gi agar usay mana sab bartan mein jama ya gaya hai lekin jamay ho ye dahi ko بلویا nahi ja sakta jamnay ke baad dahi ko is ki asal shakal mein wapas nahi laa ya ja sakta chawal agar aa pay tootay hue naram chawal nahi khana cha hte to chaawlon ko freezer mein mein mat jama yin
jim ja ny ke baad chawal apna asal zayega kho satke hain lahsun aur deegar msalh jaat lahsun saabit ho ya is ka paste bana sun-hwa ho, usay freezer mein jamanay se guraiz karen
freezer mein jamnay ke baad lahsun ki bo aur zayega dono tabdeel ho jatay hain aur un mein mazeed taizi ajati hai yahi pyaaz aur garam msalhon ke sath ho sakta hai is liye koshish karen ke lahsun adrak pyaaz aur masalhay dabbay se nikaal kar istemaal kar yn inhen freeze na karen Karachi  mein mobayyana zahreela khana khanay se guzashta mah 2 bachon ki halakat ki tehqiqaat mein paish Raft  hui hai aur defence mein waqay restaurants ke 2 mulazmeen ko girftar karkay un ke khilaaf muqadma darj karliya gaya police ke mutabiq girftar afraad ke khilaaf qatal بالسبب aur shawahid mitanay ki daf-aat ke tehat muqadma darj kya gaya girftar mulazmeen mein Aamir  Akhtar  aur Urfan  Aleem  shaamil hain wazeh rahay ke jaan bahaq honay walay dono bachay rawan baras 10 November  ki raat apni walida ke hamrah pehlay aik pallay land gaye jahan unhon ny tafyan ice kareem aur chips khaye aur is ke baad unhon ny defence mein waqay aik restrnt mein khana khaya police ke mutabiq mutasirah khandan ny raat 11 bujey ke qareeb restrnt se khana khaya jis ke baad aglay din subah 5 se 6 bujey ke darmain dono bachon aur walida ki tabiyat kharab hui aur inhen ultian huien mutasireen ko itwaar ( 11 November  ) ki dopehar aik niji hspta l- muntaqil kya gaya jahan dono bachay douran ilaaj dam toar gaye jab ke un ki walida kaafi din wahan ziralaj rahen tjzyati reports mein yeh baat samnay aayi thi ke restrnt aur pallay land mein waqay dukaan ki khanay ki ashya mzrِsht theen jinhein khanay se bachon ko food poisenning hui un ki haalat kharab hui aur woh dam toar gaye intqaal kar jaaney walay bachon ki shanakht daidh sala Ahmed  aur 5 sala Mohammad  ke naam se hui thi Mumbai  ( شوبزڈ یسک ) Bollywood ke Maroof  adakar دھرمندرا ney apni 83 win saalgirah ahliya اوربیٹی ke sath mana yi is mauqa par adakara Hema Malini ne unhein la zawaal pyar qarar diya hai
adakara ne two ‫tr par انہیںسالگرہ ki mbarkba daal di, unhon ne madahon ki janib se تمناؤں par un ka shukar yeh ada kar te ho ye apni aur adakar دھرمندرا ki tasaveer bhi share kee
legend adakar 8 decemeber 1935 ءکو panja bay mein peda ho ye
chain neh Amrici  companiyon ko aindah saal shnghayi mein honay wali doosri chaynh international amport aykspo mein shirkat ki dawat day di Amrici  companian shareek hokar apni masnoaat ki numayesh karen yeh dawat chaynh international amport aykspo بیوروکے deputy director sun چینگ hayi ki qayadat mein aik wafad neh New York mein 100 se ziyada Amrici  companiyon ke numaindon ko November  2019 hamza mein shnghayi mein honay wali numayesh mein shirkat ke liye dawat naamon ki taqseem ke douran di unhon neh kaha ke guzashta chaynh international amport aykspo mein 170 se ziyada mulkon ke numaindon ney shirkat ki aur America  174 companiyon ke sath taqreeb mein shareek honay wala teesra bara malik raha wasee tar tijarti ashya aur engineering khidmaat faraham karne wala Amrici  group aik behtareen misaal hai jis ney pehli 6 roza numayesh ke douran kayi so million dollar ke ashya ki farahmi ke order wusool kiye is mauqa par unhon ney karobari shaksiaat ko aindah numayesh ke ahem khado khhaal se aagah kiya France  ney kroshya ko shikast day kar world cupp foot baal ki aalmi jung jeet li
chaar saal baad honay walay aalmi melay mein shirkat karne wali 32 teamon mein France  ke khiladion ney –apne aap ko mumtaz saabit karte hue aalmi aizaz ka حقدارثابت kya, roos ney Fifa  world cupp foot بالء ka nah sirf shandaar ineqad kya balkay fan aayi d par duniya ke lakhoon shaiqeen ko yeh event dekhnay ka mauqa faraham karkay duniya foot baal mein aik nai rivayet ka aghaaz kiya
final taqreeb mein duniya ke mukhtalif mumalik ke sarbarahon, Fifa  ke ohdedaron aur duniya bhar ke foot baal lijndz ko madoo karkay ikhtitami taqreeb ko chaar chaand lgadiye gaye
roos mein honay wala yeh world cupp bilashuba aik tareekh saaz hesiyat اختیارکرگیا, tournament mein shandaar karkardagi kamzahrh karne wali kroshya ki team ki karkardagi aur barri teamon ka tournament se out hojane par tournament ke final se qabal France  aur kroshya ki teamon ke baaray میںجیت ki paish goi karne mein ہرجانب se ahthyat Barti  jarahi thi
کروشین team ny Simi  final taq jis karkardagi ka muzahira kiya is se andaza hota tha ke woh final mein bhi France  ke khilaaf up set kere gi lekin un ke kam tajarbay aur ghaltion ka France  ny mukammal faida uthaya aur maidan بآ sani marlya
final se qabal لوزنیکی foot baal stadium anay walay tamashaiyon ki aksariyat dono teamon mein sakht muqablay ki tawaqqa kar rahi thi lekin France  ne pey darpay hamlay karkay کروشین khiladion par aisi kaari zrbin لگائیںکہ woh is se bach nah sakay
francesi khiladion ne کروشین team ke pehli baar world champion ban'nay ke khawab ko chknachor kardiya
tournament mein shandaar karkardagi ka muzahira karne wali team ke khilari final mein shikast ke baad bachon ki terhan Balk  Balk  kar ro rahay thay
world cupp foot baal tournament ke muqablay intahi heran kin rahay jin mein sab se barray up set difai champion Germany  ko bardasht karna para
yeh team ibtidayi marhalay mein hi event se out hogayi
is ke sath sath dunyae foot baal ki barri barri teamon ke sath bhi kuch aaccha nahi sun-hwa
arjntayn, Portugal , spain, brazil ki temen bhi baghair Simi  final khailay tournament se out huien
brazil aur belgium tournament ki taap favourite team samjhi jarahi thi lekin belgium ney pehlay brazil ko tournament se out kya aur phir khud bhi Simi  final mein France  ke hathon shikast kha کرایونٹ se bahar hui
herat angaiz tor maizban malik ki hesiyat se tournament mein jagah bananay wali roosi team ki karkardagi qabil tareef rahi
is team ne home ground aur home کرائوڈ ke samnay jis karkardagi ka muzahira kiya woh muddaton yaad rakhi jaye gi
iftitahi match mein Saudi  arab ko paanch sifar se shikast day kar event mein apna shandaar aaghaz kya aur isi silsilay ko agay berhate hue yeh team quarter final mein pohanchi lekin yahan bhi sakht muqablay ke baad penalty shot aaoo t پرکروشیا ke hathon zair hui
is team ney 54 saal baad doosri baar event ke quarter final mein jagah haasil ki jis par is ke shaiqeen khush they
roosi awam apni team ki is karkardagi ko behtareen qarar dete hain
roosi foot baal federation ke saddar ka kehna hai ke woh 2022 hamza world cupp kuwait mein is se bhi b_htrkarkrdgi ka muzahira karen ge ab hamaray malik ki foot baal is dagar par aagai hai ke tournament jeetna hum ney apna maqsad bana liya hai
Fifa  world cupp ki faateh France  ki team ko khalis sonay se bani trophy ke sath majmoi tor par 3 crore 94 laakh dollar se zayed raqam inaam ke tor par mili jabkay کروشین team ko 2 crore 95 laakh dollar, teesri position haasil karne wali belgium ki team ko dhai crore dollar, chothi position haasil karne wali England  ki team ko team siwa دوکروڑ ki inaami raqam mili

dono ki mashhoor musabqat 2001 hamza ke yways open se le kar 2017 hamza ke Australian  open snglz ke faynlz ke douran dekhnay mein aayi
is douran dono ke darmain 9 grand Saleem  faynlz mein ٹاکرا sun-hwa
tennis ki tareekh mein dono pehli khilari theen ( mardo aurat mein ) jo chaar musalsal grind Saleem  faynlz ( 2002 ءکے french open se le kar 2003 ءکے Australian  open tak ) میںمد maqabil آئیںاور chaar وںفائنلز mein chhoti behan Sarina  Villiams  faateh qarar payi
2000 hamza se 2016 hamza taq 17 sala mad t- mein dono ney majmoi tor par 12 wambildon ( venus ney 5? aur Sarina  ney 7 ) jeetay
dono ne 2001 hamza ka Australian  women dblz title jeet kar career dblz grand Saleem  jeetnay wali panchwin aur career dblz grind Saleem  mukammal karne wali wahid jori ban'nay ka aizaz haasil kya
is ke ilawa dono ne do olympic gold midlz 2008 hamza beijing aur 2012 hamza London  olympics bhi jeet rakhay hain

dono tennis court mein hi mad maqabil nahi rahen balkay aik dosray ko support karne ke liye shaiqeen mein bhi mojood rehti theen
number one ki daud womens tennis association ki janib se dono ki kayi baar darjah bandi ki gayi aur dono tanha aur jori ki soorat mein bhi world number one rahi hain

aisa duniya ki tareekh mein pehli baar sun-hwa ke do bahene daraja bandi mein sare fehrist ayen

phir aglay aath saal taq aisa hi hota raha aur dono number one aur number two par apni position badalti rahen

aakhir richard ney apni baityon ko tennis star hi kyun banana chaha
