Villiams  sisters ki aamdani venus Villiams  ki takhmeenah shuda khalis آمدنی95 million dollar hai jo tennis ki tareekh mein doosri barri kamaai hai aur be shak pehlay number par is ki chuti behan Sarina  Villiams  hi hai jo saal َّ guzashta ke ke ekhtataam par 170 million dollar ki maalik theen
apni raye se aagah karen Facebook twitter ho sakta hai ke aap ko –apne Facebook نیوزفیڈ pehlay se mukhtalif lag raha ho ya bohat jald woh kuch mukhtalif nazar anay lagey ga
do arab se zayed sarfeen ke sath Facebook ko duniya ki maqbool tareen samaji raabtey ki Website ka aizaz haasil hai aur is ka dil aur rooh نیوزفیڈ hai, jis mein haliya barson ki sab se barri tabdeeli aap ko jald nazar aeye gi
is baat ka elaan Facebook ke baani mark زکربرگ nay﻿ jumaraat ko –apne aik bayan mein kya
mazeed parheen : Facebook ke samnay aap ka koi raaz chhupa nahi unhon nay﻿ kaha ke company نیوزفیڈ ko badal diya jaye ga aur ab wahan vayrl videos, news articles aur deegar media mawaad ab logon ko bohat kam nazar aaye ga, jin ki jagah aap ke ghar walon, doston ya daftari sathiyon ki tasaveer, astits up dates waghera len ge
is terhan yeh news feed par ki janey wali sab se barri tabdeeli hai
mark زکربرگ ka kehna tha ke hamara maqsad logon ko –apne pyaron se ziyada ba maqsad raabtey ka mauqa faraham karna hai aur is baat ko yakeeni banana hai ke Facebook par ziyada waqt guzaarna un ki shakhsiyat par manfi asraat muratab nah kere
guzashta mah aik tahaqeeq mein Facebook ney khud tasleem kya tha ke Facebook par mojood mawaad logon par manfi andaaz se asar andaaz ho sakta hai, yani blamqsd اسکرولنگ karna manfi asraat muratab karta hai jabkay posts layik karna ya comments karna misbet asraat ka baais bantay hain
yeh bhi parheen : social media ka ziyada istemaal khatarnaak ho sakta hai, Facebook ka aitraaf Facebook ke baani ke mutabiq' hum yeh zimma daari mehsoos karte hain ke hamari service ko sirf tafreeh ke liye istemaal nah kya jaye balkay logon ki shakhsiyat ke liye behtar ho, ab hum naay apna maqsad badal liya hai aur hamari team is cheez par tavajja markooz kere gi ke Sarif  mutaliqa mawaad hi talaash kar sakay jis se ba maqsad samaji rabton mein madad mil sakay '
rawan saal ke aaghaz par bhi mark زکربرگ nay﻿ –apne 2018 ke salana challenge ke hawalay se kaha tha ke Facebook se phelnay walay masail jaisay nafrat aur tashadud waghera ko hal karna chahtay hain aur نیوزفیڈ mein nai tabdeeli ka maqsad bhi yahi hai
guzashta roz ki post mein unhon ney tasleem kya ke is nai tabdeeli se kuch arsay ke liye company ka business bhi mutasir hoga, taham un ke khayaal mein yeh behtar mustaqbil ke liye ahem qadam hai

( file photo ) Pakistan  mein media ka sab se bara idaara samjhay janey walay jung group nay﻿ mobayyana' maali bohraan' ke baais Peshawar , Karachi  aur Lahore  se shaya honay walay paanch akhbarat aur do ایڈیشنز ko band kar ke taqreeban paanch so ke qareeb mulazmeen ko farigh kardiya hai
jung group ke zaraye ka kehna hai ke band honay walay akhbarat mein roznama awam, daily news, roznama inqilab, Peshawar  aur Faisal  abad se shaya honay walay jung ke do ایڈیشنز aur do dmi akhbarat Pakistan  times aur waqt shaamil hain
yeh bhi padhiye Pakistani  media ka tasalii bakhash ilaaj Pakistani  media par qaboo panay ki' munazzam koshish' kya pi tea am ki media courage karna jurm hai? band honay walay saat akhbarat mein se chaar Lahore  se shaya ho rahay they jabkay do Karachi  aur roznama jung ka aik aik addition Peshawar  aur Faisal  abad se shaya ho raha tha
un band honay walay roznamon mein teen ایوننگر ya shaam ke akhbarat shaamil hain jo guzashta kayi barson se Karachi  aur Lahore  se shaya ho rahay thay
jung group ke sahafion ka kehna hai ke is bandish ke baais majmoi tor par Peshawar , Lahore , Karachi , Faisal  abad aur queta se taqreeban paanch so se ziyada mulazmeen ko bar tarf kya gaya hai jin mein sahafion ke ilawa akhbaari karkun bhi shaamil hain
unhon ny kaha ke kuch arsa se hukoomat ki taraf se akhbarat ko ishtiharaat band kiye gaye hain jabkay jaedad ki khareed o farokht ya real staate ka kaarobar bhi dollar ki qmit mein baar baar utaar charhao ki wajah se mandi ka shikaar hai jis ki wajah se dono janib se ishtiharaat band hain jis se beshtar rozname' maali bohraan' ka shikaar hogaye hain
is zimn mein jung group ka muaqqaf maloom karne ke liye un ke intizamia se baarha raabtey ki koshish ki gayi aur un ko pegham bhi bheja gaya lekin unhon ny baat karne se inkaar kardiya

( file photo ) idhar Peshawar  mein roznama jung se wabasta aik senior sahafi nay﻿ naam nah bitanay ki shart par bi bi si ko bataya ke taqreeban chay saal qabal Peshawar  se roznama jung ka addition nikaalte ka faisla kiya gaya jis ke liye yahan press lagaya gaya aur darjanon mulazmeen ko bharti kya gaya
unhon ney kaha ke Peshawar  se akhbar nikaalte ki tamam tayyariyan do saal pehlay mukammal karli gayi thi lekin baaz wajohaat ki binaa par akhbar baqaida tor par shuru nahi kya jaska lekin is douran akhbar tajribati bunyaad par nikalta raha aur mulazmeen bhi kaam karte rahay
un ke mutabiq Peshawar  mein haliya dinon mein roznama jung aur di news se taqreeban 90 ke qareeb mulazmeen ko bar tarf kya gaya, jin mein reporters, sab ayditrz aur deegar akhbaari karkun shaamil hain
bar tarf honay walay beshtar mulazmeen woh they jin ki tnkhwahin نبستا kam theen
Karachi  union of journalists ke saddar Fahim  Siddiqui  ney bi bi si se baat karte hue kaha ke pehli martaba jung group ki janib se mulazmeen ko un ki bartarfi ke khat un ke gharon ke pattoun par beje gay hain jo is se pehlay kabhi dekhnay mein nahi aaya
unhon nay﻿ kaha ke' bartarfi ke letters mein mulazmeen ko kaha gaya hai ke idaray ko un ki zaroorat nahi rahi lehaza woh kal se daftar anay ki zahmat nah karen
' Fahim  Siddiqui  ke mutabiq yeh bhi pehli martaba maloom sun-hwa hai ke akhbaari malkaan' third party muahiday' ke tehat akhbarat chala rahay they yani mulazmeen ko milnay wali bartarfi ke letter kisi media group ki janib se nahi balkay aik company ki taraf se beje gay hain
unhon naay mazeed kaha ke ab agar koi mulazim apni bartarfi adalat mein challenge kere ga to inhen is akhbar ke maalik ko fareeq nahi banana parre ga balkay is company ke khilaaf case larray ga kyunkay un ko bartarfi ka letter is company ki taraf se bheja gaya hai
taham Fahim  Siddiqui  ne kaha ke is se koi farq nahi parre ga kyunkay adaltin bhi janti hain aur hukoomat ko bhi ilm hai ke mulazmeen kis ne bar tarf kiye hain
darin asna malik bhar mein sahafti tanzeemon ki taraf se mukhtalif shehron mein jung group se nikalay jaaane walay sahafion aur akhbaari mulazmeen ki jabri برطرفیوں ke khilaaf ehtijaj aur muzahiron ka ineqad kya gaya

Khyber  union of journalists ke saddar Saif  الااسلام Saifi  naay bi bi si ko bataya ke Peshawar  ke sahafion naay bar tarf mulazmeen ki bahaali ke liye silsila waar ehtijaj ka programme banaya hai jis ke tehat mulazmeen ki bahaali ke liye nah sirf adalat se rujoo kya jaye ga balkay un dafatir ke samnay ehtajaji camp lagaye jayen ge jahan se mulazmeen ko nikala gaya hai

syed Mohammad  sufi Pakistan  cricket team ke baray mein yeh mashhoor hai ke yeh team kuch bhi kar sakti hai is ke baray mein koi hatmi raye qaim karna durust nahi is team ke jitne ya harnay ka andaza sitaron ki chalon se bhi nahi kiya ja sakta waisay bhi cricket to khail hi" chance" ka hai, lekin Pakistan  team ke chance ke baray mein bhi hatmi raye nahi di ja sakti jo team England  ki sarzamen par honay wali chimpin ship mein baa-mushkil tamam jagah bananay mein kamyaab hoti ho is ka taap for mein shaamil hojana توفرین qiyaas ho sakta hai lekin is ka sab teamon ko hrakr chimpin ban jana yeh kon keh sakta tha lekin Pakistan  un predict able hai
is ne guzashta saal England  mein honay wali aalmi chmpin shup jeet li final mein is ne –apne sab se barray hareef Bharat  ko shikast day kar Pakistan  ka parcham buland kardiya tha jo kuch sun-hwa woh heran kin tha
lekin" ayshyakp" mein jahan India  ke siwa koi bhaari bhar kam team nah thi Pakistan  is ke final mein bhi nahi poanch saka, waqai hum un predict able ہیںکیوں ke asia cupp mein cricket mahireen Pakistan  ko fav qarar day rahay they is liye un ki prediction durust kyun kar hosakti thi mahireen daawa kar rahay they ke koi doosri team Pakistan  ko takkar nahi day sakti, India  ki team bhi وہرات kohli ki Adam  mojoodgi jitne ki position mein nahi thi lekin tamam mahireen ke daaway dharay reh gaye Pakistan  ka final جیتناتوالگ raha woh final mein poanch bhi nahi saka aur Bharat  satwen baar asia cupp jeet گیااس tournament se pehlay kuch mubasireen naay yeh kaha kay captain Sarfraz  kodr ke nahi balkay bahaduri se captani karni chahiye thi woh captain jis ki qayadat mein Pakistan  23 میںسے 16 match jeet chuka ho چیمپینزٹرافی mein barri barri teamon ke chhakay churra chuka ho is کوایشیا cupp mein yeh سمجھایاجارہا hai ke تمہارااندازدرست nahi, coach par ilzaam hai ke sahih tor par playerz ki rahnumai nahi kar raha hai selectors par ilzaam hai ke woh team sahih nahi bnarhe hain phir kuch" mahireen" aik asia cupp harnay prkptan tabdeel karne ka mutalba bhi kar rahay hain manfi tabsaray karne walon ney captain ki تونیندیں ura den woh team jis ke baaray mein duniya bhar ke mubasireen yeh keh rahay hain ke Pakistan  2019 ka world cup ( جوانگلینڈ mein honay wala hai ) jeet jaye ga
Pakistan  ny چیمپینز trophy England  mein jeeti hai jahan England  ko test series mein tough time diya yeh sab kamiyabiyan Sarfraz  ki qayadat mein mili hain hona yeh cha hye tha ke jo larray ayshyakp mein nakaam rahay un ke mutabadil dosray khilari talaash kiye jayen nah ke captain badal diya jaye, fkhrzman agar آؤٹ of form hain to un ko Aram  diya jaye
behar haal Pakistan  cricket board ke chairman ahsaan maani nay﻿ captain tabdeel karne ke mutalba ko mustard karte hue kaha kay un ko Sarfraz  Ahmed  par bhrporaatmad hai shayad naye chairman ke ilm mein hoga ke aksar team mein سارشیں hoti hain aur aisay halaat peda kardiye jatay hain ke captain itminan se nah khail sakay kuch saal pehlay ki baat hai ke Pakistani  team ghair mulki doray par thi

Islamabad : sprim court ke hukum par dyamr bhasha dem aur mehmand dem ke liye jama honay walay fund mein ab taq beron malik muqeem Pakistanio  ney 1 arab rupay jama karaye hain jabkay andronِ malik se 7 arab 47 crore rupay jama ho chukay hain
state bank of Pakistan  ( s bi pi ) ke jari kardah adaad o shumaar ke mutabiq dem fund mein ab taq 8 arab 46 crore rupay jama ho chukay hain
khayaal rahay ke Pakistan  mein pani ki qillat ko daur karne ke liye cheif justice sprim court of Pakistan  miyan Saqib  Nisar  ne dyamr bhasha dem aur mehmand dem ki taamer ke liye fund jama karne ki muhim ka aaghaz 6 July  ko kya tha, jis ke baad wizarat Uzma ka mansab snbhalne ke baad Imran  Khan  bhi is mein shareek hogaye
markazi bank ke mutabiq 6 decemeber tak beron malik muqeem Pakistanio  ny dem fund mein di jaaane wali raqam ka 10. 6 feesad hissa diya hai
mazeed parheen : Bartanwi  wafad mein shaamil beron malik muqeem Pakistanio  ka dem fund ke liye atiyah qabal azeen Wazeer e Azam  Imran  Khan  ney qoum se khitaab karte hue taqreeban 90 laakh bironِ malik muqeem Pakistanio , bilkhushoos America  aur Europe  mein rehne walon, se appeal ki thi ke woh is karِ kher mein hissa letay hue kam از kam aik hazaar Amrici  dollar fi fard is fndng mein den
Wazeer e Azam  Imran  Khan  nay﻿ khabardaar kya tha ke agar Pakistan  mein aabi zakhair jama karne ke liye dem taamer nahi kiye gay to Pakistan  ko qeht jaisi sorat e haal ka saamna ho sakta hai
cheif justice miyan Saqib  Nisar  naay bhi haal mein London  ka dora kya tha jahan unhon naay Pakistan  mein dem ke liye fndz jama kiye jabkay bironِ malik muqeem Pakistanio  ko malik mein qeht ki sorat e haal ke mumkina khatray ke baaray mein bhi aagah kiya
Pakistan  mein dyamr bhasha dem ki taamer ke liye 14 arab Amrici  dollar ( 14 kharab Pakistani  rupay ) se bhi zayed ki zaroorat parre gi
yeh bhi padhan :' dimz funds ki raqam par Supreme Court aur judges bhi qabil ehatasab hain' Pakistan  mein awam cheeks, cash aur mobile massages ke zariye dem fund mein apna hissa daal rahay hain jabkay sirf s am s service ke zariye 12 crore 50 laakh rupay jama hue hain
bironِ malik muqeem Pakistanio  ne apna chandah dibt card aur kridt card ke zariye diya jabkay mutadid Pakistanio  ne s bi pi نوسٹرو account aur beron malik kmrshl bankon mein –apne atyat jama kurwaye
America  mein rehne walay Pakistanio  ne 36 crore 20 laakh rupay, Bartania  mein muqeem پاکستانیون ne 21 crore 40 laakh aur canada mein muqeem Pakistanio  ne 10 crore 70 laakh rupay dem fund mein diye
ilawa azeen mutahidda arab amarat mein muqeem Pakistanio  ne 6 crore 50 laakh, Saudi  arab aur qutar se 4 crore jabkay سوئزر land aur deegar mumalik se 3 crore 20 laakh rupay dem fund mein jama karaye gaye
mazeed padhan : aaj se dem bananay ka kaam shuru karna hai, wazeer e azam ka qoum se khitaab sprim court ke mutabiq dem fund mein Norway , turkey, Japan , chain, soyidn, roos, brazil, malaysia, newzea land, janoobi Africa , azerbaijan, tajkstan, krghizstan, Austria , bronayi, Denmark , Netherlands , Belguim , Afghanistan , Bangladesh, fiji, Ireland , janoobi Korea , thai land, Amman , urdan, maldip, nigeria, pairo, tyons aur philippine mein muqeem Pakistanio  ne bhi apna hissa dala
Wazeer e Azam  ke Muawin  khusoosi baraye beron malik muqeem Pakistani  syed Zulfiqar  abbas bukhari ( Zulfi  bukhari ) ne samandar paar Pakistanio  ki garam joshi ko سراہاتے hue kaha ke jab bhi malik mushkil mein hota hai to beron malik muqeem Pakistani  madad karne ke liye hamesha agay atay hain
yeh khabar 10 decemeber 2018 ko dawn akhbar mein shaya hui New York ( web disk ) Amrici  comedian Allan  d جنیرز apni mazahiy show' di Allan  show' ke sath taweel arsay se madahon ko Mahzooz  kar rahi hain taham ab unhon ny wapsi is stage par anay ka faisla karliya hai jahan se woh –apne career mein agay barhi theen
Allan  15 saalon baad اسٹینڈپ comedy mein wapsi karne ke sath logon ko hansaney ke liye tayyar hain
comedian aur TV maizban نیٹفلکس par ریلیٹیبل Nami  show par jalva gir honay jarahi hain jahan woh har is cheez ke hawalay se baat karen gi jo un se jari hui hai
is show ka trailor bhi release kardiya gaya hai, jis mein bataya gaya ke' woh khatoon jin se hum sab pyar karte hain wahein wapsi kar rahi hain jahan se unhon naay a? gaaz kya tha '
Allan  15 saloon se stage par prfarm karte nazar nahi ayen
astind up comedy show mein Allan  1980 mein –apne career ke aaghaz se ab taq ke safar par baat karen gi
is douran unhon naay kya masail dekhe aur inhen kis terhan maqboliat mili
Allan  ne 1980 mein –apne career ka a? gaaz aik TV show se kya, un ka a? Kharee  comedy show 2003 mein samnay a? ya tha, jis ke baad unhon ne di Allan  show ka aaghaz kya
' ریلیٹیبل' rawan mah 18 tareekh se نیٹفلکس par Nashar  hoga
America  ka khalayi tehqeeqi idaara ناساکی report ke mutabiq qutub shumali ( aarktk اوشن ) ki mustaqil barf ki aadhi miqdaar nah sirf ghul kar khatam hochuki hai balkay bachi hui barf bhi bohat taizi se patli ho rahi hai
Nasa  ke mahireen satellite data aur sunaar ki madad se taweel Ar  se se aarktk ki barf ka jaiza liye rahay thay
mahireen ke mutabiq zair-e aabb sunaar ke zariye maloom sun-hwa hai ke ab yahan jo barf mojood hai is ki 70 fi sad miqdaar mosmyati hai jo kam aur ziyada hoti rehti hai
jab ke mouti aur mustaqil barf' ' par ma frost' ' ki barri miqdaar taizi se ghul kar khatam ho gayi hai
science daano ka kehna hai ke mausam sarma mein Bar  sunay aur jama honay wali barf jitni bhi taiz ho lekin woh purani aur mustaqil barf ki jagah nahi le sakti, kyonk_h پرمافراسٹ ghair mamooli ahmiyat ki haamil hai
mausam garma mein is ka pighla ئو barh jaye ga, phir yeh soorat ِhal samndron ke garam honay se mazeed kharab ho jaye gi
jet par ویلشن laboratory ke maahir dr ron کووک ke mutabiq poooray aarktk mein mustaqil barf ke bherne, pighalnay aur shakal badalny ka inhisaar mousmi brfbari par reh gaya hai
Nasa  ke science daano ka kehna hai ke 1958 hamza se aarktk barf ki motai do tahai kam hochuki hai, jis mein qadeem barf ka 20 laakh murabba klov meter Raqba  pighal kar khatam ho gaya hai
Bostan  misa چیوسیٹس insti tute of tecnology ( am aayi tea ) ke mahireen ney jelly numa gaind banai hai jisay aasani se ngla ja sakta hai yeh gaind pait mein jaakar phool jati hai aur aik mah tak wahan rehtay hue maiday ki androoni kefiyat aur amraaz se aagah karti hai phoolnay wali goli maiday mein rehtay hue 30 roz tak andar ke darjaa hararat aur deegar af-aal ki khabar deti rehti hai jab is goli ko badan se kharij karna ho to mareez calcium ka mehlool pi le is ke baad goli azkhud jism se bahar kharij hojaye gi choti si goli pait ke andar jaakar table tennis ki gaind ki terhan phail jati hai is mein bohat se sensor lagey hain jo maiday ki tezabiyat mein bhi kaam karte rehtay hain am aayi tea mahireen ne ہائیڈروجل aur پالیمر ke milaap se is goli ko tayyar kya hai jo pitt mein jaakar phool jati hai yeh itni naram hai ke maiday mein bhaari pan peda nahi karti mahireen ne usay پفر fish ko dekhte hue banaya hai jo khatray ke waqt khud ko phula layte hai isi terhan ہائیڈروجل se bani goli –apne andar pani jama karkay phelti rehti hai mahireen ne sensor laga kar is goli ko خنزیروں par aazmaaya hai un tajarbaat mein soroon ke maiday ke darja hararat aur deegar maloomat jama ki gayi hai aakhir mein calcium mehlool pila kar usay jism se kamyabi se bahar nikala gaya hai mahireen ke khayaal hai ke jald hi yeh tecnology insani azmaish ke liye mukammal mehfooz aur muasar banali jaye gi Karachi  5 decemeber ( siyasat dot com ) Pakistani  fast bowler Wahab  Riaz  world cupp mein hindostan kay khilaaf Pakistani  fatah ke khwaahan hain
unhon ne kaha ke Pakistani  team mehez ویراٹ kohli nahi balkay poori hareef team ke liye mansoobah banayen
baen haath ke 33 sala fast bowler Wahab  fi al-waqt squad ka hissa nahi lekin unhon ne apni team ki himayat karte hue kaha hai ke woh world cupp mein hindostan ko shikast day kar woh karnaama injaam day jo kabhi dekhnay mein nahi asaka
aindah baras 16 June  ko world cup mein Pakistan  ka muqaabla hindostan se manchester mein muqarrar hai aur is high voltage muqablay par shaiqeen ki nigehain abhi se markooz hain jis mein Wahab  Riaz  bhi shaamil hain jinhon ny 2015 mein Australia  kay khilaaf اڈیلیڈ mein world cupp quarter final ke douran behtareen bowling ki lekin Pakistan  ko fatah nah dila sakay
Wahab  ne mazeed kaha ke Pakistani  team ki tarz rasai yeh hona chahiye ke woh sirf kohli ke liye nahi balkay poori hindustani team ke liye mansoobah bandi kere kyunkay hindustani team mein kohli ke ilawa bhi achay khilari mojood hain
is baat ko bhi nazar andaaz nahi kiya ja sakta ke Pakistani  team guzashta asia cupp mein kohli se mahroom hindustani team kay khilaaf bhi dono matches haar gayi thi bain al aqwami maliyati fund ( aayi am f ) naay Pakistan  ki iqtisadi sorat e haal par apni report jari kar di hai jis ke mutabiq Pakistan  ke zar e mubadla ke zakhair kam ho kar 12. 8 arab dollar reh gaye hain aayi am f ke andazon ke mutabiq un zar e mubadla ke zakhair se sirf teen mah se bhi kam arsay taq ke liye draamdat ki adaigi mumkin hogi doosri janib report mein kaha gaya hai ke Pakistan  ki mustaqbil qareeb mein iqtisadi soorat e haal behtar nazar aati hai aur sunah 2017 aur 2018 mein maeeshat ki sharah numoo 5. 6 feesad rehne ki tawaqqa hai jis ki barri wajohaat bijli ki farahmi mein behtari chain Pakistan  iqtisadi raahdaari ke mansoobay ke tehat honay wali sarmaya kaari malik mein khapat mein taizi aur zarayi shobay ki bahaali bataaye gayi hain aalmi maliyati idaray aayi am f ne guzashta saal maali policy ki kamzoriyon ki wajah se maali khasara kal qaumi pidwar ka 5. 4 feesad taq poanch janey ka khadsha zahir kya hai jis se maeeshat mein behtari anay ke tamam imkanaat khatray mein par satke hain report mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke malik ki barhti hui draamdat ki wajah se Jaria  khasaray mein honay walay izafay ke baais malik ke zar mubadla ke zakhair kam ho kar 12. 8 arab reh gaye hain is soorat e haal ka tajzia karte hue aalmi maliyati idaray ne kaha hai ke Jaria  khasara kal qaumi pedawar ki 4. 4 feesad ho jaye ga jis ki wajah se malik ko androoni aur bairooni qarzon ki adayigyon aur draamdat ke liye darkaar zar e mubadla ki dasteyabi mein mushkilaat ka saamna karna par sakta hai baraamdaat mein izafay par tajzia karte hue report mein kaha gaya hai ke guzashta teen saal mein musalsal kami dekhnay ke baad pehli baar baraamdaat ko sanbhala mila hai aur is ke sath sath beron malik se anay walay zar mubadla mein bhi pichlle saal ki kami ke baad aik baar phir behtari dekhnay mein aayi hai report mein is khadshay ka izhaar kya gaya hai ke is saal honay walay election ki wajah se Pakistan  ki aayi am f ko qarzay ki adaigi mutasir ho sakti hai kyunkay election se qabal khrchon mein izafah dekhnay mein aata hai is ke ilawa aalmi manndi mein tail ki barhti hui qeematon aur baraamdaat ki bahaali nah hona bhi qarzon ki adaigi mein dushwari peda ho sakti hai doosri janib Pakistani  hakkaam ney is umeed ka izhaar kya hai ke woh rupay ki qader mein kami anay ke baad ghair mulki zar mubadla ki market mein tawazun dekhnay mein aaya hai jo darmiyani muddat mein qarzay ada karne ki mad mein faida mand saabit hoga qtr ke wazeer baraye tawanai Saad  شریدہ الکعبی ney elaan kya hai ke qtr January  2019 mein tail peda karne walay mumalik ki tanzeem ( avpik ) ka hissa nahi rahay ga
الجزیرہ ki report ke mutabiq tail peda karne walay 15 mumalik ki tanzeem ko chhornay ke faislay ki tasdeeq qtr ki sarkari oil company qtr pitrolim ki janib se ki gayi thi
Doha  mein aik news conference karte hue Saad  شریدہ الکعبی ka kehna tha ke' avpik se dastaberdar honay ke faislay ki wajah yeh hai ke qtr aindah saloon mein qudrati gas ki pedawar ko 77 million tan salana se 110 million tan salana badhaane ka iradah rakhta hai aur apni tamam tar tawajah is par markooz rakhna chahta hai '
mazeed parheen : hukoomat ka qtr ke sath ail an jee maahdon par dobarah baat cheet ke liye ghhor khayaal rahay ke qtr pehla khliji malik hai jo tail peda karne walay mumalik ki tanzeem ko chore raha hai
الجزیرہ ki sahafi کارلوٹ بیلس ka kehna tha ke qtr ne yeh faisla 6 decemeber ko avpik ijlaas ke aaghaz se chand din pehlay liya
کارلوٹ بیلس naay Saudi  arab, America , mutahidda arab amarat ( you ae ای ), misar aur bahrain ki janib se qutar par safarti pabandion ki taraf ishara karte hue kaha ke' avpik se niklny ke faislay ka qutar par pabandion se koi talluq nahi aur is hawalay se kayi mahino se soch rahay hain '
کارلوٹ بیلس nay﻿ bataya ke' qatri wazeer tawanai ka kehna tha ke woh chahtay hain ke avpik se niklny ka kaam 6 decemeber ko avpik ijlaas se qabal abhi aur shafaaf tareeqay se hojaye '
wazeh rahay ke 2013 se ab taq qtr ki tail ki pedawar mein taizi se kami aayi hai, 2013 mein qtr mein tail ki pedawar 7 laakh 28 hazaar barrel yomiya se 2017 mein 6 laakh 7 hazaar barrel yomiya taq ja pohanchi thi jo ke avpik ki majmoi pedawar ka 2 feesad se bhi kam hai
yeh bhi parheen : Saudi  arab sameit 6 mumalik ne qutar se safarti taluqaat khatam kardiye taham isi arsay mein avpik ki majmoi pedawar mein 30. 7 million barrel yomiya se 32. 4 million barrel yomiya izafah sun-hwa tha
qutar duniya mein لیکویفائیڈ natural gas ( ail an jee ) ki sab se ziyada sharah 30 feesad peda karta hai
الجزیرہ ke mutabiq wazeer tawanai ka kehna tha ke avpik chorney ka faisla aik karobari faisla hai
Saad  شریدہ الکعبی ka kehna tha ke' avpik mein hamara kirdaar bohat kam hai, mein aik karobari shakhs hon aur mein nahi samjhta ke hamein un cheezon par tavajja markooz karni chahiye jo hamari qowat nahi '
un ka kehna tha ke' hamari qowat qudrati gas hai aur is liye hum ney yeh faisla liya hai '
khayaal rahay ke qtr nay﻿ avpik ki tashkeel ke aik saal baad 1961 mein shamoliat ikhtiyar ki thi
chand roz qabal avpik aro roos ne aindah mahino mein tail ki qeematon mein ziyada kami nah laane ki koshisho par ittafaq kya tha
yaad rahay ke rawan baras october mein tail ki qeemat 4 baras ki buland tareen satah 86 dollar tak ja pohanchi thi lekin is ke baad tail ki qeemat dobarah 60 dollar fi barrel tak pahonch gayi thi
barslona mein honay wali mobile world congress ki taqreeb mein Nokia  ke aik aur puranay phone ko dobarah muta-arif karaya gaya hai
matrix Nami  film mein dukhaay jaaane walay Maroof  mobile phone 8110 ko dobarah se lanch kya gaya hai
is mobile phone par Nokia  ki برینڈنگ to mojood hai taham usay each MD global Nami  company ne banaya hai
Nokia  3310 : duniya ke sab se mashhoor phone ki wapsi Apple  aur Nokia  aik dosray se' taawun' karne par tayyar isi company ne guzashta saal mobile world congress mein Nokia  ke hi aik Maroof  mobile phone 3310 ko dobarah muta-arif karwaya tha
aisa lagta hai ke company nay﻿ 3310 ke dobarah lanch ki kamyabi ke baad waisa hi kuch dohranay ki koshish ki hai
each MD ki janib se muta-arif karwaye janay wala mobile phone 8110 aik fichr phone hai jis ke کائے operating system par chand ایپس hi chalaye ja saken gi
jo ایپس is fichr phone par chalaye ja saken gi un mein Google  assistant, Google  میپس aur Facebook shaamil hain lekin is phone par twitter, snap cheat ya wats app nahi chalaya ja sakay ga
is mobile phone ko khham daar banaya gaya hai aur is ke ki pad par aik سلائیڈر bhi hai aur yeh 4 jee internet ko bhi support karta hai
company ki janib se bi bi si ko bataya gaya hai ke is qeemat 97 dollar ke qareeb hogi
is ke ilawa company ki janib se teen deegar mobile phones bhi muta-arif kurwaye gaye hain
un mein stil se bana smart phone' سوروکو' bhi shaamil hai, jis ki qeemat 921 dollar taq ho sakti hai
tasweer ke copy write eso / m. kornmesser image caption اومواموا ( khayaali tasweer ) ab doobeeno se oojhal hota ja raha hai aap ko yaad ho ga ke guzashta saal 19 october ko nizam shamsi mein aik lambotra maheman syarche ko daryaft kya gaya tha jis ka naam mahireen falkiat ny' اومواموا' rakha tha
aik nai tahaqeeq mein Andia  diya gaya hai ke sitaron ke darmain waqay khalaa se nizam shamsi mein daakhil honay wala syarch_h khalayi makhlooq ka khalayi jahaaz ho sakta hai jis ko zameen ke baaray mein maloomat haasil karne ke liye bheja gaya ho
is sayarchay ko 19 october ko daryaft kya gaya tha aur is ki raftaar aur zawiye se zahir hota hai ke yeh nizam shamsi se bahar kisi aur setaaray ke nizaam se aaya hai
mazeed padhiye nizam shamsi mein aik lambotra maheman syarch_h is ke baray mein science daano ka kehna hai ke woh ab taq maloom ajraam falki mein se sab se ziyada lambotra hai
yeh taaza tahaqeeq America  ki harord university ke smith سونین center far ایسٹرو فزیکس ne ki hai
is tehqeeq mein is imkaan ko zahir kya gaya hai ke yeh لمبوترہ syarch_h jis ki chorai ke muqablay par is ki lambai kam از kam das gina ziyada hai aur aik laakh 96 hazaar mil fi ghanta ki raftaar se safar kar raha tha kisi khalayi makhlooq ka ho
ایسٹرو physical journal letters ko di gayi is tahaqeeq mein tahaqeeq daano ka kehna hai' اومواموا mukammal tor par fa-aal khalayi jahaaz tha jis ko zameen ke barey mein jan-nay ke liye khalayi tahazeeb ny bheja ho
' tasweer ke copy right pa harord university ki yeh tahaqeeq falkiat ke sarbarah professor ایبراہم lubh aur Shamil  بیالی ne ki hai
professor abhi tak chaar kitaaben aur 700 se ziyada tehqeeqi papers black houlle, kaayenaat ka mustaqbil, khalayi makhlooq ki talaash aur sitaron par likh chuke hain
yeh taaza tehqeeq is لمبوترے syarche ki raftaar ki bunyaad par likha gaya hai
tahaqeeq mein kaha gaya hai ke' is لمبوترے syarche ko khalayi makhlooq ki shai samgha jaye to aik mumkina baat yeh ho sakti hai ke' اومواموا' sitaron ke darmain teer raha hai
tehqeeq mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke' اومواموا' ki taiz raftaar aur ghair mamooli madaar ka matlab ho sakta hai ke yeh ab fa-aal nah ho
' tehqeeq ko radd mat karen' professor lubh ne kaha hai ke is tehqeeq ko sirf is liye radd nah kya jaye ke yeh zaheen khalayi makhlooq ki mojoodgi ki janib nishandahi kar rahi hai
' is qisam ka taasub hamein nah rakhna chahiye
science khulay zehnon ke liye hai
' chali mein waqay doorbeen se is ka mushahida karne wali Amrici  maahir falkiat kirn match aur un ke sathiyon neh takhmeenah lagaya tha ke is syarche ki lambai 400 meter hai aur taizi se ghoom raha tha, jis ki wajah se is ki chamak mein taizi se kami Beshi  hoti rehti thi
tasweer ke copy write nasa / jpl-caltech / iau image caption اومواموا ki raftaar aur zawiye se andaza hota hai ke yeh nizam shamsi ke bahar se aaya hai chamak mein isi tabdeeli ki wajah se اومواموا ki ajeeb o ghareeb shakal ka andaza laganay mein madad mili
taham yeh wazeh karna zaroori hai ke is tehqeeq mein tehqeeq daan yeh nahi keh rahay ke' اومواموا' yaqeenan khalayi makhlooq ka khalayi jahaaz hai
tehqeeq daano ka kehna hai ke aisa honay ke khatir khuwa imkanaat mojood hain
tehqeeq daano ka kehna hai ke yeh لمبوترہ syarch_h khalayi makhlooq ka khalayi kabaar bhi ho sakta hai, ghair fa-aal sale craft bhi ho sakta hai jo ghalti se yahan aa gaya
ya phir fa-aal khalayi jahaaz jo hamaray nizaam e shamsi ke baaray mein mazeed maloomat haasil karne aaya ho

Mumbai  ( daily Pakistan  online ) bollywood adakar Urfan  Khan  اورسونالی بیندرے ke baad ab Bharti  film industry ke maqbool tareen adakar Shahid  Kapoor  ke baarey mein bhi afwahen gardish kar rahi hain ke woh maiday ke cancer mein mubtala hain taham ab adakar ke ahal khanah ney un ki tardeed kar di hai
Bharti  media mein afwahen gardish kar rahi hain ke Shahid  Kapoor  ( stomach cancer ) maiday ke cancer mein mubtala hain aur inhen stage one cancer ki تشخیص hui hai
guzashta roz media mein yeh khabrain bhi gardish kar rahi theen Shahid  Kapoor  film' kabeer singh' ki shooting adhuri chore kar surgery karanay Dehli  rawana hue hain yeh khabar samnay anay ke baad hi un ke cancer ki khabar jungle ki aag ki terhan phail gayi aur Shahid  ke madah tashweesh ka shikaar hogaye
taham adakar Shahid  Kapoor  ke ghar walon ney inhen cancer honay ki khabron ki tardeed karte hue kaha hai ke' kuch log kaisay yeh sab likh satke hain? a? khar is khabar ki bunyaad kya hai? is terhan ki afwahen phelanay ko kis terhan se jaaiz thehraya jasktahe ?' doosri janib adakar Shahid  Kapoor  ney haal hi mein apni ahliya mera Rajpot  ke sath aik tasweer social media par share ki hai jis mein woh dono Khushgawar  mausam ko enjoy karte hue nazar arhay hain aur bilkul sahet mand hain
mazeed : tafreeh ade poor 10 dsmbr ( agency ) reliance industry ke chairman mukesh ambani ki beti aysha ambani ki high profayl shadi mein malik o beron malik se senkron maheman puhanche, pari وڈنگ taqreeb ade poor mein chal rahi hai, is events mein kayi international stars prfarm kar rahay hain مہشور international sngrz ko airport par dekha gaya, kaha jata hai ke byons naay aik din ke liye ade poor mein performance kya aur prfarm karne ke liye byons naay 15 crore rupay liye hain byons naay aysha aur aanand ke sangeet mein live prfarm kya hai, kaha ja raha hai ke woh paiir ko wapas ho jaien gi, unki dance team mein qareeb 60 dancer shaamil hue ﻿منی sota : nai Amrici  tahaqeeq se yeh tashweesh naak baat samnay aayi hai ke safai sthrayi aur aam gharelo ashya mein die کلورو فینولز ( d si pi ) aur deegar aisay chemical paye jatay hain jo dil ke amraaz aur سرطان ke khatray se khaali nahi
journal of اوکیوپیشنل and aynwayrmintl medicine mein shaya report ke mutabiq aik janib to anti bacteria masnoaat, bo daur karne wali ashya aur tooth paste waghera mein d si pi aam paaya jata hai to doosri janib un mein khatarnaak try کلوسان bhi aam mojood hota hai
yeh baat qabil ghhor rahay ke try کلوسان ki tabahiyoo par pehlay bhi bohat kuch likha aur kaha gaya hai aur ab kayi mumalik ney is chemical par pabandi lagadi hai jo shampoo se le kar toth paste taq darjanon ashya mein aam istemaal hota hai
is hawalay se university of mِni sutta school of public health ne national health and nutritional ایگزامنیشن surway ke tehat aik surway kya hai
is mein 3, 617 afraad shareek hue jis mein tamam shrka ne sawal naame bharay
shrka se un ke bemaar honay ke baray mein poocha gaya aur un ki pishaab ke nmonon mein do terhan ke chemical 2, 5-dcp aur 2, 4-dcp ki miqdaar note ki gayi
jin shrka ke pishaab mein 2, 5-dcp ki miqdaar ziyada thi un mein dil ke amraaz aur tamam کینسروں ka khatrah ziyada paaya gaya
taham 2, 4-dcp mein aisi koi baat note nahi ki gayi

Mumbai  : –apne dilkash khado khhaal aur dilfaraib husn ki badolat bollywood mein barbie doll ke naam se mashhoor Katrina  Kaif  neh zindagi ki 35 baharen dekh len
16 July  1983 ko hang kaang mein peda honay wali Katrina  Kaif  ke waalid' ' Mohammad  Kaif ' ' ka talluq maqboza Kashmir  jabkay walida' ' سوسانا ٹرکیوئٹ' ' Bartanwi  shehri hain, Katrina  Kaif  nay﻿ larakpan mein hi madlng ke maidan mein qadam rakh diya tha, madlng ke douran hi inhen Bharti  nazaad Bartanwi  film Hadayat  car کیزاد گستاد nay﻿ film' ' boom' ' mein adakari ki peshkash ki jis mein Amitabh  bachchan aur Gulshan  guruver jaisay barray sitaron nay﻿ kaam kya, jis ke baad unhon nay﻿ tilgo aur tml filmon mein bhi adakari ke johar dukhaay
bollywood mein un ki sahih maino mein entry 2005 ki bock bstr film' ' sarkar' ' se hui jis ke baad unhon ney peechay مڑکر nahi dekha, un ki kamyabi ka saboot yeh hai ke woh mojooda daur ki un chand super stars mein shaamil hain jinhon ney bollywood par raaj karne walay tenu خانز ke sath kaam kya hai
Katrina  Kaif  ki kamyabi mein sab se bara kirdaar Salman  Khan  se un ki dosti hai, jinhon naay har mushkil waqt mein un ka sath nibhaya
qaumi khazanay ka pait bharnay ki khatir hukoomat ney mobile phones ki daraamad par bhaari bharkam duty aed kar di tax bherne se mukhtalif aqsam ke smart phones 4 hazaar se 50 hazaar rupay taq mehngay ho gaye mobile phones dealers association ke mutabiq hukoomat ney awam ke liye smart phones khareedna intahi mushkil bana diya tax amdan mein izafay ki khatir hukoomat ney mobile phones ki daraamad par duty 4 hazaar se 50 hazaar rupay taq barha di jis ke baad 7 hazaar wala smart phone 11 hazaar rupay ka ho gaya 14 hazaar wala smart phone ab 20 hazaar rupay ka kar diya gaya 21 hazaar wala smart phones 8 hazaar izafay 29 hazaar rupay ka ho gaya jabkay 1 laakh wala smart phones ab aik laakh 42 hazaar rupay ka ho gaya Pakistan  cricket board ( PCB ) aur Bharti  cricket board ( bi si si aayi ) ke darmiyan muqadmay ki teen roza samaat aaj Dubai  mein qaim bain al aqwami cricket board ke saddar daftar mein shuru ho gayi hai
yeh muqadma Pakistan  neh 2014 mein Bharti  cricket board ke sath tey honay walay samjhotay ki Bharat  ki taraf se khilaaf warzi ke baad aayi si si ki adalat mein dair kya tha
is smjhote ki ro se Bharat  aur Pakistan  ko 2015 se 2023 ke darmain aath barson mein chay do Tarfah  series khelna theen
taham Bharti  board ne yeh kehte hue Pakistan  ke sath koi bhi do Tarfah  series khailnay se inkaar kar diya tha ke usay Bharti  hukoomat ki janib se ijazat nahi mili hai
Pakistan  ny daawa kiya hai ke usay ab taq nah kheli janay wali series se saat crore dollar ka nuqsaan sun-hwa hai aur uss ny Bharat  se yeh harjana ada karne ka mutalba kiya hai
Pakistan  aur Bharat  ne 2007 mein Pakistan  cricket team ke dora Bharat  ke baad se koi mukammal do Tarfah  series nahi kheli hai
taham Pakistan  naay 2012 ke ekhtataam par Bharat  mein mehdood overs ki aik امختصر series bhi kheli thi lekin yeh mukammal series nahi thi
sunah 2014 mein cricket ke bain al aqwami idaray aayi si si ki tashkeel no ki ja rahi thi jis mein cricket khailnay walay teen barray mulkon yani Bharat , Australia  aur inglistan ko cricket ke mamlaat mein tarjeehi hesiyat haasil ho gayi thi
Pakistan  ne Bharat  ki himayat ke badlay Bharat  se chay do Tarfah  series khailnay ke liye tehreeri samjhota tay kya tha
un chay series mein chaar ki maizbani Pakistan  ko karna thi jis mein kal 24 match khailay jane thay
un chay series mein tey shuda programme ke mutabiq 14 test, 30 aik roza match aur 12 T20 match shaamil they
taham baad mein dono mulkon ke siyasi taluqaat intahi kasheeda hotay chalay gay aur yun Bharti  board nay﻿ yeh keh kar jaan chhuranay ki koshish ki ke Pakistan  se cricket match khailnay ke liye usay Bharti  hukoomat se ijazat ki zaroorat hai aur hukoomat nay﻿ usay yeh ijazat nahi di hai
Pakistan  cricket board is se ittafaq nahi karta aur kehta hai ke Bharti  cricket board nay﻿ apni hukoomat ko qaail karne ke liye sanjeeda koshish nahi ki hai
PCB ka kehna hai ke agar Bharat  aayi si si ke tehat honay walay ٹورنمنٹس mein Pakistan  ke sath khail sakta hai to phir do Tarfah  series khailnay se munkir kyun hai
aayi si si nay﻿ shuru mein dono mulkon ke hawalay se azad aur motadil policy ikhtiyar ki
taham guzashta baras aayi si si ke Bharat  nazaad chairman shashank mnohr ny London  mein honay walay aayi si si ke ijlaas mein Pakistan  cricket board ko mahswara diya ke woh Bharti  cricket board ke khilaaf qanooni charah joi nah kere kyunkay aisa karne se uss ke Bharti  cricket بوردڈ ke sath taluqaat hamesha ke liye kharab ho jayen ge
cricket ke mubasireen kehte hain ke is mashwaray ke zariye ششانگ mnohr ne darasal Bharti  cricket board ki policy ki himayat ki ke usay Pakistan  ke sath do Tarfah  series khailnay ke liye apni hukoomat ki ijazat darkaar ho gi
Pakistan  cricket board ke hakkaam ney ijlaas se walk out karte hue kaha ke aayi si si ke chairman Dur  asal Bharti  cricket board ki waqalat kar rahay hain aur woh ghair janabdaar nahi rahay
yun Pakistan  cricket board ke paas aayi si si ke tanazeaat ke hal ke tribyonl mein jaaane siwa koi rasta nahi tha
PCB kehta hai ke agar Bharti  cricket board ko Pakistan  ke sath series khailnay ke liye hukoomat ki ijazat darkaar thi to uss ney mafahmat ki yad dasht par dastakhat kyun kiye
PCB ka moaqqaf hai ke Bharat  ki taraf se 2014 aur 2015 mein kheli jaaane wali do mujawaza series khailnay se inkaar ke baais kam se kam saat crore dollar ka nuqsaan sun-hwa hai
yun Pakistan  cricket bordne guzashta baras November  mein aayi si si ki tanazeaat ke hal ki committee ke rubaroo muqadma dair kar diya
teen rukni is tribyonl ki samaat aaj Dubai  mein shuru ho gayi hai jo teen din tak jari rahay gi
samaat ke ekhtataam par yeh teen rukni committee apna faisla budh ke roz suna day gi jis ke khilaaf koi appeal nahi ki ja sakay gi aur dono fariqain ko usay qubool karna ho ga
aayi si si ke is teen rukni panel ke chairman Michael  bilof hain jo is se qabal aayi si si ke uss tribyonl ka hissa reh chuke hain jis ne sapat fixing skindl mein Pakistan  ke Salman  Butt , Mohammad  Asif  aur Mohammad  Aamir  ko sazayen sunai theen
Michael  bilof ke ilawa deegar do arkaan mein jaan پولسن aur aynabil bent shaamil hain
khush naseebi ka inhisaar aap ki soch aur ravayye par hai kuch log dosaron ke muqablay mein ziyada khush bikhat kyun hotay hain maahir nafsiat richard vayzmin kehte hain ke' log apni achi ya buri qismat khud banatay hain richard vayzmin ke is nateejay par pounchanay ki bunyaad darasal woh tahaqeeq hai jis mein unhon neh logon ki zindagi mein qismat ke kirdaar ka mutalea kya hai woh –apne is mutalay ko baqaida aik scienci tahaqeeq qarar dete hain jis mein unhon neh budqismat afraad ka mawazna un afraad se kya jo khud ko khush naseeb kehte hain is tahaqeeq se richard neh yeh نیتجہ akhaz kya hai ke khush qismati koi jaadoyi ahliat nahi aur nah hi yeh qudrati tor par be wajah ho jati hai balkay is ka inhisaar is baat par hai ke aap sochte kya hain aur aap ka rawayya kya hai richard ke bakol jin logon ko hum khush bikhat kehte hain asal mein woh chaar kaam kar rahay hotay hain naye mawaqay se faida uthana khud ko khush naseeb kehnay walay logon mein yeh ahliat hoti hai ke woh kisi bhi naye mauqa ko nah sirf pehchan letay hain balkay usay durust waqt par dboch bhi letay hain aur jab inhen agay bherne ka naya mauqa nazar aata hai to woh hansi khushii uss simt mein chal parte hain mister vayzmin ke bakol bad naseeb log is ka bilkul ulat karte hain yeh log aik hi ratt mein lagey rehtay hain aur agar koi naya mauqa aata bhi hai to yeh log –apne khauf ki wajah se is se faida nahi utha paate dil kya kehta hai naye mawaqay se faida uthany ka ziyada inhisaar is par hota hai ke aaya aap –apne dil ki suntay hain ya nahi khush naseeb log –apne dil ki baat ya wajdan par amal karne se ghabrate nahi inn ko agar koi cheez theek lagti hai to yeh chhalang laga kar is mein kood parte hain aur yun dosaron se uge nikal jatay hain is ke bar aks bad naseeb logon ki yeh fitrat hoti hai ke woh cheezon ka zaroorat se ziyada jaiza letay rehtay hain aur asal soorat e haal ko nazar andaaz kar dete hain yahi cheez un ko bohat nuqsaan pouncha deti hai mister vayzmin kehte hain ke is qisam ke log cheezon ko samajhney mein der kar dete hain aur un ki soch ziyada mufeed nahi rehti kamyabi ki umeed karna khush naseeb log jo kaam bhi karte hain inhen umeed hoti hai ke woh is mein kamyaab ho jayen ge is qisam ke log hamesha yeh tawaqqa karte hain ke aakhir-kaar soorat e haal un ke haq mein badal jaye gi aur yahi woh cheez hai jo inhen kamyaab kar deti hai mister vayzmin kehte hain ke har baar aisa hona zurori nahi lekin aisay afraad ka misbet rawayya inhen mushkil waqt ka saamna karne mein madad karta hai aur woh is mein se bhi guzar jatay hain khush naseeb afraad ki yeh salahiyat nah sirf inhen kamyaab banati hai balkay dosray log bhi un ki taraf kheinchain chalay atay hain achay ki umeed rakhen to achchca hoga is ke muqablay mein bad naseeb log na umeedi ka shikaar ho jatay hain aur is ka nateeja yeh nikalta hai ke log aap se daur hona shuru ho jatay hain kyunkay aap har waqt bezaar nazar atay hain misbet rehna mister vayzmin ka kehna hai ke sab se ahem cheez misbet rehna hai hum mein se har shakhs ke sath buri cheeze hoti hain lekin khush naseeb log is qisam ke tajarbaat se haar nahi mante balkay aik naye jazbay ke sath samnay atay hain yeh log is qisam ki cheezon se sabaq letay hain aur apna safar jari rakhtay hain jis ka nateeja yeh hota hai ke bad qismati bhi khush bakhti mein badal jati hai khush naseeb log misbet soch se bad naseebi ko bhi khush bakhti mein badal dete hain doosri janib woh log jo khud ko bad naseeb samajte hain woh zara si manfi cheez se bhi himmat haar baithtay hain yeh log yaqeen kar letay hain ke un ka mustaqbil tareek hi hoga is liye koshish karne ki koi zaroorat bhi nahi aap ki khush bakhti hai ke khush naseeb ban-na mumkin hai richard vayzmin ka kehna hai ke aisay tareeqay mojood hain jin par amal kar ke koi bhi khush naseeb ho sakta hai inn mein aik taknik yeh hai ke apna mustaqbil sanwarnay ke liye aap aik khush naseebi ki diary banayen jis mein aap woh cheeze likhain jo achi huien maslan aaj kya aaccha sun-hwa, chahay yeh koi haqeer cheez hi ho usay apni diary mein likhain naseeb ki mhrbanyon ko yaad rakhiye aur rawayya misbet rakhiye aisa karne se hota yeh hai ke aap ke zehan se manfi cheeze kam hona shuru ho jati hain aur aap ko zindagi ke misbet pehloun ko dekhnay ka ziyada mauqa milta hai is mein koi shak nahi ke hamari zindagi mein kayi aisi cheeze hoti hain jin par hamara ikhtiyar nahi hota lekin is qisam ki diary bananay ka faida yeh hota hai ke hum ziyada sakht jaan ho jatay hain aur buri surat_e_ haal ka muqaabla behtar andaaz mein kar satke hain shayad soch mein is tabdeeli ke asraat aik dam zahir mujhe poori umeed hai ke mein bohat jald theek ho jaoon ga aur agar kkhuda ne chaha to mein bohat jald Bharat  wapas aajaon ga wazeh rahay ke rashi Kapoor  ne chand mah qabal twitter par ittila dete hue kaha tha ke woh ilaaj ki gharz se kuch dinon ke liye America  ja rahay hain taham unn ke bayan ke baad yeh khabrain bhi samnay ayen ke woh cancer jaisi bemari mein mubtala hain jis ke ilaaj ke لوچین ko qatal karne aur laash ki be hurmati karne ke jurm mein Umar  qaid ki saza ka saamna karna parsakta hai washington ( online ) trmp intizamia nay﻿ Pakistan  ke rokay gaye security funds bahaal karne par ghhor shuru kardiya Amrici  akhbar nay﻿ daawa kiya hai ke trmp intizamia Pakistan  ki nai hukoomat ke sath taluqaat mamool par laane ki khwahan hai aur is silsilay mein is nay﻿ Pakistan  ke rokay gaye funds dobarah bahaal karne par bhi ghhor shuru kya hai akhbar nay﻿ kaha ke Imran  Khan  ke Iqtidaar  mein anay se pak America  taluqaat ko dobarah ustuwar karne ka naya daur khula hai aur security fndz ki bahaali taluqaat dobarah ustuwar karne ke iqdamaat ka hissa hai yaad rahay ke pentagon ny Pakistan  ke 300 million dollar fndz 2 September  ko roknay ka elaan kya tha jis ke baad 5 September  ko Amrici  wazeer kharja mike پومپئو ny Pakistan  ka dora kya jis mein unhon ny siyasi o askari qayadat se mulakaatein bhi kee Amrici  akhbar ny daawa kiya hai ke White House intizamia mein kashmakash jari hai ke saddar Donald  trmp ki jarehana policy par az sar e no ghhor kya jaye jab ke Pakistan  mein sabiq Amrici  safeer ka khayaal hai ke Pakistan  ke fndz rokna trmp intizamia ka khofnaak faisla tha akhbar ki report mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke pak America  taluqaat mein Imran  Khan  klidi ahmiyat ke haamil ho saktay hain cnnurdu ney monday, 23 july 2018 ko shaya kya. Mumbai  : bollywood ki خوربرواداکارہ aalia Bhatt  bhi آخرکاربالی wood mein uqarba parwari se mutaliq bol parrin
Bharti  media reports ke mutabiq pichlle kuch arsay mein sab se ziyada bollywood mein fankaron ki janib se baat hui to woh اقرباپروری prthi, jis پراداکاروں ny apni apni raye di avrab adakara Alia  Bhatt  bhi is mutaliq bol hi pari hain
Alia  Bhatt  se jab poocha gaya twan ka kehna tha ke اقرباپروری se mutaliq kisi bhi اداکاریا fankar ka difaa karna be maienay hai kyunkay bollywood jaisi industry mein اقرباپروری mojood hai
adakara ney kaha ke kuch adakaron ke liye yeh jazbati behas hojati hai jab inhen kaam karne ka mauqa nahi diya jata aur agar yeh hi sab mere sath bhi ho to yakeeni tor par mera dil bhi buri terhan tootay ga
adakara ka kehna tha اقرباپروری har jagaah mojood hai, bas kisi ke liye is ka aaccha ya bura waqt bhi bohat maienay rakhta hai, film industry mein aap kologon کومحظوظ karna hota hai jo apnay aap mein mushkil kaam hai, aik aaccha dikhne wala اداکاراکثر peechay reh jata hai avrkbhi kabhi aik aam sa dikhne wala اداکاراپنی behtareen adakari se agay nikal jata hai
adakara nay﻿ apni misaal dete hue kaha ke woh bhi aik maaya naz hidayatkaar ki beti hain lekin unki pehli film' student of di air' nay﻿ mujhe agay bherne mein bohat ziyada madad di تومحنت bhi bohat zaroori hai
chris gil ki qismat khil gayi sharamnaak ilzaam lagnay ki wajah se karorron ke maalik ban gaye kngz ‬ٹاؤن ( monitoring disk ) news land ke cricketer chris gil ki qismat khil gayi hai jo khud prlgaye gaye aik khatoon ko jinsi tor par harasan karne ke ilzaam ki wajah se crore patti ban gaye hain mil online ke mutabiq 2015 hamza ke Cricket World Cupp ke dora noon chris gil پرانتہائی sharamnaak ilzaam aed kya gaya tha ke woh team ko massage karne wali khatoon leni Rasal  ke samnay burhenapa hue hain aur usay jinsi tor par harasan kya is par فیرفیکس media company ke kayi akhbarat nay﻿ articles likhay they 2016ء mein chris gil ne is media company ke khilaaf hattak izzat ka daawa dair kya tha jis ka ab faisla aa gaya hai aur adalat ne media company ko hukum diya hai ke woh chris gil ko 3 laakh dollar harjana ada kere report ke mutabiq chris gil ke khilaaf articles company ke akhbarat di sydney morning hirald di age aur di کنبرا times mein shaya hue they an s w sprim court ke chaar rukni bench ne faislay mein likha ke fiyrfiks yeh saabit karne mein nakaam rahi hai ke chris gil khatoon ke samnay burhenapa hue they aur is ne bughz ki wajah se is ke khilaaf articles shaya kiye adalat mein leni Rasal  naay bhi bayan diya is ka kehna tha ke mein apni massage table laganay ke baad team ke kamray mein gayi jahan gil aur davine smith mojood they chris naay toliya lapait rakha tha aur shirt pehan rahay they jab mein andar daakhil hui up ki device par pallay back support dastyab nahi ننھوں ko chup krwane ki jaadoyi tarkeeb aik nai tahaqeeq ke mutabiq nanhay bachon ko aahista aahista thapki dainay ke amal se un ke dimagh mein takleef da tajarbaat ke asraat kam hotay hain is tahaqeeq mein Bartania  ki aaksfrd university aur لورپول jaan morin university shaamil theen aur mahireen naay is mein blood test ke douran 32 bachon ke dimagh ki nigrani ki un mein se adhay bachon ki peshani par aik naram brush phera gaya to un ke dimagh naay dard ko 40 feesad kam mehsoos kya is report ki Musanifa  rbika slitr ka kehna hai ke chone ka yeh amal kisi muzir assar ya Said  افییکٹ ke baghair dard se nijaat ka zareya bantaa hai tahaqeeq mein bataya gaya hai ke bachay ko تھپکنے ki raftaar teen centi meter fi second thi professor slitr ka kehna hai ke walidain qudrati tor par hi bachon ko isi raftaar se thapki dete hain woh kehti hain ke agar hum aasabi nizaam ( nervous سسسٹم ) ke bunyadi dhanchay ko achi terhan samajh len to hum bachon ko behtar Aram  dainay ke hawalay se walidain ki rahnumai kar satke hain tahaqeeq mein yeh bhi samnay aaya hai ke agar hum teen centi meter fi second ki raftaar se thapki dete hain to hamari jald mein mojood mehsoos karne walay raishay ya سینسری نیورون mutharrak ho jatay hain jis se dard mein kami mehsoos hoti hai un reshon ko si ٹیکٹائل bhi kehte hain aur maazi ki tehqiqaat ke mutabiq inn mein harkat se balighon mein bhi dard ke asraat kam ho jatay hain lekin bachon ke hawalay se yeh wazeh nahi tha ke aaya un ka rad-e-amal bhi aisa hi hota hai ya phir yeh waqt ke sath parwan charhata hai yani un ki Umar  bherne ke sath sath professor slitr ka kehna hai ke ab yeh saabit ho gaya hai ke bachon mein bhi si ٹیکٹائل ko mutharrak kya ja sakta hai aur halka sa thapakna bachon ke dimagh ke feal mein tabdeeli laa sakta hai woh kehti hain ke hayaatiyaat ke jareeday current biology mein shaya honay wali un ki tahaqeeq is suni sunai baat ki scienci wazahat kar sakti hai ke nozayd_h bachon ko تھپکنے se un ki takleef kam ho jati hai yani bachon ko massage kyun kya jata aur waqt se pehlay peda honay walay bachon ko jab maa ke jism ke sath rakha jata hai to un ki takleef kam kyun ho jati hai professor slitr ke mutabiq Sabiqa  tehqiqaat mein yeh saabit ho chuka hai ke jitna walidain bachay ke qareeb hotay hain aur usay chutay hain itna hi walidain aur bachon dono ki takleef kam hoti hai aur is ke sath sath hospital mein guzray waqt ka dorania bhi kam ho jata hai tahaqeeq likhnay walon ka kehna hai ke ab woh yahi tahaqeeq waqt se pehlay peda honay walay bachon par bhi karen ge kyunkay qabal az-waqat paidaiesh ki wajah se un ki haasiyat se mutaliq maloomat aur is se munsalik aasabi nizaam abhi tayari ke marahil mein hota hai rafahi idaray bliss ki cheif executive kirolin li dyoy naay is tahaqeeq ka kher muqaddam kya hai un ka kehna tha ke hum pehlay hi jantay hain ke misbet andaaz mein chouna yani jald ke zariye jald ki care se bachon mein barah e raast wazeh farq parta hai aur bachon aur walidain ke darmain talluq mazboot hota hai bohat se log yeh nahi samajte ke aik nozayd_h bacha hospital mein kis qisam ki dekh bhaal se gujarta hai kirolin kehti hain ke aisi koi bhi daryaft jo bachon ki be aarami ko kam kar sakay woh agay ki janib aik bara qadam ho ga Mumbai  ( web desk ) bollywood ki khobsorat jori virat kohli aur anushka sharmaa ki shadi ko aik baras mukammal hogaya star jori ny is mauqa par shadi ki tasaveer اورویڈیوز madahon ke sath share karkay apni khushii ka izhaar kya virat kohli ny shadi ke Hussain  aur Khushgawar  lamhaat ki tasaveer social media par share kee aur likha' mujhe yaqeen nahi ho raha hamari shadi ko aik baras mukammal hogaya aisa mehsoos ho raha hai jaisay kal hi ki baat ho, waqt par laga کراڑ gaya virat kohli ny apni ahliya ko shadi ki pehli saalgirah ki mubarakbaad dete hue inhen apni behtareen dost aur zindagi bhar ki saathi qaraar diya' doosri janib anoshka sharmaa ne bhi apni shadi ki aik mukhtasir video share ki aur likha' aisa lag raha hai jaisay mein jannat mein hon jab aap aik achay ensaan se shadi karte hain to aisa lagta hai jaisay aap jannat mein hain' wazeh rahay ke virat kohli اورانوشکا sharmaa guzashta baras 11 decemeber ko italy mein shadi ke bandhan mein bandhay they, dono ne apni shadi ki ittila shadi ki tasaveer social media par aik sath share karkay di thi dono ki shadi ki khabar sun kar jahan tamam log heran hue wahein un ke chahanay walon aur poori bollywood industry ne jore ke liye naik تمناوؤں ka izhaar kya tha beijing ( web desk ) smart phone bananay wali Maroof  cheeni company' huawei' ne Amrici  company Apple  ke smart phone' aayi phone' ka istemaal karte hue company ke official twitter account se salِ no ki mubarakbaad ka pegham post karne par –apne do mulazmeen ki bator saza tanzuli kar di
میش able ki aik report ke mutabiq huawei ki janib se jari kiye gaye aik mehakma jati ailamiye mein company ke karporit senior naib saddar ka kehna tha ke' is waqeye se huawei brand ko nuqsaan pouncha
' waqeye ke baad huawei naay –apne do mulazmeen ki aik darjah tnzli karte hue un ki thankhowa mein se 5 hazaar ‫wan ( taqreeban 728 dollars ) ki katoti bhi kar daali
ailamiye ke mutabiq aayi phone ke zariye ٹوئیٹ ka waqea uss waqt paish aaya, jab huawei ki out source social media agency' سیپیئنٹ ke' ( sapient ) vrchoyl private net work ( v pi an ) ke disk taap computer mein kharabi peda hui up ki device par pallay back support dastyab nahi maliye Sherbano  se, jo –apne hathon se 100 se ziyada bachon ko is duniya mein layi hain Pakistan  ke shumali ilaaqon mein chand baras pehlay jab shadeed brfbari shehar ko jany walay rastay band kar deti thi to yahan janam layte nai zindagion ki sansen rukti mehsoos hotein yahan bachay ki paidaiesh maa aur bachay ki zindagi ke mushkil tareen lamhaat ban jatay they taham ab halaat kuch badal rahay hain aur is ki wajah yahan baqaida tarbiyat haasil karne wali woh dayyan ya mِd wife hain jo ghar ghar ja kar haamla khawateen ki madad kar rahi hain yeh dayyan himalaya qraqrm aur hndoksh ki un waaadiyon ki' super women' hain skrdo ke aik gaon ki tang galiyo se hotay hum patharon se banay aik ghar ke darwazay par puhanche andar dayen janib aik kamray se nomolood bachay ke ronay ki aawaz aa rahi thi yeh sakeena hai jo aik hafta pehlay peda hui hain shehar Bano  is nanhi si pari ko goad mein liye sakeena ki maa Gul  ko bta rahi hain ke unhon ne kya khana hai lekin bachi ko dabbay, gaaye ya bakri ka doodh nahi pilana, usay maa ke doodh ki zaroorat hai Gul  pehli baar maa bani hain unhein hamal aur zichgi ke douran hospital jany ki zaroorat nahi pari is ki wajah un ke mutabiq shehar Bano  hain skrdo mein dareaye Sindh  ke kinare mojood gaon' gole' ki rehaishi shehar Bano  ne kabhi hisaab to nahi rakha lekin woh kehti hain ke pichlle das saloon mein 100 se Ziyaad  bachay un ke hathon se peda hue hain woh kehti hain ke unhon ne –apne takleef da tajarbay ke baad daai ban'nay ka faisla kya' jab mere haan bachay ki paidaiesh hui to poooray gaon hatta ke aas paas ke gaon mein bhi koi daai nahi thi mein teen din taq takleef mein rahi magar meri madad ke liye koi daai nahi thi tab mein nay﻿ faisla kya ke mein khud daai ki tarbiyat haasil karoon gi aur mere baad mere gaon ki koi aur aurat is takleef se nahi guzray gi jis se mein guzri hon shehar Bano  nay﻿ Gilgit  Baltistan  ke aik sarkari hospital se taqreeban daidh saal taq tarbiyat haasil ki woh das saal taq baghair kisi thankhowa ke un dushwaar guzaar pahari ilaqon mein haamla khawateen ki madad karti rahi hain aalmi idaara sahet ke mutabiq Pakistan  mein 61 feesad bachay gharon mein peda hotay hain Unicef  ki aik report ke mutabiq sirf 39 feesad haamla khawateen ke paas zichgi ke waqt tarbiyat Yafta  daai mojood hoti hai jabkay malik ke dushwaar guzaar pahari ilaqon mein yeh tadaad nah honay ke barabar hai shehar Bano  batati hain' aik raat barf par rahi thi ke mujhe aik dosray gaon ke logon ne bulaya ke un ke ghar jana hai mein is haamla khatoon ke check up ke liye mausam ki parwa kiye baghair nikal pari is douran mein rastay mein giri aur phir aik saal taq mein bemaar rahi lekin is raat mein ne is khatoon ki dilyori karai kyunkay usay meri zaroorat thi woh kehti hain ke Gilgit  Baltistan  ki hukoomat ney aik mah qabal unhein sarkari nokari di hai ab un ke paas aik dispensary aur adwiyaat bhi hain' koi mujhe 100 rupay day deta tha to koi chai pila deta lekin mein ney khud kabhi pesey nahi mangay mere ilaqay ke log bohat ghareeb hain mein ney –apne zaati paison se blood pressure check karne ka aala khareeda dwayyan nahi theen lekin mein dawai ka naam bta deti taakay khatoon khareed le skrdo ke district health officer dr Mubasher  ke mutabiq skrdo mein do laakh se ziyada abadi ke liye 48 dayyan aur no community mِd وائیوز hain un ke bakol' hum naay ab barray pemanay par lady health workers aur دائیوں ki tarbiyat ka aaghaz kya hai unhein sarkari nokryan di ja rahi hain lekin is programme par mazeed kaam ki zaroorat hai hamein mazeed fndz ki bhi zaroorat hai taakay khawateen mein aagahi peda karne ke liye muhim bhi chalaye ja sakay dr Mubasher  kehte hain ke khaas tor par ke two ke qareebi dihaton mein pohanchna mushkil tareen kaam hai lekin haal hi mein wahan bhi tarbiyat Yafta  دائیوں ka taqarrur kya gaya hai shehar Bano  ke paas aik dispensary bhi hai lekin woh ab bhi ghar ghar jati hain aur khawateen ka check up karti hain woh unhein mutawazan ghiza khanay ka mahswara deti hain aur unhein batati hain ke unhein hamal ke douran kya ahteyati tadabeer ikhtiyar karni hain taakay woh aur bacha dono sahet mand aur mehfooz rahen mein check karti hon ke case normal hai ya nahi agar to normal ho to mein khud dilyori karati hon lekin agar haamla khatoon mein koi paicheedgi ho to mein un ke ahal khanah ko fori tor par hospital le jaane ka mahswara deti hon shehar Bano  gaon se nikaltay hue kayi bachon se mil rahi theen aur unhein shool jatay dekh kar kehnay lagen ke' ab yeh bachay aik jareeday ko interview dete hue Hareem  Farooq  nay﻿ kaha ke mere chahanay walay mujhe aik se ziyada dramon mein daykhna chahtay hain magar mein poori lagan ke sath aik waqt mein aik hi project par kaam karne ko tarjeeh deti hon

نیورونز saaf karte aur dimagh se muzir mawaad ko nikaal bahar karte hain is terhan اسپرین is khatarnaak marz ko roknay mein madadgaar saabit hosakti hai aayi bi am university of واٹرلو aur technical university of myonkh ke mohqiqeen ney saabit kya hai ke jo kaam kwantm kmpyotrz kar satke hain woh aam computeron ke liye namumkin hain is team ney saabit kya ke kwantm computer par jo الگورتھم liye yeh tey karna mushkil hai ke' payrits of di kiribin' series ki filmon se adakar johnny dip ko ziyada shohrat mili ya jani dip ne apni adakari se un filmon ko urooj bakhsha is ka jawab shayad hamaray paas bhi nahi bas itna maan letay hain ke dono aik dosray ke liye lazim o malzoom they, magar ab johnny dip ka naam un filmon ki cast se nikaal diya gaya hai pchpn sala joni dip' payrits of di kiribin' mein pichlle 15 saal se behri qazzaq jack sparrow ka markazi kirdaar ada kar rahay they magar ab it-tila-aat hain ke woh nai film ki cast ka hissa nahi kyun ke' dzni astodyoz' ab is series ko naye andaaz se paish karne ka iradah rakhta hai filmi halqon mein is khabar ny aik terhan ki halchal mchadi hai aur duniya bhar ke media mein is khabar par tabsaray ho rahay hain film ke musannif stuart بییٹی ny joni dip ko' drop' kiye jaaney se mutaliq khabar ki tasdeeq ki hai un ka kehna hai ke series ki anay wali filmon par naye suray se kaam shuru kya ja raha hai un ka yeh bhi kehna hai ke films ne kamyabi ke naye records banaye aur dip ki janib se ada kya gaya kirdaar hi sab se ziyada shohrat ka sabab bana, khud un ke liye bhi aur series ke liye bhi unhon ne johnny dip ke kaam ki tareef karte hue tasleem kya," mera khayaal hai ke jack sparrow ka kirdaar unhi ke liye takhleeq kya gaya tha yeh kirdaar un ki meeras rahay ga stuart بییٹی ke bakol," yeh wahid kirdaar hai jo johnny ne paanch martaba ada kya usay duniya bhar ke bachay hamesha yaad rakhen ge kyun ke bachon ke zehnon mein jack sparrow ka kirdaar amar hochuka hai woh jab bhi jack sparrow ka naam suneen ge un ke zehan mein joni dip ka hi chehra ubhray ga

Islamabad ( new زڈیسک ) science danon neh dimagh ke aisay nanhay hissay ko daryaft karliya hai jo sirf insanon mein paaya jata hai aur yahi inhen deegar jandaroon ke muqablay mein munfarid banata hai mohqiqeen ka kehna hai ke is herat angaiz daryaft se rashe ke amraaz ( parknsn ) aur motor نیورون amraaz ke ilaaj mein madad mil sakay گی30 saal se is tahaqeeq mein masroof science danon ko shak tha ke dimagh mein aisa hissa mojood hai magar woh dekhnay se qassar they unhon neh usay nyoro sciences ka naam diya hai aur un ka kehna tha ke yeh hissa intahi ahmiyat ka haamil hai kyunkay دیگرجانداروں mein yeh kahin nazar nahi aaya
Australia  ke mohqiqeen ney dimagh ke is chupay hue hissay ko daryaft kyaan ka kehna tha ke dimagh ke barray hajam se hatt kar yeh hissa insanon ko deegar jandaroon se mumtaz karta hai yeh hissa dimagh aur اسپائنل coward jnkshn ke qareeb daryaft kya gaya hai, yeh woh hissa hai jo snsr aur motor information ko jorta hai jo ke jismani tawazun, kharray bethnay ka andaaz aur motor movement ka kaam karta hai mohqiqeen ke khayaal mein dimagh ka yeh daryaft honay wala hissa fine motor control ke miknzm ka hissa hai is daryaft se mohqiqeen ko parknsn aur موٹرنیورون amraaz ke ilaaj tashkeel dainay mein madad miley gi parknsn amraaz mein muscles akarr jatay hain, harkat sust, neend mutasir, shadeed thakawat aur zindagi ka miyaar mutasir hota hai jo batadreej mazoori ka baais ban jata hai موٹرنیورون amraaz mein dimagh aur reerh ki haddi ke asbi khaliyaat theek tareeqay se kaam karna chore dete hain
web disk : wats app ne apni service mein video calling fichr ka bhi izafah kardiya hai jo ke skype aur Apple  fees time ke liye challenge ban sakta hai
ab taq wats app mein tasaveer, record ki gayi video aur audio share karanay ki sahoolat to mojood thi lekin ab video calling fichr ke izafay se wats app ko yaqeenan chaar chaand lag gaye
wazeh rahay ke wats app ko chand saal pehlay Facebook  naay khareed liya tha jis ke baad is mein waqfay waqfay se mukhtalif features ka izafah kya ja raha hai taakay sarfeen ki ziyada se ziyada tadaad is ki taraf mutwajjah hosakay
yeh feature wats app ke tamam vrsnz ke liye muta-arif karwaya gaya hai
yeh guzashta chand hafton ke douran wats app ki janib se muta-arif karwaya gaya dosra naya fichr hai jabkay guzashta mah ( october mein ) aik naye fichr ke tehat wats app mein share ki gayi tasaveer par lakerain khenchnay aur drawing bananay ki sahoolat ka izafah kya gaya tha
Islamabad ( new زڈیسک ) Amrici  mahireen ney mukhtalif amraaz aur infection ka hathon haath pata laganay wala kam kharch aur taiz raftaar sensor tayyar kya hai jis se amraaz ki تشخیص mein ghair mamooli madad miley gi yeh sensor canada ki university of british columbia aur university of kilgri ney mil kar banaya hai bio sensor dhai giga hurts ki مائیکرو view kharij karta hai jo namoonay se guzarti hain is ke baad mahireen امواج ka jaiza letay hain aur ریزونینس aur irtiaash mein tabdeeli ko dekhte hue batatay hain ke is mein konse bacteria kis tadaad mein mojood hain azmaish ke liye usay ای kolayi bacteria walay namoonay mein aazmaaya gaya jis ke mehlool ke pi each level mukhtalif satah ke they aur is mauqa par sensor naay fori tor par nataij dukhaay jo bilkul durust they mahireen ke mutabiq baaz infection itnay khatarnaak hotay hain ke agar shanakht mein aik ghanta takheer ho jaye to mareez ke marnay ka khadsha 8 feesad taq barh jata hai yeh bayyo sensor is kami ko btriqِ Ahsen  poora kar sakta hai chand roz qabal Amrici  university ke mahireen ki team naay mil kar aik ایسامادہ tayyar kya hai jo shamsi tawanai ko hararat mein tabdeel kar ke bijli peda karsaktha hai
mahireen ne shamsi tawanai se bijli peda karne ke liye سرامک sheets ka istemaal kya hai

room ( web desk ) eczema aur musalsal kharish ensaan ko be haal kardeti hai aur ab mumkina tor par is ka ilaaj roshni ki soorat mein samnay aaya hai room mein waqay molecular بایولوجی laboratory ( ای am bi ail ) ke mahireen nay﻿ musalsal tahaqeeq se darina kharish ka aik naya aur kam takleef da ilaaj daryaft kya hai jab choohon par un ka ilaaj kya gaya to is ke bohat mo-asar nataij bar aamad hue is tareeqa ilaaj ki insanon par ifadiyat ke baad takleef da eczema sameit kayi amraaz ki raah hamwar hosakay gi 17 درسمبر ko nature bayo medical engineering mein shaya aik report mein science daano naay kaha hai ke is tareeqa ilaaj mein roshni se hassas baaz chemical jism mein daakhil kiye jatay hain jo fori tor par bairooni jald par khujli ki wajah ban'nay walay aasabi khaliyaat ( نروسیلز ) se jarr jatay hain
tajribati tor par kharish ke shikaar choohon mein chemical tikon ki madad se shaamil kya gaya
is ke baad nzd zaireen surkh ( near anfra red light ) jald par daali gayi is roshni ki badolat kharish ki wajah ban'nay walay asaab jald ki oopri satah se daur hogaye aur choohon ki khujli khatam hogayi yahan aik baat zurori hai ke ensaan aur choohon mein khujli ki wajah ban'nay wala malecule yaksaa hotay hain jo aik terhan ka protein hai aur is ka naam انٹرلیوکن 31 ( aayi ail 31 ) hai usay waza karne walay science daano ka maanna hai ke aik martaba injunction aur roshni daalnay ke baad kayi mahino ke liye kharish se nijaat mil jati hai aur ab yeh ilaaj insanon par azmaish ke liye tayyar hai dilchasp baat yeh hai ke tajurbah gaah mein is ilaaj ke baad choohon par koi manfi asar nah sun-hwa aur un ki jald roz bah roz behtar hoti chali gayi aur kharish batadreej kam hoti gayi aur umeed hai is se eczema jaisay pareshan kin marz ka ilaaj bhi mumkin hosakay ga wazeer e khazana Asad  Umar  ny janoobi aur wasti asia ke liye Amrici  deputy assistant secretary else wheels se mulaqaat mein wazeh kar diya hai ke Pakistan  ny dehshat gardi ke khilaaf barri qurbaniyan di hain isi terhan dehshat gardon ki maali muawnat roknay aur money laundering ke khatmay ke liye iqdamaat jari rahen ge wizarat khazana se jari ailamiye ke mutabiq Islamabad mein wifaqi wazeer khazana Asad  Umar  se Amrici  deputy assistant secretary baraye janoobi aur wasti asia vils wheels naay mulaqaat ki jahan dotrfh taluqaat samait deegar kayi umoor par tabadlah khayaal kiya gaya wazeer e khazana Asad  Umar  naay Amrici  wafad ko bataya ke Pakistan  naay haliya barson mein dehshat gardi ke khilaaf barri qurbaniyan di hain aur dehshat gardi ki maali muawnat aur money laundering ke jarr se khatmay ke liye tamam mumkina iqdamaat badastoor karta rahay ga wizarat khazana ke ailamiye ke mutabiq unhon naay mojooda pak America  taluqaat samait muashi taawun par tabadlah khayaal kiya aur khittay ki majmoi soorat e haal bhi zirbhs aayi wazeer e khazana ne kaha ke is terhan ke doray bahami dilchaspi ke ahem mamlaat par aik dosray ke nuqta nazar ko samajhney mein ahem kirdaar ada karte hain ailamiye ke mutabiq unhon ne else wheels ko Pakistan  tehreek insaaf hukoomat ke vision se bhi aagah kiya aur kaha ke hukoomat malik ke muashi soorat e haal mein tabdeelian laaye gi is mauqa par else wheels ne wazeer khazana ko khittay ki security ke hawalay se Amrici  koshisho se aagah kiya aur is hawalay se bahami taawun ki dotrfh ahmiyat ko numaya kya ijlaas mein dehshat gardi ki maali muawnat roknay ke liye aalmi taawun se mutaliq mamlaat par baat cheet ki gayi khayaal rahay ke guzashta roz Pakistan husool ke liye koshishen jari rakhnay par ittafaq kya tha Amrici  principal deputy assistant secretary of staate baraye janoobi o wasti asia aur safeer els wheels aur wizarat kharja ke aala hakkaam se diya mulaqaat mein Afghanistan  sameit khittay mein security soorat e haal par tabadlah khayaal kiya gaya aur khaas kar Afghanistan  mein aman o aama ki soorat e haal mauzo guftagu rahi is mauqa par Austria  ( web disk ) un dinon duniya bhar mein plastic ki aloodgi ka bohat charcha hai kyunkay plastic hazaron baras mein bhi khatam nahi hota yeh toot-ta پھوٹتا aur pas kar bareek hota rehta hai lekin ghul kar khatam nahi hota ab aik surway se inkishaaf sun-hwa hai ke plastic ke bareek khurd beeni zarraat insani jism mein bhi pahonch rahay hain aik arsay se mahireen ka gumaan tha ke samandari hayaat plastic se shadeed aaloda horahee hai balkay woh mout ki shikaar horahee hai mahireen ke mutabiq samandari ghiza khanay walay ke jismon mein plastic ke zarraat mojood ho saktay hain doosri janib haliya tehqeeq se maloom sun-hwa hai ke 93 feesad bottlon ke pani mein plastic ke khurd beeni zarraat paye jatay hain ab duniya bhar mein insani fazlay ke surway ke baad inkishaaf sun-hwa hai ke insaan bhi plastic ki aloodgi se mutasir ho rahay hain is zimn mein medical university of vyana ney Austria  ke mehakma maholiyaat ke taawun se aik surway kya hai jis mein fِn land italy Japan  Poland  Holland  Bartania  roos aur Austria  ke logon ka mutalea kya gaya tha is zimn mein logon ke aik giroh ko aik haftay taq samandari machhli khilai gayi plastic mein lapete gaye khanay khilaye gaye aur plastic ki bottle se pani piya is ke baad un ke fazlay ke namoonay dekhe gaye sab ke فضلوں mein no mukhtalif terhan ke plastic ke assaar paye gaye jin mein poli پروپائلین ( pi pi ) aur poli ایتھائلین ٹیریفتھلیٹ ( pi ای tea ) plastic sab se aam aur miqdaar mein ziyada thay mahireen naay bataya ke fazlay ke har namoonay mein plastic ke zarraat dekhe gaye jin ki jasamat 50 se 500 مائیکرومیٹر tak thi aur fi das gram fazlay mein 20 zarraat dekhe gaye is se zahir hota hai ke hamari atraaf ka plastic pait mein ja raha hai baaz mahireen naay khabardaar kya hai ke plastic ke intehai bareek zarraat insani khoon mein bhi shaamil ho saktay hain lekin is zimn mein baqaida tehqeeq laazmi hai mahireen naay is ke nataij se khabardaar karte hue kaha hai ke plastic ke zarraat maiday aur anton ke amraaz
