boxer Aamir  ney do roz qabal dastawizi film ke permier ke hawalay se social media انسٹاگرام par elaan kya tha ke woh' team Khan ' ke liye intahi par josh hain jo 29 September  ko London  ke رینڈانس film fistol mein paish ki jaye gi * Pakistan  railway sports board ke zair e ihtimaam Punjab  jodo association ke ishtiraaq se Lahore  mein munaqidah Pakistan  railway inter divisional jodo chmpyn shup ka title Pakistan  railway workshop division ney 78 points haasil karkay –apne naam karliya, Lahore  division ney 52 points ke sath doosri aur queta division ney 43 points ke sath teesri position haasil ki jabkay 5 برائونز میڈیل ke sath Karachi  division ki team panchwin position haasil karne mein kamyabi haasil ki
chmpyn ship ke ekhtataam par maheman khusoosi صصُ واسپورٹس officer Pakistan  railway Karachi  division Shehla  Qureshi  ne faateh runner up aur teesri position haasil karne wali teamon ko trophy aur khiladion mein infiradi inamaat taqseem kiye, ikhtitami taqreeb mein Sindh  jodo association ke secretary Mohammad  Rafeeq , akayonts officer Pakistan  railway Ata  Hussain  Butt , syed Najam  alsayd, Meer  Arshad  Parvez , Ejaaz  Nawaz , owais akbar, Shahnawaz  Butt , abdul hameeed, Mohammad  Younis , Manzoor  Ali  arif, mushtaq twanh, hasnain abid, Imran  patras, inter national o national khiladion aur shaiqeen jodo ki barri tadaad mojood thi * trinti girls degree college ki principal Airain  pearl ney kaha hai ke Pakistani  khawateen sports mein bhi kisi se kam nahi hain, academy ki satah par soft baal ke musalsal events se naya talent samnay laane mein bohat madad miley gi un khayalat ka izhaar unhon ney Karachi  paarsi institute ground par national soft baal academy ke zair e ahtemam سرسبزپاکستان soft baal festival ki taqseem inamaat ki taqreeb se khitaab karte hue kya is mauqa par an s ae ki chair person Tehmina  Asif , maqsood Ahmed , director academy محمدناصر, s s ae ke secretary Mohammad zeeshan mirchant, morad Hussain , frazz Ejaaz  اورناہید Liaqat  bhi mojood theen * Pakistan  olympic association ki khawateen and sports commission ki deputy sectory اداجعفری naay managment of sports organization mein apna ایگزیکٹوماسٹرز course mukammal kar liya, woh pehli khatoon hain jinhein pi o ae naay, khawateen ko agay laane ki policy par chaltay hue is course ke liye muntakhib kya
newzea land 10 May  ( agency ) agarchay riwayati mahireen ghzayyat rozana 5? martaba khaas andaaz mein phal aur sabzian khanay par zor dete hain lekin jab baat zehni tanao aur depration ki ho to is ke shikaar afraad apni khoraak mein is ka mazeed izafah kar saktay hain kachi sabzian aur phal brahِ raast insani mood par asrandaz hotay hain is ki wajah yeh hai ke sabzion ko pakanay, bhon-nay aur garam karne se un ke andar kayi ahem ghizai ajza zaya ho saktay hain newzea land mein 18 se 25 baras ke 400 baaligh afraad ney aik mutalay mein hissa liya kyunkay is Umar  ke log sabzian aur phal kam khatay hain aur un mein depration ke imkanaat bhi ziada hotay hain mutalay mein shaamil afraad ko do garohoon mein taqseem karkay kachi aur paki hui sabzian aur phal diye gaye is ke ilawa un ki trzِ zindagi, neend, werzish, muashi halaat aur jismani sahet ko bhi mdِ nazar rakha gaya aik angrezi kahawat hai' agar aap farokht nahi hue to aap aik product hain' aur mojooda ehad mein yeh Facebook ke hawalay se durust saabit hoti hai
samaji raabtey ki is Website ke do arab ke qareeb sarfeen hain aur yahan aap ko har terhan ka mawaad muft dastyab hai jo rozana ghanton taq sarfeen ko –apne andar mashgool rakhta hai
aur Facebook mustaqbil mein chahti hai ke logon ke qiyam ka dorania mazeed taweel hojaye ya woh yahan se nikal kar bhi isi ki ایپس jaisay messenger, wats app aur انسٹاگرام mein masroof rahen
magar kya aap ko maloom hai Facebook jitna waqt sarfeen ko apni site par rakhi hai, itna hi data woh hum mein se har aik ke baaray mein jama krliti hai
yeh data is plate form mein ishtiharaat ke liye istemaal hota hai aur Facebook ko mahana arbon dollars ki aamdani hoti hai
logon ki ishtiharaat mein dilchaspi badhaane ke liye Facebook jo maloomat ikathi karti hai inhen saaf suthray chhootay dabon ki shakal day deti hai
aur yeh dabbay kuch is terhan ke hotay hain jo aap neechay tasweer mein dekh satke hain
screen shat aur yeh to is maloomat ka bas nuqta aaghaz hai jo Facebook aap ke baarey mein rukti hai magar itni maloomat bhi kisi aisay fard ke liye aap ki shakhsiyat ka khaka bananay ke liye kaafi hai jis se aap ki kabhi mulaqaat nah hui ho, jaisay aap kon hain aur kin cheezon mein dilchaspi rakhtay hain, waghera waghera
Facebook ko maloom hai ke aap ka smart phone konsa hai ya konsa kar chukay hain, konsa disk taap operating system aur براؤزر istemaal karte hain, safri aadaat kya hain aur siyasi hawalay se kya dilchaspi rakhtay hain
Facebook aap ke baaray mein kuch cheezon ka andaza un pages se lagati hai jo aap layik karte hain, isi terhan status up dates, aap ke dost kya pasand karte hain, location, career fox aur deegar اکاؤنٹس ya ishtiharaat se talluq waghera se bhi bohat kuch jana jata hai
is terhan Facebook har aik ke ki shakhsiyat ke baaray mein kaafi jame tasweer tayyar krliti hai aur yeh to woh data hai jo Facebook hamaray samnay bhi paish karti hai
yeh herat angaiz honay ke sath khaufzadah kardainay wala bhi hai kyunkay yeh woh maloomat hai jo hum hansi khushi Facebook ke hawalay karte hain aur dobarah sochte bhi nahi, yani hikrz se to drtay hain magar online privacy ki koi parwa nahi
agar aap bhi janna chahtay hain ke Facebook aap ke baray mein kya kuch janti hai to ad profayl ke is link par click karen, wahan –apne baray mein jan-nay ke liye your informatio aur phir your categories mein chalay jayen
wahan aap un dabon mein se jis ko chahain delete kar saktay hain taham aisa karne se ishtiharaat kam nazar nahi ayen ge bas yeh hoga ke phir har qisam ke ishtiharaat aap ki profile mein nazar anay lagen ge
vashngtn : technology joint Google  ke si ای o sunder پیچائی ne Amrici  insaaf committee ke samnay janibdari aur data trikng ke hawalay se ilzamaat ki sakhti se tardeed kar di
tafseelaat ke mutabiq America  mein tecnology joint Google  ke si ای o sunder پیچائی paish hue, is mauqa par unhon nay﻿ congress meanz ke sawalaat ke jawabaat dete hue bataya ke Google  nay﻿ kabhi bhi sarfeen ke sath janibdari se brtav nahi kya hai, baat Google  ایڈسنز ki ho ya data tracking ki baat ho Google  nay﻿ hamesha policy ke mutabiq kaam kya hai
unhon naay kaha ke hum naay data trikng aur security aur privacy ke mutaliq qawaneen mutayyan kiye hain jis ke mutaliq sarfeen ko gahe ba gahe aagah kiya jata hai, is silsilay mein sarfeen se jaan boojh kar kisi shaqq ya qanoon ko khufia nahi rakha jata hai
congress meanz ney sawalaat utthaye aisa kyun nahi ho sakta ke sarfeen Google  ki bees safhaat par mushtamil privacy policy parheen is ki bajaye Google  khud un ko tarameem ke mutaliq waqt ke sath aagah karta rahay kyunkay Google  ki privacy policy kaafi purani ho chuki hai ab sarfeen ko andaza nahi ke is mein kya badlaav aeye hain
aik aur congress rukan ney sawal uthaya ke kya Google  sarfeen ko har mahinay is se mutaliqa data bhaij sakta hai aur phir Sarif  se poocha jaye ke woh kya share karna chahta hai is ki marzi se share ho, is sawal ko Google  si ای o gole kar gaye aur bataya ke is ke hawalay se company ke wazeh qawaneen mojood hain
si ای o sunder nay﻿ bataya ke Google  sarfeen ko ای mil ke zariye apni tarmemaat ke hawalay se aagah karta rehta hai ab sarfeen ko chahiye ke woh سیٹنگز mein jaakar apni privacy پیرامیٹرز ko set karen
aik committee rukan ney sawal uthaya ke kya Google  ke data tak liye pehle aur jee mil ki rasai mumkin hoti hai to is sawal ke jawab mein unhon ney kaha jee haan, liye pehle aur jee mil Google  data tak rasai hoti hai
committee baraye insaaf ke sarbarah ney sawal uthaya ke agar Sarif  aur پراڈیکٹ doylpr mil kar aik app tayyar karen aur is mein apni marzi ki tabdeelian karen jis se Google  data taq rasai ho ya wahan se kisi cheez ko link karne ki koshish ki jaye to kya Google  ko is ke mutaliq mukammal maloomat hon gi
is sawal ke jawab mein Google  si ای o ney bataya ke ke product doylpr aur Sarif  ke darmain app ki tayari aur is mein istemaal ki gayi tecnology se Google  ko koi maloomat nahi hoti hain ke doylpr ney kis cheez ko track karne ke liye kya tecnology istemaal ki, Google  sirf –apne data ki security ko yakeeni banata hai
Google  si ای o nay﻿ bataya ke privacy aur data tracking ko mehfooz bananay ke liye Google  ki koshishen jari hain, waqt ke sath sath is mein tabdeelian layi ja rahi hain
mexico city 14 october ( siyasat dot com ) argentina ke azeem ftbalr dyago miradona ny malik ke mojooda star khilari لیونل meese par tanqeed karte hue kaha hai ke un mein qayadat ki salahiyat nahi hai aur woh match se pehlay kayi baar baath room jatay hain miradona ny yahan itwaar ko interview mein kaha ke meese leader nahi hai meese jaisay kisi khilari ko leader bananay ki koshish nahi karni chahiye jo match se pehlay 20 martaba baath room jata hai woh coach ya khiladion se baat karne se pehlay pallay station par hotay hain lekin maidan par aap inhen leader banana chahtay hain sabiq ftbalr ne agarchay maana ke کرسٹیانو Ronaldo  ke sath woh duniya ke azeem football khiladion mein shaamil hain lekin un mein qayadat ki salahiyat nahi hai saal 1986 mein argentina ne miradona ki captani mein world cupp khitaab jeeta tha lekin meese apni team ko is ki qayadat mein barri kamyabi nahi dila sakay hain unhon ne kaha ke mujhe nahi lagta ke meese ko bhagwan banana chahiye meese barslona ke liye dil se khailtay hain lekin jab woh argentina ki jarsi pehantay hain to woh allag hi khilari ban jatay hain miradona un dinon mexico mein second division club سنالوا ke liye coaching kar rahay hain miradona naay sath hi kaha ke woh agar argentina ke coach hotay to hamesha kehte ke sirf meese par hi bharosa nahi karo unhon naay kaha ke agar meese ko aap is terhan se khailtay dekhnaa chahtay hain jaissa aap chahtay hain to un se qayadat wapas le lijiye aalmi cupp ke pehlay naak out round mein France  ke hathon harnay ke baad se meese naay argentina ke liye teen dostana matchon mein bhi nahi khailay hain agarchay dilchasp hai ke guzashta haftay hi brazil ke azeem ftbalr peelay naay Portugal  ke Ronaldo  par meese ko apna pasandeeda khilari mana tha Amrici  saddar Donald  trmp ne aaj jummay ke roz chain se honay wali draamdat par 50 arab dollar ke mehsoolat aed karne ka elaan kar diya hai jabkay chain ne is ka fori jawab dete hue Amrici  draamdat par bhi 50 arab dollar ke hi mehsoolat aed kar diye hain
yun duniya ki do sab se barri mayshton ke darmain bazabta tor par tabal jung baja diya gaya hai
trmp nay﻿ chain se daraamad honay wali 800 ke lag bhag حصاص noiyat ki ashya ki nishandahi kar dahi hai jin par 25 feesad mehsoolat aed kiye ja rahay hain
un mehsoolat ke نفاظ ka aaghaz 6 July  se ho ga
un draamdat mein gariyaan bhi shaamil hain
chain ki wizarat tijarat ka kehna hai ke chain jawab mein barabar ki satah ke mehsoolat aed kere ga
shan sun-hwa news agency ke mutabiq chain America  se daraamad honay wali 659 ashya par 25 feesad duty aed kere ga jin mein soybean se leker gariyaan aur samandari khoraak taq shaamil hai
chain ki taraf se Amrici  draamdat par lagai jane wali duty bhi 50 arab dollar ki satah ki ho gi
taham duty aed ki jaaane wali ashya ki fehrist se ziyada qeemat ki ashya ko nikaal diya gaya hai jin mein hawai jahaaz shaamil hain
saddar trmp ne aik bayan mein kaha hai ke agar chain ne jawab mein Amrici  draamdat par duty aed ki to America  mehsoolat mein mazeed izafah kar day ga
is waqt America  chain tijarat mein America  ka tijarti khasara 375 arab dollar ka hai
saddar trmp ka moaqqaf hai ke yeh mehsoolat chain ko ghair munsifana tor par muntaqil honay wali tknaloji ko roknay aur americion ki mlazmton tahaffuz dainay ke liye zaroori hain
taham mahireen ka kehna hai ke Amrici  taraf se aed honay walay mehsoolat se chain ki maeeshat ko koi khaas nuqsaan nahi puhanche ga aur dono mulkon ki tijarti mahaaz aarai mumkina tor par barhti rahay gi
America  ke tijarti nmayinde ke daftar ka kehna hai ke Amrici  kstmz aur border protection ke hakkaam chain se daraamad honay wali 818 ashya par 6 July  se mehsoolat wusool karna shuru kar den ge jin ki maliyat 34 arab dollar ho gi
Karachi  ( web disk ) Wazeer e Aala Sindh  morad Ali  Shah  ke samnay is baat ka inkishaaf sun-hwa hai ke Karachi  ke mukhtalif ilaqon mein polio virus mojood hai Wazeer e Aala Sindh  morad Ali  Shah  ki zair sadarat insidaad polio aur khasray se mutaliq ijlaas sun-hwa jis mein wazeer e sahet cheif secretary principal secretary commissionaire Karachi  aur deegar hakkaam naay shirkat ki ijlaas ke douran insidaad polio programme incharge Fayaz  jtoyi naay breifing dete hue bataya ke mah September  mein Karachi  ke 11 maqamat se polio ke namoonay liye gaye unhon naay bataya ke Gulshan  Iqbal  Sohrab  goth چکورہ naala Mohammad  Khan colony baldia aur avrngi naala se liye gaye nmonon ke misbet nataij aaye hain breifing ke douran unhon ne bataya ke September  mein Sindh  ke shehar Sukkur  mein bhi polio virus ki mojoodgi ki tasdeeq hui wazeer aala ko breifing dete hue bataya gaya ke April  se September  2018 ke darmain Karachi  mein aik laakh 18 hazaar 5? so 57 bachon ke walidain ke inkaar ke baais inhen polio vaccine nahi di jaski is terhan un 6 mah mein 96 hazaar 9 so 6 bachay gharon mein nah honay ke baais vaccine haasil nahi kar sakay breifing ke douran bataya gaya ke dehi Sindh  ke ilaqon mein 88 hazaar 4 سو64 bachay gharon par nah honay ke baais polio vaccine se mahroom rahay is mauqa par Wazeer e Aala Sindh  neh kaha ke Allah  ka karam hai ke mushtarqa kawishon ki badolat is saal Sindh  mein polio ka koi case samnay nahi aaya unhon neh kaha ke is waqt Pakistan  aur Afghanistan  sirf do mumalik mein polio virus paaya jata hai lehaza hamari hukoomat ka azm hai ke پولیہ ka khtama yakeeni banayen Wazeer e Aala Sindh  neh hadaayat ki schoolon mein polio temen bhejen aur bachon ko vaccine di jaye hamein apni kawishon ko mazeed taiz aur behtar karkay polio ka jarr se khtama karna hoga ijlaas ke douran Wazeer e Aala Sindh  ko khasra ki bemari se mutaliq bhi breifing di gayi breifing ke douran bataya gaya ke Sindh  mein 2015 se khasra mein izafah ho raha hai aur isi saal 281 kisz hue jis mein 8 ki mout waqay hui wazeer aala ko aagah kiya gaya ke 2016 mein 17 so 29 kisz hue aur 19 amwaat hui jabkay 2017 mein 3 hazaar 86 kisz mein se 35 log zindagi ki baazi haar gaye is mauqa par Wazeer e Aala Sindh  naay khasray ke barhatay kisz par tashweesh ka izhaar kya aur Hadayat  ki ke is silsilay mein bazabta tor par aag_hi muhim chalaye jaye aur awam ko khasray ki alamat ke baare mein bataya jaye Mumbai  ( daily Pakistan  online ) bollywood adakara anushka sharmaa naay maa ban'nay ke hawalay se ghalat khabrain bananay walon kay khilaaf phatt parrin aur kaha hai ke ghalat khabrain phela kar maa ban'nay se pehlay hi naya mahaaz khara kar dete hain jo bohat ziyada pareshan kin baat hai virat kohli aur anushka sharmaa ki shadi ke baad social media par yeh qiyaas aarayyan ki ja rahi hain ke anushka aur virat ke ghar nanhay maheman ki aamad mutawaqqa hai jis ke baais unhon naay koi naya پرواجیکٹ sign nahi kya Bharti  media se guftagu karte hue anushka sharmaa naay un qiyaas araiyo ko mazhaka khaiz qarar diya aur kaha ke na jaany kyun log is terhan ki be bunyaad bate phela kar –apne aap ko khush aur dosaron pareshan karte hain unhon neh kaha ke aap shadi ko to khufia rakh satke hain magar koi bhi aurat naye maheman ki aamad ke hawalay se khabar ko chhupa nahi sakti kyunkay alamaat zahir honay lagti hain mujhe lagta hai saari adakaron ko is terhan ki sorat e haal ka saamna karna parta hoga kyunkay shadi ke baad kuch log aap ko har soorat maa bananay ke chakkar mein rehtay hain, yeh sorat e haal aik larki ke liye kaafi pareshan kin hoti hoti hai leemo ka ras ya leemo ka juice garmi ke mausam ka sab se ahem sharbat maana jata hai aur sirf yahan hi nahi duniya bhar mein usay be had pasand kya jata hai is ki wajah yeh hai ke leemo ka sharbat tayyar karna be had aaasaaan hai yeh mazedar hota hai is ke ilawa is ke sahet par bohat se misbet fawaid bhi muratab hotay hain taham chand logon ka maanna hai ke leemo ka sharbat bohat ziyada piinaa hadion ke liye theek nahi kyun ke is mein aik qisam ka acid mojood hota hai jo hadion ko kamzor karta hai leemo ke ras ko aam tor par sahet ke liye misbet maana jata hai khaas tor par agar subah usay sab se pehli khoraak ke tor par liya jaye yeh wazan kam karne mein bhi madadgaar hai leemo mein acid aur vitamin si ki miqdaar bohat ziyada hoti hai aur doctors ke mutabiq agar kisi ko gistrk ke masail ka saamna ho to woh leemo ka juice peenay se parhaiz kere leemo ke sharbat mein namak ya cheeni shaamil karkay usay piya ja sakta hai aur rozana aik glass leemo ka juice sahet ko misbet karne mein madadgaar hai aalmi idaara sahet ke mutabiq das laakh se zayed Afghan  zehni dabao ka کشار hain jo khud kshyon ki wajah hai Jamila  ny shadi ke liye –apne mangetar ka chay saal intzaar kya woh baar baar apni maa aur behnoon ke sath mera rishta mangnay aaya aur ab jab mein jawan nahi rahi aur chay saal se is ki mangetar hon to woh mujh se shadi nahi karna chahta un ki kahani افغاسنتان ki beshtar aurton ki kahani jaisi hai adaad o shumaar ke mutabiq maghribi soobay hrat mein khawateen ki khudkushi ka rujhan baqi Afghan  abadi se kahin ziyada hai hrat mein tibbi hakkaam ke mutabiq sirf 2017 mein hi 1800 afraad naay khudkushi ki koshish ki jin mein 1400 khawateen theen un mein se 35 apni jaan lainay mein kamyaab rahen yeh tadaad guzashta saal ke muqablay mein dogni hai jab 1000 koshishen ki gayeen Afghanistan  mein gharelu tashadud ke shikaar khawateen ke liye madad ke ziyada maqamat nahi yeh tadaad un khawateen ki tadaad se bhi bohat ziyada hai jo jung ka nishana banin aqwam mutahidda ke mutabiq guzashta baras musallah larai ka shikaar honay wali khawateen mein 359 halaak jabkay 865 zakhmi huien Afghan  andipindnt human rights commission aur muqami media ke adaad o shumaar ke mutabiq har saal 3000 Afghan  khudkushi ki koshish karte hain malik bhar mein paish anay walay un waqeat mein se nisf hrat mein hotay hain Afghan  andipindnt human rights commission naay khabardaar kya hai ke yeh tadaad is se bhi ziyada hosakti hai kyunkay Afghanistan  mein ziyada tar log khudkushi ke mamlaat ki hakkaam ko ittila nahi karte hrat mein bi bi si ke numainda Mohammad  qaazi zaadah ka kehna hai ke Afghanistan  ke mazhabi dehati ilaqon mein khudkushi ko badnami aur ghair islami qarar diya jata hai qaazi zaadah ka kehna tha un logon ke kayi dosray masail hain jis ki wajah se khandano mein khudkushi ki koshish par ziyada tavajja nahi di jati Afghan  andipindnt human rights commission ki ahelkaar Hawa  aalam nooristani ka kehna hai ke is tadaad mein izafay ki wajah barhatay hue zehni masail gharelu tashadud jabri shadian aur aurton ko darpaish kayi samaji dabao hain jin mein izafah ho raha hai un ke bakol hrat barray aur riwayati sobon mein shaamil hai yeh adaad o shumaar hatmi nahi hain kyunkay un mein ziyada tafseelaat nahi hain taham hum itna jaan paye hain ke hrat mein khud kashi ki sharah sab se ziyada hai agarchay Afghanistan  mein zehni sehat ke hawalay se adaad o shumaar dastyab nahi taham aalmi idaara sehat ke andazay ke mutabiq 10 laakh afghani zehni dabao ke masail ka shikaar hain jabkay baara laakh afraad ko انزائٹی ke masail darpaish hain Afghanistan  mein musallah larai ko sunah 2018 mein chaleeswa saal shuru ho gaya aur w each o ke mutabiq zehni masail ka shikaar afraad ki tadaad is se kahin ziyada hogi aqwam mutahidda ke population fund ke andazon ke mutabiq 87 feesad Afghan  aurton jismani, jinsi ya nafsiati tashadud mein se kisi nah kisi ka shikaar hoti hain jabkay 62 feesad ko mukhtalif aqsam se istehsal ka saamna rehta hai unicef ke mutabiq aik tahai Afghan  larkiyon ki shadi 18 saal ke honay se pehlay ho jati hai khawateen ke dabao ka shikaar honay aur faraar ke liye khudkushi karne ki aik wajah jabri shadion ko bhi qarar diya jata hai nooristani ke mutabiq khawateen ke khudkushi ki wajah istehsal hai jo khandan se hi shuru hota hai misaal ke tor par jabri shadian khawateen ki marzi nahi suni jati aur inhen taleem haasil karne se bhi rokkk diya jata hai Lahore  ( web desk ) maqbool photo messaging app asnip cheat naay jald hi sarfeen ke liye اسکرپٹڈ shows muta-arif karne ka elaan kardiya
yeh shows asnip cheat aur hali would ki naamwar products companiyon ke ishtiraaq se qist waar paish kiye jayen ge, jin mein' growing up is a drag' jaisi ڈاکیومینٹریز series bhi shaamil hain
yeh series mashhoor ریئلٹی TV show' kipng up vِd da کارڈیشینز' ke producer بونیم morey ki peshkash hogi
asnip cheat ke mutabiq yeh series baghair kisi khlal ke taizi se chaliin gi, jis ka dorania 5 minute par mushtamil hoga
har show ke sath aik profile page bhi muhayya kya jaye ga jis se Sarif  aasani se qist talaash kar sakay ga
asnip cheat shows mein 6 seconds ka ishtihar bhi shaamil hoga, taham is ke liye nazar andaaz karne ka option nahi diya gaya

jasoosi ke ilzamaat ki wajah se cheeni companiyon par America  mein pabandi laga di gayi hai
America  ke baad duniya ke kayi mumalik nay﻿ un companiyon se tally kmyoni kishn alaat khridne band kar diye hain
huawei kayi mumalik mein 5g net works qaim kar raha hai lekin kuch mumalik naay ab huawei se 5g alaat nah khardney ka faisla kya hai
haliya hafton mein America  ke baad Australia  aur newzea land bhi un dono cheeni companiyon se 5gآلات ki kharidari aur tanseeb par pabandi laga chuke hain
Europe  mein Bartania , France  aur Germany  bhi cheeni companiyon ki taraf se jasoosi ke khatray ko sanjeeda le rahay hain
un mumalik ke baad Japan  nay﻿ bhi hifazati iqdamaat ke tor par cheeni companiyon ka kaarobar band karne ki mansoobah bandi kar raha hai
( jari hai ) Japan  mein un dono companiyon par barah e raast to koi pabandi nahi lagai ja rahi lekin aisay iqdamaat kiye ja rahay hain, jin se dono companian hi ziyada mutasir hongi
is faislay se cheeni companiyon ke smart phones ka kaarobar bhi mutasir hoga aur dono companiyon ke shiraakat daaron ki mushkilaat mein bhi izafah hoga
huawei ney Japan  ki dono barri tally kaam companiyon an tea tea ڈوکومو aur ke d d aayi karporishn ko bhi net work alaat faraham kiye they
huawei ke Japan  ke soft bank group corporation ke sath bhi taweel almdti shiraakat daari ke muahiday hain
yeh group you s سپرنٹ karporishn ka maalik bhi hai
huawei ne is group ke sath mil kar 5g ke tajarbaat karne thay
yeh mansoobah bhi ab khatai mein parta dikhayi day raha hai

is sorat e haal mein huawei aur zid tea ای ke shiyrz ki qeemat bhi kaafi gir gayi hai
Fifa  world cupp 2018 hamza mein pari quarter final marhalay ke aik match mein brazil ne mexico ko do
sifar se shikast day quarter final ke liye qualify karliya
brazil ki janib se نیمار aur رابرٹوفرمینو ne gole score kiye
paanch martaba ki aalmi champion brazil aur mexico ke darmain naak out marhalay ke match mein pehlay half ke douran dono temen bharpoor koshish ke bawajood koi gole nah kar saken
نیمار naay is douran gole score karne ke teen mawaqay peda kiye lekin inhen gole mein tabdeel nahi kiya ja saka
is half mein dono teamon ke aik, aik khilari ko yellow card bhi dekhaya gaya
khail ke 51 win minute mein نیمار ney gole karkay apni team ko bartari dilae
world cupp muqablon mein yeh نیمار ka chhata gole hai
aik gole ke khasaray mein jaaane ke baad میکسیکونے team mein do tabdeelian kee, jo kaar amad saabit nah hosakin
88 win minute mein نیمار ke khobsorat paas par rabarto فرمینو ne gaind gole mein pheink kar team ko do
sifar se kamyabi dila di aur brazil ki team aglay marhaly mein pahonch gayi, jabkay mexico ki team event se bahar ho gayi
1986ﺀ mein راؤنڈ of skstin muta-arif karaye jany se ab taq world cupp muqablon mexico satwen martaba is marhalay mein event se bahar hui hai jo kisi bhi doosri team ke muqablay mein dugna hai
ab tak paanch temen quarter final mein jagah bana chuki hain
jin mein France , یوروگوائے, roos, kroshya aur brazil shaamil hain
quarter final matches 6 July  se shuru hon ge
pehla match euro gawaee aur France  ke darmiyan khela jaye ga

is ki ahem baat yeh hai ke yeh –apne wazan se 40 gina zayed wazan uttah sakta hai yeh tang jaghon par ja kar bhaari ashya ko hata kar rasta banata hai aur bhaari ashya ko khech bhi sakta hai aur zaroorat ke tehat ring bhi sakta hai yeh sab kuch is ki choti jasamat ki wajah se mumkin hai agarchay inhen hadsaat ki soorat mein talaash aur madad ke liye bhi istemaal kya ja sakta hai lekin drone waqti tor par bohat si jaghon par kisi pathar ya deewar se chipak kar bhi bohat se kaam karsaktha hai mahireen ke mutabiq usay bananay ke liye chipkali se madad li gayi hai aur is mein hook ki tar h 32 ubhaar lagaye gay hain jo drone ko aik jagah jim jaaney mein madad faraham karte hain is robot ko mahireen ki janib se fly کروٹگ kanam diya gaya hai jis ka matlab hai yeh urr sakta hai wazan uttha sakta aur reengnay ka kaam bhi karsaktha hai is ke neechay aik kamera nasb kya gaya hai jo zalzalay ya haadsay ke baad poooray maqam ke ahwaal se aagah karta hai journal of فیزیئولوجی mein shaya honay wali is tahaqeeq mein shrka ki werzish ki maazi ki aadato aur dil ki sharianon mein sakhti ka jaiza liya gaya aik nai tahaqeeq ke mutabiq dil ki markazi sharianon ko sakht honay se roknay ke liye haftay mein chaar se paanch baar werzish karna intahi mufeed hai saath saal ki Umar  walay 100 afraad ka jaiza lainay se pata chala hai ke haftay mein do ya teen martaba werzish se sirf chand shareyanien sahet mand rehti hain mohqiqeen ka kehna hai ke kisi bhi qisam ki werzish se dil ke amraaz ka khatrah kam ho jata hai magar zindagi ke durust marhalay par werzish ki durust miqdaar se dil aur khoon ke nizaam dono par Umar  ke asraat kam kar deta hai journal of فیزی اولوجی mein shaya honay wali is tahaqeeq mein werzish ki maazi ki aadato aur dil ki sharianon mein sakhti ka jaiza liya gaya Amrici  mohqiqeen ny daryaft kya hai ke haftay mein do se teen martaba ( 30 minute fi session ) werzish karne se sir aur gardan ko jaaane wali shareyanien sehat mand rehti hain
taham jo log haftay mein 4 se 5 martaba werzish karte hain un ki markazi shareyanien bhi sahet mand rehti hain markazi shareyanien woh hain jo chhaati aur pait ko khoon faraham karti hain is tahaqeeq mein khoraak samaji back ground aur taleem jaisay anasir ko zair-e ghhor nahi laya gaya aur un anasir ka sharianon ki sahet par assar ho sakta hai London  ( web disk ) yeh kaisay mumkin hai ke aik khatoon ke haan do jurwan bachay peda hon aur un dono ke baap allag allag hon science ny yeh karishma bhi kar dekhaya hai aur Bartania  mein aik khatoon ny do aisay jurwan bachon ko janam diya hai jin ke baap allag allag hain un bachon mein aik larki aur aik larka hai larki ka naam الیگزینڈرا aur larke ka naam کیلڈر rakha gaya hai کیلڈر ke baap ka naam گرائمی hai jabkay الیگزینڈرا ka baap saymn Nami  shakhs hai yeh dono shakhs aik hi khatoon se apna apna bacha peda karna chahtay they jis ke liye unhon naay 25 hazaar pound ( taqreeban 45 laakh 93 hazaar rupay ) ke aiwz aik Canadian  khatoon ki bator sarogate ( mutabadil maa ) khidmaat haasil kee jis ka naam mig stone hai doctoron naay un dono ke سپرمز aur mig stone ke bize le kraayi v f ( masnoi tareeqa afzaish ) ke zariye laboratory mein allag allag ambrio banaye aur phir dono ko mig stone ke pait mein rakh diya jahan parwarish panay ke baad chand haftay qabal dono bachay sahet mandi ke sath peda hue bachon ki paidaiesh ke baad mig stone ka kehna tha ke mein naay saymn aur گرائمی ki profayl aik srogisi Website par dekhi meri haal hi mein Talaq  hui thi aur mein agla bacha peda karne ke liye tayyar thi chunancha mein naay un se rabita kya aur un ke bachon ki maa ban'nay ki haami bhar li saymn ka kehna tha ke mujhe aur saymn ko bachay chahiye they lekin hamaray darmain yeh kashmakash thi ke un bachon ka waalid hum mein se kon ho ga phir hamein Los Angeles mein waqay aik cilinic ke doctoron mein bataya ke hum dono back waqt baap ban satke hain jab unhon ney hamein tareeqa bataya to hum ney foran sarogate ki talaash shuru kar di Mirza  Shahid  barlas machini zahanat ( augmented intelligence ) masnoi zahanat ki tar f paish qadmi ki aik koshish hai
is jadeed daur mein machinon ko الگورتھم ( algorithm ) sikahnay ke tajarbaat kiye jarahay hain, is ke sath sath tiknalojiz ki barri companian machini zahanat ke shobay mein ka fi sir maaya kaari bhi kar rahi hain
go insaan abhi haqeeqi masnoi zahanat ki takhleeq se bohat daur hain
lekin is silsilay mein tajarbaat musalsal kiye jarahay hain
haliya koshisho mein طبیعیاتی mahireen naay machinon ko الگورتھم sikha kar aik khaas qisam ke super conductor ke kwantm se Bar  tao ki baabat kaafi kaar amad maloomat haasil ki hain jin ke husool ke liye mahireen kayi arsay se koshan thay
mohqiqeen naay masnoi zahanat ki madad se aik high ٹیمپریچر super conductor ( ( high-temparature super conductorکی tasaveer mein chupay hue posheeda raaz daryaft kiye hain
New York میںقائم کارنیل university ki professor ‫on aah kam ke mutabiq is jaizay mein pehli martaba yeh andaza sun-hwa hai ke kwantm meter ko samajhney ke liye machini zahanat ke kaam yab tajarbaat kiye gaye hain
un ka mazeed kehna hai ke mustaqbil mein machini zahanat ko kwantm span raqeeq ko samajhney ki koshish mein bhi istemaal kya ja sakta hai jo anay walay waqt ke aala tareen kwantm computer bananay mein car aamad ho sakta hai
haliya jaiza super conductor par markooz tha, jis ke zareya bijli ko baghair kisi barqi muzahmat ke muntaqil kya ja sakta hai
lekin aisa absolute zero ( ( absolute zero ke ٹیمپریچر par mumkin hota hai jo منفی269 degree centi grade ke قر ۤb hota hai
mahireen طبیعیات ki team ne que par ‫ts par tajarbaat kiye thay jo cooper oxide ke sandwich banay hotay hain aur yeh manfi 140 degree centi grade par super conductor ban jatay hain
science daano ka kehna hai ke کیوپر tees ke super kund kattar ban jaaane ki wajohaat samajh kar hum aisay engineering material bananay ke qabil ho jaien ge jo تقریباکمرے ke temper یچر par kaam karne walay super conductor bananay mein kaar amad hoga
lekin کیوپریٹس jab سیوڈو gape ( pseudogap ) ( سیوڈوگیپ bohat hi kam tawanai ki aisi haalat hai jis mein sirf chand الیکٹرون ka talluq hota hai ) ki haalat mein ho to ajeeb tar h se kaam karta hai aur yeh haalat jab paish aati hai jab yeh super conductor ban'nay ke qareeb hotay hain الیکٹرون aur atom ke darmain گنجلگ qisam ka bahami taamul honay ke sabab سیوڈوگیپ bantaa hai aur is ki be tarteeb haalat ke sabab is ki baabat kuch maloom karna bhi intahi mushkil hai
chand mahireen طبیعیات کیوپر ‫ts ki haalat ko' ' dark meter' ' kehte hain
is ke bawajood سیوڈو gape ka bayan karna hi super کنڈکٹیویٹی ko samaghnay ki tar f pehla qadam ho ga
aur jis ki be tarteeb haalat ke sabab is ki baabat kuch maloom karna bhi diqat talabb hai
کیوپریٹس ki haalat کوچند mahireen tabeeyat' ' dark meter' ' kehte hain
lekin phir bhi سیوڈو gape ko bayan karna hi super کنڈکٹیویٹی ko samajhney ki taraf pehla qadam hoga
haal hi میںماہرین neh سیوڈو gape mein tar تیب ke kuch assaar daryaft kiye hain jin ko الیکٹرون ki density ki laharen kaha ja sakta hai lekin un mein is tarteeb ko bayan karne ke tareeqon mein ikhtilaaf hai
mahireen ka aik group un الیکٹرون ko' ' mazboot bahami تعاملی zarraat' ' kehta hai
dosra group un ko lehar vn jaissa samajh kar' ' un ko zaeef bahami taamul' ' kehta hai
un ki tarteeb ki baabat mazeed maloomat ke husool ke liye mahireen ki team naay ( ( neutral network design kiye they, jis ka khayaal un kwansani dimagh ki saakht ki baabat soch kar aaya tha
چناںچہ unhon ne سیوڈوگیپ ki tasaveer ka jaiza liya
yeh tasaveer scan karne wali مائیکرو اسکوپک tnl mein li gayi theen jo ziyada tar insani aankh ko be tarteeb nazar aati hain, kyun ke yeh material qudrati tor par hi be tarteeb hain aur پیمائشیںلینے ke douran jo khafee FC aawazian peda hoti ہیںوہ is ko mushkil banati hain
chana chay machini zahanat ke zareya الگورتھم un mein aisa imtiaz karna seekh sakta hai jo insani aankh ke liye mumkin nahi hai
الگورتھم sikahnay ke liye team naay نیورل net works ki kayi aqsam faraham ki theen, jis mein lehron ki tarteeb aur mukhtalif تھیوریٹی kal prediction shaamil theen
jab machini zahanat naay un misalon mein imtiaz karna seekh liya to کیوپریٹس ke سیوڈوگیپ ka asli data faraham kya gaya tha

netherland ki lidn university ke maahir طبیعیات ملان Allan  ka kehna hai ke patteren ki noiyat is kubian karne mein ahmiyat ki haamil hai
yani woh kis wajah se namodaar hotay hain
un ka mazeed kehna hai ke bulaa shuba yeh tiknik mahireen ke liye haier ٹیمپریچر super کنڈکٹیویٹی ko samajhney mein madad gaar saabit ho gi
kuch mahireen ka kehna hai ke سیوڈو gape ki noiyat ki baabat mustaqbil mein bhi mobahisa jari rahay ga

is tar h ke tajribati data ko machinon ko الگورتھم sikahnay ke liye istemaal کرناایک aur challenge hai
lekin الگورتھم sikhayiye hue مفرو ضوں mein sirf farq btaskta hai, is ki bajaye ke woh –apne tor par khud koi bilkul نیاپیٹرن daryaft kar sakay
mahireen ki team is tiknik ko kwantm material ke x-ray ڈفریکشن mein istemaal karne ke tar ‫qe wazeh karne par kaam kar rahay hain, jis mein roshni ki laharen idhar idhar phail kar 3Die mention ( 3d ) mein is ki saakht banakar dikha sakti hain

ghantay mein andiks mein 450 points ka izafah sun-hwa kaarobar ke dosray session mein andiks mein aik mauqa par 577 points ka izafah bhi dekhnay mein aaya taham kaarobar ke ekhtataam par index ki yeh satah kam ho kar 485 points ( 1. 16 feesad ) par aagai majmoi tor par 11 crore 18 laakh shiyrz ka kaarobar sun-hwa jin ki maliyat 6 arab 10 crore rupay rahi companiyon ke infiradi karobari mein bank of Punjab  3 crore 90 laakh hasas ke sath pehlay number par raha world cal tally kaam ltd 84 laakh hasas ke sath dosray یونیٹی foods ltd 74 laakh hasas ke sath teesray ayngro پولیمر and kimiklz ltd 65 laakh hasas ke sath chouthay jabkay Pakistan  international airline karporasion ltd 62 laakh hasas ke sath panchwin number par theen Mumbai  naamwar bollywood adakara sonam Kapoor  ka kehna hai ke woh Pakistanio  se bohat mohabbat karti hain aur Pakistan  janey ke liye be chain hain adakar Aneel  Kapoor  ki Sahebzadi  adakara sonam Kapoor  ki Pakistanio  se mohabbat samnay aagai haal hi mein انسٹاگرام ke naye fichr ko istemaal karte hue sonam Kapoor  ne –apne madahon ki janib se poochay gaye salawon ke kaafi dilchasp jawabaat dyie aik madah ki janib se sonam se sawal poocha gaya kya aap musalmanoon se mohabbat karti hain jis ke jawab mein sonam ne kaha' ' mein tamam aqaed ke logon se pyar karti hon aur mera mazhab bhi mujhe yahi sakata hai aik aur purastaar ne sonam se un ke Pakistani  madahon ke hawalay se sawal poocha ke kya aap –apne Pakistani  فالوورز se mohabbat karti hain jis par sonam ne kaha' ' mein Pakistan  se mohabbat karti hon, aur Pakistan  jany ke liye be chain hon sonam Kapoor  ke waalid Aneel  Kapoor  ka talluq Pakistan  ke shehar Peshawar  se hai aik taqreeb ke mauqa par unhon ne bhi Pakistan  anay ki khwahish ka izhaar karte hue kaha tha ke Peshawar  mein mere aabao ajdaad ka ghar hai mujhe jab bhi mauqa mila Pakistan  zaroor jaoon ga wazeh rahay ke sonam Kapoor  Pakistani  adakar Fawad  Khan  ki bohat achi dost hain aur un se be had mutasir hain jab ke Fawad  Khan  ko bollywood mein muta-arif karanay ka sahra bhi sonam ke sir hi jata hai Islamabad ( web disk ) wifaqi hukoomat ki janib se smuggling ke zariye malik mein anay walay mobile phones band karne ke elaan ke baad is sawal nay﻿ janam liya hai ke aakhir yeh maloom kaisay ho ke zair istemaal phone smuggle shuda hai ya nahi, aam halaat mein yeh janna aassan nahi lekin Pakistan  tally kmyoni kishn authority ( pi tea ae ) nay﻿ mobile sarfeen ki mushkil ko hal kar diya hai
pi tea ae ki janib se is silsilay mein device آئیڈینٹی fkishn registration and bollockings system ( d aayi are bi s ) muta-arif karaya gaya tha, jis se aap yeh maloom kar saktay they ke aap ka mobile Pakistan  mein register hai ya nahi
is nizaam ke elaan ke baad ibtidayi tor par awam ko is se ziyada aag_hi nahi di gayi thi, taham wifaqi hukoomat ke elaan ke sath hi Pakistan  tally کمیونکیشن atharti mutharrak hogayi aur malik bhar mein mojood karorron mobile sarfeen ko aik pegham bheja gaya
is pegham mein awam ko tanbeeh ki gayi ke pi tea ae se tasdeeq shuda mobile sm devices khridi aur –apne mobile ke antrnishl mobile اکیوپمنٹ آئیڈینٹٹی ( aayi am ای aayi ) number maloom karne ke liye 8484 par pegham bhejen, basorat deegar aap ki device 20 october 2018 ke baad ghair fa-aal ho jaien gi
aayi am ای aayi ki baat karen to yeh ensaan ki terhan mobile ki aik shanakht hoti hai aur duniya bhar mein mojood har mobile phone mein aayi am ای aayi mukhtalif hota hai aur usay aalmi company jee s am ae jari karti hai
isi terhan aik sm se zayed walay mobile phone mein har sm ke liye allag aayi am ای aayi number hota hai jabkay nah sirf mobile balkay aisi koi bhi device jis mein sm lag sakti ho is mein aayi am ای aayi number mojood hota hai
taham yahan is ka baat ka zikar zurori hai ke agar tamam mobile phone ka aayi am ای aayi mukhtalif hota hai to phir pi tea ae ko yeh intibah jari karne ki zaroorat kyun paish aayi
darasal chand aisay anasir hain jo mukhtalif tareeqon se mobile phones par jaali aur aik jaisay aayi am ای aayi number darj karte hain aur aisay mobile phones ko ghair qanooni sar garmion mein istemaal kya jata hai aur inhen track karna bhi mushkil hota hai
doosri janib kuch aisay aayi am ای aayi bhi hotay hain, jin par tax ada nahi kya sun-hwa hota, yani aap ka mobile kahin se asmgl sun-hwa ho aur hukoomat ko is barey mein maloom nahi ho, taham aisay mobile rakhnay walon ke liye ziyada pareshani nahi hain aur woh 20 october taq usay register karwa satke hain
isi silsilay mein pi tea ae ki janib se Website, mobile appli kishn aur s am s ki service muta-arif karwai gayi hai, jis ke zariye aap yeh maloom kar saktay hain ke aap ka mobile کمپلائنٹ hai, nan کمپلائنٹ hain, asli hai ya smuggle shuda hai
–apne mobile ke aayi am ای aayi number oopar betaye gaye tenu tareeqon se tasdeeq kar saktay hain
agar aap ke aayi am ای aayi par کمپلائنٹ ya compliant ka jawab aata hai to is ka matlab hai ke aap ka mobile jee s am ae aur pi tea ae se tasdeeq shuda hai aur aap baghair kisi maslay ke usay ba aasani istemaal kar saktay hain
dosra jawab yeh aasakta hai ke aap ka mobile ka aayi am ای aayi durust hai aur yeh jee s am ae se tasdeeq shuda hai lekin yeh pi tea ae se tasdeeq shuda nahi, aisi sorat e haal mein aap ko –apne mobile se aik cal ya s am s karna hai aur 20 october ke baad aap ka mobile کمپلائنٹ hojaye ga aur aap ko koi pareshani nahi hogi
teesra jawab aap ko jo aasakta hai woh nan کمپلائنٹ ya non compliant ho sakta hai, aisi surathaal aap ke liye thori pareshan kin hosakti hai
agar aap ko aisa pegham masool hota hai to is ka matlab hai ke aap ke mobile phone ka aayi am ای aayi jee s am ae ki janib se jari nahi sun-hwa ya yeh jaali hai
aisi sorat e haal mein aap naay –apne mobile phone mein woh sm lgani hai jo aap mustaqil istemaal karte hain kyunKPT ae ki janib se aap ke mobile phone ko sirf is sm se munsalik kardiya jaye ga jo 20 october taq aap ke mobile phone mein hogi, is ke baad aap –apne mobile mein koi doosri sm istemaal nahi kar saken ge
aakhri jawab jo pi tea ae ki janib se aap ko masool ho sakta hai woh hai ke aap ka aayi am ای aayi bock hai, aisi sorat e haal ka matlab aap ka mobile ya to chori shuda hai ya is ke hawalay se shikayat darj karai gayi thi aur is sorat e haal mein aap ka mobile bock hojaye ga aur usay dobarah khulwane ke liye pi tea ae se rabita karna parre ga
lehaza –apne mobile phone ki tasdeeq ke liye 20 october tak aayi am ای aayi number likh kar 8484 par s am s karen ya Website aur mobile appli cash istemaal karen

is ke bawajood dono is haftay umeed kar rahay hain ke tail peda karne walay mumalik ki tanzeem avpik tail ki aalmi qeemat badhaane ke liye apni pedawar mein kami nah kere

yeh tawaqqa ki ja rahi thi ke avpik ke sab se taaqatwar malik Saudi  arab ki khwahish par pedawar mein kami se qeematein barhain gi, jo November  ke aakhir taq guzashta aik saal ke douran kam tareen satah par pahonch chuki hain
lekin fi al haal aisa koi faisla nahi sun-hwa

to hamein avpik ke ijlaas ke baad kis elaan ki tawaqqa rakhni chahiye aur kyun? aur is ke ilawa woh kon se deegar mamlaat hain jo Saudi  arab aur avpik ko malhooz khatir rakhna hon ge? agar hum tail ki mojooda qeematein dekhen aur un ka mawazna guzashta dahai se karen to yeh batadreej kam hain
brint curved ko aalmi tail ki qeemat ka miyaar samgha jata hai aur is ki qeemat 28 November  ko 58. 76 dollar fi barrel taq gir gayi thi
yeh october 2017 se is ki kam tareen satah thi
lekin tajzia karon ki janib se' avpik pedawar mein kami ka elaan kere ga' ki pishngoyyon ke baad bhi tail ki qeematein 63 dollar tak pahonch gayeen
taham satah phir bhi March  2012 mein tail ki qeemat ka aadha bhi nahi hai
tab fi barrel qeemat 128 dollar thi, kyunkay is waqt khadshaat thay ke Iraq  mein Adam  istehkaam ke baais tail ki farahmi mutasir hogi
yeh bhi padhiye irani tail ke kharidaron ko istashna dainay ke liye tayyar pedawar mein kami ka faisla, khaam tail ki qeematon mein izafah Saudi  arab nay﻿ kab kab Pakistan  ki madad ki? avpik pedawar mein kami chahta hai kyunkay is ke andazay ke mutabiq duniya bhar mein aindah saal taraqqi ki sharah kam honay se tail ki maang mein bhi kami hogi

motay motay lhafon mein late kar chilghozay aur moong phalian khana subah subah daant کٹکٹاتے hue uthna aur haath mnh dho kar laraz te hathon se nashta karna waghera aisay maloomat hain jo sirf sardiyoon ke liye hi makhsoos hain garmi aur sardi ke asraat hamaray jism par bhi mrttb hotay hain garmiyon mein hamara nizam hazem kam zor hojata hai is ki bunyadi wajah yeh hai ke doranِ khoon hamaray jism ke bairooni hisson ki janib mael rehta hai yani haath peeron ki ragon mein khoon ziyada miqdaar mein gardish karta hai taakay paseena waafar miqdaar mein jِld se kharij hota rahay aur jism ka androoni hissa thanda rahay lekin jab sardiyoon mein jism bairooni sard mahol se khud bakhud thanda rehta hai to aisi soorat mein jism ki hararat ko ziyada se ziyada miqdaar mein mehfooz rakhnay ke liye doranِ khoon androoni aaza ka rukh karleta hai androoni aaza mein nizam hazem bunyadi ahmiyat ka haamil hai maida aanten aur jigar waghera nizam hazem ka laazmi hissa hain androoni aaza mein doranِ khoon ziyada hojane ki wajah se nizaam hazem taaqat war hojata hai jis ki badolat saqeel se saqeel cheezain bhi bakhoobi hazem honay lagti hain aur badan ko taaqat aur tawanai milnay lagti hain nizam hazem ki beedar یسردی nizam hazem ki baydaari ka mausam hai is mausam mein aap ziyada kaam kar satke hain kyun ke nizam hazem hamein bhar poor tawanai faraham karta hai jab aap himmat karkay jism ko harkat dete hain to garmi ke muqablay mein ziyada mustadi se kaam karne ko dil chahta hai is mausam mein ki gayi ورزشوں ke asraat sara saal jism ko sahet mand aur توانارکھتے hain aur jism thos hojata hai jab aap yeh jantay hain ke sardi ke mausam mein ziyada mehnat mushaqqat aur دوڑدھوپ ki ja sakti hai oxford ( web disk ) janoobi America  aur junoob shumali America  ke meethay paanion mein aam payi jaaane wali machhli ٹیٹرافش agarchay –apne khobsorat rangon ki wajah se mashhoor hai lekin yeh –apne dil ki azkhud murammat karne ki zabardast salahiyat rakhti hai
mahireen ke mutabiq agar machhli ka yeh raaz maloom hojaye to is se insanon mein heart feel aur amwaat ke ilaaj mein madad mil sakti hai
isi pehlu par oxford university ki professor میتھلڈا aur un ke sathiyon nay﻿ titra fish ka mutalea shuru kya
un ka hadaf machhli mein yeh dekhna tha ke aakhir woh kis terhan qalb ke shakista tissues ki azkhud murammat karti hai
mahireen nay﻿ do aqsam ki titra fish ka jeneati jaiza liya aur un mein dil ko dobarah sayhat mand bananay walay jain ki talaash shuru ki
mahireen nay﻿ note kya ke machhli ka dil mutasir honay ke baad aayi are are si 10 aur کیوولن jain ziada sargaram ho jatay hain
mahireen ka khayaal hai ke un mein se aayi are are si teen jain is amal mein qadray ahem kirdaar ada karta hai
is se qabal mahireen aik dosray tajarbay mein choohay mein aayi arECC teen jain ki sargarmi note kar chukay they
yeh jain dil ki aik kefiyat ڈائلیٹڈ کارڈیومیوپیتھی se wabasta hota hai aur is bemari mein dil barh jata hai aur khoon pump karne mein nakaam rehta hai
mazeed tahaqeeq se maloom sun-hwa ke aayi are are si 10 dil ke khaliyaat ke سکڑاؤ aur پھیلاؤ mein bhi ahem kirdaar ada karta hai
ab is tahaqeeq ko mazeed agay badhaane ke liye mahireen ne machhli gharon mein rakhi jany wali aik araishi machhli, zebra fish ka mutalea kya jis mein bhi apna dil khud murammat karne ki salahiyat payi jati hai
science danon nay﻿ zebra fish li aur is mein aayi are are si 10 jain ki sargarmi moattal kar di aur herat angaiz tor par maloom sun-hwa ke is ke baad zebra fish nuqsaan pounchanay walay dil ki dobarah murammat nahi kar saki
is khabar se mahireen bohat khush hain kyunkay woh jaan chuke hain ke aayi are are si 10 dil ke tootay hue khaliyaat ki murammat karne mein ahem kirdaar ada karta hai taham is tahaqeeq ko insanon par aazmaane ke liye taweel mehnat aur sbraazma marahil darkaar hain lekin qudrat se hamein aik barri insani bemari ke ilaaj ki roshni zaroor mili hai agar yeh amal kisi terhan insanon ke liye mumkin hojaye to usay aik tibbi inqilab kaha jaye ga
dil ke shadeed doray ke baad jab dil ke tamam hisson ko khoon aur oxygen nahi milta to woh dheeray dheeray bilkul be amal ho jatay hain
basa auqaat is ka wahid ilaaj sayhat mand dil ki pyondkari ke siwa kuch aur nahi hota
America  ki vzrat khazana ny mashkook zrِ mubadla ki policy par Bharat  ko currency watch list mein shaamil kardiya is fehrist mein Bharat  aur chain ke ilawa deegar mumalik bhi shaamil hain Amrici  wizarat khazana ki jari report ke mutabiq watch list mein un tamam barray karobari shiraakat daaron ko shaamil kya gaya hai jin ki currency policy tavajja talabb hai is shahmahi report mein congress ny Bharat  ke ilawa un paanch mumalik ka naam bhi shaamil kya jo october se mazkoorah fehrist mein mojood they un mein chain Germany  Japan  Korea  aur سوئزر land shaamil hain currency watch list mein shaamil tijarti shiraakat daaron mein se koi bhi tijarti faiday ke liye currency ko control nahi krska lekin fehrist mein shaamil 5 mumalik currency policy ke 3 mein se 2 miyaar par poora utre jabkay chain ko America  ke tijarti khasaray mein ghair munasib sharah ki wajah se shaamil kya gaya Amrici  sarkari data ke mutabiq America  ka aalmi tijarti khasara 556 arab dollar hai jis mein 337 arab dollar ka tijarti khasara sirf chain se mutaliq hai Amrici  wazeer khazana stevin minchin ka kehna tha ke hum ghair munsifana zar mubadla se nimatnay ke khilaaf jung aur nigrani jari rakhain ge jabkay barray tijarti Adam  tawazun ke liye islahat aur policion ki hosla afzai karen ge wizarat khazana ki is report ko congress ne talabb kya tha taakay aisay mumalik ki shanakht ki jasakay jo tijarti faiday ki khatir apni currency ki qeemat ko masnoi tor barqarar karte hain jis ka maqsad zar e mubadla ki kam sharah aur susti baraamdaat mein izafah karna hai report mein kaha gaya hai ke America  se tijarat mein Bharat  ko 23 arab dollar ka izafah sun-hwa Bharat  ke zar e mubadla mein saal 2017 ki pehli teen sah mahyon mein izafah dekha gaya aur sath hi Bharti  rupay ki qader mein bhi izafah dekhnay mein aaya chain ko America  ke sath tijarti tanaze ki wajah se watch list mein shaamil kya gaya is hawalay se wizarat khazana ka kehna tha ke chain ki currency aam tor par dollar ke mukhalif simt ki janib jarahi thi jis ki wajah se America  ko chain ke tijarti khasaray ko kam karne mein madad miley gi Germany  ko bhi watch list mein rakha jaye ga kyunkay Germany  Europi  union ka hissa honay ki wajah se azadana tor par euro ka ایکسچنچ rate control nahi karsaktha hukoomat ke aik faislay se Pakistan  ke 12 arab rupay zaya hogaye Islamabad ( daily Pakistan  online ) Pakistan  ail an ab ail an jee ki zaroorat nahi hai aur mazeed ail an jee June  2019 mein bhaije jaye jabkay aik laakh tees hazaar metric tan ail an jee ki khaip mansookh kar di gayi zaraye ka kehna hai ke ail an jee sunil gwaskr poori baat suneney ke baad goya hue,' baja kaha ke kayi aik achay پلئیرز un tea ٹؤنٹی legs ney peda kiye hain magar masla yeh hai ke tea ٹؤنٹی ka behtareen plyir bhi one day ka aaccha plyir nahi ban sakta, nah hi one day ka aaccha plyir test ka khilari ban sakta hai

Sindh  ke zila thar parkr ke ilaqay muthi mein waqay soul hospital mein gurbat iflaas bhook aur pyaas ke sataye mazeed 4 bachay intqaal kar gaye mehakma sahet ke zaraye ke mutabiq soul hospital muthi mein bachon ki yeh amwaat guzashta 24 ghanton ke douran hui hain zaraye mehakma sahet ka mazeed kehna hai ke intqaal karne walay bachon mein do nozaida hain jabkay do ki umrein aik din hain un amwaat ke baad mah rawan mein ghizaiyat ki kami o deegar amraaz ke sabab zila thar parkr mein intqaal karne walay bachon ki tadaad 44 taq ja pohanchi hai turkey ki janib se Iran  se tail ki kharidari bilkul khatam hokar reh gayi hai Iran  se tail kharednay wali tark oil company توبراش ney october mein Iran  se 1 laakh 29 hazaar barrel tail khareeda tha magar November  mein yeh miqdaar sifar rahi tafseelaat ke mutabiq turkey un aath mumalik mein shaamil hai jinhein America  ney t_hran par pabandion ke douran Iran  se mehdood pemanay par tijarti taluqaat aur tail ki kharidari ki ijazat di thi America  ney paanch nombrko Iran  par mazeed iqtisadi pabandiyan Ayad  ki theen jin mein irani tail aur tawanai ke shobo ko khaas tor par hadaf banaya gaya tha irani wazeer baraye ptrolim بیجن zngnh neh guzashta roz aik bayan mein kaha ke dushman ke sath hamari jung mein tail ka shoba sab se agay hoga un ka kehna tha ke America  ki taraf se Ayad  ki jaany wali pabandion ke asraat kam karne ki poori koshish kere ga un ka kehna tha ke America  Iran  par pabandion ke zariye t_hran ko black mil karna chahta hai magar Iran  Amrici  pabandion ka shikaar nahi hoga aur nah hi kisi دباؤ mein aaye mutabiq machhli dil ke amraaz ki sharah ko bohat hadd tak kam kar sakta hai wazan ko kam karne mein machhli ka tail bohat mufeed hota hai you new rusty of sow th aastr ylya ki aik tahaqeeq ke mutabiq machhli ke tail mein aisay ajzaa paye jatay hain jin se werzish ke douran wazan kam karne mein kaafi madad millti hai werzish ke sath sath agar machhli ka tail apni roz maraah khoraak mein shaamil karliya jaye توورز sh ke zariye kam karna aaasaaan hota hai jism mein khoon ke bahao ko behtar bananay mein bhi machhli ka tail ka fi madad gaad saabit hota hai aur is ki madad se ko listr will control kyajasktahe mukhtalif mousmi qisam ki bimarion maslan bukhaar, nazla, kha nasee waghera se bchayo میںبھی madad millti hai nature l- science programme ki reserch ke mutabiq machhli ke tail ko add zay ke ilaaj ke tor par bhi istemaal kya ja sakta hai machhli ke jahan aur bohat saaray faiday hain wahan is ki wajah se sirkay balon ki nashonuma mein bhi khatir khuwa behtari layi ja sakti hai is ke istemaal se sir ke balon mein chamak peda hoja ti hai aur woh mazboot bhi bantay hain high blood par یشر ayjo kishn programme America  ki report ke mutabiq machhli ka tail high blood pressure ko na Ramil  karne mein bhi kaam aata hai aap yeh soch rahay hon ge ke aap ko –apne baqi vegetable oils ki jagah machhli ke tail ka istemaal shuru kar na chahiye lekin is ki zaroorat nahi aap –apne dosray ویجٹیبل oil ke sath sath roz ke khanay mein kuch miqdaar machhli ka tail istemaal karkay bhi bohat saaray fayd y haasil kar satke hain maahir tib ka kehna hai ke aap baqi tamam oils band karkay sirf machhli ka tail hi istemaal karen to woh bhi durust nahi machhli ke tail mein vitamin ae d avray paaya jata hai jo ke bohat saaray khatarnaak amraaz mein mufeed hotay hain dimaghi taaqat ke liye omega 3 se barh kar shayad hi koi cheez kaar amad hai agar jism mein omega
3 ki miqdaar kam ho to yeh dimagh ki kharab karkardagi par mntj hoti hai omega 3 sard pani ki machhliyon ki makhsoos aqsam mein paaya jata hai
maslan سلیمون aur ٹراؤٹ aisi machhliyan hain ke jin mein omega
3 paaya jata hai
yeh dimaghi istedad car aur dimagh ke baahum mut-tasil af-aal ko behtareen banata hai har haftay do teen martaba machhli khanay walay afraad mein dil ke doray ka imkaan unn logon ke muqablay mein kam hota hai jo har haftay sirf aik baar ya bilkul hi machhli nahi khatay America  mein honay wali aik tahaqeeq mein yeh baat samnay aayi hai ke haftay mein aik baar bhi machhli khana yad dasht ke liye faida mand saabit ho sakta hai
tahaqeeq mein kaha gaya ke jo log بھنی hui ya baked machhli ko apni khoraak ka hissa banatay hain un ki yadasht mein izafah honay ke imkanaat barh jatay hain aur is se dimagh ko tawanai millti hai haftay mein ik do din machhli khana sahet ke liye bohat mufeed hai aur jo log machhli nahi khatay woh akhrot soybean ya un ka tail kha kar omega 3 chiknai haasil kar satke hain aam khayaal hai ke yahi chiknai dil ko mehfooz rakhti hai Lahore  ( web desk ) chicken ke gosht ke baare mein yeh kaha jaye to ghalat nah hoga ke Pakistan  mein usay sab se ziyada khaya jata hai magar kya aap usay pakanay se pehlay aisi ghalatiyan to nahi karte jo fod pwayznng ka khatrah barha deti hain jee haan kuch غذائیں aisi hoti hain jo deegar ke muqablay mein fod pwayznng ka baais ban sakti hain aur بچاؤں ke liye asal cheez un ki tayari hai khasosan chicken ke muamlay mein anday kacha doodh sabz pattoun wali sabzian aur chicken aisi غذائیں hain jin mein bacteria ki nashonuma ka khatrah bohat ziyada hota hai agarchay yeh khanay ke liye mehfooz hoti hain magar chicken ke hawalay se ziyada ahthyat ki zaroorat hoti hai chicken ke gosht mein aksar salmonila Nami  bacteria paaya jata hai jo antadiyon ki soozish aur food pwayznng ka baais ban sakta hai khaas tor par buzurgon haamla khawateen aur bachon ke liye khatarnaak saabit ho sakta hai chicken ko fridge se bahar kaafi der ke liye chore dena kamray ke darjah hararat mein chicken ke gosht mein sahet ke liye nuqsaan da bacteria ki afzaish ka imkaan barhta hai aur food pwayznng ka shikaar bnaskta hai is liye zurori hai ke ghar laatay hi gosht ko fridge mein rakh den aur jab pakana ho isi waqt nikalen durust tareeqay se mehfooz nah karna kya aap ko lagta hai ke chicken fridge ke shilf mein rakhna theek hai agar haan to is soch ko badleen is gosht se pani kharij hokar fridge ke deegar hisson taq poanch sakta hai jis ke nateejay mein fridge mein mojood deegar ashiayi bhi bacteria se aaloda hosakti hain chicken ko kisi plate ya bartan mein rakhen aur phir cover karkay fridge ke nichale shelf mein store karen pakanay se pehlay chicken ko dhona yeh bohat aam hai ke chicken ke kachay gosht ko dho kar pakaya jata hai magar aisa karne se chicken mein mojood bacteria poooray kitcehn mein phail jata hai to gosht dhoney ki bajaye usay barah e raast mein bartan ya slow kukkar mein daal kar pakayen meri net karte hue khayaal nah rakhna chicken ko lazeez bananay ke liye meri net karna zurori hota hai magar usay kitcehn کانٹر par chore dena zaroor khatarnaak bana sakta hai kyunkay bacteria is waqt taizi se nashonuma paate hain jab gosht garam hota hai to plastic bag ( ya kisi band bartan ) mein chicken ko fridge mein meri net karen kachay gosht ko lagnay wali ashiayi ka istemaal agar chicken ko banatay hue usay koi cheez jaisay chamach ya kuch bhi chhoo gaya hai to woh bhi fod pwayznng ka khatrah barha sakta hai is liye jo bhi cheez gosht ko chhoyin usay achi terhan dho kar hi istemaal karen haath dhona chicken ke gosht ko chone ke baad –apne hathon ko bhi achi terhan dhowen
taiz aanch mein pakana chicken mein کیمپائلو biktr Nami  bacteria bhi paaya jata hai jabkay salmonila aisay jaraseem hain jo pakanay ke douran bhi bach satke hain is liye yeh bhi zurori hai ke chicken ko taiz aanch mein pakaya jaye taakay nuqsaan da bacteria ke khatmay ko yakeeni banaya jasakay kyunkay un ki mamooli miqdaar bhi bemaar karne ke liye kaafi saabit hoti hai qutar 27 May  ( siyasat dot com ) arab TV ki report mein daawa kya gaya hai ke do saal mein hindustani team ke teen test matchon ke mukhtalif sishnz fux kiye gay England  ke 3 Australia  ke 2 khiladion ke mulawis honay ka inkishaaf sun-hwa english cricketers nay﻿ ilzamaat radd kar diye australvi cricketers nay﻿ rad-e-amal dainay se inkar kardiya report ke mutabiq abhi taq kisi hindustani cricketer ka naam samnay nahi aaya فکسرز kyoritr aur khiladion ko kis terhan rishwat dete hain kis terhan conection istemaal kar taay hain sab samnay aagaya poora match ya match ka koi hissa fux karkay apni marzi ka nateeja kaisay haasil kya jata hai فکسرز kis terhan kyoritr aur cricketers ko rishwat dete hain report mein daawa kya gaya hai ke guzashta saal 16 se 20 decemeber ke darmain chnyi mein hindostan England  test match fux tha hindostan aur Srilanka ke darmain gaal mein July  2017 mein khela gaya test bhi fux match tha March  2017 mein ranchi mein sun-hwa Australia  hindostan test bhi fux tha un tenu test matches ke makhsoos sishnz khiladion aur فکسرز ke darmain tey shuda they report ke mutabiq un matches mein ab taq kisi hindustani cricketer ka naam samnay nahi aaya hindostan England  chnyi test mein England  ke teen khilari fixing mein mulawis rahay ranchi ke test mein australvi team ke do khilari mulawis paye gaye report par english khiladion neh ilzamaat mustard kardiye jabkay australvi khiladion neh rad-e-amal dainay se inkaar kardiya nai Dehli , 12 decemeber ( agency ) مشہوراداکار anl Kapoor  apni anay wali film takhat ke liye apna wazan barhayain ge
film saaz kiran johar film takhat bananay jarahay hain
is film mein anl Kapoor  Shah  jahan ka kirdaar ada karen ge
is kirdaar ke liye woh apna wazan barhayain ge
is ke liye unhon ne aglay sulaa se aik allag terhan ki diet follow karne ka mansoobah banaya hai
film takhat mein rnoyr singh, qareena Kapoor  Khan , aalia Bhatt , wiki کوشل, bhomi پیڈنیکر, جہانوی Kapoor  aur anl Kapoor  ahem kirdaar ada karte nazar ayen ge
film ki kahani sachhi tareekhi kahani par mabni hai aur guzashta dinon kiran ne khud is baat ki tasdeeq ki thi
unhon ne bataya ke film tareekhi kahani par mabni hai
film ko tareekhi miyaar ko tavajja mein rakh kar banaya jaye ga
kiran nay﻿ kaha, yeh film sachey tareekhi waqea par mabni hai
yeh poori terhan tareekh mein mojood hai aur is liye usay is tareeqay se banana ahem hai jis terhan se yeh waqea waqay sun-hwa hai
Lahore  Multan  cheecha watni sameit Punjab  ke mukhtalif shehron mein aaj bhi اسموگ ya aaloda dhund rahi jis ke baais shehrion ko pareshani ka saamna karna para Lahore  aur is ke mulhiqa ilaqon mein اسموگ se hadd nigah mtasrhoyi hai Multan  sameit janoobi Punjab  ke mukhtalif shehar kal se اسموگ ki lapait mein hain jis se bemariyan bherne ka khadsha hai Lahore  ki فضاؤں kwayk baar phir اسموگ ne lapait mein le kar dhundlaa kar rakh diya hai jis mein din badan izafah hota ja raha hai bachay aur barray sabhi aankhon mein kharish aur ghutan ki shikayat kar rahay hain cheecha watni aur grdonwah mein halki اسموگکی wajah se shehrion ko saans lainay mein dushwari aur aankhon mein jalan ki bhi shikayat ho rahi hai Sindh  ke shehron Badeen  nawab Shah  aur Balochistan  ke zila Gwadar  mein bhi dhund se hadd nigah mutasir hui aur sifar ho kar reh gayi hai اسموگ ki raat aur subah ke auqaat mein shiddat ziyada hoti hai paidal motorcycle aur chung chi sawaar aankhon mein jalan aur namak sa lagta mehsoos karte hain saans letay hue bhi ghutan hoti hai khawateen aur bachon ka kehna hai ke woh gharon aur schoolon mein bhi mehfooz nahi اسموگ ki bo aur aankhon mein jalan gharon mein bhi mehsoos hoti hai tibbi mahireen ny hadaayat ki hai ke shehri اسموگ ke buray asraat se bachney ke liye chashmay aur mask pehan kar gharon se nikleen mehakma mosmiyat ka kehna hai ke اسموگ ki shiddat pichlle saal ki nisbat kam hai Lahore  aur Punjab  ke kayi shehron mein 2 din baad halki barish ka imkaan hai jis se اسموگ ki shiddat kam ho sakti hai mutahidda arab amarat ka pehla satellite khalaa mein rawana mutahidda arab amarat ka pehla satellite khalaa mein rawana Dubai  ( Sabah  news ) mutahidda arab amarat ka pehla satellite khalaa mein rawana kar diya gaya
ghair mulki khabar-rasan idaray ke mutabiq mutahidda arab amarat ney apna satellite khalifa set khalaa mein rawana kar diya, yeh satellite Japan  mein tani گاشیما khalayi markaz se ایچ-2 ae rocket ke zariye khalaa mein bheja gaya
report ke mutabiq khalifa set pehla sitilayt hai jo mukammal tor par amarati engineers aur mahireen ki team ne design, test aur tayyar kya hai, is ki tayari Mohammad  ban rashid khalayi markaz ki tecnology tajurbah gaah mein hui hai
Mumbai  police ne durust Darazi  ke ilzamaat par Bollywood ke vitrn adakar alluk nath ke khilaaf muqadma darj karliya
alluk nath ke khilaaf aik maheena pehlay writer ونتا نندا ne shikayat darj karai thi
muqami media reports ke mutabiq ونتا نندا ne alluk nath ke khilaaf 17 october ko shikayat darj karai thi jis ke baad alluk nath ne ونتا نندا پرجوابا saakh aur shohrat ko nuqsaan pohanchanay par aik rupiya harjanay aur tehreeri maffi mangnay ka case darj karaya tha
deegar baton ke ilawa ونتا نندا nay﻿ alluk nath par 19 saal qabal un ke sath zayad-ti ka ilzaam aed kya jab yeh dono aik project mein sath kaam kar rahay thay
alluk nath ne ilzamaat ko mustard kardiya hai
rawan mah ke aaghaz par seenay and TV aartst association ne wraps ke ilzamaat samnay anay پربالی would filmo mein' aadarsh بابوجی' ke krdaron ke liye مشہورالوک nath ki rukniat mansookh kar di thi
khawateen ko harasan karne ke khilaaf aalmi muhim' ?me two' se jarray alluk nath ke khilaaf muqadma darj karanay wali writer ونتا نندا ka kehna hai :' mein intiqam nahi lena chahati thi
mein islaah chahati hon intiqam nahi
kuch pachtaawa koi ehsas jurm to ho
mein chahati hon kisi aurat ke sath woh nah karen جوآپ ney mere sath kya
lekin jo hum dekh rahay hain woh haqayiq ko jutlana aur be sharmi ka rawayya hai

Dubai  28 May  ( siyasat dot com ) cricket ki duniya mein aik aur fixing scandal naay tehelka macha diya hai aur Srilanka mein khailay gaye do tst matchon mein do Srilanka aur aik sabiq hindustani khilari ki janib se pitch fixing ka inkishaaf sun-hwa hai jis ki international cricket council ( aayi si si ) naay tehqiqaat shuru kar di hain الجزیرہ TV ki dastawizi film mein Srilanka ke gaal international stadium ke kyoritr ko mobayyana tor par match fixing scandal mein mulawis dekhaya gaya hai jahan Srilanka aur Australia  ke darmain khailay gaye is match mein maheman autraliyai team sirf 3 din mein match haar gayi thi yeh dastawizi film ki kuch jhalkiyan samnay aayi hain aur is mein dekhaya gaya hai ke gaal stadium ke assistant manijar aur kyoritr tharnga اندیکا yeh daawa karte hain ke woh aik aisi wicket tayyar karen ge jo un ki marzi ke nataij day sakay dastawizi film mein inkishaaf kya gaya ke Srilanka aur hindostan ke darmain 2017 mein gaal mein khailay gaye match mein janib boojh kar batsmanon ke liye mozoon wicket tayyar ki gayi jabkay is mein roeben mors aur تھرندو minds Nami  match فکسرز ko bhi samnay laya gaya hai jo yeh daawa karte hain ke November  mein isi maqam par honay walay aglay match mein England  ko hadaf banaya jaye ga di Australian  ney apni report mein daawa kya ke 2016 mein gaal ke maqam par Australia  aur Srilanka ke darmain khailay gaye match ki pitch ki saakht ko jaan boojh kar tabdeel kya gaya is match mein Australia  pehli ining mein 106 aur doosri mein 183 runs par dhair ho gayi thi aur usay match mein 229 runs se shikast ka saamna karna para tha jabkay is ke 18 khilari span bowling ka nishana banay they aur maheman team dono ining mein majmoi tor par 85 overs bhi batting nahi kar saki thi الجزیرہ ney tehqiqaat ke liye lagaye gaye ilzamaat bohat sangeen hain aur unhon ney sahafti idaray se mutalba kya ke woh is silsilay mein tamam tar saboot tafteeshi idaron ke supurd karen cricket ki aalmi gornng body ney kaha ke amit Shah  ney is saal June  mein adakara se Mumbai  mein waqay unki rahaish gaah par mulaqaat ki thi Islamabad ( monitoring desk ) toyota corolla 2020 Pakistan mein muta-arif, toyota corolla 5 mukhtalif models mein farokht ke liye paish ki jaye gi, teen models 1800 si si jabkay 2 models mein 2 hazaar si si engine ke haamil hon ge
media reports ke mutabiq duniya ki sab se maqbool car toyota krola ke 2020 ke models Pakistan  mein bhi muta-arif karwa diye gay hain
toyota ne krola 2020 ke 5 mukhtalif models Pakistan  mein paish kiye hain
Pakistan  mein toyota krola ail, toyota krola ail ای, toyota krola x ail ای toyota krola x s ایاور toyota krola s ای Nami  models کیشکل mein muta-arif karwai gayi hai
toyota corolla ail, toyota corolla ail ای, toyota corolla x ail ای 1800 si si engine ke haamil hon ge
jabkay toyota corolla x s ای aur toyota corolla s ای 2 hazaar si si engine ki haamil hon gi
toyota corolla ke un tamam models mein 8 air bag daaley gaye hain
jabkay behtar بریکس aur behtar head lights samait deegar aur mazeed khususiyaat bhi shaamil ki gayi hain
تاہمٹویوٹا ki janib se krola 2020 ke models ki qeematon ka fi al haal elaan samnay nahi aaya
tasweer ke copy right epa image caption prinka aur nuk جوانس ki shadi haal hi mein hui hai aik Amrici  Website ke article mein' dhokay baz' qarar diye jaany ke baad India  mein social media sarfeen adakara prinka chopra ke sath izhaar yakjahti kar rahay hain
di kat mein shaya kiye jaanay wala yeh mazmoon ab hata liya gaya hai taham is mein kaha gaya tha ke adakara naay Amrici  gulukar nuk جونس ko' phansa kar un se shadi ki taakay un ke kriyr ko sahara mil sakay '
indian awam khaas kar jo pehlay is shadi ko pasand nahi kar rahay thay woh bhi prinka ka difaa karne lagey hain
yeh bhi padhiye prinka ke 75 foot lambay dupattay ne megan مارکل ko bhi maat day di prinka chopra ne nick جونس se shadi kar li hindu shiddat pasand plot par prinka chopra ki maffi khud prinka chopra ne hindostan times se baat karte hue kaha ke woh is article par' rdِ amal ya bayan' nahi dena chahtain
un ka kehna tha' mein is waqt bohat khush hon
aisi cheeze mujhe pareshan nahi kar sakteen
' kayi logon ka kehna hai ke yeh mazmoon nasal parasti par mabni hai
is khabar naay aik terhan se is jooray ke baray mein haliya shadi ki khabron mein un logon ke liye phir se jaan bhar di hai jin ka un ki shadi ki taaza tareen khabron se dil bhar gaya tha
ab woh sab prinka ka difaa kar rahay hain
hatta ke woh log bhi jo is shadi ko ghair zaroori tor par shahana qarar day rahay thay khasosan 75 foot lambay ghonghat ki wajah se jisay aik team ko utha kar lana para
is se pehlay prinka chopra ke nuk جونس ke sath barhatay marasim ki khabron par kayi andinz khush nahi hotay thay
kayi log yeh jantay tak nahi thay ke nuk جونس kon hain lekin phir bhi unhein social media par aisi tasaveer ya posts pasand nahi theen jin mein woh sath sath nazar atay thay
lekin di kat mein shaya honay walay mazmoon naay sab kuch badal diya
yakam decemeber ko 36 sala prinka chopra aur 26 sala nuk جونس ki shadi ke teen din baad shaya honay walay is article mein likha gaya' kuch hai jo logon ko pata nahi hai ya unhon ney usay tasleem kar liya hai ke mere khayaal mein prinka chopra daur jadeed ki aik' farebi adakara' hain
yeh sach hai ke nuk جونس yakam decemeber ko aik dhoka dahi par mabni rishtay mein bndh gay hain
' andinz ne foran hi joray ke talluq ko dhoka qarar diye jane ko mustard kya aur kaha ke article ke musannif ke paas aisa koi saboot nahi ke nuk ne yeh talluq nah chahtay hue qaim kya hai
andinz aur deegar ashaati idaron ki janib se muzammat kiye jaaney par is article ko' tabdeel' kar diya gaya
aur budh ki shaam tak yeh article Website se hata hi diya gaya
is ke sath hi yeh kaha gaya ke yeh ashaat aik ghalti thi
lekin is waqt tak nuqsaan ho chuka tha aur is baaray mein ٹویٹس aur posts phelnay lagen aur logon ney is par herat ka izhaar kya
is mutanazia article ko kayi andinz aur Amrici  Websites ne nishana banaya aur usay' زینوفوبک' yani ghair mulkion se nafrat par mabni qarar diya
news laundry mein sahafi nisha sosan naay sawal kya ke Maria  smith ka tehreer kardah yeh mazmoon' nashay mein ki gayi ashaat' thi
khawateen ke haqooq ki almbrdar aik Amrici  Website' جیزیبل' mein پراچی gpta ne is article ke lab labaab ko kuch is terhan bayan kya' is mein prinka chopra ko shohrat ki bhukhi ghair mulki, jis ne India  mein naam kamaya aur ab America  mein kamyabi par nigehain jamaye hue hai aur is ke liye is ki seerhi bhala kon hai? aik safaid mard
' un ka mazeed kehna tha yeh mazmoon' sara sar nasal parastana aur sanfi imtiaz par mabni hai
' jald hi Bollywood aur hali would ke fankaron ne bhi is mazmoon ke khilaaf ٹویٹ karna shuru kar den jin mein sonam Kapoor , prinka ke dever jo جونس, game of تھرونز ki adakara sufi turner shaamil hain
do martaba academy awards ( oscar ) jeetnay wali Pakistani  film saaz Shermin  Abaid  chnaye aik aur aalmi aizaz' di aylisn globl lidrshp award' jeetnay mein kamyaab hogayi hain
woh yeh aizaz haasil karne wali pehli Pakistani  hain
yeh award inhen America  ke shehar New York ki' di تالبرگ فاؤنڈیشن' ne munfarid mozuaat ka intikhab karne ki bharpoor salahiyat ke aitraaf ke tor par diya hai
award milnay prkhoshi ka izhaar karte hue Shermin  ka kehna hai ke" mein award lainay par bohat khush hon
mujhe aik aisay waqt par yeh award mila hai jab muashray ko aaina dikhaane ki bhaari qeemat chukane ki khabrain aam hain
–apne sathiyon ko mehez sach bolnay par duniya bhar mein qaid o band ki savbtin sahte aur qatal hota dekhnay ke sath, hamein saabit qadam rehne ki himmat rakhnay ki zaroorat hai
" Shermin  ko un ki do dastawizi filmon' saving fees' aur' ae girl un di river' ke liye oscar awards diye ja chukay hain
woh nisf darjan Aimi  awards bhi kar chuki hain jab ke inhen Pakistan  mein hlalِ imtiaz se bhi Nawaz  ja chuka hai
America  ney Iran  ke paanch shehrion پرسفری pabandiyan aed kar dein mehakma khazana hakkaam ney kaha hai ke un shehrion ka talluq pasdaran inqilab se hai Amrici  mehakma khazana ki Website par jari bayan ke mutabiq America  ney Iran  ke paanch shehrion پرسفری pabandiyan aed kar dein mehdi Azar  پشیح Mohammad  Jafferi  Mohammad  kazm abad Javed  شہرامین aur syed mohakam طہرانی ke America  aur ittihadi mulkon ke safar par pabandi hogi Amrici  mehakma khazana ke mutabiq irani pasdaran inqilab se munsalik un shaksiaat ke America  mein asasay bhi munjamad kardiye gaye Amrici  wazeer kharja mike پومپیو ne baara mutalibaat paish kiye they aur kaha tha ke agar Iran  ne un mutalibaat par amal nahi kya twayran par tareekhi pabandiyan aed kar di jayen gi yeh khadsha zahir kya ja raha hai ke malik mein pani ki kami ke baais rawan saal aam ki pedawar mein 35 feesad taq kami askati hai jabkay globl varmng aur phalon ke chhote size par exporters mein tashweesh phail gayi hai
wazeh rahay ke Sindh  mein pani ki shadeed kami ki wajah se Haider  abad, tando alhyar aur Meer  poor khaas ke azlaa mein aam ke baagaat mutasir hon ge jabkay is hi terhan ki soorat e haal Punjab  mein bhi hogi
is soorat e haal mein muzaffar garh, Multan , Raheem  yaar Khan  aur shuja abad ke azlaa mein majmoi tor par aam ki pedawar mein 30 se 50% kami ka imkaan zahir kya ja raha hai
mazeed padhan : zaiqay se bharpoor aam ke heran kin tibbi fawaid all Pakistan  fruits and vegetable exporters, importers and mrchnts association ( pi f v ae ) ke sarparast waheed Ahmed  ka kehna tha ke pedawar mein kami ke sath sath Pakistani  aamon ke chhootay size par bhi bar aamad knndgan ko tashweesh hai
rawan saal aam ki maang mein izafah aur supply mein kami ki wajah se houlle sale market mein aam ki qeemat mein fi 40 klov 24 so se 3 hazaar taq izafay ka imkaan hai
yeh bhi parheen : Sindh  mein aam ki pedawar mein kami ka imkaan un ka kehna tha ke aam ki pedawar ke hawalay se Maroof  ilaqon mein sardiyoon ka mausam taweel honay ki wajah se bhi pedawar buri terhan mutasir hui hai jabkay aam ki fasal ko aik nai qisam ki bemari ka bhi saamna hai jis ki wajah se bhi pedawar mein kami hogi
exporters nay﻿ rawan saal aam ki draamdat ka hadaf 1 laakh tan rakha hai jis ke liye bairooni mumalik mein shipment ka aaghaz 20 May  2018 se hoga
vhid Ahmed  ka kehna tha ke pak chain iqtisadi raahdaari ( si pack ) ko pehli martaba aam ko chain mein daraamad karne ke liye istemaal kya jaye ga aur dollar ke muqablay rupay ki qader mein kami bhi is saal munafe mein izafah kere gi
mazeed padhan : meethay aur zaiqay daar aamon ki pehchan bohat asan! un ka kehna tha chain mein aam ki talabb ke baais umeed hai ke rawan saal 5? so se 1 hazaar tan taq ke aam chain daraamad kiye jayen ge
unhon nay﻿ bataya ke guzashta saal aam ki pedawar 50% tak kam hui thi aur 81 hazaar tan aam export hosakay thay
yeh khabar dawn akhbar mein 18 May  2018 ko shaya hui sawal o jawab ki Website kora ( quora ) ney elaan kya hai ke un ke 10 crore registered sarfeen ka data heiek hogaya hai
si ای o aydm d anglo ke mutabiq ghair majaz third party nay﻿ account ki maloomat, misaal ke tor par naam, ای mil address, aayi pi address, انکرپٹڈ ( ہیشڈ ) password, dosray net works se sarfeen ka amport kya sun-hwa public data aur ایکشنز jaisay sawalaat, jawabaat, comments, up vote, nan public کانٹنٹ aur ایکشنز jaisay jawabaat ki darkhwast, down vote aur direct massages haasil kiye hain
( jari hai ) kora ko is waardaat ka 30 November  ko pata chala tha aur is hawalay se tehqiqaat jari hain
kora ney tamam sarfeen ko jabri tor par account se laag out kardiya hai aur un se password ree set karaye ja rahay hain
kora ka kehna hai ke sarfeen ke paas word انکرپٹڈ they lekin sarfeen ke yahi password agar dosray net work par they to inhen har jagah tabdeel karna chahiye
sarfeen ney jo sawalaat gumnaam rehtay hue poochay they, un ka data is waardaat mein mutasir nahi sun-hwa
kora sarfeen ko data hik honay ke baray ای mil se mutala kar raha hai
is hawalay se tamam maloomat haasil karne ke liye yahan click karen Islamabad ( new زڈیسک ) poori duniya aglay saal smart phone mein teen tabdeelion ki shiddat se muntazir hai : awwal, فائیوجی, doum ae aayi ya masnoi zahanat aur soum kayi lense walay camera, taham pehli do tabdeelion ke liye munasib hardware ki talaash thi aur is tanazur mein smart phone ke liye پروسیسربنانے wali mashhoor company کوالکم neh elaan kya hai ke woh aglay baras five jee support karne wali chup farokht ke liye paish kere gi
کوالکم ke mutabiq asnip drign 855 processor mein five jee aur آرٹیفیشل intelli jins ( masnoi zahanat ) ya mukhtsiran ae aayi ke mukammal lawazmaat mojood hon ge
is ahem elaan ke baad ab tawaqqa ki jarahi hai ke aglay baras ke aakhir taq awleen فائیوجی phone istemaal hosakin ge taham is ka inhisaar khud sale phone companiyon par hoga ke aaya woh is ke liye tayyar hain ya nahi
har saal کوالکم –apne mobile phone processor ka elaan karti hai jo aglay 12 baras tak اینڈروئڈ phones ki zeenat banay rehtay hain yahi wajah hai ke کوالکم company ko ab tak koi bhi shikast nahi day saka hai
aglay saal ke liye asnip drign 855 system aan ae chup ( s o si ) hoga jo five jee ko support karta hai tajzia karon ke mutabiq five jee technology smart phone muwasilat mein data transfer ke lehaaz se aik inqilab hogi
jis mein data ki raftaar kayi gina barh jaye gi aur up load aur ڈاؤن load mein inqalabi tabdeeli runuma hogi
is mein ae aayi ke liye aik bilkul naya engine shaamil kya gaya hai
is lehaaz se آگمینٹڈ ریئلٹی, tasaveer aur aawaz ki shanakht ko goya par lag jayen ge
yeh processor –apne pehlay asnip drign 845 se teen gina barq-e raftaar hoga
bohat kam logon ko maloom hai ke usay bananay ke liye saat نینومیٹر par tayari ka amal istemaal kya gaya hai

mharshtr ke kuch shehron mein petrol ki qeemat 90 rupay ki' nafsiati had' paar kar gayi hai aur diesel 80 se oopar farokht ho raha hai
aisa pehlay kabhi nahi sun-hwa, is waqt bhi nahi jab bain al aqwami mandiyon mein tail ki qeemat daidh so dollar fi barrel ke ird gird mandala rahi thi
fi al haal mehanga honay ke bawajood bhi tail aalmi mndyon mein is ki aadhi qeemat par dastyab hai lekin phir bhi is ka asar petrol pmpon par nazar nahi aa raha hai jahan sirf aik mahinay mein qeematon mein paanch rupay fi letter se ziyada ka izafah sun-hwa hai
petrol mehanga hota hai to poooray private tansport siktr par asar parta hai, diesel mehanga hota hai to kisaan naraaz hotay hain
aur jis hukoomat se kisaan naraaz ho jayen is ke liye Iqtidaar  mein qaim rehna taqreeban namumkin hai kyunkay India  ab bhi kisanon ka hi malik hai

dollar jitna mehanga hota jaye ga, draamdat bhi itni hi mehengi hoti jayen gi aur buri khabar yeh bhi hai ke India  apni zaroorat ka 83 feesad tail daraamad karta hai

tax kam kiye to hukoomat ki aamdani kam hogi aur election ke saal mein, jab taraqiyati kamon ke liye ziyada paisay ki zaroorat hoti hai, hukoomat ke liye yeh qabil amal tajweez nahi hai

khabardaar kya jata hai jabkay chain mein internet company ٹینسینٹ naay bachon ke liye maqbool games khailnay ki muddat muqarrar ki hui hai Australia  ke mojooda aur sabiq khiladion par' aspat fixing' ke taaza ilzamaat samnay aaye hain, yeh ilzamaat qatri news channel' الجزیرہ' ki tehqiqati dakyomntri ke baad samnay aaye, jo rawan saal jari ki gayi dakyomntri ka falo up hai
cricket Australia  ne' 2011 hamza se ab taq tareekhi matches' se mutaliq un ilzamaat ki tasdeeq ki hai
is douran australvi team ney aik ayshz series, Cricket World Cupp, phir bngladish, Srilanka aur janoobi africa ke dotrfh doray kiye aur phir newzea land aur Bharat  ke khilaaf home series kheli
cheif executive james sndrlind ka kehna hai ke cricket Australia  ne un دعوؤں par integrity unit investi gation ne tehqiqaat ki hain
' الجزیرہ' TV ne rawan saal aik documentry ke zariye cricket mein spot fixing ki nishandahi ki thi aur is martaba bhi TV ki janib se idiot shuda video jari ki hai, jis mein biki Bharat  aur Australia  ke darmain March  2017 mein ranchi test se qabal keh raha hai ke woh bta sakta hai kis terhan se match khela jaye ga
doosri janib, international cricket council ( aayi si si ) ne awam se aspat fixing mein mulawis shakhs ke baaray mein maloomat dainay ki appeal ki hai
mazkoorah shakhs ka naam Aneel  Munawar  bataya gaya hai aur is ke baaray mein daawa kya gaya hai ke woh Bharat  ke ghair qanooni satta baazi syndicat ke liye spot fixing organisers ke tor par kaam karta hai
aayi si si ke anti corruption unit ke sarbarah aliks marshal ka kehna hai ke mobayyana فکسر Aneel  Munawar  ki shanakht ke hawalay se ab taq koi kamyabi nahi mili, is ki asal shanakht ab taq moamma bani hui hai jabkay asal dakyomntri mein nazar anay walay hrshkhs ko shanakht karliya gaya hai
