Pakistan  ke dar-al-hakoomat Islamabad mein sabzi manndi ke ilaqay se polio virus ki تشخیص ke liye liya gaya سامپل misbet anay ke baad shehar mein polio muhim shuru ho chuki hai sath hi yeh bataya ja raha hai ke yeh muhim 20 decemeber taq chalay gi bi bi si se baat karte hue deputy kmishnr Islamabad Mohammad  Hamza  shafqat ney bataya ke maholiyati سامپل mein jo virus paaya gaya hai is ka talluq kabul Afghanistan  se hai world health organization ney is ko wild polio virus ka naam diya hai mein payi jati hai unhon ney kaha ke sabzi manndi ka ilaqa jahan se yeh سامپل liya gaya wahan ziyada tar abadi Afghan  panah gzinon ki hai sath hi aayi 12 hai jahan afaan panah gzinon ki kachi abadi bhi mojood hai jis ko aqwam mutahidda ka idaara baraye panah Guzeen  chala raha hai hum pichlle paanch chay saloon mein honay wali beshtar mhmat mein hum paanch saal taq ke bachon ko polio ke qatray pila rahay they yahi kya lekin maholiyati سامپل check karne par polio virus phir nikal aaya is hawalay se is baar hukoomat is hawalay se is baar hukoomat ki technical team naay 10 saal taq ke bachon ko Islamabad ke kuch siktrz mein polio ke qatray pilanay ka iradah kya hai aur is par kaam shuru kar diya gaya hai smart phones tayyar karne wali duniya ki teesri barri cheeni company' huawei' ki canada mein girftar ki gayi cheif financial Afsar  ( CFO ) ming وانژو par America  se dhokay karne ka alzm aed kardiya gaya
ming وانژو ko rawan mah ke aaghaz mein Canadian  police naay Amrici  darkhwast par hirasat mein liya tha, taham un ki girftar 6 decemeber ko zahir ki gayi thi
khabar rasan idaray' ae f pi' naay bataya tha ke Amrici  hakkaam ko shuba hai ke ming وانژو naay Iran  par aed Amrici  pabandion ki khilaaf warzi ki
abhi yeh mukammal tor par wazeh nahi ho saka ke ming وانژو naay kis terhan khilaaf warzi ki, taham 7 decemeber ko inhen canada ki muqami adalat mein paish kya gaya, jahan un ke khilaaf America  ke sath dhokay ke ilzaam ke tehat samaat ki gayi
Bartanwi  nashriyati idaray' bi bi si' ne apni khabar mein bataya ke ming وانژو ke khilaaf lagaye gay ilzamaat par canada ki riyasat british columbia ki sprim court ne 5 ghantay tak taweel samaat ki, taham adalti karwai kisi nateejay ke baghair hi khatam hogayi
ming وانژو par America  ko dhoka dainay ka ilzaam aed kya gaya hai —فوٹو : chayna morning post ming وانژو ko isi adalat mein agli samaat par paish kya jaye ga aur agar un par America  ke sath dhokay aur Iran  ko faida dainay ka ilzaam saabit hogaya to inhen kam se kam 30 saal qaid ki saza ho sakti hai
yeh bhi parheen : huawei executive girftar, chain aur America  ke taluqaat mein phir kasheedgi report ke mutabiq adalat mein pehli samaat ke douran adalat ne bataya ke ming وانژو ne Iran  par aed Amrici  pabandion ki khilaaf ورژی ki aur unhon ne 2009 se 2014 ke darmain aik farzi company bana kar Iran  ke sath mamlaat tey kiye
adalat ke mutabiq ming وانژو ne اسکائے kaam Nami  company banakar huawei ko faida diya aur yeh ta-assur dainay ki koshish ki ke اسکائے naam aik allag idaara hai

khushki se chhutkara haasil karne ke liye market mein kayi terhan ki mehngi products dastyab hain jin ke bananay walay sir se khushki ka mukammal khtama karne ka daawa karte nazar atay hain
taham khushki ka khtama to daur ki baat, un products mein shaamil kimiklz balon ke liye nihayat nuqsaan da saabit hotay hain jin ki wajah se balon ke girnay aur be jaan honay ki shikayat peda hojati hai

wazeer khazana naay paiir ki shaam jaane kiye jaane walay aik video bayan mein kaha ke' guzashta chand hafton se is par kaam ho raha tha, hum naay androoni faislay bhi kiye, dost mumalik se bhi mushawarat ki
Wazeer e Azam  ne Pakistani  mahireen muashiaat se bhi mushawarat ki, jis ke baad faisla kiya gaya ke hamein aayi am f ke sath mazakraat ki ibtida karni chahiye jis se hum is muashi bohraan par qaboo pa saken

Asad  Umar  nay﻿ bohraan ke liye guzashta hukoomat ko zimma daar th_hrate hue kaha ke' logon ko idraak hai ke pichli hukoomat kaisay halaat chore kar gayi thi
is liye jab yeh hukoomat aayi to is waqt hum nay﻿ kaha tha ke hum nay﻿ tarjeehi bunyadon par is bohraan se niklny ke liye rasta ikhtiyar karna hai aur is ke liye aik se ziyada mutabadil zaraye ko talaash karna hai aur back waqt karna hai kyun ke hamaray paas waqt nahi hai
' is se qabal Wazeer e Azam  Pakistan  Imran  Khan  ney bhi itwaar ko Lahore  mein khitaab ke douran kaha tha shayad Pakistan  ko aayi am f ke paas jana parre, kyunkay adayigyon ke bohraan ka saamna hai
taham unhon ne yeh bhi kaha tha ke hum aayi am f jane se qabal dost mumalik se madad mangeen ge
Pakistani  wazeer khazana ne kaha ke' hum koshish karen ge ke kamzor tabqay par mushkil faislon ka asar kam parre
yeh mushkil faislay aur challenge hain
' khayaal rahay ke intikhabaat se qabal thrikِ insaaf aayi am f se maali madad lainay ki shadeed mukhalfat karti rahi thi aur wazeer e azam Imran  Khan  ny baarha apni tqarir mein yeh baat kahi thi ke agar woh brsraqtdar aaye to kabhi aalmi maliyati idaray se karzzzz ke liye rujoo nahi kya jaye ga
wizarat khazana ki janib se twitter par jari kardah aik bayan mein bataya gaya hai ke 1990 ke baad se ab taq Pakistani  hakoomaten das baar kisi nah kisi shakal mein aayi am f ke paas ja chuki hain aur mojooda hukoomat ka challenge yeh hai ke aisi bunyadi maliyati islahat ki jayen ke har chand saal baad aayi am f ke paas jaany ka chakkar tora ja sakay
bayan mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke' wazeer khazana isi haftay Indonesia  ke jazeere bali mein world bank aur aayi am f ke srbrahan se mulakaatein karen ge
' wizarat ne yeh nahi bataya ke hukoomat ko kitni hungami imdaad ki zaroorat hai, taham Asad  Umar  is se qabal keh chuke hain ke malik ko –apne qarzay chukane ke liye saal ke ekhtataam taq kam از kam aath arab dollar darkaar hain
Asad  Umar  nay﻿ kaha ke' hamari muashi tarjeehat hain ke hum nay﻿ rozgaar peda karna hai to aisa nah ho ke is bohraan par qaboo panay ke andar hamein –apne bunyadi manshoor mein bohat ziyada tabdeeli karna parre
yeh aik mushkil faisla hai aur is qoum se saabit kya hai ke jab qoum malik ki behtari ki liye koi faisla kar le, kisi giroh ya fard ki behtari nahi balkay qoum ki behtari ke liye to malik is faislay par mehnat bhi karta hai aur kamyaab bhi ho kar dekhata hai
' agar Pakistan  aayi am f se madad mangta hai ke to yeh paanch saloon mein doosri baar ho ga ke Pakistan  is se bail out package le ga
malik ke zar mubadla ke zakhair September  ke aakhir mein no arab dollar se ziyada thay jis mein 62 crore dollar kami aayi hai aur october mein zar mubadla ke zakhair sirf 8. 4 arab dollar reh gaye hain jo karzzzz ki qstin ada karne ke liye baa-mushkil kaafi hain

aayi am f mein jane se hakoomati faislay par Pakistan  peoples party ki rukan qaumi assembly naz balouch ne kaha ke' Pakistan  aur aayi am f ke darmain qarzon ke haliya muahiday ke nateejay mein rupay ki qader mein mazeed kami hogi, mehengai aur be rozgari barhay gi

tabdeeli bohat jaldi aagai hai
' Pakistan  Muslim League (N) ne bhi is faislay to sakht tanqeed ka nishana banaya

sabiq vzirdfaa aur Muslim League (N) ke rehnuma khwaja Asif  ne bhi kuch isi qisam ka ٹویٹ kya aur kaha ke' Wazeer e Azam  sahib aap ki kam Ilmi  aur jahilana guftagu aur Iqtidaar  ki andhi hawas aap ka taqub kere gi
agar cancer ka ilaaj dsprin se ho sakta he to aap ko chandah mangnay ki zaroorat nahe rahi

' Bollywood industry duniya bhar mein –apne par phelaaye hue hai
duniya mein jahan kahin bhi hindi bolnay aur samajhney walay log mojood hain, wahan Bharti  filme dekhi aur pasand ki jati hain
yahi wajah hai ke Bollywood mein pesey ki rail pail hai aur mamooli se mamooli filmon par bhi barri barri rqmin kharch ki jati hain
is ke sath sath Bollywood industry bohat se aisay mumalik mein bhi apni filmon ke liye nai market talaash kar rahi hai jahan nah to hindi boli aur samjhi jati hai aur nah hi kabhi is se pehlay Bollywood filme wahan dikhayi gayeen
is ki sab se barri misaal chain hai jahan guzashta saal pehli martaba Aamir  Khan  ki film' danghal' cheeni zabaan ke sab taytlz ke sath dikhayi gayi
duniya ke deegar mumalik ki terhan chain mein bhi film ne karorron ka business kya
is kamyabi ko dekhte hue' danghal' ke baad' secret super star ',' Bahoo  billi' aur Salman  Khan  ki' Sultan ' jaisi barray budget ki kayi filmon naay bhi chain ka rukh kya aur zabardast business karne mein kamyabi haasil ki
aur ab baari Pakistan  ki hai
Pakistani  cinema nay﻿ taweel sunehri daur ke baad kayi ashron baad naya janam liya hai
malik mein cinema industry ke sath sath film industry ka bhi zahuur sun-hwa hai aur chunkay Pakistan  aur chain ke taluqaat tareekhi hain is liye Pakistani  entertainment industry khaas kar filme wahan nai market ki talaash mein hain
go ke abhi yeh kehna qabal از waqt hoga ke bollywood filmon ki mojoodgi mein Pakistani  filmon ke liye kamyabi ki rahein kis had taq khulti hain, lekin itna zaroor hai ke jahan Pakistan  aur chain ke darmain tijarti raahdaari, tawanai aur railway jaisay mansoobon mein cheeni sarmaya kaari ho rahi hai, wahein yeh bhi kharij از imkaan nahi ke kisi roz chain ki janib se Pakistan  ki film industry mein bhi sarmaya kaari ka elaan hojaye
Ali  Zafar  ke bakol aisi soorat mein mushtarqa film saazi ka sab se bara faida Pakistan  ko hi hoga
yahan sarmaya kaari, jadeed technology aur dono mumalik ke darina taluqaat ki nai rahein khilain gi
chain duniya ka abadi ke lehaaz se sab se bara malik hai aur agar yahan Pakistani  filmo ney business karna shuru kya to Bollywood filmo ki terhan Pakistan  filmi industry mein bhi pesey ki rail pail hosakti hai aur kuch baeed nahi ke mulki filme bhi chand roz mein hi karorron rupay ka business karne lagen
Pakistani  adakar o gulukar Ali  Zafar  un dinon isi maqsad ke tehat chain mein mojood hain
sath hi sath un ki aik kmrshl film' طیفا un trouble' ko bhi pehli martaba' slk road international film fistyol' mein numayesh ka mauqa mila hai
' طیفا un trouble' geo films, mandwi wala entertainment aur light aynglz ki mushtarqa peshkash hai
aur' geo films' ke Mohammad  nasir ke bakol yeh' silk road international film fistyol' mein dikhayi jaaane wali pehli Pakistani  film hai
Mohammad  nasir ne wise of America  ko bataya hai ke yeh festival chain ke shehar فوزوہو mein jari hai
Ali  Zafar ' طیفا un trouble' ke producer honay ke sath sath Muawin  musannif bhi hain aur un dinon fistyol ke tehat munaqqid honay wali conference mein shareek hain
is conference ke douran Ali  Zafar  naay Pakistan  aur chain ke bahami taluqaat ko cinema aur film ke zariye mazeed wusat dainay ki himayat ki aur Pakistani  film industry mein sarmaya kaari ke imkanaat ke baaray mein cheeni film industry ke zimma daraan ko aagah kiya
conference mein Pakistan  ke ilawa Bharat , turkey, canada, janoobi Africa , misar, tyons, kroshya, serbia, malaysia aur jarjya ke wafood ney bhi shirkat ki
chain ke ilawa Saudi  arab bhi Pakistani  filmon ki aik nai aur barri market ho sakta hai
Saudi  arab mein naye naye cinema halz khil rahay hain aur is shobay mein islahat ke baad ghair mulki film saaz idaron nay﻿ bhaari sarmaya kaari ke muahiday kiye hain
Saudi  cinema industry mein Pakistani  filmon ko muta-arif karanay mein cheeni market ke muqablay mein nisf se bhi kam mehnat lagey gi kyun ke yahan urdu bolnay aur samaghnay walon ki kaseer tadaad mojood hai
mulki filmo ke liye doosri aasani yeh bhi hogi ke khaleeji mulkon mein sun 70 ki dahai se Pakistani  dramon ki maang rahi hai aur behtar marketing se filmo ke liye bhi maidan hamwar kya ja sakta hai
Japan  mein taqreeban paanch dahaiyo ke baad پیجر service ko band kya ja raha hai
Japan  mein aakhri پیجر service پروائیڈر, Tokyo  tally mesage, ne elaan kya hai ke woh September  2019 mein service band kar den ge
company ka kehna hai ke Tokyo  aur muzafaat mein taqreeban 1500 afraad aaj bhi پیجر service istemaal karte hain
پیجرز ( pagers ) ko Japan  mein poke-beru ya pocket bail kaha jata hai
پیجر aik choti si device hoti hai, jo radio waves ki madad se mukhtasir paighamaat bhijti hai
1996ء mein Japan  mein un ka istemaal urooj par tha
uss waqt poooray malik mein is ke 1 crore unit zair istemaal thay
jaisay hi mobile phone manzar aam par aaye پیجر ka istemaal khatam hota chala gaya
Japan  mein پیجر ko aik barri tally kmyoni kishn firm, an tea tea, nay﻿ muta-arif karaya tha
( jari hai ) an tea tea nay﻿ is service ko 2007 hamza mein band kar diya tha
ab taqreeban aik dahai ke baad Tokyo  tally msg ne bhi is service ko band karne ka elaan kar diya hai
is service ko bndkrne ka elaan, aaj smart phones ke daur mein bhi, پیجر istemaal karne walay sarfeen ke liye mayoos kin hoga
Tokyo  tally msg ne 20 saal pehlay پیجر bananay band kar dyie they
Japan  mein پیجر to band ho rahay hain lekin fax ka istemaal aaj bhi kaafi ziyada hai
yahan aap کوسٹورز par cassette tips bhi mil jatay hain
Mumbai  bollywood adakara kangna رناوت apni film money کارنیکا queen of jhansi ki tashheer ke liye jhoot bolnay se bhi ba’az nah ayen chand roz qabal Bharti  media mein khabrain gardish kar rahi theen ke Bharti  Rajpot  tanzeem karni seena ne kangna رناوت ki film money کارنیکا queen of jhansi par aitraaz uthatay hue kaha tha ke film mein rani laxmi bayi ki ghalat tasweer paish ki gayi hai jis par kangna رناوت ne inhen dhamkatay hue kaha tha ke woh khud ko harasan karne aur film par aitraaz uthany walay tamam afraad ko tabah kar dein gi kangna ke bayan ke baad karni seena ka muaqqaf samnay aaya tha ke unhon ne film ko le kar kangna ko koi dhamki di hi nahi hai Bharti  media ke mutabiq karni seena ke tarjuman dr ہیمانشو ne is baat se bilkul inkaar kya hai ke unhon ne film ki mukhalfat karte hue kangna ko kisi qisam ki koi dhamki di hai haan kangna ke tabah karne walay bayan ke baad ab karni seena un se naraaz zaroor hogayi hai is sorat e haal se yeh sawal khara ho jata hai ke kahin kangna ne karni seena ka naam apni film ki pblsti ke liye to istemaal nahi kya karni seena ke tarjuman ka mazeed kehna tha ke hum film money کارنیکا ke mukhalif nahi taham kayi log –apne faiday ke liye karni seena ke naam ka istemaal karte hain wazeh rahay ke kangna رناوت ki film money کارنیکا queen of جھانسی25 January  ko cinema gharon ki zeenat banay gi un dinon kangna apni film ki khoob zor o shore se tashheer mein masroof hain rawan baras ke aaghaz mein jahan duniya ki sab se barri samaji Website Facebook ne khabron ko kam karkay sarfeen ki aam posts ko ziyada ahmiyat dainay ka fichr muta-arif karaya tha
wahein ab مائکرو bloging samaji Website twitter ne Facebook ka mukhalif feture muta-arif karate hue aam posts se ziyada khabron ko ahmiyat di hai
jee haan, ab aam twitter sarfeen ko –apne home page par –apne doston ki aam posts se ziyada khabrain nazar ayen gi
twitter ke naye feature ke baad ab har Sarif  ko –apne whom page prkhbron ki links ki bharmaar nazar aaye gi
yani har Sarif  ko notification ki terhan –apne home page par aisi link dekhnay mein aaye gi, jis mein bataya jaye ga ke kis shakhs ney kis hawalay se kya khabar post ki hai
yeh bhi parheen : twitter ka sarfeen ke liye tohfa is feture ke baad agar kisi bhi Sarif  ke dost ney dawn news ki khabar ٹوئیٹ ki hogi to Sarif  ke home page par usay aisi link nazar aaye gi ke aap ke falan dost ney dawn news ki khabar ٹوئیٹ ki hai
—اسکرین shat isi terhan agar isi ٹوئیٹ ko aur koi ree ٹوئیٹ bhi kere ga, to bhi is ki link Sarif  ke home page par nazar aaye gi

Saam  sang nay﻿ yeh phone 9 augst ko New York mein aik event ke douran paish karte hue usay note series ka sab se behtareen phone qarar diya tha
yeh phone guzashta saal ke model ke muqablay mein kuch bara hai balkay company ka sab se bara display wala phone hai jis mein 6. 4 inch ki انفٹنی بیزل lais screen di gayi hai, magar dekhnay mein chhota lagta hai jis ki wajah taap aur nichale hissay mein بیزل bohat kam hona hai
yeh phone bhi Sabiqa  model ki terhan water ریزیزٹنٹ aur dust proof hai
gliksi note 9 mein 4000 am ae each battery di gayi hai, jo ke kisi bhi gliksi note phone mein ab taq ki sab se taaqatwar battery hai, guzashta saal ke model mein 3300 am ae each battery thi, Albata  note 7 mein 4000 am ae each battery di gayi thi taham betria phatnay par is model ko mansookh karna para tha

Johnsburg  test shuru sun-hwa to yeh Australia  ka janoobi africa mein choutha aur aakhri test tha, 1970 se protiz ke dais mein test series mein na qabil e shikast chali aa rahi australvi team jahan is record ke khonay ke khatray se dochar thi, wahan cricket ki duniya mein woh sab kuch luta kar maidan mein utri thi, muqami tamashaiyon ne jis terhan tanzia jumlon se muzayyan posters aur jumlay baazi karkay khiladion ka istaqbaal kya, woh کینگروز ke asal maqam ki yaad dehani ke liye kaafi tha, Johnsburg  se hazaron mil daur isi subah krayst chrch mein England  aur newzea land ke test ke aaghaz par Bartanwi  tamashaiyon ke makhsoos group barmy army ne bhi australvi khiladion ko –apne andaaz mein salute kya
dunyae cricket mein taaqat, pesey aur ikhtiyarat ki jung shuru din se jari hai lekin guzashta teen dahaiyo se is mein sar-at, jarhiyat aur dhatai jis taizi se aayi hai is ki misaal is se qabal cricket ki 106سالہ tareekh mein nahi millti, nai genration cameron ki zahiri taizi aur maal ki chamak damak mein shayad uljhi ho, magar kon nahi jaanta ke 30 saal qabal جانبدارامپائرز ke sath australvi cricket team –apne mahdanon mein bddyanti ki woh misaal qaim kya karti thi ke jis ki taqleed mein hamsaaya malik Bharat  bhi peechay nahi tha, phir field mein bad kalami, tazheek aamaiz rawayya , ghair mulki mahdanon mein naak charha kar utarna australvi khiladion ka dosra taaruf tha
cricket ki aalmi tanzeem ka control jab tak London  se hota raha to goron ki kuch qadamat pasandi aur insaaf pasandi dikhayi deti rahi
english mahdanon mein Pakistan , west indies jaisi temen nyotrl ampayrz ke nah honay ke bawajood fatahyaab rahen ke yeh temen salahiyat rakhti theen
Australia  ke milkm a speed jaisay log jab cricket Australia  se hotay aayi si si ke aiwanon mein puhanche to un ke dosray behtareen muqallad Bharti  cricket hakkaam ka bhi un se gath joor barh gaya
chunancha phir cricket ke bain al aqwami qawaneen se chairr chhar sameit cricket body ke ikhtiyarat, pesey ki taqseem aur ikhtiyarat ke ghair munsifana istemaal naay big three sameit kayi daramay dukhaay, qawaneen ka mazaq urna mamool ban gaya, mashkook bowling action mein kamzor mumalik hadaf banaye gaye jrmanon aur معطلیوں mein janibdari dikhayi di, legs ke be thaasha ineqad aur pesey ki rail pail naay شرفاکے khail ko w w baksng ke tamashay se bhi agay kar diya
guzray saloon mein match fixing, aspat fixing, baal tempering sameit kayi barray waqeat naay yeh saabit kya ke cricket ka khail ab شرفاکی fehrist se bahar nikal raha hai, cricket ki aalmi tanzeem ke head quarter mein baith kar jab taaqatwar mumalik mann chahay faislay karen, Bharti  board aayi si si ko khuli dhamkian day, australvi board apni marzi musallat kere to phir mahdanon mein mojood krdaron se kya tawaqqa ki ja sakti hai
Bharat  ke virat kohli ko bhi guzashta saal baal se chairr chhar karte dekha gaya Pakistan  aur England  ki 2016ء ki test series mein bhi yeh aawaz buland hui magar barri khoubsurti se usay taall diya gaya
janoobi afriqa team ka toar australvi camp ny yeh nikala ke bad deyanti aur fraud kar ke test jeeta jaye, baal tempering ki purani rawish ko naye andaaz mein karna mehanga par gaya, stevin asmth camp ki ikhlaq se giri bad ikhlaqi ka asar australvi media sameit awam aur ghair mulki cricket halqon ny liya is ke nateeja mein board ke cheif executive james سدرلینڈ ko raton raat Johnsburg  jana para ibtidayi tehqiqaat ke baad pehlay khiladion ko series se bahar nikala gaya aur phir warner aur asmth par aik aik saal jabkay bain craft par 9 mah ki pabandi lagany pari coach dirn lihmn ko be qasoor grdana gaya, is waqeye par aayi si si ka qanoon itna hi harkat mein aaya ke jitna tha captain aik match ke liye moattal hue baqi khiladion par jrmane lag gaye goya aayi si si naay maamla khatam kar diya, yeh baat wazeh rahay ke australvi board ki faislay mein taizi aur khiladion ki muatali mehez aala ikhlaqi misaal nahi hai, balkay is jurm mein mulawis aadhi se ziyada team ko bachanay ke liye yeh sab kya gaya hai, board bhi jaanta hai ke yeh marz kitna purana hai, cricket Australia  naay apni janib se mustaqbil ki cricket ko behtar karne, duniya ko behtar ikhlaqi messgae dainay ke liye yeh sazayen den
sawal yeh hai ke kya yeh kaafi hain? Australian  cricket ka klchrl yahi hai usay moattal karne ki zaroorat hai international cricket council ko is hawala se tawajah karna ho gi aur Pakistan , Bangladesh, west indies, England , janoobi africa aur newzea land jaisay cricket mumalik ko mazboot hikmat e amli ke sath Australia  board ko barabari ki satah par laa kar khelna ho ga

Faisal  abad ( urdu pointe اخبارتازہ tareen
31 augst 2018 hamza ) Faisal  abad zarayi university ke aik science daan nay﻿ pani mein shaamil anhtayi khatarnaak murakkab آرسینک ko pani se allag karne ke liye duniya ka sasta tareen flutter tayyar krnika daawa kya hai
Faisal  abad ki zarayi university ke dr nabeel nayazi ne tarbooz ke chilkay ki madad se pani se آرسینک ko allag karne ke liye duniya ka kam qeemat tareen flutter tayyar karne ka daawa kya hai
آرسینک aisa zeher hai jo qudrati tor par zair zameen pani mein mojood hai, is pani ke istemaal se pait ke amraaz, gurdon aur jigar ki bimarion se har saal 43 hazaar afraad jaan se haath dho baithtay hain
آرسینک ko pani se allag karne walay dastyab tareeqon par har chaar mah baad 20 se 25 hazaar rupay ka kharch aata hai taham dr nabeel Khan  nayazi ney tarbooz ke chilkay se sirf 5 hazaar rupay mein 8 mah ke liye qabil istemaal technology ijaad ki hai
( jari hai ) dr nabeel ke mutabiq water melon ka chilka muft mein dastyab hai, hum ne is ko peesa aur زینٹھیٹ Nami  technology ke zariye is mein thori si tarmeem ki, is ka faida yeh sun-hwa ke yeh na to pani mein hal ho ga aur na hi kharab ho ga, usay laboratory mein test kya ke yeh آرسینک ko nkalta hai ya nahi to hamein barray achay result miley, taqreeban 95 se 98 feesad آرسینک pani se khatam ho gaya
dr nabeel ne bataya ke is technology mein bijli ka istemaal nahi hai, is flutter se malik ke pasmandah ilaaqon mein ghareeb abadi ke liye آرسینک se pak pani faraham kya ja sakta hai
Faisal  abad university ke science daan ka kehna hai ke thoray se fndz ke zariye mutasirah ilaaqon mein yeh technology intahi kam qeemat mein pohanchai ja sakti hai
mahireen ke mutabiq malik mein pani ko آرسینک se pak karne ke sath sath is technology ko آرسینک ke masail se dochar dosray mulkon ko farokht kar ke Pakistan  zar e mubadla bhi haasil kar sakta hai
chain aur America  ki janib se aik dosray ke khilaaf draamdi masnoaat par aed kiye jaaney walay taxon par amal daraamad shuru kar diya gaya hai America  ki janib se chain ki 200 arab dollar ki masnoaat par 10 feesad izafi tax nafiz kya gaya tha America  ney chain se anaywali khanay peenay ki ashya khelon ke samaan ذرائے muwasilat mein istemaal honay wali ashya aur industry mein istemaal honay wali machinery par 10 feesad izafi tax aed kya doosri janib chain ney bhi Amrici  muashi hamlay ke jawab mein America  se chain aaniwale gosht chemical kapray aur آٹوپارٹس par paanch se 10 feesad tirf aed kardiya America  ki janib se laago tirf aindah baras 25 feesad taq poanch jayen ge Amrici  saddar Donald  trmp chain ko tanbeeh kar chukay hain ke agar chain nay﻿ tirf aed karne par muzahmat jari rakhi to chain کی267 arab dollar ki ashya par mazeed tax laga diye jayen ge Mumbai  ( web desk ) naamwar bollywood adakara Madhuri  Dixit  siyasat mein qadam rakhnay ja rahi hain, Bharat  mein 2019 mein honay walay aam intikhabaat mein bi jay pi ke ticket par pauney se laren gi Madhuri  se pehlay bhi showbiz aur film industry se talluq rakhnay wali kayi shaksiaat siyasat mein apna naam kama chuki hain cricketer Imran  Khan  ab Pakistan  ke Wazeer e Azam  hain jabkay un ke Bharti  dost nojot singh sidhu nay﻿ –apne siyasi career ka aaghaz 2004 mein bi jay pi se kya tha taham woh January  2017 mein indian national congress mein shaamil hue aur ab 2019 ke intikhabaat ke liye party ki intikhabi muhim chala rahay hain Bharti  media ki reports ke mutabiq hukmaran jamaat bhartia janata party ( bi jay pi ) ke saddar amit Shah  nay﻿ June  mein Madhuri  Dixit  se Mumbai  mein un ki rahaish gaah par mulaqaat ki thi bi jay pi ke senior rehnuma ka kehna hai ke' party nay﻿ lok sabha ke liye Madhuri  ka naam short list kya hai, party 2019 mein honay walay aam intikhabaat mein Madhuri  ko umeed waar ke tor par laane ke liye sanjeedgi se ghhor kar rahi hai hamara khayaal hai ke lok sabha ke liye pauney ka halqa Madhuri  ke liye theek rahay ga' unhon ne kaha ke is waqt party qayadat kayi lok sabha nashiston ke liye umeedwaron ki fehrist ko hatmi shakal dainay ke amal mein masroof hai party ke aik aur senior rehnuma ka kehna tha ke' Wazeer e Azam  nrindr moodi ne is terhan ki hikmat e amli par gujrat mein is waqt amal daraamad kya tha jab woh pehli baar wazeer Alla  banay they unhon ny baldeati intikhab ke tamam umeedwaron ko tabdeel kar diya tha jis se party ko khasa faida pouncha tha' un ka kehna tha ke' election mein naye chehray muta-arif karanay se tanqeed ka saamna nahi karna para tha jis se oppostion ko dhachka laga aur bi jay pi ny aksariyat haasil kar li thi 51 sala Bharti  adakara Madhuri  kayi mashhoor filmon mein kaam kar chuki hain jin mein, dil to pagal hai, sajan aur devdas sir fehrist hain Madhuri  Dixit  ko Pakistan  aur Bharat  mein yaksaa maqboliat haasil hai lekin un ki janib se shiddat pasand nazriaat ki haamil siyasi jamaat bi jay pi ko join kiye jaaney par taajjub ka izhaar kya ja raha hai aur inhen dono atraaf kari tanqeed ka bhi saamna hai bi jay pi aalmi satah par is wajah se bhi aaj kal tanqeed ki zad mein hai kyunkay is ne pehlay se Bharat  ka maskh shuda sikolr chehra mazeed bigaar kar rakh diya hai moodi sarkar ki janib se haal hi mein poooray Bharat  mein aik hazaar se zayed jaghon ke woh naam jo musalmanoon ke naam par they tabdeel kiye jaaney ke baais kari tanqeed ka saamna hai, aik aisay waqt mein Madhuri  jaisi adakara ki janib se bi jay pi ko join kya jana madahon ke liye waqai chonka dainay wala hai khayaal rahay ke Bharat  mein bollywood se talluq rakhnay wali kayi shaksiaat mutharrak siyasat mein hissa le chuki hain jin mein shayar Javed  Akhtar , adakar anopm kheer, adakara kiran kheer, naghma, Amitabh  bachchan samait deegar shaamil hain sports ke shobay se nojot singh sidhu bator sayasatdan apni kamyabi ke jhanday garh chuke hain jabkay un ke Pakistani  cricketer dost Imran  Khan  is waqt Pakistan  ke Wazeer e Azam  hain nwabshah : peoples medical university of health sciences ki laboratory mein saanp ke katay ki vikisin tayyar kar li gayi
Sindh  hukoomat ki janib se anti snake vaccine aur anti ribiz vaccine ki tayari ke liye nawab Shah  se 19 klov meter ke faaslay par waqay tehseel skrnd mein saal 2010 mein سیرولوجی laboratory ka sang bunyaad rakha gaya, laboratory se wabsta science daan dr Naeem  Qureshi  aur un ki team naay 4 saal ki tehqeeq o tajarbaat ke baad saanp ke katay se bachao ki vaccine tayyar karli
tayyar ki gayi vaccine ko aalmi idaara sahet se registered karaya gaya aur saal 2016 mein peoples medical university ki team ke hamrah dr Naeem  Qureshi  thrparkr gaye aur vaccine das mareezon ko lagai gayi jis se tamam mareezon ki jaan bach gayi aur un mein kisi bhi qisam ka koi sayid affect bhi nahi sun-hwa, ibtidayi tour par 125 vaylz tayyar kiye gaye they, 10 ke ilawa mazeed 110 mareezon ko bhi vaccine lagai gayi aur nataij 100 feesad rahay
laib ke scientist dr Naeem  Qureshi  ne bataya ke un ki tayyar ki gayi vaccine Pakistan  ki sab se susti aur taaqatwar vaccine hai, Bharat  se amport ki jany wali Bharti  ae s v ke 10 se 12 vaylz aik mareez ko lagaye jatay hain aur aik waile ki qeemat 2 hazaar rupay hai, isi terhan aik mareez par 20 hazaar rupay ke akhrajaat atay hain, hamari tayyar ki gayi ae s v ka sirf aik waile hi aik mareez ko lagaya jaye ga
peoples medical university ke wise chancellor professor dr Azam  yosfani ney mulaqaat mein bataya ke skrnd mein banai gayi ae s v o ae are bi سیرولوجی laboratory Sindh  hukoomat ney un ki university ke hawalay ki magar budget nahi diya gaya
pi si one ke mutabiq 250 million budget darkaar hai, agar Sindh  hukoomat unhein fndz faraham kere to woh aik saal mein vaccine tayyar kar ke market mein sab se kam qeemat par farokht ke liye paish kar satke hain

pakar mein aata hai lekin yeh sakht jaan lewa bhi hota hai ab mahireen nay﻿ zabaan ke bacteria mein ghayr-maa'mooli tabdeeli ko dekhte hue lablabay ke سرطان ki ibtidayi darjay mein hi pishgoyi ki ja sakti hai shaya honay wali aik nai tehqeeq ke mutabiq zabaan ke bacteria aur lablabay ke سرطان ke darmiyan mumkina talluq ho sakta hai is zimn mein mahireen nay﻿ woh tareeqa ikhtiyar kya hai jo riwayati cheeni tib mein istemaal hota araha hai jis mein zabaan ka jaiza liya jata hai زیجیانگ university ke professor لینجوان layi aur un ke sathiyon ney is tareeqay ka istemaal karte hue jadeed technology se DNAe سیکوینسنگ bhi ki hai zahir sun-hwa hai ke zabaan ke bacteria lablabay ke cancer ki soorat mein taizi se bdalty lagtay hain mahireen ney is ke liye aik chhota sa surway kya jis mein 55 log shaamil they un mein 30 لبلبلے ke سرطان ke ibtidayi mareez jabkay 25 mukammal sayhat mand they yeh jaiza teen mah taq jari raha jis mein kisi ney bhi koi anti bayotk dawa nahi khayi mahireen naay kaha ke lablabay ke سرطان mein zabaan par لیپٹوٹریکیا فیوسوبیکٹیریئم ہیموفائلس aur پورفائروموناس ki tadaad barh jati hai saabit sun-hwa ke yeh chaar bacteria is khofnaak marz ke بایومارکر ho mazeed tahaqeeq se yeh baat saabit hojati hai to hum lablabay ke سرطان ka aik nihayat aaasaaan aur saada tareeqa istemaal karte hue qeemti jaanen bacha saken ge Japan  national insti tute of advanced andstril science and technology ( ae aayi s tea ) ke mahireen ney barri mahaarat se aik ensaan numa mistri robot tayyar kya hai jo tamirat ke kaam karsaktha hai
is naye robot ko' ' each are pi five pi' ' ka naam diya gaya hai, jis mein motoron ko barha kar insanon ki terhan lachak daar banaya gaya hai
agarchay yeh sust rawi se kaam karta hai lekin is mein ghalti ka imkaan nah honay ke barabar hai lekin mahireen ka kehna hai ke waqt ke sath sath yeh robot taizi se kaam karne ke qabil ho jaye ga
is terhan yeh building aur dafatir saazi mein insanon ki madad karsaktha hai aur azadana tor par bhi apna kaam injaam day sakta hai
is se qabal hum کارسازی aur deegar kaarkhanon mein bhi robots dekh chuke hain
doosri janib robotic 3D printers bhi herat angaiz kaam kar rahay hain jisay aatomishn ka aik naya roop kaha ja sakta hai
2016ء aur 2017 hamza mein karon ki aalmi manndi mein Germany  ka hissa 22 feesad tha, jo kay karen bananay walay tamam mumalik ke muqablay mein sab se ziyada tha
barson se duniya mein german karon ki maang mein wusat ka silsila jari hai
yeh aam ta-assur hai ke car khardney walay ko agar munasib qeemat mein koi car dastyab ho aur woh german sakhta ho, to woh usay khardney ko tarjeeh day ga
lekin yeh bhi aik haqeeqat hai ke is waqt duniya bhar mein german karon ko mushkilaat ka saamna hai
do baras qabal ووکس vagon karon se dhowen ke ikhraj ka scandal ubhra
yeh scandal aalmi satah par diesel gate scandal ke naam se mashhoor sun-hwa
is douran is ki lapait mein kayi car saaz idaray bhi aaye
isi scandal ke douran aisi mukhtalif tehqiqati o tafteeshi reports bhi manzar aam par ayen, jin mein german car saaz industry ke tareek rukh ko paish kya gaya
diesel gate scandal ke bawajood' made inn Germany ' ka jaadoo ab bhi sir par charh kar bol raha hai
german car sanat ke liye chain bhi bohat ahmiyat ikhtiyar kar gaya hai
chain mein 30 feesad karen Germany  se daraamad ki jati hain
cheeni kharidaron mein dhowen ke kam ikhraj ki haamil gariyon ko bohat ziyada pasand karne walon ki tadaad barhti ja rahi hai
chain ki terhan roos mein bhi german karon par aetmaad kya jata hai aur roosi koshish karte hain ke aik laakh klomitrz ke baad car ko tabdeel kar diya jaye
aam roosi logon ka khayaal hai ke aik laakh klomitrz gaari chalanay ke baad uss mein naqais peda hona shuru ho jatay hain
roos aur chain mein پورشے, bi am w, آڈی aur mrsidiz ko khaas tor par pasand kya jata hai
mahol dost kaari saazi Germany  mein batadreej mahol dost karon ko pasandeedgi haasil ho rahi hai
german idaray doyche post nay﻿ tarseel ke liye electric gariyon ka istemaal barha diya hai
Germany  ko aalmi satah par bhaari technology ke hawalay se aik khaas shohrat haasil hai
is malik ki karon ko aqwam aalam mein pasand kya jata hai aur is ki bunyadi wajah gariyon ka paidaar engine hai
mercedez ka naya record ڈائملر ke saddar dafatir janoobi german shehar اشٹٹ gart mein hain aur mrsidiz benz is idaray ka mashhoor tareen brand hai
pichlle saal is company ki luxury karon ki aalmi satah par farokht mein jo record izafah dekha gaya, is ki aik barri wajah cheeni manndi mein un gariyon ki talabb mein ghair mamooli izafah tha
ڈائملر ke cheif executive ڈیٹر seechay ke mutabiq, guzashta baras is company nay﻿ majmoi tor par lag bhag 2. 3 million gariyaan farokht kee, aur yeh tadaad 2016ء ke muqablay mein tqriba10 feesad ziyada thi
is terhan pichla saal is german idaray ke liye musalsal satwaan saal tha ke ڈائملر naay apni pedawar aur kaarobar mein wazeh taraqqi ki manzil haasil kar li
bi am w ke so saal Germany  ki luxury karen tayyar karne wali company bi am w ke qiyam ko sosal ka arsa guzar chuka hai
is company naay is arsay ke douran kayi utaar چڑھاؤ bhi dekhe hain
bi am w ka head quarter myonkh mein waqay hai, jahan is ka aik bara planet aur museum bhi hai
is janoobi shehar mein bi am w sab se barri niji mulazmat faraham karne wali company hai aur yahan is ke mulazmeen ki tadaad 41 hazaar hai
pehli aalmi jung ke douran shuru honay wali yeh company ab aik bain al aqwami brand ban chuki hai
is waqt bi am w ke plants duniya ke 14 mumalik mein mojood hain jabkay is ke mulazmeen ki majmoi tadaad 1 laakh 16hzar hai
bi am w ki salana farokht 80 arab euro hai
aaj bi am w karon ke ilawa motocycle bhi banati hai aur is company ke brandz mein rolls rice aur mِni bhi shaamil hain
America  mein duty aed karne par ghhor Amrici  saddar Donald  trmp nay﻿ mehakma tijarat ko karon, truckon aur gariyon ke fazil purzah jaat par aed shuda draamdi duty ka jaiza lainay ka hukum diya hai
trmp ke mutabiq,' car saazi aur fazil purzah jaat jaisi klidi sanat hamari qoum ke istehkaam ke liye ahem hain '
trmp ke bakol yeh wazeh hona chahiye ke beron malik se gariyon ki daraamad America  ki qaumi salamti ke liye kitna bara khatrah hai
trmp nay﻿ rawan baras March  mein aluminium aur steal par izafi mehsoolat aed karte waqt bhi yahi kaha tha ke woh qaumi salamti ke tahaffuz ke liye yeh qadam utha rahay hain
jareeday' wall street journal' nay﻿ bhi kaha hai ke is tanazur mein 25 feesad tak izafi tax aed kiye janay ka imkaan hai
trmp nay﻿ is se qabal Europi  union aur chain se daraamad ki jaaney wali gariyon ko tanqeed ka nishana banaya tha
trmp nay﻿ March  mein aik ٹویٹ ki thi,' agar Europi  union nay﻿ business karne wali Amrici  companiyon par bhaari mehsoolat aed kiye ya un ke liye mazeed mushkilaat peda kee, to hum America  mein azadi ke sath daraamad ki jaany walay ghair mulki gariyon par bhi tax barha den ge '
Mumbai  14 october ( siyasat dot com ) mehdood overs ke teen muqablon mein paiir ko India  ae ka muqaabla Australia  ae ke sath Mumbai  cricket asosi ation bandrh krla kampliks mein aaghaz hoga aur dosray do matches bhi isi maqam par 17 aur 19 اکوپر ko khailay jayen ge aur yeh muqablay maheman team ki azmaish ki hesiyat rakhtay hain khaas tor par captain ponm ravt par sab ki nazrain garhi hui hain guzashta saal ke world cupp ke final match mein hindustani team ki quied ponm ka ahem rule raha hai ponm ke ilawa teen aur khilari Moona  مشرم راجیشوری گائیگواڈ aur shikha pande se hindustani awam ko kaafi tawaquaat wabasta hain aur sab ki nazrain selectors ke oopar lagi hui hain ke kis terhan jonir khilari apni karkardagi ki binaa par senior khiladion mein jagah bana paate hain 50 overs ke teen matches matches ke baad t20 series ka bhi aaghaz hoga aur is ke liye bcci ke liye team ka intikhab o elaan kere gi hindustani team mein punam ravt ( captain ) پونیا devika vidya Moona  مشرم tnoshri sarkar شماورما ( wicket keeper ) راجیشوری گائیگواڑ اسوشہری دیبیا درشنی si پرتیوشا reema laxmi lapka shikha panday tera uppal punjabi بورونیکر koyta paatil aur preetee bose shaamil hain Australian  اسکاڈ mein سمنتا بئیس ماشلن brown لارن چیٹل peepa klri جوزقیس doli ہیتر gram Sami  jo johnson تہکسہ mak grath klov پیپارو جیورجیا ریڈمائین ناؤکی اسٹلین barg mooli اسٹرانو be lnda وکاریوا aur امنڈا jed vilngtn shaamil hain Islamabad ( new زڈیسک ) Nasa  ka baghair pilot khalayi جہاز”انسائٹ” taqreeban 7 mah ke khalayi safar ke baad mareekh ki satah par kamyabi se land kar gaya, surkh sayaray ki tasaveer bhejen
khalayi jahaaz mareekh ki satah par zalzalon aur is ke wujood kapt_h laganay ki koshish karega
Nasa  ka khalayi جہاز”انسائٹ” mareekh par kamyabi se utar gaya
un site naay land karne ke fori baad sayaray ke qudrati manazair ki pehli tasweer zameen par arsaal ki jis mein jahaaz ka aik پاؤں, aik chhota pathar aur ufaq ko dekha ja sakta hai
khalayi jahaaz do saal taq mareekh par rahay ga aur is ki satah par zalzalon aur is ke wujood ka pata laganay ki koshish karega
incite zameen se 54 crore 80 laakh klov meter ka safar tey kar ke mareekh par pouncha hai
nai Dehli  1 June  ( agency ) garmi ho ya sardian pani peenay ke faiday ke barey mein to aap ny khoob suna hga ghar khandan mein barron se aap ny yahi suna hoga ke pani ziyada se ziyada istemaal jism ko faida dete hain is liye khoob pani piyn garmiyon ke mausam mein pani ki zrorrt barh jati hai lekin aap ko yeh baat pata honi chahay ke zaroorat se ziyada pani se bhi aap ko pareshani hosakti hai jee haan haal hi mein aik reserch ke nataij mein yeh baat samnay aayi hai tahaqeeq se pata chalta hai ke ziyada pani peenay se aap ke dimagh mein soojan askati hai tahaqeeq se wazeh hai ke jism mein pani ki miqdaar ziyada honay par sodium ka level taizi se kam honay lagta hai is se dimagh mein soojan askati hai soojan bherne se ہایپوٹرمیا ka khatrah barh jata hai yeh aik khatarnaak sorat e haal hai sahet mand jism mein mutawazan miqdaar mein pani rehna zurori hai aik din mein qareeb 8 glass ( 4 se 5 letter ) pani piinaa chahiye Islamabad ( urdu pointe اخبارتازہ tareen
11 decemeber 2018 hamza ) check jamhooria ki aik bijli peda karne wali company aur jee ای ( nyse : ge ) ny elaan kya hai ke Europe  ka pehla jee ای 9emax gas ٹربائن up grade kamyabi se mukammal ho gaya hai jee ای ki combined saykl salahiyaten aur 9emaxکی karkardagi hate rate, power out pitt aur یونٹflexibilty tawaqqa se behtar rahen
sokolovska uhelna ke pradkshn director aur mumbar of board, ہومولا ne kaha ke" ge 9e gas ٹربائنز apni zindagi mukammal kar rahay benawar hum ne mukhtalif halaat ka از sir no jaiza liya
hum ne operating aur sarmaye ke akhrajaat dono ka jaiza lainay ke baad faisla kya ke 9emaxاپ grade behtareen option hi "
jee ای gas power ke si ای o, scot سٹریزک naay kaha ke" hum –apne tamam plant services solutions ko samajte hain aur combined cycle power plants mein fani mahaarat is intahi ahem plant ko sirf das hafton mein kamyabi se jadeed bananay ke liye zurori thi
( jari hai ) jee ای ney project ke hissay ke tor par rotr ki aik paicheeda murammat bhi ki aur do t240-370 جنریٹرزکا fast سٹیٹر ree وائنڈ bhi kya taakay alaat ke kaam karne ki meyaad barhai ja sakay aur poooray gas planet ki karkardagi aur is par inhisaar ko behtar banaya jaye
is ke ilawa up grade kiye jaaney walay unit ko jee ای ke online monitoring system se lais kya gaya aur chobees ghantay minti nins support ke liye usay jee ای ke atlanta monitoring and ڈائیگنوسٹکس center se munsalik kya gaya
jee ae ke total planet سلوشنز ke hissay ke tor par 9emax, simple cycle operation mein 37 feesad tak ایفی شینسی aur 145 mega wats tak out pitt deta hai aur combined cycle operation mein 53. 5 feesad tak ایفی شینسی aur 210 mega wats tak out pitt deta hai

20 June  ( siyasat dot com ) football world cupp 2018 mein Japan  ne columbia aur sinigal ne Poland  ko shikast di jis ke sath hi ٹورنمنٹ ke aik hi din mein do heran kin nataij ho gay jabkay roos ne misar ko shikast day kar aglay راؤنڈ mein jagah bana li
match mein columbia ko match ke chouthay hi minute mein is waqt bara nuqsaan sun-hwa jab Japan  ki gole mein jati gaind ko haath se roknay par refree nay﻿ sanchiz ko surkh card dikha kar bahar kardiya
is ke sath Japan  ko penalty bhi mili jis par کگاوا ney gole kar ke apni team ko bartari dila di
taham dosray half ke ekhtataam se chand minute qabal match ke 39 win minute mein columbia ke کوئنٹرو naay gole kar ke score barabar kardiya jis ki badolat half time taq muqaabla 1
1 gole se barabar tha
match ke baad dono teamon ney nisbatan taiz khail paish kya aur is ke nateejay mein اوساکو ney 73 win minute mein gaind ko jaal mein pouncha kar apni team ko bartari dladi jo match ke ekhtataam taq barqarar rahi
is match mein fatah ke sath hi Japan  ne world cupp mein heran karte hue aalmi cupp mein janoobi Amrici  team ko shikast dainay wali pehli asiayi team bhi ban gayi
din ka dosra match sinigal aur aalmi darja bandi mein 8 win number par mojood Poland  ke darmain tha jis mein sinigal ney fatah haasil kar ke sab ko heran kardiya
match ke 37 win minute mein sinigal ki team is waqt khush qismat saabit hui jab تھیاگو sayonk nay﻿ –apne hi gole mein gaind pheink kar apni team ko khasaray se dochar kardiya
pehlay half ke ekhtataam tak sinigal ko match mein 1
0 ki bartari haasil thi
dosra half bhi Poland  ke liye kuch aaccha saabit nah ho saka aur match ki pasandeeda team ko is waqt shadeed dhaka laga jab 60 win minute mein difai khilari ki ghalti se faida uthatay hue sinigal ke am by نیانگ naay gole kar ke apni team ki bartari ko dugna kardiya

1 se kamyabi haasil kar ke din ka dosra heran kin nateeja faraham kardiya
din ke teesray match mein maizban roos ne misar ko yaktarfa muqablay ke baad 3

1 se kamyabi haasil ki
اینڈروئیڈ mein kaafi arsay se mukhtalif lahjoon ke liye lingoyj option hai
misaal ke tor par english ( you s ), ( you ke ), ( India  ) waghera
aap ko un lahjoon mein angrezi sun kar shayad pehli baar shayad koi farq nah lagey lekin un option ko muntakhib karne se device par kaafi asr parta hai
jab aap zabaan mein Bartanwi  angrezi muntakhib karte hain to currency bhi dollar ( $ ) se badal kar pound ( £ ) hojati hai aur is ka assar Google  assistant ki wise ریکگنیشن ke sath doosri سیٹنگز par bhi parta hai
( jari hai ) Google  naay ab –apne machine learning net work ko mazeed phelaya hai, jis ki wajah Google  ab angrezi ke ilawa bhi kayi zabanon ke mukhtalif lehjon mein farq kar sakta hai
nai up date mein jin zabanon mein mukhtalif lehjoun ki support shaamil ki gayi hai, un ki tafseel kuch is terhan hai

tasweer ke copy right getty images aik Amrici  thnk tank nay﻿ khabardaar kya hai ke jaisay jaisay chain masnoi zahanat ( آرٹیفیشل intelli jins ) ke maidan mein taraqqi kar raha hai, duniya ka iqtisadi aur askari tawazun tabdeel ho sakta hai
report mein misalein di gayi hain ke masnoi zahanat kaisay fouji maqasid ke liye istemaal ki ja sakti hai
yaad rahay ke July  mein chain ney masnoi zahanat ke qaumi mansoobay ka elaan kya tha jis mein kaha gaya tha ke chain is maidan mein America  se peechay nahi rahay ga
yeh bhi padhiye' qaatil robots' ki tayari par pabandi ka mutalba taham aik maahir ka kehna hai ke yeh tanbeeh sirf buland bangh daaway ho satke hain
report shaya karne walay idaray center of new american security ka kehna hai ke' chain ab America  ke muqablay mein takneeki pasti ka shikaar nahi hai aur woh sirf barabari hi nahi kar sakta, balkay America  se agay bhi barh sakta hai
' report ke mutabiq' cheeni fouj masnoi zahanat se mutaliq mansoobon mein shud o mad se sarmaya kaari kar rahi hai aur un ke tehqeeqi idaray cheeni difai sanat ke sath mil kar kaam kar rahay hain
' is mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke cheeni fouj ko tawaqqa hai ke masnoi bunyadi tor par jungi sayaq o Sabaq  mukammal tor par tabdeel kar day gi
tasweer ke copy write getty images image caption mahireen naay khudkaar hathyaar aur qaatil robots ke khatraat se aqwam mutahidda ko khabardaar kya hai qaatil robot report ki musannif elsa kanya ka kehna hai ke baaz mahireen midanِ jung mein' wahdat' ( singularity ) ke muntazir hain, jab ensaan larai ke douran روبوٹوں ke barq-e raftari se faislay karne ki salahiyat ka muqaabla nahi kar sakay ga
Amrici  mehakma difaa pentagon ki policy hai ke jung mein insanon ki bajaye robot istemaal kiye jayen, taham doosri janib aqwam mutahidda khud mukhtar hathyaaron ke istemaal par pabandi par ghhor kar rahi hai
elsa kanya ne likha hai ke' cheeni fouj masnoi zahanat ko munfarid aur ghair mutawaqqa tareeqon se istemaal kar sakti hai, jin par America  ki manind qanooni aur ikhlaqi قدغنیں aed nahi hoten
' professor noyl sharki' qaatil روبوٹوں par pabandi ki muhim' Nami  tanzeem ke sarbarah hain
unhon ney bi bi si ko bataya ke cheeni hakkaam ney unhein bataya hai ke un ka is qisam ke robot tayyar karne ka koi iradah nahi hai
unhon nay﻿ kaha :' unhein maghrib jo kar raha hai is ke baray mein chinyon ko ziyada tashweesh hai is liye yeh khaali خولی dhamki ho sakti hai
' taham unhon ne tasleem kya ke chain is maidan mein paanch barson ke andar andar maghrib ke hum palla ho jaye ga
' بائیدو, Ali  baba aur teen senate jaisi companiyon ke masnoi zahanat ke shobo mein bohat se cheeni talba dilchasp kaam kar rahay hain
بائیدو ke paas masnoi zahanat ke 60 mukhtalif plate form hain aur is nay﻿ maghribi masnoi zahanat ki companian khridne ke liye 1 arab dollar kharch kiye hain
' Google  ki parent company الفابیٹ ke chairman airk shmt ne bhi chain ki janib se la-haq masnoi zahanat ke khatray se khabardaar kya hai
haal hi mein unhon ne washington d si mein kaha :' mein samjhta hon ke hamari bartari aglay paanch baras tak qaim rahi gi, phir chain hamein aa le ga
' khabar rasan idaray روئٹرز ke mutabiq pentagon ki aik dastaweez mein khabardaar kya gaya hai ke cheeni companian aisi Amrici  companiyon ke hasas khareed rahi hain jin ke paas aisi tecnology hai jisay mumkina tor par fouji istemaal mein laya ja sakta hai
north kirolayna 26 June  ( agency ) gurday mein pathri ki soorat mein barray aur boorhay aik arsay se lemoo aur lemoo pani ke istemaal par zor dete aaye hain aur ab scienci tor par is totkay ki haqeeqat saabit hogayi hai science daano ny surway ke baad kaha hai ke aik janib to lemoo pani gurday mein pathri ban'nay ke amal ko pehlay se hi rokta hai aur agar pathri hoto is ke bherne ki raftaar ko bhi sust karta hai is zimn mein yeh mashroob jaadoyi asraat rakhta hai yahan taq ke Amrici  maahir dr Roger  sir aur jamea vskansn mein euro loji ke professor stevin ناکاڈا lemoo pani ko tamam dawaon se bhi muasar qarar dete hain is ki wajah yeh hai ke lemoo mein tamam phalon ke muqablay mein strk acid ki buland miqdaar payi jati hai aur yeh tezaab gurday ki پتھریوں ka muasar sdِ baab karta hai is amal ko ab lemoo therapy bhi kaha jane laga hai doosri janib splimnt ke tor par mareez ko potasium سائٹریٹ diya jata hai lekin yeh bhi lemoo ke samnay bohat kam asar rakhta hai taaza ittila ke mutabiq Amrici  shehar drhm mein waqay diyook university ke kidney stone center mein pathri walay 12 mareezon ko chaar baras taq lemoo pani ke ilaaj se guzaraa aur un ke gurdon mein pathri ban'nay ka amal bohat sust dekha gaya un tamam 12 afraad ko chaar saal ke douran pathri ki wajah se kisi tibbi emergency aur ilaaj ki zaroorat paish nahi aayi lemoo pani safai ka amal karte hue gurdon ko muzir asraat se pak rakhta hai mahireen ke mutabiq is ke istemaal se pani ziyada piya jata hai aur mareez rozana daidh se do letter taq pani pishaab ki soorat mein jism se kharij karta hai jo sahet mand gurdon ke liye munasib miqdaar hai agar koi splimnt ya dawa di jaye to is ke bhi ain yahi asraat hotay hain jab pishaab mein khaas namkiyat ki miqdaar barh jaye aur pathar bananay walay سائٹریٹس jism mein kam ho jaien to is se gurdon mein pathriyan jama hona shuru hojati hain badan mein سٹرس ki satah ko barqarar rakh kar pathri ko daur kya ja sakta hai aur yahan lemoo pani aik qudrati dawa ki soorat mein hamari madad karta hai mahireen ke mutabiq zurori hai ke aadha cupp lemoo saat cupp pani mein milaya jaye aur is mein hsbِ zayega shehad bhi milaya ja sakta hai doosri janib mareez ka gosht aur namak ke be ja istemaal se پرہیزبھی zurori hai sabzion aur phalon ka istemaal usay behtar karta hai kyunkay ghizai ahthyat se bhi gurdon ko tandrost rakha ja sakta hai gurday mein pathri se mareez kamar aur gurdon mein dard qay honay samait pishaab mein takleef aur khoon anay ki takaleef mein mubtala ho sakta hai is ki shadeed alamaat mein bukhaar aur khoon ka infection bhi ho sakta hai jo jaan lewa bhi saabit ho sakta hai sydney
13 اکٹوبر ( siyasat dot com ) یوسین bullet ne professional football mein pehla gole kar diya hai
aalmi shohrat Yafta  اسپرنٹر aur ethlate یوسین bullet nay﻿ Australian  central cost میرینرز ke liye khailtay hue professional football mein apna pehla gole score kardiya
100 meter daud ke aalmi record ke haamil sabiq ethlate nay﻿ sydney mein میکارتھر ساؤتھ west united ke khilaaf match mein do gaal score kiye
32 sala ftbalr match mein azlaat mein jakran ka shikaar hue lekin apni takleef par qaboo paatay hue unhon ney 55 win minute mein gole score kar ke professional football mein goals ka khatah khol liya
hareef team ke difaa ki ghaltion ka faida uthatay hue jamaica se talluq rakhnay walay sabiq ethlate nay﻿ 69 win minute mein apna dosra gole score kya aur riwayati andaaz mein jashnn manaya
dosra gole score karne ke baad inhen maidan se bahar bulaa liya gaya lekin is waqt taq un ki team central cost par 0-4 ki bartari haasil kar chuki thi
یوسین bullet augst mein ae league club ka hissa banay they aur is ke baad se pehla mauqa tha ke bullet ne match ki shuruvaat ki aur ibtidayi minute se khail ka hissa rahay
unhon ne match ke baad fox sports se guftagu karte hue kaha ke mein bohat khush hon ke mujhe khailnay ka mauqa mila aur mujhe khud par fakhr hai
bullet ney kaha ke match ka aaghaz karne ke baad do gole score karna mere liye bohat ahmiyat ka haamil hai, mein bohat aaccha mehsoos kar raha hon aur mustaqbil mein mazeed behtar karkardagi dikhaane ki koshish karoon ga
سیلیبرٹیز آؤٹفٹ style manzar aam atay hi fashion trained ka hissa ban jatay hain, jinhein falo karne ke liye madahon ki barri tadaad un ke peechay chal padtee hai
aur jab baat ho khawateen اداکاراؤں ki to un se mutaliq yeh baat aam hai ke un ka fashion جھمکوں aur baalion ke baghair namukammal سالگتا hai
lekin un air rings mein hop ایئررنگز aik aisa trained hai, jin se mutaliq kisi bhi mausam mein khawateen ki raye li jaye to aik hi jawab milta hai' ' hop air rang kaafi un hain' '
hollywood ho ya bollywood سیلیبرٹیز ki barri tadaad khaas taqrebaat ke ilawa street style ke tor prbhi hope air rang ka hi intikhab karti nazar aati hai
60 baras ki Medonna  se le kar 26برس ki slina گومز tak, har aik ki پسندہوپ air rang hi bantay hain
yeh haqeeqat hai ke fashion industry se naye rujhanaat janam letay hain aur سیلیبرٹیزاسٹائل hi taqleed ka baais bantay hain
yahan zikar karte hain un سیلیبرٹیز ka, jinhon ne ahem taqrebaat ke liye hope air rang ka intikhab kya
Medonna  moseeqi ke ranga rang mailon ki Shahrah  Afaq  pop signer Medonna  ney 1985 hamza mein pinsalwania ke shehar fladilfya mein live knsrt ke liye jis jyolri ka intikhab kya, woh gold ke hop air rang hi thay
sarah jiska parkr sarah jisika ka shumaar hollywood ki Maroof  اداکاراؤں mein hi nahi balkay business women mein bhi hota hai
sarah douran shooting hi nahi, camera ke peechay bhi aksar wa beshtar hope air rang ka hi intikhab karti hain
black asport dress ke sath silver hope air rang pehnana sarah jisika parkr ko be had pasand hain
tilr soyft Maroof  Amrici  gulukarah tilr soyft ki wajah shohrat jahan aik taraf to un ke super hatt ganay hain, wahein un ke anu khe style bhi madahon ki tavajja ka markaz banay rehtay hain
2009 hamza mein London  mein munaqqid honay walay bert award mein tailor soyft naay silver drees ke hum rang hope air rang ka intikhab kya tha
wiktoria bikhm Bartania  ki sabiq spice girl wiktoria bikhm moseeqi ke baad fashion designing mein bhi –apne kamalaat se madahon ki tamam tar tavajja samaitt chuki hain
phrih kaisay mumkin hai ke koi naamwar trained ho aur wiktoria bikhm usay nah apnayen? wiktoria aam taqrebaat ke liye jeans aur short taap ke sath hop ایئررنگ hi pehnana pasand karti hain
krstina ایگولیرا Amrici  pop signer krstina ایگولیرا bhi hollywood ki fashion بیوٹیز ke sath paish paish hain
krstina ایگولیرا bhi Medonna  ki terhan –apne concert آؤٹ foot ke liye high poni tail ke hamrah barray size ke hope air rang ka intikhab karti dikhayi deti hain
candle جینر Amrici  model candle جینر ko duniya bhar mein sab se mehngi aur sab se ziyada kamanay wali fashion model ke tor par jana jata hai
candle جینرنے 2017 hamza mein hop air rang ko jewllery trained ka hissa banaya, un ka kehna tha ke guzashta baras hop air rang meri sab se fav jewllery mein se aik rahay
angelina joly angelina joly ko hollywood style star ke tor par jana jata hai
angelina waisay توہوپ air rang ka intikhab deegar hollywood ki سیلیبرٹیز ki terhan aik nahi kayi baar kar chuki hain lekin angelina ne 2008 hamza میںسیگ award ki taqreeb mein shirkat ke liye براؤن rang ki میکسی ke hamrah gold ke khobsorat hop air rang ka intikhab kya tha, jawan ka sab se ziyada pasand kya jaaney wala style saabit sun-hwa
saleena گومز 2016ء mein saleena گومز ney grimy ایوارڈمیں shirkat ke liye Maroof  international brand ka khobsorat jagmagata navy baalo colour ka گاؤن muntakhib kya, wahein is گاؤن ke liye silver rang ke jagmagaty hope air rang saleena گومز ki dilkashii ko mazeed badhaane ka sabab banay

celebrity jewelry trained ki taqleed karte hue deegar khawateen bhi hop ایئررنگ ka hi intikhab karti nazar aati hain
is baras khawateen mein asymmetrical hoops ایئررنگز ka fashion ziyada maqbool hai
ایسمیٹریکل hope style air rings mashriqi ya maghribi dono qisam ke libaas ke sath pehnay jarahay hain, taham metal ki ایسمیٹریکل hope style air rang is baras ziyada maqbool horahee hain
doosri janib barri ya gole baalion mein oon, moti ya dhagon se bani chhoote balls ko bali mein daal kar hope air rang pahannay ka fashion khawateen mein be had maqbool hai

to is se aap andaza lagayen ke aadrz nikal rahay hain to mein dishes larhi hon

London  ( monitoring disk ) 35 sala Rubi  meri Nami  Bangladeshi nazaad Bartanwi  khatoon ney 2017 ءمیں' miss gliksi yoke' aur rawan saal' miss yonayitd kngdm arth' ka muqaabla jeeta
guzashta dinon Bartanwi  nashriyati idaray ko interview dete hue is ne apni maazi ki aisi dilkharash kahani duniya ko snadi hai ke har suneney wala uffsurdaha ho jaye
Rubi  meri nay﻿ interview mein bataya ke ”jb mein sirf 15 saal ki thi, mere walidain mujhe Bangladesh le gaye aur wahan zabardasti meri aisay shakhs se shadi karwa di jisay mein janti tak nah thi aur woh mujh se Umar  mein do gina bara tha
shadi ke baad woh shakhs kayi mahinay taq rozana mujhe jinsi zayad-ti ka nishana banata raha
“ ruby meri ka kehna tha ke ”as aziat naak sorat e haal se is waqt meri jaan chuute jab mein haamla ho gayi aur bachay ko janam dainay ke liye mujhe wapas Bartania  laya gaya
mera shohar is liye mujhe rozana jinsi zayad-ti ka nishana banata tha taakay woh mujhe haamla kar sakay, kyunkay yahi is soorat mein woh Bartania  aa sakta tha
woh daur mere liye kisi khofnaak khawab jaissa hai
mujhe aaj taq samajh nahi aayi ke mere –apne walidain ny mere sath aisa kyun kya, kyun unhon ny mujhe aisay shakhs ke hawalay kar diya jis ny mere sath jinsi ghulam jaissa sulooq rava rakha
mazeed : daily بائیٹس motor se chalne wali wheel chiyrz ko riwayati tor par joy stk ya Sarif  ke jism se lagey سنسرز se control kya jata hai lekin masnoi zahanat se mazoor afraad –apne chehray ke tasrat se bhi wheel chair ko control kar satke hain
brazil ki company ہوباکس robotics ny until ke sath shiraakat daari se وہیلی 7 ( wheelie 7 ) wheel chair kat banai hai, jis mein masnoi zahanat ke istemaal se mazoor afraad –apne chehray ke 10 tasrat, jaisay bhanwain onche karna, zabaan nikalna, muskurana اورہونٹ phelana waghera se wheel chair ko control kar satke hain
is wohi chair ko sarfeen ki harkaat sikahnay ya installation mein sirf 7 minute lagtay hain, isi wajah se is ka naam وہیلی 7 hai
aik madadgaar ki madad se mazoor afraad –apne chehray ke tasrat ko wheel chair ki harkaat se marboot kar satke hain
( jari hai ) is wheel chair mein chehra shanasi ka soft wear, snsr, robotics aur intel 3d realsense depth camera baahum marboot ho kar kaam karte hain
is amal mein sab se pehlay 3D camera se chehray ko sakin kya jata hai
is ke baad masnoi zahanat ka الگورتھم data ko prasis kar ke wheel chair ko command bhaij deta hai
موٹرائزڈ wheel chiyrz mein lagi yeh kat Sooraj  ki roshni aur madham roshni mein bhi kaam karti hai
yeh kat market mein dastyab 95 feesad موٹرائزڈ wheel chiyrz ke sath kaam kar sakti hai
Bollywood ke super star Amitabh  bachchan ney kaha hai ke unhon ney kayi so maqrooz kisanon ke qarzay chuka kar inhen maali pareshaniyon se nijaat dila di hai un qarzon ki majmoi maliyat 4 crore rupay se ziyada thi Amitabh  ney mangal ke roz –apne blog mein likha ke unhon ney 1398 kisanon ke dukh aur masail ko paish e nazar rakhtay hue un par wajib alada karzzzz chuka diye jis par inhen itminan ka ehsas ho raha hai un tamam kisanon ka talluq shumali riyasat utar pradesh se hai jahan Amitabh  peda ho ye they Bharat  ke lakhoon kisaan qarzon ke jaal mein phansay hue hain guzashta kayi ashron se Bharti  kisaan mushkilaat ka saamna kar rahay hain jis ki wajah khushk saali, zair zameen pani ki satah ka girna, zarayi pedawar mein kami aur zarayi shobay mein جدیدکاری ka fuqdaan hai kisaan faslun ki kaasht ya apni zarurten poori karne ke liye majaburan karzzzz letay hain lekin faslun se itni aamdani nahi hoti ke woh –apne karzzzz chuka saken jis se woh qarzon ke jaal mein buri terhan jakray jatay hain aur inhen is se nijaat haasil karne ka wahid rasta yeh dikhayi deta hai ke khudkushi kar len Bharti  kisanon mein khudkushi ki sharah mein musalsal izafah ho raha hai bi bi si ki aik report mein bataya gaya hai ke sun 1955 se ab tak teen laakh se ziyada Bharti  kisaan khudkushi kar chuke hain Amitabh  ka shumaar jin ki Umar  76 saal hai Bollywood ke Maroof  aur pasandeeda tareen adakaron mein hota hai unhon ny kisanon ke woh qarzay chkaye hain jo unhon ny Bharat  ke sarkari malkiat ke bankon se liye thay unhon ny –apne blog mein likha hai ke bankon ny maqrooz kisanon ke karzzzz ada honay ke srtifikt jari kar diye hain jis ke liye unhon ny 4 crore rupay se ziyada ki adayigyan kee –apne blog mein Amitabh  ny likha hai ke woh zaati tor par kisanon ko yeh srtifikt paish karen ge lekin chunkay un ke liye tamam 1398 kisanon ko Mumbai  mein bulana mumkin nahi hai is liye unhon naay 70 kisanon ke liye rail gaari ki aik bogi buk karai hai jin se mulaqaat ke baad woh bank ke kaghzat un ke hawalay kar den ge tawaqqa hai ke kisanon mein karzzzz adaigi ki dastawizaat taqseem karne ki taqreeb 26 November  ko ho gi is se qabal Amitabh  riyasat mharashtr se talluq rakhnay walay 350 kisanon ke karzzzz ada kar chuke hain pichlle saal Bharat  mein hazaron kisanon naay qarzon ki maffi aur fasal ki behtar qeematon ke liye barray pemanay par muzahirey kiye they garmi garmi haae ray garmi jab garmi ka zor hoto ensaan ka bas nahi chalta ke kaisay is ka toar kere waqt ke sath sath technology ny taraqqi ki to pankhon aur room cooler ke baad air kndishnr logon ki zindagion mein aam hota gaya ab ghar chhootay hon ya barray aap ko har ghar mein kam از kam aik ae si to laazmi laga dikhayi day ga ab to yeh haal hai ke daftar hoya ghar gaari ya phir koi shopping سینٹرہرجگہ ایئرکنڈیشنرکی sahoolat mojood hai jab har jagah hi air kndishnr mojood hoga to phir aap ko is ki aadat bhi zaroor prhjati hai aur loadshedding ke douran is ke baghair jeena mahaal hojata hai hamaray jism ayyrkndishnr ke aadi hogaye hain aur ab zara si garmi bhi hamaray liye naqablِ bardasht hojati hai agar koi chilchelati dhoop mein se kisi aisi jagah poanch jaye jahan ayyrkndishnr chal raha ho twase foran hi sukoon aur raahat ka ehsas hota hai ayyrkndishnr ke sahet par asraat jaissa ke saans lainay mein dushwari sir aur jism mein dard yani thakawat ka mehsoos hona jald aur balon ka be ronaqe aur khushk nazar aana jald ki bimarion khujli aur blood pressure jaisi bemariyan shaamil hain is liye jald aur balon ko nami pohanchanay ke liye ziyada se ziyada pani piyeen aap ایئرکنڈیشنرکو 24 se 26 degree ke darmiyan rakhen aur sath aahista raftaar se pankha chladin
is amal se aap ke jism ka darja hararat qaboo mein rahay ga aur sath bijli ki bhi bachat hogi London  ( web disk ) science daano ke aik giroh ney kaha hai ke ab hamein yeh elaan kar dena chahiye ke baaz aqsam ke cancer ke ilaaj mein اسپرین mufeed saabit hosakti hai Bartania  mein kardf university mein waqay kokrin insti tute of primaray care and health se wabsta paiter ail ney is zimn mein 71 tehqeeqi jaizon ( reserch sroyz ) aur mtalaat ka baghore tajzia kya hai aur is ke nataij public library of science one ki Website par shaya karaye hain اسپرین ki kam khoraak dil faalij aur cancer ki bimarion mein mo-asar saabit hochuki hai aur ab is baat ke mazeed saboot miley hain ke اسپرین kayi aqsam ke cancer ko roknay ya inhen daur rakhnay mein mufeed saabit hosakti hai is se qabal mumtaz tibbi jareeday linst mein shaya shuda aik report mein bataya gaya tha ke udhair Umri  mein cancer ke shikaar honay walay afraad mein اسپرین faida mand saabit hoti hai guzashta baras choohon par tajarbaat ke baad yeh baat samnay aayi thi ke cancer ke murawaja mualjay ke sath sath agar اسپرین bhi istemaal ki jaye to is se ilaaj ki asar pazeeri aur raftaar dono barh jati hain dr paiter aur un sathiyon naay 120000 aisay mareezon ka data khngala jo cancer ka ilaaj karwa rahay they aur sath mein اسپرین bhi kharhe they phir is data ka mawazna chaar laakh aisay mareezon se kya gaya jo اسپرین nahi le rahay they is zimn mein barri aant ke cancer breast cancer aur prostate cancer ke mareezon ki reports dekhi gayeen mahireen yeh jaan kar heran reh gaye ke سرطان ke jin mareezon naay ilaaj ke sath sath اسپرین khayi thi un mein baqiya mareezon ke muqablay mein zindah bach jaany ki sharah 20 se 30 feesad ziyada thi bah alfaaz deegar اسپرین se un ki zindagi ka dorania barh gaya tha taham mahireen naay is zimn mein mazeed azmaish aur tehqeeq par bhi zor diya hai New York ( monitoring disk ) ilm najoom ke maahir sitaron ki chalon ke zariye logon ki qismat ka haal batatay hain aur baaz star saynz ko khush bakhti ki alamat qarar dete hain ab scienci tehqeeq mein bhi burj dalo ke haamil logon ke liye heran kin inkishaaf kar diya gaya hai di mirror ke mutabiq yeh burj un logon ka hota hai jo January  aur feb mein peda hotay hain aur yeh log bohat Ameer  aur mashhoor hotay hain hollywood adakara jinifr anistn opera ونفرے aur Maroof  foot bowler کرسٹیانو Ronaldo  sameit mutadid aalmi shaksiaat adakar khilari gulukar aur sayasatdan waghera un do mahino mein peda hue they ab science danon ny Bartania  ke qaumi idaara shumariyat ke adaad o shumaar haasil karkay 19 mukhtalif pishon aur logon ki paidaiesh ke mahino ka tajzia karkay mazeed heran kin inkishaaf kya hai is tjzyie mein maloom sun-hwa ke January  aur feb mein peda honay walay log barray ho kar sab se ziyada Ameer  aur Maroof  hue un do mahino mein peda honay walay aksar log cheif executive officers adakar dr aur deegar aisay pishon se munsalik hue jahan inhen bohat shohrat aur paisa haasil sun-hwa is ke bar aks baqi mahino mein peda honay walay afraad un pishon ki taraf bohat kam gaye tahaqeeq ke mutabiq 1992 hamza se 2009 hamza ke darmain duniya ki 500 barri companiyon ke cheif executive officers mein se 10 feesad January  mein peda hue they twitter par bachay khud nahi atay Pakistan  tehreek insaaf ( pi tea aayi ) ke rukan qaumi assembly aur Maroof  TV maizban Aamir  Liaqat  Hussain  apni doosri shadi ke baad ahliya Sayeda  tuba ke hamrah kayi shows ka hissa ban rahay hain, jahan woh apni zindagi ke hawalay se kayi baten share bhi kar rahay hain dawn ke mutabiq Aamir  Liaqat  aur tuba haal hi mein sanam balouch ke morning show subah saweray Samah  ke sath ka hissa bhi banay, jahan pehli martaba Aamir  Liaqat  neh khil kar apni dono shadion ke hawalay se baat ki show ke douran sanam balouch neh Aamir  Liaqat  se sawal kya ke deen parhnay ke bawajood un ki pehli ahliya bashri neh ab taq un ki doosri shadi qubool kyun nahi ki? is par Aamir  Liaqat  neh kaha ke' unhon neh deen nahi parha, deen parhna mukhtalif hai aur degree haasil karne ke liye parhna mukhtalif hai, kuch log apni baton se logon ko zahir karte hain ke woh bohat dainee hain' yaad rahay ke Aamir  Liaqat  ki pehli ahliya bashri Aamir  aur beti dua ny twitter par waalid ki doosri shadi ke hawalay se –apne dukh ka izhaar kya tha dua Aamir  ny aik ٹویٹ mein likha tha ke' aik aur din aik aur almiya, jab se aap ny apni family ka dil dekhaya, aap ki behtari ke liye dil se dua hai aur is ke liye bhi jis ny ghar tabah kya, umeed hai Allah  aap ki sahih simt mein rahnumai farmaiye, jis waqt aap ke bachay –apne ansoo ponch rahay hain, karb mein mubtala aap ki ujri hui beti, dua Aamir  '
Aamir  Liaqat  ne is par bhi apni raye ka izhaar karte hue kaha ke' twitter par bachay khud nahi atay' unhon ne kaha ke woh bachay jo twitter par anay ke liye internet ka istemaal kar rahay hain woh un ke waalid ne hi laga kar diya hai Aamir  Liaqat  ne mazeed kaha ke' pehli biwi ko bhi izzat day raha hon, bachay bhi zair kifalat hain, deegar log hain jo do gharon mein jhagra karwa rahay hain warna pehla ghar bhi durust hai aur dosra ghar bhi durust hai' sanam balouch ne show ke douran un afwahon ka tazkara bhi kya jo un ke aur Aamir  Liaqat  ke hawalay se samnay aayi theen, unhon ny kaha ke woh Aamir  Liaqat  ko bhai bolti hain, is ke bawajood aisi afwahen samnay ayen ke Aamir  Liaqat  ny un se doosri shadi karli show ke douran sanam balouch ny Aamir  Liaqat  se sawal kya ke islam mein kitni shadian jaaiz hain? is par Aamir  Liaqat  ny kaha ke chaar shadian jaaiz hain, jabkay sanam balouch ka hawala dete hue kaha ke agar dost bohat achi ho to teesri shadi bhi ki ja sakti hai

ki peshkash kar di Aamir  Liaqat  nay﻿ is show par yeh bhi inkishaaf kya ke un ki doosri ahliya tuba jald screen par kaam bhi karti nazar ayen gi yaad rahay ke Aamir  Liaqat  Hussain  ki doosri shadi rawan saal hui thi jo is waqt samnay aayi jab election commission mein un ke khilaaf kaghzat namzadgi mein doosri ahliya ka zikar nah karne par darkhwast dair hui is mauqa par Aamir  Liaqat  Hussain  nay﻿ election commission mein paish hokar مؤقف ikhtiyar kya tha ke unhon ne apni ahliya ke hawalay se kuch nahi chupaya, abhi sirf un se nikah sun-hwa hai jis ke baad rawan mah pi tea aayi ke rehnuma ne bhi inhen –apne twitter اکاؤنٹ par doosri ahliya ke sath shadi ki tasaveer share kee jabkay rukhsati ki tasdeeq bhi is se aik roz qabal hi ki thi jabkay is show par unhon ne yeh bhi bataya ke samnay anay wali tasaveer un ke valimay ki nahi balkay rukhsati ki hi theen, jabkay un ka valima Wazeer e Azam  Imran  Khan  munaqqid karen ge Aamir  Liaqat  ne yeh bhi inkishaaf kya ke unhon ne ab taq tuba ko mun dikhayi nahi di, jabkay tuba ney inhen mun dikhayi mein kamera diya hai unhon ney show ke douran apni doosri ahliya ke liye ganay bhi gaaye Zurich  science daan aisay lachak dar robot bananay mein kamyaab hogaye hain jo pani ki terhan apni haiyat tabdeel karne ki salahiyat rakhtay hain aur yeh insani khoon mein tairnay ki salahiyat bhi rakhtay hain tehqeeqi jareeday science advance mein shaya honay walay aik maqalay ke mutabiq science daan Salman  sakaar ki qayadat mein do engineering company ke mahireen aisay lachak dar robots bananay mein kamyaab hogaye hain jo maya ki terhan apni haiyat tabdeel kar lete hain un robots ko bacteria ki shakal ki terhan banaya gaya hai jo tairnay ki salahiyat se bhi malaa maal hain aur yeh atraaf ke mahol ke tehat apni shakal bhi tabdeel kar lete hain yahan taq ke apni raftaar kam kiye baghair khoon ki nalion mein bhi safar kar saktay hain un robots mein aisa intelli jins programme muratab kya gaya hai jis ki madad se yeh robots pani aur khoon mein bhi teer satke hain aur –apne tafweez kardah faraiz ki durust tareeqay se injaam dahi bhi kar saktay hain jis ke baais tib ki duniya mein usay inqilab تصورکیا ja raha hai science daan is ijaad ko jism mein dawa ki tarseel jarahat aur paicheeda zakhamo ko bharnay mein Muawin  ijaad qarar day rahay hain jin ki madad se tib ki duniya mein herat angaiz karhaye numaya injaam diye ja saken se zahir hota hai ke landing ke douran robot ko koi nuqsaan nahi pouncha وولگوگریڈ 23 June  ( siyasat dot com ) Fifa  world cupp ke aakhri 16 marhalay mein rasai nigeria ki qismat khud is ke –apne hi un ka kehna tha ke chain ki taraqqi ke paish e nazar koi malik is position mein nahi hai ke chain ke awam ko yeh hukum day ke inhen kya karna aur kya nahi karna chahiye

un ka kehna tha ke chain aalmi aman ka Daiee  hai aur mosmyati tabdeelion se nimatnay mein is ka ahem kirdaar hai
