London  27 May  ( siyasat dot com ) Pakistani  nazaad Bartanwi  boxer Aamir  Khan  ki zindagi se mushkilaat khatam honay kanam nahi le rahi hain guzashta baras ahliya Faryal  Makhdum  se alehadgi ke scandal se عامرابھی bahar niklay hi they ke aik aur scandal ka shikaar hogaye London  se talluq rakhnay wali 22 sala byotishn Sufia  ہامانی naay Aamir  pralzam aed kya ke Aamir  Khan  naay apni beti ki paidaiesh ke mehez 17 roz baad un kay sath taluqaat qaim kiye Sufia  naay kaha ke inhen Aamir  ke انسٹاگرام se un ki shadi se mutaliq ilm sun-hwa inhen bilkul andaza nahi tha ke Aamir  shadi shuda hain warna woh un kay sath taluqaat qaim nahi kartain Sufia  ne Aamir  Khan  ki ahliya Faryal  Makhdum  ke liye afsos ka izhaar karte hue kaha ke yeh sab is ke liye aik bura khawab hai usay chahiye ke woh Aamir  ko chorde wazeh rahay ke Sufia  ہامانی ke ilzamaat ke jawab mein fi al haal Aamir  ka koi muaqqaf samnay nahi aaya hai aaj kal log farsh par bethnay ke bajaye kursi ya سوفے par baithna pasand karte hain aisa maloom hota hai ke farshi nashist ka zamana guzar gaya halaank_h yeh bhi hamari tahazeeb mein shaamil tha aam tor par jab kahin milaad mshaarh ya qawali hoti to sab log farshi nashist pasand karte they darj baala taqrebaat ke mawaqay par darri aur chandni bichai jati thi aur log gayo takiye ka istemaal karte they taakay kamar ko sahara milta rahay agar mushahida karen to yeh dekh kar afsos hota hai ke logon ny farsh par baithna band kardiya hai ntijta unki kamar aur ghutnon mein dard rehta hai yeh shikayaat mehez is liye hoti hain ke hum sara din kursi par sakit baithy rehtay hain werzish nahi karte aur khatay waqt aitdaal pasandi ikhtiyar nahi karte aur is terhan wazan barh jata hai is ke ilawa air kndishnr mein bethnay ki wajah se joron mein dard rehne lagta hai tawazun barqarar rakhnay ke liye yoga ka khaas andaaz ya aasen ikhtiyar karne se airee ghatney aur joron ka dard khatam hojata hai is andaaz se ہارمونوں ki افزایش hoti hai aur yeh aap ke jism ko Aram  وسکون dete hain yoga ka yeh khaas andaaz سنتولان aasen kehlata hai yoga ka yeh mufeed sahet andaaz ikhtiyar karne ke liye farsh par nangay paon joor kar seedhay kharray ہوجایئے aur –apne haath farsh ki taraf seedhay rakhiye haath aap ke pehloun mein rehne chahaiyn phir apni dayen taang موڑیے aur dayen haath se thaam lijiye yun ke aap ke paon ka anghutha apkee hatheli prho baayaan haath, ungelian aur anghutha khicha aur akra sun-hwa hona chahiye ab aik gehra saans len aur baen haath ko uthana shuru kar dein pehlay usay samnay le jayen phir aahista aahista oopar karen is door nah karen baazu ko kaan se لگاہوا hona chahiye dayen haath se paon ke khinchte rahen aur usay dayen ko لھے se laga den is andaaz se kharray rahen aur aath ya das taq ginti gnin samnay aik farzi nuqtay ka tasawwur karen aur sarko seedha rakhtay hue usay ghoortay rahen phir saans ko kharij karen aur baen haath ko batadreej neechay le ayen
is ke baad dayen taang ko chore den aur seedha karkay farsh par rakh den
ab baen paon ko baen haath se thaam len paon ka anghutha hatheli mein hona chahiye saans khinchte hue dayan haath batadreej uthayen aap ki airee koolhay se lagi honi chahiye aur dayan baazu kaan se لگاہونا chahiye ab aath ya das baar ginti gnin phir saans kharij karte hue apni taang aur haath neechay le ayen is saaray amal ko paanch baar karen jin afraad ko ghatney ke dard ki shikayat ho woh taang ko mornay ke baad paanch ya chay taq ginti gnin jab jism mein lachak peda hojaye to werzish ke is andaaz ko chay sath minute taq ikhtiyar kiye rahen toss ke waqt na munasib libaas kohli par shadeed tanqeed sydney 30 November  ( siyasat dot com ) hindustani cricket team ke captain ویراٹ kohli ne cricket Australia  eleven ke khilaaf 64 runs ki umdah ining kheli lekin isi match ke douran mamooli ghalti par woh aik martaba phir social media ki tanqeed ki zad mein aagaye Australia  ke khilaaf tst series se qabal wahid practice match mein jab kohli sydney cricket grand mein toss ke liye aaye to unhon ne cricket ki riwayaat ke bar aks short ( nicker ) pehan kar toss kya jabkay doosri janib cricket Australia  eleven ke captain same white mean –apne mukammal cricket libaas mein toss karne aaye kohli ke is amal ko social media par ziyada pazeerai nahi mili aur kuch logon naay usay gentle mean game ki tazheek qarar dete hue captain par shadeed tanqeed ki hindustani aik twitter Sarif  naay likha ke kohli ke ravayye se yeh zahir sun-hwa ke woh khail aur is ki saakh ka ehtram nahi karte aik aur Sarif  naay likha ke aik waqt tha ke captain toss ke waqt blizr ( suit ) pehna karte they yeh rawayya bilkul qabil maffi nahi taham doosri janib baaz madah aisay bhi rahay jinhon naay kaha ke kohli ka yeh amal itna bura nahi tha kyunkay hindostan sirf aik practice match khail raha hai Lahore ( web disk ) zindagi ke kisi bhi marhalay par pyaron ka bichadna aur kisi –apne ka sath chhuut jana ensaan ke liye aik kara imthehaan saabit hota hai maamar joron mein se kisi aik ki mout ke baad kuch arsay ke baad dosray ki mout ki khabrain aksar samnay aati rehti hain lekin kya aap ney kabhi socha ke aisa kyun hota hai is ke peechay jazbati لگاو aur dil ka tootna to hota hi hai lekin is ki chand scienci wajohaat bhi hain psycho nyoro اینڈو کرائنولوجی journal mein shaya honay wali aik tahaqeeq se saabit hota hai ke gham kabhi kabhar mohlik bhi ho jata hai aur isi terhan dil totnay ke sabab mout bhi waqay ho sakti hai Amrici  tehqiqati idaray rice ke mohqiqeen naay aisay 99 logon ke khoon ke namoonay liye aur interviews bhi kiye jin ke shareek hayaat ka haal hi mein intqaal sun-hwa tha tehqiqati team naay –apne pyaron ke bhichar jaanay par be panah dukh ka izhaar karne walon ka mawazna un afraad ke sath kya jnhon naay aisay kisi ravayye ka izhaar nahi kya tha tahaqeeq ke douran shareek hayaat kho dainay ke baad dukh ka izhaar nah karne walay mardon aur khawateen mein jismani soozish ki satah 17 feesad ziyada payi gayi jismani soozish dil ke aarze cancer aur diabities jaisi jaan lewa bimarion ko badhaane mein madad deti hai yeh apni noiyat ki pehli tahaqeeq hai jis se yeh baat saabit hoti hai ke dukh jismani soozish ko berhata hai jis ke sahet par jaan lewa hadd taq manfi asraat muratab ho saktay hain tehqiqati team ke mutabiq –apne kisi pyare ka bhichar jana bohat hi mushkil marhala hota hai aur is se niklana Umar  ke kisi bhi hissay mein aaasaaan nahi hota is mein kuch waqt lagna qudrati amal hai is liye mohqiqeen ki janib se mahswara diya jata hai ke agar koi –apne gham se lar raha hai to usay kisi mualij ki raye le leni chahiye ya phir kisi ke sath apna dukh bayan kar dena chahiye ke gham baantane se waqai kuch had taq kam hojata hai tasweer ke copy write reuters Pakistan  stak market mein zabardast mandi ke rujhan ki wajohaat mein mahireen Pakistan  ka aayi am f ki taraf qarzay ke liye jana aur hukoomat ki policy ka wazeh nah hona qarar day rahay hain
Pakistan  stak exchange ka andiks paiir ke roz 1100 points gira hai jo aik barri gravt samjhi jati hai
wazeh rahay ke Wazeer e Azam  Pakistan  Imran  Khan  nay﻿ itwaar ko Lahore  mein khitaab ke douran kaha tha shayad Pakistan  ko aayi am f ke paas jana parre ga kyunkay adayigyon ke bohraan ka saamna hai
lekin aayi am f jane se qabal dost mumalik se madad mangeen ge
mazeed padhiye riyasat madinah, jinah ka Pakistan  aur naya Pakistan  market mein sastay dollar ka faida kis ko sun-hwa ?' muslim duniya mein laraiyan hum sab ko kamzor kar rahi hain' agar Pakistan  aayi am f ke paas jata hai to yeh paanch saloon mein doosri baar ho ga ke Pakistan  is se bail out package le ga
adaad o shumaar ke mutabiq malik ka zar mubadla ke zakhair September  ke aakhir mein no arab dollars se ziyada thay jis mein 627 million dollar kami aayi hai aur october mein zar mubadla ke zakhair 8. 4 arab dollars reh gaye hain
zar mubadla ke yeh zakhair bas itnay hi hain ke saal ke aakhir mein jo adayigyan karni hain woh Pakistan  kar sakay
zar mubadla ke zakhair mein aik haftay ke andar jo kami waqay hui hai woh guzashta kayi barson mein sab se ziyada kami hai
Pakistan  stak exchange mein mandi guzashta chay saat mah se jari hai
mahireen ke mutabiq is ki barri wajah thi ke tijarti khasara kaafi barh gaya tha, budget targets poora nahi kar sakay aur zar mubadla ke zakhair mein kami waqay ho rahi thi
to paiir ko kya sun-hwa? tasweer ke copy right afp ae ke d group ke chairman Aqeel  kareem dhidi ne paiir ko 1100 points girnay ke hawalay se baat karte hue bi bi si urdu ko bataya ke paiir ko jo gravt aayi hai is ki bhi wajohaat wahein hain jo guzashta chay saat mah se jo Karachi  stak exchange mein gravt ki hain
unhon nay﻿ kaha' hamaray zar mubadla ke zakhair taqreeban daidh mah ke reh gaye hain jo sirf daidh mah ki draamdi adayigyon ke barabar hain
aur phir hukoomat yeh faisla karne ja rahi hai ke aayi am f ke paas jaya jaye
' un ka kehna tha ke aayi am f ke paas agar Pakistan  jata hai to woh Pakistan  par zor den ge ke sharah sood mein izafah kya jaye, rupay ki qader mein kami ki jaye, utility bills ko badhaya jaye waghera
' jab rupay ki qader mein kami ki baat ki jaye gi to is waqt ghair mulki sarmaya car to niklny ki karen ge
' doosri janib arif habib ltd ke naib saddar farhan mnsori ka kehna hai ke Karachi  stak exchange mein kami ki chand barri wajohaat hain
' aik to yeh ke Pakistani  rupay ki qader mein kami nazar aa rahi hai aur andaza hai ke dollar 135 ya 140 rupay tak chala jaye ga
is ki wajah se ghair mulki sarmaya car to nikal rahay hain
doosri wajah hakoomati policy ka wazeh nah hona
phir hukoomat ne sharah sood mein bhi izafah kya hai
' unhon ne mazeed kaha ke takneeki teamon ka yeh andaza hai ke market mein hazaar points ki mazeed kami ho gi
wizarat khazana se misbet policy ka intzaar tasweer ke copy right afp Aqeel  kareem dhidi ka kehna hai ke Karachi  stak exchange mein kami ki wajah mein bain al aqwami muashi sorat e haal ka amal dakhal bhi hai
taham unhon ne kaha ke Pakistan  mein tijarti baradri baalkhsos Karachi  mein tijarti baradri wizarat khazana se misbet bayan ke intzaar mein hai lekin woh nahi aaya
un ka mazeed kehna tha ke aaj shaam ko siniyr stak brokrz ka aik ijlaas ho raha hai jo kuch faislay karen ge aur phir hukoomat se baat cheet karen ge taakay mojooda sorat e haal par hukoomat guide lines day
' hukoomat ki janib se misbet bayan ya گائئڈ lines zaroori hai taakay sarmaya karon ka aetmaad bahaal ho sakay
guzashta chay mah mein das din aisay nahi hon ge ke jin mein sarmaya aaya taqreeban sarmaya nikal hi raha hai
' unhon nay﻿ kaha ke hukoomat ko policy deeni chahiye aur doosri baat yeh ke aayi am f mein jaane ya nah jaane ke baaray mein hukoomat ko faisla kar lena chahiye
' hukoomat ne aayi am f mein jaaane ya nah jaaane ke hawalay se faislay mein takheer ki hai
hum samajte hain ke hukoomat ko foran faisla kar lena chahiye aur aik policy ka elaan kere jis se sarmaya karon mein aetmaad aaye
' arif habib ltd ke naib saddar farhan mnsori nay﻿ bhi Aqeel  kareem dhidi se hukoomat ki janib se kisi qisam ki policy ke elaan ke nah honay par ittafaq kya
Pakistan  mein dhowen aur dhund ke milaap ka season shuru honay ke sath hi sarkon par mazhabi jamaaton ka ehtijaj jari hai jis mein social media par baat ki ja rahi hai ke traffic kam honay se smog ka zor kam ho ga ya jalao gherao se yeh mazeed zor pakdae gi Pakistan  ke dosray barray shehar Lahore  mein musalsal panchwin baras smog ka mausam lout raha hai dhowen aur dhund ka yeh zahreela imtezaaj shehar ki fiza mein mehsoos kya ja sakta hai khadsha hai ke anay walay dinon mein is mein shiddat aaye gi lekin Lahore  mein Asiya  bi bi ki barriat ke khilaaf tehreek labbaik ka ehtijaj jari hai aur is par Benazir  Shah  ne ٹویٹ ki ke Punjab  assembly ke bahar labbaik ehtijaj kar rahi hai aur unhon ne pahiyah jaam ki cal di hai ho sakta hai ke smog un ke sath ho is par logon ne smog ke maslay ko tehreek labbaik se milatay hue ٹویٹ karna shuru ki jis mein Shehryar  Ali  Shah  ne ٹویٹ ki kash ke smog un ke andar ho social media par behas to jari hai lekin Lahore  mein smog ke barey mein baat karte hain jahan fazai aloodgi ke is mausam mein shehar ki fiza mein saans lena dushwaar hota hai soobah Punjab  ki hukoomat smog se bachney ke liye jatan karti rahi hai magar ta haal kamyaab nahi ho payi haliya baras smog se hifazati iqdamaat par amal daraamad ko yakeeni bananay ka daawa kya gaya tha Punjab  ke idaara baraye maholiyati tahaffuz ney decemeber taq riwayati chhoout ke bhton par pabandi aed kar rakhi hai sirf زگ زیگ tecnology par banay bhton ko chalne ki ijazat hai idaray ke tarjuman Naseem  al-rehman ney bi bi si ko bataya ke dhuwan chorney wali gariyon aur fiktryon ke khilaaf bhi sakht karwai ki ja rahi hai to un tamam iqdamaat ke baad smog kahan se aa gayi Naseem  al-rehman kehte hain ke ab ke baar yeh India  se aa rahi hai woh India  mein barray pemanay par dhaan ki fasal ke mndh jalaaye jaane ke amal ko qasoor waar th_hrate hain magar woh dhuwan Pakistan  kaisay aata hai Pakistan  mein bhi to مڈھی jalai jati hai kya woh aloodgi ka zareya nahi smog India  se kaisay aati hai idaara baraye maholiyati tahaffuz Punjab  ke tarjuman Naseem  al-rehman ka kehna tha ke Lahore  mein is baar phir smog nazar aana aik qudrati amal hai is ki wajah un ke mutabiq yeh hai ke Pakistan  mein to aloodgi phelanay walay anasir par qaboo karne ke iqdamaat kiye ja rahay hain taham jab taq India  mein bhi waisay hi iqdamaat nahi kiye jatay smog Pakistan  mein zaroor aaye gi maholiyati tahaffuz ke mahireen ke mutabiq smog ke peda honay mein bara haath is dhowen ka hai jo chawal ki fasal ke mndh ko jalanay se uthta hai India  mein jitne raqbay par yeh mndh jalaya jata hai is ka hissa Pakistan  ke muqablay mein kayi gina ziyada hai Naseem  al-rehman ka kehna tha ke Pakistan  ke qaumi khalayi agency sparko ke naqshoon se wazeh tor par dekha ja sakta hai ke is dhowen ka bara hissa India  mein hai guzashta baras Amrici  khalayi idaray Nasa  ke masnoi sayyaron se li gayi jari kardah tasaveer ney bhi is baat ki tasdeeq ki thi mahireen ke mutabiq Pakistan  aur India  ke shumal mein pahari silsilay waqay hain yeh aik deewar ka kaam karte hain chawal ke mndh jalanay se peda honay wala dhuwan fiza mein uthta hai muallaq rehta hai aur jab idhar ki sun-hwa chalti hai to yeh Pakistan  mein daakhil ho jata hai jis qader yeh ziyada ho ga itna daur tak Pakistan  ke andar tak safar kere ga is terhan ziyada shehar mutasir hon ge Naseem  al-rehman ke mutabiq Pakistan  androoni satah par fazai aloodgi par qaboo panay se smog ki shiddat ko kam kar sakta hai magar kya India  se anay walay is dhowen ko roknay ki koi soorat nahi maholiyaat ke mahireen aur wukla ke mutabiq bain al aqwami qawaneen kisi malik ki janib se kisi dosray malik ki hudood mein aloodgi phelanay par qanooni charah joi ka haq dete hain maholiyaat ke wakeel Rifie  aalam neh bi bi si se aik guzashta interview mein bataya tha ke agar aik malik apni aloodgi dosray malik mein phela raha ho to is par bain al aqwami tor par muqadma chalaya ja sakta hai is ke liye zurori hai ke fazai aloodgi ke zaraye maloom hon fazai aloodgi ko napnay walay meter ke zariye na sirf aloodgi ki miqdaar ka andaza balkay zaraye ka pata bhi lagaya ja sakta hai Naseem  al-rehman neh bi bi si ko bataya ke Lahore  mein kayi maqamat ke ilawa aisay meter Gujranwala  Multan  aur Faisal  abad mein bhi nasb hain taham un se haasil honay walay adaad o shumaar ta haal samnay nahi laaye gaye idaara baraye maholiyati tahaffuz Punjab  ke tarjuman ka mazeed kehna tha ke unhon naay Pakistan  ki wazarat kharja se darkhwast ki hai ke woh indian hukoomat se baat karen un se baat cheet ho bhi rahi hai kyunkay India  ke –apne liye bhi yeh bara masla hai Naseem  al-rehman ka kehna tha ke smog se bachao ke liye androoni satah par chaar iqdamaat intehai zurori hain yani riwayati chhoout ke bhton par pabandi fiktryon mein baqaida fltrishn ke alaat gariyon ke dhowen par qaboo paana aur dhaan ki مڈھی jalanay ke amal ki rokkk thaam un mein pehlay teen par amal-dar-aamad karwaya ja raha hai taham chouthay iqdaam mein nataij ke husool mein waqt lagey ga Naseem  al-rehman ka kehna tha ke bhte ki nepal mein istemaal honay wali زگ زیگ technology Pakistan  mein muta-arif karwa di gayi hai riwayati bhte ko hi زگ زیگ mein tabdeel kya ja sakta hai un ka kehna tha ke muqami bhutta malkaan ke taawun se nai technology ke istemaal ko yakeeni banaya ja raha hai riwayati bhte ke muqablay mein زگ زیگ bhte mein eendhan yani koylay ki khpt mein 30 feesad taq kami hoti hai jabkay is se peda honay wali aloodgi mein 70 feesad kami aati hai un ka kehna tha smog ka mausam guzar jany ke baad bhi sirf un bhton ko chalne ki ijazat di jaye gi jo زگ زیگ tecnology par muntaqil ho jayen ge Pakistan  mein qareeban 20 hazaar ke lag bhte mojood hain
inhen fazai aloodgi ka bara zareya tasawwur kya jata hai idaara baraye maholiyati tahaffuz ke tarjuman ka mazeed kehna tha ke mehakma zaraat Punjab  ko Hadayat  di gayeen hain ke dafaa 144 ke tehat chawal ki مڈھی jalanay walon ke khilaaf karwai ki jaye taham un ka kehna tha ke hukoomat deegar aapshnz par bhi ghhor kar rahi hai un mein kisanon ko روٹاویٹر ya machinon ki farahmi bhi shaamil hai jin ke zariye chawal ki مڈھی ko jalaaye baghair talaf kya ja sakay ga taham is mein waqt lag sakta hai is mein maali masail aur deegar umoor bhi dekhnay hotay hain to is mein waqt lagey ga taham Naseem  al-rehman ney umeed zahir ki ke hukoomat ke iqdamaat ki badolat is saal smog ki shiddat kam ho gi abhi bahar hal aaghaz hai Mumbai  Bharti  cricket team ke maaya naz cricketer virat kohli ney apni aur bollywood haseena anushka sharmaa ki kamyaab ازواجی zindagi ka raaz bta diya Bharti  media ke mutabiq virat kohli ney aik channel ko diye gaye interview mein bataya ke mein aur ahliya anushka hamesha aam se kaam karte hain aur hamesha hi aam logon ki terhan chehal qadmi karne kahin bhi chalay jatay hain taakay aik dosray ko waqt day saken virat kohli ney yeh bhi bataya ke guzashta raat hi hum log achanak saahil kinare chalay gaye jahan chodween ka chaand aik khobsorat manzar paish kar raha tha hum dono bas uss jagah aik bench par baith kar lutaf andoz hue dar haqeeqat yeh sab aam si chizen hain jis se hamein khushi millti hai aur kamyaab ازواجی zindagi ki asal wajah bhi yeh saadgi hai yaad rahay ke aik saal qabal rishta azwaaj mein munsalik honay wali bollywood aur cricket ki duniya se wabsta anoshka aur virat ki jori ka shumaar Bharat  ki maqbool tareen جوڑیوں mein hota hai dono hi fankar apni apni pesha warana zindagi se faraghat mlitay hi aksar kahin nah kahin sair spate karte nazar atay hain un dinon yeh jori Bharat  aur newzea land ke darmain honay walay match ki wajah se newzea land mein mojood hai Karachi  aqwam mutahidda ke idaara baraye children emergency fund unicef naay Pakistan  ko nomolood bachon ki amwaat mein sab se khatar naak malik qarar day diya unicef ki janib se jari kardah report mein bataya gaya hai ke 2016 mein Pakistan  mein har 1000 mein se 46 bachay paidaiesh ke pehlay mah mein hi jaan bahaq ho jatay they jis ka matlab yeh hai ke har 22 mein se 1 bacha apni zindagi ka aik mah bhi poora nahi krpata report ke mutabiq haliya barson mein nozaida bachon ki amwaat ki sharah bherne ke bawajood aik mah se paanch saal ke bachon ko mutasir kin fawaid pohanchanay mein peechay raha hai jabkay 1990 se 2016 ke darmain is Umar  ke bachon ki sharah amwaat 62 feesad taq gir gayi jo taqreeban do tahai ke barabar hai report ke mutabiq duniya bhar mein har saal 26 laakh bachay aik mah se qabal hi mout ka shikaar ho jatay hain jabkay un mein se 10 laakh bachay apna pehla aur aakhri saans paidaiesh walay din hi letay hain aur un mein se har aik ki amwaat aik almiya hai kyunkay un mein se ziyada tar qabil ilaaj hotay hain report mein kaha gaya ke 80 feesad nomolood bachon ki amwaat ki wajah qabal از waqt paidaiesh hai jabkay labour aur ڈیلوری ke douran mushkilaat gardan toar bukhaar aur pneumonia jaisay infection bhi un amwaat ka baais bantay hain report mein bataya gaya ke nomolood bachon ki amwaat ke peechay aik wajah is bachay ki paidaiesh ki jagah hai jabkay nomolood ki baqa ka talluq malik ki aamdani ki satah se bhi talluq rakhta hai unicef ki report ke mutabiq 2016 mein jin 10 mumalik mein sab se ziyada nomolood bachon ki sharah amwaat dekhi gayi un mein Bharat , Pakistan , naijeria, kango ki jamhoori ripblk ethiopia , chain, Indonesia , Bangladesh, tanzania aur Afghanistan  hain vn bachon ki zindagion ko bachaaya ja sakta hai ankhen bhi tavajja ki taalib hain aankh bohat naazuk uzoo hai is liye is ki sahet ke liye khaas ahthyat ki zaroorat hoti hai
aankhon ko har roz kam از kam dobaar saaf pani se dhona chahiye
mualij ke mashwaray ke baghair koi dawa nahi dalni chahiye
sir mein mustaqil dard rehta ho to benaie check karwany chahiye
zail mein chand aisi alamtain darj ki jarahi hain, jin ke zahir honay par foraَ aankhon ke mualij se rabita karna chahiye peeli ankhen Umar  mein izafah honay par baaz afraad ki aankhon mein zardi mael bhoora rang jhlkne lagta hai, is liye ke un ki ghzaon mein phal aur sabzian kam aur chiknai ziyada hoti hai, ntijta un ke jismon mein chiknai jama honay lagti hai, jis se aankhon par تواثر nahi parta, Albata  jald ki zaroor mutasir hoti hai aur unhein yarqaan ho sakta hai aisi soorat mein kisi mualij se rujoo karna chahiye dhundli baseerat sooji hui ankhen Basarat  mein dhund laa pan aajana “motiyan band ki ibtidayi alamat bhi hosakti hai
is mein aankhon ke samnay saaye se nazar anay lagtay hain, jo jarrahi ke baad khatam ho jatay hain
agar usay be parwai se taall diya jaye to kala pani ho sakta hai aur aankhon ki benaye bhi khatam hosakti hai
: aisi aankhon mein soozish ya chubhan hoti hai ghaliban aisa حسا sit ki wajah se hota hai ya phir aankhon mein pani jama hojata hai, jo kharij nahi hopata نکھوں mein جھماکے yeh غدؤ درقیہ ke la-haq honay ki alamat bhi hai, jis mein gardan mein soojan peda hosakti hai
: jab aap zehni uljan aur tanao se dochar hotay hain to aankhon mein جھماکے peda honay shuru ho jatay hain
yeh بردہٴ chasham mein kharabi ki alamat hai
chana chay aisi koi kharabi peda hojaye to is ki taraf se be parwai nah brtie, balkay forun aankhon ke mualij ko dikhaeye dohri nazar nasha aawar adwiyah khanay se aap ko aik ke bajaye do dikhayi dainay lagtay hain is ke ilawa agar bachpan mein aankhon mein bhainga pan peda hojaye to is se bhi Basarat  mein aisa nuqs peda hojata hai, lekin yeh shikayat agar baad bhi peda hojaye to yeh aasabi nizaam ke akarr jaanay, faalij, rasoli ya kisi doosri bemari ka ishara ho sakta hai ghair wazeh Basarat  : Basarat  mein agar dhundlaa hatt peda hojaye to nazdeek ودور ki nigah kharab hojati hai ya aankhon mein nuqs ki wajah se ashkaal bigri hui nazar aati hain اگربصارت ghair wazeh ho to yeh is baat ki alamat hosakti hai
ke aap ke blood pressure mein izafah hogaya hai aap ke khoon mein shukar ki satah be qaboo horahee hai ya barhti Umar  ke sath aankh ke قرنیے ke safaid hissay mein bhi kharabi peda hogayi hai yeh bemari kisi ko bhi hosakti hai, lekin ”لیوٹن“ ke ضمیے khanay se bemari ki raftaar sust hojati hai
”لیوٹن“ aik sehat bakhash jazo hai, jo palaak, anday ki zardi, hewani charbi aur poudoon mein paaya jata hai aankhon mein dard aankhon mein chubhan ya surkhi computer ke samnay bohat der taq baithy rehne ki wajah se yeh shikayat پیداہوجاتی hai, lehaza kaam ke douran waqfa dena chahiye
: allergy ya تعدیے ki bana par ankhen surkh hosakti hain aur un mein aisi chubhan bhi peda hosakti hai, jaisay aankhon mein bareek rait ya kanker chalay gaye hon

paanch matchon ki series pehlay hi ganwa chuki autraliyai team nay﻿ chouthay match mein toss jeetnay ke baad pehlay batting karte hue muqarara 50 overs mein آرون فنچ ( 100 ) aur shaan marsh ( 101 ) ki snchryon ki badolat aath wicket par 310 run ka score banaya lekin England  nay﻿ 44. 4 اوورس mein chaar wicket par ہی314 runs bana kar match jeet liya aur series mein 4-0 ki bartari haasil karli
England  ki Australia  ke khilaaf aakhri no matchon mein yeh aathween jeet bhi hai jabkay baal tempering ke baad badnaam hui autraliyai team ne –apne aakhri 17 vnde mein sirf do hi muqablay jeetay hain
England  agar aakhri vnde bhi jeet jata hai to woh sab se pehlay Australia  ke khilaaf 5-0 ki clean swap ka karnaama injaam day ga
aakhri martaba 2012 mein is ne paanch matchon ki series 4-0 se jeeti thi jabkay aik match mansookh ہوہا tha
is match mein jeet ke sath England  nay﻿ vnde tareekh mein doosri baar sab se barray hadaf ka kamyaab taqub bhi kya hai
is se pehlay saal 2015 mein notnghm mein is ne newzea land ke khilaaf 350 run banaye thay

نزنی نوگورودو 22 June  ( siyasat dot com ) kroshya ny لاجوا bay muzahira karte hue dosray half mein teen gole banakar sabiq runner up argentina ko 3-0 se shikast dete hue group d se Fifa  foot baal ٹورنمنٹ ke naak out marhalay mein apna maqam mustahkam karliya hai نزنی نووگوروڈ stadium mein khailay gaye match mein kroshya ny ibtida hi se umdah khail paish kya jabkay argentina ki team shuru se hi mayoos nazar aayi jis ka hareef team ny bharpoor faida uthaya aik martaba phir argentina ki ibtidayi team prswalat uthae gaye jinhon ny یوونٹس ki numaindagi karne walay –apne nojawan star ڈیبالا ko dobarah team ka hissa nahi banaya hamesha ki terhan argentina ka difaa bilkul be Faiz  nazar aaya aur match ke pehlay half mein difai khilari ki ghalti se kroshya ko gole ka nadir mauqa mila lekin woh is se faida nah utha saki dono hi teamon ney pehlay half mein milnay walay mawaqay se faida nah uthaya jis ke sabab pehlay half ke ekhtataam taq muqaabla baghair kisi gole ke barabar raha dosray half ke 8 win minute mein argentina ke gole keeper ney zabardast ghalti ki aur woh gaind ko sahih tareeqay se kick karne mein nakaam rahay jis ke nateejay mein gaind qareeb hi mojood kroshya ke آنتے ریبک ke paas gayi aur unhon ne zordar shot se gaind ko gole ki raah dikha di argentina kroshya ke khilaaf 3-0 se shikast bardasht kya aur ice land ke khilaaf 1-0 se nigeria ke khilaaf barray farq se jeetna bhi kaafi nahi ho ga agar ice land nigeria ko shikast day deta hai to ice land ko dosray round mein jane ke liye kroshya ke khilaaf sirf match barabar karna kaafi ho ga kroshya 1998 ke baad pehli martaba dosray round mein pohanchi hai is se qabal kroshya ne 1998 mein pehli martaba world cupp khailtay hue quarter final mein Germany  ko bhi 3-0 se shikast di thi
195 mein چیکوسلوواکیا ke khilaaf 6-1 se shikast ke baad argentina ki yeh shikast sab se bad tareen hai doosri janib 1974 ke baad se is world cupp mein yeh pehli baar sun-hwa hai ke argentina –apne pehlay dono match jeetnay mein nakaam rahi hai agar aayis land ke khilaaf meese ney pnalti gavayi thi to Corshia  ke pehlay gole ke zimma daar poori terhan argentina ke gole keeper vali کیبلارو rahay jinhon ney apni zabardast bhool se رینتے روبوج ko gole karne ka mauqa diya back paas par baal vali ke paas aayi thi jis se woh aasani se hathon mein utha satke they lekin unhon ney paiir se short lagaya jo sahih nahi laga aur gaind thora agay kharray روبیچ ke paas pahonch gayi jinhon ne pehli koshish mein gaind ko gole mein pohancha diya vali ne –apne dono hathon se mnh چھپالیا kyunkay woh jantay thay ke woh barri ghti kar chukay hain bunyadi haqaaiq ilm najoom mein daira البروج ke 210 se 240 darjaat par mshml hissa, burj aqrab ( scorpio ) kehlata hai
fitri tarteeb ke lehaaz se yeh aathwan burj hai
Shams  taqreeban 24 october se 22 November  tak is burj mein gardish karta hai
ilm najoom mein usay nasli irtiqa, takhleeqi salahiyat aur shrakti mafadaat se mansoob kya gaya hai
aabi tikon ( سرطان, aqrab aur haut ) ka yeh dosra burj hai aur apni mahiat mein Sabaat  o ٹھہراؤ rakhta hai
yeh la shaori tour par sufi, arif aur rohaniyat se jabkay shaori to rapar tehqeeq, tafteesh aur chhaan bain se wabasta hai
daira البروج mein allamti nishaan bichhoo, Ansar  pani, jins مؤنث aur haakim sayarah mareekh aur پلوٹوہیں
Shah  rukh Khan  Shah  rukh Khan  1965 hamza mein mah َّ November  ki doosri tareekh ko peda hue, is liye un ka burj aqrab hai
zaati aur pesha warana zindagi mein buland maqam par pounchanay ke liye un ki jad-o-jehad, مقصدکے sath sachaai aur khud itmadi, yeh woh khususiyaat hain jo unhein –apne haakim sayyaron mareekh aur پلوٹو se mili hain
yeh khususiyaat ka woh nayaab milaap hai, jin ki badolat aqrab afraad namumkin ko mumkin aur na qabil taskheer ko bhi fatah kar lete hain
aik sachey aqrab ki terhan Shah  rukh Khan  –apne khandan, biwi gori aur teen bachon se intehai mukhlis hain aur un ke liye koi bhi qurbani day satke hain
ہرچندکہ Shah  rukh Khan  kisi filmi khandan se talluq nahi rakhtay, taham unhon nay﻿ –apne liye filmi hero ban'nay ka aik ghirrwayti khawab dekha aur apni khudadad salahiyaton, nah khatam honay wali tawanai aur anthak mehnat ke zariye usay shandaar tareen andaaz mein sharminda tabeer bhi kya
umomi khususiyaat tanqeed jin ka kuch nah bigaar sakay aur tareef jin ko nah chala sakay, aisay logon ka burj aqrab se talluq hota hai
inhen is baat ki qatee zaroorat nahi hoti ke log inhen un ki achaiyaan ya buraiyaan batayen
aqrab ke haamil afraad ke andar kuch bhi chal raha ho magar is ke asraat un ke chehray par kabhi dikhayi nahi den ge
aqrab burj walon ki artkaz karne ki taaqat dosray tamam logon se ziyada hoti hai
yeh log jab kisi baat ka faisla kar len to phir duniya ki koi taaqat un ko is se nahi hata sakti
un ki shakhsiyat jazbaat aur zimma daari ka Hussain  imtezaaj hoti hai
burj aqrab ke haamil logon ki sohbat se kabhi koi shakhs bore nahi ho sakta kyunkay un ki shakhsiyat har fard ko apni janib khainchti hai aur phir daur nahi jaanay deti
burj aqrab ke haamil log intahaa darjay ke wafadar hotay hain
woh agar aik baar kisi se sath nibhanay ka wada kar len to kabhi is waday se peechay nahi htte
aishwarya raye bachchan Sabiqa  miss world, bollywood ki sfِ avol ki adakara aur bachchan khandan ki baho aishwarya raye bachchan yakam November  1973 hamza ko Bharti  riyasat کرناٹکہ ke شہربنگلورو mein peda huien
1994 hamza mein 21 saal ki Umar  mein woh Bharat  ke liye miss world ka aalmi muqaabla jeet kar shohrat ki bulandio پرپہنچیں
maani runtum ki tamil فلمiruvar se –apne career ka aaghaz karne wali Aishwariya  nay﻿ bollywood mein qadam 1997 hamza mein film' ' aur pyar hogaya' ' se rakha taham bollywood mein inhen barri kamyabi film' hum dil day chuke sanam' se mili, isi saal aishwarya ki aik aur film' taal' bhi release hui
do barri filmo ki yakke baad deegray kamyabi aur un ke mazboot krdaron mein zabardast adakari ka muzahira karne ke بعدایشوریہ raye bollywood ki barri اداکاراؤں mein jagah bananay mein kamyaab hogyin
Aishwariya  raye 2007 hamza mein bollywood ke لیجنڈری adakar Amitabh  bachchan ke اداکاربیٹے abhishek bachchan ke sath shadi ke bandhan mein bndh gayeen اورنومبر 2011 hamza mein aik beti ارادھیا ki maa banin
share karen : London  : Bartanwi  jareeday ki janib se tayyar ki gayi fehrist mein Mahera  Khan  asia ki chothi pur kashish khatoon qarar, asia ki 50 purkashish khawateen mein Mahera  Khan  ka list mein choutha number hai
hatmi fehrist jummay ko jari ki jaayegi
asia ki pachaas par kashish khawateen ki fehrist jari, Mahera  Khan  apni position barqarar rakhnay mein kamyaab rahen
hafta waar showbiz magazine" aystrn aayi" saal 2018 hamza ki fehrist mein musalsal chothi baar Pakistani  adakara Mahera  Khan  chouthay number par hain jabkay aik aur Pakistani  adakara" sanam Saeed " ka fehrist mein uneswaan number hai
asia ki pur kashish khawateen mein pehla number Bharti  adakara دپیکا پاڈوکون ka hai
dosray aur teesray number par bal tarteeb pryanka chopra aur naya sharmaa Barajman  hain jabkay panchawan number شیوانجی joshi ka aata hai
Mahera  Khan  ke liye yeh saal qabil zikar kamyabion ke sath ekhtataam Pazeer  ho raha hai, jis mein unhon ney koi drama ya film to nahi ki, taham TV ishtiharaat ki badolat sab ki tavajja ka markaz rahen aur flahi kamon mein bhi paish paish rahen
is fehrist mein Pakistan  se sanam Saeed  19 win, ارمینا Khan  24 win, mehwish hayaat 40 win jab ke iqra Aziz  46 win number par mojood hain
yeh jareeda har saal asia se talluq rakhnay walay dilkash afraad khasosan showbiz stars ki fehrist shaya karta hai
urdu ki Maroof  novel nigaar, Adiba  aur afsana nawees Altaf  fatima 91 baras ki Umar  mein intqaal kar gayeen
Altaf  fatima Lahore  mein muqeem theen aur taweel arsay se aleel theen
woh Bharti  riyasat utar pardesh ke dar-al-hakoomat lkhno mein 1927 hamza ko peda huien
taqseem hind ke baad un ka khandan Lahore  aa kar abad ho gaya tha
lkhno ki tehzibi riwayaat ka asar Altaf  fatima ki shakhsiyat par numaya tha
unhon ne جامعۂ Punjab  se urdu adab mein am ae kya tha jis ke baad woh islamia college baraye khawateen Lahore  mein urdu ki ustaad muqarrar huien
Altaf  fatima ne bohat se novel aur afsaanay likhay
un ka pehla afsana 1962 hamza mein shaya sun-hwa
un ke mashhoor navlon mein nshanِ mahfil, ankboot, jab dewarain giryaa karti hain, dastak nah do shaamil hain
Altaf  fatima nay﻿ 1971 hamza mein pak Bharat  jung ke baad mashriqi Pakistan  ki alehadgi par bhi aik novel' chalta musafir' tehreer kya tha
Altaf  fatima ke intqaal ko malik ke adbi halqon ne aik bara aur na qabil talaafi nuqsaan qarar diya hai
mumtaz shayar aur Adeeb  amjad islam amjad ny Altaf  fatima ki wafaat par wise of America  se baat karte hue kaha ke un ke navlon ny novel nigari mein aik nai jahat peda ki thi aur un ka novel' dastak nah do' apni ashaat ke waqt itna maqbool sun-hwa tha ke Pakistan  tally vision ny usay dramayi shakal di thi
Maroof  qanoon daan aur allama Iqbal  ki baho justice retired Nasra  Javed  Iqbal  bhi Altaf  fatima ki wafaat par gham zada hain
wise of America  se baat karte hue unhon ne kaha ke Altaf  fatima ki adbi khidmaat lambay arsay taq yaad rakhi jayen gi
Nasra  Javed  ka kehna tha ke inhen kitaaben aur khaas tor par novel parhnay ka shoq Altaf  fatima ke novel se hi sun-hwa tha
Islamabad Pakistan  mein ziyada tar bankon ka data ﮦlak kar liya gaya hai jo beron malik se ﮦlak kya gaya niji news se khusoosi guftagu karte hue wifaqi tehqiqati agency f aayi ae ke director cyber crimes wing captain ( ray ) Shoiab  ney bataya ke Pakistan  ke ziyada tar bankon ka data beron malik se ﮦlak kar liya gaya hai guzashta haftay aik bank ki Website ﮦlak hui thi unhon ney kaha ke hamein bankon ney is barey mein report nahi kya hum khud tajzia karte hain hum ney crime data dekha hai jis se Pakistan  ke barray bankon ke data ki hikng ka pata chala aur isi wajah se sarfeen ki janib se data chori honay ki shikayaat aa rahi hain director f aayi ae ka kehna tha ke is hawalay se tamam bankon ko khat likh diya hai aur bankon ke numaindon ka ijlaas bhi bulaa rahay hain jab ke 100 se zayed muqadmaat darj karkay kayi grftaryan bhi ki hain captain ( ray ) Shoiab  ne mazeed kaha ke hikng ke hawalay se karwai ka aaghaz kardiya hai aur beron mumalik se bhi rabita kar rahay hain director f aayi ae ka kehna tha keh bank awam ke paison ki hifazat ke zimma daar hain agar bankon ke security features kamzor hon ge to is ki zimma daari bankon par aed hoti hai captain ( ray ) Shoiab  ney bataya ke bhais badal kar awam ko be waqoof bananay walay giroh ko bhi girftar karliya hai yaad rahay ke 28 october ko Pakistan  ke aik bank ke online nizaam par cyber hamla sun-hwa hikrz bank ke security system mein ghse aur kuch ٹرانزیکشنز bhi kee lekin is waqt taq bank ka amlah chokanna hochuka tha amlay ney pehlay apna system aalmi nizaam se d link kya aur baad mein un ٹرانزیکشنز ko rivers professor george duniya ke aisay mumtaz tareen maahir hain jinhein dimaghi naqsha saaz kaha ja sakta hai woh dimaghi atls bananay mein bain al aqwami shohrat rakhtay hain aur duniya bhar ke dimaghi کارٹوگرافر un ka ehtram karte hain professor george is waqt نیوروسائنس reserch Australia  mein kaam karte hain aur ab dimaghi aks nigari ki behtareen تکینک ki badolat unhon ny yeh dimaghi gosha daryaft kya hai agarchay اینڈوریسٹائی forum nyokliys ka durust kirdaar ab taq posheeda hai lekin yeh jis maqam par waqay hai wahan dimagh aur haraam maghaz mlitay hain yeh hissa ensaan ke haath peeron ki hassas tareen harkaat vsknat yani soi mein dhaga daalnay se le kar mutawazan honay bethnay ke andaaz aur jismani چلت پھرت ko control karta hai isi bana par george پیکسی nows kehte hain ke naya uzoo insani harkaat aur mukhtalif qabliton mein ahem kirdaar ada karta hai taham unhon nay﻿ is par mazeed tahaqeeq ki zaroorat par zor diya hai chain ke saddar she jin png nay﻿ mangal ke roz chain ki manndi ko azad bananay ke amal ke chalees saal mukammal honay ke moqay par khitaab karte hue islahat par amal daraamad ke azm ka izhaar kya
taham unhon nay﻿ un khusoosi iqdamaat ka zikar nahi kya jin ka shiddat se intzaar kya ja raha tha
saddar she neh apni taweel taqreer mein sarkari maeeshat ki himayat ke sath sath niji shobay ki numoo par bhi baat ki
unhon ne kaha ke chain apni mandiyon ko mazeed azad karne ki koshisho ko wusat dainay ka amal jari rakhay ga, aur bunyadi islahat ke nifaz ko yakeeni banaye ga

chalees saal qabal chain ke leader aanjhani daing ژاؤ png nay﻿ islahat aur azad manndi ki muhim chalaye thi
aur isi ki wajah se chain nay﻿ shandaar sanati taraqqi ki aur ab yeh duniya ki doosri barri maeeshat ban chuka hai
is moqay par khitaab karte hue saddar she ne kaha ke naye imkanaat ke khilnay se taraqqi hoti hai jabkay khud ko muqeed rakhnay se pasmandagi peda hoti hai
saddar she ne communist party ke kirdaar par baat karte hue kaha ke islahat aur khulay pan ka har iqdaam aassan nahi hai
mustaqbil mein hamein har qisam ke khatraat aur challengon ka saamna ho ga, yahan tak ke hamein naqabil tasawwur aur hungama خیزطوفانوں ka saamna bhi ho sakta hai
saddar she ka khitaab aik aisay waqt mein samnay aaya hai, jab islahat aur ghair mulki companiyon ko manndi taq rasai dainay ke liye dabao barhta ja raha hai, doosri taraf chain aur America  ke darmain talkh tijarti jung se chain ki maeeshat par manfi asraat muratab ho rahay hain
America  ke sath is ke tanaza ka aik sabab yeh hai ke chain –apne sarkari shobay ke tehat qaim taizi se barhti hui sanati sar garmion ki himayat karta hai
tijarti jung ne chain ki chand karobari shaksiaat, sarkari musheeron aur think tinkon ki janib se muashi islahat mein taizi laane aur niji shobay ko mazeed azad karne ke mutalbe mein izafah kya gaya hai
saddar she aur saddar Donald  trmp ne is mah nawway din taq tijarti jung bandi par ittafaq kya hai, jis se dono janib se aik dosray ki masnoaat par mazeed tax laganay ka amal ruk gaya hai, is douran fariqain ke darmain mazakraat jari rahen ge

Lahore  ( web disk ) junaid jamsheed — Pakistan  ki woh Maroof  shakhsiyat, jinhon nay﻿ –apne career ka aaghaz kya to golokaari se tha lekin baad azan mazhab ki janib barhatay hue rujhan ke baais apni zindagi islam ke liye waqf kar di
unhon nay﻿ –apne golokaari ke career mein woh shohrat aur maqboliat haasil ki, jo bohat hi kam logon ke naseeb mein aati hai, Pakistan  ke behtareen pop signer honay ke bawajood unhon nay﻿ golokaari aur moseeqi ke career ko khirbad keh diya
taham unhon ny apni aawaz ko hamesha logon ke dilon mein apni naton ke zariye zindah rakha, Chitral  se Islamabad jany wali pi aayi ae ki parwaaz pi ke -661 ke hoylyan ke qareeb gir kar tabah sun-hwa, jis mein junaid jamsheed bhi sawaar apni ahliya ke hamrah sawaar they
junaid jamshed ki khobsorat naton ki wajah se duniya bhar mein un ke madah inhen hamesha yaad rakhain ge
junaid jamshed bohat se logon ke liye aik mutasir kin shakhsiyat thay, unhon nay﻿ naton ke sath sath kayi deeni programme aur events mein bhi shirkat ki, apni zindagi ke aakhri safar mein bhi woh islam ki tableegh par mojood thay
Lahore  ( klchrl reporter ) asian ayksi lense performance awards ki silver jubilee ke silsilay mein Islamabad mein PNSi ae آدیٹوریم mein taqreeb munaqqid hogi jis mein Lahore  se mukhtalif shoba jaat ke afraad وشخصیات ke ilawa fankar vn ki kaseer tadaad shareek hogi is baat ka elaan asian klchrl association of Pakistan  ke secretary general syed Sohail  bukhari ney kya hai unhon ney bataya ke ایوارڈزکمیٹی ney shoba business se chohadry aurang Zaib  cheif ایگزیکٹوالکبیر tayon ko award baraye best tayon پلانرکیلئے naamzad kya hai Facebook ney guzashta haftay apni news fid mein sab se barri tabdeeli ka elaan karte hue kaha tha ke ab is mein ishtiharaat aur khabron ke muqablay aam logon ki postin ziyada nazar ayen gi
taham Facebook ke is elaan ke mehez 5? din baad yeh khabar samnay aayi ke is tabdeeli se social media par jhooti khabrain taizi se aur ziyada phelnay ka imkaan hai
Amrici  media mein shaya reports ke mutabiq news fade mein tabdeeli hotay hi chand mumalik mein jaali khabrain taizi se phail rahi hain
Amrici  akhbar New York times ne khabar di thi ke jin mumalik mein نیوزفیڈ mein tabdeelion ka tajurbah kya ja raha hai, wahan jaali khabrain poori service mein jungle ki aag ki terhan phail chuki hain
yeh bhi parhain : Facebook news fid tabdeel karne ka elaan taham ab Facebook ke baani mark زکربرگ nay﻿ is hawalay se ahem tabdeeli ka elaan kardiya
mark زکربرگ ne apni Facebook post mein bataya ke news fid mein tabdeeli ke dosray marhalay mein Facebook par aik surway kya jaye ga, jis mein sarfeen se un ki pasand se mutaliq tajweez haasil ki jaye gi
unhon ne kaha ke woh Facebook par aik surway ke zariye logon se yeh jan-nay ki koshish karen ge ke sarfeen kis terhan ka mawaad ya khabrain dekhnaa aur parhna pasand karte hain
unhon nay﻿ is azm ka bhi izhaar kya ke Facebook par achi aur mayaari maloomat, khabron aur poston ko tarjeeh di jaye gi
mark زکربرگ ny yeh bhi bataya ke news fid mein tabdeeli ke baad ab sarfeen ko wahan par sirf 4 feesad khabrain dekhnay ko milein gi, jo is se qabal 5 feesad hoti theen
mark زکربرگ ka apni lambi chorrie post mein kehna tha ke Facebook is surway mein sarfeen se aisay sawalaat kere ga ke woh kis terhan ke zaraye se milnay walay mawaad ya khabron ko tarjeeh dete hain
unhon naay tasleem kya ke agarchay yeh surway kuch mushkil hoga, taham is ke zariye Facebook ko yeh faisla karne mein aasani hogi ke un ke sarfeen kis terhan ki khabrain daikhna chahtay hain, jis ke baad hi woh logon ki pasand ke mutabiq mawaad ko tarjeeh den ge
yeh bhi parheen : news feed mein tabdeeli se jaali khabrain phelnay ka imkaan khayaal rahay ke mutadid media reports ke mutabiq news feed mein tabdeeli se sab se ziyada nuqsaan media, tsh_hiri o karobari idaron ko hoga, kyun ke un ki khabrain aur ishtiharaat ko news feed mein kam jagah di jaye gi, taham is se Facebook ko bhi maali nuqsaan uthana parre ga
aik report ke mutabiq Facebook news fid mein tabdeeli se Facebook ko fori tor par kam se kam 23 arab dollars ( Pakistani  23 kharab rupay se zayed ) ka nuqsaan hoga, jo ussay shiyrz ki qader mein kami ki soorat mein ada karna parre ga
iss faislay se mark زکربرگ ke zaati asason mein bhi 3 arab 30 crore Amrici  dollars ( Pakistani  3 kharab 30 arab rupay se zayed ) ki kami hojaye gi
reports ke mutabiq mark زکربرگ ki janib se news feed mein tabdeeli ke elaan ke foran baad Facebook ke shiyrz ki qader mein 4 feesad ki kami dekhi gayi, lekin inn ibtidayi reports ko dekhnay ke baad sawal yeh hai ke kya waqai iss faislay se sirf Facebook ko nuqsaan hoga, aur yeh nuqsaan kya iss se dugna bhi ho sakta hai? moscow 26 May  ( siyasat dot com ) Fifa  ney aindah mah roos mein honay walay football world cupp 2018 ka official gana lِo att up jari kardiya jisay Maroof  fankaron will asmth niki james aur Aira  استریفی ney gaaya hai football ki aalmi governing body Fifa ne aalmi event ke aaghaz se 20 din qabal gana jari kya jisay ab taq 20 laakh se zayed martaba dekha aur suna ja chuka hai Fifa  ki janib se gana ganay walon tenu fankaron ko 15 July  ko moscow mein honay walay final mein madoo kar ke muzahira karwaye jany ka quwwat imkaan hai naamwar ریاپ fankar will asmth ne kaha ke Fifa  world cupp mein muzahira ki dawat milna aizaz ki baat hai yeh aalmi event duniya bhar ke awam ko aik jagah jama karta hai taakay woh khush hon jashnn manayeen aur karishmati lamhaat se lutaf andoz hon aur is ganay ke zariye hum yeh pegham dena chahtay hain ke hum duniya ko naachtay hue daikhna chahtay hain world cupp ke official ganay aur miskot ka silsila 1966 world cupp se jari hai aur is ke baad se har world cupp ke liye ganay aur miskot ko khusoosi tor par jari kya jata hai is ganay ki release se qabal hi shaiqeen ke darmain mobahisa shuru ho gaya tha ke aaya yeh gana sabiq world cupp ke ganoon ke muqablon mein kamyaab ho sakay ga ya nahi
201 mein Jareh  kya gaya gana waka waka naamwar gulukar شکیرا ney gaaya tha aur yeh gana aaj bhi logon mein yaksaa maqbool hai taham is ke muqablay mein Jennifer  lopiz ki janib se gaaya gaya 2014 world cupp ka gana v are one ( hum aik hain ) ziyada maqboliat haasil karne mein nakaam raha tha chain mein Apple  app stor sameit deegar app stores se سکائپ cal aur messgae service ko hata diya gaya hai
Apple  ka kehna hai ke is ki kayi doosri ایپس mein se aik ko hukoomat ki janib se yeh keh kar hata diya gaya hai ke yeh muqami qanoon se mutabqat nahi rakhtin
سکائپ ki maalik company مائیکرو soft ney bi bi si ko bataya ke is app ko' earzi tor par hataya gaya hai' aur company' jald از jald app ko bahaal karne ke liye kaam kar rahi hai
' chain mein yeh app ab اینڈروئڈ app stor par bhi dastyab nahi hai
zaraye ablaagh ki reporton ke mutabiq october mein hi سکائپ ki service mein khalaal parna shuru ho gaya tha
Apple  ne –apne aik bayan mein kaha hai :' hamein awaami tahaffuz ki wizarat ne mutala kya hai ke wise over internet protocol ایپس muqami qanoon ke mutabiq nahi hain
'' is liye yeh ایپس chain ke app stor se hata di gayi hain
' مائیکرو soft ke aik tarjuman ka kehna hai :' chain mein سکائپ ke aayi o s version ko earzi tor par hata diya gaya hai
hum سکائپ ke paish kardah fawaid ke baaray mein pur josh hain jo woh duniya bhar mein sarfeen ko muwasilat ki sahoolat aur taawun ko farogh dainay ke liye faraham karta hai
' yeh bhi padhiye chain : Apple  ney New York times ki app ko hata liya cheeni company ko aayi phone ka naam istemaal karne ki ijazat chain : baaes jaali Apple  stores ka suraagh company ney is barey mein tabsarah karne se inkaar kar diya ke سکائپ app ko pehli baar kab hataya gaya ya اینڈروئڈ ki kya soorat e haal hai
chain mein bi bi si ke amlay ke tajarbaat mein samnay aaya ke budh se Apple  aur اینڈروئڈ app stor par سکائپ down load karne ki sahoolat dastyab nahi hai
chain ke app stor se apni ایپس nikaalte ke baad Apple  par tanqeed ka silsila jari hai
July  mein ایپس bananay walon neh is baat ko mustard kar diya ke Apple  neh 60 se zayed vrchoyl private net works ( v pi an ) ko khatam kar diya tha jo chain ki internet fayrwal se mutsadam theen aur chain ke qawaid o zawabit ke mutabiq' qanooni tor par unhein khatam karna laazmi tha
' mangal ko Apple  nay﻿ inkishaaf kya tha ke chain ki hukoomat ki darkhwast par is saal 674 v pi an ایپس ko hataya gaya
do Amrici  senetors ko likhay gaye aik khat mein company ka kehna tha ke usay baaz v pi an ایپس ko hataane ka' hukum' diya gaya hai hatta ke is mein' darkhwast ki qanooni hesiyat par bhi sawal kya gaya hai
' Apple  ke mutabiq usay bataya gaya hai ke v pi an operators nay﻿ chain ke cyber security qawaneen ki khilaaf warzi ki hai
chain mein un qawaneen ko hukoomat mukhalif jazbaat aur raye aama ko control karne ki koshisho ke hissay ke tor par dekha jata hai aur chain mein –apne sarfeen ki tadaad badhaane ki koshisho mein masroof ghair mulki companiyon ney is par tashweesh ka izhaar kya hai
nama nigaron ka kehna hai ke chain ki firewall ke bahar se down load ki gayi سکائپ app pay hassas mozuaat par behas ko chain ki reyasti security ki janib se name mehfooz tasawwur kya jata hai
سکائپ par pabandi, ghair mulki digital aur internet plate forms ki haliya kari hai, taham is se qabal alphabet Google , Facebook  aur twitter bhi cheeni sarfeen ke liye dastyab nahi rahay thay
London  ( monitoring disk ) wazan kam karna jaan jokhon ka kaam hai lekin ab science danon ny aik aisa heran kin tareeqa bta diya hai jis par amal karkay aap baghair werzish kiye motapay mein khaterkhah kami kar satke hain daily star ke mutabiq yeh aassan tareen tareeqa masala chaye ka istemaal hai an si bi aayi ke science danon ny jadeed tahaqeeq mein bataya hai ke masala chaye mein paye janay walay ajzaa jism se charbi ko zael karte hain jo log rozana aik cupp masala chaye peetay hain un ke jism mein ghair zaruri charbi jama nahi hoti science danon ny is tahaqeeq mein motapay ke shikaar teen darjan logon ko do groupon mein taqseem kya aik group ko werzish karne ko kaha gaya aur dosray group ko rozana aik cupp masala chaye peenay ko kaha gaya teen mah baad jab un ki kamar dobarah naapi gayi to heran kin tor par chaye peenay walay afraad ki kamar 2 centi meter se zayed kam ho chuki thi werzish karne walon mein bhi charbi ghatney ki sharah lag bhag yahi thi nataij mein science danon ny kaha ke agar aap apni khoraak ko mutanasib rakhen to yeh chaye behtareen nataij day sakti hai taham unhon ny logon ko nasiyaat ki ke chaye ka istemaal aitdaal mein rehtay hue karen سٹٹگارٹ ( urdu pointe اخبارتازہ tareen 03 decemeber 2018 hamza ) Germany  ki motor saaz company ڈیملر naay aindah saal se chain mein electric karen bananay ka elaan kya hai ڈیملر ke chain ke hawalay se shobay ke sarbarah ہوبرٹس ٹروسکا naay bataya ke company aindah saal 2019 ke aakhir taq chain mein barqi qowat se chalne wali mahol dost ای gariyon ki baqaida pedawar shuru kar day gi jin mein mercedez benz ای que si model bhi shaamil hai unhon naay kaha ke chain mein un ki riwayati mercedez benz me beech model ki talabb behtareen ja rahi hai yeh model har mah 600 ki tadaad mein khareeda ja raha hai web disk : Dubai  police ne to madadgaar robot tayyar bhi karliya jo sab ki madad kere ga
Dubai  mein pehlay hi juraim bohat kam hotay hain kyunkay Dubai  ki police mujrimon ki soch se bhi taiz aur hmsh_h agay rehti hai, Dubai  ki police squad ke paas faraari aur لیمبورگینی jaisi duniya ki mehngi aur taiz tareen gariyaan bhi hain
ab hollywood style' روبوکوپ' Dubai  police ka hissa ban'nay jarahay hain, yeh روبوکوپ fi al haal Dubai  ke shopping maal mein sab ki madad kere ga
Dubai  police ke mutabiq 2030 tak Dubai  police ka 25 feesad amlah unhi robot police ehalkaron par mushtamil hoga, woh waqt daur nahi, jab robot police wala asal action bhi dukhaay ga, hthkrhyan lagaye ga aur mujrimon ko pakar kar qanoon ki girift mein laaye ga
face sabiq Amrici  jimnastik ke dr laree Nasar  ko nojawan larkiyon ka tibbi muanay ke naam par jinsi zayad-ti ka nishana bananay ke jurm mein 40 se 175 saal qaid ki saza suna di gayi
judge roz meri ny 150 se zayed mutasireen ki shikayaat par hafta bhar se zayed chalne wali samaat ke douran faisla sanate hue laree Nasar  se kaha ke' mein ny tumahari mout ke warrant par dastakhat kardiye hain '
mazeed padhan : Pakistan  mein wraps culture unhon naay 54 sala mujrim se kaha ke' tum kabhi bhi jail ke bahar chalne ke haqdaar nahi thay '
saza sunaye jaane se kuch hi lamhoon qabal laree Nasar  ne adalat mein tamam mutasirah afraad se maffi mangi jin mein olympic mein gold medal haasil karne wali saymn bills, ale ریزمین, gibe ڈوگلاس aur mk کائلا مرونی bhi shaamil theen
saza panay walay laree Nasar  ka adalat mein mutasireen ko mukhatib karte hue kehna tha ke' mein jo abhi mehsoos kar raha hon woh un tamam afraad ke dard, jazbaat ke agay madham par jata hai '
un ka kehna tha ke mein kis qader moazrat khuwa hon koi alfaaz aisay nahi jo usay bayan kar saken
jab adalat ne sunai to laree Nasar  ro parre
khayaal rahay ke 150 se zayed khawateen aur larkiyon ne do dahaiyo qabal laree Nasar  ko serial tashadud ka nishana bananay ka ilzaam lagaya tha
yeh bhi parheen : wraps ke shikaar bachay adalat mein apna bayan qalamband karanay wali aakhri khatoon rachil ڈینولینڈر theen jinhon ney Nasar  par pehli martaba zayad-ti karne ka ilzaam awaami tor par lagaya tha aur un ke khilaaf police report bhi darj karai thi
unhon ney judge se ziyada se ziyada saza sunanay ki darkhwast karte hue adalat mein sawal kya ke aik chhoote bachi ki kya qeemat hogi
unhon naay mazeed kaha ke un ke sath zayad-ti 15 saal ki Umar  mein ki gayi thi aur jahan un ke sath zayad-ti ki gayi is kamray mein un ki walida bhi mojood theen lekin woh be khabar theen ke ho kya raha hai

ney kaha hai ke Pakistan  ki mojooda iqtisadi haalat ki zimma daari aik hawalay se chain se liye hue qarzon par bhi hai
unhon ney jumaraat ko apni aik press breifing mein kaha ke' mere khayaal mein Pakistan  jis sorat e haal mein hai is ki aik wajah chain se liya sun-hwa qarza hai aur is qarzay ke hawalay se Pakistani  hukoomaton ka khayaal ho ga ke is se niklana itna mushkil nahi ho ga lekin yeh mushkil ho gaya hai
' yeh bhi prhhiye' Pakistan  jin halaat mein hai is ki wajah cheeni qarza hai' paneer hi Pakistan  ko aayi am f se bacha sakta hai? maliyati bohraan : hukoomat ka aayi am f ke paas jaaney ka faisla to kya waqai Pakistan  ki mojooda haalat ke zimma daar cheeni qarzay hain? is hawalay se bi bi si urdu dot com ny iqtisadiat ke maahir aur skalr Majeed  Sheikh  aur national bank of Pakistan  ke sabiq saddar aur cheif aygzikityo officer Saeed  islahi se baat ki aur janna chaha ke Amrici  daaway mein kitni sadaqat hai
Majeed  Sheikh , iqtisadi umoor ke maahir aur skalr' aayi am f mein 25 feesad share America  ka hai is liye har kaam mein un ka bara amal dakhal hota hai
is mein Pakistan  ka bhi hissa do aashariya paanch feesad hai
is liye aisi koi baat nahi ke yeh koi Amrici  idaara hai aur woh jo chahay kere
yeh aik bain al aqwami idaara hai
' aayi am f ki sood ki sharah ya rate of interest bohat kam hota hai, taqreeban aik feesad
woh qarzon ki wapsi mein ziyada se ziyada chaar saal tak ki chhuut dete hain
is ke ilawa mukhtalif soorat e haal ko dekhte hue un ka qarzon ki wapsi ka arsa bhi bohat lamba hota hai jo ke das se bees saal taq hota hai
is ke bar aks cheeni qarzay saarhay chaar feesad se 8 feesad tak jatay hain
un mein sirf aik saal ki chhuut hoti hai aur qarzon ki adaigi ka arsa bohat kam hota hai
isi liye cheeni qarza bohat mehanga parta hai

is liye America  ki bator aayi am f ke major شییر holdr soch bilkul durust hai ke woh qarza achi terhan soch samajh kar den ge
' America  Pakistan  ki darkhwast radd nahi kar sakta lekin woh usay dekhe ga zaroor
woh sharait rakh den ge maslan tax akhatta karne ko behtar banaao kyunkay duniya mein sab se kam' tax کولیکشن' Pakistanio  ki hai, money laundering ko roko, current account ke khasaray mein behtari laoo, aisay iqdamaat karo jis se baraamdaat barhain
' hamein apni baraamdaat brhhani parrin gi, jo cheezian hum daraamad karte hain un ko malik mein banana parre ga, ذراعت mein inqalabi tabdeelian lana parrin gi, shiddat pasand anasir se durust tareeqay se nimatna ho ga, corruption kam karna parre gi, sirf goood gornns se hi sab theek ho ga aur yeh mumkin hai
' Saeed  islahi, sabiq saddar national bank of Pakistan ' America  Pakistan  ka qarza nahi rkwaye ga nah hi is ki yeh khwahish hai
lekin asal masla hai woh qarzay jo Pakistan  ne chain se liye hue hain
woh bohat barri sharah sood ya high rate par liye gay hain
aur un ki izafi فائنانسنگ bhi bohat ziyada hai shayad sarhay 8 feesad ke qareeb
ab America  ka nuqta nazar yeh hai ke itnay bhaari qarzon aur itnay ziyada rate ke sath Pakistan  ki' dibt srosng' ya qarzon aur sood ada karne ki salahiyat par farq parta hai

un se baat karen ke yeh qarzay bohat mehangay hain un ka rate kam kya jaye taakay hamari karzzzz ada karne ki salahiyat behtar ho sakay
is liye yeh kaha ja sakta hai ke America  ka jo aitraaz hai is mein bara wazan hai
' dekhen Pakistan  ka jo is waqt date level ya karzzzz ki satah hai woh koi itni ziyada nahi hai
hamara date level 75 aur 70 ki range mein hai
kayi mulkon ka jis mein pasmandah mumalik bhi shaamil hain un ka date rate bohat ziyada hai
lekin hamari qarzay ko service ya ada karne ki salahiyat bohat kam hai
is ki wajah yeh hai ke hamari baraamdaat nahi barh rahen aur hum ne is ki taraf tawajah bhi nahi di aur mehangay qarzay liye
hamara tht level yunan ke muqablay mein bohat kam hai un ka taqreeban 300 feesad tha
is ki sab se barri misaal Japan  hai jis ka date level taqreeban 250% ke qareeb hai
masla ziyada qarzon ka nahi unhein ada karne ki salahiyat ka hai
' aayi am f ka qarza bunyadi tor par balance of payment ( adaigi ke tawazun ) ke liye hota hai
balance of payment ki mushkilaat is waqt hi daur hon gi jab hamari baraamdaat barheen gi aur hamari qarzon ki adaigi ki salahiyat mein behtari aaye gi
jo abhi nahi ho raha
' jaan boojh kar apni' qiq bacchus' ke liye kharab qarzay liye gaye hain
agar hamari baraamdaat barhti rahen aur hamari mndyon mein muqablay ki salahiyat behtar ho jaye to hum usay karzzzz ko' manage' kar satke hain

Holland  ( web disk ) ab sirf jald par roshni daal kar diabities aur dil ke amraaz ki shanakht karna mumkin hoga mahireen ne is zimn mein herat angaiz technology waza karli mahireen ki waza kardah is technology ke tehat sugar aur dil ke amraaz ki bar waqat kam kharch aur durust shanakht mein madad miley gi aur yeh tareeqa istemaal mein bhi bohat aassan hai is ka saada usool yeh hai ke khoon mein tertey hue glucose aur deegar mayaat jald mein mojood protein aur deegar bafton ( tissues ) se kisi gond ki terhan chipak jatay hain jald par roshni daal kar un ka muaina karkay mareez ko diabities aur deegar bimarion se khabardaar kya ja sakta hai Holland  ki university of گروننجن ke professor bros وولفن بیوٹل aur in ke sathiyon ny kaha hai ke jald aur ragon ke atraaf jama honay walay un protein ko tibbi zabaan mein گلائسیشن and pradkts ya ae jee ای kaha jata hai yeh jism mein jama hokar tissues aur khoon ki nalion ki dewaron ko sakht kardete hain aur high blood pressure ki wajah bhi bantay hain barhti hui Umar  ke sath sath hamaray jism ke tissues mein ae jee ای jama hotay rehtay hain lekin diabities ke mareezon mein un ke jama honay ki raftaar barh jati hai aur phir sugar ke marz ka ibtidayi maqam ajata hai is terhan bar waqat intizamaa ke baad marz ko bherne se roka ja sakta hai aur jald mein munakis honay wali roshni se un ka pata lagaya ja sakta hai mahireen ke mutabiq jald mein ae jee ای ki satah maloom ki ja sakti hai kyunkay ae jee protein deegar ke muqablay mein rang barangi aur damaknay wali ( فلورسینٹ ) roshiniyon ko khaas andaaz mein munakis karte hain usay napnay ke liye Holland  ki aik company ney aik dasti aala banaya hai jisay ae jee ای reader ka naam diya gaya hai yeh aala jald ke andar roshni phenketa hai aur wapas anay wali roshni ko dekh kar ae jee ای ki miqdaar se aagah karta hai khudkushi karne walay bachon naay khandani masail mustaqbil ki fikar aur shool mein harasan kiye jaanay ki shikayat ki thi Japan  ki wizarat taleem ke adaad o shumaar ke mutabiq un ke malik mein bachon mein khodkshyon ki sharah tees barson mein apni buland tareen satah par hai un ke mutabiq 2016 aur 2017 ke maali saal ke douran shool jaanay walay taqreeban 250 bachon naay khudkushi ki yeh tadaad pichlle saal ke muqablay mein paanch gina ziyada hai aur 1986 ke baad sab se ziyada un bachon naay khandani masail mustaqbil ki fikar aur shool mein harasan kiye jaanay ki shikayat ki thi taham mutaliqa schoolon ke mutabiq un mein se 140 bachay aisay hain jinhon nay﻿ apni jaan lainay se pehlay koi note nahi chorra is liye un ki khudkushi ki wajah ke barey mein kuch nahi kaha ja sakta khudkushi karne walay ziyada tar bachay high shool mein they Japan  mein umooman bachay athaara saal ki Umar  taq shool jatay hain japani kibnt office ki 2015 ki aik report ke mutabiq Japan  mein yakam September  ko shool ke saal ke aaghaz ke waqt sab se ziyada khodkshyan hoti hain Japan  mein 2017 mein 21000 hazaar logon nay﻿ khudkushi ki jo ke 2003 ki 34500 khodkshyon ke muqablay mein bohat kam hai Japan  ke wazeer taleem ne kaha hai ke Japan  mein taalib ilmoon ki khudkushi ki sharah ziyada hai jo ke fikar ki baat hai aur is ka hal talaash karna zurori hai sharaab noshi se bemari se nijaat haasil karne mein takheer hoti hai bohat si jagah log yeh puchhte hain ke agar woh anti بایوٹکس duwaein le rahay hain to kya woh sharaab pi satke hain ya nahi bohat si haamla khawateen jo –apne hamal ko chhupana chahti hain woh bhi sharaab nah peenay ke liye anti بایوٹکس ko izr banati hain lekin kya yeh izr waqai durust hai bohat se afraad yeh tasleem karte hain ke sharaab peenay se anti بایوٹکس munasib tor par apna assar nahi dekhtein kuch log yeh bhi kehte hain ke anti بایوٹکس ke sath sharaab pi jaye to is ke buray asraat muratab hotay hain London  ke jeeny ٹورنری cilinic naay is silsilay mein 300 se ziyada afraad ka surway kya 81 feesad ka khayaal hai ke sharaab peenay walon par anti بایوٹکس bohat muasar nahi hoten jabkay 71 feesad afraad ka khayaal tha ke anti بایوٹکس ke sath sharaab peenay ke sayid effects hotay hain lekin haqeeqat yeh hai ke ziyada tar anti بایوٹکس ke barey mein un mein se dono tasawurat bilkul ghalat hain doctoron ka khayaal hai ke yeh ghalat tasawwurat logon ko sharaab peenay se bachatey hain lehaza woh is ghalat fehmi ki hosla afzai karte hain taakay mareez apni duwaein waqt par letay rahen haqeeqat yeh hai ke sab se ziyada anti بایوٹکس par alchohal ka koi assar nahi hota hai behar haal baaz anti بایوٹکٹس aisay hain jin ke sath sharaab nahi piinaa hi behtar hai agar سیفالوسپورن سیفوٹیٹان dawa ke sath sharaab peetay hain to is ke jism par muzir asraat ho satke hain un dono ke milnay se اسیٹلڈیہائڈ Nami  keemiyai madah bantaa hai jis ki wajah se sir chakranay matli qay honay sir dard chehray ka rang badalny saans phoolnay aur seenay mein dard ki shikaytein ho sakti hain isi terhan ki alamaat is waqt zahir hosakti hain jab aap ڈائیسلفیرم Nami  dawa letay hain is dawa ko sharaab ki latt se nijaat dilanay ke liye istemaal kya jata hai is ka maqsad yeh hota hai ke agar koi mareez sharaab piyay to usay bura mehsoos ho aur woh sharaab se daur rahay bohat saari anti بایوٹکس ke sath sharaab nah piinaa hi behtar hai un mein ٹینیڈازول لائنیزلڈ aur ایریتھرومائسن jaisi adwiyaat shaamil hain aur doctoron is ke sath sharaab se parhaiz tajweez karte hain bohat se anti بایوٹکس ke sath sharaab noshi mein koi nuqsaan nahi aur un ki fehrist lambi hai taham sharaab noshi bemari se chhutkara haasil karne mein takheer ka baais hoti hai kyunkay sharaab ke baad aap thakan aur pyaas mehsoos karte hain kabul 5 decemeber ( siyasat dot com ) Afghanistan  ke saddar Ashraf  ghanni naay womens football team ki janib se jinsi tor par harasan kiye jaany ke daawa par gehray dukh ka izhaar karte hue fori tor par muamlay ki tehqiqaat ka elaan kardiya hai Bartanwi  khabar rasan idaray garjin naay apni khabar mein daawa kya tha ke Afghanistan  ki football federation ke saddar sameit aala ohdedaron naay khawateen football team ki arakeen ko jinsi tor par harasan kya malik ke attorny general se mulaqaat ke baad Afghan  saddar ne kaha ke yeh tamam afghanyon ke liye bara dhaka hai mard o khawateen athletes se kisi bhi qisam ka kharab rawayya na qabil bardasht hai lehaza mein ne attorny general se kaha hai ke woh muamlay ki mukammal aur jame tehqiqaat karen garjin ne apni khabar mein daawa kya tha ke womens football team se munsalik aik senior ohdedar ne bataya ke footballers ko na sirf Afghanistan  mein football federation ke head quarter balkay rawan saal feb mein urdan mein munaqidah tarbiati camp mein bhi jinsi tor par harasan kya gaya mazkoorah khabar mein sabiq Afghan  captain Khalda  پوپل neh –apne bayan mein daawa kya tha ke team ke mard عہدیدارخواتین khiladion se zabardasti karte hain Afghanistan  football federation ke secretary general syed Ali  Raza  aaqa zaadah neh un ilzamaat ko mann gharat qarar diya tha lekin olympic committee ke saddar Hafeez  Allah  walii raheemi neh un inkishafaat ko durust qarar dete hue kaha tha ke is terhan ke ilzamaat naye nahi hain Hafeez  Allah  neh kaha ke fidrishnz ke srbrahan trinrz aur saathi khiladion ki janib se hamesha se hi harasan kya jata raha hai hamein maazi mein bhi shikayaat masool hoti rahi hain aur un haqayiq ko jhtlaya nahi ja sakta Afghan  saddar ne un ilzamaat par barhami ka izhaar karte hue kaha ke agar mehez ilzamaat ko dekhte hue log apni baityon aur biton ko khelon ki janib bhejnay se rokkk satke hain to phir hamein fori tor par iqdamaat karne ki zaroorat hai mein jinsi tor par پراساں karne ko kisi tor par bardasht nahi karoon ga duniya ki koi taaqat hamaray bachon ko zayad-ti ka nishana nahi bana sakti aur is terhan ke waqeat se nimatnay keliye hamari sports fidrishnz mein baqaida frame work mojood hai tasweer ke copy right getty images image caption chand haftay qabal ٹمبلر par bachon ke sath jinsi ziadti ki tasaveer shaya honay ke baad Apple  naay –apne app stor se ٹمبلر ko hata diya tha samaji rabton ki Website ٹمبلر naay apni Website par tamam pornografk mawaad par pabandi ka elaan kya hai, is pabandi ka itlaq 17 decemeber se hoga
is nai policy ka elaan Apple  ke app stor se ٹمبلر ki appli kishn htaye jane ke chand hafton ke baad samnay aaya hai
Apple  nay﻿ –apne appli kishn stor se ٹمبلر ko is waqt hata diya tha jab bachon ke sath jinsi bud sulooki ki kuch tasaveer ٹمبلر par is ke fltrz ko dhoka dete hue shaya ho gayi theen
aik bayan mein ٹمبلر nay﻿ cheif executive officer Zaif  d اونوریو nay﻿ zor diya hai ke ٹمبلر ki aisay mawaad ke hawalay se' sakht policy' hai taham woh site ko mazeed mehfooz banana chahtay hain
unhon naay likha ke' hamaray iqdamaat apni community ke liye pyar aur umeed par mabni hai
' yeh bhi parheen! India  mein bachay balighon ki filme dekhnay par majaboor' Europe  bachon se mutaliq jinsi mawaad ka garh' nojawan internet par khud ko ٹرول kyun kar rahay hain tasweer ke copy right getty images naye zabita e ikhlaq ke mutabiq sarfeen' asal insanon ke jinsi aaza' post nahi kar satke, is ke liye ilawa koi bhi aisa mawaad ko jo' is had taq haqeeqat pasandana ho' ke woh asal mehsoos ho, is ki bhi ijazat nahi hogi
taham Website ke mutabiq aisi burhenapa posts jo' fankaranah, taleemi, khabar ki ahmiyat ujagar karne wali, ya siyasi' hon woh qabil qubool hain aur zaroori nahi ke unhein bhi hata diya jaye ga
woh sarfeen jnhon ne بالغانہ mawaad post kya sun-hwa hai unhein notice ke zariye aagah ke jaye ke woh pabandi ke khilaaf appeal kaisay kar satke hain, ya is Website ke bahar apna mawaad kaisay mehfooz kar satke hain
khayaal rahay ke chand haftay qabal ٹمبلر par bachon ke sath jinsi zayad-ti ki tasaveer shaya honay ke baad Apple  nay﻿ –apne app stor se ٹمبلر ko hata diya tha
tasweer ke copy write getty images image caption ٹمبلر ka kehna tha ke ٹمبلر par up load ki jaaane wali har tasweer ko sakin kya jata hai ٹمبلر ka kehna tha ke tamam ghairqanooni tasaveer ke baaray mein jaisay hi mutala hue unhein hata diya gaya tha
ٹمبلر ka kehna tha ke ٹمبلر par up load ki janay wali har tasweer ko sakin kya jata hai ke aaya un mein se koi bachon ke sath jinsi zayad-ti par mabni koi mawaad to nahi
ٹمبلر aam tor par jinsi mawaad ko apni Website mein share karne ki ijazat deta hai
is Website par isi qisam ke mawaad par Indonesia  mein aik din ki pabandi aed ki gayi thi jab ke janoobi Korea  bhi maazi mein usay jinsi mawaad ki behtar nigrani karne ke hawalay se mntb_h kar chuka hai
nai Dehli  ( monitoring disk ) agar aap social media istemaal karte hain to aap yaqeenan 60 second fees wash rule ke mutaliq sun rakha ho ga yeh mun dhoney ka aisa tareeqa hai jis mein aik minute ke andar chehray par nikhaar aa jata hai times of India  ke mutabiq ibtidayi tor par yeh tareeqa نیامکا رابرسٹ smith Nami  aik khatoon ney aik video ki shakal mein –apne youtube channel par post kya caption mein is ney likha ke yeh tareeqa mein un logon ke liye bta raha hon jo kam waqt mein chehray par nikhaar lana chahtay hain نیامکا ney tareeqa batatay hue kaha ke aap jo bhi کلینزر istemaal karte hain usay –apne chehray par lagayen aur 60 second ke liye unglio se poooray chehray par is ka massage karen yeh tareeqa istemaal karne se pehlay yeh tasalii karlen ke aap ka کلینزر aap ki jald ko kharab nah karta ho is aik minute ke massage ke baad hi aap –apne chehray ke nikhaar mein wazeh farq dekhen ge agar aap is ke behtareen nataij chahtay hain to subah aur raat ko din mein do baar is tareeqay se chehray ko saaf karen report ke mutabiq نیامکا ka yeh tareeqa internet par bohat vayrl ho raha hai aur log hash tig 60 ke tehat is tareeqay se chehra saaf karne se pehlay aur baad ki tasaveer post kar rahay hain London  ( monitoring disk ) daano ke ilaaj ke liye istemaal ki janey wali dawa mardon ko mardana kamzoree ka shikaar bananay lagi رواکیوٹین daano ke ilaaj ke liye istemaal ki ja rahi hai ab is ke aisay khofnaak مضراثرات samnay aa gay hain ke sun kar مرداسے haath bhi nahi lagayen ge mil online ke mutabiq Bartania  mein kayi aisay mard samnay aa chuke hain jo is dawa ke bhi shuka raho chuke hain report ke mutabiq is ka shikaar honay walay aik nojawan ka naam ad ہنتھران hai jis ki walida kithrin ہنتھران ka kehna hai ke is dawa ki wajah se mera beta shadeed depration mein mubtala ho chuka hai mein –apne shohar aur beti ke hamrah France  mein chuttiyan mananay gayi ad shool ki wajah se nahi ja saka tha wahan mujhe is ki cal masool hui aur is ne kaha ke' mammy mera dil kar raha hai ke mein khudkushi kar lon mein ne yeh sun kar foran ghar pounchanay ko kaha aur khud bhi hungami tor par wapsi ki parwaaz pkrhli report ke mutabiq رواکیوٹین darasal آئسوٹریٹینائن Nami  chemical hai jo jald ke ghadodon se tail ki pedawar kam karta hai, انفلیمیشن mein kami lata hai aur آئسوٹریٹینائن bacteria ka khtama karta hai banger university ماہرذہنی amraaz professor david hile ka kehna hai ke ”برطانیہ mein hi lakhoon nojawan yeh dawa istemaal kar rahay hain, jinhein chehray par daano ki shikayat hoti hai
agarchay aksar ko is se faida pohanchana hai taham kayi aisay kisz bhi samnay aeye hain jin mein mardon ko un ke intahi muzir asraat ka saamna karna para un mein ziyada ترذہنی تناؤ aur depration ke mareez ban kar khudkushi ki taraf mael ho gaye aur is ki barri wajah is dawa ki wajah se un mardon mein shadeed mardana kamzor aajana hai is se mardana uzoo مخصوصہ ki aystadgi shadeed mutasir hoti hai aur mard hamesha ke liye bhi mardangi se mahroom ho sakta hai Islamabad : maliyati darjah bandi dainay walay 3 barray idaron mein se aik' فچ ritngz' ny Pakistan  ki karzzzz lainay ki darjah bandi ko zrِ mubadla ke kam zakhair, kharab maali sorat e haal aur intahi bhaari wajib alada raqam ke baais kam kar ke' bi negative' kardiya
dawn akhbar ki report ke mutabiq New York se talluq rakhnay wali rating agency ka kehna tha ke zrِ mubadla ke kam zakhair, bairooni qarzon ki adayigyon mein mein izafay, maali sorat e haal musalsal kharab honay mulki majmoi pedawar ki sharah ke aitbaar se قرضو n mein izafay ki wajah se bairooni maliyati khatray ke pishِ nazar taweel arsay tak barqarar rehne wali rating' bi' se kam kar ke' bi negative' ki gayi
un ka mazeed kehna tha ke aalmi maliyati fund ( aayi am f ) ke programme ke liye honay walay kamyaab mazakraat bairooni maliyati sorat e haal ko behtar bana satke hain lekin aayi am f programme ke nifaz mein khatraat mojood hain
yeh bhi parheen : modiz ka Pakistan  ke kam hotay zar mubadla par khadshaat ka izhaar wazeh rahay ke Pakistan  tehreek insaaf ( pi tea aayi ) ki hukoomat aur staate bank Pakistan  ( s bi pi ) ki sir toar koshisho ke bawajood akstan ke manqola zakhair mein musalsal kami waqay horahee hai aur yeh 6 decemeber ko 7 arab 30 crore dollar ki satah taq grchke they jo ke daidh mah ki draamdat ke barabar hai
rating agency nay﻿ guzashta saal ke muqablay mein bairooni karzzzz ki adayigyon mein izafay ki wajah se current account khasaray mein mutawaqqa kami ko daikthay hue aala majmoi maliyati zaroriat ka takhmeenah lagaya
is baaray mein maliyati agency ka kehna tha ke khud mukhtaar karzzzz ki zimma darion mein aindah 3 baras mein fi saal 7 se 9 arab dollar ke karzzzz ki adaigi karna hogi jis mein aindah saal April  taq 1 arab dollar ke euro bond ki adaigi bhi shaamil hai
mazeed parheen : Saudi  arab se 1 arab dollar ka dosra bail out package masool, stat bank un ka mazeed kehna tha ke anay walay 10 saloon taq bairooni qarzon ka hajam ziyada rehne ka imkaan hai kyun ke pak chain iqtisadi raahdaari ( si pack ) se mutaliq out flow ka aaghaz 2020 mein hoga
فچ ritngz ke lagaye gay muashi andazon ke mutabiq aayi am f programme ki Adam  mojoodgi mein ghair mulki zar mubadla ke manqola zakhair kam hotay hue haliya maali saal ke ekhtataam tak 7 arab dollar honay ka imkaan hai
agency ka kehna tha ke mulki majmoi pedawar ke aitbaar se June  2018 mein khatam honay walay maali saal mein qarzon ki sharah 72.5 feesad rahi taham ab rupay ki qader mein kami aur maali khasaray mein izafay ki wajah se rawan maali saal mein yeh sharah 75. 6 feesad taq pounchanay ka imkaan hai
yeh bhi parheen : shoba tawanai ke baais Pakistani  maeeshat ko 18 arab dollar ke bohraan ka saamna is ke sath idaray ke lagaye gaye tkhminon ke mutabiq Pakistan  mein mehengai ki sharah bhi guzashta maali saal ke 3. 9 feesad se barh kar 7 feesad taq pounchanay ka khadsha hai
