gulukarah شکیرا 2003 se aqwam mutahidda ki kher sgali safeer hain, unhon ney bachon ki madad se aik shool ki bunyaad rakhi hai aur un ko ilm ki roshni se Munawar  karne ke liye 40 laakh dollar atiyah bhi kar dyie
columbia mein taqreeb ke douran gulukarah bachon ke sath ghul mil gayeen aur un ki farmaaish par tasaveer bhi banwaen
شکیرا ke atye par shool asatzh ne un se izhaar tshkr bhi kya
س-ع cricket hockey aur foot baal mein beron malik Pakistani  khiladion ki pazeerai to aik arsa se ho rahi hai lekin ab khawateen ko bhi beron malik ja kar legs khailnay aur trinng haasil karne ka mauqa mil raha hai
unhi mein aik naam international hockey player afshaan Noreen  ka bhi hai
afshaan Noreen  naay tasalsul ke sath Pakistan  hockey team ki numaindagi ki lekin kuch arsa qabal un ke sath pasand na pasand ka silsila shuru ho gaya lekin afshan Noreen  naay himmat nahi haari balkay mehnat jari rakhi
unhon ne nah sirf qaumi team mein kam back kya balkay isi douran inhen Australia  mein club hockey khailnay ka mauqa bhi mil gaya
afshaan Noreen  guzashta teen mah se Australia  mein club hockey khailnay mein masroof hain
afshaan Noreen  batati hain ke jab woh team se drop huien to woh waqt un ke liye bohat mushkil tha lekin himmat nah haari aur mein naay hadaf bana liya tha ke ab team mein bhi aana hai, beron malik trinng bhi karni hai aur legs bhi khelna hai taakay –apne khail mein mazeed nikhaar laoun aur jab taq team mein hon to aaccha khelon aur phir coaching se wabsta ho kar khiladion ki trinng bhi achi karsakeoon
dono hadaf haasil karne mein kamyaab hui
afshaan Noreen , test cricketer ahsaan adil ki choti behan hain
afshaan Noreen  kehti hain ke bhai ne bohat asport kya hai
unhon ne hosla pust nahi honay diya balkay hamesha himmat bndhayi hai
unhon nay﻿ kaha ke khail ke miyaar mein hum bohat peechay hain
beron malik khailnay se bohat kuch seekhnay ka mauqa milta hai
mein samajhthee hon ke beron malik legs khailnay ke tajarbay ka koi nam albdl hai hi nahi
تکنیکس behtar ho ti hain
khail mein nikhaar aata hai balkay is ke sath fitness bhi behtar ho ti hai
diet planz ka pata chalta hai aur is se khilari ki Umar  mein izafah hota hai
afshaan Noreen  ka kehna hai ke Australia  mein khelon ka anfrastrkchr bohat behtar hai
yahi wajah hai ke international events mein Australia  ki karkardagi din badan behtar ho tein ja rahi hai aur yahan sab se barri cheez yeh hai ke merritt ko har soorat mein tarjeeh di jati hai jis se khiladion ki hosla shikni nahi hoti
sab khiladion ko yaksaa mawaqay diye jatay hain
pasand na pasand ka tasawwur bhi nahi kya jata aur yeh sab nichli satah se shuru hota hai
yahi wajah hai ke oopar wohi pahunchte hain jo ghair mamooli salahiyaton ke maalik hon
un ka kehna hai ke Pakistan  women hockey is liye peechay reh gayi hai ke yahan baqaidagi se events nahi hotay aur jab hotay hain to oopar taley do teen events ho jatay hain aur phir lamba waqfa ajata hai, jis ka koi faida nahi hai
events ka aik baqaida calendar ban-na chahiye aur is par amal hona chahiye
mulki satah par baqaidagi se events honay ke baad bain al aqwami satah ke events mein shirkat karni chahiye
sab se ziyada ahmiyat league hockey ko deeni chahiye aur yeh league har baras baqaidagi se honi chahiye
khiladion ko mara-aat milni chahiye
agar yeh sab ho to Pakistan  women hockey ke miyaar mein behtari aaye gi warna hum numaishi matches khailnay taq hi mehdood reh jayen ge
tasweer ke copy right getty images ion stayn ke –apne haath ka woh khat ghair mutawaqqa tor par 29 laakh dollar mein nelaam sun-hwa hai jis mein unhon nay﻿ kkhuda ke wujood ke baaray mein baat ki hai
yeh khat ion stayn ne 1954 mein german zabaan mein likha tha aur tawaqqa thi ke yeh ziyada se ziyada 15 laakh dollar mein bikey ga lekin New York mein honay wali is nilami ne saari tawaquaat toar den
is khat mein ion stayn ny mazhab aur science ke darmain honay wali purani behas par izhaar-e khayaal kya hai
ion stayn ko insani tareekh ke azeem tareen dimaghon mein se aik samgha jata hai aur unhon nay﻿ kayi baar kkhuda ke wujood ke baare mein behas ki hai
ion stayn german falsafi airk get kind ke naam is khat mein likhte hain :' lafz kkhuda mere liye insani kamzoree ke izhaar aur pedawar ke ilawa kuch nahi


bible qabil e qader magar daqyanoosi asateer ka majmoa hai


koi Tafseer , chahay woh kitni hi bareek kyun nah ho, is baaray mein mere khayalat badal nahi sakti
' tasweer ke copy rite getty images ion stayn ka mazhab kya tha? is khat se to yahi zahir hota hai
lekin maamla itna saada nahi hai
ion stayn aik moqay par wazeh tor par keh chuke hain ke woh دہریے nahi hain
un ka yeh qoul mashhoor hai ke' mein spy نوزا ke kkhuda par yaqeen rakhta hon jo –apne aap ko tamam ashya mein zahir karta hai jo wujood rakhti hain, lekin is par kkhuda par yaqeen nahi rakhta jo ensaan ki taqdeer aur aamaal ke baarey mein fikarmand rehta hai
' سپینوزا 18 win sadi mein guzarnay walay mashhoor walandezi falsafi thay
un ka khayaal tha ke kkhuda ka koi shakhsi aur maadi wujood nahi hai, balkay kaayenaat kkhuda ke takhayyul aur tosee ki Mazhar  hai
kaayenaat ki har shai kkhuda ki zaat ka hissa hai aur is lehaaz se har shai doosri shai se jari hui hai
is tasawwur ko istilaah mein' hama oast' kaha jata hai
سپینوزا ke isi tasawwur ke tehat kaayenaat mein jo waqea bhi hota hai, woh kkhuda se jura honay aur kkhuda ke wujood ka hissa honay ki wajah se hatmi aur qatee hota hai aur is ki bajaye kuch aur nahi ho sakta
is ko nazriya jabar kaha jata hai aur jaisay ke neechay aaye ga, ion stayn bhi isi ke qaail thay
zindagi bhar bdalty khayalat ion stayn yahodi walidain ke ghar peda hue they aur unhon naay aik catholic isaai shool mein ibtidayi taleem haasil ki
unhon nay﻿ khud aik baar likha tha ke un ka bachpan mazhabi mahol mein guzra lekin woh 12 saal ki Umar  mein ghair mazhabi ho gay thay
' scienci kitaaben parhnay se mein jald hi is yaqeen poanch gaya ke bible ki aksar kahaniyan durust nahi ho sakteen
' yeh ion stayn ke larakpan ki baghaawat ka Mazhar  tha, aur is ka assar un ki zindagi par khasay arsay tak raha
taham paki Umar  ko pounchanay ke baad ion stayn yeh kehnay lagey they ke woh 1 shakhsi aur zaati kkhuda par yaqeen rakhtay hain
jab un ki Umar  50 baras thi to aik interview mein unhon nay﻿ kaha tha :' mein dahria nahi hon
hamein jo masla darpesh hai woh hamaray mehdood zehnon ke muqablay par intahi azeem hai
hamari misaal is bachay ki si hai jo aik wasee o Areez  library mein daakhil hota hai jo mukhtalif zabanon ki kitabon se bhari hui hai
bachay ko maloom hai ke kisi ne zaroor yeh kitaaben likhi hon gi, lekin yeh nahi pata kaisay
' usay woh zubanain nahi aatin jin mein yeh kitaaben likhi gayi hain
bacha kitabon ki tarteeb mein aik pur asraar tarteeb daikhta hai lekin usay pata nahi woh tarteeb kya hai


hum kaayenaat ko dekhte hain jo pur asraar tareeqay se tarteeb di gayi hai aur woh baaz qawaneen ke tabay hai, lekin woh un qawaneen ko bohat madham andaaz mein samjhta hai
' agar is nuqta nigah se dekha jaye to maloom hota hai ke ion stayn ke mazhab ke baarey mein khayalat bdalty rahay hain
bzahir mazkoorah khat un ki zindagi ke aik aisay daur se talluq rakhta hai jab woh kkhuda ke wujood ke munkir ho gay they
tasweer ke copy right getty images kya ion stayn yahodi qomiat par yaqeen rakhtay thay? ion stayn ke baaray mein kaha jata hai ke hazrat eesa ke baad woh dosray mashhoor tareen yahodi hain
unhein Israel  ka saddar ban'nay ki peshkash bhi hui thi halaank woh Israel  ke shehri nahi thay
lekin unhon ney yeh jawab day kar inkaar kar diya ke' mein saari zindagi marozi mamlaat ko brtta chala aaya hon, is liye mere andar logon ko baratnay ka melaan hai aur nah sarkari umoor sar-anjaam dainay ka tajurbah
' oopar mazkoor interview ke douran unhon ne kaha tha :' qomiat aik bchganh bemari hai, jaisay insaaniyat ka khasra
' isi interview mein unhon nay﻿ yeh bhi kaha tha ke' mein jabriyat ka qaail hon
mein ensaan ki khudmukhtaari par yaqeen nahi rakhta
yahodi samaghtay hain ke ensaan apni taqdeer khud banata hai
mein is nazriye ko mustard karta hon
mein is lehaaz se yahodi nahi hon
' moscow ( urdu pointe اخبارتازہ tareen 17 decemeber 2018 hamza ) roos ki ayrospis company yonaytd ayyrkraft coopration nay﻿ naye musafir bardaar tayyarah bananay ka elaan kardiya jis par 10 arab rouble 150. 5 million dollar laagat aeye gi yeh tayyarah Sabiqa  tayyaron ki nisbat chaura hoga is ki tajribati bunyadon par tayari decemeber 2019 hamza taq hosakay gi sarkari zaraye ke mutabiq naye musafir bardaar jet tayyaray ii-96-400 ki chorai pehlay se mojood tayyaron ki nisbat ziyada hogi aur yeh taweel faaslay taq parwaaz kar sakay ga tajribati bunyadon par tayyar honay walay is tayyaray par kharch anay walay 10 arab rouble mein se 7. 6 arab rouble tayyaray par jabkay baqi is ki engineering drawing aur deegar shobo par kharch kiye jayen ge tayyaray ki tajribati bunyadon par tayari decemeber 2019 hamza taq mukammal hosakay gi jabkay tajribati parwaaz November  2019 hamza se January  2020 hamza ke darmiyani arsay mein ki jasakay gi tayyaray ki commercial bunyadon par pedawar 2020 hamza ke aaghaz mein shuru hogi tasweer ke copy right getty images aik Amrici  thnk tank ne khabardaar kya hai ke jaisay jaisay chain masnoi zahanat ( آرٹیفیشل intelli jins ) ke maidan mein taraqqi kar raha hai, duniya ka iqtisadi aur askari tawazun tabdeel ho sakta hai
report mein misalein di gayi hain ke masnoi zahanat kaisay fouji maqasid ke liye istemaal ki ja sakti hai
yaad rahay ke July  mein chain ney masnoi zahanat ke qaumi mansoobay ka elaan kya tha jis mein kaha gaya tha ke chain is maidan mein America  se peechay nahi rahay ga
yeh bhi padhiye' qaatil robots' ki tayari par pabandi ka mutalba taham aik maahir ka kehna hai ke yeh tanbeeh sirf buland bangh daaway ho satke hain
report shaya karne walay idaray center of new american security ka kehna hai ke' chain ab America  ke muqablay mein takneeki pasti ka shikaar nahi hai aur woh sirf barabari hi nahi kar sakta, balkay America  se agay bhi barh sakta hai
' report ke mutabiq' cheeni fouj masnoi zahanat se mutaliq mansoobon mein shud o mad se sarmaya kaari kar rahi hai aur un ke tehqeeqi idaray cheeni difai sanat ke sath mil kar kaam kar rahay hain
' is mein mazeed kaha gaya hai ke cheeni fouj ko tawaqqa hai ke masnoi bunyadi tor par jungi sayaq o Sabaq  mukammal tor par tabdeel kar day gi
tasweer ke copy write getty images image caption mahireen naay khudkaar hathyaar aur qaatil robots ke khatraat se aqwam mutahidda ko khabardaar kya hai qaatil robot report ki musannif elsa kanya ka kehna hai ke baaz mahireen midanِ jung mein' wahdat' ( singularity ) ke muntazir hain, jab ensaan larai ke douran روبوٹوں ke barq-e raftari se faislay karne ki salahiyat ka muqaabla nahi kar sakay ga
Amrici  mehakma difaa pentagon ki policy hai ke jung mein insanon ki bajaye robot istemaal kiye jayen, taham doosri janib aqwam mutahidda khud mukhtar hathyaaron ke istemaal par pabandi par ghhor kar rahi hai
elsa kanya ne likha hai ke' cheeni fouj masnoi zahanat ko munfarid aur ghair mutawaqqa tareeqon se istemaal kar sakti hai, jin par America  ki manind qanooni aur ikhlaqi قدغنیں aed nahi hoten
' professor noyl sharki' qaatil روبوٹوں par pabandi ki muhim' Nami  tanzeem ke sarbarah hain
unhon ney bi bi si ko bataya ke cheeni hakkaam ney unhein bataya hai ke un ka is qisam ke robot tayyar karne ka koi iradah nahi hai
unhon nay﻿ kaha :' unhein maghrib jo kar raha hai is ke baray mein chinyon ko ziyada tashweesh hai is liye yeh khaali خولی dhamki ho sakti hai
' taham unhon ne tasleem kya ke chain is maidan mein paanch barson ke andar andar maghrib ke hum palla ho jaye ga

maiday ke cancer mein mubtala hain jab v meet Haider  aur urta Punjab  jaisi kamyaab filmon mein adakari ke johar dikhaane walay 37 sala adakar Shahid  Kapoor  se mutaliq Bharti  media mein afwahen gardish kar rahi hain ke Shahid  Kapoor  ( stomach cancer ) maiday ke cancer mein mubtala hain aur inhen stage one cancer ki تشخیص hui hai guzashta roz media mein yeh khabrain bhi gardish kar rahi theen Shahid Kapoor  film kabeer singh ki shooting adhuri chore kar surgery karanay Dehli  rawana hue hain yeh khabar samnay anay ke baad hi un ke cancer ki khabar jungle mein aag ki terhan phail gayi aur Shahid  ke madah tashweesh ka shikaar hogaye taham adakar Shahid  Kapoor  ke ghar walon neh inhen cancer honay ki khabron ki tardeed karte hue kaha hai ke kuch log kaisay yeh sab likh satke hain aakhir is khabar ki bunyaad kya hai is terhan ki afwahen phelanay ko kis terhan se jaaiz thehraya ja sakta hai doosri janib adakar Shahid  Kapoor  neh haal hi mein apni ahliya mera Rajpot  ke sath aik loca موڈرچ mein muqaabla ho ga un teen khiladion ke naamon ka intikhab chimpiynz league aur yoropa league khailnay wali 80 teamon ke coaches ke ilawa یوئیفا ki asosi ation mein shaamil 55 sahafion ki janib se diye gay voton ki roshni mein kya gaya guzashta do season se yeh award jeetnay walay موڈرچ aur Ronaldo  ney rawan saal ryil midrd ke liye lagataar teesri martaba champions league jeeti jabkay Ronaldo  lagataar chhatay saal champions league mein sab se ziyada gole score karne walay khilari rahay موڈرچ ney world cupp mein umdah khail paish karte hue apni team kroshya ko final tak pohanchaya aur golden baal ka award jeetnay mein kamyaab rahay Mohammad  Salah  ney english football club lyorpol ke liye shandaar karkardagi ka muzahira karte hue season mein 44 gole score kiye aur apni team ko chimpiynz league ke final tak rasai dilae انٹوئن گریزمین is fehrist mein chouthay number par rahay jinhon naay ایٹلیٹکو midrd ke liye yoropa league jeetnay ke baad world cup jeetnay ka bhi aizaz haasil kya jabkay barslona ke لیونل meese panchwin number par rahay is award ke faateh ke naam ka elaan 30 augst ko hoga Lahore  high court Multan  bench naay Qandil  balouch qatal case mein mqtolh ke bhai aur markazi mulzim vsim ki darkhwast zamanat mustard kar di hai lekin isi case mein aik aur mulzim haq Nawaz  ki darkhwast zamanat Manzoor  kar li hai
Lahore  high court Multan  bench ke samnay mulzim haq Nawaz  ki darkhwast zamanat mein un ke wakeel neh muaqqaf ikhtiyar kya tha ke mulzim haq Nawaz  ka naam f aayi are mein nahi hai aur usay sirf aik mulzim vsim ke bayan ki roshni mein girftar kya gaya hai is liye is ki zamanat Manzoor  ki jaye jo dalail suneney ke baad adalat neh Manzoor  kar li
adalat mein mulzim waseem ki darkhwast zamanat ke samaat ke douran is case ke mudai aur Qandil  ke waalid azeem bakhash aur Qandil  ki walida ney adalat mein bayan diya ke inhen –apne betay ki zamanat par koi aitraaz nahi lekin adalat ney waseem ki darkhwast zamanat mustard kar di aur qarar diya ke is mein dafaa 311 ke tehat mudai mulzim ko maaf nahi karsaktha aur mulzim waseem magistrate ke samnay qatal ka aitraaf kar chuka hai
Qandil  balouch ke waalid azeem bakhash ke wakeel Safdar  Shah  neh is baat ki tasdeeq ki ke Qandil  balouch ke walidain neh adalat mein bayan halfi jama karaye hain jis mein unhon neh –apne betay vsim ke baare mein kaha hai ke inhen zamanat ki hadd taq –apne betay ki rihayi par koi aitraaz nahi hai lekin adalat neh un ki is khwahish ko radd kar diya aur kaha ke dafaa 311 ke tehat ghairat ke naam par qatal ke is case ki pairwi riyasat kar rahi hai
aur phir dafaa 164 ke tehat mulzim ka aatrafi bayan bhi record par mojood hai
doosri taraf trial court mein Qandil  balouch qatal case ki samaat jari hai aur abhi teen gawahoon ke bayanaat record hona baqi hain jis ke baad jarah ho gi
ishaa ambani ki shadi ko Bharat  ki sab se mehngi shadi qarar diya ja raha hai aur is mein boli would stars Shah  rukh Khan , Aamir  Khan , Aishwariya  sameit deegar ke ilawa America  ki sabiq khatoon awwal Hillary  Clinton  ne bhi shirkat ki hai

t_hran ( an an aayi ) bain al aqwami maliyati muwasilat association yani soft nizaam Iran  ke khilaaf Amrici  pabandion ke nifaz soft mein apni janib se amli iqdamaat ka aaghaz kardiya hai ki taraf se irani bankon par pabandiyan Ayad  ki ja rahi hain aur irani bankon ko tarseelat zar par pabandi laganay ka amal shuru kardiya gaya hai soft ke is iqdaam ka maqsad irani bankon ko aalmi maliyati net work mein tanha karna aur America  ki taraf se t_hran par Ayad  ki jany wali pabandion کوموثر aur nateeja khaiz banana hai arab TV ke mutabiq brslz mein qaim soft ke saddar daftar se jari aik bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke agarchay company ko Iran  ke khilaaf faislon par afsos hai magar aalmi maliyati tarseelat ko shafaaf bananay aur soft sis ke istehkaam is ke mafaad aur iss ki shfafit ko yakeeni bananay ke liye Amrici  pabandion mein واشنگںٹن ka sath dena zurori hai soft bank ki taraf se yeh muaqqaf Amrici  wazeer khazana astifn منوچین ke jari honay walay bayan ke baad samnay aaya hai Amrici  wazeer e khazana neh kaha tha ke un ka malik somwaar se Iran  par Sabiqa  pabandion ki doosri qist bahaal kar raha hai is ke baad Iran  ke sath lain dainay karne walay idaron aur companiyon ko bhi black list kardiya jaye ga un ka kehna tha ke soft bhi kisi dosray idaray aur company se mukhtalif nahi agar is ney t_hran ke sath lain deen jari rakha to usay bhi pabandion ka saamna karna par sakta hai Amrici  wazeer e khazana ka kehna tha ke dehshat gardi ki pusht panahi karne walay Iran  par دباؤ badhaane ka is se behtar aur mo-asar zareya aur koi nahi ke t_hran ke gird muashi pabandion ka نوازالدین Siddiqui  ko guzashta saal apni kitaab' an آرڈنری life?' ko ashaat ke baad wapas lena para tha
apni khud nawisht ko wapas lainay par afsos ka izhaar karte hue نوازالدین nay﻿ kaha,' ' mein phir se kitaab likhon ga aur is baar sab jhoot likhon ga, sab log khoob parheen ge kyunkay mein' Maroof ' hon
log parheen ge aur wah wa karen ge kyunkay Maroof  logon ki kitaab sab parhte hain
meri kitaab 209 safhaat par mushtamil thi jabkay mere taluqaat ke baaray mein is mein sirf chaar paanch safhaat hi thay
mein ney apni kitaab mein unn ka naam ke sath zikar kya, jo meri ghalti thi' '
is kitaab mein نوازالدین ne apni saathi adakara نیہاریکا singh ke ilawa kayi khawateen ke sath –apne taluqaat ko tafseel se bayan kya tha
Nawaz  kehte hain,' ' mein ney is ka aitraaf kya aur kitaab wapas le li
is ke باقی204 safhaat mein, mein ney bataya ke mein kis terhan aik chhootay se گاؤں se aaya, kis terhan tarbiyat haasil ki, kis terhan meri soch badli
mein jaisa bhi adakar hon aaccha ya bura woh sab likha
mein ney is mein apna Qasida  nahi likha tha
yeh kitaab angrezi mein zaroor thi lekin is mein likhi hui batian bohat wazeh aur sach par mabni theen, jaisay ke mein tha
mein nay﻿ –apne ghalat tasawwurat ka zikar kya tha kyunkay mein aik aisi jagah se aata hon, jahan waisay hi khayalat aam hotay hain' '
is ke baad unhon ne maffi mangte hue –apne Facebook aur twitter اکاؤنٹ par likha tha,' ' mein har is shakhs se maffi mangta hon jis ke jazbaat hamari yaad daasht' an آرڈنری life' ki tahreeron se majrooh hue hain
is ka mujhe afsos hai aur isi liye mein ne apni kitaab wapas lainay ka faisla kya hai' '
film minnaton aur thakre ke ilawa نوازالدین apni film' new Lau un room' aur super star Rajnikant ke sath aik film mein masroof hain
Rajnikant ke liye un ke madahon ki mohabbat par Nawaz  kehte hain,' ' rajni sir duniya ke sab se barray supra star hain
is baat mein koi shak nahi ke un ke madahon mein un ke liye jo jazba hai woh kisi aur ke liye nahi nazar aata
jab aap un se milein ge to woh aap ko yeh ehsas nahi honay den ge ke woh itnay barray a star hain balkay woh yeh zahir karen ge ke woh aap hi ki terhan hain' '
apni adakari ka loha manwane walay نوازالدین Siddiqui  ko national award ka koi lalach nahi
نوازالدین ka kehna hai,' ' mein national award ke liye film nahi karta aur mein jaanta hon ke mujhe national award nahi miley ga
mein yeh achi terhan jaanta hon isi liye mujhe is ki koi umeed bhi nahi' '
naamwar Hadayat  car raaj kumar ہیرانی se jab bollywood ke ba-salahiyat adakar ke baaray mein sawal kya gyato unhon nay﻿ aik lamha soochey baghair Nawaz  Aldeen  Siddiqui  ka naam lyajbk_h نوازالدین Siddiqui  ko dabangg Khan  bhi behtareen adakar qarar day chuke hain, aik mauqa par unhon nay﻿ aitraaf kiya ke Nawaz  Aldeen  anay walay waqton ka Salman  Khan  hai jis ki tamam filme maqbool hon gi
bali ووڈلیجنڈ gulukarah Lata  mangeshkar ne kaha hai ke woh abhi retire nahi ho rahen balkay woh apni aakhri saans taq golokaari karti rahen gi
Mumbai  ( ae pi pi ) Bharti  zaraye ablaagh ke mutabiq gulukarah Lata  mangeshkar ney guzashta haftay social media par apna gaaya gaya gana' ' ata وساویاچا kashan' ' post kya jis ke baad un ke retire honay ke hawalay se khabrain gardish karne lagen jin ki wazahat karte hue un ka kehna tha woh abhi retire nahi ho rahen balkay woh apni aakhri saans taq golokaari karti rahen gi aur yeh gana unhon ney 2013 mein composure Salil  klkrni ke liye gaaya tha
tibbi mahireen ne kaha hai ke sardiyoon mein werzish karna garmiyon ke mad-muqabil ziyada faiday ka baais bantaa hai saan فرانسسكو scienci aitbaar se is baat ke kayi shawahid mil chuke hain ke sardiyoon mein dbke rehne ki bajaye agar werzish ki jaye to کیلیوریز julne ya khatam honay ki raftaar barh jati hai lekin zurori hai ke aap ghar se bahar nikal kar werzish ki himmat karen agar aap ne is saal 10 pound wazan ghatanay ka ehad kya hai to bahar nikleen aur sard mausam mein werzish karen science daan is amal ki irtiqai wajah batatay hain kyunkay hamaray jism mein mojood bhuri charbi dar haqeeqat sard aur ghizai qillat walay auqaat ke liye hi jama hoti hai aur usay khatam karne ka behtareen mauqa sardi mein hi milta hai hum is waqt mehnat karkay qadray taizi se brown feets kam kar saktay hain dilchasp baat yeh bhi hai ke sardi bardasht karte waqt bhi calories ki kuch nah kuch miqdaar kam hoti rehti hai kyunkay yeh aik qudrati amal hai harord medical school se wabsta dr si ronald کیہن jism mein mojood bhuri aur sakht jaan bhuri chiknai par tahaqeeq ke liye mashhoor hain un ka kehna hai ke sardiyoon mein dil ki dharkan sust hoti hai aur is mein werzish ka faida garmiyon ke muqablay mein ziyada hota hai isi liye sardiyoon mein taweel daud qadray aaasaaan hojati hai garmiyon mein jism khud ko thanda rakhnay ki koshish karta hai aur yun thori der dornay ke baad hi himmat kam hona shuru ho jati hai sardiyoon mein hrqsm ki werzish faida mand hoti hai aur sardiyoon mein werzish se insani jism mein lachak aur sakht mehnat ki salahiyat bhi peda hoti hai agar aap sardiyoon mein barf baari walay ilaaqon mein rehtay hain to bailcha utha kar barf saaf karen kyunkay yeh bhi aik umdah werzish hai ya phir jagrz pehan kar jagng shuru kar dein aur kuch der dornay ki koshish bhi kiijiye lekin jism ko sardi se bachanay ke liye munasib libaas zaroor pehnein Indonesia  rawan saal 18 augst se 2 September  taq 18 win asian games ki maizbani kere ga, un muqablon ki maizbani pehlay olympic council of asia naay vit naam ke shehar hnoyi kodi thi مگرمالی mushkilaat aur deegar mushkilaat ke baais vit naam naay maizbani se inkaar kardiya is soorat e haal mein Indonesia  ke olympic council naay un muqablon ke ineqad ki paish kash kar di jis par un ko maizban honay ka haq day diya gaya, Indonesia  ke olympic hakkaam naay is faislay ke baad jis barq-e raftari se tayari ki is naay khelon ke halqon ko herat zada kardiya, pichlle dinon un tayari se aagahi ke liye dono maizban shehron Jakarta  aur palam bang mein sports media forum ka ineqad kya gaya jis mein tamam asiayi mulkon se talluq rakhnay walay khelon ke media person ne shar kt ki, Pakistan  se راقم alhrof aur Shahid  sati ne numaindagi ki, jis ke douran mard aur khawateen asiayi sahafion ko کھیلون ke zair taamer aur taamer shuda vino ko dora karaya gaya, un tayario ko dekh kar baja tor par kaha ja sakta hai ke Indonesia  aglay asian games mein –apne home ground par asiayi khelon ke super power ke tor par samnay aeye ga, un ke khiladion ka josh وجذبہ aur shehrion ki dil chaspi is baat ka wazeh saboot hai ke Indonesia  mein khail ab culture ban gaya hai jo har aik ke khoon ka hissa nazar arhha hai, Jakarta  aur palam bang mein honay walay aglay asian games ke liye shehar mein josh wa-kharosh abhi se urooj par dikhayi day raha hai, Jakarta  ki mukhtalif shehron aur imaarton par asian games ke hawalay se banners aur piinaa flix awezan kar dyie gay jin par asian games ka slogan, aur nishanaat banay hue ہیںجبکہ اندونشیا ke khiladion ke poster bhi shehar bhar mein lagaye gay hain, is ke ilawa ashya hamza khiirad nosh par bhi asian games ke nishanaat lagaye gay hain, un ki qeemat mein bhi kami kar di gayi hai, Christmas  ke liye baichi jaane wali اشیاءپر bhi asian games ko ahmiyat di gayi hai, dono maizban shehron palam bang aur Jakarta  ke taleemi idaron mein asian games ke hawalay se tlbaavr talbat ke liye aik pered ko makhsoos kya gaya hai jis mein inhen asian games ki maizbani ke mauqa par shehrion komthrk rakhnay ke liye خسوصی pmflt taqseem karne ke liye dyie gay hain, shehar mein nai sarr koo ki taamer ka kaam bhi jari hai parkon aur public maqamat par mukhtalif mulkon ke qaumi par cham bhi lehratey hue dikhayi day rahay hain, is ke ilawa asian games ہمااری taaqat hai ke jumlay bhi likhay hue hain
aglay saal honay walay asian games ke mauqa par Jakarta  mein jadeed sahulaton se aaraasta aik naye hospital ki taamer ka kam aakhri marahil mein, aik barray raqbay par taamer kiye jane walay hospital ko asian games ke douran, khiladion, aafishlz, aur Raza  karon ke ilaaj ke liye istemaal kya jaye ga jis mein har qisam ki jadeed tibbi saholaten mojood hongin jabkay games ke douran hospital ke liye duniya ke mukhtalif mulkon se doctors, اسپیلسٹ, pera medical staff ki earzi tor par bhaari muawzay par khidmaat bhi haasil ki jaye gi, games ke ekhtataam par yeh hospital shehrion ke ilaaj o muawzay ke liye istemaal hoga, aglay saal honay walay asian games no khelon ke events mein tabdeeli ki gayi jis mein kuch ka izafah aur baaz mein kami ki gayi hai baksng اورجیسو جسٹو ke muqablon ke events mein izafah sun-hwa hai
jabkay teer andazi ke muqablay ko drop kardiya gaya hai, khawateen ke football muqablay palam bang mein hunge, khawateen peraki ke baaz events barah e raast nahi dukhaay jayen ge
Indonesia  olympic committee ke sir barah aur asian games ki intizami committee ke chairman airk taher nay﻿ kaha hai ke asian games ke douran khiladion aur aafishlz ko ghair mamooli saholaten faraham ki jayen gi, muqami hotel mein asian games sports media forum se khitaab karte hue unhon nay﻿ kaha ke khelon ke tamam astidimz ki taamer aur Tazaeen  o Araish  aglay saal June  tak mukammal kar li jaye gi, media center mein 700 se zayed jr نلسٹ back waqt kaam kar saken ge jin ko jadeed saholaten di jayen ge, unhon nay﻿ kaha ke asian games ke water sports muqablay pelam bang mein hunge, un muqablon ke testing muqablay das se athaara feb taq Jakarta  mein hunge, unhon naay kaha kay Jakarta  mein traffic jaam ke masail ko hal karne ke liye teen aalmi company se madad li gayi jis mein London  olympic committee ki committee ke arkaan bhi shaamil hain jis par paanch project par kaam shuru hochuka hai jo June  mukammal hojaye ga, inho ne kaha kk_h hukoomat un khelon ke liye hamaray sath bhar poor تعااون kar rahi hai, unhon naay kaha ke 1962 ke baad Jakarta  doosri martaba un khelon ki میزہانی kar raha hai y, unhon naay kaha کہافتتا hi aur ikhtitami taqrebaat shaan daar hi nahi har aik ke liye yaad gaar saabit hogi, is mauqa par olympic council of asia ke saddar Sheikh  Fahd  ka khusoosi pegham ملاائیشیا ke numainday anthony nay﻿ sunaayaa, baad mein shurka ko asian games ke mukhtalif vinanu ki tayario ke barey mein video film ki madad se aagah kiya gaya, baad mein sawal jawab ka session sun-hwa
asian games ke muntazmeen naay un khelon ke douran baaz asiayi mulkon ki janib se –apne khiladion ke liye kuttay aur billi ke gosht ki dish faraham karne ki darkhwast par moazrat kar li hai, انڈونشین media kay mutabiq janoobi, shumali Korea , Japan , chain naay –apne baaz khiladion ke liye seen qisam ki dish ki farmaaish ki thi jis par muntazmeen naay moazrat karte hue kaha ke un ke liye aisa karna mumkin nahi hai, Albata  agar koi khilari is qisam ki dish sath laaye ga to is ki hifazat aur is ke qabil istemaal ke liye khusoosi saholaten day di jaye gi taakay ashya qabil istemaal reh sakay
Indonesia  ke wazeer khail mnh نہروانی nay﻿ kaha hai ke hum Pakistan  ke sath khail ke shobay میںتعلقات ko behtar bananay ke khwahish mand hai aur is silsilay mein Pakistan  ki har mumkin madad ke liye tayyar hain, jung se baat cheet karte hue inho ne kaha ke Pakistan  ke khiladion ko andor khelon ki coaching ke liye –apne khiladion ki khidmaat den ge, unhon nay﻿ kaha ke Pakistan  un dinon mushkil halaat se dochar hai, ghair mulki khilari paksta noon jaaney par razamand nahi hain is silsilay mein olympic council aa f asia ko bhi kirdaar ada karna ہوگاپاکستان میںانڈور khelon ki teamon ko bheja jaye, unhon ny kaha ke Pakistan  ke bad mntn, table tennis, jimnastik ke khilari Indonesia  mein trinng ke liye aana chahtay hain to un ke sath poora taawun kya jaye ga, Indonesia  –apne junior khiladion ko Pakistan  bhejnay ke liye tayyar hai, Pakistani  khilari Indonesia  ki bad mntn league mein hissa le satke hain, unhon ny bataya k_han ke malik mein football mein behtari aayi hai, kar kat ابعد ke club muqablay ho rahay hain, hockey ke domistk dhanchay ko behtar bananay ke liye Bharat  ke sabiq khiladion se baat cheet horahee hai jis ke malik mein club hockey ko mazboot andaaz mein ustuwar kya jaye ga
asian games ki intizami committee ny asian games ke logo aur مسکوٹ ke ronmayi ki aafishlz taqreeb munaqqid ki jis mein mulki saddar ny khusoosi tor par shirkat ki, is taqreeb mein asian games ki Mashal  ko malik bhar mein ghumanay ka elaan kya jis ka aaghaz aglay saal January  mein hoga
asian games sports media forum ke douran Palestine  se aaye wafad ne inkishaaf kya ke un ke malik mein kar kat ka khail taizi se maqbool ho raha hai galiyo aur sarkon par bachay aur nojawan barri tadaad mein kar kat khail rahay hotay hain, khatoon jr نلسٹ عبدلالطیف haijani ne bataya ke Pakistan  ke sabiq captain Misbah  Al Haq  aksar nojawanon ke pasandeeda khilari aur woh un ke video dekh kar –apne khail mein copy karte hain, unhon ne bataya ke Palestine  mein khawateen khiladion ko Israel  ki janib se shadeed muzahmat ka saamna karna parta hai, Israel  ki sarhad ke nazdeeqi ilaaqon se chaar khawateen khiladion ko chay mah qabal aghwaa kar liya gaya tha jin ke baaray mein ta haal koi ittila nahi mili hai
jis par shurka ne shadeed afsos aur dukh ka izhaar kya
asian games aargnayzng committee ke zair htmam honay walay asian گیمزاسپورٹس media forum mein mangal komkhtlf mulkon se aye hue wafood naay –apne malik mein khelon ke hawalay se report paish ki, asian games aargnayzng committee ke arkaan naay asian games mein honay walay events ki tayario ke baray mein tafseel se aagah kiya jis mein stadium, jmnazim mein honay wali Tazaeen  vaaraysh ke ilawa un khelon ke دورضاضاکاروں ki tadaad ke baray mein bhi bataya, jo un muqablon ke douran khiladion aur aafishlz ki rahnumai ke faraiz Najjan  den ge, baad mein shurka ko palam bang le jaya gaya jahan khawateen ke football, jodo krate, tai kwando, peraki, کینوئنگ, روئنگ ke ilawa, bowling ke muqablay hunge
un muqablon ke liye naye astidimz ke ilawa pranon par rang roghan ka kaam bhi jari hai, bowling muqablon ke liye 20 crore انڈونشین rupay ki maliyat ka naya ayrina bhi qaim kya ja raha hai
asian games ki intizami committee naay games ke douran khawateen ke peraki muqablon ke douran tamashaiyon ke liye mobile phone se تصاویربنانے par pabandi laganay ka faisla kya hai jis ka maqsad aam شہریوںکی taraf se un muqablon ki ghalat tashheer se rokna hai, muntazmeen ka kehna hai ke baaz karobari idaray apni ashya par is qisam tasaveer istemaal kar ke faida uthany ki koshish karte hain, khawateen swimming mein media ke numaindon ko bhi mobile se tasaveer khenchnay ki ijazat nahi hogi, sirf camera se tasaveer banai jasakay gi
, jabkay electronic media ko bhi khawateen ke baaz events ki barah e raast courage ki ijazat nahi di jaye gi inhen muntazmeen khud is event ki video faraham karen ge
Indonesia  ke soobay smtra salateen ke governor aliks noor Aldeen  nay﻿ kaha hai ke Pakistan  khail ke maidan mein bara naam hai, kar kat ke aalmi muqablon mein Pakistan  ki jeet par andonishin bhi khush hotay hain, Pakistani  media se baat cheet karte hue unhon nay﻿ kaha ke Pakistan  nay﻿ hockey mein barray aizaz jeetay magar ab khail mein is ki car kardagi achi nahi hai, snooker aur askwash mein is nay﻿ ftohat haasil kee, Pakistan  mein khelon ke aalmi muqablon ke nah honay se hamein bhi mayoosi hai, taham haal bhi kuch aalmi teamon ki aamad achi tabdeeli hai, Pakistan  mein aman ke hawalay ab bhi misbet khabrain kam aati hain, unhon ne kaha ke woh fori tor par Indonesia  ki table tennis, bed mntn, basket baal teamon aur deegar khiladion ke Pakistan  jaaney ka wada nahi kar saktay hain, Albata  Pakistani  andor khiladion ko trinng ke liye –apne malik mein bulanay ke liye tayyar hain jin ke akhrajaat bhi hamari hukoomat bardasht kere gi
Jakarta  mein raat ke waqt lout maar mein izafah hogaya hai jis ki wajah se shehrion ko pareshani ka saamna hai, asian games media forum mein shar kt ke liye nepal ke aik mard aur khatoon media person ko namaloom afraad naay chaako dikha kar lotney ki koshish ki taham police mobile ki aawaz sun kar rehzan bhaag gaye jis ke baad منتظمیننے tamam shurka ko raat ke waqt sarr koo par bila waja ghoomnay phirnay se rokkk diya, police hakkaam ka kehna hai ke unhon naay aik haftay ke douran chay afradko hirasat mein liya hai jin mein دوخواتین bhi shaamil hain un mein paanch ghair mulki hain
asian games aargnayzng committee ke tehat honay wala sports media forum budh ko khatam hogaya, چارروزہ forum ke douran 45 asiayi mulkon ke 300 ke lag bhag mard aur khawateen mandoobeen nay﻿ shar kt ki jin کووڈیو ki madad se un khelon ki tayari, mulki, kstmz qawaneen ke mutaliq khusoosi lecture dyagya, is mauqa par olympic council of asia ke saddar Sheikh  Ahmed  a لفہد alsbah nay﻿ pannay pegham mein kaha ke un khelon se انڈوونیشیا tamam asiayi mulkon ko nazdeek laane mein kaam yab hojaye ga, unhon nay﻿ kaha ke olympic khelon ko maqbool bananay ke silsilay mein Indonesia  ki y hamesha yaad rakhi jaye gi, unhon naay umeed zahir ki ke yeh maizbani ke hawalay se aik nai misaal qaim karen ge, chaar roza forum ke douran mandoobeen ko mushtarqa maizban shehron Jakarta  aur palam bang mein astidimz aur jmnazim ke tamirati کاموںکا nzarah bhi karaya gaya, muntazmeen ka daawa hai ke tamam tamirati kaam aindah saal March  taq mukammal ho jaien ge, palam bang mein olympic vilij ka decemeber mein khatam hojaye ga, palam bang mein dyie gaye ashayih mein bachiyon naay Indonesia  ka ilaqai raqs aur mulki Saqafat  paish ki, is mauqa par smtra سلطین soobay ke گورنرالیکس noor Aldeen  maheman khusoosi they un ko asian games mein khush bakhti ke liye Indonesia  ki rivayet ke mutabiq paan ke pattay mein mithai rakh kar paish ki gayi, governor ny paish kiye gaye paanchon pattoun ko daant se thora kaat kar dobarah plate mein rakha, is mauqa par –apne khitaab mein governor ny kaha ke un khelon se –apne malik ko muashi tor پرمضبوط bananay mein madad miley gi, Jakarta  mein mangal ki shab dyie gaye عشائی se khitaab karte hue indonesion aur asian games aargnayzng committee ke sir barah airk taher ny kaha ke un khelon ki maizbani bara challenge hai jis ka chalees feesad safar kamyabi se طعے hogaya hai, unhon nay﻿ kaha ke un muqablon se Indonesia  ke mahdanon aur parkon ko behtar bananay mein madad mili hai
unhon naay kaha ke asian games ke mauqa prhmari tayari ka asal khobsorat aur Hussain  chehra samnay aaye ga
Lahore  ( daily Pakistan  online ) wifaqi hukoomat ne ghair registered mobile phones bock karne ki hatmi tareekh ka elaan kar diya hai aur wifaqi wazeer mumlikat baraye revenue Hamad  azhar ka kehna hai ke 15 feb ke baad tamam ghair registered mobile phones bock kar diye jayen ge tafseelaat ke mutabiq Lahore  mein vahg_h border par world kstmz day ki munasbat se munaqidah taqreeb se khitaab ke baad media se guftagu karte hue wifaqi wazeer mumlikat Hamad  azhar ka kehna tha ke anay walay dinon mein malik ko smugling free malik bananay ke hawalay se iqdamaat kiye hain unhon ne kaha ke muashi package islahat ke liye laya gaya hai jis mein koi naya tax aed nahi kya gaya aur logon ko relief miley ga jabkay is se nai nokryan peda hon gi
unhon ney kaha ke mobile phone registration mein koi tosee nahi ki ja rahi, 15 feb ke baad tamam ghair registered mobile phones bock kar dyie jayen ge f ae tea f giray list se jald nikal jayen ge Mumbai  12 decemeber ( agency ) Bollywood adakara nargis Fakhri  ney anoshka sharmaa ki tareef ki hai nargis Fakhri  jald hi ہارر film amavas mein nazar ayen gi unhon ney anoshka sharmaa ki tareef ki hai aur kaha hai ke anoshka ney jis terhan film pari mein bhoot ka کردارنبھایا hai is se logon ka bhoot ke kirdaar ke tiyn nazriya badal gaya hai aur ab hiroynin bhooton par makhoz filme karne se guraiz nahi kar rahi hain unhon naay kaha mere liye kisi bhi film ki kahani ziyada ahmiyat rakhti hai lekin aap sahih keh rahi hain ab woh din gaye jab hiroynin ڈراونی filmon mein kaam karne se inkaar kar deti theen ab aap anoshka ko hi lijiye unhon naay nah sirf pari jaisi film banai balkay is mein kaam bhi kya jo aik ڈراونی film hi thi aur ab kayi adakarayin ہاررفلموں mein kaam karne ke liye agay aayi hain qabil zikar baat yeh hai ke film amaavas mein bhoshn patel hadaayat kaari ka kaam kar rahay hain jinhon naay is se qabal Ragni  am am s 2 aur alone jaisi draoni filmo mein hadaayat kaari ki thi film amaavas 11 January  2019 mein jalva gir hogi saal ka dosra grind سلام tournament French  open Paris  ke Maroof  ronald گیراس stadium mein shuru ho raha hai
yeh wahid klya court grand سلام tennis tournament hai jo guzashta 121 barson se shaiqeen tennis ki tavajja haasil kar raha hai
aglay mah roos mein honay walay foot baal world cupp se qabal yeh khelon ki duniya ki aik bohat barri ایکٹویٹی hai jo shaiqeen ko –apne sehar mubtala rakhay gi
spain ke رافیال Nadal  aik baar phir bharpoor form mein aa chuke hain
inhen aik martaba پھرفیورٹ qarar diya ja raha hai
woh 11 win martaba French  open title jeetnay ki koshish karen ge
is martaba inhen Roger  Federer  ke challenge ka saamna nahi ho ga kyunkay Roger  Federer  klya court season se pehlay hi break le chuke hain lekin naye nojawan khilari رافیال Nadal  ko tough time day satke hain
is ke bawajood Nadal  ko hi French  open ka fav qarar diya ja raha hai kyunkay klya court Nadal  ka pasandeeda hai
taees grand سلام title jeetnay ka aizaz rakhnay والی36 sala sirina Villiams  arsa daraaz ke baad kisi barri championship mein action mein dikhayi den gi
beti ki paidaiesh ki wajah se sirina Villiams  ne tennis se break li ho yi thi
inhen ranking bohat gir jaaane ki wajah se sidd playerz mein shaamil nahi kya gaya
Sarina  Villiams  French  open ko barri sanjeedgi se le rahi hain
yahi wajah hai ke rayl wedding mein shirkat ke baad Sarina  Villiams  fori tor par Paris  poanch gayeen aur unhon naay muqami academy mein subah o shaam ke session mein bharpoor training ka aagha zay kar diya
wrld number aik simona help French  open jeetnay ke liye barri be taab hain
unhon nay﻿ is khwahish ka izhaar kya hai ke woh is baras French  open jeetna chahti hain aur is ke liye unhon nay﻿ mehnat bhi khoob kar rakhi hai
simona help ney French  open se qabal klya court season mein achi form ka muzahira kiya hai lekin aalmi number aik khilari ko doosri khawateen khiladion ki taraf se sakht muqaabla darpaish hai
roos ki Marria  shirapowa bhi up set karne ke par toal rahi hain lekin un ki form mein tasalsul nahi hai
khail mein wapsi ke baad woh koi bara maarka nahi maar saki hain lekin French  open mein woh tehelka machane ki khwahish mand hain
yahan yokrayn ki aylina سویٹولینا ka tazkara nah karna zayad-ti hogi

Islamabad mein news conference karte hue maryam Orangzaib  ka kehna tha ke Imran  Khan  ny aayi am f ke paas nah jaany aur kashkaul tornay ka kaha tha
unhon ne kaha ke Fawad  chohadry ko sharam aani chahiye ke jinhon ne aayi am f ke paas nah jane ka daawa kya tha, qoum ko bataya jaye ke kin sharait par hukoomat aayi am f ke paas gayi
noon leaguei rehnuma ka kehna tha ke aayi am f ki deal se pehlay hi gas, tail ki qeematein kyun barhai gayeen? maryam Orangzaib  nay﻿ kaha ke yeh koi ittafaq nahi ke aik din mein dollar ki qeemat mein 10 rupay ka izafah hogaya aur stock market mein tareekhi mandi ki wajah se qoum ko aagah karen
un ka kehna tha ke dollar ki qeemat mein izafah karkay kis sarmaya daar group ko faida pohanchaya gaya uska naam bitayen, maryam Orangzaib  nay﻿ kaha ke Asad  Umar  ko mohlat hai sarmaya daar ka naam btadin warna mein btadon gi
mazeed parheen :' Imran  Khan  brhhkin nah marain, lُota sun-hwa paisa wapas layein' noon leaguei rehnuma naay kaha ke zrِ mubadla mein kami, tareekhi mehengai, load shedding hui hai, is par koi tawajah nahi hai lekin toilet ki safai wazeer e azam khud dekhen ge, yeh koi kaam hai? maryam Orangzaib  naay kaha ke Shahbaz  shareef ko siyasi intiqam ka nishana banaya gaya, is case mein girftar kya jo Shahbaz  shareef naay khud rkwaya tha, sirf aik mafroozay ki bunyaad par inhen girftar kya gaya
unhon ne kaha ke Shahbaz  shareef ki fi alfoor rihayi ka mutalba karte hain
maryam Orangzaib  ka kehna tha ke Fawad  chohadry kehte hain 90 arkaan hon ge to ijlaas bulaa len ge, aap speaker sahib se pooch len 90 arkaan ke dastakhat mojood hain
sabiq wazeer it-tila-aat ne kaha ke wizarat it-tila-aat aur wizarat Uzma ke kuch takazey hain, Fawad  chohadry aap ab tehreek insaaf ke tarjuman nahi pin
yeh bhi parheen :' syastdanon ko bad unwan bana kar paish karna malik dushmani hai' un ka kehna tha ke jab jab hukoomat jhoot bolay gi, hum awam ko tab tab اگاہ karen ge, Fawad  chohadry fac news ki Website par apna aik section bhi banalen
maryam Orangzaib  ne kaha ke hamaray daur mein oppostion ki press conference ke liye pi aayi d par bohat ehtijaj sun-hwa, hamein intzaar rahay ga ke Fawad  chohadry kab oppostion ke liye pi aayi d ko khollen ge
un ka kehna tha ke pehlay ehatasab commission ko tala lagaya rakha ab yeh pi ae si ko bhi chalne nahi dena chahtay, pi ae si ka chairman oppostion leader ban gaya to 80 arab rupay ke کھڈوں ki pooch gach kon kere ga? unhon ny mazeed kaha ke kehte they ke corruption ka shore karte hain to hukoomat ke pait mein dard hojata hai, ab bitayen Mahmood  alrshid ke betay ko kis haalat mein girftar kya gaya? pak patan ke d pi o ko kyun moattal kya gaya? maryam Orangzaib  ny kaha ke aayi jee Punjab  Mohammad  taher ko kyun hataya gaya? naye aayi jee se zimni intikhabaat mein nataij lainay hain is liye tabadlah kya gaya jabkay zimni intikhabaat ke elaan ke baad aisa koi tabadlah nahi kiya ja sakta
noon leaguei rehnuma neh railway ki karkardagi par tanqeed karte hue kaha ke railway se mutaliq logon ko tamasha dekhaya ja raha hai, hamaray daur mein railway mein 5 hazaar nokriyan tareeqa car ke mutabiq di gayeen
unhon ne kaha ke 5 saal mein daidh crore musafiron ka izafah sun-hwa, hamaray daur mein railway ki amdan 18 se 50 arab rupay barhi

hamaray jism ke andar har waqt mutadid ahem amal jari rehtay hain jo harmonz control karte hain manen ya nah manen magar mardon ke muqablay mein khawateen mein harmonz ka nizaam ziyada paicheeda hota hai aur is mein inteshaar ka imkaan bhi ziyada hota hai yeh janna zurori hai ke harmonz ka nizaam mutasir ho to mizaaj rawayya achi shakhsiyat aur zahiri roop bhi mutasir hotay hain magar un nishanion ko samajhney ki zaroorat hai taakay khawateen jaan saken ke un ke harmonz ka nizaam mutasir ho raha hai aur phir is hawalay se dr se rujoo kya jana chahiye keel mahasay aur black head is waqt namodaar hotay hain jab massam bock ho jatay hain taham kuch tibbi mahireen ka daawa hai ke keel mahason ka be waqt niklana jism mein harmonz mein achanak tabdeeli ka nateeja hota hai misaal ke tor par اینڈروجن ki satah mein kami poooray jism par keel mahason ka baais banti hai aisa nojawani ke daur mein khawateen ke sath aksar hota hai taham darmiyani Umar  mein bhi is ka imkaan hota hai agar kisi khatoon ko aksar sar dar ki shikayat rehti hai zehni تناؤ ya thakawat se hatt kar to yeh ایسٹروجن ki satah mein kami ka nateeja ho sakta hai ایسٹروجن aisa hormone jo khawateen mein dimagh aur reerh ki haddi ke میٹابولک prasis ko control karta hai agar is ki miqdaar bohat ziyada ya bohat kam hojaye to adhay sarka dard ya chirchiray pan ki shikayat honay lagti hai be khwabi aik khatarnaak alamat hai kyunkay yeh پروجسٹرون ki intehai kam satah se jari hoti hai tibbi mahireen ke mutabiq yeh hormone qudrati tor par pursukoon rakhta hai aur neend ko mamool par lata hai is ki satah mein tabdeeli aksar be khwabi ka baais banti hai aam tor par khawateen jab bachon ko janam deti hain to ایسٹروجن aur پروجسٹرون ki satah mein kami dekhnay mein aati hai magar is se hatt kar aisa nahi hota to agar aisa ho to yeh dr se rujoo karne ka ishara hai achanak bohat ziyada paseena behna ya bukhaar harmonz ke tawazun mein garbar ki barri alamaat mein se aik hai harmonz jismani darjah hararat ko control karte hain aur un mein Adam  tawazun ki soorat mein achanak garmi ka ehsas barh jata hai paseena behna lagta hai aur bukhaar jaisi kefiyat taari hojati hai har aik ko kisi nah kisi waqt thakawat ka saamna hota hai taham agar kisi khatoon ko har waqt thakawat ka ehsas ho chahay munasib aaram hi kyun nah kar rahi hon to yeh harmonz mein Adam  tawazun ki alamat hosakti hai
tibbi mahireen ke mutabiq shadeed thakawat thai رائیڈ harmonz ban'nay ke amal mein masail ka nateeja hosakti hai balon ka girna balon ka bohat ziyada girna bhi thai رائیڈ ansolin ya ٹیسٹوسیٹرون ka nateeja ho sakta hai misaal ke tor par mardon mein yeh harmonz un ke jism ko bhaari aur balon se bharta hai magar khawateen mein is hormone ki ziyada miqdaar aksar ganj pan ki janib le jati hai thar paar kar ke qeht zada ilaqay mein غدائیت ki kami gurbat iflaas bemariyan musalsal insani jaanen le rahi hain نومولودوں se le kar chuuti Umar  ke masoom bachay durust ilaaj nah ho saknay ke baais musalsal mout ki agosh mein ja rahay hain mehakma sahet ke zaraye ke mutabiq thar park ke soul hospital muthi mein teen mazeed bachay intqaal kar gaye zaraye mehakma sahet ka mazeed kehna hai ke intqaal karne walay bachon mein 2 nomolood shaamil they jabkay aik ki Umar  15 din thi un bachon ki amwaat guzashta 24 ghanton ke douran huien jin ka sabab ghizaiyat ki kami o deegar amraaz they mehakma sahet ke zaraye ka kehna hai ke rawan mah ghizaiyat ki kami aur bimarion ke baais intqaal karne walay bachon ki tadaad 40 ho gayi hai tasweer ke copy write reuters image caption indian note India  mein puranay noton par pabandi ke baad jari honay walay naye do hazaar, paanch so aur with so ke note ab nepal mein istemaal nahi kiye ja saken ge
India  mein 2016میں noton prpabndi ke amal ke baad do hazaar, paanch so, do so aur pachaas ke naye note jari kiye thay
moodi hukoomat ki janab se sunah 2016میں paanch so aur aik hazaar ke puranay note band kiye jane ke baad do hazaar, paanch so, do so, so aur pachaas rupiye ke naye note jari kiye gaye thay
is amal ke do baras baad nepal neh un mein se do ہزارن paanch so aur do so ke noton par pabandi laga di hai
yeh bhi padhiye India  : currency note par pabandi ke baad bankon mein afratafri' mun dikhayi mein puranay note dainay parrin ge' nepal ki dar-al-hakoomat mein mojood bi bi si hindi ke radio editor rajesh joshi ne bataya ke' sarkari tarjuman gokl باسکوٹا ka kehna hai ke do hazaar, paanch so aur do so rupay ke indian noton ko rakhna, un ke badlay koi ashya khareedna ya inhen nepal ke andar lana ghair qanooni hai
' tasweer ke copy right reuters unhon ne bataya ke India  mein puranay noton par pabandi ke amal ke baad se hi yeh masla mauzo behas hai
do baras baad kyun utha yeh sawal indian currency nepal mein aasani se chalti thi
nepal ke mutadid muqami afraad ka kehna hai ke un ke paas ab bhi India  ke puranay aik hazaar aur paanch so rupay ke kayi note hain, jinhein wapas nahi liya gaya hai

canada duniya bhar ke emergency room mein jab julne walay mareezon ko laya jata hai to pehlay dr julne ki zakhamo ki noiyat is ki geherai aur phelao ko dekhte hue is ke julne ke darjon ka andaza lagatay hain jis mein waqt lagta hai lekin digital انفراریڈ tharmo graphi se yeh kaam bohat aasaan ho sakta hai canada ki mِk gِl university ke maahir hoze loyis رامریز garshya لیونا aur un ke sathiyon ne pi ail o s one mein aik report shaya karai hai jis mein kaha gaya hai ke kisi takleef ke baghair digital انفراریڈ تھرموگرافی ke zariye fori tor par julne ke zakham ka andaza lagaya ja sakta hai is technology mein jism se kharij honay wali hararat ko dekha jata hai insani jism mein hararat ka inhisaar khoon ke bahao par hota hai is terhan zakham ke andar khoon ke bahao aur mojoodgi ko dekhnay ke liye yeh aik behtar tareeqa hai is terhan baar baar mahireen thrml امیجنگ ke zariye maloom kar saktay hain ke aaya zakham theek ho bhi raha hai ya mazeed kharab ho raha hai hum jantay hain ke julne ke bad tareen amal mein khoon ki ragein shadeed mutasir hoti hain is terhan khoon ke zariye ahem ajza agay nahi poanch paate aur yun laakh koshisho ke bawajood bhi zakham durust nahi hopata mahireen ney is digital انفراریڈ tharmo graphi ke zariye zakham ke bharnay ki pishgoyi ka aik tareeqa bhi waza kya hai is mein zakham ke تھرموگرام le kar is ka mawazna sahet mand jald se kya jata hai zakham ke تھرموگرام ki tabdeelian is waqt tak dekhi jati hain jab tak woh sayhat mand mand jald ki terhan ka aks nahi deta is ke baad kayi تھرموگرام ( jald ke julne ki tasaveer ) ko masnoi zahanat ke zariye jancha jata hai aur sirf darja hararat ki tabdeeli se hi zakham ke bharnay ki pishgoyi ki gayi jis mein 90 feesad durusti dekhi gayi mِk gِl mahireen ke mutabiq yeh nizaam mareez ke liye aik behtareen paishgoey karta hai is ki badolat zakham mein murda hissay bhi shanakht kiye jasakte hain yahan tak ke ilaaj ke tareeqay aur mareez ke hospital mein rehne ki muddat ki paishgoey bhi mumkin hai Pakistan  aur Bharti  sarhadoon par kasheedgi ho, wahan jharpen jari hon ya taluqaat paicheedgi ka shikaar hon

tamam ghair mawafiq halaat aur avnch neech ke bawajood Pakistan , Bharti  filmon aur deramo ki dilkash market hai
malik bhar mein Bharti  filmon ka business kamyabi se jari hai aur koi maheena ya hafta aisa nahi jata jab koi nah koi Bharti  film aaccha business nah karti ho
is ki aik taaza misaal guzashta haftay release honay wali film' soi dhaga' hai
' soi dhaga' Bharat  ki kamyaab tareen film saaz companies mein se aik' yash raaj films' ki nai peshkash hai jo Bharat  ke sath sath Pakistan  mein bhi release hui aur guzashta haftay aaccha business karne wali filmon mein sar-e fehrist rahi
Pakistani  company' dstri byoshn club' ki ohdedar سدرا Ahmed  naay v o ko bataya hai ke film naay release ke pehlay roz aath crore, dosray roz 12 crore jab ke teesray roz paanch crore rupay se ziyada ka business kya
yeh raqam majmoi tor par 36 crore rupay se ziyada banti hai
film ki cast mein vron dhon aur anoshka sharmaa sar-e fehrist hain jab ke baqi cast mein ziyada tar ghair Maroof  fankar hain
film ke producer adtih chopra hain

idhar Pakistan  mein haliya barson mein ban'nay wali aik darjan se zayed filme aisi hain jo tayyar honay ke bawajood release nahi hosaki hain
un mein syed noor ki teen filme jab ke Danish  taimoor, Ahsen  Khan , maamar rana aur Sangeeta  ki kayi filme shaamil hain
un filmon ki release mein takheer ki wajah Bharat  ki masalha filmon ke samnay muqami filmon ke nakaam hojane ya khatir khuwa business nah kar panay ka khauf hai

shayad yahi wajah hai ke woh teen filme tayyar honay ke bawajood inhen release nahi kar rahay
yeh bhi ho sakta hai ke inhen kisi munasib waqt ka intzaar ho

un ke bakol maamar rana film industry ka purana aur kamyaab naam hai lekin un ki bhi aik film' bhai wantd' takmeel ke bawajood takheer ka shikaar hai

kuch filmon ne ost darjay ka business bhi kya jis ki bunyaad par inhen flop nahi kaha ja sakta
lekin un filmon ki kamyabi ke darmiyan kayi kayi barson ka farq hai

filmi halqon ke mutabiq Pakistan  film industry ko is manzil taq pounchanay mein abhi bhi kayi saal ya mumkin hai ashray darkaar hon ge
jab aap kisi sard din ghar se bahar nikaltay hain to ziyada imkanaat is baat ke hotay hain ke aap ki ungelian hi sab se ziyada thand bardasht karen gi, yeh mamool ki baat hai kyunkay is mausam mein jism ziyada khoon aur hararat ahem aaza jaisay dil, dimagh aur pehphron ko pehlay faraham karta hai
taham agar aap ki ungelian garam mahol mein bhi har waqt kisi barf ki terhan thandhi rahen to yeh kisi bemari ki alamat bhi hosakti hai
yeh intibah America  mein honay wali mukhtalif tibbi tehqeeqi reports mein samnay aaya hai aur is se waqfiyat aap ki sehat ko la-haq khatraat se tahaffuz day sakti hai
khoon ki gardish ki ravani mein masail New York ke ail aayi jay health system ki tahaqeeq mein bataya gaya hai ke khoon ki farahmi mein masail ke baais bhi logon ki ungelian har waqt thandhi reh sakti hain
aisa is wajah se hota hai ke nutrition aur oxygen se bharpoor khoon ka بہاؤ jism mein kam honay lagta hai ya dil ki khoon pump karne ki salahiyat mutasir hochuki hoti hai
mohqiqeen ka kehna hai ke jab dil jism ke mukhtalif hisson ko munasib miqdaar mein khoon faraham nahi krpata to is ka asar hathon aur peeron mein thandak, be hisi ya soyyan chubne jaisay ehsas se hota hai
اینیمیا ( khoon ki kami ) New York university ke mutabiq اینیمیا ke marz mein jism mein khoon ke surkh khaliyaat ki kami hojati hai ya khoon mein haemoglobin ki sharah kam hojati hai, is marz mein mubtala honay ki soorat mein jism mein oxygen ki supply mutasir hoti hai jis ka nateeja hathon ki thandak ki shakal mein nikalta hai, is marz ki mumkina wajohaat mein ghiza mein iron ki na kafi miqdaar, kisi wajah se khoon ka ziyada miqdaar mein beh jana, kuch aqsam ke kinsrz aur maiday ke masail waghera shaamil hain, hathon ko thanda karne ke sath sath yeh marz sar dar, sir chakranay, saans lainay mein mushkil aur zard jald jaisay masail ka bhi baais ban sakta hai
lau blood pressure blood pressure ki satah mein kami ki wajohaat mein jism mein pani ki kami, khoon ka ziyada miqdaar mein beh jana aur makhsoos adwiyaat waghera hosakti hain, jab blood pressure ki satah kam hoti hai to khoon ki shareyanien barah e raast ahem aaza ko khoon faraham karne lagti hain jis ke nateejay mein ungelian thandhi prhjati hain
agar aap ko sir chakranay, nazar dhndlane, matli, kamzoree aur uljan jaisi alamaat mehsoos hon to dr se rujoo karna ziyada behtar hota hai
تناؤ aur khauf yeh to aksar afraad ko maloom hai ke zehni تناؤ jism ke mukhtalif hisson par asraat muratab karta hai aur jab kisi fard ko shadeed تناؤ ya khauf ka saamna hota hai to jism aik makhsoos rad-e-amal ka izhaar karta hai jis ke nateejay mein khoon ki shareyanien suker jati hain aur ungelian aur haath thanday par jatay hain, –apne تناؤ ki satah ko mamool par rakhna is takleef se nijaat dila deta hai
tambaku noshi agar aap ke paas cigrette se mun mornay ki wajohaat kam hain to is mein aik aur ka izafah karlen, cigrette noshi se jism mein daakhil honay wala نکوٹین khoon ki sharianon ko sukairh deta hai aur yeh sharianon mein rukawat ka bhi baais bantaa hai, jis se khoon ki ravani mutasir hoti hai aur ungelian barf ki dali ki terhan mehsoos honay lagti hain

internet ki Website red aِt se baat karte hue bil Gates  ne kaha ke' کرپٹو currency khatarnaak hai aur mout ka sabab banti hai
' bil Gates  ke mutabiq کرپٹو currency ka aik bara masla yeh hai ke hakkaam un ki nigrani nahi kar satke aur unhon ny –apne khadshay izhaar kya ke is currency ke istemaal se muashray mein manfi asraat samnay ayen ge
کرپٹو کرنسیاں :' kalay dhun ko safaid kya ja raha hai' dijtl currency Butt  coin ki qeemat mein zabardast izafah chicago mein Butt  coin mein pehli baar tijarat ka aaghaz' hukoomaton ki salahiyat jis ki madad se woh kalay dhun ko safaid karne wali raqam, tax chori aur dehshat gardi ki maali muawnat ki nigrani karte hain muashray ke liye achi baat hai
' unhon nay﻿ کرپٹو currency ke baray mein mazeed kaha :' کرپٹو currency ki khaas baat hai ke unhein namaloom tor par istemaal kya ja sakta hai aur yeh achi baat nahi hai
log is ki madad se jaan lewa manshiat kharedtay hain jis se logon ki barah e raast mout waqay hoti hai
' tasweer ke copy right getty images bil Gates  ne apni guftagu mein کرپٹو currency ke ilawa deegar technology ke baaray mein bhi tabsarah kya
ٹیسلا aur space x ke baani aylon museek ki nai akhtra hyper لووپ, jis ki madad se barq-e raftaar safar mumkin ho sakay ga, ke baarey mein bil Gates  ka kehna tha ke' safar karne ka yeh tasawwur kuch wazeh nahi hai aur is mein hifazat o salamti barqarar rakhna aaasaaan nahi hoga

' hamein chahiye ke logon ko nai anay wali nokryon ke baaray mein seekhiye
' lekin apni guftagu mein bil Gates  naay khatray ki ghanti bhi bajai jab unhon naay kaha ke duniya bhar ke muashi nizaam ki sahet achi nahi hai aur unhon naay –apne khayaal ka izhaar karte hue kaha ke' hum mustaqbil mein dobarah aisay muashi bohraan ka saamna kar satke hain jaissa 2008 mein aaya tha
' Islamabad ( new زڈیسک ) Amrici  mahireen nay﻿ Sooraj  aur sun-hwa jaisay qabil e tajdeed ( رینیوایبل ) zaraye se ban'nay wali bijli ko مؤثر andaaz mein jama karne wala aik nizaam design kya hai jisay' dabbay mein Sooraj ' ka naam diya gaya hai
wazeh rahay ke qabil e tajdeed zaraye tawanai ko jama karne ka مؤثر nizaam duniya mein kahin mojood nahi aur isi bana par yeh hota hai ke hazaron shamsi tkhtyon ( solr pinlz ) ki bijli Sooraj  doubtey hi munqita hojati hai
isi soch ke tehat misa چیوسیٹس insti tute of technology ( am aayi tea ) ke science danon ka naya design wind ٹربائن aur solar planet band honay ki soorat mein bhi aik wasee ilaqay ko bijli faraham کرسکت hai
jis se dabbay mein Sooraj  kaha ja raha hai woh aisay barray barray box hain jin mein maya slikon rakhi jasakay gi aur yeh murawaja batrion ( maslan لیتھیئم ion ) se kahin ziada مؤثر bhi hoga
is ke zariye bijli faraham karne walay nizaam ya grid ko bhi bijli faraham ki jasakay gi
am aayi tea ke shoba mikinkl engineering ke پروفیسرایسی gun henry aur un ke sathiyon ny kaha hai ke agar yeh technology kamyaab hojati hai to tawanai ko jama karne ka aik bohat bara challenge hal hojaye ga
is ikhtira ki tafseelaat journal of anrji and aynwayrmintl science mein shaya hui hai
lekin naya model solr sale ki bajaye shamsi آئنوں ki murtakiz honay wali hararat ko jama karta hai aur bijli ki bajaye hararat ko jama karna qadray aasaan aur kam kharch hota hai
is mein garam maya سلیکن ko istemaal kya jaye ga avrphr usay aik hate ایکسچینر pipe se guzaar kar kisi maya ko bhaap mein tabdeel karkay is se ٹربائن chlakr bijli banai jasakay gi
lekin is ke liye poooray nizaam ko buland daraja hararat bardasht karne ke qabil banana hoga taakay woh is amal mein peda honay wali 4000 darjay فیرن hieght garmi ko bardasht kya jasakay
is ka dosra version فوٹووولٹائک ya solar sale bijli ko bhi hararat mein tabdeel karkay jama kya ja sakta hai
poooray nizaam ka naam tea ای jee s am pi v rakha gaya hai
گریفائٹ aur maya سلیکن ke barray barray tinkon mein garam honay ke baad slikon raat ke waqt dehakta sun-hwa roshan material ban jaye ga
phir usay ٹیوبوں mein bhar kar solr sale ke oopar se guzara jaye ga aur woh is roshni se bijli banayen ge
ab yeh thanda maya dobarah tank mein aaye ga aur subah dhoop niklny par usay dobarah garam kya jasakay ga
isi terhan tank se tawanai haasil karne ka silsila jari rahay ga

کوونزنے veils na qabil yaqeen had tak ba-salahiyat africi Amrici  adakara کوونزے veils 2003 hamza mein lozyana, America  mein peda huien
unhon ny aik truck driver ki beti honay ke bawajood apni madad aap ke tehat apni salahiyaton ko nkhara aur kam suni mein globl اسٹاربن gayeen

is film ne inhen raton raat shohrat ki bulandi par pouncha diya
sath hi woh 21 win sadi mein peda honay wali pehli shakhsiyat ban gayeen, jin ka naam oscar ke liye naamzad sun-hwa
kolarado : duniya ka sab se chhota transstr tayyar karliya gaya hai jis ke choraai sirf 2.5? نینومیٹرہے, usay duniya ka sab se chhota 3D transstr kaha ja sakta hai, is waqt jitne bhi transstr ban rahay hain yeh un se aik tahai chhota hai
misa چیوسیٹس insti tute of technology ( am aayi tea ) aur university of kolarado ke mahireen ne usay mushtarqa kawish se banaya hai
transstr ki tayari mein مائیکرو fabrication tareeqa ikhtiyar kya gaya hai jo zahir karta hai ke ٹرانسسٹروں ko mazeed chhota karna mumkin hai
wazeh rahay ke jadeed tareen kaarkhanon mein 14 نینومیٹر choray transstr aam they jin ki had pehlay 10 nino meter aur phir 7 nino meter taq pohanchi jin ke zariye Apple  nay﻿ ae aayi two بایونک processor bana kar duniya mein shohrat haasil ki
taham yeh record bilkul nai technology مائیکرو فیبریکشین tareeqay mein kuch misbet tabdeelion ke baad kya gaya hai
tabdeel shuda مائیکرو fibrikshn tareeqay ko' thrml ایٹامک layer ایچنگ' ( thrml ae ail ای ) ka naam diya gaya hai
engineers naay pehlay mashhoor Simi  conductor انڈیئم گیلیئم آرسینائڈ istemaal kya aur is ka saamna hydrogen floride se karaya
is terhan dhaati floride ki aik bareek substrate ( androoni ) parat wujood mein aayi
is ke baad aik namiati murakkab die methyl aluminium کلورائیڈ ( d am ae si ) dala gaya jis se aik taamul shuru sun-hwa
is amal mein ion dhaati floride se jurne lagey aur dhaati satah par atom jama honay lagey
is amal ko secron baar d_hraya gaya jisay mahireen pyaaz ke chilkay utaarnay ka amal batatay hain
ahem baat yeh hai ke dhai nino meter chaura yeh 3D transstr karkardagi mein deegar transstr se 60 feesad behtar hai aur tawanai kam istemaal karta hai
is achi khabar se yun lagta hai ke duniya mein barqiyat ka mazeed سکڑاؤ jari rahay ga aur hum is ki tabee hudood ki band gali mein pounchanay se bach jayen ge
Mumbai  ( شوبزڈیسک ) Bollywood adakar Amitabh  bachchan aur Shah  rukh Khan  film badla mein aik sath nazar ayen ge Bharti  zaraye ablaagh ke mutabiq dono adakar فلمسا zay سجو ye gho sh ki تھریلر film badla mein aik sath dikha yi den ge film mein Amitabh  Shah  rukh Khan  aur تاپسی pno ahem krdarada karen ge Amitabh  aik police Afsar  hon تاپسی working women jabkay Shah  rukh تاپسی pno ke shohar ka kirdaar ada karen ge yeh haspanwi film se makhoz hai Shah  rukh zero ki release ke baad badla ki aks bandi shuru karen ge wazeh rahay Amitabh  aur Shah  rukh kabhi khushi kabhi gham muhabbaten kabhi alwida nah kehna aur bhoot nath jaisi filmon mein bhi aik sath kaam kar chukay hain Mirza  Shahid  barlas aqwam mutahidda ka zeli idaara inter گورنمنٹل panel of kalla ئمیٹ change ( aayi pi si si ) ki janib se paish kardah report mein aalmi hiddat ( globle waar mangg ) se muqaabla karne ke liye zameeni mahol mein ki jany wali kuch درستگیاں manzar aam par layi gayi hain
go ke is mein geo engineering ki baabat mukhtasir tor par bta ya gaya hai
mahireen ka kehna hai ke kuch kalla ئمیٹ model se zahir hota hai ke aalmi hiddat ko 2 degree centi gir ‫d se ziyada nah badhaane ke liye geo engineering ke iqdamaat na گذیر hain
geo engineering ki ziyada tar tiknalojiz mein ya to shamsi shu-aon ( dhoop ) ko masnoi baadalon se fiza mein munakis kya ja taa hai ya mahol میںموجود green house gasson ki kasheed karkay a noon ki miqdaar mein kami ki jati hai
baad azan tecnology ko manfi ikhraj ke naam se manon kya ja taa hai, jis mein minaar bana kar fiza se carbon dioxide ko kasheed kya ja taa hai jo pissi hui chitta no n se ree act karkay fiza se rafa ho jati hai
lekin baaz mahireen ka kehna hai ke yeh tiknalojiz abhi taq ghair saabit shuda hain jin ke asraat ghair maloom hain
aayi pi si si ki report tayyar karne walon ka kehna hai ke is baat ke scienci shawahid samnay aaye hain ke sirf ikhraj mein kami nateeja khaiz nahi ho gi
mahireen ke mutabiq is report mein khaas tor par is baat ka mushahida kya gaya hai ke barray pemanay pur aab wahwa ki makoos tabdeeli ke liye aik lambay Ar  se tak zameeni mahol se carbon dioxide ki kasheed zaroori ho gi
chand کلائمیٹ model se andaza laga ya gaya hai ke temper یچر ko 2 degree centi gir ‫d se kam کررکھنے ke liye mahol se carbon dioxide ka manfi ikhraj laazmi hoga
is ke baad shamsi inikaas tar تیب solar radiation management اورکاربن die oxide ke manfi ikhraj carbondioxide removal jaisay iqdamaat ka mukammal jaiza le kar un ki aabb wahwa ki tabdeeli par ifadiyat ke saboot haasil karne hon ge
Bar  tanih mein qaim لیڈزکی yonyo rusty mein کلائمیٹ chenge ke par وفیسر پائرس فارسٹر jo is report mein bhi shaamil they, un ka kehna hai ke is baat ki shahadat mojood hai ke agar aap ikhraj mein kami ki policy nahi apnatay to mustaqbil mein aisay nagawaar iqdamaat karne parrin ge
mojooda waqt mein bohat chhootey pemana par geo engineering ke pilot mansoobay kaam kar rahay hain, jis mein mahol se carbon nikaalte ke liye dobarah janglaat laganay ke ilawa bayo feul ha salle karne walay poudoon se carbon ko khatam karna hai
un mansoobon par reserch karne walay science daan is par shaaki hain ke un mansoobon par reserch karne ke liye fndz ki intahi kami hai
lekin is report ke baad yeh rawayya tabdeel ho sakta hai
is report se yeh wazeh hota hai ke ab kisi hadd taq un tajaweez par amal dar aamad ke liye hukoomaton ki dil chaspi barh rahi hai
yeh baat can کالڈیرانے kahi thi jo kili for naya ke اسٹینفورڈیونیورسٹی ke car نیگی insti tution of science mein kalla ئمنٹ par reserch karte hain
un ka mazeed kehna tha ke is ka andaza laga na mushkil hoga ke kitney fund ka izafah hakoomati dil chaspi bherne ke baais hoga aur kitna report anay ke baad hoga
mahireen ke mutabiq geo engineering tiknik ki baabat sirf fndz ka masla nahi hai balkay is ki technical mumkinaat, samaji qabuliat, wusat aur is ke zeli asraat ki baabat kayi sawalaat peda ho te hain
Bar  tanih ki آکسفورڈیونیورسٹی ke جیوانجینئرنگ پروگر umm ke manager ka kehna hai ke policy saaz aisay zaroori salawon ke jawab haasil kiye baghair hi mutmaen hain
geo engineering ke bohat se mahireen koyh shikayat hai ke is maidan mein tehqeeq ki shadeed kami hai, is liye a noon tiknalojiz ka barray pemanay par istemaal bohat kam ho raha hai
fi al haal is baat par ghhor kya ja raha hai ke reserch o ray dyolpmint ke baad kon si technology munasib tar yan hain aur aarktk ki barf par reserch se mahireen ko yeh jan-nay ko bhi miley ga ke kis tar h mudakhlat kar ke samandar ki satah mein izafay ko sust kya ja sakta hai
ilawa azeen baadalon par reserch kar ke yeh maloom kya jasakay ga ke shamsi shu-aon ki ridishn ko kis tar h control kya ja sakta hai
Pakistan  mein gurday nakara honay ki bemari aam honay lagi Islamabad malik bhar mein gurday nakara honay ki bemari aam ho gayi jab ke gurdon ki bemari ke baais Pakistan  mein salana 20 hazaar afraad amwaat hoti hain gurday nakara honay ke baais wifaqi dar-al-hakoomat Islamabad ke pmz hospital mein waqay dialisis unit mein guzashta 5 baras ke douran kal 72294 martaba mareezon ke dialisis kiye gaye hain hospital mein rawan baras January  ke douran 1850 martaba mareezon ke dialisis kiye gaye hain guzashta chand Bar  soon mein mareekh ke hawalay mutadid khabrain samnay aa rahi hain ab mahireen naay mareekh par oxygen ki munasib miqdaar daryaft ki hai aik report ke mutabiq yahan par mojood matti mein oxygen mojood hai mareekh par beje gaye khalayi robot کیوروسٹی naay chand pathar bhi dekhe hain jo oxygen se bhar poor hain mahireen ka andaza hai ke shayad yeh amal baar baar pani ke androoni رسائو ki wajah se amal Pazeer  sun-hwa hoga ilawa azeen mareekh par namkeen pani ke zakhair bhi miley hain jahan oxygen bohat ziyada miqdaar mein hosakti hai is binaa par science daan ka kehna hai ke mareekh ki matti taley mojood oxygen ki miqdaar saada hayaat ke liye kaafi hosakti hai California mein qaim jet proplshn laboratory ( jay pi ail ) ke science daan اسٹاکن کووچ ke mutabiq mareekh ke mukhtalif maqamat par herat angaiz Dur  یافتیں ki hain jo namkeen pani ke zakhair ki soorat mein mojood hain is mein bacteria aur sponge ki nashonuma ke liye oxygen ki bhar poor miqdaar payi jati hai jo jandaroon ko baasani zindah rakh sakti hai lekin mahireen ka kehna hai ke un daryafton ka har gaz yeh matlab nahi ke mareekh par zindagi daryaft karli gayi hai sirf is ke imkanaat ko zahir kya hai aur agar mojood bhi hai tab bhi is ki azmaish ke liye fi al haal koi tecnology nahi hai taa hum is zimn mein 2020 hamza mein Nasa  apna aik jadeed tareen robot mareekh par beje ga roos mein turkey ke tmatron ki barhti ho maang ke baad 5 mazeed roosi companiyon ney mehakma tahaffuz nabataat ke tavassut se tark wizarat zaraat ki zair zamanat tmatron ki daraamad ka faisla kiya hai
roos ke zaraye ablaagh ke mutabiq roos ki 5 companiyon ki janib se roosi mehakma tahaffuz nabataat ke tavassut se tark wizarat zaraat ki zair zamanat tmatron ki daraamad par amal daraamad ka silsila jummay ko shuru sun-hwa
wazeh rahay ke roosi mahireen ne guzashta saal timatar daraamad karne walay mutaliqa companiyon ka mukammal mushahida kya tha jis ke baad inhen mazeed timatar daraamad karne ki ijazat di thi
mahireen ka kehna hai ke turkey se tmatron ki daraamad ke baad mulki talabb ko poora kya ja sakay ga science daano ka kehna hai ke khawateen ka dimagh –apne hum Umar  mardon ke mad-muqabil teen saal ziyada jawan hota hai vashngtn Amrici  scienci journal national academy of science mein shaya honay walay aik mutanazia maqalay mein science daano ka kehna hai ke khawateen ka dimagh apni Umar  ke mardon ke muqablay mein 3 saal ziyada jawan hota hai yahi wajah hai ke khawateen zaefi ki Umar  ko poanch kar bhi zehni amraaz se nisbatan mehfooz rehti hain vashngtn university ke science daano naay logon ke zehen ki تحولی Umar  jan-nay ke liye jadeed scienci bunyadon par tahaqeeq ki jis ke liye aik khaas tareeqay ایروبک galai کولائسس ka istemaal kya gaya is tareeqay mein bachpan se burhapay taq dimagh ki numoo mein honay wali tabdeelion ko jhanchne ke liye glucose ki sharah record ki jati hai zaeef afraad ke dimagh se glucose ki nihayat kam miqdaar pump hoti hai jis ke baais dimagh ke khaliyaat aur نروز ko muqarara tawanai muyassar nahi hopati lekin is Umar  ki khawateen mein bhi dekha gaya ke mardon ke muqablay mein un ke dimagh mein glucose ki waafar miqdaar mojood hoti hai science daano neh is tahaqeeq ke liye aik hi Umar  ki 121 khawateen aur 84 mardon ka intikhab kya un tamam afraad ke dimagh ka pi ای tea scan karaya gaya is test mein dimagh mein oxygen aur glucose ke بہاؤ ko naapa jata hai test ke nataij heran kin saabit hue khawateen ka dimagh apni Umar  ke lehaaz se 3 saal 8 mah jawan jab ke mardon ka dimagh 2 saal 4 mah ziyada boorha hota hai Lahore  ( web desk ) aabb zam zam aabb hayaat o Shifa  hai jis mein siwaye mout ke har terhan ka ilaaj mojood hai
yeh Rohani  o muqaddas pani hai jis quran o ahadees mein bohat si فضیلتیں bayan farmai gayi hain mujhe aik salk ne bataya tha ke usay haram shareef ke aik khadim ne bataya tha ke is ne cancer ke aik mareez ko dekha jo jaan bulb tha log usay utha kar namaz ke waqt masjid mein laatay they woh rozana zam zam ka pani peeta aur isi pani ko apni رسولیوں par daal kar din bhar ke liye mazeed pani hamrah le jata mein apna tajurbah bhi bayan karta hon jab bhi omra par jata hon kaaba shareef mein qiyam ke douran khoob aabb zam zam peeta hon aur meri sugar aur blood pressure ka naam o nshan nahi rehta watan wapsi par bhi kayi mahino taq dawa nahi khaani padtee mujhe yaqeen hai aabb zam zam se Faiz  panay ke baad parhaiz kya jaye to har terhan ka marz jata rehta hai kaamil imaan walay ko Shifa  naseeb hoti hai hazrat Abuzer  ghaffari aabb zam zam ki Barkaat  ke baarey farmatay hain aik mahinay taq mera khana siwaye zam zam ke kuch nah tha mein mota hogaya aur mere pait mein motapay ki wajah se silwatein prhgyin aur mein ny a pannay kaleje mein bhook ki natwani nahi payi hazrat Abuzer  ghaffari ka yeh waqea bukhari shareef mein bhi mojood hai ke woh chalees din khaye piyay baghair kaaba shareef se lagey sirf zam zam ke pani par guzaraa karte rahay jis par nabi? nay﻿ farmaya ke yeh khana bhi hai aur piinaa bhi aur sab se barh kar yeh tabiyat ko bahaal karta hai nabi pak? zam zam ke pani ko bartano aur مشکیزوں mein bhar kar le jatay aur bimaroon par چھڑکتے aur un ko pilate lehaza maloom sun-hwa ke yeh pani bukhaar ki hararat ko thanda karta hai mareezon par chirakna aur un ko pilana sahih ahadees se saabit hai imam Ibn  Ali  faasi nay﻿ aabb zam zam ke tehattar naam zikar kiye hain jin mein bemari se Shifa  bhi shaamil hai rio d janeiro hum jantay hain ke duniya koi ghiza ya dawa werzish ki jagah nahi le sakti aur ab mahireen naay werzish ki aik aur zabardast ahmiyat bayan kar di hai ke doranِ kasrat jism aik aisa hormone kharij karta hai jo kayi dimaghi bimarion ki jarr bemari الزائیمر ko la-haq honay se rokta hai brazil mein waqay federal university of ryo d jniro se wabsta فرنینا d فیلکا ke mutabiq jab jab hum baqaidagi se werzish karte hain to jism aik hormone آئریسن ka afraaz karta hai jo pathon ke azlaat se kharij hokar khoon mein shaamil hota rehta hai werzish karne walay مردوخواتین mein yeh hormone ziyada jabkay werzish se jee churanay walon mein kam paaya jata hai mahireen ny is hormone ko choohon par azmaane ki koshish ki to herat angaiz inkishafaat hue jaisay hi choohon mein آئریسن ki kami ki gayi un ki yad dasht mutasir hui aur woh seekhnay aur samajhney mein bhi mushkilaat mehsoos karne lagey aglay marhalay mein un ke andar آئریسن ki miqdaar bahaal ki gayi to choohon ki manfi kefiyat jati rahi aglay marhalay mein werzish karne walay choohon mein الزائیمر ki kefiyat peda ki gayi magar آئریسن ke signal ko agay bherne se rokkk diya gaya aur nateejay mein un ke dimagh ko werzish se honay walay faiday bhi gayab hogaye Bartania  mein الزائیمر ki maahir dr Rosa  سانچو naay kaha ke khasosan Umar  Raseedah  afraad mein jismani mushaqqat aur werzish dimagh ko behtar banati hai aur is tahaqeeq se werzish ke hayatiati asraat wazeh hue hain mahireen naay kaha hai ke baqaidagi se werzish aap ko mustaqbil mein kayi dimaghi aarzon se بچاسکتی hai aur is ki wajah yahi hai ke الزائیمر ke mareezon ko aisi duwaein di jati hain jo jism mein آئریسن ki pedawar aur farahmi barhati hain agarchay yeh tahaqeeq choohon par ki gayi hai taham insanon mein jismani werzish aur dimaghi fawaid ke naqablِ tardeed saboot samnay aachukay hain aur isi bana par mahireen werzish ka mahswara day rahay hain Karachi  Pakistan  international airline ( pi aayi ae ) ke cheif operations Afsar  si اواو Zia  Qadir  Qureshi  ko kharab karkardagi ke baais un ke ohday se bar tarf kardiya zaraye ke mutabiq Zia  Qureshi  ko qaumi airline ke miyaar ke mutabiq un ke faraiz mein kami ke baais 17 augst ko un ke ohday se bar tarf kya gaya tha zaraye naay yeh bhi bataya ke si o o pi aayi ae ko jo maqasid haasil karne ke liye tainaat kya gaya tha woh inhen haasil karne mein bhi nakaam hogaye dawn naay jab pi aayi ae ke tarjuman Mashhood  تجوار se rabita kya to unhon ne Zia  Qadir  Qureshi  ki bartarfi ki tasdeeq karte hue bataya ke un ka kantrikt khatam kardiya gaya hai aaditr general Pakistan  ne Zia  Qadir  Qureshi  ki taenati ko karam nawazi qarar dete hue un ki fori bartarfi ka mutalba kya aur kaha ke si o o ko jin logon ne mulazmat di thi un ke khilaaf karwai honi chahiye zaraye ne bataya ke Zia  Qadir  Qureshi  sabiq wazeer-e-azam ke musheer baraye hwabazi mehtaab Abasi  ke chaheetey kahe jatay they jinhein 5 June  2017 ko 15 laakh rupay mahana thankhowa par mulazmat di gayi thi Zia  Qadir  Qureshi  ka jab taqarrur kya gaya tha to un ki retirement ki intehai Umar  ke sirf teen mah baqi reh gaye they pi aayi ae ki cheif human risors Afsar  asmaa bajoh ney si o o ki bartarfi ka notification jari kya jo bzatِ khud bhi pi aayi ae ki کانٹریٹ mulazma hain bartarfi notification mein Zia  قارد Qureshi  ko kaha gaya ke un ki retirement ki intehai Umar  ke baad taqarruri un ki shash mahi karkardagi se mashroot thi zaraye ney is hawalay se bataya ke Zia  Qadir  Qureshi  ko 2 martaba shash mahi karkardagi jaiza meeting ke liye madoo kya gaya tha lekin unhon ney aik bhi meeting mein shirkat nahi ki Amrici  technology companiyon' کوال com' aur' Apple ' ke درمیاب patent ke tanaza par chain ki adalat ney' aayi phone' ki chain mein farokht par pabandi aed kar di
adalat naay –apne bayan mein kaha ke فوژو intermediate peoples part کوال com ki darkhwast par fori tor par aayi phone 6ایس, aayi phone 6ایس plus, aayi phone 7, aayi phone 7 plus, aayi phone 8, aayi phone 8 plus aur aayi phone x ki farokht roknay ka hukum deti hai
adalat ne aayi phone ko کوال com ke soft viyrz ke do pitnt ki khilaaf warzi ka murtakib qarar diya
America  ki do barri tecnology companiyon کوال com aur Apple  ke darmain aik arsay se pitnt aur royalty par adalti jung jari hai
کوال com ke wakeel don rosin barg naay –apne bayan mein kaha ke appeal hamari antlikchoyl properly se faida utha raha tha jabkay hamein harjana ada karne se bhi mana kardiya
software ke pitnt ke hawalay se masail ke baad Apple  مزیدمسائل se bachney ke liye apna software tayyar kere gi taakay woh –apne phone beech sakay
کوال com ny Amrici  hakkaam se bhi mutalba kiya hai ke woh pitnt ke masail ke sabab aayi phone par pabandi aed kere lekin is hawalay se inkaar karte rahay hain
nai Dehli  / 4 dsmbr ( agency )' desi girl' prinka chopra America  ki signer adakara nuk جونس se shadi kar ke jald hi America  jany wali hai, is se pehlay yeh jori aaj ( 4 dsmbr ) ko Dehli  mein apni shadi ka rispshn dainay jari hai, prinka chopra aur nuk ki shadi jodhpor ke umeed bhuvan mein hui hai, jahan chopra aur جونس khandan ny kaafi masti ki hai, lekin is ke darmain prinka ki honay wali dewrani ka desi style prinka ke indian fins ko kuch ziyada hi pasand aa rahi hai. prinka chopra ke dever جونس ki mangetar سوفی ٹنر american TV industry ka jana maana naam hai, btadin ke duniya bhar mein mashhoor TV series game of thrones mein سوفی turner ahem kirdaar mein hai. apni کلائیوں par barf milnay ka kya faida hota hai maahir nafsiat naay behtareen nuskha batadiya London  ( monitoring disk ) shadi bayah aur deegar t_hwaron par ensaan ko kayi terhan ki trghibat ka saamna hota hai jin mein kayi aik manfi bhi hoti hain maslan ziyada cigrette ki talabb waghera agar un khwahisaat ko poora nah kya jaye to ensaan zehni تناؤ ka shikaar ho jata hai ab aik maahir nafsiat naay un manfi trghibat se chhutkara panay ka aik intahi aassan hal bta diya hai di mirror ke mutabiq jo ہیمنگزنامی is maahir ka kehna hai ke mukhtalif t_hwaron par jab aap khusihyan mana rahay hotay hain توماحول aisa hota hai ke aadmi khud ko kuch manfi sar garmion se rokkk nahi paata aisay log jo cigrette ya isi noo ki deegar muzar e sehat ashya chorney ki koshish kar rahay hon koi tehwar aa jaye to un ki koshish nakaam ho jati hai himngz ke mutabiq aisay logon ko chahiye ke tehwar ke douran mukhtalif waqfon se apni کلائیوں par barf رگڑتے rahen is se un ke andar mukhtalif ashya ke liye uthnay wali talabb kam ho jaye gi is se inhen zehni تناؤ se bhi nijaat mili gi jaisay hi log samjhain ke inhen kisi cheez ke liye be qarar ho rahi hai inhen chahiye ke foran thori barf len aur kuch der ke liye usay apni کلائیوں par ragarna shuru kar den jo log cigrette chhorna chahtay hain yeh tareeqa un ke liye bhi bohat faida mand ho sakta hai
